# language_name:        Misima-Paneati
# closest ISO 639-3:    mpx
# ISO_15924:            Latn
# year_short:           1947
# year_long:            1947, 1997, 2011 Bible Society Papua New Guinea
# vernacular_title:     Bateli Vavaluna
# english_title:        The Bible in Misima-Paneati
# URL:                  http://pngscriptures.org/mpx/
# copyright_short:      © Bible Society Papua New Guinea 1947
# copyright_long:       
# notes:                
01001001	Abatelipuna elana Yabowaine labulabum ge panayawi i ginolil .
01001002	He panayawi i enonovan ya , ge nigeya ga ana awa i mamasal i oola te sauga ya . Gogou kubwa wewel limwalimwanina i yabom , ge Yabowaine Yayaluwana i nononawanawa wewel pwatanaa .
01001003	Yaka Yabowaine i ba , “ Mwananal ni gan , ” inoke mwananal i gan .
01001004	Inoke Yabowaine i kite mwananal i waisi ge i yaliyaya-an . Mwananal ge gogou i teli walel ,
01001005	yaka mwananal alana i tun “ lan ” ge gogou alana i tun “ bulin . ” He bulin i gan ge lan i gan , * lan houwan to .
01001006	Yaka Yabowaine i ba , “ Hawawal ni gan wewel nuwana tabonaa ge wewel ni tagawali . ”
01001007	Yabowaine hawawal i ginol ge wewel i wali eluwe , etega i minaa hawawal pwatanaa ge etega i minaa gabulanaa . Inoke i gan i ola to .
01001008	Yaka Yabowaine hawawal alana i tun “ labulabum . ” He bulin i gan ge lan i gan , lan eluwana to .
01001009	Yaka Yabowaine i ba , “ Wewel toto labulabum gabulanaa ni tub pahipahi , inoke bilibili kekevana ni masal . ” Inoke i gan i ola to .
01001010	Yaka Yabowaine bilibili kekevana alana i tun “ datu , ” ge wewel i tub pahipahi alana i tun “ hoga . ” Inoke Yabowaine i kite i waisi ge i yaliyaya-an .
01001011	Yaka Yabowaine i ba , “ Mwawin bolo enowaliya pwatum ge ebwakil bolo enowaliya pwatumwina gaganina tomaha ge tomaha nihi gan nihi siun datuwa . ” Inoke i gan i ola to .
01001012	Mwawin tomaha ge tomaha ge ebwakil tomaha tomaha hi gan hi siun datuwa . Inoke Yabowaine i kite i waisi ge i yaliyaya-an .
01001013	He bulin i gan ge lan i gan , lan etonina to .
01001014	Yaka Yabowaine i ba , “ Mwananal ona nihi gan labulabumwa , heliya lan ge bulin nihi teli walel , nihi ola etotohi , lan , baliman , ge tal ona kaiweliya ,
01001015	ge nihi yana labulabumwa panayawi nihi yane . ” Inoke i gan i ola to .
01001016	Yabowaine mwananal bwabwatal labui i ginolil , toto mwananalina bwabwatana lan ni logugui-an , ge toto mwananalina kekeisi bulin ni logugui-an . I ola al putum i ginolil .
01001017	Yabowaine i telel labulabumwa panayawi hi yane ,
01001018	lan ge bulin hi logugui-an , ge mwananal ge gogou hi teli walel . Inoke Yabowaine i kite i waisi ge i yaliyaya-an .
01001019	He bulin i gan ge lan i gan , lan esopalena to .
01001020	Yaka Yabowaine i ba , “ Bugul bolo yawaliliya gaganil hoga nihi pakalaopopwi , ge bwasumu nihi youyou hawawala panayawi pwatanaa .
01001021	Yabowaine moti bwabwatal hot ge bugul yawaliliya gaganil bolo hoga hi kalaopopwi tomaha ge tomaha i ginolil . I ola al bwasumu bolo hi youyou tomaha ge tomaha i ginolil . Inoke Yabowaine i kite hi waisi ge i yaliyaya-agil .
01001022	Yaka Yabowaine i ba muloluagil i ba , “ Moti , nuku talaabab ge nuku gewi , yaka nuku debalala hoga nuku pakalaopopwi . Bwasumu bolo ku youyou , nuku gewi yaka nuku debalala panayawi pwatanaa . ”
01001023	He bulin i gan ge lan i gan , lan nimala panunana to .
01001024	Yaka Yabowaine i ba , “ Bugul bolo yawaliliya gaganil tomaha ge tomaha nihi masal datuwa : bolo totounuwal , bolo hi yawayawal bilibili pwatanaa , ge bolo bekikil , tomaha ge tomaha . ” Inoke i gan i ola to .
01001025	Yabowaine bwasumu bekikil tomaha ge tomaha , bwasumu totounuwal tomaha ge tomaha , ge bugul bolo hi yawayawal bilibili pwatanaa tomaha ge tomaha i ginolil . Inoke Yabowaine i kite i waisi ge i yaliyaya-an .
01001026	Yaka Yabowaine i ba , “ Gamagal ta ginol totola kanukanunula elana ge ni ola kila , yaka moti hogaa , bwasumu bolo hawawala , bwasumu totounuwal , bwasumu bekikil ge bugul bolo hi yawayawal bilibili pwatanaa gegewel nihi logugui-agil . ”
01001027	Yabowaine gamagal i ginol totona kanukanununa elana , he iya Yabowaine totona kanukanununa elana i ginolil ; gamagalau i ginolil tau ge yova .
01001028	Yaka Yabowaine i ba muloluagil i ba , “ Nuku talaabab ge nuku gewi , yaka nuku debalala panayawi nuku pakalaopopwi ge ni minaa wami logugui gabulanaa . Moti hogaa , bwasumu bolo hawawala ge bugul gegewel yawaliliya gaganil bolo hi nawanawa bilibili pwatanaa nuku logugui-agil . ”
01001029	Yaka Yabowaine i baek elal i ba , “ Mwawin gegewel panayawi pwatanaa bolo enowaliya pwatum ge ebwakil gegewel bolo enowaliya pwatumwina gaganina ya pewa . He nuku ahel aanan kaiwena .
01001030	Ge bwasumu gegewel panayawiya , bwasumu gegewel hawawala , ge bugul gegewel bolo hi nawanawa bilibili pwatanaa , he bugul gegewel yawaliliya gaganil , mwawin ge ebwakil lamwaliya gegewena ya pek eliyalil aanan kaiwena . ” Inoke i gan i ola to .
01001031	Inoke Yabowaine bugul gegewel i ginolil i kitel hi waisi hot ge i yaliyaya-agil . He bulin i gan ge lan i gan , lan sikisina to .
01002001	Inoke Yabowaine labulabum ge panayawi ginebi ge buguliliyau gegewel i ginolil habal .
01002002	He mulaa abwe lan sebenina Yabowaine tuwalali gegewena i ginolil iyaka i pwamowasi , inoke lan sebenina elana i veyahoem wana tuwalali elana .
01002003	Inoke lan sebenina i ba muloluan ge i teli i bwabwalena , kaiwena lan o elana i veyahoem wana tuwalali gegewena elal bolo iyaka i ginolil .
01002004	Yehoba labulabum ge panayawi i ginolil i mowasi , yaka liwanina i ola hiwe . Sauga Yehoba Yabowaine labulabum ge panayawi i ginolil , inoke gamagal al i ginol .
01002005	Houwan ga nige ebwakil etega o ebo mwawin etega i sisiun bilibiliya , ebo uleya , ebo eyowaa , kaiwena Yehoba Yabowaine nigeya ga kehe i papatuna bilibili i papahun , ge nige gamagal i gagan tage bilibili ni eyowa-an .
01002006	He gogau i heem bilibiliya yaka tutulina bilibili pwatana gegewena i pahunhun .
01002007	Yehoba Yabowaine bilibili i ahe gamagal i ginoliya , yaka yawal yawalina gaganina i yana papanetan buhunaa , inoke gamagal yawalina i gan .
01002008	He Yehoba Yabowaine eyowa * iyaka i ginol labi balimana , labena Ideni elana , inoke tau toto i ginol i teliya eyowa o elana .
01002009	Yehoba Yabowaine ebwakil tomaha ge tomaha ali awa waiwaisal ge enowaliya waiwaisana aanan kaiwena i pasiuniliya to . Eyowa nuwanaa ebwakil labui hi siunaa , yawal ana ebwakil ge aatena gegewena waiwaisana ge nanakina ana ebwakil .
01002010	Wewel etega i sani solaa labena Ideni gamwanaa eyowa i pahunhun . Yaka abwe i wali lalana esopali hi tabwa wewel unuliya .
01002011	Wewel houwan alana Pison , iya i sani solaa labi Havila gamwanaa . ( He labi o elana gold i minaa ,
01002012	goldina i waisi hot . I ola al ebwakil etega suina hi aahe bugul bwalena waiwaisana hi ginoliya ge pat ali awa waiwaisal hi gan al to . )
01002013	Wewel eluwana alana Gihon , iya i sani solaa labi Kus gamwanaa .
01002014	Wewel etonina alana Taigilis , iya i sani olak panuwa Asul labena balimana , ge wewel esopalena alana Yupeleitis .
01002015	Yehoba Yabowaine tau i ahe i teliya Ideni eyowana elana , inoke ni tuwalali-an ge ni matahikan .
01002016	Yaka Yehoba Yabowaine i baek tau elana i ba , “ I bosowaina te ebwakil gegewel eyowa gamwanaa enowaliya nu anan ya ;
01002017	yaa aatena gegewena waiwaisana ge nanakina ana ebwakil enowana bahi nu aan , kaiwena sauga toto ebo nu an , he nasi nu aliga . ”
01002018	Inoke Yehoba Yabowaine i ba , “ Nige i wawaisi te tau maisena ya ni mimwaumwau . Ana tolaba etega na ginol iya alona . ”
01002019	He Yehoba Yabowaine iyaka bilibili i ahe bwasumu gegewel i ginoliliya , bolo hi nawanawa bilibili pwatanaa ge bolo hi youyou hawawala . Inoke i enil pwatanik tau elana ge ni kite tau alaliya ga ni tun ola . Inoke tau bwasumu bolo totounuwal , bolo hi youyou hawawala ge bolo bekikil gegewel alaliya i tun . Bugul gegewel alaliya ga i tun ola , he alaliya i ola to . Yaa Adama * nige ana tolaba etega i pwapwawa ge alona .
01002020	
01002021	Inoke Yehoba Yabowaine tau i pakenu mati . Sauga i kenukenu , inoke luluna tutuwana etega i ahe , yaka tuwana i kaus pasikal .
01002022	Yehoba Yabowaine tau luluna tutuwana i ahe yova i ginoliya , yaka i pwatanik tau elana .
01002023	Sauga tau yova i kite , yaka i ba , “ He abwe o hulhula hot . Tutuwana i neem tutuwau elana ge bunumwina i neem bunumwiu elana . Inoke alana na tun ‘ yova ’ * kaiwena i masalem tau tuwana elana .
01002024	Heiya te kaiwena tau tamana ge hinana ni miluwagil ni na alona ge lagona nihi mipamaisena , inoke ali toto labui nihi ola tuwan maisena .
01002025	He Adama ge lagona hi bokaboka , yaa nige hi pupuluwawi .
01003001	Bwasumu bolo Yehoba Yabowaine i ginolil gamwaliyaa , he gegewel mwata i siba lakel . Yaka mwata i baek yova elana i ba , “ Age Yabowaine ebwakil gegewel eyowa gamwanaa enowaliya i lopwali bahi nuku aan ? ”
01003002	Inoke yova mwata anana i lahe i ba , “ Bosowaina ya ebwakil gegewel eyowa gamwanaa enowaliya naha anan ya ,
01003003	iyai ya te ebwakil toto i siuna eyowa nuwanaa enowana nige naha aan . Yabowaine i ba , ‘ Ebwakil o enowana bahi nuku aan o ebo nuku pipihikan , eba nuku aliga . ’
01003004	Yaka mwata i baek yova elana i ba , “ Nigeya ! Nige nuku aaliga .
01003005	Yabowaine i ba ola o kaiwena i atena te sauga ebo nuku an , he abwe matamiu ni mwapwela yaka bugul gegewena waiwaisana ge nanakina nuku atena ge nuku ola iya Yabowaine . ”
01003006	Yova ebwakil i kite ana awa i waisi ge enowana i waisi aanan kaiwena . I ola al i nuwatu i ba , “ I waisi te na an inoke na siba . ” Inoke enuna i ahe i an . I ola al enuna i pek lagona i an .
01003007	Yaka mataliya i mwapwela ge hi kitel age hi bokaboka , inoke poga lamwana hi bugulan ge hi helil tuwaliya ana ekaukaus .
01003008	Kokoyaviya vetutulina elana Yehoba Yabowaine i nawanawa eyowa gamwanaa , yaka butuna tau ge lagona hi hago , inoke hi na hi bunsumi ebwakil gamwaliyaa .
01003009	Yaka Yehoba Yabowaine i yoga tau elana i ba , “ Owa ga ? ”
01003010	Anana tau i lahe i ba , “ Butum ya hago u nawanawa eyowa gamwanaa , inoke ya lovakun ge ya bunsumi , kaiwena ya bokaboka . ”
01003011	Inoke Yehoba Yabowaine i ba , “ Ga i ola ge u atena te u bokaboka ? Henala ge wam wasa i pewa ? Bi ola ebwakil toto ya lopwali enowana u an ? ”
01003012	Yaka tau i ba , “ Yova toto u pem alou , iya te ebwakil o enowana enuna i pem ya an . ”
01003013	Inoke Yehoba Yabowaine i baek yova elana i ba , “ Ga i ola ge u ginol ola o ? ” Yaka yova i ba , “ Mwata i kakaweyau inoke ya ahe ya an . ”
01003014	Yaka Yehoba Yabowaine i baek mwata elana i ba , “ Kaiwena ginol ya u ginol , inoke sauga ya na ba nuwamut-agiwa ge am lahi na baunan . Am pulowan bwasumu gegewel totounuwal ge bekikil ali pulowan ni bwata lake . Yawalim ana minamina gegewena elana , tinem nu uluwan ge bilibili pwapwalanana kokowam ni papakove .
01003015	Na ba owa alom ge yova nuku pepihigelgel-agimiu , i ola al tubutubunim ge iya tubutubunina nihi pepihigelgel-agil . Tubutubunina etega kokowam abwe ni puligebal ge owa aena gunina nu tal . ” *
01003016	Yaka i baek yova elana i ba , “ Na ba owa wam liyan elana pulowan ni gewi nu pwawa , ge wam ab elana lomwan bwabwatana nu pwawa . Lagom ana nuwan ni gasisi eliyam ge iya ni logugui-agiwa . ”
01003017	Yaka i baek Adama elana i ba , “ Owa lagom wana baaba u hago ge ebwakil enowana toto ya lopwali u an . Kaiwena ginol o u ginol , inoke sauga ya na ba bilibili ni nak . Yawalim ana minamina gegewena elana nu tuwalali gagasisi ge nu lomwan mulaa abwe enowana nu an .
01003018	Pepesala ge mwawin nanakina nihi siunem bilibiliya kaiwem , yaa aanan nu eyowa-an ga mulaa abwe nu anan .
01003019	Nu tuwalali gagasisi lamwam ni alutan mulaa abwe nu anan , ana siga nu sikal bilibili elana , toto ya ahe ya ginoliwa . Kaiwena owa bilibili , yaka nu sikal nu tabwa bilibili . ”
01003020	Adama lagona alana i tun Ive , * kaiwena iya gamagalau gegewel yawaliliya gaganina hinaliya .
01003021	Inoke Yehoba Yabowaine bwasumu kunisina i ahe Adama ge lagona ali kaliko i ginoliya yaka i pagaloil .
01003022	Yaka Yehoba Yabowaine i ba , “ Gamagal iyaka bugul gegewena waiwaisana ge nanakina i atena ge i ola kila . Nige bosowaina ge ta talamwan yawal ana ebwakil enowana al ni ahe ni an , eba yawalina ni mihot . ”
01003023	Inoke Yehoba Yabowaine tau ge yova i patuna owaowa-agil hi tagil Ideni eyowana elana , yaka tau bilibili ni eyowa-an , toto Yabowaine i ahe ge i ginoliya .
01003024	Tau ge yova i patuna owaowa-agil i mowasi , yaka bwasumu opeliya gaganina * ge elohaveyan kilepana tautauina i huli pwapwati labi gegewena elal , i telel Ideni eyowana labena balimana . Inoke kamwasa hi kausil bahi gamagal etega ni nonok yawal ana ebwakil elana .
01004001	Adama alona ge lagona Ive hi kenukenu , yaka i liyan , inoke natuna melutauina i ab . Yaka i ba , “ Yehoba wana labe eliyana wawaya melutauina ya pwawa . ” Inoke alana i tun Keni . *
01004002	Yaka abwe al talina Eibol i liyanan ge i ab . Sauga wawayau hi lobwata , inoke Eibol i tabwa sipi ali tomatahikan ge Keni iya toeyowa .
01004003	Abwe Keni wana eyowa enowana enuna i ahe ge i pek Yehoba ana powon .
01004004	Eibol wana sipi bolo ab houwan enuna i lolil , yaka gabomwiliya waiwaisal i ahel ge i pek Yehoba ana powon . Yaka Yehoba Eibol ge wana powon i yaliyaya-an ,
01004005	yaa Keni ge wana powon nige i yayaliyaya-an . Inoke Keni i huga nabi ge maninina i lala .
01004006	Inoke Yehoba i baek Keni elana i ba , “ Hauna kaiwena u huga ge maninim i lala ?
01004007	Binimala ebo wam ginol ni sapu , he nasi na yaliyaya-agiwa . Yaa ebo wam ginol ni nak , he gegi iyoho i matamatan ni apanakiwa . Nuwana ni ahewa , yaa owa nu gasisi lake . ”
01004008	Inoke Keni i baek talina Eibol elana i ba , “ Ta na ta nawanawa uleya . ” Sauga hi na uleya , yaka Keni i tatalut talina i tagapaaliga .
01004009	Yaka Yehoba i baek Keni elana i ba , “ Talim Eibol iya ga ? ” Anana Keni i lahe i ba , “ Nige ya aatena . Age nau taliu ana tomatahikan ? ”
01004010	Yaka Yehoba i ba , “ Hauna kaiwena ginol nanakina ya u ginol ? Talim saliyana i lau bilibiliya ge i kahin ha eliyau , nuwana ana lol lahena na ginol .
01004011	Talim u tagapaaliga ge saliyana bilibili u paim , inoke am ba nuwamut na baunan na ba bilibili ni nak nige al bosowaim nu tuwalali-an .
01004012	Sauga ebo bilibili nu eyowa-an , he nige wam tuwalali enowana ni pepewa . Nige abam hot ni gagan , yaa nu nononawanawa ya panayawiya . ”
01004013	Yaka Keni i baek Yehoba elana i ba , “ Lahi ya i bwata hot ge nige bosowaiu na mikalivai !
01004014	He iyaka u patuna owaowa-agau nige al bosowaina bilibili na tuwalali-an ge o bwaga ni yapu maninimwa . Nige abau hot ni gagan , yaa na nononawanawa ya panayawiya . Ge ebo gamagalau nihi nopwawau , nasi nihi tagapaaligau . ”
01004015	Yaka Yehoba i baek Keni elana i ba , “ Nigeya ! Ebo gamagal etega ni tagapaaligawa , wana ginol o lahena na ginol elana ni bwata hot . ” Inoke Yehoba etotohi etega i teli Keni tuwanaa i lopwali ebo gamagalau Keni nihi nopwawa bahi nihi tatagapaaliga .
01004016	Yaka Keni i egon ana bwaga i yapu Yehoba manininaa , i na i minaa panuwa alana Nodi , * iyoho Ideni labena balimana .
01004017	Keni alona ge lagona hi kenukenu , yaka i liyan ge i ab , inoke wawaya alana hi tun Inok . ( He Keni panuwa bwabwatana i sepa ge i tal , yaka natuna Inok alana i tun pwatanek panuwa o elana . )
01004018	Abwe Inok natuna i gan alana Ilad . Yaka Ilad natuna alana Mehuyael , Mehuyael natuna alana Metusael , ge Metusael natuna alana Lemeki .
01004019	Lemeki yowau labui i alolonagil , etegana alana Eda ge etegana alana Silaa .
01004020	Eda i ab natuna alana Yabal , iya houwan hot i minaa epanapana elana yaka sipi , goti ge bulumwakau ali matamatahikan i pamasal .
01004021	Talina alana Yubal , iya hapi ge igo i galavenu-an pamasal .
01004022	Silaa i ab natuna alana Tubal-Keni , iya etuwalali tomaha ge tomaha kopa ge aiyan elana i ginoliya . He nuna alana Nama .
01004023	Lemeki i ba haha , i baek lagonau elalil i ba , “ Eda ge Silaa , nuku laegan eliyau , nau Lemeki lagowau komiu , no baaba nuku hago . Tau etega i lolau yaka ya tagapaaliga , he ya tagapaaliga kaiwena i palomwanagau .
01004024	Gamagal toto Keni ni tagapaaliga , wana ginol lahena ni bwata hot , yaa gamagal toto nau Lemeki ni lolau , wana ginol lahena nau na ginol eliyana ni bwata nabiyan hot . ”
01004025	Adama alona ge lagona hi kenukenu , yaka i liyan al ge i ab natuna melutau . Yaka i ba , “ Yabowaine natu etega al i pem Eibol lahena , kaiwena Keni Eibol i tagapaaliga . ” Inoke natuna alana i tun Seti . *
01004026	Abwe Seti natuna i gan alana i tun Inosi . He sauga o elana gamagalau hi telipuna hi tapwatapwalolo Yehoba elana .
01005001	Adama alonau natunau ge tubutubunau liwaniliya i ola hiwe . Sauga Yabowaine gamagal i ginolil , he iya totona kanukanununa elana i ginolil .
01005002	I ginolil tau ge yova , inoke i ba muloluagil , ge alaliya i tun , “ gamagal . ”
01005003	Adama wana baliman 130 yaka natuna tau etega al i gan . Wawaya ya Adama kanukanununa , i ola ya te iya . Inoke alana i tun Seti .
01005004	Seti hi ab enaa , Adama i minamina al baliman 800 yaka natunau bolau ge yowau enuna al hi gan .
01005005	He Adama wana baliman gegewena 930 i pwawa , yaka abwe i aliga .
01005006	Seti wana baliman 105 yaka natuna i gan alana Inosi .
01005007	Inosi hi ab enaa , Seti i minamina al baliman 807 yaka natunau bolau ge yowau enuna al hi gan .
01005008	He Seti wana baliman gegewena 912 i pwawa , yaka abwe i aliga .
01005009	Inosi wana baliman 90 yaka natuna i gan alana Keinan .
01005010	Keinan hi ab enaa , Inosi i minamina al baliman 815 yaka natunau bolau ge yowau enuna al hi gan .
01005011	He Inosi wana baliman gegewena 905 i pwawa , yaka abwe i aliga .
01005012	Keinan wana baliman 70 yaka natuna i gan alana Mahalalil .
01005013	Mahalalil hi ab enaa , Keinan i minamina al baliman 840 yaka natunau bolau ge yowau enuna al hi gan .
01005014	He Keinan wana baliman gegewena 910 i pwawa , yaka abwe i aliga .
01005015	Mahalalil wana baliman 65 yaka natuna i gan alana Yaledi .
01005016	Yaledi hi ab enaa , Mahalalil i minamina al baliman 830 yaka natunau bolau ge yowau enuna al hi gan .
01005017	He Mahalalil wana baliman gegewena 895 i pwawa , yaka abwe i aliga .
01005018	Yaledi wana baliman 162 yaka natuna i gan alana Inok .
01005019	Inok hi ab enaa , Yaledi i minamina al baliman 800 yaka natunau bolau ge yowau enuna al hi gan .
01005020	He Yaledi wana baliman gegewena 962 i pwawa , yaka abwe i aliga .
01005021	Inok wana baliman 65 yaka natuna i gan alana Metuisela .
01005022	Metuisela hi ab enaa , Inok i mipalalek hot Yabowaine elana baliman 300 al , yaka natunau bolau ge yowau enuna al hi gan .
01005023	He Inok wana baliman gegewena 365 i pwawa .
01005024	Inok i mipalalek hot Yabowaine elana , yaka lan etegana Yabowaine Inok i ahe egonan ge nige al hi kikite .
01005025	Metuisela wana baliman 187 yaka natuna i gan alana Lemeki .
01005026	Lemeki hi ab enaa , Metuisela i minamina al baliman ana gewi 782 yaka natunau bolau ge yowau enuna al hi gan .
01005027	He Metuisela wana baliman gegewena 969 i pwawa , yaka abwe i aliga .
01005028	Lemeki wana baliman 182 yaka natuna tau i gan .
01005029	Inoke i ba , “ Valila Yehoba i ba bilibili ni nak inoke ta tuwalali gagasisi ge ta lomwan , yaa wala lomwan o eliyana wawaya ya ni payaliyaya-agila . ” Inoke natuna alana i tun Nowa . *
01005030	Nowa hi ab enaa , Lemeki i minamina al baliman ana gewi 595 yaka natunau bolau ge yowau enuna al hi gan .
01005031	He Lemeki wana baliman gegewena 777 i pwawa , yaka abwe i aliga .
01005032	Nowa wana baliman 500 inoke natunau hi gan alaliya Semi , Hami ge Yapeta .
01006001	Sauga gamagalau hi gewi hi debalala panayawiya ge natuliyau yowau hi abil hi gewi ,
01006002	he Yabowaine natunau melutauil * panayawi gamagaliliyau natuliyau yowau hi kitel ali awa i lowaisi hot , inoke bolo nuwaliya i noek hi alolonagil .
01006003	Inoke Yehoba i ba , “ Yawal toto ya pek gamagalau eliyalil nige ni mimihot . He heliya gamagalau ya , yawaliliya abwe ni mowasi . Inoke yawaliliya ana yapu besena te baliman 120 . ”
01006004	He sauga Yabowaine natunau melutauil avaliyau panayawi gamagaliliyau natuliyau yowau hi kenu toyawa , yaka hi ab natuliyau hi hul kantutubwai . Inoke saugena o ge sauga o enaa al , gamagalau ololal o hi gan , heliya toasiyala bolo houhouwel , alaliya bwabwatana .
01006005	Yehoba i kite gamagalau wali gegi i bwata nabi ge nuwatu nanakina ya te hi mimi nuwanuwatu-an ateliyaa .
01006006	Yaka nuwana i nak ge i ba , “ Hauna kaiwena gamagalau ya ginolil ya telel panayawi ge hi gegi ? ” Inoke atena i palomwan nabiyan .
01006007	Yaka i ba , “ Gamagalau bolo ya ginolil , avaliyau bwasumu bolo hi nawanawa , bolo hi yawayawal ge bolo hi youyou , gegewel na pwamowasel . Nuwau i nak te ibwe ge ya ginolil . ”
01006008	Yaa Yehoba Nowa i awa wawaisian ge i yaliyaya-an .
01006009	He Nowa alonau natunau liwaniliya i ola hiwe . Nowa wana pagan i sapu ge iya maisena ya sauga o gamagaliliyau gamwaliyaa nige wana ginol nanakina i gagan , yaa i mipalalek hot Yabowaine elana .
01006010	He Nowa natunau bolau eton alaliya te Semi , Hami ge Yapeta .
01006011	Yabowaine matanaa gamagalau panayawi wali ginol i nak nabi ge lohalohaveyan i gasisi labena gegewena elal .
01006012	Yabowaine i kite panayawi iyaka i nak hot gamagalau gegewel wali pagan nanakina kaiwena .
01006013	Inoke i baek Nowa elana i ba , “ Ya nuwatu gamagalau gegewel ge panayawi na apanakil nihi mowasi , kaiwena wali lohalohaveyan i gasisi labena gegewena elal .
01006014	Inoke kewadi waiwaisal nu ahel nu talil wam waga etega nu ginol . Baba tomwa ona nu ginolil gamwanaa , yaka kolta * nu ahe gamwanaa ge tolinaa nu ebaliya .
01006015	He nu ginol ni ola hiwe : ana yapu 140 mita , ana magaga 23 mita ge ana miha 13.5 mita .
01006016	Pwatana nu kaus ge hawawal ana bwata ni ola 50 sentamita ni gan ana vavan ge ana helhel ali hawawala . Ana nog nu ginol bebenaa , ge gamwana eton nu ginolil , etegana paiya , etegana nuwanuwanaa , ge etegana natiya .
01006017	He nau abwe kehe na patuna panuwa ni tub ge nub ni ha , yaka bugul gegewel bolo hi yanayana yoho ni apanakil . Inoke bugul gegewel panayawi pwatanaa nihi aliga .
01006018	Yaa owa elam no bateli na ginol na pwamwalimiu . He alomwau lagom , natumwau ge lagoliyau , nuku na nuku ulutuk wagaa .
01006019	Bwasumu gegewel yawaliliya gaganina , eluwa eluwa , tau ge yova , nu ahel , inoke bahi nihi aaliga .
01006020	Bwasumu bolo hi youyou gegewel , bolo hi nawanawa gegewel ge bolo hi yawayawal gegewel , eluwa eluwa alomwau nuku tuk wagaa , inoke bahi nihi aaliga .
01006021	I ola al aanan tomaha tomaha ona nu ahel ge nu bugul tukagil alomiyau ge bwasumu amiu . ”
01006022	Inoke Nowa bugul gegewena i ginol i ola Yabowaine wana baaba .
01007001	Yaka lan etega Yehoba i baek al Nowa elana i ba , “ Heyan sauga ya gamwaliyaa , ya kitewa owa maisem wam pagan i sapu . Inoke alomwau am heniheni ku na ku ulutuk wagaa .
01007002	Bwasumu gegewel bolo bosowaina powon , ali gewi seben , aloliyau ge lagoliyau , nu ahel . Bwasumu gegewel bolo nige bosowaina powon , eluwa eluwa , aloliyau ge lagoliyau , nu ahel .
01007003	Ge bwasumu gegewel bolo hi youyou , ali gewi seben , aloliyau ge lagoliyau , nu ahel . He nu ahel alomwau nuku ulutuk wagaa , inoke bwasumu tomaha ona bahi etega ni momowasi panayawiya .
01007004	Lan seben ya ni mowasi , yaka na ba lan poti ge bulin poti kehe ni laulau . Inoke bugul gegewel yawaliliya gaganina bolo ya ginolil , na pwamowasel panayawiya . ”
01007005	Inoke Nowa bugul gegewena i ginol i ola Yehoba wana baaba .
01007006	He Nowa wana baliman 600 te nub i ha .
01007007	Yaka alonau lagona , natunau ge lagoliyau , hi ulutuk wagaa nub hi lou luwan .
01007008	He avaliyau bwasumu bolo hi nawanawa , bolo hi youyou ge bolo hi yawayawal — bolo bosowaina powon ge bolo nige bosowaina powon .
01007009	Bwasumu gegewel o , eluwa eluwa , tau ge yova , avaliyau hi ulutuk wagaa i ola Yabowaine wana baaba .
01007010	Lan seben i mowasi , yaka panuwa i tub ge nub i ha .
01007011	He liwanina i ola hiwe . Nowa wana baliman 600 , weikena eluwana ana lan sebentinina elana , wewel bwabwatana i sani heem bilibili gamwanaa , ge labulabum i mwapwela kehe i maligin laulau .
01007012	Yaka lan poti ge bulin poti kehe i mimi laulau .
01007013	Lan toto o elana Nowa alonau lagona , natunau Semi , Hami ge Yapeta , aloliyau lagoliyau hi ulutuk wagaa .
01007014	He avaliyau bwasumu sosokal tomaha ge tomaha , bwasumu totounuwal tomaha ge tomaha , bwasumu bolo hi yawayawal tomaha ge tomaha , ge bwasumu bolo hi youyou tomaha ge tomaha .
01007015	Bugul gegewel bolo hi yanayana yoho , eluwa eluwa , tau ge yova , avaliya Nowa hi ulutuk wagaa ,
01007016	i ola Yabowaine wana baaba . He sauga Nowa i ulutuk , inoke Yehoba waga ana nog i kaus .
01007017	Lan poti ge bulin poti nub i haha ya . Wewel iyaka i bwata nabi , inoke waga i ota hin .
01007018	Wewel iyoho i bwabwata heheya , yaka waga i otaota wewel pwatanaa .
01007019	Wewel iyoho i bwabwata heheya , yaka oya i yabomwil ,
01007020	oya i heluwan ana miha i ola 7 mita .
01007021	Bugul gegewel panayawi pwatanaa hi aliga — bwasumu bolo hi youyou , bolo totounuwal , bolo bekikil ge bolo kekeisi ona , ginebi ge gamagal .
01007022	Bugul gegewel bolo hi yanayana yoho ge hi miminaa bilibili pwatanaa hi mowasi .
01007023	Yehoba bugul gegewel yawaliliya gaganina , gamagal , bwasumu bolo hi nawanawa , bolo hi yawayawal ge bolo hi youyou , i pwamowasel . Nowa alonau ge alonau bolo wagaa ya te hi mwal .
01007024	Lan ali gewi 150 wewel iyoho i bwata panayawi i yabom .
01008001	Yaa Nowa alonau ge bwasumu totounuwal ge bekikil wagaa , Yabowaine nige i nunuluwagil . Inoke i ba mana i towa panayawiya , yaka wewel i taltal lau .
01008002	He iyaka wewel bwabwatana nige al i sasani heem bilibili gamwanaa ge kehe nige al i mamaligin laulau .
01008003	Inoke wewel iyoho i taltal lau . Lan ali gewi 150 i mowasi wewel iyaka i lau ,
01008004	inoke weikena sebenina ana lan sebentinina elana , waga i buntal labi Alalat oyana etega elana .
01008005	Wewel iyoho i taltal lau , yaka weikena elulutega ana lan houwan elana oya pwataliya hi hopit .
01008006	Lan poti al i mowasi , Nowa waga ana windo toto iyaka i ginol i pwela
01008007	ge okok i patuna i you tagil . Nige i sisikal wagaa , he i youyou pwatpwat ya ana siga wewel i mowasi ge bilibili i kevakeva .
01008008	Yaka bunibuni al i patuna i tagil ge ni atena ebo wewel iyaka i tal lau ge bilibili i dato .
01008009	Yaa wewel iyoho ya i bwayabwaya bilibili i yayabom , inoke bunibuni nige wana abayoutal i pwapwawa . Yaka i you sikal i na wagaa , inoke Nowa nimana i paelu tagilan yaka bwasumu i youtala ge i teli tukan .
01008010	Nowa i matamatan al lan seben i mowasi , yaka bunibuni i patuna al i tagil .
01008011	Kokoyaviya bunibuni i you sikal Nowa elana , he olibe lamwana kolena etega i alahikan awanaa . Inoke Nowa i atena te wewel iyaka i tal lau .
01008012	Inoke i matamatan al lan seben i mowasi , yaka abwe bunibuni i patuna al i tagil . Yaa sauga toto o nige i yoyou sikal Nowa elana .
01008013	Nowa wana baliman 601 , weikena houwan ana lan houwan elana , wewel iyaka i tal lau ge bilibili i dato . Yaka Nowa waga pwatana i pwela yoho , inoke matana i nok i kite bilibili pwatana iyaka i dato .
01008014	He weikena eluwana ana lan tuwenti sebenina ( 27-ina ) elana bilibili iyaka i kevakeva hot .
01008015	Yaka Yabowaine i baek Nowa elana i ba ,
01008016	“ Alomwau lagom , natumwau ge lagoliyau waga ku loluwai ku tagil noleleya .
01008017	Bwasumu bolo hi youyou , bolo hi nawanawa ge bolo hi yawayawal , gegewel nu ahel alomwau nuku tagil tola . Inoke heliya abwe nihi talaabab ge nihi gewi , yaka nihi debalala panayawiya . ”
01008018	Yaka Nowa alonau lagona , natunau ge lagoliyau , waga hi loluwai hi tagil noleleya .
01008019	Yaka bwasumu bolo hi nawanawa , bolo hi yawayawal ge bolo hi youyou , tomaha ge tomaha ali pwahin elana hi tagilem wagaa .
01008020	Yaka Nowa pat i pahe abapowon i ginol ge ni tapwalolo Yehoba elana . Yaka bwasumu bolo bosowaina powon , bolo hi nawanawa ge bolo hi youyou , enuna i ahel ge i powon pwabwaligel Yehoba elana .
01008021	Yehoba powon bwalena i hago ge i awa wawaisian , yaka atena elana i ba , “ Bwagana gamagalau nuwatu nanakina ya te hi nuwanuwatu-an ateliyaa , i telipunaa wali sauga wawaya elana , he nige al na babaa ge panayawi na aapanak wali ginol nanakina kaiwena . Ge nige al bwasumu gegewel na aapapanak-agil ni oola toto iyaka ya ginol .
01008022	Panayawi miminana elana , logalagalauma ge lovelovetomwa , tultul ge kalakalas , kehe ge sabwelu , lan ge bulin , ni gangan ya nige ni momowasi . ”
01009001	Yaka Yabowaine Nowa ge natunau i ba muloluagil i ba , “ Nuku talaabab ge nuku gewi , yaka nuku debalala panayawi nuku pakalaopop .
01009002	Bwasumu gegewel , bolo hi nawanawa , bolo hi youyou , bolo hi yawayawal , ge moti gegewel nihi lovakunagimiu . Iyaka ya telel wami logugui elana ge nuku logugui-agil .
01009003	Bugul gegewel yawaliliya gaganina nuku anan ya . Valila bugul siusiunil enowaliya ge lamwaliya ya pewa amiu , yaa sauga ya bugul gegewena ya pewa eliyamiu aanan kaiwena .
01009004	Yaa bahi bunum salisaliyana nuku an , kaiwena yawal i minaa saliya eliyana . Saliya ga ni lohaba yaka abwe nuku an .
01009005	He ebo bwasumu etega gamagal etega ni tal saliyana ni lau ge yawalina ni mowasi , nau abwe ana lahi na ginol . I ola al ebo gamagal etega alona yawalina ni pwamowasi , nau abwe ana lahi na ginol .
01009006	Ebo gamagal etega alona yawalina ni pwamowasi , he iya al yawalina gamagalau nihi pwamowasi , kaiwena nau Yabowaine gamagalau ya ginolil totou kanukanunu elana .
01009007	He nuku talaabab ge nuku gewi , yaka ami boda ni bwata panayawiya . ”
01009008	Yaka Yabowaine i baek Nowa alonau natunau eliyalil i ba ,
01009009	“ Sauga ya no bateli na ginol eliyamiu , tubutubumiyau eliyalil ,
01009010	ge bugul gegewel bolo yawaliliya gaganina eliyalil — bwasumu bolo hi youyou , bolo totounuwal , ge bolo bekikil — bolo alomiyau ku tagilem wagaa .
01009011	He ya bateli te nige al na babaa nub ni gagan ge bwasumu gegewel ni pwapwamowasel , nige al nub panayawi ni aapapanak-an . ”
01009012	Yaka Yabowaine i ba al i ba , “ Bateli toto ya ginol eliyamiu ge bwasumu gegewel eliyalil , iya bateli mihomihotina heyan mulaa gegewel kaiweliya . He bateli o ana etotohi i ola hiwe .
01009013	Liliyal na ginol yaluyalu eliyalil , inoke ni tabwa no bateli ana etotohi , bateli toto ya ginol panayawi elana .
01009014	Sauga ebo yaluyalu na ginol panayawi ni yabom ge liliyal ni masal yaluyaluwa ,
01009015	yaka no bateli na nuwahikan , toto ya ginol eliyamiu ge bugul gegewel yawaliliya gaganina eliyalil . He nige al nub ni tutub ge bugul gegewena ni aapapanak-agil .
01009016	Sauga ebo liliyal ni masal yaluyalu eliyalil ge na kite , inoke ni panuwahikagau bateli mihomihotina kaiwena , toto nau Yabowaine ya ginol bugul gegewel yawaliliya gaganina panayawiya eliyalil . ”
01009017	He Yabowaine i ba i ola to Nowa elana , i ba , “ Liliyal iya no bateli ana etotohi , toto ya ginol bugul gegewel panayawiya eliyalil . ”
01009018	Nowa natunau bolo hi tagilem wagaa alaliya Semi , Hami ge Yapeta . ( He Hami iya Kenani tamana . )
01009019	Nowa natunau ali toto eton ya , heliya gamagalau gegewel panayawiya tubuliyau .
01009020	Nowa iya toeyowa ge iya houwan hot oine ana eyowa i ginol ge i galaumaan .
01009021	Sauga etegana Nowa oine i im kokona-an , yaka i kenu bokaboka wana epanapana gamwanaa .
01009022	Kenani tamana Hami i tuk tamana bobokana i kite , yaka i tagil i lowasawasa-an talinau eluwa elal .
01009023	Yaka Semi ge Yapeta kaliko etega hi ahe hi anal vevelaliyaa ge hi pihikan , yaka eliya hi huwalaan hi na tamaliya hi pahabobu . He mataliya hi ligetoga-an ge bahi tamaliya bobokana nihi kikite .
01009024	Sauga oine wana gasisi i mowasi ge Nowa i lut , yaka wasa i hago natuna toalaalahul Hami wana ginol kaiwena .
01009025	Inoke i ba : “ Sauga ya Kenani ya ba nuwamut-an . Iya ni totuwalali loloyowan hot talinau elal . ”
01009026	Yaka i ba al : Yehoba ya tobalan , iya Semi wana Yabowaine ! He Kenani ni totuwalali loloyowan Semi elana .
01009027	Ya awanun Yabowaine Yapeta wana labi ni pwabwata , i ola al tubutubunau ge Semi tubutubunau nihi mibubun . He Kenani ni totuwalali loloyowan elana . ”
01009028	Nub enaa , Nowa i minamina al baliman 350 .
01009029	He Nowa wana baliman gegewena 950 i pwawa , yaka abwe i aliga .
01010001	Nowa natunau Semi , Hami ge Yapeta , avaliyau natuliyau ge tubutubuniliyau liwaniliya i ola hiwe . He nub enaa natuliyau hi gewi hi abil .
01010002	Yapeta natunau bolau heliya Gomeli , Magog , Madai , Yavan , Tubal , Meseki ge Tilasi .
01010003	Gomeli natunau bolau te Askenasi , Lipat ge Togalama .
01010004	Yavan natunau bolau te Elaisa , Talsis , ge boda Kit tubuliya ge Lodan tubuliya .
01010005	He boda bolo hi miminaa Hoga Mediteleiniya bebenaa ge tavalina ona elal hi neem Yavan natunau o elal . Hi miminek tomaha wali labi ge wali panuwa ona elal , ge anan tomaha ona hi baubaunan .
01010006	Hami natunau bolau heliya Kus , Itipita , Puti ge Kenani .
01010007	Kus natunau bolau te Seeba , Havila , Sabita , Laama ge Sabiteka . Laama natunau bolau te Seba ge Dedan .
01010008	Kus tubutubunina etega te Nimlod . Iya haveyan ana toematana gasigasisena , yaka alonau wana boda panuwa hi gewi hi pakokovel .
01010009	Yehoba wana labe eliyana iwauka i sibaan . Inoke heiya te kaiwena gamagalau wali ebaaba etega i ola hiwe , “ Tau ya i ola te Nimlod , iya houhouwena Yehoba wana labe eliyana iwauka i sibaan . ”
01010010	Wana abalogugui i tal houwan labi Babiloniya elana , panuwa Babiloni , Elek , Akad ge Kalne elal .
01010011	Yaka abwe i na al labi Asiliya inoke panuwa bwabwatal bolo Ninibe , Lehobot-Il , Kala
01010012	ge Lesen i ginolil . He Lesen i minaa Ninibe ge panuwa bwabwatana Kala ali hawawala .
01010013	Itipita tubutubunau heliya boda Lud , Anam , Lehab , Naptuhi ,
01010014	Patulusi , Kasiluhi ge Kaptoli . He boda Pilistiya hi neem al boda Kaptoli elal .
01010015	Kenani natuna gamaun te Saidoni . Natunau al hi gan , inoke Kenani tubutubunau te boda Hiti ,
01010016	Yebusi , Amoli , Gegasi ,
01010017	Hivi , Alki , Sini ,
01010018	Alvadi , Semali ge Hamati . Un bolo Kenani tubutubunau hi miwaliwali labi tomaha ge tomaha ,
01010019	yaka labi toto hi miminaa i telipunaa panuwa Saidoni ge i nok Gelal kaiwena ana siga te Gasa , ge i ola al i nok Sodoma , Gomola , Adima ge Seboim kaiweliya ana siga te Lasa .
01010020	He Hami natunau ge tubutubunau i ola to . Inoke un bolo o anan tomaha ona hi baubaunan ge hi miminek tomaha wali labi ge wali panuwa ona elal .
01010021	Semi , iya Yapeta talina bwabwatana , natunau al hi gan . ( He iya Ebe alonau tubutubunau tubuliya houhouwena . )
01010022	Semi natunau bolau te Elam , Asul , Alpakad , Lud ge Alam .
01010023	Alam natunau bolau te Us , Hul , Geta ge Meseki .
01010024	Apakad iya Sela tamana ge Sela iya Ebe tamana .
01010025	Ebe natunau bolau eluwa . Etegana alana hi tun Peleg , * kaiwena wana sauga elana gamagalau hi miwaliwali panayawi labena gegewena elal . He Peleg talina alana hi tun Yoktan .
01010026	Yoktan natunau te Alimodad , Selep , Hasamavet , Yela ,
01010027	Hadolam , Usal , Dikila ,
01010028	Obal , Abimael , Seba ,
01010029	Opil , Havila ge Yobab . He Yoktan tubutubunau i ola to .
01010030	Labena toto hi miminaa i telipunaa Mesa ge i na Sepal , iyoho labi manaoyaoya toto balimana .
01010031	He Semi natunau ge tubutubunau i ola to . Inoke un bolo o anan tomaha ona hi baubaunan ge hi miminek tomaha wali labi ge wali panuwa ona elal .
01010032	He Nowa natunau ge tubutubunau ali lihu ana siga to , ge tomaha wali labi elana hi miminek . Inoke nub enaa , heliya eliyalil boda tomaha ona hi masalem ge hi miwaliwali panayawi labena gegewena elal .
01011001	Valila gamagalau gegewel panayawiya analiya maisena ya ge wali baaba i maisena .
01011002	He gamagalau hi mimi heheya labi balimana , inoke abwab bwabwatana etega hi pwawa labi Babiloniya elana yaka hi minaa to .
01011003	Yaka abwe hi pebaaba-agil hi ba , “ Ehei ! Bilibili ta ahe bilik ta ginolil yaka ta tonil ge nihi gasisi . ” Inoke hi ginol ola to , yaka bilik hi ahe limi hi taliya , ge kolta * hi ahe bilik hi papihikagil .
01011004	Yaka abwe hi ba , “ Ehei ! Wala panuwa bwabwatana etega ta ginol ge limi mihahaina hot etegana ta tal ni na ni tupa yaluyaluwa . Ta ginol ola o , inoke alala ni bwata ge bahi ta mimiwaliwali panayawi labena gegewena elal .
01011005	Yaa Yehoba i nem i lau panuwa bwabwatana ge limi mihahaina hot toto gamagalau hi taltal o i kitel .
01011006	Inoke i ba , “ Gamagalau ya heliya boda maisena ge anan maisena elana hi baaba . Sauga ya bugul ya hi giginol , he bwaliga abwe bugul ni gewi al nihi ginolil . Ebo bugul etega nihi nuwatuan , he bosowailiya ya te nihi awaawaginol ya .
01011007	Ehei ! Ta na ta lau analiya ta pasamwayagayaga inoke bahi avaliyau wali baaba ana sapu nihi aatena . ”
01011008	Inoke eliyana Yehoba gamagalau i waliwali-agil hi na panayawi labena gegewena elal , yaka panuwa o nige al hi tatal .
01011009	Inoke panuwa alana hi tun Babiloni * kaiwena panuwa o elana Yehoba gamagalau gegewel analiya i pasamwayagayaga , yaka eliyana i waliwali-agil panayawi labena gegewena elal .
01011010	Semi alonau natunau ge tubutubunau liwaniliya i ola hiwe . Nub i mowasi enaa baliman eluwana elana , Semi wana baliman 100 yaka natuna i gan alana Alpakad .
01011011	Alpakad hi ab enaa , Semi i minamina al baliman 500 yaka natunau bolau ge yowau enuna al hi gan .
01011012	Alpakad wana baliman 35 yaka natuna i gan alana Sela .
01011013	Sela hi ab enaa , Alpakad i minamina al baliman 403 yaka natunau bolau ge yowau enuna al hi gan .
01011014	Sela wana baliman 30 yaka natuna i gan alana Ebe .
01011015	Ebe hi ab enaa , Sela i minamina al baliman 403 yaka natunau bolau ge yowau enuna al hi gan .
01011016	Ebe wana baliman 34 yaka natuna i gan alana Peleg .
01011017	Peleg hi ab enaa , Ebe i minamina al baliman 430 yaka natunau bolau ge yowau enuna al hi gan .
01011018	Peleg wana baliman 30 yaka natuna i gan alana Liu .
01011019	Liu hi ab enaa , Peleg i minamina al baliman 209 yaka natunau bolau ge yowau enuna al hi gan .
01011020	Liu wana baliman 32 yaka natuna i gan alana Selag .
01011021	Selag hi ab enaa , Liu i minamina al baliman 207 yaka natunau bolau ge yowau enuna al hi gan .
01011022	Selag wana baliman 30 yaka natuna i gan alana Naho .
01011023	Naho hi ab enaa , Selag i minamina al baliman 200 yaka natunau bolau ge yowau enuna al hi gan .
01011024	Naho wana baliman 29 yaka natuna i gan alana Tela .
01011025	Tela hi ab enaa , Naho i minamina al baliman 119 yaka natunau bolau ge yowau enuna al hi gan .
01011026	Tela wana baliman 70 yaka natunau hi gan alaliya Abalam , Naho ge Halan .
01011027	He Tela alonau natunau ge tubunau liwaniliya i ola hiwe . Tela natunau hi gan alaliya Abalam , Naho ge Halan . Inoke Halan natuna i gan alana Lote .
01011028	He Tela yawalina miminana , natuna Halan i aliga panuwa Ul , labi Koldiya elana , panuwa toto hi aba .
01011029	Abalam i alolon lagona alana Selai ge Naho i alolon lagona alana Milika , iya Halan natuna . He Milika talina alana Iska .
01011030	Yaa Selai i kobwas yaka nige i aab .
01011031	Tela i lut natuna Abalam , tubuna Lote ( Halan natuna ) ge yawana Selai ( Abalam lagona ) i ahel , yaka panuwa Ul labi Koldiya elana hi eguluwan ge nihi nok nihi na Kenani . Yaa sauga hi vin panuwa Halani , yaka hi miminaa ga to .
01011032	Tela wana baliman 205 i pwawa , yaka i aligaa panuwa Halani .
01012001	Yehoba i baek Abalam elana i ba , “ Wam panuwa , tutumwau , ge tamwam wana limi ana heniheni nu eguluwagil nu na panuwa toto abwe na pankitewa .
01012002	Yaka tubutubumwau nihi gewi na pewa nihi tabwa boda gasigasisena etega , ge na mulolu-agiwa . Alam na pwabwata , ge owa eliyam gamagalau mulolu nihi pwawa .
01012003	Bolo nihi mulolu-agiwa nau na mulolu-agil , yaa bolo ami hehegan hi apapanak-an nau na nuwamut-agil . Ge owa eliyam un gegewel panayawiya na muloluagil . ”
01012004	Abalam wana baliman 75 , yaka panuwa Halani i eguluwai ge i nawanawa , i ola Yehoba wana baaba eliyana . He Lote al ge i nok alona .
01012005	Abalam , lagona Selai ge talina natuna Lote i ahel alonau , ginebi gogomwau gegewena ge totuwalali gegewel bolo hi pwawal Halani elana . Yaka panuwa o hi eguluwai ge hi nawanawa Kenani kaiwena . Sauga hi vin ,
01012006	inoke Abalam labi Kenani gamwana i nosolaan ge i nawanawa i na i vin Mole wana kawadi bwabwalena elana panuwa Sekemi elana . He saugenana o Kenani gamagaliliyau iyoho ya hi minamina labi Kenani elana .
01012007	Yaka Yehoba i masal Abalam elana ge i ba , “ Labi toto ya ya pewa tubutubumwau eliyalil . ” Yaka Abalam pat i pahe abapowon i ginol panuwa o elana ge i tapwaloloek Yehoba elana , iya i masala elana .
01012008	Toto o enaa , yaka Abalam i egon i noek labi manaoyaoya elana panuwa Betel labi nati , ge wana epanapana i pamilil panuwa Betel ge Ai ali luwaluwala . He panuwa Betel i minek labi pai ge panuwa Ai i minek labi nati . Yaka abapowon etega al i ginol ge i tapwalolo Yehoba elana .
01012009	Toto o enaa , yaka i novevehe al i nanawa labi kekevana Negeb kaiwena .
01012010	Yaka galebu bwabwatana etega i masal labi Kenani elana . He galebu o i bwata hot , inoke Abalam i na Itipita ge i miminek ga to .
01012011	Kelaubwa Abalam ni vin Itipita ana labiya , yaka i baek lagona elana i ba , “ Selai , ya atena te am awa i waisi hot .
01012012	He ebo Itipita nihi kitewa , nasi nihi ba , ‘ Lagona to . ’ Yaka nihi tagapaaligau ge owa nihi pwamolowa .
01012013	He nu baek eliyalil nu ba , ‘ Nu te , ’ inoke owa kaiwem o hehegan nihi abubun ge yawaliu nihi pwamwal . ”
01012014	Sauga Abalam i na i vin Itipita , yaka Itipita gamagaliliyau Selai hi kite ana awa i waisi hot .
01012015	I ola al kin wana totuwalali bwabwatal Selai hi kite , inoke hi na kin elana ge ana awa hi awa wawaisi-an ge hi tobalan . Yaka hi na hi ahe ge hi en pwatanik kin wana limiya , alona hi mina .
01012016	He kin Abalam ana hehegan i ginol bubun , kaiwena Selai i ahe alona hi mina wana limiya , yaka wana sipi , goti , bulumwakau , donki , kamel ge wana totuwalali loloyowanil ona i bugul pek .
01012017	Yaa Yehoba kasiyebwa nanakina hot etega i patuna kin alonau ge wana limi ana heniheni gegewel hi kasiyebwa , kaiwena kin Abalam lagona Selai i ahe tukan alona hi mina wana limiya .
01012018	Inoke kin Abalam ana baaba i patuna ge i nok elana . Sauga i vin yaka i neli i ba , “ Hauna pagan u ginol eliyau e ? Hauna kaiwena nige no wasa u pepem te Selai iya lagom ?
01012019	Hauna kaiwena u ba tage iya num , ge ya ahe i ola lagou ? He lagom hiwe ! U ahe ge ku egon . ”
01012020	Inoke kin i baek awana toabinau elal , yaka Abalam alona lagona hi patuna owaowa-agil ginebi ge wali gogomwau gegewena Itipita hi eguluwan .
01013001	Inoke Abalam ge lagona wali gogomwau gegewena hi bugulan yaka Itipita hi eguluwai ge hi nawanawa hi na labi Negeb . He Lote al i nok aloliya .
01013002	Abalam i gogomwau hot , wana bwasumu ona hi gewi nabi , i ola al wana silba ge wana gold .
01013003	Yaka i novevehe al kekeisi kekeisi i nohoholavi panuwa ge panuwa ona elal , ana siga i vin Betel ge Ai ali hawawala toto valila wana epanapana i tatala ,
01013004	ge abapowon i ginoginola . Yaka i tapwalolowa al to Yehoba elana .
01013005	He Lote alona Abalam hi nononawanawa , iya al ge wana sipi , goti , bulumwakau ge wana totuwalali ona hi gan .
01013006	Nige bosowailiya nihi mipamaisena , kaiwena wali bwasumu hi gewi nabi , ge wali abaanan nige i bwabwata .
01013007	Yaka ba apwaapwanawa i gan Abalam ge Lote wali bwasumu ali tomatahikan elal . He sauga o elana boda Kenani ge Pelisi iyoho ya hi minamina labi o elana .
01013008	Inoke Abalam i baek Lote elana i ba , “ Nige nuwala ba apwaapwanawa ni gan owa ge nau elala , ge wala bwasumu ali tomatahikan elal , kaiwena owa ge nau tubula maisena hot .
01013009	He ta nowali tomaha tomaha ta nonoek . Labi gegewena i mwapwela eliyam , labena etegana u hile ge nu na nu minaa . Ebo nu tukik labena aluwabwa , inoke nau na tagilik yavanaa . Ebo nu tagilik yavanaa , inoke nau na tukik aluwabwa . ”
01013010	Yaka Lote matana i lipwapwati i kite wewel Yolidani abwabwina i waisi ge wewelina i bwata i na ana siga panuwa Sowal elana , i ola te Yehoba wana eyowa Ideni ge panuwa Itipita . ( He ana awa i ola to , mulaa te abwe Yehoba panuwa Sodoma ge Gomola i apapanak-agil . )
01013011	Yaka Yolidani abwabwina gegewena i hile iya totona kaiwena , inoke i hek ge i minaa to . He Abalam ge Lote wali miwali i ola to .
01013012	Inoke Abalam i na i minaa labi Kenani elana , yaa Lote i na i minaa Yolidani abwabwina panuwa ona gamwaliyaa ge wana epanapana i pamilil Sodoma gegelinaa .
01013013	He Sodoma gamagaliliyau wali ginol i nak hot , ge hi gegi nabi Yehoba elana .
01013014	Sauga Lote i egon enaa , yaka Yehoba i baek Abalam elana i ba , “ Labi toto u taltalmilila matam u lipwapwati ni nok labena aluwabwa , yavanaa , balimana ge yalasa .
01013015	Labena bolo u kitel bibilena gegewena ya pewa hoti alomwau ge tubutubumwau eliyamiu sauga gegewena nige ni momowasi .
01013016	Tubutubumwau nihi gewi nabi na pewa nihi ola bilibili papakovana . He nige bosowaina gamagal etega bilibili papakovana ni vasili haba , i ola al nige bosowaina tubutubumwau nihi vasilel haba .
01013017	He u nok u na bilibili o ana yapu ge ana magaga u nawaan , kaiwena iyaka ya pewa eliyam . ”
01013018	Yaka Abalam wana epanapana i lekel ge i na i miminaa Mamele wana kawadi bwabwalel gegeliliyaa Hebiloni elana . Inoke abapowon i ginol ge i tapwalolo Yehoba elana .
01014001	Sauga o elana kin esopali , heliya Amlapel Babiloniya ana kin , Aliyoka Elasa ana kin , Kedolaoma Elam ana kin , ge Taidal Goim ana kin ,
01014002	hi nok hi na avaliyau ge kin nimala panuna hi lohaveyan , heliya Bila Sodoma ana kin , Bilsa Gomola ana kin , Sinab Adima ana kin , Semeba Seboim ana kin ge Bela ( alana al te Sowal ) ana kin .
01014003	He kin bolo nimala panuna o wali ivan * hi ahel hi teli pamaisena-agil panuwa Sidim abwabwina elana . ( Toto sauga ya iyaka Hoga Alialigana i ehik . )
01014004	He liwanina i ola hiwe . Valila baliman elulutega eluwa ( 12 ) Sodoma ana kin ge alonau hi minaa Kedolaoma wana logugui gabulanaa , yaa baliman tetinina ( 13-ina ) elana yaka wana logugui hi towani nige hi giginol .
01014005	Kedolaoma i huga , inoke baliman potinina ( 14-ina ) elana alonau wana pan kin wali ivan hi ahel hi teli pamaisenal , yaka hi nem labi o elana . Wali nemnem eliyana avaliyau boda enuna al hi lohaveyan ga . Lepaimi hi pakokovel Astelot Kanaim elana , Susim hi pakokoveliya Hami elana , Emim hi pakokoveliya Kiliyataim abwabwina elana ,
01014006	ge Holi hi pakokoveliya Seil oyana elalil ge hi takel ana siga Elpalan labi kekevana gegelinaa .
01014007	Yaka hi awona pil ge hi sikal hi nem Keides ( alana al te Enmispat ) , inoke Amaleki hi pakokovel ge wali labi gegewena hi ahe , i ola al Amoli bolo hi miminaa panuwa Haseson Tamal elana .
01014008	Yaka Kedolaoma alonau ge alonau hi nem al , inoke panuwa Sodoma , Gomola , Adima , Seboim ge Bela ali kin avaliyau wali tolohaveyan , ge hi tagil hi na Sidim abwabwina elana .
01014009	Inoke hi lovivina avaliyau ge Kedolaoma Elam ana kin , Taidal Goim ana kin , Amlapel Babiloniya ana kin , ge Aliyoka Elasa ana kin nihi lohaveyan . Yaka kin nimala panuna avaliyau ge kin esopali hi lohaveyan .
01014010	Kedolaoma wana boda hi gasisi , inoke Sodoma ge Gomola wali kin avaliyau wali tolohaveyan hi lou . He Sidim abwabwina kolta ali gol hi gewi , inoke sauga hi lou , enuna hi soguek kolta ali gol gamwanaa ge enuna hi lou hi na hi ha oya elal .
01014011	Yaka kin bolo ali toto esopali hi na Sodoma ge Gomola wali gogomwau ge aliya gegewena hi bugulagil , inoke hi egonan .
01014012	He Abalam talina natuna Lote al hi ahe , ginebi ge wana gogomwau gegewena , kaiwena saugenana o i miminaa Sodoma .
01014013	Tau etega i lou ge i na bugul gegewena i wasaan Abalam gagama Hibilu eliyana . Saugenana o Abalam i miminaa Mamele gagama Amoli wana ebwakil bwabwalel gegeliliyaa . He Mamele alonau talinau Eskol ge Anel , heliya Abalam ana tolaba haveyan elana .
01014014	Sauga Abalam i hago talina natuna Lote iyaka hi yowan ge hi ahe egonan , yaka wana boda gamwanaa wana tolohaveyan ali gewi 318 i yogaagil ge hi tatauliulil Kedolaoma ge alonau eliyaa ana siga hi na hi vin panuwa Dani .
01014015	Inoke bulina Abalam wana tolohaveyan i walel ali boda ona elana , yaka hi tuk Kedolaoma ge alonau hi lekaleka-agil ge hi takel ana siga panuwa Hoba , Damasiko labena aluwabwa .
01014016	Yaka Abalam bugubugul gegewena bolo Kedolaoma ge alonau hi bugulan i ahel pasikalil . I ola al talina natuna Lote ginebi wana gogomwau gegewena i ahe , alonau yowau ge gamagalau enuna al .
01014017	Abalam Kedolaoma alonau wana pan kin eton i pakokovel i mowasi ge i sikasikal , yaka Sodoma ana kin i na Abalam i kite Save Abwabwina elana , alana etegana al te Kin Abwabwina .
01014018	Yaka Melkisedek , iya panuwa Salem ana kin ge iya Yabowaine Mihahaina Hot wana topowon , beleid ge oine i ahe yaka i tagil i na i pek Abalam elana .
01014019	Yaka i ba muloluan i ba : “ Yabowaine Mihahaina Hot , iya labulabum ge panayawi ali toginol , Abalam ni muloluagiwa .
01014020	Ge ya ba mulolu Yabowaine Mihahaina Hot elana ge ya tobalan , kaiwena am topihigelgel i telel nimwam elana . ” Inoke Abalam bugul gegewena bolo i oem haveyan elana i wali paelulutega ( 10 ) ge gamwaliyaa wali maisena i pek Melkisedek elana .
01014021	Yaka Sodoma ana kin i baek Abalam elana i ba , “ Bugubugul gegewena u kukuhikan kaiwem , yaa no gamagalau ya te nu pem pasikalil eliyau . ”
01014022	Yaka wana baaba Abalam i lahe i ba , “ Nimwau ya latahin ya papasila Yehoba , Yabowaine Mihahaina Hot elana , iya labulabum ge panayawi ali toginol ,
01014023	nige wam bugul etegana na aahe . Bwagana bugul kekeisisi hot ololana teleid o but ana hihiu , gegewena na pewa pasikal , eba bwaliga nu ba , ‘ Nau te Abalam ya pagogomwau . ’
01014024	Nige bugul etegana na aahe , besena ya te aanan o hevalau hi an . Yaa nuwau o tolabe ali toto eton , Anel , Eskol ge Mamele , ali guyau nihi ahe . ”
01015001	Bugul bolo o enaa , Abalam ana pankite elana Yehoba anana i hago i ba , “ Abalam , bahi nu lolovakun . Nau am ligovan na kausiwa nak elana ge nau am mulolu bwabwatana na pewa . ”
01015002	Yaka Abalam i ba , “ O Babala Yehoba , hauna ana waisi ebo o mulolu bwabwatana nu pem , nau nige aeu pipihina i gagan , gagama Damasiko Eliyesa iya te bwaliga no gogomwau ni ahe .
01015003	Nige natu etega u pepem , inoke bwaliga ebo na yaomal , no limi ana totuwalali etegana te no gogomwau ni ahe ge ni logugui-an . ”
01015004	Yaka Abalam Yehoba anana i hago al i ba , “ Sauga ebo nu yaomal , tau toto ya nige wam gogomwau ni aahe . Yaa natum melutau etega ni masalem saliyam elana ge iya wam gogomwau ni ahe . ”
01015005	Inoke Yehoba Abalam i en tagilan noleleya ge i baek elana i ba , “ Matam i ha hawawala putum u kitel . Tab bosowaim nu vasilel ? Nigeya ! He tubutubumwau bwaliga ali gewi ni ola to . ”
01015006	He Abalam Yehoba i abulilek-an , inoke Yehoba Abalam i kite iya tosapu wana abulilek kaiwena .
01015007	Yaka Yehoba i baek Abalam elana i ba , “ Nau Yehoba , ya ahewaa panuwa Ul labi Koldiya elana ge labi toto ya na pewa nu ahe wam labi . ”
01015008	Yaka Abalam i ba , “ O Babala Yehoba , ga na atena ola labi toto ya nu pem na ahe no labi ? ”
01015009	Inoke Yehoba i ba , “ Bulumwakau meluyovana maisena , goti maisena ge sipi melutauina maisena wali baliman eton ona , i ola al bunibuni maisena ge lumlum maisena nu ahel nu pwatanim eliyau . ”
01015010	Inoke Abalam bwasumu bolo o i ahel ge i pwatanik Yehoba elana . Yaka i gopwetapweta-agil labi labui ona ge i telel vatal labui , yaa bunibuni ge lumlum nige i gogopwetapweta-agil .
01015011	He bwasumu bwabwatal enuna hi youyou lau tage bwasumu tuwaliya nihi anil , yaa Abalam i tatakel .
01015012	Sabwelu lobelobekina elana Abalam i kenu mati ge gogou kubwa lolovakunina i yabom .
01015013	Inoke Yehoba i baek elana i ba , “ Nu atena bubun te tubutubumwau bwaliga labi ya nihi ahe . He houwan nihi na nihi mibwabwali panuwa getoga elana , nihi paloloyowan-agil ge ali hehegan nihi apapanak-an baliman ana gewi 400 .
01015014	Yaa bolo tubutubumwau hi paloloyowan-agil na lahel , ge sauga panuwa o nihi eguluwan , gogomwau ni bwata hot nihi ahe .
01015015	( Yaa owa nu liki bubun yaka alom wam nuwa laumwal nu yaomal ge tuwam nihi teli . )
01015016	He tubutubumwau bolo heyan esopalena heliya te abwe nihi sikalim labena ya elana . Kaiwena Amoli gamagaliliyau nigeya ga na tatakel nihi tatagil ana siga wali pagan nanakina ni bwata hot ge lahena nihi pwawa . ”
01015017	Inoke sauga sabwelu i lobek ge i gogou , yaka hiwo ana ulun i kasukasu ge i tautau sauga o i masal , yaka i nosolaa gopwetapweta bwasumoliyau vatal labui ali hawawala . *
01015018	He i gan i ola to , inoke lan o elana Yehoba bateli i ginol Abalam elana i ba , “ Labi toto ya ya pek tubutubumwau elal , i telipunaa Itipita ana siga elana ge i nok i na wewel Yupeleitis elana :
01015019	Keni wali labi , Kenisi wali labi , Kadmoni wali labi ,
01015020	Hiti wali labi , Pelisi wali labi , Lepaimi wali labi ,
01015021	Amoli wali labi , Kenani wali labi , Gegasi wali labi ge Yebusi wali labi . ”
01016001	Abalam lagona Selai nige Abalam natuna etega i aab . Yaa wana totuwalali loloyowanina meluyovana etega i gan alana Hega , Itipita yovana ,
01016002	inoke Selai i baek Abalam elana i ba , “ Yehoba i kausau nige ya aab . He nu na alom no totuwalali loloyowanina meluyovana nuku kenukenu , yaka ebo ni liyan ge ni ab , inoke wawaya o na awa natuni . ” Yaka Abalam i talam .
01016003	Inoke Selai wana totuwalali loloyowanina Hega i en pwatanik Abalam elana i ola lagona etegana al . He ginol ya i gana wali minamina Kenani elana ana baliman elulutega enaa .
01016004	Abalam alona Hega hi kenukenu yaka i liyan . Sauga i atena i liyan , inoke Selai i kite lowan .
01016005	Yaka Selai i baek Abalam elana i ba , “ Owa wam nak te . No totuwalali ya pewa eliyam , inoke sauga i liyan , yaka i kite lowagau . Yehoba ni hilela henala ge i sapu , owa o ebo nau . ”
01016006	Abalam Selai anana i lahe i ba , “ He iya wam totuwalali loloyowanina i minaa wam logugui eliyana . Nu ginol elana ni ola hauna wam nuwatu . ” Inoke Selai Hega ana hehegan i apapanak-an , yaka i lou luwai .
01016007	Yaka Yehoba wana anelose Hega i pwawaa wewel bwanapitpit etegana gegelinaa labi kekevana elana , panuwa Sul ana kamwasa bebenaa .
01016008	Yaka i ba , “ Hega , Selai wana totuwalali loloyowanina , ga u noem , ge ga u nana ? ” Yaka anana i lahe i ba , “ No nevenak Selai ya lou luwai . ”
01016009	Yaka Yehoba wana anelose i ba , “ U sikal u na wam nevenak eliyana ge nu minaa wana logugui gabulanaa . ”
01016010	Yaka i ba vevehe al i ba , “ Bwaliga tubutubumwau na pagewel nabiyan ge nige bosowaina gamagal etega ni vasilel habal . ”
01016011	Yaka i baek al elana i ba : “ He iyaka u liyan tei , ge abwe nu ab natum melutau . Yaka alana nu tun Isimel , * kaiwena wam kahin Yehoba iyaka i hago .
01016012	He totona ni logugui-an ni ola ewalili . Ni pihigelgel gamagalau gegewel elal , ge gamagalau gegewel nihi pihigelgel elana . Ge nige alonau ge tutunau nihi mimibubun . ”
01016013	Inoke Hega Yehoba , iya i baaba elana , alana i tun “ Yabowaine toto i kiteyau , ” kaiwena i ba , “ Age Yabowaine toto i kiteyau ya kite . ”
01016014	Heiya te kaiwena gamagalau wewel o alana hi tun , “ Wewel Yabowaine yawalina gaganina i kiteyau . ” He wewel o iyoho panuwa bolo Keides ge Beled ali luwaluwala .
01016015	Inoke Hega Abalam natuna melutauina i ab , yaka Abalam wawaya alana i tun Isimel .
01016016	He Abalam wana baliman 86 te Hega Isimel i ab .
01017001	Abalam wana baliman 99 yaka Yehoba i masal elana ge i baek elana i ba , “ Nau Yabowaine Togasisi Hot . U mipalalem eliyau ge bahi wam ginol nanakina ni gagan .
01017002	He no bateli na ginol eliyam tubutubumwau na pagewel . ”
01017003	Yaka Abalam i kululu maninina i patupa bilibiliya , inoke Yabowaine i baek elana i ba ,
01017004	“ He nau no bateli toto ya ginol eliyam i ola hiwe : nasi nu tabwa boda nihi gewi tubuliya .
01017005	Alam nige al ni oola te Abalam , yaa alam na tun Abalahama , * kaiwena iyaka ya ba nu tabwa boda nihi gewi tubuliya .
01017006	Tubutubumwau na pagewel yaka nihi tabwa boda nihi gewi , ge kin ona nihi masalem owa eliyam .
01017007	Bateli toto ya ginol iya bateli mihomihotina owa eliyam ge tubutubumwau emwa heyan ge heyan elal . Ya bateli nau wam Yabowaine ge tubutubumwau wali Yabowaine .
01017008	Labi Kenani sauga ya eliyana u mibwabwali , bwalibwaligena na pewa ni mihot eliyam ge tubutubumwau eliyalil , yaka nau na ola wali Yabowaine . ”
01017009	Yaka Yabowaine i ba vevehe al Abalahama elana i ba , “ He owa no bateli ana logugui nu henapuan , owa ge tubutubumwau emwa heyan ge heyan .
01017010	He no bateli toto ya ginol owa eliyam ge tubutubumwau eliyalil ana logugui i ola hiwe : wami bolau gegewel gotomwa yoho paganina nihi ahe .
01017011	Tuwamiu buhuna kunisina nuku gotomwa yoho ge ni tabwa bateli toto ya ginol eliyamiu ana etotohi .
01017012	Wami bolau heyan ge heyan , sauga nihi abil ge wali lan eit ni mowasi , yaka gotomwa yoho paganina nihi ahe . Gegewel nihi ahe : komiu natumiyau , wami totuwalali loloyowanil bolo hi abil wami limi ana heniheni gamwaliyaa , ge i ola al wami totuwalali loloyowanil bolo ku pwamolal hi neem labi getoga .
01017013	Gegewel gotomwa yoho paganina nihi ahe inoke no bateli mihomihotina ana etotohi ni minaa tuwamiwa .
01017014	Ebo melutau etega nige tuwana buhuna kunisina nihi gogotomwa yoho , he ni mitagil wana boda gamagaliliyau gamwaliyaa , kaiwena no bateli ana logugui i leke . ”
01017015	Yaka Yabowaine i ba vevehe al Abalahama elana i ba , “ He lagom Selai , nige al alana ni oola te Selai , yaa alana nu tun Sela .
01017016	Na muloluan yaka natum melutauina ni ab . Na muloluan ni tabwa boda nihi gewi tubuliya , ge panuwa ona wali kin nihi masalem iya eliyana . ”
01017017	Yaka Abalahama i kululu maninina i patupa bilibiliya . Yaa Yehoba wana baaba nige i memelteli-an , yaka i nival ge atena elana i ba , “ No baliman iyaka elulu bwagabwaga ( 100 ) , he ga na ola ge natu ni gan ? Ge Sela iyaka wana baliman 90 , he ga ni ola ge ni ab ? ”
01017018	Yaka Abalahama i baek Yabowaine elana i ba , “ Binimala Isimel te ni tabwa wam ba mulolu gamagalina , yaka toto u bateli eliyau nu ginola iya eliyana . ”
01017019	Inoke Yabowaine i ba , “ Nigeya ! Lagom Sela natum melutauina ni ab yaka alana nu tun Aisake . * No bateli na ginola iya eliyana , bateli mihomihotina tubutubunau enaa heyan ge heyan kaiweliya .
01017020	He wam awanun Isimel kaiwena iyaka ya hago : tunahot na muloluan , yaka tubutubunau na pagewel . Bwaliga natunau melubolau ali gewi elulutega eluwa heliya nihi tabwa un ali tohouwa , ge tubutubunau nihi gewi na pek nihi tabwa boda gasigasisena etega .
01017021	Yaa no bateli na ginola Aisake eliyana , iya baliman i nenem waikena toto ya elana Sela ni ab . ”
01017022	He Yabowaine wana baaba i pwamowasi , yaka i eguluwai .
01017023	Inoke lan o elana Abalahama i ginol i ola Yabowaine wana baaba ge bolau gegewel wana limi ana heniheni elana tuwaliya buhuna kunisina i gotomwa yoho : natuna Isimel , wana totuwalali loloyowanil bolo hi abil wana limi ana heniheni gamwaliyaa , ge wana totuwalali loloyowanil bolo i pwamolal hi neem labi getoga .
01017024	He Abalahama wana baliman 99 te tuwana buhuna kunisina hi gotomwa yoho ,
01017025	ge natuna Isimel wana baliman elulutega eton ( 13 ) .
01017026	He liwanina i ola to , inoke lan toto Yabowaine i baaba Abalahama elana , Abalahama alona natuna Isimel gotomwa yoho paganina hi ahe .
01017027	I ola al , lan o elana bolau gegewel wana limi ana heniheni elana gotomwa yoho paganina hi ahe .
01018001	Abalahama i miminaa Mamele wana abwakil bwabwalel gegeliliyaa , yaka lan etega alalati bwagatau Yehoba i masal al elana . He liwanina i ola hiwe . Abalahama i misiyo wana epanapana ana abauluulutuka ,
01018002	yaka matana i lihin , he sauga o bolau eton i kitel hi taltalmilil nige ali bwaga i yayapu . Inoke i lut i tapalelu i na elal , ge i kululu maninina i pahanalowanek bilibiliya .
01018003	Inoke i baek elal i ba , “ No tonowakau , nau wami totuwalali , ebo ku yaliyaya-agau , yaka bahi egon , yaa alowau komiu ga ta mina .
01018004	Na ba no totuwalali etega eliyana wewel kekeisi ni pwatanim , yaka aemiu nuku ul ge nuku veyaho abwakil ya pwapwaligumwina elana .
01018005	Iyaka ku nem nau wami totuwalali no abamina elana , inoke aanan kekeisi na pwatanim nuku an ge tuwamiu ni gasisi , yaka abwe nuku novevehe al . ” Yaka anana hi lahe hi ba , “ I waisi , nu ginol ni ola wam baaba . ”
01018006	Yaka etimwawa Abalahama i sikal i na i tuk wana epanapana gamwanaa ge i baek Sela elana i ba , “ Etimwawa pwalawa matana waiwaisana nu wage bol dis bwabwatal eton ana luvi , yaka nu pitoli ge beleid nu umun . ”
01018007	Inoke etimwawa Abalahama i na wana bulumwakau ali yawi elana ge natuna tatabwana bunumwina waiwaisana etega i hile . Yaka i pek wana totuwalali etega elana ge iya etimwawa i lovivina-an .
01018008	Iyaka aanan hi lovivina-an haba , inoke Abalahama aanan sis ge hul enuna alona bulumwakau bunumwina momolana i bugulan , i na i pwahin bolau eton maniniliyaa ge hi anan . Inoke Abalahama i talmilil gegeliliyaa abwakil ligumwina elana ge i matahikagil . *
01018009	Yaka abwe hi nel Abalahama elana hi ba , “ Lagom Sela iya ga ? ” Analiya i lahe i ba , “ Iya iyoho epanapana gamwanaa . ”
01018010	Yaka avaliya etega i ba , “ Baliman i nenem weikena toto ya elana na sikalim al , yaka lagom Sela natuna melutau ni gan . ” Yaa Sela iyoho i lalaegan epanapana ana abaululutuka Abalahama enaa .
01018011	He Sela alona ge Abalahama iyaka hi liki nabi , ge Sela iyaka nige al i weweikena kasiyebwa .
01018012	Yaka i nival ge atena elana i ba , “ Iyaka ya pweyata ge no babala * iyaka i liki , he nige al bosowaiu yaliyaya toto ya na pwawa tage wawaya na ab . ”
01018013	Inoke Yehoba i baek Abalahama elana i ba , “ Hauna kaiwena Sela i nival ge i ba , ‘ Iyaka ya liki nige bosowaiu na ab ’ ?
01018014	Nige bugul etega i pupulowan tage nau Yehoba nige bosowaiu na ginol . He baliman i nenem weikena toto ya eliyana na sikalim al , yaka lagom Sela natuna melutau ni gan . ”
01018015	Sela i lovakun yaka i alaha i ba , “ Nige ya ninival . ” Anana Yehoba i lahe i ba , “ Nigeya , he tunahot te u nival . ”
01018016	Inoke bolau eton hi lut ge hi nawanawa hi na labi toto elana mataliya ni lau Sodoma nihi kite . He Abalahama i nok alonau hi notoyawa ge ni entelel .
01018017	Yaka abwe Yehoba atena elana i ba , “ Nak toto abwe na ginol panuwa Sodoma elana bahi na susume Abalahama elana .
01018018	Kaiwena bwaliga tubutubunau nihi tabwa boda bwabwatana ge gasigasisena etega , ge iya eliyana gamagalau gegewel panayawiya na muloluagil .
01018019	Iya ya hile natunau ge tubutubunau ni pankitel nau Yehoba no kamwasa nihi toulil , yaka ginol waiwaisana ge sasapona nihi awaawaginol , inoke hauna ya bateli iya kaiwena na ginol . ”
01018020	Inoke Yehoba i baek Abalahama elana i ba , “ Panuwa Sodoma ge Gomola wasaliya i bwata te gegi paganina hi awaawaginol nabiyan .
01018021	Na na ga na lau na kitel ebo tunahot wali pagan nanakina ana bwata i ola toto ya hago , o ebo nigeya . ”
01018022	Yaka bolau eluwa hi noegon ge hi noek kamwasa toto i na Sodoma . Yaa Yehoba alona ge Abalahama hi minaa to .
01018023	Inoke Abalahama i na Yehoba gegelinaa ge i nel i ba , “ Nasi bolo tosapu avaliyau ge bolo wali pagan nanakina nu pwamowasel ?
01018024	Ga i ola ebo bolo tosapu ali gewi pipti ( 50 ) iyoho panuwa o elana , age nasi panuwa bwabwaligena nu apapanak-an ? Age nige panuwa nu pwapwamwal bolo tosapu ali gewi pipti ( 50 ) kaiweliya ?
01018025	Bahiwa ! Bahi bolo tosapu avaliyau ge bolo wali pagan nanakina nu pwapwamowasel . Ebo nu ola o , he tosapu ali hehegan iyaka i ola ya te bolo wali pagan nanakina ali hehegan . Bahiwa ! Owa gamagalau gegewel panayawiya ali toyatala , ge sapu elana te nu payatalal . ”
01018026	Anana Yehoba i lahe i ba , “ Binimala ebo tosapu ali gewi pipti ( 50 ) na pwawal panuwa Sodoma gamwanaa , yaka heliya kaiweliya panuwa bwabwaligena na pwamwal . ”
01018027	Inoke Abalahama i ba al i ba , “ Babala , nau gamagal ya , ya ola bilibili ge papakova , iyaka ya baaba , inoke nu talamwagau ga na baaba al .
01018028	Ga i ola ebo tosapu ali gewi poti paib ( 45 ) ya iyoho panuwa o gamwanaa ? Age nasi panuwa bwabwaligena nu apapanak-an kaiwena nimala panuna hi kala ? ” Anana Yehoba i lahe i ba , “ Ebo tosapu ali gewi poti paib ( 45 ) na pwawal , he nige panuwa na aapapanak-an . ”
01018029	Inoke Abalahama i ba vevehe al i ba , “ Ga i ola ebo ali gewi poti ( 40 ) ya nu pwawal ? ” Anana Yehoba i lahe i ba “ Ebo ali gewi poti ( 40 ) iyoho , he nige panuwa na aapapanak-an . ”
01018030	Inoke Abalahama i ba , “ Babala , bahi nu huhugaagau , yaa nuwau na baaba al eliyam . Ga i ola ebo ali gewi teti ( 30 ) ya nu pwawal ? ” Yaka anana Yehoba i lahe i ba , “ Ebo ali gewi teti ( 30 ) na pwawal , he nige panuwa na aapapanak-an . ”
01018031	Inoke Abalahama i ba , “ Babala , iyaka ya baaba , inoke nu talamwagau ga na baaba al . Ga i ola ebo ali gewi tuwenti ( 20 ) ya nu pwawal ? ” Anana i lahe i ba , “ Ebo ali gewi tuwenti ( 20 ) na pwawal , he nige panuwa na aapapanak-an . ”
01018032	Inoke Abalahama i ba , “ Babala , bahi nu huhugaagau , yaa nuwau pamaisena al na baaba eliyam . Ga i ola ebo ali gewi elulutega ( 10 ) ya nu pwawal ? ” Yaka anana Yehoba i lahe i ba , “ Ebo ali gewi elulutega ( 10 ) na pwawal , he nige panuwa na aapapanak-an . ”
01018033	Sauga Yehoba alona ge Abalahama hi liwaliwan haba , inoke Yehoba i egon , ge Abalahama i sikal i na wana epanapana elana .
01019001	Lan o kokoyavi elana aneloseyau labui hi na hi vin panuwa Sodoma , he Lote iyoho i misiyo panuwa ana gana ana abauluulutuka . Sauga aneloseyau i kitel inoke i lut i na eliyalil , ge i kululu maninina i pahanalowanek bilibiliya .
01019002	Inoke i baek eliyalil i ba , “ No tonowakau , nau wami totuwalali , ya awanun elamiu nuku nem no limiya ge aemiu nuku ul , yaka bulina nuku kenu . Bwaligumwa mweluluga kekeisi abwe nuku nawanawa al . ” Yaka Lote anana hi lahe hi ba , “ Nigeya , naha kenuwa te bakubakuwa e panuwa ana abamimigogowa . ”
01019003	Yaa Lote i ba balbalgig inoke hi nok avaliya ge hi na hi tuk wana limiya . Yaka i baek wana totuwalali elal pwalawa nige alona yis hi vivikuhu hi umun , inoke aanan hi lovivina-an ge hi anan .
01019004	He nigeya ga hi kekenu , yaka bolau gegewel hot , hevalau ge tonowakau , hi neem panuwa Sodoma gamwana gegewena elal hi na limi hi mipainan .
01019005	Inoke hi yoga tuktuk Lote elana hi ba , “ Bolau bolo hi nem eliyam bulin e heliya ga ? U ahel nihi tagilem eliyama ge naha loneganega-agil . ”
01019006	Inoke Lote i na i tagil elal ge nog i tagakaus enaa ,
01019007	yaka i baek elal i ba , “ No heliyamwau , bahi pagan nanakina toto ya nuku giginol .
01019008	He natuwau galokau labui hi gan nigeya ga hi lolobolau , na ahel nihi tagilim eliyamiu , inoke hauna nuwamiu , he nuku ginola eliyalil . Yaa bahi bugul etega nuku giginol bolau ya elal , kaiwena iyaka hi nem no limiya ge na matahikagil bubun . ”
01019009	Yaa Lote anana hi lahe hi ba , “ U miegonik ! ” Yaka hi ba , “ Tau ya iya bwabwali yaka tage ni logugui-agila ! ” Inoke hi baek al Lote eliyana hi ba , “ Nak toto tage naha ginol bolau labui elal , nasi naha ginol panak hoti owa eliyam . ” Inoke Lote hi bibin pasikal , yaka hi nok hi na tage nog hi tatagaleke .
01019010	Yaa bolau labui limi gamwanaa nimaliya i tagil Lote hi momol tukan , yaka nog hi tagakaus .
01019011	Yaka bolau gegewel limi tolinaa mataliya hi tagapagogou inoke hi babalalu , yaa nige bosowailiya nog nihi pwawa .
01019012	Yaka bolau hi baek Lote elana hi ba , “ Panuwa ya wali pagan nanakina wasana i bwata hot Yehoba i hago , inoke i patunama ha nem ge naha apapanak-an . Tab wam boda enuna al hi gan e , ebo natumwau bolau ge yowau , ebo natumwau yowau ali kawakawalolu , o ebo tutumwau enuna al panuwa ya elana ? Ebo hi gan , nu na nu ahel ge alomwau nuku tagil , kaiwena panuwa ya ha aapapanak-an . ”
01019013	
01019014	Yaka Lote i tagil i na i baek natunau yowau ali kawakawalolu elal i ba , “ Etimwawa ku nem panuwa ya ta eguluwan , kaiwena Yehoba i aapapanak-an . ” Yaa hi nuwatu tage i tatalawasi .
01019015	Mweluluga kekeisi hot , aneloseyau Lote hi patotoe hi ba , “ Etimwawa lagom ge natumwau galokau labui bolo sauga ya alomwau , u ahel , yaka panuwa ya ku lou luwai . Inoke sauga Yehoba ni apapanak-an , komiu nige nuku yayaomal . ”
01019016	He Lote iyoho i nuwatu pilpil , yaa Yehoba i atilomwan-an , inoke bolau labui Lote alonau lagona ge natuliyau galokau labui nimaliya hi ahe ge hi nul tagilagil panuwa tolinaa .
01019017	Iyaka hi tagil haba inoke bolau o alona etega i baek elal i ba , “ Ku lou , eba nuku aliga ! Bahi nuku tatagena sikalek emiwa ge bahi nuku veveyaho Yolidani abwabwina panuwana etega elana . Ku lou ku na oya elal yaka nige nak nuku pwapwawa . ”
01019018	Yaa anana Lote i lahe i ba , “ Tonowak , bahiwa !
01019019	Wam pagan i waisi eliyau , ge u muloluagau yawaliu u pwamwal . Yaa nige bosowaiu na lou noek to oya elal . Nasi nigeya ga na vivin inoke nak toto ya ni kukuhikagau ge na yaomal .
01019020	He awan kekeisi etega huwo nige ana bwaga i yayapu . Na lou noek to . He awan o i kekeisisi age ? Na noek to , inoke mwal na pwawa . ”
01019021	Yaka anelose i baek Lote elana i ba , “ I waisi , ya talam nu nok to ni ola wam awanun . Inoke awan o nige na aapapanak-an .
01019022	He etimwawa u lou u noek to , kaiwena nigeya ga bugul etega na giginol ana siga nu na nu vin . ” ( Lote awan o i awa kekeisisi-an inoke alana hi tun Sowal . ) *
01019023	Sabwelu iyaka i ha te Lote i vin awan Sowal elana .
01019024	Inoke sauga o Yehoba pat salpa * tautauina i ligin lowanem hawawala i tala panuwa Sodoma ge Gomola elal .
01019025	Yaka panuwa bolo o ge labi o abwabwina gamwana bwalibwaligena , ginebi ge gamagalau gegewel bolo hi miminaa o , ge bugul bolo hi siun bilibili pwatanaa al ge , Yehoba i apapanak-agil .
01019026	Yaa Lote lagona i tagena sikalek enaa , inoke i tabwa solti papatina i talmilil i ola kokola .
01019027	He lan o mweluluga ya , yaka Abalahama i lut i na i talmilil labi toto nolu alona ge Yehoba hi milimilila .
01019028	Inoke matana i lau panuwa Sodoma ge Gomola elal ge labi o abwabwina gegewena elana , ge i kite panuwa kasona babalona i haha i ola ginaha hi ton gol gamwanaa kasona .
01019029	He liwanina i ola to . Inoke Yabowaine Yolidani abwabwina panuwana i apapanak-agil , yaa Abalahama wana awanun nige i nunuluwan , yaka Lote i palou ga mulaa abwe panuwa toto i eguluwan i ton olan .
01019030	Lote i lovakun te ni minaa awan Sowal elana , inoke alonau natunau galokau labui hi egon hi na oya elal ge hi miminaa gol etega elana .
01019031	Lan etega natuna galok toto bwabwatana i baek kekeisina elana i ba , “ Tamala iyaka i liki , ge nige bolau hi gagan te labi ya elana tage avalau ta alolon ge natulau nihi gan , ni ola panayawi labena gegewena bolau ge yowau hi giginol .
01019032	Oine ta ahe tamala ta paim nabiyan , yaka ta na avala ta kenu ge iya eliyana natulau nihi gan , yaka bahi un ni yayaomal . ”
01019033	Inoke bulin o oine hi ahe tamaliya hi paim nabiyan , yaka toto bwabwatana i na i tuk ge alona tamana hi kenu . He tamana nige i aatena te natuna i na i tuk alona hi kenu ge nige al i aatena te i lut ge i tagil .
01019034	Lan i gan inoke toto bwabwatana i baek talina kekeisina elana i ba , “ Bulin alou ge tamala ha kenu , he nasi bulina ta paim nabiyan al , yaka owa nu na nu tuk ge alom nuku kenu . Inoke iya eliyana natulau nihi gan ge bahi un ni yayaomal . ”
01019035	Yaka bulin o tamaliya hi paim nabiyan al , inoke toto kekeisina i na i tuk alona tamana hi kenu . He tamana nige i aatena te natuna i na i tuk alona hi kenu , ge nige al i aatena te i lut ge i tagil .
01019036	Inoke Lote natunau galokau labui hi liyan , wali liyan i neem tamaliya elana .
01019037	Toto bwabwatana i ab natuna melutau , inoke alana i tun Mowabi . He iya boda Mowabi bolo sauga ya tubutubuliya .
01019038	Yaka toto kekeisina al i ab natuna melutau , inoke alana i tun Benami . He iya boda Amoni bolo sauga ya tubutubuliya .
01020001	Abalahama Mamele wana abwakil bwabwalel i eguluwan yaka i tagilik i na labi Negeb , ge i minaa ga panuwa Gelal , Keides ge Sul ali hawawala .
01020002	Yaka gamagalau o wali wasa i pek lagona Sela bana i ba , “ Nu te . ” Inoke Abimeleki , panuwa Gelal ana kin , i hago ge i ba wana totuwalali elal hi na Sela hi en pwatanik elana ge i ahe tukan wana limiya .
01020003	Yaa bulin etega kenonou elana Yabowaine i masala Abimeleki elana ge i ba , “ Owa nasi nu aliga , kaiwena yova toto u ahe iya toalolon . ”
01020004	He Abimeleki nigeya ga alona Sela hi kekenu , inoke anana i lahe i ba , “ Babala , nau nige gegi ya giginol ! Age nasi alowau ge no gamagalau nu lopaaligama ?
01020005	Abalahama no wasa i pem i ba , ‘ Nu te Sela , ’ yaka Sela al i ba , ‘ Nu te Abalahama . ’ He ya atena bubun , toto ya ginol nige tage nuwatu nanakina elana ge ya ginol . ”
01020006	Inoke kenonou o elana Yabowaine i baek al Abimeleki elana i ba “ Ee , ya atena nige nuwatu nanakina elana ge u giginol . Inoke nau te ya kaisewa ge nige alom yova ku kekenu ge tage nu gegi matawa .
01020007	He yova ya nu pek pasikal lagona elana . Tau o iya palopita , yaka ni awanun kaiwem ge nige nu aaliga . Yaa ebo nige nu pepek pasikal , he nasi nu aliga , alomwau ge wam gamagalau gegewel . ”
01020008	Lan i gan mweluluga kekeisi , Abimeleki wana totuwalali bwabwatal gegewel i yogaagil . Inoke bugul gegewena toto i masal ana kenonou elana i wasaan elal , yaka hi lovakun nabi .
01020009	Inoke Abimeleki Abalahama i yogaan ge i baek elana i ba , “ Hauna kaba pagan u ginol eliyama e ? Nau nige bugul etega ya giginol panak eliyam , yaa wam ginol kaiwena alowau no gamagalau ha minaa lahi bwabwatana ya elana . Binimala bahi nu giginol ola ! ”
01020010	Yaka Abimeleki i nel al i ba , “ Hauna wam puna ge u ginol ola o ? ”
01020011	Inoke anana Abalahama i lahe i ba , “ No nuwatu tage panuwa ya gamagaliliyau nige etega Yabowaine i lolovakun-an , yaka lagou kaiwena nasi nihi tagapaaligau ge nihi oe .
01020012	He tunahot nu te Sela , alou tamama maisena , yaa hinameyau tomaha ona te ya alolonan e .
01020013	Yaka sauga Yabowaine i ba nam wana limi ana heniheni ya eguluwagil ge ya nononawanawa , yaka ya baek elana ya ba : Ebo u nunuwana-agau , yaka hauna labi elana ta nonoek , gamagalau wali wasa nu pek nu babaa , ‘ Tau ya iya nu . ’ ”
01020014	Yaka Abimeleki sipi , bulumwakau ge totuwalali loloyowanil bolau ge yowau i ahel ge i pek Abalahama elana . Inoke lagona Sela i pek pasikal elana .
01020015	Inoke i baek Abalahama elana i ba , “ Matam u lipwapwati no abalogugui ana bwata nu kite , yaka labi etega nu hile ge nu na nu minaa . ”
01020016	Inoke i baek Sela elana i ba , “ He mani silba tausan maisena ( 1000 ) ya pepek num elana am puluwawi ana abwabubun kaiwena , ge gamagalau gegewel nihi atena tunahot te owa nige gegi etega u giginol . ”
01020017	He valila , sauga toto Abimeleki Abalahama lagona Sela i ahe tukan wana limiya , inoke baena Yehoba Abimeleki wana limi ana heniheni yowau gegewel lalgamaniliya i lokausan nige bosowailiya nihi liyan . Inoke Abalahama i awanun Yabowaine elana , yaka Yabowaine Abimeleki alonau lagona ge wana totuwalali loloyowanil yowau , i pwamolol bosowailiya al nihi liyan ge nihi ab .
01020018	
01021001	Yehoba Sela i muloluan i ola valila wana baaba , ge i ginol eliyana i ola wana bateli .
01021002	Inoke i liyan , yaka Abalahama wana liki ana sauga elana natuna melutauina Sela i ab . He sauga toto Yabowaine Abalahama i bateli , ana sauga hot elana te i masal .
01021003	Yaka wawaya toto Sela i ab , Abalahama alana i tun Aisake . *
01021004	Sauga hi ab ge wana lan eit i pwawa , yaka Abalahama natuna Aisake tuwana buhuna kunisina i gotomwa yoho , i ola Yabowaine wana baaba elana .
01021005	He Abalahama wana baliman ana bwata elulu bwagabwaga ( 100 ) elana te natuna Aisake Sela i ab .
01021006	Inoke Sela i ba , “ Yabowaine i panivalau ya yaliyaya , ge gamagalau gegewel bolo no ab wasana nihi hago alowau naha nival toyawa . ”
01021007	Inoke i ba vevehe al i ba , “ He valila nige gamagal etega ni nuwatu tage wawaya etega na paalahul . Yaa age Abalahama wana liki ana sauga elana te natuna etega iyaka ya ab e . ”
01021008	He Aisake i bwaya yaka hul hi paalayoho , inoke lan o Abalahama aanan bwabwatana i ginol .
01021009	Yaa Sela i kite Abalahama natuna toto Hega Itipita yovana i ab , Aisake i sisinali-an .
01021010	Inoke i baek Abalahama elana i ba , “ Yova totuwalali loloyowanina ei alona ge natuna nu patuna owaowa-agil . Kaiwena yova totuwalali loloyowanina natuna nige tamana wana gogomwau ni aahe , natu Aisake ya te ni ahe . ”
01021011	Baaba o kaiwena Abalahama atena i lomwan nabi , kaiwena Isimel al ge iya natuna .
01021012	Yaa Yabowaine i baek Abalahama elana i ba , “ Bahi atem ni lolomwan nabi wawaya alona ge hinana wam totuwalali loloyowanina kaiweliya . Nu ginol ni ola Sela wana baaba eliyam , kaiwena tubutubunim bolo ya bateli kaiwem nihi masalem Aisake elana .
01021013	Yaa yova totuwalali loloyowanina natuna tubutubunau nihi gewi na pek , ge heliya al nihi tabwa boda etega , kaiwena iya al ge natum . ”
01021014	Lan i gan mweluluga kekeisi , Abalahama aanan enuna , ginebi ge wewel patuna etega toto goti kunisina hi ginoliya i ahel ge i na i telel Hega vevelanaa . Yaka alona natuna i patunal hi egon , ge hi nonobwagabwaga Biyaseba ana labi kekevana elana .
01021015	Sauga wewel i mowasi patuna gamwanaa , yaka Hega geman i teliya abwakil kekeisi etega pwapwaligumwina elana .
01021016	Inoke i na i misiyo laha ana bwaga i ola 100 mita , kaiwena i nuwatu i ba , “ Bahi natu na kikite ni aaliga . ” He Hega iyoho i misiyo abanaa ge i kahikahin .
01021017	Yaka Yabowaine i hago geman i kahikahin , inoke Yabowaine wana anelose i yoga Hega elana anana i loem labulabumwa i ba , “ Hega , ga i ola ? Hauna gun i nak ? Bahi nu lolovakun , Yabowaine geman wana kahin iyaka i hagoem labi toto u teliya .
01021018	U lut u na geman u pamilil ge nu nolabin , kaiwena bwaliga tubutubunau nihi gewi na pek , ge heliya nihi tabwa boda gasigasisena etega . ”
01021019	Yaka Yabowaine wewel kenken etega i pankite , inoke Hega i na patuna i pakalaopop , ge i pek geman i im .
01021020	He geman i bwatabwata ge Yabowaine i miminaa elana . I minaa uleya labi kekevana elana ge i tabwa egipoyo ana toalialihin waiwaisana .
01021021	Sauga i miminaa o labi kekevana alana Palan , yaka hinana yova etega i hilek Itipita ge i alolonan .
01021022	Sauga etega kin Abimeleki alona ge wana tolohaveyan wali tohouwa Pikol , hi na Abalahama elana , ge i baek elana i ba , “ Ya atena Yabowaine i minaa eliyam , inoke bugul gegewena u ginolil hi waisi .
01021023	He Yabowaine matanaa nu bateli te alowau natuwau ge tubutubuwau nige nu kakakawema . Nau pagan waiwaisana ya ginol eliyam , inoke nu bateli pagan waiwaisana al nu ginol eliyau , ge panuwa u mibwabwaliya e gamagaliliyau elal . ”
01021024	Inoke Abalahama i ba , “ Ya bateli ni ola to . ”
01021025	Yaka abwe Abalahama i baaba Abimeleki elana wewel kenken etega kaiwena , toto Abimeleki wana totuwalali hi oem Abalahama wana totuwalali eliyalil .
01021026	Yaa Abimeleki i baek elana i ba , “ Nige ya aatena te henala ge i ginol ola o . Valila nige no wasa u pepem , he abwe ya hago te lan e . ”
01021027	Inoke Abalahama sipi ge bulumwakau enuna i ahel ge i pek Abimeleki elana , yaka ali toto labui wali bateli hi ginol .
01021028	He Abalahama sipi natunau meluyowau seben al i ahel ali yawi gamwanaa ge i teli getogaagil .
01021029	Inoke Abimeleki i nel Abalahama elana i ba , “ Hauna kaiwena ge sipi natunau meluyowau bolo seben u teli getogaagil ei ? ”
01021030	Inoke anana Abalahama i lahe i ba , “ Sipi natunau meluyowau bolo seben e hi neem eliyau . Nu ahel , yaka eliyana nu patunahot te wewel kenken ya nau ya ken . ” Yaka Abimeleki i ginol i ola Abalahama wana baaba .
01021031	Inoke gamagalau panuwa o alana hi tun Biyaseba , * kaiwena eliyana tonowakau labui wali bateli hi ginola .
01021032	Sauga tonowakau labui wali bateli hi ginol i mowasi , inoke Abimeleki alona ge wana tolohaveyan wali tohouwa Pikol hi sikal wali panuwaa labi Pilistiya .
