01036012	Elipas lagona al i gan alana Timna , i ab natuna Amaleki . Bolo ya heliya Iso lagona Eda tubunau .
01036013	Luwel natunau bolau alaliya i ola hiwe : Nahat , Selaa , Sama , ge Misa . Bolau ya Iso lagona Basimata tubunau .
01036014	Iso lagona Oholibama , Anahi natuna ge Sibiyon tubuna , natunau bolau eton i abil , Yeus , Yolam ge Kola .
01036015	Iso natunau ge tubutubunau hi tabwa un tomaha tomaha ali tonowakau . Iso natuna gamaun Elipas natunau hi tabwa un bolo ya ali tonowakau : Teman , Omal , Sepo , Kenasi ,
01036016	Kola , Gatam ge Amaleki . Un bolo o hi minaa labi Idom ge hi masalem Elipas elana , iya Iso ge Eda natuliya .
01036017	Iso natuna Luwel natunau hi tabwa un bolo ya ali tonowakau : Nahat , Selaa , Sama , ge Misa . Un bolo o hi minaa labi Idom ge hi masalem Luwel elana , iya Iso ge Basimata natuliya .
01036018	Iso ge Oholibama natuliyau hi tabwa un bolo ya ali tonowakau : Yeus , Yalam ge Kola . Un bolo o hi masalem Iso lagona Oholibama elana , iya Anahi natuna .
01036019	He Iso ( alana labuina al te Idom ) tubutubunau ge un bolo hi masalem eliyana i ola to .
01036020	Seil gagama Holi natunau , heliya labi Idom towohiliyau , alaliya i ola hiwe : Lotan , Sobal , Sibiyon , Anahi ,
01036021	Dison , Esa ge Disan . Bolau o heliya boda Holi ali un tonowakiliyau labi Idom elana .
01036022	Lotan natunau bolau alaliya i ola hiwe : Holi ge Homam . He Lotan nuna alana Timna .
01036023	Sobal natunau bolau alaliya i ola hiwe : Alvan , Manahat , Ebal , Sepo ge Onam .
01036024	Sibiyon natunau bolau alaliya i ola hiwe : Aiya ge Anahi . He Anahi iya te wewel bwanapitpit kalakalasina i pwawa uleya labi kekevana elana , sauga toto tamana wana donki i matahikagil .
01036025	Anahi natuna tauina alana Dison ge natuna yovana te Oholibama .
01036026	Dison natunau bolau alaliya i ola hiwe : Hemdan , Esban , Itlam ge Kelan .
01036027	Esa natunau bolau alaliya i ola hiwe : Bilhan , Savan , ge Akan .
01036028	Disan natunau bolau alaliya i ola hiwe : Us ge Alan .
01036029	He boda Holi ali un tonowakiliyau alaliya i ola hiwe : Lotan , Sobal , Sibiyon , Anahi ,
01036030	Dison , Esa ge Disan . He Holi ali un tonowakiliyau alaliya i ola to , hi miminek tomaha tomaha wali labi ona elal labi Seil elana .
01036031	Mulaa abwe Isileli wali kin i gan , kin bolo ya hi tologugui labi Idom elana .
01036032	Bela Beo natuna , i tabwa kin panuwa Idom elana . Iya i miminaa Dinhaba .
01036033	Sauga Bela i yaomal , inoke abana Yobab Selaa natuna i ahe i tabwa kin , he wana panuwa Bosela .
01036034	Sauga Yobab i yaomal , inoke abana Husam i ahe i tabwa kin . He iya i neem Teman wali labiya .
01036035	Sauga Husam i yaomal , inoke abana Heidad Bedad natuna i ahe i tabwa kin . Iya Midiyani i pakokovel labi Mowabi elana . He i miminaa Avit .
01036036	Sauga Heidad i yaomal , inoke abana Samla i ahe i tabwa kin , he wana panuwa Masileka .
01036037	Sauga Samla i yaomal , inoke abana Saul i ahe i tabwa kin . He wana panuwa Lehobot toto wewel labenaa .
01036038	Sauga Saul i yaomal , inoke abana Bal-hanan Akbo natuna i ahe i tabwa kin .
01036039	Sauga Bal-hanan Akbo natuna i yaomal , inoke abana Heidad i ahe i tabwa kin . Heidad i miminaa panuwa Pau , lagona alana Mehetabel , Matled natuna ge Mesahab tubuna .
01036040	Iso tubutubunau hi tabwa un tomaha tomaha ali tonowakau ge hi miminek tomaha tomaha wali panuwa ona elal , alaliya i ola hiwe : Timna , Alva , Yeteti ,
01036041	Oholibama , Ela , Pinon ,
01036042	Kenasi , Teman , Mibsa ,
01036043	Magdiyel ge Ilam . He Idom ali un tonowakiliyau alaliya i ola to , hi miminek tomaha tomaha wali labi ona elal . He Iso , iya Idom tubuliya houhouwena hot , tubutubunau liwaniliya i ola to .
01037001	Yakobo i miminaa Kenani , labi toto valila tamana Aisake i miminaa .
01037002	He Yakobo alonau ge natunau liwaniliya i ola hiwe . Natuna Yosepa iya hevalina ya , wana baliman sebentin , iya sipi ge goti ana tomatahikan alonau ge talinau bolo tamana lagonau Bilha ge Silpa natuliyau . He talinau wali ginol nanakina wasana ni baubaunan tamaliya elana .
01037003	Yakobo alana etega al Isileli , wana nunuwana Yosepa elana wana nunuwana natunau bolau gegewel al elal i bwata lake , kaiwena wana sauga liki elana te Yosepa hi ab . Ana holahola yayapona etega i hel , matana i waisi ge nimana i yapu .
01037004	Talinau hi kite tamaliya wana nunuwana Yosepa elana wana nunuwana heliya elal i bwata lake , inoke Yosepa hi pihigelgel-an yaka nige nunuwana ana baaba hi baubaunan elana .
01037005	Sauga etega Yosepa i kenonou , inoke ana kenonou i baunan talinau elal , yaka abwe hi pihigelgel nabi elana .
01037006	He i baek elal i ba , “ Ku laegan ge o kenonou na baunan nuku hago .
01037007	Tage kilau gegewela iyoho witi ta tomwatomwa ge ta kinkin eyowaa . Yaka nau o kin i lut ge i talmilil pasapu , ge komiu ami kin ona o kin hi milil painan ge hi kululuek elana . ”
01037008	Yaka talinau hi baek elana hi ba , “ Age u nuwatu nu tabwa wama kin ge nu logugui-agima ? ” He Yosepa ana kenonou i baunan talinau elal i ola to , inoke abwe hi pihigelgel nabi elana .
01037009	Yaka kenonou etega al i kenonou-an ge i baunan talinau elal i ba , “ Ku laegan , kenonou etega al ya kenonou-an i ola hiwe . Tage sabwelu , weikena ge putum ali gewi elulutega maisena hi kululuem elau . ”
01037010	Ana kenonou i baunan al tamana elana , yaka tamana i ba lalaan i ba , “ Hauna kenonou u kenonou-an ei ? Age u nuwatu alowau hinam ge talimwau naha nowa ge naha kululu elam ? ”
01037011	Yaka talinau hi lamwapulowan-an , yaa tamana kenonou o i nuwahikan atenaa ge i nuwanuwatu kaiwena .
01037012	Sauga etega Yosepa talinau tamaliya wana sipi ge goti hi ahel hi na panuwa Sekemi ge hi matahikagil hi anan .
01037013	Inoke tamaliya Isileli i baek Yosepa elana i ba , “ Talimwau heliya iyoho panuwa Sekemi sipi ge goti hi matahikagil hi anan . He nuwau na patunawa ge nu na elal . ” Inoke Yosepa i talam i ba , “ I waisi , na nok . ”
01037014	Yaka tamana i baek elana i ba , “ Nu nok nu na nu kite ebo talimwau hi mibubun ge ebo sipi ge goti hi waisi , inoke nu sikalim ge no wasa nu pem . ” Inoke Yakobo Yosepa i patuna i egon , yaka labi o Hebiloni Abwabwina i eguluwan . Sauga i na i vin panuwa Sekemi ,
01037015	inoke i nononawanawa ya labi o elana . Yaka abwe tau etega Yosepa i pwawa , ge i neli i ba , “ Hauna gun u loloyaan e ? ”
01037016	Anana Yosepa i lahe i ba , “ Taliwau ya loloyaagil , heliya wali sipi ge goti hi matahikagil . He tab bosowaina ge no wasa nu pem heliya ga ? ”
01037017	Anana i lahe i ba , “ Iyaka hi egon . Ya hago hi ba , ‘ Ta egon ta na panuwa Dotan . ’ ” Inoke Yosepa i nouliulil talinau eliyaa i na i pwawaliya panuwa Dotan .
01037018	Sauga talinau mataliya i nok hi kite i nenem laha , inoke mulaa abwe i vin elal , heliya iyaka wali nuwatu hi pamaisena te nihi tagapaaliga .
01037019	He hi pebaaba-agil hi ba , “ Ku kite , tokenokenonou iya huwo i nenem o !
01037020	Ehei , ta tagapaaliga , yaka tuwana ta alipaloek wewel kenken bolo ya etega gamwanaa . Inoke tamala wana wasa ta pek te iyaka bwasumu sosokana etega i an . Yaka abwe ta kite tab ana kenonou nihi tabwa tunahot . ”
01037021	Wali baaba o Lubeni i hago inoke iya nuwana Yosepa ni pwamwal , yaka i ba , “ Bahi yawalina ta pwapwamowasi .
01037022	He bahi ta tatagapaaliga . Ta alipaloek ya te wewel kenken toto ya gamwanaa labi kekevana ya elana , yaa bahi tuwana ta papalomwan . ” He Lubeni i ba ola o nuwana Yosepa ni pwamwalem elal ge ni ahe ni pasikal tamaliya elana .
01037023	Sauga Yosepa i na i vin talinau elal , inoke hi lib ge ana holahola yayapona matana waiwaisana hi kukuleke yoho .
01037024	Inoke Yosepa hi ahe hi na hi alipaloek wewel kenken etega enoenovana gamwanaa .
01037025	Hi alipalo wewel kenken gamwanaa i mowasi , yaka hi na hi misiyo ge hi anan . Hi anan ee , abwe mataliya hi lihin boda Isimel hi kitel hi nenem avaliyau ge wali kamel . He aanan bwalena ana epawaisi , bugul bwaleliya waiwaisana ge enonu meya hi usanil , hi neem labi Gileyad hi nana panuwa Itipita .
01037026	Inoke Yuda i baek talinau elal i ba , “ Binimala ebo talila ta lol ge wana yaomal wasana ta sume , hauna waisi abwe ta pwawa ?
01037027	He ta palian boda Isimel elal , yaka bahi tuwana ta papalomwan . Kaiwena iya talila hot , tuwala ge saliyala maisena ya . ” Inoke wana baaba talinau hi talamwi .
01037028	Sauga panuwa Midiyani * tolobisnes hi vin elal , yaka Yosepa talinau hi na hi momol heyanem wewel kenken ana gola , ge hi palian boda Isimel elal molana mani silba ana gewi tuwenti . Inoke heliya Yosepa hi ahe ge hi na panuwa Itipita .
01037029	Yaka abwe Lubeni i sikal i na matana i lau wewel kenken gamwanaa nige Yosepa i kikite , yaka nuwana i nak nabi ge ana kama i kukuleli .
01037030	Inoke i sikal i na talinau elal ge i ba , “ Geman Yosepa nige i gagan to wewel kenken gamwanaa o . He nasi ga na ola e ? ”
01037031	Inoke Yosepa talinau goti etega hi lol ge saliyana hi ahe ana holahola hi pasasaliya .
01037032	Yaka hi ahe hi na tamaliya elana ge hi ba , “ Holahola yayapona ya ha pwawa . He u hile tab ana awa i ola natum ana holahola ? ”
01037033	Tamaliya holahola o i kite yaka i ba , “ Ee , natu ana holahola te . Bwasumu sosokana etegana iyaka i an . Eu , natu geb ! Bwasumu i alatomwatomwa-an ! ”
01037034	Yaka wana nuwanak kaiwena ana kaliko i kukuleli , kaliko toto bwasumu pupunona elana hi ginoliya i galoi , ge natuna baena i kahikahin sauga yayapona .
01037035	Natunau bolau ge yowau gegewel hi na elana tage nuwana nihi pawaisi , yaa i towa nige nuwana i oola . Inoke i ba , “ Na kahikahin ya , ana siga na kahin aliga ge na na Tuma alou ge natu . ” Inoke natuna baena i mimi kahikahin .
01037036	He Midiyani Yosepa hi ahe hi pwatanik Itipita ge hi palian Potipa elana . Potipa iya Itipita wali kin wana totuwalali bwabwatana etega , wana limi ana tomatahikan wali tohouwa .
01038001	Saugena o elana , Yuda talinau i eguluwagil i na i miminaa tau etega elana alana Hila , iya panuwa Adulam gamagalina .
01038002	Yaka Kenani tauina etega alana Suwa natuna yovana i pwawa to ge i alolonan , yaka alona hi kenukenu .
01038003	Inoke i liyan ge i ab natuliya melutauina , yaka alana Yuda i tun El .
01038004	Yaka abwe i liyan al , ge i ab natuna melutauina , yaka alana i tun Onan .
01038005	Yaka i liyan al ge i ab paetonina natuna melutauina , yaka alana i tun Sila . He Yuda alona ge lagona heliya iyoho panuwa Kesib * te wawaya o hi ab .
01038006	Sauga natuna gamaun El i bwata , inoke Yuda yova etega i hile El lagona , alana Tama .
01038007	Yaa El wana pagan i nak Yehoba matanaa , inoke i lol ge i aliga .
01038008	Yaka Yuda i baek Onan elana i ba , “ Talim iyaka i aliga nige natunau . Inoke talim abuabulina nu alolonan yaka alom nuku kenukenu , inoke wawayau nu pamasalil talim alana nihi milili ge aena pipihina ni gan . * He wala pagan ana logugui i ola to . ”
01038009	Yaa Onan i atena te ebo wawayau ni pamasalil , heliya nige alana nihi mimilili . Inoke sauga ebo alona talina abuabulina hi kenu toyawa , yaka ana puhu ni pasulu yoho bilibiliya . He nige nuwana i oola wawayau ni pamasalil talina kaiwena .
01038010	Wana pagan toto o i nak Yehoba matanaa , inoke iya al i lol ge i aliga .
01038011	Yaka abwe Yuda i baek yawana Tama elana i ba , “ U sikal u na tamwam wana limiya ge nu miabuabul ga ana siga natu Sila ni bwata . ” He i ba ola o , kaiwena i nuwatu eba Sila al ge ni aliga ni ola talinau . Inoke Tama i sikal i na i miminaa tamana wana limiya .
01038012	Sauga kekeisi iyapu abwe Yuda lagona , Suwa natuna , i yaomal . Sauga Yuda wana nuwanak i pwamowasi , inoke alona wana heliyam Hila , Adulam gamagalina , hi na panuwa Timna Yuda wana sipi pupunoliya ana totomwatomwa ni kitel .
01038013	Yaka Tama wana wasa hi pek hi ba , “ Yawam i nenem i nana panuwa Timna wana sipi pupunoliya ni tomwatomwa . ”
01038014	Inoke abuabul kalikona i ahek yoho tuwanaa , yaka kaliko getoga i galoi ge kama etega i ahe maninina i kaus , yaka nige bosowaina ana awa nihi eunaan . Inoke i na i misiyo awan Enaim ana abauluulutuk elana kamwasa toto i na panuwa Timna . I ginol ola o , kaiwena i atena bwagana Sila iyaka i bwata , yaa tamana Yuda nige Tama i pepek alona hi aalolon .
01038015	Sauga Yuda i pulivin ge i kite , wana nuwatu iya yova toganawal mani kaiwena , kaiwena maninina i kaus .
01038016	Inoke i nopanet i na yova elana kamwasa bebenaa ge i ba , “ Nuwau alou owa ta kenu . ” Yaa Yuda nige i aatena te age yawana . Inoke anana yova i lahe i ba , “ Ebo alou owa ta kenu , hauna gun nu pem molau ? ”
01038017	Anana Yuda i lahe i ba , “ Goti natuna etega na ahe no bwasumu ali yawi gamwaliyaa , ge na patuna eliyam . ” Inoke yova i ba , “ Bugul etega nu pem ga na kukuhikan , inoke ni paatimatuwa-agau te abwe goti natuna u papatunam . Yaka abwe wam bugul na pasikal elam . ”
01038018	Yaka anana Yuda i lahe i ba , “ Binimala hauna na pewa ge ni paatimatuwa-agiwa ? ” Inoke anana i lahe i ba , “ Wam etotohi ana eawaginol ginebi ana sisiu , * ge wam suki nimwamwa ei . ” Inoke i bugul pek elana ge alona hi kenu , yaka abwe yova i liyan . *
01038019	Sauga Tama i sikal limiya , yaka maninina ana ekaukaus i ahe yoho , ge ana kaliko i loho abuabul kalikona i galoi pasikal al .
01038020	Yaka abwe Yuda goti natuna etega i pek wana heliyam Hila Adulam gamagalina elana , ge i patuna ni na ni pek Tama elana , inoke wana etotohi ana eawaginol ginebi ana sisiu ge wana suki ni ahel pasikalil . Yaa Hila nige yova i pwapwawa .
01038021	Inoke i nel Enaim bolauiliyau enuna elal i ba , “ Yova toganawal mani kaiwena , toto i misiyowa kamwasa bebenaa panuwa ya elana , iya ga ? ” Yaka anana hi lahe hi ba , “ Nige sauga etega yova ololana o i miminaa te . ”
01038022	Inoke i sikal i na Yuda elana ge i ba , “ Yova o nige ya pwapwawa . He panuwa o bolauiliyau enuna hi baem eliyau hi ba , ‘ Nige sauga etega yova toganawal mani kaiwena i miminaa te . ’ ”
01038023	Inoke Yuda i baek elana i ba , “ Ni ola , no bugul ni minaa elana . Bahi ta sisikal , eba gamagalau nihi talawasi-agila . He no bateli ya paolaolaek te goti natuna ya patuna elana , yaa sauga u nok , yaka nige u pwapwawa . ”
01038024	Weikena eton i mowasi abwe Yuda wana wasa hi pek hi ba , “ Yawam Tama i gaganawal , he iyaka i liyan . ” Inoke Yuda i huga ge i ba , “ Ku na ku ahe nuku pwatanik boda mataliyaa , inoke nuku ton paaliga . ”
01038025	Sauga hi na hi ahe ge nihi pwatanik boda mataliyaa , inoke baaba i patuna yawana Yuda elana , i ba , “ Tau toto wana etotohi ana eawaginol ginebi ana sisiu ge wana suki ei , iya te i paliyanagau . He u eunaan bubun , henala ge wana bugul . ”
01038026	Yuda bugul bolo o i eunaagil inoke i atena te iya wana bugul , yaka i ba , “ He nau te ya gegi , iya nigeya , kaiwena nige ya pepek alona ge natu Sila hi aalolon . ” Inoke i ahe tukan i miminaa wana boda gamwanaa , yaa nige al alona hi kekenu .
01038027	Tama wana sauga ab i pwawa , he wawayau gamaluwaluwa iyoho tinenaa .
01038028	Wana sauga ab elana , yaka etega nimana i paelu tagilan , inoke topapaab sisiu keketina i ahe i gimwana to , ge i ba , “ Toto ya iya ab houwa . ”
01038029	Yaa nimana i nul pasikal yaka talina i lohouwa , inoke topapaab i ba , “ Age wam kamwasa u lopwela ge u sogu houwa ! ” Yaka alana hi tun Peles . *
01038030	Enaa , inoke talina toto sisiu keketina hi gimwan nimanaa i sogu , yaka alana hi tun Selaa . *
01039001	He boda Isimel Yosepa hi ahe hi pwatanik panuwa Itipita , yaka Potipa i pwamola wana totuwalali loloyowanina . Potipa iya Itipita wali kin wana totuwalali bwabwatana etega , wana limi ana tomatahikan wali tohouwa .
01039002	Yehoba i minaa Yosepa elana , inoke i labe ge bugul gegewena i ginolil hi waisi . He i miminaa wana tonowak Itipita gamagalina wana limiya .
01039003	Wana tonowak i kite Yehoba i minaa elana ge i labe bugul gegewena i ginolil hi waisi ,
01039004	inoke i yaliyaya Yosepa kaiwena ge i teli ni totuwalali ya te iya eliyana . Yaka i ba wana limi ana totuwalali i houwaagil ge wana bugubugul gegewena i teli nimanaa i matahikagil .
01039005	Sauga o elana ge i nok , Yosepa kaiwena Yehoba Potipa wana limi ana heniheni i muloluagil waisi hi pwawa . Wana bugubugul gegewel , wana limi gamwanaa ge wana eyowaa , Yehoba i muloluagil hi waisi .
01039006	Inoke wana bugubugul gegewena ali logugui i pek Yosepa elana ni matahikagil , yaka iya nige i nuwanuwatu bugul etega kaiwena iyai te aanan toto i aan . He Yosepa i hebubun ge ana awa i waisi .
01039007	Wana minamina nige ana sauga i yayapu inoke wana tonowak lagona Yosepa i hebabale ge i baek elana i ba , “ U nem alou owa ta kenu . ”
01039008	Yaa Yosepa i towa , inoke i baek elana i ba , “ No tonowak nige i nuwanuwatu bugul etega kaiwena wana limi gamwanaa , kaiwena nau ya minaa te . He wana bugubugul gegewena i teli nimwawa ya matahikagil .
01039009	No logugui i gan limi ya gamwanaa i ola iya , ge nige bugul etega i kakaise eliyau iyai te owa lagona . Inoke ga i ola ge pagan nanakina ya na ginol ge na gegi Yabowaine elana ? ”
01039010	Bwagana lan maisena ge maisena yova i mimi papalawakik Yosepa elana , yaa Yosepa i towa nige alona hi kekenu ge nige alona hi minamina .
01039011	Lan etegana Yosepa i na i tuk limiya tage ni tuwalali , he sauga o elana nige limi ana totuwalali etegana i miminaa to .
01039012	Yaka Potipa lagona i na Yosepa ana holahola i kukuhikan , inoke i baek elana i ba , “ U nem alou owa ta kenu ! ” Yaa Yosepa ana holahola i lou luwana yova nimanaa ge i lou tagil noleleya .
01039013	Sauga yova i kite Yosepa ana holahola i lou luwana nimanaa ge i lou tagil noleleya ,
01039014	inoke wana limi ana totuwalali i yogaagil hi nem , ge i baek elal i ba , “ Ku kite i ! Hibilu gamagalina toto ya no tonowak i pwatanim eliyala , i papapuluwawi-agila . I nem i ulutuk no lum gamwanaa nuwana alou naha kenu , inoke ya yoga nabi .
01039015	Sauga anau i hago , yaka ana holahola i lou luwana labewa ge i lou tagil noleleya . ”
01039016	He yova Yosepa ana holahola i teliya labenaa ana siga lagona i sikalim limiya .
01039017	Inoke wasa maisena i wasaan al lagona elana i ba , “ Totuwalali loloyowanina Hibilu gamagalina toto u pwatanim eliyala , i nem i ulutuk no lum gamwanaa tage ni papuluwawi-agau .
01039018	Yaa sauga ya yoga , inoke ana holahola i lou luwana labewa ge i lou tagil noleleya . ”
01039019	Yosepa wana tonowak lagona wana baaba i hago , inoke i huga nabi ,
01039020	yaka i ba tolohaveyan Yosepa hi lib hi na hi teli dela , del toto kin wana tololoyowan wali abamina . He sauga Yosepa iyoho dela ,
01039021	Yehoba i minaa elana yaka i nunuwana-an ge i muloluan , inoke del ana tomatahikan i yaliyaya iya kaiwena .
01039022	Yaka i teli todibula gegewel i houwaagil ge del ana tuwalali gegewena i matahikan .
01039023	He del ana tomatahikan nige i nuwanuwatu tuwalali toto Yosepa i matahikan kaiwena , kaiwena Yehoba i minaa Yosepa elana , inoke i labe ge bugul gegewena i ginolil hi waisi .
01040001	Sauga kekeisi i yapu , abwe Itipita wali kin ana oine ana tomatahikan wali tobwabwatana alona ge ana beleid ana totonton wali tobwabwatana , bugul etega hi ginol panak yaka kin nige i yayaliyaya kaiweliya .
01040002	Inoke i huga wana totuwalali bwabwatal eluwa o elal
01040003	ge i ba tolohaveyan hi na hi telel dela , del toto kin wana limi ana tomatahikan wali tohouwa wana limiya . He Yosepa iyoho al to del maisena o eliyana .
01040004	Inoke kin wana limi ana tomatahikan wali tohouwa Yosepa i teli i matahikagil , ge hi miminaa o sauga yayapona .
01040005	Heliya iyoho dela , yaka bulin etega kin ana oine ana tomatahikan wali tobwabwatana alona ge ana beleid ana totonton wali tobwabwatana , ali toto eluwa hi kenonou . Ali kenonou nige i mamaisena ge kenonou ali sapu tomaha ona .
01040006	Lan i gan mweluluga , yaka Yosepa i na elal ge i kitel ali awa i nuwaleyan .
01040007	Inoke i nelil i ba , “ Hauna gun i panuwanuwatu-agimiu ge lan ebe ami awa i nuwaleyan ? ”
01040008	Anana hi lahe hi ba , “ Ama toto labui ha kenonou , yaa nige gamagal etega i gagan te ge bosowaina ama kenonou ni pasikal . ” Inoke Yosepa i ba , “ Yabowaine te i lalabela bosowaina kenonou ta pasikal . He ami kenonou ku baunanim . ”
01040009	Inoke oine ana tomatahikan wali tobwabwatana ana kenonou i baunan Yosepa elana i ba , “ O kenonou elana oine puna etega ya kite maniniwa ,
01040010	lalana eton i tagila nuwanaa . Sauga lamwana i titin , inoke etimwawa lanina i tagilan , yaka enona i gan ge i matuwa .
01040011	He kin wana kom ya pihikan , yaka oine enona ya ahe ge suina ya pi loke gamwanaa , inoke ya pek kin elana . ”
01040012	Inoke Yosepa i baek elana i ba , “ Am kenonou ana pasikal i ola hiwe . Oine lalana eton , he lan ana gewi eton bana .
01040013	Lan eton ni mowasi , yaka kin ni sokaliwa nu tagil dela , ge ni teli pasikaliwa wam abatuwalaliya . Inoke ana oine nu pek elana ni ola valila , sauga toto owa ana oine ana tomatahikan .
01040014	Yaa sauga ebo minamina waiwaisana nu pwawa , he nu nuwahikagau . Nu atilomwan-agau yaka nu baaba kin elana kaiweu , inoke ni aheyau na miegonik te del ya elana .
01040015	Kaiwena valila hi kaomeyauek Hibilu wali panuwaa inoke hi aheyau ge ya nem . Ge sauga ya miminaa e , nige bugul etega ya giginol panak , yaa hi teleyau bwabwageyau abamina nanakina ya elana . ”
01040016	Sauga beleid ana totonton wali tobwabwatana i hago oine ana tomatahikan ana kenonou ana sapu i waisi , inoke i baek Yosepa elana i ba , “ He nau al ge ya kenonou . Tage beleid ana egowa eton ya toun pate .
01040017	Egowa toto pwatanaa hot , beleid , bisket ge keik totonil tomaha ge tomaha kin kaiwena i kalaopop . Yaa bwasumu bolo hi youyou hi nem ge hi anil . ”
01040018	Inoke Yosepa i baek elana i ba , “ Am kenonou ana pasikal i ola hiwe . Egowa eton , he lan ana gewi eton bana .
01040019	Lan eton ni mowasi , kin ni sokaliwa nu tagil dela , yaka ni ba tolohaveyan mwamwalim nihi gotomwa . Inoke tuwam nihi pakuki ebwakil elana ge bwasumu bolo hi youyou nihi nem nihi an . ”
01040020	Lan eton i mowasi kin wana lan ab ana nuwahikan , inoke aanan bwabwatana i ginol wana totuwalali bwabwatal gegewel kaiweliya . Inoke ana oine ana tomatahikan wali tobwabwatana alona ge ana beleid ana totonton wali tobwabwatana , i sokalil hi tagil dela ge i telel wana totuwalali bwabwatal maniniliyaa .
01040021	Yaka ana oine ana tomatahikan i teli pasikal wana abatuwalaliya inoke kin ana oine i pek elana i ola valila .
01040022	Yaa i ba tolohaveyan elal ana beleid ana totonton mwamwalina hi gotomwa yaka tuwana hi pakuki ebwakil elana . He i masal i ola toto Yosepa i baunan elal , sauga ali kenonou i papasikal .
01040023	Yaa kin ana oine ana tomatahikan wali tobwabwatana nige Yosepa i nunuwahikan , he i nuluwan hoti .
01041001	Baliman eluwa i mowasi , yaka abwe Itipita wali kin i kenonou . Tage i talmilila wewel Naile bebenaa ,
01041002	yaka bulumwakau meluyowau tuwaliya sasapona ge tatabwal , ali gewi seben , hi gaiheem wewela ge hi alaalamwawin wewel bebenaa .
01041003	Toto o enaa , yaka bulumwakau meluyowau ali gewi seben al hi gaiheem wewela , heliya tuwaliya lalauina ge ali awa nanakina . Inoke hi na hi talmilila bolo hi miminaa wewel bebenaa gegeliliyaa .
01041004	Yaka bulumwakau bolo tuwaliya lalauina ge ali awa nanakina bolo seben tuwaliya sasapona ge tatabwal hi anil habal . Kin i kenonou i ola o inoke matana i panana .
01041005	Inoke i kenu al ge kenonou eluwana i kenonou-an . Tage witi enona ali haka seben hi enona nuwana maisena elana , enowaliya hi tabwa ge ali awa i waisi .
01041006	Toto o enaa , yaka witi enona ali haka seben al hi siun , heliya enowaliya i yakiwa ge mana kalakalasina i neem labi kekevana iyaka i tonil .
01041007	Yaka haka bolo enowaliya hi yakiwa haka seben bolo enowaliya hi tabwa hi tinonil . Inoke kin i kenu lut ge i atena te i kenonou .
01041008	Lan i gan mweluluga i nuwanuwatu kenonou o kaiweliya , inoke Itipita wali tokukula ge wali tosiba gegewel ali baaba i patuna ge hi nem . Yaka kenonou labui i baunan elal , yaa nige etega bosowaina ni pasikal .
01041009	Yaka abwe kin ana oine ana tomatahikan wali tobwabwatana i baek elana i ba , “ Tonowak , no gegi etega , bugul etega nige ya babaunan eliyam , abwe ya nuwatu te .
01041010	He valila sauga etega u huga alou ge am beleid ana totonton wali tobwabwatana eliyama , inoke u telema dela , del toto wam limi ana tomatahikan wali tohouwa wana limiya .
01041011	Yaka bulin etega ama toto eluwa ha kenonou , yaa ama kenonou ali sapu tomaha ona .
01041012	Hibilu hevalina etega iyoho to aloma , iya wam limi ana tomatahikan wali tohouwa wana totuwalali loloyowanina . Ama kenonou ha baunanik elana , inoke alou ge alou ama kenonou ali sapu i pasikal kaiwema .
01041013	He bugul gegewena i masal i olaolaek te kenonou ali pasikal toto i baunan eliyama . Nau u teli pasikalau no abatuwalaliya , ge u ba tolohaveyan am beleid ana totonton mwamwalina hi gotomwa yaka tuwana hi pakuki ebwakil elana . ”
01041014	Sauga kin baaba o i hago , inoke Yosepa ana baaba i patuna ge ni nem elana . Yaka etimwawa Yosepa hi ahe tagilan dela , yaka i na awana pupunona i kol ge kama waiwaisana i galoi , inoke hi pwatanik kin elana .
01041015	Inoke kin i baek Yosepa elana i ba , “ Kenonou etega ya kenonou-an , yaa nige gamagal etega i bosowaina ni pasikal . He no wasa hi pem tage ebo gamagal etega ana kenonou ni baunaniwa , inoke owa bosowaim nu pasikal . ”
01041016	Yosepa kin anana i lahe i ba , “ Tonowak , nau nige bosowaiu i oola kenonou na pasikal . Yaa Yabowaine am kenonou ana pasikal ni pamasal eliyam ge ana sapu ni waisi . ”
01041017	Yaka kin i baek Yosepa elana i ba , “ O kenonou i ola hiwe . Tage ya talmilila wewel Naile bebenaa ,
01041018	yaka bulumwakau meluyowau tuwaliya sasapona ge tatabwal , ali gewi seben , hi gaiheem wewela ge hi alaalamwawin wewel bebenaa .
01041019	Yaka bulumwakau meluyowau ali gewi seben al hi gaiheem wewela , heliya tuwaliya lalauina ge ali awa nanakina . Nige sauga etega bulumwakau ololal o ya kikitel panuwa Itipita gamwanaa .
01041020	Yaka bulumwakau bolo tuwaliya lalauina ge ali awa nanakina bolo houwan hi gaiheem wewela tatabwal hi anil habal .
01041021	Yaa bwagana hi an habal , ali kite i ola te nige hi aanan . He tuwaliya ana awa nanakina i ola ya te valila . Inoke matau ya panana .
01041022	“ Yaka abwe ya kenu al ge kenonou eluwana ya kenonou-an . Witi enona ali haka seben ya kitel hi enona nuwana maisena elana , enowaliya hi tabwa ge ali awa i waisi .
01041023	Toto o enaa , yaka witi enona ali haka seben al hi siun , heliya enowaliya i yakiwa ge mana kalakalasina i neem labi kekevana iyaka i tonil .
01041024	Yaka haka bolo enowaliya hi yakiwa haka seben bolo ali awa i waisi hi tinonil . He sauga ya lut , inoke o kenonou ya baunan tokukula elal , yaa nige etega bosowaina ni pasikal eliyau . ”
01041025	Inoke Yosepa i baek kin elana i ba , “ Tonowak , am kenonou bolo eluwa o ali sapu maisena . Yabowaine i pankitewa hauna gun abwe ni ginol .
01041026	Bulumwakau meluyowau tatabwal ali gewi seben , he baliman ana gewi seben bana , ge witi enona ali haka ali awa waiwaisana ali gewi seben , heliya al baliman ana gewi seben bana . Ali toto eluwa ali sapu maisena ya .
01041027	Ge bulumwakau tuwaliya lalauina ge ali awa nanakina ali gewi seben , bolo mulaa abwe hi masal , he baliman ana gewi seben bana , ge i ola al witi enona ali haka seben , bolo enowaliya nanakina ge mana kalakalasina iyaka i tonil . Heliya hi pamasal baliman ana gewi seben galebu bwabwatana ni masal .
01041028	“ Tonowak , he i ola te ewasi ya baunan eliyam : Yabowaine iyaka i pamasal elam hauna gun abwe ni ginol .
01041029	Baliman ana gewi seben malul bwabwatana ni gan panuwa Itipita ana labi gegewena elana .
01041030	Enaa , inoke baliman ana gewi seben galebu bwabwatana ni masal . Yaka Itipita ana malul baliman seben gamwanaa nige mulina ni gagan , kaiwena galebu o nasi panuwa ni pagulagula .
01041031	Gamagalau sauga malumalulina nige al nihi nunuwatu-an , kaiwena galebu o nasi ni bwata hot .
01041032	Kenonou u kenonou-an paeluwa puna kaiwena Yabowaine bugul ya iyaka i nuwatuan haba , ge kaiwena sauga kekeisi ya inoke ni ginol .
01041033	“ Inoke tau etega nu hile , toto wana siba i gan ge nuwana i sapu , ge nu teli panuwa Itipita gegewena ni logugui-an .
01041034	Tologugui enuna al nu hilel panuwa nihi logugui-an . Inoke malul ana baliman seben gamwanaa , pahi ana sauga elana pahi enona nihi wali panimala panuna ge wali maisena nihi ahe gamaman kaiwena .
01041035	Yaka aanan gegewena toto nihi ahe malul ana baliman toto i nenem gamwaliyaa , nihi bugul papahe . Inoke wam logugui ana gasisi elana witi enona o nihi teli hikan ali limi gamwanaa panuwa ona elal ge nihi matahikan .
01041036	Aanan o ni ola etagalou . Yaka galebu ana baliman seben gamwaliyaa toto i nenem panuwa Itipita elana , nihi patuwalali nihi pek gamagalau elal . Inoke bahi gamagalau galebu bwabwatana kaiwena ge nihi aaliga . ”
01041037	Sauga kin alonau ge wana tologugui bwabwatal Yosepa wana baaba hi hago , inoke nuwatu o hi awa wawaisi-an .
01041038	Yaka kin i baek elal i ba , “ Nige bosowaina gamagal etega al ta pwawa wana siba ni ola tau ya , iya Yabowaine Yayaluwana i minaa elana . ”
01041039	Inoke i baek Yosepa elana i ba , “ Yabowaine bugul bolo ya gegewel iyaka i pankitewa , he nige gamagal etega wana siba ge wana nuwasapu i oola owa .
01041040	Na telewa nu tabwa tologugui bwabwatana no panuwa elana , inoke no gamagalau gegewel wam baaba nihi henapuan . He nau kin maiseu ya te alau alam ni bwata lake . ”
01041041	Inoke i ba vevehe al Yosepa elana i ba , “ Ya telewa nu tologugui bwabwatana Itipita ana labi gegewena elana . ”
01041042	Inoke nimana gigina ana lin toto kin etotohena iyoho lin tuwanaa , i palo ge i pahek Yosepa nimana giginaa . Yaka kaliko matana waiwaisana i ahe Yosepa i pagaloi , ge bobot gold elana hi ginoliya i telek Yosepa mwamwalinaa .
01041043	I ola al i ba ni heya kin wana waga momomol labuina pwatanaa , yaka gamagalau nihi nohouwa manininaa nihi yogayoga nihi ba , “ Ku legi ! Ku legi ! ” He kin i ginol ola o ge i pamasal Yosepa i teli i tologugui bwabwatana panuwa Itipita ana labi gegewena elana .
01041044	He i baek Yosepa elana i ba , “ Nau te kin , yaa nige gamagal etega al panuwa Itipita ana labi gegewena elana bugul etega totona ni giginol , houwan ga ni papatalam eliyam . ”
01041045	Yaka kin Yosepa alana i tun Sepenat Peneya , ge lagona i pek yova alana Asinata , iya panuwa Heliyopelis wali topowon Potipela natuna . Inoke Yosepa alana i bwata i tabwa tologugui Itipita elana .
01041046	He Yosepa wana baliman teti te i tuwalali telipuna Itipita wali kin elana . Inoke Yosepa i notagil kin i eguluwan ge wana waga momomol elana i nawanawa panuwa Itipita gamwana gegewena i anugayawa-an .
01041047	Malul ana baliman seben gamwanaa Itipita wali eyowa enona i bwata nabi .
01041048	Inoke baliman seben o elana Yosepa aanan i gewi hot i bugulan ge i teli hikan ali limi gamwanaa panuwa ona elal . He panuwa maisena ge maisena ana eyowa enowana i teliya panuwa o elana .
01041049	Witi enona i gewi nabi i ola hoga gilesana Yosepa i pwahin abaliyaa , inoke nige al bosowaina ana gewi ni ahe .
01041050	Galebu ana baliman nigeya ga i mamasal , inoke Yosepa lagona Asinata natuliyau bolau labui i abil . Asinata iya panuwa Heliyopelis wali topowon Potipela natuna .
01041051	Yosepa natuna gamaun alana i tun Manasa , * ge i ba , “ Alana ya tun ola o kaiwena Yabowaine i labeyau yaka o pulowan gegewena ge nam wana limi ana heniheni gegewel ya nuluwagil . ”
01041052	Natuna eluwana alana i tun Ipileimi , * ge i ba , “ Alana ya tun ola o kaiwena Yabowaine natuwau i pem no lomwan panuwana ya elana . ”
01041053	Malul ana baliman seben i mowasi panuwa Itipita elana ,
01041054	inoke galebu bwabwatana ana baliman seben i telipuna , i ola Yosepa wana baaba . He galebu bwabwatana i masal al panuwa gegewel elal , yaa Itipita ana labi gegewena elana aanan i gan .
01041055	Sauga Itipita gamagaliliyau hi galebu , inoke hi na kin elana ge aanan kaiwena hi awanun gagasisi . Yaka kin i baek elal i ba , “ Nuku na Yosepa elana , yaka hauna gun ni baunan eliyamiu nuku ginol ola . ”
01041056	He galebu i bwata nabi ge iyaka panuwa Itipita ana labi gegewena i pwawa , inoke Yosepa witi enona ana limi i lopwelaan ge i palian Itipita elal .
01041057	Panuwa gegewena labi o elana hi na Itipita ge witi enona hi pwapwamola Yosepa elana , kaiwena labi gegewena galebu i apapanak-an .
01042001	Yakobo wasa i hago te witi iyoho Itipita , inoke i baek natunau bolau elal i ba , “ Ga i ola ku minamina ya ge ku pepegagayawa-agimiu ?
01042002	Ya hago te witi iyoho Itipita . Nuku na enuna nuku pwamola kaiwela , yaka bahi galebu kaiwena ge ta aaliga . ”
01042003	Inoke Yosepa talinau elulutega hi egon nihi na Itipita witi nihi pwapwamola .
01042004	Yaa Yakobo nige Beniyamina , iya Yosepa talina hot , i tatalamwan aloliya hi nonok , kaiwena i lovakun eba nak etega ni pwawa .
01042005	Inoke bolo hi na Itipita witi nihi pwapwamola , gamwaliyaa Yakobo natunau al ge , kaiwena galebu bwabwatana iyaka i masal panuwa Kenani elana .
01042006	He sauga o elana Yosepa iya i tologugui bwabwatana panuwa Itipita , ge iya witi i palipali gamagalau elal bolo hi neem panuwa gegewena elal . Inoke sauga talinau hi na hi vin elana , hi kululu elana maniniliya i loek bilibiliya .
01042007	Sauga Yosepa talinau i kitel inoke i atena te iya talinau , yaa i ginol i ola te nige i aatenal . Inoke i nel elal anana i elolol i ba , “ Komiu ga ku neem ? ” Anana hi lahe hi ba , “ Ha neem panuwa Kenani , nuwama aanan naha pwapwamola . ”
01042008	He bwagana Yosepa i atena te iya talinau , yaa heliya nige hi aatena te henala iya .
01042009	Inoke Yosepa ana kenonou bolo valila i kenonou-an talinau kaiweliya i nuwatuan . Yaka i baek elal i ba , “ Komiu toanugayawa ! Ku nem nuku kite hauna labi wama panuwa gamwanaa bosowaina tolohaveyan etimwawa nihi tuk . ”
01042010	Anana hi lahe hi ba , “ Tonowak , ama nige toanugayawa i oola . Ha nem aanan pwapwamola kaiwena ha ola wam totuwalali .
01042011	Gegewema tamama maisena . He ama gamagalau waiwaisal , nige toanugayawa i oola . ”
01042012	Analiya Yosepa i lahe i ba , “ Nigeya ! Ku nem nuku kite hauna labi wama panuwa gamwanaa bosowaina tolohaveyan etimwawa nihi tuk . ”
01042013	Inoke Yosepa anana hi lahe hi ola , “ Tonowak , wam totuwalali ama alomeyau ge talimeyau gegewema ama gewi elulutega eluwa . Tamama maisena , iya i miminaa panuwa Kenani . Ama melumelu iyoho to alona ge tamama , ge toto etegana al iyaka nige i gagan . ”
01042014	Yosepa i baek elal i ba , “ He i ola te ya ba haba eliyamiu : komiu toanugayawa .
01042015	Wami baaba o eliyana na labosemiu ge na atena ebo komiu gamagalau waiwaisal o ebo nigeya . O sila kin , nige panuwa ya nuku eeguluwan ana siga ami melumelu ni nem na kite .
01042016	Inoke etega gamwamiwa nuku patuna ni na ami melumelu ni ahe ge ni pwatanim eliyau . Yaa gegewemiu al nuku minaa ga dela ana siga na atena ebo toto ku baunan i tunahot o ebo nigeya . Yaa ebo nige i tutunahot , he o sila kin , komiu toanugayawa ! ”
01042017	Inoke gegewel Yosepa i telel dela hi miminaa o lan ana gewi eton .
01042018	Lan etonina elana Yosepa i baek elal i ba , “ Nuku ginol ola hiwe no nuwatu , inoke nige na aapanakimiu , kaiwena nau Yabowaine ya lovakunan .
01042019	Ebo tunahot komiu gamagalau waiwaisal , inoke talimiu etega ni minaa ga dela yaka gegewemiu al witi nuku ahe ge nuku sikal nuku pek tutumiyau togalebu elal .
01042020	Yaa ami melumelu nuku ahe ge nuku pwatanim eliyau , inoke na atena te toto ku baunan eliyau i tunahot , yaka nige nuku yayaomal . ” Inoke Yosepa wana baaba hi awa wawaisi-an .
01042021	Yaka hi pebaaba-agil hi ola , “ Valila wala ginol talila elana lahena te sauga ya ta pwawa e . Sauga i awanun nabinabi te bahi ta aapanak , he atena ana lomwan ta kite ya , yaa nige anana ta hahago . Inoke heiya te kaiwena ge pulowan ya i masal elala e . ”
01042022	Yaka Lubeni i ba , “ Valila ya ba eliyamiu te bahi nuku giginol panak geman elana , yaa nige anau ku hahago . He wana yaomal lahena te sauga ya ta pwawa e . ”
01042023	Yosepa i hago hauna bana hi baaba , yaa nige hi aatena to , kaiwena iya i papana Itipita ge topapasikal etega i papasikal elal .
01042024	Inoke Yosepa i eguluwagil i na i kahin . I pwaul i mowasi , inoke i sikal i na i baaba al elal . Yaka i ba wana totuwalali Simiyon hi ahe ge hi yowan mataliyaa .
01042025	Inoke Yosepa i baek wana totuwalali elal witi nihi usan pakalaopop talinau wali beig gamwanaa , ge wali mani nihi teli pasikal maisena ge maisena wana beig gamwanaa . I ola al i ba aanan enuna nihi pek wali nawanawa kamwasaa kaiwena . He totuwalali hi ginol ola to kaiweliya ,
01042026	inoke ali witi ana beig hi usan wali donki pwataliyaa ge hi egon .
01042027	Hi vin abaveyaho elana ge abwe nihi kenu , yaka taliliya etegana wana beig i pwela tage wana donki aana ni ahe ge ni paan . Inoke wana mani i pwawaa wana beig awanaa .
01042028	Yaka i yoga talinau elal i ba , “ No mani toto witi ya pwamolaya hi teli pasikal . Ku kite , iya hiwe no beig gamwanaa e . ” Yaka tuwaliya i aliga ge ginebi wali lovakun hi pebaaba-agil hi ba , “ Yabowaine ga i ginol ola eliyala e ? ”
01042029	Sauga hi na hi vin tamaliya Yakobo elana panuwa Kenani , inoke bugul gegewena toto i masal elal hi wasaan elana .
01042030	Hi ba , “ Itipita wali tologugui bwabwatana i ba lalaagima , ge i wolema tage ama toanugayawa .
01042031	Yaa ha baek elana ha ba , ‘ Ama gamagalau waiwaisal , nige toanugayawa i oola .
01042032	He alomeyau ge talimeyau gegewema ama gewi elulutega eluwa ge tamama maisena . Talima etegana iyaka nige i gagan , ge ama melumelu iyoho Kenani alona ge tamama . ’
01042033	“ Inoke tologugui bwabwatana o i baem al eliyama i ola , ‘ Wami baaba o eliyana na labosemiu ge na atena ebo komiu gamagalau waiwaisal o ebo nigeya . He talimiu etega nuku eguluwana te eliyau , yaka gegewemiu al witi nuku ahe ge nuku sikal nuku pek tutumiyau togalebu elal .
01042034	Yaa ami melumelu nuku ahe ge nuku pwatanim eliyau , inoke na atena te komiu nige toanugayawa i oola yaa gamagalau waiwaisal . Inoke abwe talimiu toto ku eguluwan eliyau na pewa pasikal , ge na talamwagimiu hauna nuwamiu inoke nuku pwamola . ’ ”
01042035	Sauga wali beig hi lopwelaan witi hi ligiligin palu , yaka maisena ge maisena wana mani ana os i pwawaa wana beig gamwanaa . Aloliya ge tamaliya mani ana os hi kitel inoke hi lovakun .
01042036	Yaka abwe tamaliya Yakobo i baek elal i ba , “ Nasi natuwau gegewel nuku payaomalil nige al na kikitel . Yosepa iyaka nige i gagan , Simiyon iyaka nige i gagan , ge sauga ya nuwamiu Beniyamina nuku ahe . Bugul gegewena iyaka i pulowan eliyau ! ”
01042037	Inoke Lubeni i baek tamana elana i ba , “ Ebo nige Beniyamina na papasikal eliyam , he natuwau bolau labui nu lolil . U teliya nimwawa o matamatahikan , inoke abwe na en pasikalim eliyam . ”
01042038	Yaa Yakobo i ba , “ Natu nige na tatalamwan nuku aahe alomiu nuku nana Itipita . Talina iyaka i yaomal , iya maisena ya te i mina e . * Iyaka ya liki , ebo nuku nawanawa kamwasaa ge nak etega ni pwawa , nasi nuwanakina ni paaligau .
01043001	Panuwa Kenani elana galebu iyoho ya i bwatabwata .
01043002	Inoke sauga witi toto valila hi ahem Itipita hi an haba , yaka Yakobo i baek natunau bolau elal i ba , “ Nuku sikal Itipita ge witi enuna al nuku pwamola kaiwela . ”
01043003	Yaa Yuda i baek tamaliya elana i ba , “ Itipita wali tologugui bwabwatana valila i ba nabinabi eliyama i ba , ‘ Ebo nige alomiu talimiu nuku nenem , he nige na tatalam nuku tutuk ge nuku kikiteyau . ’
01043004	Ebo talima nu talamwan aloma naha nok , inoke naha nok yaka aanan naha pwamola kaiwem .
01043005	Yaa ebo nige nu tatalamwan , he nige naha nonok . Kaiwena tau o iyaka i ba haba eliyama i ba , ‘ Ebo nige alomiu talimiu nuku nenem , he nige na tatalam nuku tutuk ge nuku kikiteyau . ’ ”
01043006	Yakobo , alana etega al Isileli , i baek elal i ba , “ Ga i ola ge tau o wana wasa ku pek ku ba , ‘ Talima etega al iyoho , ’ yaka eliyana o pulowan bwabwatana ya ku pem . ”
01043007	Anana hi lahe hi ba , “ Tau o i nel bubunima ama kaiwema ge tutumeyau kaiweliya . I ba , ‘ Tamamiu iyoho ya i minamina ? Tab talimiu etegana al i gan ? ’ Inoke wana nel lahena ya te ha baunan elana . He nige ha aatena te abwe ni baem eliyama ni ba , ‘ Talimiu nuku en pwatanim . ’ ”
01043008	Inoke Yuda i baek tamaliya Isileli elana i ba , “ Geman u talamwan ni nem alou , yaka sauga ya te naha egon . Inoke owa ge ama alomeyau natumeyau bahi galebu kaiwena ge ta aaliga .
01043009	Ya batelewa nau na matahikan , inoke pulowanina nu pem o kalikalivai . Ebo nige na een pasikal ge na teteli maninimwa , he nau iyaka ya gegi eliyam , inoke yawaliu miminana ana woliwoli o ni minem eliyau .
01043010	Binimala nige nu kukuhikagima ge sauga naha aahe nabiyan , he bosowaima te iyaka naha nok ge naha nem palabuina te . ”
01043011	Inoke tamaliya Isileli i baek elal i ba , “ Ebo ni ola o , he nuku ginol ni ola hiwe . Wala panuwa enona waiwaisal ona nuku usan wami nabwa gamwanaa : bugul bwaleliya waiwaisana enuna , luvi uleya enuna , aanan bwalena ana epawaisi enuna , enonu meya enuna , ge ebwakil pistasiyo ge amon * enowaliya enuna . Inoke nuku na nuku pek tologugui o elana wami mulolu .
01043012	Mani toto valila ku noahe , he sauga ya nuku daboli ge nuku ahe . Kaiwena mani toto hi teli pasikal wami beig awanaa nasi nuku pek pasikal ga elal . Tabana eba hi usan pagegi .
01043013	Talimiu Beniyamina al nuku ahe , inoke sauga ya etimwawa nuku egon nuku sikal tologugui o elana .
01043014	Ya awanun Yabowaine Togasisi Hot tologugui o ni paatilomwanan yaka atena ni lomwanagimiu , inoke talimiu toto etegana alona ge Beniyamina ni talamwagil alomiyau nuku sikalim eliyau . Yaa ebo natuwau na payaomalil , he iyaka ya payaomalil . ”
01043015	Inoke natunau wali mulolu hi ahe , ge mani toto valila hi noahe hi daboli ge hi ahe . Yaka avaliya ge Beniyamina etimwawa hi egon hi na Itipita ge hi masal Yosepa eliyana .
01043016	Sauga Yosepa i kite Beniyamina iyoho avaliya , inoke i baek wana limi ana totuwalali wali tohouwa elana i ba , “ Bolau ya nu enil nihi na no limiya , yaka sipi o ebo goti o ebo bulumwakau etega nu tagapaaliga ge aanan nu ginol . Nasi alalati alowau naha anan . ”
01043017	Totuwalali i ginol ola Yosepa wana baaba , yaka i enil ge nihi na Yosepa wana limiya .
01043018	Hi nanawa limi kaiwena , inoke hi lovakun ge hi nuwanuwatu hi ba , “ Mani toto wala nem houwan elana hi teli pasikal wala beig gamwanaa , baena te i ahela ge ta nem e . He nuwaliya nihi pakokovela yaka nihi telela ta ola wali totuwalali loloyowanil ge wala donki nihi ahel . ”
01043019	Limi ana nog elana inoke hi na hi baek Yosepa wana totuwalali elana hi ba ,
01043020	“ Tonowak , valila ha nem ga houwan aanan ha pwapwamola .
01043021	Yaa wama sauga sikal elana , ha vin abaveyaho elana ge abwe naha kenu , inoke wama beig ha lopwelaan , yaka maisena ge maisena wama mani ana bwata i olaolaek ha pwawaa wama beig awaliyaa . He iyahe ha pwatanim ge naha pewa pasikal .
01043022	Ge mani enuna al ha pwatanim aanan enuna al naha pwamolaya . Yaa nige ha aatena te henala wama mani toto valila i teli pasikal wama beig ona gamwaliyaa . ”
01043023	Analiya totuwalali i lahe i ba , “ Bahi nuku nuwanuwatu ge nuku lolovakun . Wami Yabowaine , toto tamamiu wana Yabowaine , iya te wami mani i teli wami beig gamwaliyaa . Yaa mani toto valila witi ku pwamolaya iyaka ya ahe . ” Inoke i na dela Simiyon i sokal ge i pwatanik talinau elal .
01043024	Yaka totuwalali i en tukagil Yosepa wana limiya , inoke wewel i wage i pek aeliya hi ul , ge wali donki aliya i pek hi anan .
01043025	He iyaka hi hago te nasi alalati avaliya ge Yosepa nihi anan , inoke wali mulolu hi lovivina-an ge sauga Yosepa ni vin nihi pek elana .
01043026	Inoke sauga Yosepa i sikal limiya , wali mulolu bolo hi bugul tukagil limiya hi ahe ge hi pek elana . Inoke hi kululu elana maniniliya i loek bilibiliya .
01043027	Yosepa i nel elal i ba , “ Tab ku molu ? ” Yaka abwe i nel vevehe i ba , “ Valila no wasa ku pem tamamiu lilikena kaiwena . He ga i ola ? Iya iyoho ya i minamina i molu ? ”
01043028	Anana hi lahe hi ba , “ Tonowak ! Ee , tamama iyoho ya i minamina ge i molu . ” Yaka abwe Yosepa ana awatauwan hi ginol hi kululu elana .
01043029	Sauga Yosepa matana i lipwapwati ge Beniyamina , iya talina hot hinaliya maisena i kite , inoke i nel elal i ba , “ Ami melumelu toto valila wasana ku wasaan elau heiya e ? ” Inoke hi talam , yaka i baek Beniyamina elana i ba , “ Natu , Yabowaine ni muloluagiwa . ”
01043030	Yosepa atena i lomwan nabi talina kaiwena kelaubwa ni kahin , inoke etimwawa i eguluwagil i na wana lum elana ge i kahikahin .
01043031	Sauga i pwaul yaka wewel i ahe maninina i ul , inoke atena i pagasisi al i na i tagil elal , ge i ba wana totuwalali aanan nihi habwe .
01043032	Yosepa i minaa teibol etega elana aana hi pek , talinau hi minaa teibol getoga elana aliya hi pek , ge Itipita bolo avaliyau hi anan hi minaa teibol getoga al elana aliya hi pek . Hi ginol ola o , kaiwena Itipita nige sauga etega avaliyau ge Hibilu hi aanan toyawa , amnaliya i naka hot . *
01043033	He Yosepa i ba totuwalali talinau hi telel abaliyaa teibol elana . Awoliya i noek Yosepa elana ge ali vatavatal i golugoluwa wali baliman ab elana , i telipunaa ali gamaun elana i na ana siga ali melumelu . Sauga talinau ali vatavatal hi kite , inoke nuwaliya hi ahe ge hi pegagayawa-agil .
01043034	Totuwalali Yosepa talinau aliya hi habweya Yosepa wana teibol elana hi na hi pek maisena ge maisena elana . Yaa Beniyamina aana hi habwe pwabwata i ola gamagalau nimala panuna aliya ana bwata . Inoke aloliya Yosepa hi anan ge hi imwim ginebi wali yaliyaya .
01044001	Sauga hi anan haba , inoke Yosepa i baek wana limi ana totuwalali wali tohouwa elana i ba , “ Witi nu wage usan bolau ya wali beig gamwaliyaa ana siga ni kalaopop hot , ge wali mani nu teli pasikal maisena ge maisena wana beig awanaa .
01044002	No kom toto silba hi ginoliya nu ahe nu loke ali melumelu wana beig awanaa ginebi ge wana mani toto i pwatanim witi molana . ” Inoke i ginol ola Yosepa wana baaba .
01044003	Mweluluga kekeisi hot totuwalali Yosepa talinau hi patunal hi egon aloliyau ge wali donki .
01044004	Sauga hi nawanawa nigeya ga ali bwaga i gagan panuwa elana , inoke Yosepa i baek wana totuwalali wali tohouwa elana i ba , “ Nu tatauliulil bolau o eliyaa , inoke sauga nu kukuhikagil yaka nu baek elal nu ba , ‘ No tonowak i ginol bubun eliyamiu , inoke hauna kaiwena lahena komiu ku ginol panak elana ?
01044005	Hauna kaiwena no tonowak wana kom silba hi ginoliya ku kaome ? Kom o heiya te i imwimwa ge i papatuwalali sula ana eabab . * Komiu pagan nanakina hot ku ginol . ’ ”
01044006	Yaka wana totuwalali wali tohouwa i tatauliulil eliyaa , inoke sauga i kukuhikagil Yosepa wana baaba o i baunanik elal .
01044007	Anana hi lahe hi ba , “ Tonowak , ga i ola ge baaba ololana o u baunan eliyama ? Ama nige wama pagan i oola te ginol ololana o naha ginol .
01044008	U atena te mani toto valila ha pwawa wama beig awaliyaa , ha ahem wama panuwa Kenani ha pwatanim ge naha pewa pasikal . Inoke ga i ola ge u nuwatu tage ama silba o ebo gold naha kaome wam tonowak wana limiya ?
01044009	Tonowak , ebo kom nu pwawaa ama etega eliyana , he gamagal o ni aliga , yaka gegewema al nu ahema naha tabwa wam totuwalali loloyowanil . ”
01044010	Inoke totuwalali analiya i lahe i ba , “ I waisi , ta ginol ni ola wami baaba . Yaa ebo kom na pwawaa alomiu etega eliyana , he gamagal o iya te ni tabwa no totuwalali loloyowanina . Gegewemiu al nige na wowolemiu na talamwagimiu nuku egon . ”
01044011	Inoke etimwawa wali beig hi kaval palo bilibiliya , yaka maisena ge maisena wana beig i pwela .
01044012	Inoke totuwalali i loya , i telipunaa ali gamaun wana beig elana i na i pwamowasiya ali melumelu wana beig elana . He kom i pwawaa Beniyamina wana beig gamwanaa .
01044013	Talinau kom hi kite , inoke nuwanak kaiwena ali kaliko hi kukuleli . Yaka wali beig hi kaval heyagil wali donki pwataliyaa ge hi sikalek eliyaa hi na panuwaa .
01044014	He Yosepa iyoho ya wana limiya , yaka Yuda alonau ge talinau hi na hi vin eliyana . Inoke ginebi ge wali lovakun hi sogu bilibiliya Yosepa matanaa .
01044015	Inoke Yosepa i baek elal i ba , “ Hauna kaiwena pagan ya ku ginol ? Age nige ku aatena tau ololana nau bosowaiu sula na ab inoke eliyana bugul misusumel na atena ? ”
01044016	Yaka anana Yuda i lahe i ba , “ Tonowak , ga naha ba ola ? He nige bosowaima anam naha lahe ! Ga naha ola ge naha ba pasapu tage nige ha giginol ? He Yabowaine wama gegi iyaka i pamasal . Tonowak , gegewema iyaka ha tabwa wam totuwalali loloyowanil , aloma ge toto kom hi pwawaa wana beig gamwanaa . ”
01044017	Yaa Yosepa i ba , “ Nigeya ! Nige bosowaina na ginol ola eliyamiu ! Tau toto kom hi pwawaa wana beig gamwanaa , iya ya te ni tabwa no totuwalali loloyowanina . He gegewemiu al nuku sikal nuku na tamamiu elana ge bahi nuku nuwanuwatu . ”
01044018	Inoke Yuda i noha Yosepa gegelinaa ge i ba , “ Tonowak , ateu hot owa , nuwau no baaba nu laeganan . Owa tologugui bwabwatana alam i bwata i ola Itipita ana kin , yaa bahi nu huhugaagau .
01044019	Tonowak , wama nem houwan elana u nel eliyama u ba , ‘ Tab tamamiu o ebo talimiu etega al i gan ? ’
01044020	Inoke anam ha lahe ha ba , ‘ Ibwe , tamama iyoho i gan , iyaka i liki . Ge ama melumelu i gan , tamama wana sauga liki elana te hi ab . Talina hot iyaka i yaomal , yaka hinana natunau gamwaliyaa iya maisena ya te sauga ya i mina , inoke tamama i nunuwana-an nabiyan . ’
01044021	“ Tonowak , inoke u baem eliyama u ola , ‘ Nuku ahe ge nuku pwatanim eliyau na kite . ’
01044022	Inoke anam ha lahe ha ba , ‘ Geman o nige bosowaina tamama ni eguluwan . Ebo ni ginol ola , nasi tamama ni yaomal . ’
01044023	Yaa u baem eliyama u ba , ‘ Ebo nige alomiu talimiu nuku nenem , he nige na tatalam nuku tutuk ge nuku kikiteyau . ’
01044024	Sauga ha sikal tamama elana , inoke hauna toto u baunan eliyama ha wasaan eliyana .
01044025	“ Yaka abwe sauga etega al i baem eliyama i ba , ‘ Ku sikal nuku na aanan enuna al nuku pwamola . ’
01044026	Yaa ha baek elana ha ba , ‘ Nige bosowaima naha nok . Ana siga ama melumelu nu talamwan aloma te naha nok . Ebo nige aloma ama melumelu naha nonok , he tologugui nige ni tatalam naha tutuk ge naha kikite . ’
01044027	“ Inoke tamama i baem eliyama i ba , ‘ Ku atena ya te lagou Letiyeli natuwau bolau eluwa ya te i abil .
01044028	Etegana i eguluwagau , yaka nige al sauga etega ya kikite . Yaka ya nuwatu ge ya ba : Bwasumu sosokana iyaka i alatomwatomwa-an !
01044029	Inoke sauga ya nuwamiu toto ya al ge nuku aheya eliyau . Iyaka ya liki , ebo nak etega ni pwawa , nasi nuwanakina ni paaligau . ’
01044030	“ Tonowak , binimala ebo na sikal na na nam elana ge nige geman ya ni kikite , he nasi ni yaomal , kaiwena geman ya ana nuwan i bwata tamama elana , atena ununa te . Tamama iyaka i liki nabi , inoke ebo geman ya nige aloma naha nonok elana , nasi nuwanakina ni paaliga .
01044031	
01044032	Ge bugul etega al , ya bateli nam elana ya ba , ‘ Nau geman na matahikan . Ebo nige na een pasikalim eliyam , he nau ya gegi owa nam eliyam , inoke yawaliu miminana ana woliwoli o ni minem eliyau . ’
01044033	Inoke tonowak , ya awanun eliyam nau geman abana na ahe ge na minaa te na tabwa wam totuwalali loloyowanina . He geman u talamwan alonau talinau nihi sikal .
01044034	Nige bosowaiu na sikal nam elana ebo nige alou geman naha nonok . Bahiwa ! Nige nuwau nak toto ni masal nam eliyana o na kite . ”
01045001	Yaka Yosepa atena i lomwan nabi , inoke nige al bosowaina ni palahikan wana totuwalali mataliyaa . Inoke i baek elal i ba , “ Gegewemiu ku eguluwagau . ” Iya maisena ya alonau ge talinau hi mina , yaka abwe totona i pamasal elal .
01045002	Inoke i kahin anana i bwata nabi . Itipita bolo hi miminaa noleleya wana kahin hi hago , yaka hi na bolo hi miminaa kin wana limiya wali wasa hi pek .
01045003	He Yosepa i baek talinau elal i ba , “ Nau Yosepa . Nam iyoho ya i minamina ? ” Yaa talinau nige bosowailiya anana nihi lahe , kaiwena hi lovakunan .
01045004	Inoke i baek elal i ba , “ Ku nem gegeliwa . ” Sauga talinau hi ginol ola , yaka abwe i ba , “ Nau talimiu Yosepa , valila ku paliagau tolobisnes elal ge hi aheyau te ya nem e Itipita .
01045005	Yaa bahi nuku papanuwanuwatu-agimiu ge totomiu nuku huhugaagimiu kaiwena ku paliagau te ya nem e . He Yabowaine te i patunau ya houwa awomiwa inoke gamagalau na pwamwalil bahi nihi yayaomal .
01045006	Baliman labuina te galebu bwabwatana panuwa i apapanak-an , yaa baliman nimala panuna iyoho i nenem , baliman o gamwaliyaa gamagalau nige eyowa nihi giginol ge enona nihi papahi .
01045007	Yabowaine i patunau ya houwa awomiwa nuwana pwamwal bwabwatana ni ginol kaiwemiu yaka bahi nuku yayaomal , inoke tubutubunimiu ni gan panayawiya .
01045008	Nige tage komiu ku patunau ge ya nem e , yaa Yabowaine te i patunau ya nem . Iya i teleyau ya tabwa kin ana tolabe bwabwatana . Wana panuwa ya matahikan , ge ya tologugui bwabwatana Itipita ana labi gegewena elana .
01045009	“ He etimwawa nuku sikal nuku na nam elana ge nuku ba , ‘ Natum Yosepa i ba ola hiwe : Yabowaine i teleyau panuwa Itipita ana labi gegewena ya logugui-an . Etimwawa nu nem eliyau , bahi nu matamatan .
01045010	Nu minaa gegeliwa labi Gosen eliyana . Alomwau natumwau ge tubumwau nuku minaa o ginebi wami sipi , goti , bulumwakau ge wami bugubugul gegewena .
01045011	Nu minaa Gosen inoke nau na matahikagiwa , kaiwena galebu ana baliman nimala panuna iyoho i nenem . Inoke bahi alomwau am heniheni ge wam bwasumu nuku miminanakina ge nuku gagalebu . ’ ”
01045012	Inoke Yosepa i ba vevehe al talinau elal i ba , “ Alomiu taliu hot Beniyamina iyaka ku kiteyau ge ku atena nau Yosepa te ya baaba eliyamiu e .
01045013	Nuku baek nam elana te nau ya towasawasa panuwa Itipita elana , ge bugul gegewena toto ku kitel nuku wasaan eliyana . Inoke etimwawa nuku ahe ge nuku pwatanim eliyau . ”
01045014	Inoke Yosepa i na alona talina Beniyamina hi holatomwal ge ali toto labui hi kahin .
01045015	Yaka abwe talinau maisena ge maisena i holatomwal , i nalol ge i kahikahin . Toto o enaa , abwe talinau ateliya i matuwa yaka avaliya hi liwaliwan .
01045016	Sauga wasa i vin kin wana limiya te Yosepa talinau hi nem elana , yaka alonau ge wana totuwalali bwabwatal hi yaliyaya .
01045017	Inoke baaba i patuna Yosepa elana i ba , “ Nu baek talimwau elal , ‘ Nuku ginol ni ola hiwe : Witi nuku usan wami donki pwataliyaa , ge nuku sikal nuku na panuwa Kenani .
01045018	Yaka tamamiu alonau ge natumiyau nuku ahel inoke nuku nem te eliyau . Nau abwe labi waiwaisana etega panuwa Itipita elana na pewa eliyamiu , inoke bilibili enona waiwaisana eliyana nuku anana . ’
01045019	“ Ge nu baek talimwau elal , ‘ Waga momomol * enuna nuku aheya Itipita , inoke nuku pwatanik lagomiyau avaliyau ge natumiyau wawayau nuku usanil . Yaka tamamiu al nuku ahe ge alomiu nuku nem .
01045020	Wami bugubugul bolo ebo nuku tataluwagil panuwa Kenani , bahi kaiweliya nuku nuwanuwatu , kaiwena nau abwe panuwa Itipita bugubugulina waiwaisal na pewa eliyamiu . ’ ”
01045021	Inoke Yakobo natunau hi ginol ola to . He Yosepa waga momomol enuna i pek talinau elal i ola kin wana baaba , ge aanan enuna i pek al wali nawanawa kaiwena .
01045022	I ola al kaliko vavaluna i guyau talina maisena ge maisena elana , yaa mani silba tili handeled ge kaliko bosowaina gamagalau ali toto nimala panuna i pek Beniyamina elana .
01045023	Yosepa Itipita bugubugulina waiwaisal enuna i ahe tamana kaiwena , i usanil donki elulutega elal , i ola al witi , beleid ge aanan ona i ahe tamana wana nem kamwasaa kaiwena , i usanil donki yowau elulutega elal , inoke i patunal tamana elana .
01045024	Inoke Yosepa talinau i patunal nihi egon . He wali sauga egon elana i baek elal i ba , “ Bahi loapwaapwanawa kamwasaa . ”
01045025	Inoke Itipita hi eguluwan , hi nawanawa hi na hi vin tamaliya Yakobo elana panuwa Kenani .
01045026	Inoke wana wasa hi pek hi ba , “ Yosepa nige i yayaomal , iya iyoho i tologugui panuwa Itipita ana labi gegewena elana . ” Tamaliya wasa o i hago , yaka atena i you nuwana i gewagewa , nige wali wasa i aabulilek-an .
01045027	Yaa sauga Yosepa wana baaba gegewena elal hi wasaan elana , ge sauga waga momomol i kitel bolo Yosepa i patunal ge ni heya ni na Itipita , yaka abwe wana nuwatu i sapu .
01045028	Inoke i baek elal i ba , “ Oo , age tunahot ! Age natu Yosepa iyoho ya i molu nige i yayaomal . Na nok na na na kite ga mulaa abwe na yaomal .
01046001	Yakobo wana bugubugul gegewena i abubun , yaka abwe alonau ana heniheni ge wana bwasumu gegewel hi telipuna hi nawanawa Itipita kaiwena . Sauga hi na hi vin panuwa Biyaseba , inoke Yakobo bwasumu enuna i powonan tamana Aisake wana Yabowaine elana .
01046002	Bulina pankite etega elana Yabowaine i baaba Yakobo elana i ba , “ Yakobo ! Yakobo ! ” Yakobo i talam i ba , “ Oo , nau iyahe . ”
01046003	Inoke Yabowaine i ba , “ Nau Yabowaine , tamwam wana Yabowaine . Bahi nu lolovakun nok Itipita , kaiwena nau na labewa yaka panuwa o elana tubutubumwau nihi tabwa boda bwabwatana .
01046004	Nau alou owa ta nok Itipita , ge nau abwe tubutubumwau na ahel nihi sikalim te . He Yosepa iya abwe aem ni kin . ”
01046005	Inoke Yakobo panuwa Biyaseba i eguluwan . He natunau Yakobo hi usan waga momomol elana , i ola al lagoliyau ge natuliyau wawayau hi usanil waga momomol elal , bolo Itipita wali kin i patunal ge nihi heya .
01046006	Wali bwasumu ona ge wali bugubugul bolo hi aheliya panuwa Kenani hi bugulagil avaliyau hi nok . Inoke Yakobo alonau ana heniheni gegewel , natunau bolau , natunau yowau , tubunau melubolau ge tubunau meluyowau , hi na Itipita .
01046007	
01046008	He boda Isileli , Yakobo ana heniheni , bolo alonau hi na Itipita alaliya i ola hiwe . Lubeni , iya Yakobo natunau ali gamaun .
01046009	Lubeni natunau bolau alaliya hiwe : Hanok , Palu , Hesiloni ge Kami .
01046010	Simiyon natunau bolau alaliya hiwe : Yemuwel , Yamin , Ohad , Yakin , Sohal ge Saul iya hinana panuwa Kenani yovana .
01046011	Libai natunau bolau alaliya hiwe : Gelison , Kohat ge Melali .
01046012	Yuda natunau bolau alaliya hiwe : El , Onan , Sila , Peles ge Selaa . ( He El alona ge Onan hi yaomalek panuwa Kenani . ) Peles natunau bolau alaliya Hesiloni ge Hamul .
01046013	Isaka natunau bolau alaliya hiwe : Tola , Puwa , Yasub ge Similon .
01046014	Sebuloni natunau bolau alaliya hiwe : Seledi , Elon ge Yalil .
01046015	He Lubeni , Simiyon , Libai , Yuda , Isaka ge Sebuloni heliya Leya natunau , Yakobo lagona etegana . Natunau o i abiliek Mesopotemiya . I ola al Leya natuna meluyovana Daina i ab . Leya natunau ge tubunau bolo o gegewel ali gewi teti tili ( 33 ) .
01046016	Gada natunau bolau alaliya hiwe : Sepon , Hagi , Suni , Esbon , Eli , Alodi , ge Aleli .
01046017	Aseli natunau bolau alaliya hiwe : Imna , Isba , Isbi ge Belaiya . He nuliya alana Seila . Belaiya natunau bolau alaliya Hebel ge Malkiyel .
01046018	Gamagalau o heliya Yakobo alona ge Silpa natuliyau ge tubuliyau , ali gewi sikistin ( 16 ) . He Leiban Silpa i pek natuna Leya elana wana totuwalali yovana .
01046019	Letiyeli , iya Yakobo lagona eluwana , natunau bolau heliya Yosepa ge Beniyamina .
01046020	Itipita elana Yosepa lagona Asinata , iya panuwa Heliyopolis wali topowon Potipela natuna , natunau bolau Manasa ge Ipileimi i abil .
01046021	Beniyamina natunau bolau alaliya hiwe : Bela , Bekel , Asbel , Gela , Naman , Ehi , Losi , Mupim , Hupim , ge Adi .
01046022	Bolau o heliya Yakobo alona ge Letiyeli natuliyau ge tubuliyau , ali gewi potin ( 14 ) .
01046023	Dani natuna tauina alana Husim .
01046024	Napitalai natunau bolau alaliya hiwe : Yasiyel , Guni , Yesa ge Silem .
01046025	Bolau o heliya Yakobo alona ge Bilha natuliyau ge tubuliyau , ali gewi seben . He Leiban Bilha i pek natuna Letiyeli elana wana totuwalali yovana .
01046026	Inoke Yakobo natunau ge tubunau bolo alonau hi na panuwa Itipita ali gewi sikisti sikis ( 66 ) , yaa natunau lagoliyau yowau nige ali gewi hi vavasili toyawel .
01046027	Inoke ebo Yosepa natunau labui bolo i abil Itipita elana ta ahel al , yaka Yakobo ana heniheni bolo hi na Itipita ali gewi sebenti ( 70 ) . *
01046028	He Yakobo Yuda i patuna i houwa i na Yosepa elana , yaka i baek elana aloliya nihi petupatupa-agil labi Gosen . He Yakobo alonau ge ana heniheni iyaka hi na hi vin labi Gosen ,
01046029	inoke Yosepa wana waga momomol i lovivina-an ge i heya i na tamana Yakobo , alana etegana al Isileli , ni kite . Sauga hi petupatupa-agil , inoke Yosepa tamana i holatomwa ge i kahikahin sauga i yapu .
01046030	Yaka Isileli i baek Yosepa elana i ba , “ Sauga ya bosowaiu na aliga , kaiwena iyaka totou matawa ya kitewa ge ya atena owa iyahe nige ga u yayaomal . ”
01046031	Inoke Yosepa i baek talinau ge tamana ana heniheni elal i ba , “ Na nok kin elana ge na ba , ‘ Taliwau aloliyau nam ge ana heniheni hi miminek panuwa Kenani , he heliya iyoho hi nem elau .
01046032	He bolau o heliya sipi ge bulumwakau ali tomatahikan , inoke wali sipi , wali bulumwakau ge wali bugubugul gegewena hi ahel te hi nem e . ’
01046033	Yaka sauga ebo kin ni yoga tukagimiu ge ni nelimiu ni ba , ‘ Hauna wami tuwalali ? ’
01046034	inoke anana nuku lahe nuku ba , ‘ Tonowak ! Ama wam totuwalali bwasumu ali tomatahikan , i telipunaa wama sauga geman ana siga sauga ya , i ola valila tubumeyau hi giginol . ’ Nuku ba ola o , inoke ni talam nuku minaa te labi Gosen elana , ge ami bwaga ni gan Itipita elal , kaiwena heliya nige nuwaliya i oola sipi ali tomatahikan .
01047001	Yaka abwe Yosepa i sikal i na kin elana ge i ba , “ Nam ge taliwau hi neem labi Kenani elana avaliyau wali sipi , wali bulumwakau ge wali bugubugul gegewena , heliya iyoho labi Gosen elana . ”
01047002	Inoke abwe talinau ali toto nimala panuna i ahel ge i en tukagil kin manininaa .
01047003	Yaka kin i nel Yosepa talinau elal i ba , “ Hauna wami tuwalali ? ” Anana hi lahe hi ba , “ Tonowak ! Ama wam totuwalali sipi ali tomatahikan , i ola valila tubumeyau hi giginol .
01047004	Ha nem ge naha minaa ga te panuwa ya elana sauga kekeisi , kaiwena galebu i bwata hot labi Kenani elana , inoke nige wama sipi aliya i gagan . He ha awanun elam ge nu talam ama wam totuwalali naha minaa labi Gosen elana . ”
01047005	Inoke kin i baek Yosepa elana i ba , “ Tamwam ge talimwau iyaka hi nem eliyam ge alomwau nuku mina ,
01047006	inoke Itipita labena gegewena i mwapwela eliyam . Labi waiwaisana hot etega nu hile , yaka tamwam ge talimwau nihi minaa . He nihi minaa labi Gosen . Ebo gamwaliyaa enuna u atenal wali aatena i bwata , inoke nu telel no bulumwakau nihi matahikagil . ”
01047007	Inoke abwe Yosepa i na tamana i en tukan kin manininaa , ge Yakobo kin ana ba awatauwan i baunan elana .
01047008	Yaka kin i nel elana i ba , “ Wam baliman ana bwata ehila ? ”
01047009	Anana Yakobo i lahe i ba , “ No galanawanawa panuwa ge panuwa ona elal yawaliu ana baliman ana bwata wan handeled ge teti ( 130 ) . He no baliman nige hi gegewi ge pulowan hi gewi ya pwawal . Nam alona ge tubu wali galanawanawa panuwa ge panuwa ona elal yawaliliya ana baliman i bwata , yaa nau yawaliu ana baliman nige i bwabwata . ”
01047010	Inoke kin ana ba awatauwan i baunan al elana ge i eguluwan .
01047011	Inoke Yosepa labi waiwaisana hot etega i hile Itipita gamwanaa panuwa Lamesese ana labiya , Gosen gamwanaa , yaka i pek tamana ge talinau elal ge hi minaa , i ola kin wana baaba .
01047012	He Yosepa tamana , talinau ge tamana ana heniheni gegewel aanan i pekpek elal , i golugoluwa natuliyau ali gewi elana .
01047013	Galebu iyaka i bwata nabi yaka nige al aanan i gagan labi gegewena elana , inoke panuwa Itipita ge Kenani galebu kaiwena hi wesal .
01047014	Gamagalau hi nemnem witi hi pwapwamola , inoke eliyana Yosepa Itipita ge Kenani wali mani gegewena i ahe , yaka i bugulan ge i na i pwahin kin wana gogomwau ana abateliya .
01047015	Sauga Itipita ge Kenani wali mani gegewena iyaka hi palian haba , inoke Itipita gegewel hi na Yosepa elana ge hi ba , “ Wama mani gegewena iyaka ha pwamowasi . He aanan u guyauan eliyama ge naha an ! Bahi naha aaligaa matamwa ! ”
01047016	Yaka analiya Yosepa i lahe i ba , “ Ebo wami mani gegewena iyaka ku pwamowasi , he wami bwasumu nuku pwatanim eliyau , yaka molana aanan na pewa . ”
01047017	Inoke wali bwasumu hosi , sipi ge goti , bulumwakau ge donki hi pwatanik Yosepa elana , yaka molana aanan i guyauan elal . He baliman o Yosepa i ginol ola to , yaka wali bwasumu gegewel hi pek elana aanan molana .
01047018	Yaka baliman etega al ana abatelipuna elana gamagalau hi na Yosepa elana ge hi ba , “ Tonowak , nige bosowaina ama pulowan naha sume eliyam . Wama mani gegewena iyaka ha pwamowasi , ge wama bwasumu iyaka ha paliagil eliyam . Nige bugul etega i gagan eliyama tage naha pewa ge molana aanan nu pem , toto i minaa elama iyai te ama ge wama bilibili .
01047019	Bahi naha aaligaa matamwa ge wama bilibili ni mimibwagabwaga ! He aloma ge wama bilibili naha paliagima eliyam , yaka molana aanan nu pem . Inoke ama naha tabwa kin wana totuwalali loloyowanil ge wama bilibili ni minek eliyana . He witi nu pem eliyama , yaka eliyana naha anana ge bahi naha aaliga . Ge pwatum nu pem naha luwan , yaka wama bilibili bahi ni tatabwa bilibili bwagabwaga . ”
01047020	He galebu iyaka i bwata hot yaka Itipita gegewel wali bilibili hi paliagil Yosepa elana . Inoke Itipita bibilena gegewena i pwamola i tabwa kin wana bilibili .
01047021	Yaka Itipita ana labi gegewena gamagaliliyau hi tabwa kin wana totuwalali loloyowanil .
01047022	Yaa Itipita wali yabowaineyau ali topowon wali bilibili Yosepa nige i pwapwamola . Heliya nige wali bilibili hi papalian , kaiwena kin aanan i pekpek elal ge eliyana hi anana .
01047023	Yaka Yosepa i baek gamagalau elal i ba , “ He lan ebe alomiu wami bilibili iyaka ya pwamolamiu kin kaiwena . He aanan vivena hiwe , ku ahe ge nuku na nuku luwan wami eyowaa .
01047024	Sauga ebo aanan ni matuwa ge nuku pahi , yaka pwahin nimala panuna nuku ginolil , ge maisena nuku pek kin kaiwena . Yaka pwahin esopali nuku kukuhikan , enuna wami vivi kaiwena , ge enuna aamiu , alomiyau natumiyau ge wami limi ana heniheni . ”
01047025	Inoke gamagalau hi baek Yosepa elana hi ba , “ Tonowak , owa u ginol bubun eliyama ge yawalima u pwamwal , he ha talam naha tabwa kin wana totuwalali loloyowanil . ”
01047026	Inoke Yosepa logugui etega i ginol Itipita kaiweliya . Ebo wali eyowa enona ni matuwa ge nihi pahi , yaka pwahin nimala panuna nihi ginolil ge maisena nihi pek kin elana . He logugui o iyoho i gangan sauga ya elana . Iyai te topowon wali bilibili nige kin i aahe , inoke nige enona enuna hi pepek kin elana .
01047027	Boda Isileli hi minaa labi Gosen elana panuwa Itipita , ge hi gogomwau hot . Inoke hi talaabab ge hi gewi nabi .
01047028	He Yakobo i minaa panuwa Itipita elana baliman ana gewi sebentin ( 17 ) , inoke yawalina ana baliman ana bwata wan handeled ge poti seben ( 147 ) .
01047029	Sauga amnana i anbose wana yaomal ana sauga iyaka i kelakelaubwa , inoke natuna Yosepa ana baaba i patuna ge i nem elana . Inoke i baek elana i ba , “ Ebo u nunuwana-agau nabiyan , yaka nimwam u teliya nagiliu gabulanaa , * inoke nu bateli te nu awatauwagau ge nu ginol ni ola no baaba . He bahi tuwau nu teteliya Itipita .
01047030	Yaa sauga na yaomal , yaka tuwau nu kalivai egonan Itipita elana ge nu na nu teliya nam ge tubu wali salaiya . Anana Yosepa i lahe i ba , “ Na ginol ola toto u baunan eliyau . ”
01047031	Inoke i baek Yosepa elana i ba , “ Nu papasila eliyau te nasi nu ginol ola o . ” Inoke Yosepa i papasila . Yaka abwe Isileli wana suki i ahe ge i gena palalek suki kokowanaa , yaka i tapwalolo Yehoba elana .
01048001	Sauga etegana al , abwe Yosepa wana wasa hi pek hi ba , “ Tamwam i kasiyebwa . ” Inoke natunau bolau eluwa Manasa ge Ipileimi i ahel ge alonau nihi na tamana nihi kite .
01048002	Sauga hi na hi vin , yaka gamagal etega Yakobo wana wasa i pek i ba , “ Natum Yosepa iyahe i vin nuwana ni kitewa . ” Inoke Yakobo , alana etegana al Isileli , i logasisi ge i lut i misiyo wana abakenu pwatanaa .
01048003	Inoke i baek Yosepa elana i ba , “ Yabowaine Togasisi Hot i masal eliyau panuwa Lus elana labi Kenani , ge i ba muloluagau
01048004	i ba , ‘ Nau abwe natumwau nihi gewi na pewa ge tubutubumwau nihi tabwa boda bwabwatana ali un tomaha tomaha , ge bilibili ya na pek eliyalil ni mihot . ’ ”
01048005	Yaka i ba vevehe al i ba , “ Natumwau bolau labui Ipileimi ge Manasa lagom i abil panuwa Itipita elana ge mulaa abwe ya nem , heliya nihi tabwa natuwau hot , ni ola natuwau Lubeni ge Simiyon .
01048006	Yaa ebo wawayau enuna mulaa abwe lagom ni abil , heliya natumwau , wali bilibili ni noem Ipileimi ge Manasa alaliya bibilena elana .
01048007	Ya ginol ola o , kaiwena hinam Letiyeli natunau labui ya ge i yaomal . Sauga labi Mesopoteimiya ha eguluwan ge ha nawanawa , inoke i yaomala kamwasaa labi Kenani elana , nige ana bwaga i yayapu awan Epalat elana . Inoke alou no nuwanak tuwana ya teliya Epalat ana kamwasa bebenaa . ” ( Epalat , he Bedeliyema alana houhouwena . )
01048008	Sauga Isileli Yosepa natunau bolau eluwa i kitel , inoke i nel i ba , “ Henalau ya ? ”
01048009	Yaka Yosepa i ba , “ Natuwau te . No minamina panuwa Itipita elana Yabowaine i pem . ” Inoke Isileli i ba , “ U ahel nihi nem eliyau ge na ba muloluagil . ”
01048010	He Isileli matana i pweyata nige bosowaina bugul ni kite bubun , kaiwena iyaka i liki nabi . Inoke Yosepa natunau i ahel ge i na i telel tamana gegelinaa , yaka Isileli i holatomwal ge i nalol .
01048011	Yaka i baek Yosepa elana i ba , “ Valila ya nuwatu tage nige al na kikitewa , yaa Yabowaine i talamwagau inoke sauga ya alomwau ge natumwau ya kitemiu . ”
01048012	Yaka Yosepa natunau i ahel Isileli aenaa ge i kululu maninina i pahanalowanek bilibiliya .
01048013	Inoke abwe natunau labui i pihikagil , Ipileimi i minaa nimana labena awonaa , Isileli nimana labena gegebana i awoni , ge Manasa i minaa Yosepa nimana labena gegebanaa , Isileli nimana labena awona i awoni . Yaka abwe i pwatanik i na i teleliya Isileli gegelinaa .
01048014	Yaa Isileli nimana i teli pil , awona i teliya toto kekeisi Ipileimi kokowanaa , ge gegebana i teliya gamaun Manasa kokowanaa .
01048015	Inoke Isileli Yosepa * i ba muloluan i ba : Yabowaine toto tubu Abalahama ge nam Aisake hi mipalalek elana , Yabowaine toto yawaliu ana sauga bwalibwaligena i matahikagau i ola sipi ali tomatahikan ,
01048016	Yabowaine toto i ola anelose i pwamwalau nak gegewena elana iya gemanau ya ni muloluagil . Ya awanun nau alau , tubu Abalahama alana , ge nam Aisake alana nihi mihot eliyalil , ge natuliyau nihi gewi nihi talaabab inoke tubuliyau nihi debalala panayawiya .
01048017	He mulaa abwe Isileli gemanau i ba muloluagil , Yosepa i kite tamana nimana labena awonaa i teliek Ipileimi kokowanaa , yaka nige i yayaliyaya-an . Inoke tamana nimana i pihikan tage ni ahek yoho Ipileimi kokowanaa ge ni teliek Manasa kokowanaa .
01048018	Yaka i baek elana i ba , “ Nam , bahiwa ! Manasa iya te gamaun . Nimwam awom nu teliek kokowanaa . ”
01048019	Yaa tamana nige wana nuwatu i oola , inoke i baek Yosepa elana i ba , “ Natu , ya atena ya te hauna ya giginol . Manasa iya al ge alana ni bwata ge tubutubunau nihi tabwa boda etega . Yaa talina kekeisena iya te alana ni bwata hot ge tubutubunau nihi tabwa boda bwabwatana hot . ”
01048020	Inoke lan o i ba muloluagil i ba , “ Sauga ebo boda Isileli ba mulolu nihi baunan , alamiu nihi lumen nihi ba , ‘ Ha awanun Yabowaine ni muloluagimiu ni ola Ipileimi ge Manasa . ’ ” Inoke Ipileimi alana i teli houwan ge Manasa alana i teli mulaa .
01048021	Yaka Isileli i baek Yosepa elana i ba , “ Sauga kekeisi na yaomal , yaa Yabowaine ni minaa eliyamiu ge ni ahemiu nuku sikal nuku na tubumiyau wali labiya .
01048022	He labi Sekemi bibilena malumalulina ya pewa eliyam , nige ya pepek talimwau elal . No elohaveyan kilepana alona ge no egipoyo elal ya lohaveyani , inoke bilibili o ya aheya boda Amoli elal .
01049001	Inoke Yakobo natunau bolau i yoga gogonil ge i baek elal i ba , “ Ku mipahipahi gegeliwa , ge na baewa eliyamiu hauna gun abwe nihi gan eliyamiu sauga i nenem elana . *
01049002	Nau Yakobo natuwau , ku nem ku migogo gegeliwa , nau tamamiu Isileli no baaba nuku laeganan .
01049003	Lubeni , owa natu o gamaun , no gasisi saugena enowana houwan , alam i miha ge u gasisi hot , talimwau gegewel u lakel .
01049004	Yaa wam ginol i ola banata nige bosowaina ta pal , inoke nige al talimwau nu bwabwata lakel , kaiwena u na no abakenuwa yaka alom ge lagou etega ku kenu , u ganawali , yaka u papuluwawi-agau .
01049005	Simiyon ge Libai , alom ge talim ku olaolaek ya , wami elohaveyan kilepana ku patuwalaliek nak ana ginol elana .
01049006	Ginebi wami huga gamagalau ku gulil , * ge totomiu wami nuwatu elana bulumwakau aeliya ana tubwi ku goapwalil . * Toto o kaiwena nige na tutuk wami boda elana , ge nige na tutubwi wami pwahin elana .
01049007	Yehoba ni apapanak-agimiu , kaiwena wami huga i gasisi ge wami ginol likalika i bwata . He tubutubunimiu na walel nihi miwaliwali Isileli ana labi ona elal ge nihi minaa ana un tomaha tomaha gamwaliyaa .
01049008	Yuda , talimwau nihi tobalagiwa , tamwam natunau nihi kululu elam , kaiwena am topihigelgel mwamwaliliya nu piatati ge nu pakokovel .
01049009	Yuda , owa nu ola laiyoni hevalina , nu gasisi ge nu tologugui . Natu , nu ola laiyoni ana mwa i alapaaliga i an yaka i sikal abanaa , inoke i lomisiyo lau ge i talkenu . He henala ni palut ? Nige etega !
01049010	Kin wali suki ni miminaa ya Yuda nimwamwa , ge sauga gegewena tubutubumwau nihi tologugui , ana siga gamagal toto iya wana bugul hot ni nem ni ahe , iya boda gegewel awana nihi ab .
01049011	Wam donki nu gimwana oine nuwana elana , ge wam donki natuna nu am hikana oine sisiuina waiwaisana elana . Am kama oine suina elana nu ul , ge am holahola yayapona oine ununa elana nu ul . *
01049012	Am oine ni bwata yaka matam ni paket , am hul suina ni balu yaka ninim ni pawawakeki .
01049013	Sebuloni , owa nu minaa hoga bebenaa , yaka wam galowa waga wali abaveyaho waiwaisana . Wam bilibili ni na ana siga labi Saidoni elana .
01049014	Isaka , owa nu ola donki gasigasisena , yaa yayaluwana i pweyata alona ge ana kaval i kenukenu .
01049015	Abamina waiwaisana ge panuwa ana awa waiwaisana nu kite nu minaa , yaa abwe boda getoga nihi paloloyowan-agiwa ge kaval pupulowanina nihi pahe vevelamwa .
01049016	Dani , owa wam gamagalau nu logugui-agil , ni ola Isileli ali un maisena ge maisena hi logugui-agil .
01049017	Dani , haveyan elana nu siba nu ola mwata kamwasa elana , nu ola weso kela bebenaa , toto sauga hosi etega ni nem , yaka aena ena ni tal , inoke toto i heya pwatanaa ni soguek enaa .
01049018	O Yehoba , ya matamatan kaiwem ge nu pwamwalau .
01049019	Gada , * tolohaveyan kaluoyaoya kaiwena nihi tuk nihi haveyan elam , yaa owa nu haveyan elal ge nu takel .
01049020	Aseli , wam bilibili enowana ni waisi , aanan amnana poposana toto kin nunuwaliya ni neem eliyam .
01049021	Napitalai , owa nu ola bwasumu diya * toto i patalelu nemnowa , ge natunau i abil ali awa waiwaisal .
01049022	Yosepa , owa nu ola oine enoenonina , puna i siuna wewel kenken bebenaa ge i enon nabi , lalana gana hi lema likaan .
01049023	Gamagalau ginebi wali ati elolol nihi haveyan elam , ge aloliya wali pihigelgel wali egipoyo nihi alihinewa elam .
01049024	Yaa nimwam ni mweyaha ge ni gasisi , wam egipoyo nu alihin pwamwaun , kaiwena Yakobo wana Yabowaine Gasigasisena nimana elana ni labewa , iya alana al Sipi ali Tomatahikan ge Isileli ali Libu .
01049025	Tamwam wana Yabowaine ni labewa , Yabowaine Togasisi Hot ni muloluagiwa . Ni muloluagiwa ni ba kehe ni loem labulabumwa , ni muloluagiwa wewel ni patub heyan bilibiliya , ni muloluagiwa wam bwasumu ge tubutubumwau nihi gewi .
01049026	Nau tamwam no ba mulolu i bwata hot , mulolu toto nu pwawa oya mihahaina ni heluwan , waisi toto nu pwawa oya mihomihotil ni lakel . Mulolu gegewena o nihi minaa owa Yosepa eliyam , owa u getoga talimwau gegewel elal , alam i bwata hot .
01049027	Beniyamina , owa nu ola wanuka bekikina toto iyauka i sibaan , mweluluga elana ana mwa ni alapaaliga ni an , ge kokoyavi elana bugul bolo i kaluoel ni guyauan ana boda elal . ”
01049028	He bolau gegewel o heliya Isileli ali un elulutega eluwa . Ali ba mulolu tamaliya i vavaen eliyalil i ola to , i golugoluwa maisena ge maisena ana ba mulolu toto iya i bosowaina .
01049029	Yakobo natunau i ba muloluagil i mowasi , inoke i ba pagasisel i ba , “ Sauga kekeisi na aliga ge na na tubuwau bolo hi aliga houwan elal . Tuwau nuku ahe nuku na labi Kenani ge nuku teliya tubuwau ali salaiya , pat golina elana Epiloni Hiti gamagalina wana bilibiliya .
01049030	He pat golina o i minaa Makpela elana panuwa Mamele gegelinaa labi Kenani . Valila gol o alona ge bilibili Abalahama i pwamolaa Epiloni Hiti gamagalina elana wana salai .
01049031	Gol o elana te Abalahama alona lagona Sela , ge Aisake alona lagona Lebeka hi teleliya . Inoke nau al Leya ya teliya to .
01049032	He bilibili o alona ge pat golina , Abalahama i pwamolaa boda Hiti elal . ”
01049033	Sauga Yakobo ba pagasisi i baunan haba natunau elal , inoke aena i teli heyan wana abakenuwa ge i tal kenu , yaka wana yana i yana yoho ge i aliga , i na tubunau bolo hi aliga houwan elal .
01050001	Yosepa i kite tamana yawalina iyaka i mowasi , inoke i talpo pwatanaa , yaka maninina i nalo ge i kahikahin .
01050002	Inoke abwe i ba doketa bolo hi tuwalali elana tamana Isileli tuwana nihi abubun , yaka sawasawal ona nihi telek ge bahi ni bwebweyan . Inoke hi ginol ola to .
01050003	He lan ana gewi poti tuwana hi abubun ge sawasawal ona hi telek , kaiwena toyaomal tuwana ana abwabubun ana lan ana gewi i ola to . Ge Itipita Yakobo baena hi nuwanak lan ana gewi sebenti ( 70 ) .
01050004	Wali nuwanak ana sauga i mowasi , yaka abwe Yosepa i baek kin wana totuwalali bwabwatal elal i ba , “ Ebo ku yaliyaya-agau , yaka nuku na kin elana ge no baaba nuku baunan nuku ba ,
01050005	‘ Valila nam wana yaomal ana sauga i kelakelaubwa , inoke i ba ya papasila eliyana te ebo ni yaomal , yaka tuwana na ahe ge na na na teliya aban toto i lovivina-an labi Kenani elana . He u talamwagau na na nam tuwana na teli , yaka abwe na sikalim . ’ ”
01050006	Inoke Yosepa wana baaba ana lahena kin i patuna pasikal i ba , “ Tamwam tuwana nu ahe ge nu na nu teli , ni ola wam bateli elana . ”
01050007	Yaka Yosepa alonau kin wana totuwalali bwabwatal gegewel — tonowakau bolo hi tuwalaliya kin wana limiya , ge Itipita ana tonowakau gegewel — hi na tamana tuwana nihi teli .
01050008	I ola al Yosepa wana limi ana heniheni gegewel , ge talinau avaliyau tamana wana limi ana heniheni alonau hi nok . He natuliyau ya te avaliyau bwasumu sipi , goti ge bulumwakau hi eguluwagil labi Gosen elana .
01050009	Bolo hi heya waga momomol elana ge bolo hi heya hosi pwataliyaa avaliyau hi nok . He boda bwabwatana hot te hi nowanik teliteli kaiwena .
01050010	Sauga hi na hi vin panuwa Atad wali witi musana ana abaasiasi elana wewel Yolidani labenaa , inoke toyaomal baena hi kahin lopili analiya i bwata hot . Yaka Yosepa nuwanak ana pagan i ginol tamana kaiwena lan ana gewi seben .
01050011	He Kenani towohiliyau bolo hi miminaa o , sauga hi kite boda hi lolokahin lopili panuwa Atad elana , inoke hi ba , “ Itipita nuwanak ana kahikahin hi kahikahini . ” Yaka panuwa o alana hi tun Ebel Mislaim . *
01050012	Yaka Yakobo natunau bolau hi ginol ola valila tamaliya wana ba pagasisi elal .
01050013	Tamaliya tuwana hi kalivai hi na labi Kenani elana , ge hi teliya pat golina toto i minaa Makpela elana panuwa Mamele gegelinaa . Pat golina toto o alona ge bilibili , valila Abalahama i pwamolaa Epiloni Hiti gamagalina elana wana salai .
01050014	Yosepa tamana tuwana hi teli salaiya i mowasi , inoke alonau talinau ge bolo hi nowanik teliteli kaiwena gegewel hi sikal hi na Itipita .
01050015	Yosepa talinau hi kite te tamaliya iyaka i yaomal , inoke hi ba , “ Bi ola ge Yosepa iyoho ya i hugahuga kaiwela , ge nuwana nak gegewena toto valila ta ginol elana ni ginol lahe elala ? ”
01050016	Inoke baaba hi patuna elana hi ba , “ Valila tamala mulaa abwe i yaomal i baem eliyama i ola hiwe .
01050017	‘ Nuku baek Yosepa elana nuku ola : Ya awanun talimwau wali gegi ge nak toto valila hi ginol eliyam nu nuwayoho . ’ Inoke ama tamwam wana Yabowaine wana totuwalali , ha awanun elam wama gegi nu nuwayoho . ” Sauga Yosepa baaba o i hago , inoke nuwana i nak ge i kahin .
01050018	Yaka abwe talinau hi nok elana ge hi kululu manininaa ge hi ba , “ Ama wam totuwalali loloyowanil . ”
