01050019	Yaa Yosepa i baek elal i ba , “ Bahi nuku lolovakun ! Nau nige Yabowaine i oola ge tage na payatala-agimiu .
01050020	Valila komiu nuwamiu nuku apanakau , yaa Yabowaine i pil waisi i ginoliya , yaka gamagalau hi gewi i pwamwalil ge nige hi yayaomal , i ola te ta kite lan ebe .
01050021	Bahi nuku lolovakun ! Nau abwe alomiyau ge natumiyau na matahikagimiu . ” Inoke baaba meimeina elana i baaba talinau elal ge ateliya i ba pamatuwa .
01050022	Yosepa i miminaa panuwa Itipita elana alonau ge tamana ana heniheni gegewel . He wana baliman ana bwata wan handeled ge ten ( 110 ) i pwawa .
01050023	Yaka wana minamina o elana natuna Ipileimi natunau , natuliyau , ge natuliyau , ha eton o , i kitel ga . I ola al , sauga Manasa natuna Makil , natunau hi abil , yaka hi telel Yosepa aenaa , * kaiwena iya tubutubunau .
01050024	Inoke i baek talinau elal i ba , “ Sauga kekeisi na yaomal , yaa tunahot Yabowaine ni matahikagimiu ge ni ahemiu nuku tagil labi ya elana nuku na nuku minaa labi toto wana bateli i papasila-an ni pek Abalahama , Aisake ge Yakobo elal . ”
01050025	Inoke i baek talinau elal i ba , “ Tunahot Yabowaine ni matahikagimiu ge ni ahemiu nuku na labi o elana , inoke nuku papasila te sauga o elana tutuwau al nuku kalivai . ”
01050026	Yosepa wana baliman wan handeled ge ten ( 110 ) i pwawa , inoke i yaomala Itipita elana . Yaka tuwana hi abubun ge sawasawal ona hi teli , inoke hi usan kesi pat hi ginoliya gamwanaa .
02001001	Yakobo natunau bolau bolo alonau hi nok hi na Itipita avaliyau ge natuliyau alaliya i ola hiwe :
02001002	Lubeni , Simiyon , Libai , Yuda ,
02001003	Isaka , Sebuloni , Beniyamina ,
02001004	Dani , Napitalai , Gada ge Aseli .
02001005	Bolo ya Yakobo natunau ge tubunau ali gewi sebenti . He natuna Yosepa iyoho Itipita .
02001006	Hi minamina ee , yaka abwe Yosepa ge talinau , heliya ha bolo o , hi yaomal haba .
02001007	Yaa tubuliyau Isileli hi talaabab yaka hi gewi nabi , inoke Itipita hi pakalaopop .
02001008	Yaka abwe kin vavaluna etega hauna Yosepa i ginol Itipita wasana nige i aatena i milil ge i tologugui Itipita .
02001009	I baek wana gamagalau eliyalil i ba , “ Isileli iyaka hi gewi nabi , he kila wala abanak etega to .
02001010	Binimala ebo tolohaveyan enuna nihi vin , nasi Isileli nihi na avaliyau nihi boda pamaisena ge nihi haveyan elala , inoke wala panuwa nihi louluwan . He nuwatu etega ta ginol ge bahi nihi gegewi al . ”
02001011	Inoke Itipita Isileli hi paloloyowan-agil . Ali tomatahikan hi telel tuwalali gasigasisena hi pek tage yawaliliya nihi apanak . Yaka Isileli taun bwabwatal Pitom ge Lamesese hi talil , kin wana bugul ana abapwahipwahin .
02001012	Yaa sauga Itipita Isileli yawaliliya hi apapanak-an , yaka heliya ali gewi i heheya ge wali awan hi pwabwaya al . Yaka Itipita hi lovakun Isileli eliyalil ,
02001013	inoke hi ba tuwalali pupulowanina hi ginol ge i papanuwaleyan-agil . Hi patuwalali-agil limi hi taltal ge eyowa hi awaawaginol , nige hi nunuwanak-agil .
02001014	
02001015	Yaka Itipita wali kin i liwaliwan yowau labui , Sipila ge Puwa elal , heliya Hibilu * yowauiliyau ali topapaab .
02001016	I ba , “ Sauga Hibilu yowauiliyau nuku label ab elana , ebo nihi ab melutau , yaka nuku pipaaliga . Yaa ebo meluyova , he nuku pwamolu . ”
02001017	Yaa topapaab hi lovakun Yabowaine elana , inoke nige hi giginol ola kin wana baaba yaka nige melubolau hi pipipaaligal .
02001018	Inoke kin i ba topapaab hi nem elana ge i nelil i ba , “ Hauna kaiwena ku ginol ola o ? Hauna kaiwena bolau ku pwamolol ? ”
02001019	Anana hi lahe hi ola , “ Hibilu yowauiliyau nige hi oola Itipita yowauiliyau . Heliya hi gasisi ge wali abab i mweyaha , inoke hi ab ga mulaa abwe ama ha vin . ”
02001020	Yabowaine yowau labui i label totoliya natuliyau i pek elal , kaiwena hi lovakunan . Yaka Isileli ali gewi i haha al , ge hi gewi nabi hot .
02001021	
02001022	Yaka abwe kin logugui i ginol ge i baek wana gamagalau gegewel elal i ba , “ Hibilu wawayaliyau memelol bolo melutauil nuku aliyohil wewel Naile elana nihi unun , yaa bolo meluyowau nuku pwamolol . ”
02002001	Saugena o elana tau etega ana un Libai alona yova etega ali un maisena hi alolon ,
02002002	yaka yova i liyan ge i ab natuliya melutauina . I kite wawaya waiwaisana hot inoke i sume ana siga waikena eton .
02002003	Yaa sauga nige al bosowaina ni sume , yaka mwawin etega i ola kaliyou , alana papilas , i ahe egowa i ginoliya , ge i ebali . Yaka wawaya i loke ge i paota mwawin yayapona gamwaliyaa wewel Naile bebenaa .
02002004	Wawaya nuna i talmilil laha ge i gagayawa hauna ni masal elana .
02002005	Yaka kin natuna meluyovana i na i lau wewela i highig , ge wana totuwalali galokau hi nononawanawa wewel bebenaa . Yaka egowa i kite mwawin yayapona gamwaliyaa , inoke totuwalali loloyowanina meluyovana etega i patuna i na i ahe .
02002006	Kin natuna egowa i pwela yaka wawaya melutauina i kite i kahikahin , inoke nuwana i nakan ge i ba , “ Hibilu wawayana etega te . ”
02002007	Yaka nuna i na kin natuna elana ge i neli i ba , “ Tab na nok Hibilu yovana etega na ba ni nem wawaya ni ahe ni matahikan ge ni papaalahul kaiwem ? ”
02002008	Inoke i talam i ba , “ Ee , u nok . ” Inoke galok o i na wawaya hinana hot i en pwatanim .
02002009	Yaka kin natuna i ba , “ Wawaya ya u ahe nu papaalahul kaiweu , yaka abwe na pwamolawa . ” Inoke wawaya i ahe i matahikan ge i papaalahul .
02002010	Sauga wawaya iyaka i bwaya , inoke i pwatanik kin natuna elana , iya i ahe natuna . Inoke i ba , “ Ya pagaiheyanem wewela , ” inoke alana i tun Mosese . *
02002011	Mosese iyaka i tau matuwa , inoke lan etega i na i tagil wana pan Hibilu i kenanagil ge i kite tuwalali pupulowanina hi awaawaginol . Yaka i kite Itipita etega Mosese wana pan Hibilu etega i nibinibihan .
02002012	Mosese matana i lipwapwati nige gamagal etega i kikite , inoke Itipita gamagalina i lol ge tuwana i sume bilibiliya .
02002013	Lan i gan inoke i tagil al , yaka Hibilu bolauiliyau eluwa i kitel hi lohalohaveyan . Inoke i baek tau toto i gegi elana i ola , “ Hauna kaiwena ge wam pan Hibilu u lololi ? ”
02002014	Anana tau i lahe i ba , “ Owa nige ama wama tologugui ge wama toyatala i oola . Age nasi nu lolau ni ola nolu Itipita gamagalina u lol ? ” Yaka Mosese i lovakun , kaiwena i nuwatu i ba , “ Gamagalau iyaka hi atena hauna ya ginol . ”
02002015	Sauga Mosese wana ginol wasana kin i hago , inoke kamwasa i loya ge Mosese ni lol . Yaa i lou i na panuwa Midiyani ge i misiyowa wewel kenken etega bebenaa .
02002016	He Midiyani wali tapwalolo ana tohouwa etega natunau meluyowau ali gewi seben . Hi nem wewel hi wagiwagi ha tamaliya wana sipi ge wana goti wali abaimwim hi papakalaopop ge nihi paimwil .
02002017	Yaa sipi tomatahikan enuna hi nem yowau hi takel . Inoke Mosese i na i label bolau o i palil , yaka wewel i wage yowau wali bwasumu i paimwil .
02002018	Sauga yowau hi sikal tamaliya Luwel * elana , inoke i nelil i ba , “ Hauna kaiwena ge lan ebe etimwawa ku sikal ? ”
02002019	Anana hi lahe hi ba , “ Sauga sipi tomatahikan hi takema , inoke Itipita gamagalina etega i labema ge i palil , yaka wewel i wage kaiwema ge wala bwasumu i paimwil . ”
02002020	Yaka i nel natunau elal i ba , “ He iya ga ? Ga i ola ge ku tataluwai ? Ku nok ku ba ni nem avala ta anan . ”
02002021	Inoke Mosese i talam ge i na wali limiya , yaka abwe i miminaa to . He Luwel natuna etega alana Sipola i pek Mosese elana alona hi alolon .
02002022	Yaka natuliya melutauina i ab . Mosese i ba , “ Ya mibwabwali panuwa ya elana , ” inoke wawaya alana i tun Gesomi . *
02002023	Baliman hi gewi i mowasi abwe Itipita wali kin i yaomal , yaa Isileli heliya iyoho hi yowalu wali miloloyowan elana , inoke hi kahin awaawanun labe kaiwena . Wali kahin i ha Yabowaine elana ,
02002024	ge wali yowalu i hago , inoke wana bateli Abalahama , Aisake ge Yakobo elal i nuwahikan .
02002025	He Isileli wali lomwan i kite , inoke atena i lomwanagil .
02003001	Mosese yawana Yetilo , Midiyani wali tapwalolo ana tohouwa etega , wana sipi ge goti i matahikagil , yaka lan etega i nulil hi noek ula kekevana gamwanaa hi na hi vin Sainai oya bwabwalena .
02003002	Yaka Yehoba wana anelose i masal elana ana awa i ola ginaha memena i tautau ebwakil lamwanaa . Mosese i kite ginaha i tautau , yaa ebwakil nige i kakalas .
02003003	Inoke i ba , “ Abanuwa ahi hot ! Hauna kaiwena ebwakil nige i kakalas ? Na na ga na kenani . ”
02003004	Yehoba i kite Mosese i na i kenakenan , inoke i yogem ebwakil elana i ba , “ Mosese ! Mosese ! ” Yaka Mosese i talam i ola , “ Oo , nau iyahe . ”
02003005	Yabowaine i ba , “ Bahi nu nenem ebwakil labenaa . Aem ana os u leke kaiwena bilibili toto u talmilila i bwabwalena .
02003006	Nau tubumwau Abalahama , Aisake ge Yakobo wali Yabowaine . ” Inoke Mosese maninina i teli kaus , kaiwena i lovakun bahi Yabowaine ni kikite .
02003007	Yaka Yehoba i ba , “ Ya kite Itipita no gamagal hi paloloyowan-agil , ge wali kahin ya hago nuwaliya na pwamwalil ali tomatahikan elal . Ya nuwanuwatu wali lomwan kaiwena ,
02003008	inoke ya lau na pwamwalil Itipita nimaliyaa , ge na nulil tagilagil nihi nok panuwa waiwaisana ge bwabwatana elana , panuwa malumalulina . Sauga ya Kenani , Hiti , Amoli , Pelisi , Hivi ge Yebusi hi miminaa to .
02003009	No gamagal wali kahin iyaka ya hago , ge ya kite Itipita hi paloloyowan-agil .
02003010	He nu nok , ya papatunawa nu na Itipita wali kin elana ge no gamagal nu nulil tagilagil wana panuwaa . ”
02003011	Yaa Mosese i baek Yabowaine elana i ba , “ Nau gamagal bwagabwaga ya ! Ga i ola ge na na kin elana ge Isileli na nulil tagilagil Itipita ? ”
02003012	Anana Yabowaine i lahe i ba , “ Nau alom . He sauga gamagalau nu nulil tagilagil Itipita abwe nuku kululuwa elau oya ya elana , inoke nu atena tunahot nau ya patunawa . ”
02003013	Yaka Mosese i ba , “ Sauga ebo na nok Isileli elal ge na ba , ‘ Tubulau wali Yabowaine i patunau eliyamiu ’ ge ebo nihi nel elau nihi ba ‘ Alanaek ? ’ he ga na ba ola elal ? ”
02003014	Anana Yabowaine i lahe i ba , “ Nau heiya te nau , nau iyoho ya gangan . Inoke nu ba Isileli elal , ‘ Toto alana Nau Heiya te Nau , * iya i patunau eliyamiu . ’
02003015	Nu ba Isileli elal , ‘ Yehoba , tubulau wali Yabowaine , Abalahama , Aisake ge Yakobo wali Yabowaine , i patunau eliyamiu . ’ He alau ya ni mihot ; heyan ge heyan alau nihi lumelumeni ni ola to .
02003016	Nu na Isileli wali tonowakau nu pamigogoil , inoke nu baek eliyalil nu ba , ‘ Yehoba , tubulau wali Yabowaine , Abalahama , Aisake ge Yakobo wali Yabowaine , iyaka i masal elau ge i ba : He iyaka ya nem ge Itipita wali ginol eliyamiu ya kite .
02003017	Ya bateli na nul tagilagimiu Itipita wami abaloloyowana , nuku na nuku tuk panuwa malumalulina toto Kenani , Hiti , Amoli , Pelisi , Hivi ge Yebusi hi miminaa . ’
02003018	“ Isileli wali tonowakau wam baaba nihi hago . Inoke alomwau nuku nok nuku na Itipita wali kin elana ge nuku ba , ‘ Yehoba , ama Hibilu wama Yabowaine , iyaka i masal eliyama . Inoke sauga ya nu talamwagima lan eton naha nawanawa-an ula kekevana elana ge bwasumu naha powonan Yehoba wama Yabowaine elana . ’
02003019	He ya atena Itipita wali kin nige ni tatalamwagimiu ge nuku eegon , ebo nige no gasisi bwabwatana na papamasal ni kikite .
02003020	No gasisi na patuwalali ginol lolovakunina na ginolil ge Itipita na apapanak-agil , yaka abwe kin ni talamwagimiu nuku egon .
02003021	“ No gasisi kaiwena Itipita nihi awatauwagimiu , inoke sauga nuku egon , nige nimamiu enoenovana i oola .
02003022	Isileli yowauiliyau nihi nok Itipita yowauiliyau elal , bolo hi miminaa labeliyaa ge bolo avaliyau hi mipamaisena , inoke tuwan ana isela gold ge silba ginebi ge kaliko waiwaisana nihi awanuni elal . Yaka bugul ya natumiyau bolau ge yowau nuku pagaloil , inoke Itipita wali wasawasa nuku ahe egonan . ”
02004001	Yaka Mosese i baek Yehoba elana i ba , “ Ga i ola ebo Isileli nige no baaba nihi hahago ge nihi aabulilek-an . Binimala ebo nihi baem elau nihi ba , ‘ Yehoba nige i mamasal eliyam , ’ ga na ginol na ola ? ”
02004002	Inoke Yehoba i nel i ba , “ Hauna nimwamwa ? ” Anana Mosese i lahe ba , “ Suki te . ”
02004003	Yehoba i baek elana i ba , “ U alipalo bilibiliya . ” Yaka Mosese suki i alipalo inoke i tabwa mwata , yaka Mosese i lou luwai .
02004004	Yaka Yehoba i baek Mosese elana i ba , “ U kululu , nimwam u paelu u aheya mwata ulinaa ge u latahin . ” Inoke Mosese i kululu ge i pihikan , yaka i tabwa suki al .
02004005	Yaka Yehoba i ba , “ Nu ginol ni ola to , inoke Isileli nihi patunahot te nau Yehoba , tubuliyau wali Yabowaine , Abalahama , Aisake ge Yakobo wali Yabowaine , iyaka ya masal eliyam . ”
02004006	Inoke Yehoba i baek al Mosese elana i ba , “ Nimwam u teliya babagalimwa am kaliko gamwanaa . ” Mosese i ginol ola ge sauga nimana i ahe , inoke nimana i lepelo , i yanayana hot i ola apwapwali .
02004007	Yaka Yehoba i ba , “ Nimwam u teliya al babagalimwa am kaliko gamwanaa . ” Mosese i ginol ola , ge sauga nimana i ahe al , inoke nimana i waisi sikal i ola tuwana gegewena .
02004008	Yaka Yehoba i ba , “ Binimala ebo ginol yawiyawi houwan nihi kite ge nige nihi abulilewa elam , inoke ginol yawiyawi eluwana nihi kite yaka abwe nihi abulilek .
02004009	Yaa binimala ebo ginol yawiyawi eluwa o nihi kite , ge nige wam baaba nihi hahago ge nihi abulilewa al elam , inoke Naile wewelina nu wage nu ligin bilibiliya , yaka ni tabwa saliya . ”
02004010	Yaa Mosese i ba , “ Bahiwa , Yehoba , bahi nu papatunau . Nau nige toawabaaba i oola . Valila ya ola , sauga al ya ya ola , bwagana nu baaba eliyau . Anau i mumulan ge memeu i pulowan . ”
02004011	Yaka Yehoba i ba , “ Henala gamagal awana i ginol ? Henala tanan i pipatui ge anana i pakekepa ? Henala matan i pipanana o ebo i pipakai ? Heiya te nau , Yehoba .
02004012	U egon ! Abwe na labewa baaba na paatenawa ge nu baunan . ”
02004013	Yaa Mosese i ba , “ Bahiwa Babala , gamagal getoga u patuna . ”
02004014	Yaka Yehoba Mosese i hugaan ge i ba , “ Ga i ola talim Eloni , ana un Libai ? Ya atena iya toawabaaba . He sauga ya am kaiwa i nenem , ge sauga ni kitewa ni yaliyaya .
02004015	Owa nu baek elana hauna ni baunan . Ami toto labui na labemiu nuku baaba ge na baewa eliyamiu hauna nuku ginol .
02004016	Iya wam tobaaba inoke kaiwem ni baaba gamagalau elal . Owa nu ola Yabowaine Eloni matanaa , kaiwena nu baek elana hauna ni baunan .
02004017	Suki ei nu noahe inoke eliyana ginol yawiyawi nu ginolil . ”
02004018	Yaka Mosese i sikal i na Midiyani yawana Yetilo elana . Inoke Yehoba i baek elana i ba , “ U sikal Itipita , kaiwena bolo nuwaliya nihi loliwa gegewel iyaka hi aliga . ” Yaka Mosese i baek yawana elana i ba , “ U talamwagau na sikal na na Itipita tutuwau na kitel tab heliya iyoho hi molu . ” Inoke Yetilo i talam ge i ba , “ Ee , ya yaliyaya nu nok . ”
02004019	
02004020	Inoke Mosese lagona ge natunau bolau i ahel , i telel donki pwatanaa , ge alonau hi egonan nihi na Itipita . Mosese suki toto Yabowaine i baunan i noahe .
02004021	Yaka Yehoba i baek Mosese elana i ba , “ Sauga nu vin Itipita , nu nuwahikan ginol yawiyawi gegewel toto ya talamwan elam , nu ginolil kin matanaa ge nu ba no gamagalau ni talamwagil nihi egon nihi na nihi tapwalolo elau . Yaa kin atena na paelolol , inoke nige ni tatalamwagil nihi eegon .
02004022	Inoke nu sikal kin elana nu ba , ‘ Yehoba i ba : Isileli hi ola natu tauina gamaun .
02004023	Iyaka ya ba haba eliyam , “ Isileli u talamwagil nihi egon nihi na nihi tapwalolo elau . ” Yaa ebo nigeya , inoke natum gamaun na lol . ’ ”
02004024	Abaveveyahowa Itipita ana kamwasaa , Yehoba i masal Mosese elana tage i tatagapaaliga . *
02004025	Yaa Sipola nibuka i ahe natuna melutauina tuwana buhuna kunisina i gotomwa yoho ge i ahe i patupa Mosese aena * elana . Inoke i ba “ Tunahot lagou owa u sasaliya . ”
02004026	I ba ola o , kaiwena nige nuwana i oola gotomwa yoho paganina . Inoke Yehoba Mosese i eguluwai .
02004027	Yehoba iyaka i baek Eloni elana i ba , “ U na ula kekevana elana Mosese u kite . ” Yaka Eloni i nok ge sauga Mosese i pwawaa Sainai oya bwabwalena elana , inoke i nalo .
02004028	Yaka baaba gegewena toto Yehoba i ba ni baunan Itipita , Mosese i wasaan Eloni elana . I ola al , ginol yawiyawi toto Yehoba i ba ni ginol i wasaan .
02004029	Inoke Mosese ge Eloni hi nok hi na Itipita , ge Isileli wali tonowakau gegewel hi pamigogoil .
02004030	Inoke Eloni baaba gegewena toto Yehoba i baunan Mosese elana i wasaan elal , yaka Mosese ginol yawiyawi gegewena i ginol gamagal mataliyaa .
02004031	Hi abulilek Yehoba i patunal , ge sauga hi hago age Yehoba wali miloloyowan i kite ge i atilomwan-agil , inoke hi kululu ge hi tapwalolo .
02005001	Toto o enaa , yaka Mosese ge Eloni hi na Itipita wali kin elana hi ba , “ Yehoba , ama Isileli wama Yabowaine , i ba ola hiwe , ‘ No gamagalau u talamwagil nihi nok ula kekevana elana hagali nihi ginol o awatauwan kaiwena . ’ ”
02005002	Yaka kin i ba , “ Henala Yehoba , ge anana na hago Isileli na talamwagil nihi egon ? Yehoba nige ya aatena , inoke nige Isileli na tatalamwagil nihi eegon . ”
02005003	Mosese ge Eloni hi ba , “ Ama Hibilu wama Yabowaine iyaka i masal eliyama . U talamwagima lan eton naha nawanawa-an ula kekevana elana bwasumu naha powonan Yehoba wama Yabowaine elana . Ebo nigeya , tab abwe ama kasiyebwa ni teli o ebo elohaveyan kilepana elana ni lolima ge naha aliga . ”
02005004	Kin i ba , “ Mosese ge Eloni , ga i ola ge gamagalau wali tuwalali ku apanak . Ku sikal wami abatuwalaliya .
02005005	Komiu Isileli iyaka Itipita ku gewi lakema . Ga i ola ! Tuwalali iyaka ku towani ! ”
02005006	Lan toto o elana , kin logugui gasigasisena i baunanik tontuwalali ge tuwalali ana tomatahikan elal i ba ,
02005007	“ Bahi widiwidi kekevana alona bilibili nuku pepek elal ge bilik nihi giginol ! Nuku ba totoliya nihi na widiwidi nihi loya .
02005008	Yaa nuku ba al elal bilik nihi ginol ali gewi ni ola valila , bahi ali gewi ni lalau . Heliya hi pweyata , heiya te kaiwena ge hi awanun elau tage na talamwagil nihi na bwasumu nihi powonan wali Yabowaine elana !
02005009	Wali tuwalali ku pwapwabwaya-an , yaka nihi mimi tuwatuwalali ya , inoke bahi nuwaliya ni nonoek ba kakawi ana haguhagu elana . ”
02005010	Inoke tontuwalali ge tuwalali ana tomatahikan hi tagil , hi na hi baek Isileli elal hi ola , “ Kin i ba ola hiwe , ‘ Widiwidi nige naha pepewa al .
02005011	Nuku na totomiu wami widiwidi nuku loya hauna labena elana nuku pwawaa , yaa bilik nuku ginol ali gewi ni olaolaek , bahi ni lalau . ’ ”
02005012	Inoke Isileli , Itipita gamwana gegewena hi nemnowa-an widiwidi ana loya kaiwena .
02005013	Tontuwalali Isileli hi palawakikil hi ba , “ Lan maisena maisena bilik nuku ginolil ali gewi ni ola sauga toto widiwidi hi pewa eliyamiu . ”
02005014	Yaka tontuwalali tuwalali ana tomatahikan hi nibihil hi ba , “ Ga i ola ge bilik nige ku giginolil ali gewi i oola valila ? ” Tontuwalali heliya gagama Itipita . Tuwalali ana tomatahikan heliya Isileli bolo Itipita hi hilel tuwalali nihi matahikan .
02005015	Inoke tuwalali ana tomatahikan hi na kin elana hi ba , “ Ga i ola ge u giginol ola eliyama ?
02005016	Widiwidi nige hi pepem eliyama , yaa hi ba bilik naha ginolil ! Yaka hi nibinibihagima ! Wam gamagalau hi gegi te hi ginol ola eliyama . ”
02005017	Yaka kin i ba , “ Komiu topweyata , ku pweyata hot ! Heiya te kaiwena ku mimi baaba tage na talamwagimiu nuku na bwasumu nuku powonan Yehoba elana .
02005018	Ku sikal , ku na ku tuwalali ! Widiwidi nige nihi pepewa , yaa bilik nuku ginolil ali gewi ni olaolaek toto valila . ”
02005019	Tuwalali ana tomatahikan hi atena te i pulowan elal , kaiwena kin i ba . “ Lan maisena maisena bilik nuku ginolil ali gewi ni ola toto valila . ”
02005020	Sauga kin hi eguluwan , inoke hi na Mosese ge Eloni hi pwawal heliya hi matamatan kaiweliya .
02005021	Yaka hi baek Mosese ge Eloni elal hi ba , “ Ha awanun Yehoba ni lahemiu , kaiwena kin alonau ge ana tolabe tineliya ku palut ge hi pihigelgel-agima . He wami ginol kaiwena bosowailiya te nihi lolima . ”
02005022	Inoke Mosese i na i awanun Yehoba elana i ba , “ Babala , ga i ola ge pulowan u pwatanim wam gamagalau elal ? Age toto o kaiwena heiya u patunau ge ya nem ?
02005023	Ya nok kin elana wam baaba ya baunanik , inoke nak i ginol gamagalau elal . Nige bugul etega u giginol ge nu pwamwalil ! ”
02006001	Yaka Yehoba i baek Mosese elana i ba , “ Sauga kekeisi abwe nu kite hauna na ginol kin elana . No gasisi kaiwena inoke ni patuna owaowa-agimiu ge wana panuwa nuku eguluwan . ”
02006002	Yaka Yabowaine i baek al Mosese elana i ba , “ Nau Yehoba .
02006003	Sauga ya masala Abalahama , Aisake ge Yakobo elal , alau Yabowaine Togasisi Hot ya te hi atena . Ya masal elal , yaa alau Yehoba , alan bwabwalena , nige ya papamasal elal .
02006004	Inoke no bateli ya ginol elal labi Kenani na pek , labi toto elana hi mibwabwaliya .
02006005	Sauga ya Isileli hi miloloyowan Itipita , inoke wali yowalu iyaka ya hago ge no bateli ya nuwahikan .
02006006	“ Inoke nu baek Isileli elal , ‘ Nau Yehoba . Nau na pwamwalimiu , na sokalimiu Itipita wali paloloyowana . Nimwau gasigasisena na paelu , lahi pupulowanina na pek elal ge na pwamwalimiu .
02006007	Na ahemiu komiu nuku ola no gamagalau , ge nau wami Yabowaine . Inoke nuku atena nau Yehoba wami Yabowaine , kaiwena na sokalimiu Itipita wali paloloyowana .
02006008	Na nulimiu nuku na panuwa toto ya bateli na pek Abalahama , Aisake ge Yakobo elal , inoke na pewa hoti wami panuwa . Nau Yehoba . ’ ”
02006009	He Mosese Yehoba wana baaba i wasaan Isileli elal i ola to , yaa anana nige hi hahago , kaiwena yayaluwaliya i pweyata wali miloloyowan kaiwena .
02006010	Yaka Yehoba i baek Mosese elana i ba ,
02006011	“ Nu na nu ba Itipita wali kin Isileli ni talamwagil nihi tagil wana panuwaa . ”
02006012	Yaa anana Mosese i lahe i ba , “ Isileli anau nige hi hahago . Ga i ola ge kin anau ni hago ? Nau memeu i pulowan ge ya baaba gegegi . ”
02006013	He liwanina i ola to . Yehoba i ba Mosese ge Eloni Isileli nihi nulil tagilagil Itipita , ge i patunal nihi baek Isilel elal ge nihi ba Itipita wali kin elana .
02006014	Isileli ali un tubutubuliyau i ola hiwe . * Yakobo natuna gamaun Lubeni , natunau bolau esopali : Hanok , Palu , Hesiloni , ge Kami . Heliya un Lubeni ali pwahiya ona tubutubuliyau .
02006015	Lubeni loena Simiyon , natunau bolau esiwa ( 6 ) : Yemuwel , Yamin , Ohad , Yakin , Sohal ge Saul , iya Kenani yovana natuna . Heliya un Simiyon ali pwahiya ona tubutubuliyau .
02006016	Simiyon loena Libai , natunau bolau eton : Gelison , Kohat ge Melali , i ola te i pamasal ali un wasana ana buki elana . Libai yawalina ana baliman wan handeled teti seben ( 137 ) .
02006017	Gelison natunau bolau eluwa : Libinai ge Simei . Heliya al tubutubuliyau hi gewi .
02006018	Kohat natunau bolau esopali : Amilam , Isihal , Hebiloni ge Usiyel . Kohat yawalina ana baliman wan handeled teti tili ( 133 ) .
02006019	Melali natunau bolau eluwa : Mahali ge Musi . Heliya un Libai ali pwahiya ona tubutubuliyau , i ola te i pamasal ali un wasana ana buki elana .
02006020	Amilam alona tamana nuna Yokebed hi alolon , inoke natunau Eloni ge Mosese i abil . Amilam yawalina ana baliman wan handeled teti seben ( 137 ) .
02006021	Isihal natunau bolau eton : Kola , Nepeg ge Sikili .
02006022	Usiyel natunau bolau eton : Misael , Elisapan ge Sitili .
02006023	Eloni alona Eliseba hi alolon , iya Aminadab natuna , Nason nuna . Natunau i abil Nadab , Abihu , Eliyesa ge Itamali .
02006024	Kola natunau bolau eton : Asil , Elekana ge Abiyasap ; heliya pwahiya Kola ali tonowakau ona .
02006025	Eloni natuna Eliyesa alona ge Putiyel natuna yovana hi alolon inoke i ab natuna Pinehas . He un Libai ali pwahiya ona ge ali tini ona tonowakiliyau liwaniliya i ola to .
02006026	He Eloni ge Mosese bolo ya heliya te Yehoba i baek elal i ba , “ Isileli ali un gegewena nuku nulil tagilagil Itipita . ”
02006027	Ge heliya te hi baek Itipita wali kin elana Isileli ni talamwagil nihi nulil tagilagil Itipita .
02006028	He Mosese iyoho Itipita , Yehoba iyaka i baek elana i ba , “ Nau Yehoba . Baaba gegewena toto na baunaniwa , nu baunanik Itipita wali kin elana . ”
02006029	
02006030	Yaa saugena o Mosese i baek Yehoba elana i ba , “ Nau memeu i pulowan ge ya baaba gegegi . Ga i ola ge kin anau ni hago ? ”
02007001	Yaka Yehoba i baek elana i ba , “ Ya telewa nu ola Yabowaine kin matanaa , ge talim Eloni ni baaba kin elana ni ola wam palopita .
02007002	Baaba gegewena toto na baunaniwa nu baunanik Eloni elana , inoke ni ba kin elana Isileli ni talamwagil nihi tagilem wana panuwaa .
02007003	Yaa kin atena na pagasisi , inoke bwagana ginol yawiyawi ge abanuwaahi ona ni gewi na ginolil Itipita ,
02007004	yaa anam nige ni hahago . Inoke nimwau na paelu lahi pupulowanina na ginol Itipita elana , yaka no gamagalau Isileli un gegewel na nulil tagilagil .
02007005	Sauga nimwau na paelu Itipita elana ge Isileli na nulil tagilagil wali panuwaa , yaka abwe Itipita nihi atena nau Yehoba . ”
02007006	Yaka Mosese ge Eloni hi ginol ola Yehoba wana baaba .
02007007	Sauga toto hi na hi baaba kin elana , he Mosese wana baliman eiti ge Eloni wana baliman eiti tili .
02007008	Yaka Yehoba i baek Mosese ge Eloni elal i ba ,
02007009	“ Sauga ebo kin ni baewa eliyamiu ni ba , ‘ Ginol yawiyawi etega nuku ginol inoke wami baaba ni patunahot , ’ yaka nu baek Eloni elana wana suki ni ahe ni alilowana kin awonaa , inoke ni tabwa mwata . ”
02007010	Yaka Mosese ge Eloni hi nok hi na kin elana ge hi ginol ola Yehoba wana baaba . Eloni wana suki i alilowana kin ge ana tolabe awoliyaa inoke i tabwa mwata .
02007011	Yaka kin wana tosiba ge wana tokukula i yogaagil , ge wali siba elana hi ginol i ola ya te toto Eloni i ginol .
02007012	Wali suki hi alilowan inoke hi tabwa mwata . Yaa Eloni wana suki heliya wali suki i tinonil .
02007013	Yaa kin atena i pagasisi inoke Mosese ge Eloni analiya nige i hahago , i ola valila Yehoba wana baaba .
02007014	Inoke Yehoba i baek Mosese elana i ba , “ Kin atena i gasisi nabi , gamagal nige i tatalamwagil hi eegon .
02007015	Sauga mweluluga ni lau i nana wewel Naile kaiwena , inoke nu na nu kite . Yaka suki toto i tabwa mwata nu noahe ge nu matamatan wewel labenaa .
02007016	Yaka nu ba kin elana nu ola , ‘ Yehoba , ama Hibilu wama Yabowaine , i patunau elam , i ba , “ No gamagal u talamwagil nihi na ula kekevana elana ge nihi tapwalolo elau . ” Yaa nige anana u hahago .
02007017	Inoke Yehoba i ba ola hiwe , “ Ginol etega na ginol inoke nu atena nau Yehoba . ” He suki toto ya pihikan e , eliyana wewel Naile na lol inoke ni tabwa saliya .
02007018	Yaka moti nihi aliga ge wewel ni bweyan , inoke Itipita nige bosowailiya nihi im . ’ ”
02007019	Yaka Yehoba i baek Mosese elana i ba , “ U baek Eloni elana wana suki ni paelu Itipita wewelina gegewena elal , bolo hi sanisani , bolo dulein hi sani toulil * ge bolo opopwil , yaka nihi tabwa saliya . Panuwa gamwana gegewena ni sasaliya , i ola al patuna ge ulugomwa wewelina nihi saliya . ”
02007020	Yaka Mosese ge Eloni hi ginol i ola Yehoba wana baaba . Eloni wana suki i latahin kin ge ana tolabe mataliyaa , inoke wewel Naile i lol yaka gegewena i tabwa saliya .
02007021	Wewel Naile moteliyau hi loaliga ge bwaleliya wewel i pabweyan , inoke Itipita nige bosowailiya wewel nihi im . Itipita gamwanaa gegewena i yousasaliya .
02007022	Yaa Itipita wali tokukula wali siba elana hi ginol i ola ya te toto Eloni i ginol . Yaka kin atena i pagasisi al inoke Mosese ge Eloni analiya nige i hahago , i ola valila Yehoba wana baaba .
02007023	Yaka kin ena i pek elal ge i sikal i na wana limiya , nige i nuwanuwatu bugul o kaiwena .
02007024	Itipita gegewel ali wewel imwim hi ken loyaloya wewel Naile bebenaa , kaiwena nige bosowailiya wewelina nihi im .
02007025	Yehoba wewel Naile i palogabola , enaa lan seben i mowasi ga .
02008001	Yaka Yehoba i baek al Mosese elana i ola , “ U na kin elana ge nu ba , ‘ Yehoba i ba ola hiwe : No gamagal u talamwagil nihi egon nihi na nihi tapwalolo elau .
02008002	Ebo nige nu tatalamwagil nihi eegon , nasi wam panuwa na palogabola , gamwana gegewena pwagali nihi pakalaopop .
02008003	Pwagali wewel Naile nihi pakalaopop inoke nihi na nihi ha wam limiya , wam babatomwa elana , wam abakenuwa , am tolabe wali limiya , ge wam gamagalau wali limiya , i ola al nihi ha wam abaliligaa ge wam ulun gamwaliyaa .
02008004	Nihi susupeni ha elam , wam gamagalau elal ge am tolabe gegewel elal . ’ ”
02008005	Yaka Yehoba i baek Mosese elana i ba , “ Nu ba Eloni elana wana suki ni paeluek wewel sanisani , wewel bolo dulein hi sani toulil ge wewel opopwil elal . Inoke pwagali nihi heyan panuwa Itipita nihi pakalaopop . ”
02008006	Inoke Eloni wana suki i paeluek Itipita wewelina gegewena elal , yaka pwagali hi heyan ge panuwa hi pakalaopop .
02008007	Yaa tokukula wali siba elana hi ginol i ola ya te toto Eloni i ginol , inoke pwagali hi heyan panuwa Itipita hi pakalaopop .
02008008	Yaka kin Mosese ge Eloni i yogaagil ge i baek elal i ba , “ Nuku awanun Yehoba elana pwagali ni ahe yohil alowau ge no gamagalau eliyama , yaka wami gamagalau na talamwagil nihi na bwasumu nihi powonan Yehoba elana . ”
02008009	Anana Mosese i lahe i ba , “ Ya yaliyaya hot na awanun kaiwemiu . Nu ba hauna sauga ge na awanun alomwau am tolabe ge wam gamagalau kaiwemiu , inoke pwagali nihi mwayayu-em eliyamiu ge wami limi elal nige etega nihi mimina al , iyai ya te bolo wewel Naile gamwanaa . ”
02008010	Yaka kin i ba , “ Bwaligumwa hot te nu awanun kaiwema . ” Anana Mosese i lahe i ba , “ Na ginol ni ola wam baaba , inoke nu atena nige yabowaine etega al i oola Yehoba wama Yabowaine .
02008011	Inoke owa , am tolabe , wam gamagalau ge wami limi , pwagali nihi mwayayu luwagimiu . Bolo wewel Naile gamwanaa ya te nihi mina . ”
02008012	Mosese ge Eloni kin hi eguluwai enaa , inoke Mosese i awanun Yehoba elana pwagali bolo i patunal kin elana kaiweliya .
02008013	Yaka Yehoba i ginol ola Mosese wana awanun , inoke pwagali hi loaliga limiya , bakubakuwa , ge eyowaa .
02008014	Itipita pwagali hi hala papahel ali pwahin bwabwatal ona , inoke bwaleliya panuwa i pabweyan .
02008015	Yaa sauga kin i kite pwagali iyaka hi mowasi , yaka atena i pagasisi al inoke Mosese ge Eloni analiya nige i hahago , i ola valila Yehoba wana baaba .
02008016	Yaka Yehoba i baek Mosese elana i ba , “ Nu ba Eloni elana wana suki ni paelu ge bilibili ni lol , inoke Itipita ana labi gegewena elana bilibili papakovana nihi tabwa sapwasapwa . ”
02008017	Yaka Eloni wana suki i paelu ge bilibili i lol , inoke Itipita ana labi gegewena elana bilibili papakovana gegewena hi tabwa sapwasapwa , inoke gamagal ge bwasumu hi pomwil ge hi talil .
02008018	Sauga tokukula wali siba hi labose tage sapwasapwa nihi pamasal , he nige bosowailiya . Sapwasapwa hi gewi nabi bwasumu ge gamagal hi talil .
02008019	Inoke tokukula hi baek kin elana hi ba , “ Yabowaine wana ginol te . ” Yaa kin atena i gasisi inoke Mosese ge Eloni analiya nige i hahago , i ola valila Yehoba wana baaba .
02008020	Yaka Yehoba i baek Mosese elana i ba , “ Bwaligumwa mweluluga kekeisi nu lut , yaka sauga kin ni lau i nana wewela , nu na nu kite ge nu baek elana nu ba , ‘ Yehoba i ba ola hiwe : No gamagalau u talamwagil nihi egon nihi na nihi tapwalolo elau .
02008021	Ebo nu kaisel , yaka uluulu ali yawi na patunal nihi you tal alomwau am tolabe ge wam gamagalau eliyamiu ge nihi tuk wami limi elal . Itipita wami limi nihi pakalaopop ge bilibili nihi yabom .
02008022	Yaa na ginol getoga labi Gosen elana , toto no gamagal hi miminaa . Uluulu ali yawi nige nihi gagana to , inoke nu atena nau Yehoba iyahe panuwa ya elana .
02008023	No gamagalau ali hehegan ni getoga wam gamagalau elal . He bwaligumwa hot te ginol yawiyawi ya ni gan . ’ ”
02008024	Inoke Yehoba i ginol ola hiwe . Uluulu ali yawi bwabwatana i patuna hi tuk kin ge ana tolabe wali limiya . Uluulu Itipita gamwana gegewena hi palogabola .
02008025	Yaka kin Mosese ge Eloni i yogaagil ge i baek elal i ba , “ Nuku na bwasumu nuku powonan wami Yabowaine elana , yaa nuku ginola panuwa ya gamwanaa . ”
02008026	Yaa Mosese i ba , “ Nige bosowaima naha ginol ola , kaiwena bwasumu bolo naha powonan Yehoba wama Yabowaine elana , Itipita hi bwaikikin-an . Binimala bwasumu o naha powonan mataliyaa , nasi nihi loipat-agima ge naha aliga .
02008027	Yehoba wama Yabowaine i ba eliyama lan eton naha nawanawa-an naha na ula kekevana elana yaka bwasumu naha powonan elana . ”
02008028	Yaka kin i ba , “ Ya talamwagimiu nuku na ula kekevana elana ge bwasumu nuku powonan Yehoba wami Yabowaine elana , yaa bahi nuku nonopayapu . He nuku awanun kaiweu . ”
02008029	Anana Mosese i lahe i ba , “ Sauga na eguluwagiwa na na na awanun Yehoba elana , inoke bwaligumwa uluulu nihi mowasi hot alomwau am tolabe ge wam gamagalau eliyamiu . Yaa bahi nu kakakawema al . Bahi gamagal nu lolopwalil ge nu babaa , ‘ Nige bosowaina nuku na bwasumu nuku powonan Yehoba elana . ’ ”
02008030	Inoke Mosese kin i eguluwan i na i awanun Yehoba elana ,
02008031	yaka Yehoba i ginol ola Mosese wana awanun . Inoke uluulu hi mowasi hot kin alonau ana tolabe ge wana gamagalau elal , nige etega i mimina .
02008032	Yaa kin atena i pagasisi al , inoke gamagal nige i tatalamwagil nihi eegon .
02009001	Inoke Yehoba i baek Mosese elana i ba , “ Nu na kin elana ge nu ba , ‘ Yehoba ama Hibilu wama Yabowaine i ba ola hiwe : No gamagalau nu talamwagil nihi na nihi tapwalolo elau .
02009002	Ebo nu kaisel ge iyoho ya nu kukukuhikagil ,
02009003	inoke nau Yehoba no gasisi eliyana wam bwasumu hosi , donki , kamel , bulumwakau , sipi ge goti ona ali gila na teli nihi aliga .
02009004	Yaa Isileli wali bwasumu ali hehegan ni getoga Itipita wali bwasumu elal . Isileli wali bwasumu nige etega ni aaliga .
02009005	He nau Yehoba lan iyaka ya teli ya ba bwaligumwa hot te na ginol . ’ ”
02009006	Lan i gan yaka Yehoba i ginol ola wana baaba . Itipita wali bwasumu gegewena hi loaliga , yaa Isileli wali bwasumu nige etega i aaliga .
02009007	Kin i loya ge i pwawa te Isileli wali bwasumu nige etega i aaliga . Yaa iyoho ya atena i gagasisi , yaka nige gamagalau i tatalamwagil hi eegon .
02009008	Yaka Yehoba i baek Mosese ge Eloni elal i ba , “ Papakova ku gagalo ginaha ana abatontona , inoke Mosese ni aliheyan hawawala kin awonaa .
02009009	Yaka papakova ni ola kasukasu ge ni lovaleyan Itipita gamwana gegewena ni pwawa . Inoke gamagalau ge bwasumu nihi youbabaliyan ge nihi youbonbon . ”
02009010	Inoke papakova hi gagalo ginaha ana abatontona ge hi na hi talmilil kin manininaa , yaka Mosese i aliheyan hawawala kin awonaa . Inoke gamagal ge bwasumu hi youbabaliyan ge hi youbonbon .
02009011	Tokukula nige bosowailiya nihi nem nihi talmilil Mosese matanaa kaiwena hi youbabaliyan , i ola al Itipita gegewel .
02009012	Yaa Yehoba kin atena i pagasisi inoke Mosese ge Eloni analiya nige i hahago , i ola valila Yehoba wana baaba .
02009013	Inoke Yehoba i baek Mosese elana i ba , “ Bwaligumwa mweluluga kekeisi nu lut , yaka nu na kin nu kite ge nu baek elana nu ba , ‘ Yehoba , ama Hibilu wama Yabowaine , i ba ola hiwe : No gamagal nu talamwagil nihi na nihi tapwaloloem elau .
02009014	Ebo nigeya , yaka logabola nanakil hot na ginol alomwau am tolabe ge wam gamagalau eliyamiu . Inoke nu atena nige etega al panayawiya i oola nau .
02009015	Bosowaina valila nimwau na paelu ge logabola etega na ginol alomwau wam gamagalau eliyamiu ge na gul habamiu panayawiya .
02009016	Yaa ya telewa u tabwa kin , kaiwena nuwau no gasisi na pankitewa , inoke wasau ni lelu panayawi gegewena ni soli .
02009017	Owa wam logugui i gasisi no gamagal elal ge u lopwalil nige hi eegon ,
02009018	inoke bwaligumwa ni ola te sauga e kehe kalakalapatina * na palau , kehe ololana o nige sauga etega i lolowa Itipita .
02009019	He nu ba totuwalali elal wam bwasumu ge bugul gegewena bolo hi miminaa noleleya nihi bugul tukagil ligumwa . Kaiwena gamagal ge bwasumu bolo nige hi uulutuk ligumwa , nasi kehe kalakalapatina ni lolil ge nihi aliga . ’ ”
02009020	Kin ana tolabe enuna hi lovakun Yehoba wana baaba kaiwena , inoke etimwawa wali totuwalali loloyowanil ge wali bwasumu hi palou tukagil .
02009021	Yaa bolo nige hi nuwanuwatu Yehoba wana baaba kaiwena inoke wali totuwalali loloyowanil ge wali bwasumu nige hi papalou tukagil .
02009022	Yaka Yehoba i baek Mosese elana i ba , “ Nimwam u paeluek labulabumwa , inoke kehe kalakalapatina ni lau Itipita gamwana gegewena elana , ni lowa gamagal , bwasumu , ge bugul siusiunil eyowaa pwataliyaa . ”
02009023	Inoke Mosese wana suki i paeluek labulabumwa yaka Yehoba gulumwawa ge kehe i patuna , inoke pinamal panuwa i lol . Kehe kalakalapatina Yehoba i palau ge Itipita ana labi gegewena pinamal i topainan . Kehe ololana o nige sauga etega i lolowa Itipita .
02009024	
02009025	Itipita labi gegewena elal kehe kalakalapatina bugul gegewena bolo noleleya i apapanak-agil , i ola al gamagal ge bwasumu . Bugul bolo siusiunil eyowaa i paanlolowagil ge ebwakil lamwaliya i olan palo .
02009026	Yaa kehe nige i lolowa labi Gosen , Isileli wali abaminaa .
02009027	Yaka kin Mosese ge Eloni i yogaagil ge i ba , “ Iyaka ya gegi . Yehoba wana ginol i sapu , nau alowau no gamagalau ha gegi .
02009028	Ku awanun Yehoba elana ! Besema gulumwawa ge kehe ! Ya talamwagimiu nuku egon , nige al nuku mimina . ”
02009029	Yaka anana Mosese i lahe i ba , “ Sauga na tagil panuwa ya elana , inoke nimwau na latahin ge na awanun Yehoba elana . Inoke gulumwawa ni bakuhu ge kehe ni mainum . Yaka nu atena panayawi iya Yehoba wana panayawi .
02009030	Yaa ya atena owa ge am tolabe nigeya ga Yehoba Yabowaine ku lolovakun-an . ”
02009031	( He mwawin palakes toto kaliko hi ginoliya , ge aanan bali kehe i apapanak-agil , kaiwena bali iyaka i matuwa ge palakes lanina abwe i pwela .
02009032	Yaa witi nige i nanak , kaiwena nigeya ga ana sauga matuwa i oola . )
02009033	Yaka Mosese kin i eguluwan i notagil panuwa tolinaa , inoke nimana i latahin i awanun Yehoba elana , yaka gulumwawa i bakuhu ge kehe i mainum .
02009034	Sauga kin i kite kehe i mainum ge gulumwawa i bakuhu , yaka i gegi al , alonau ge ana tolabe ateliya hi pagasisi .
02009035	Inoke Isileli nige i tatalamwagil hi eegon , i ola valila Yehoba wana baaba Mosese elana .
02010001	Yaka Yehoba i baek Mosese elana i ba , “ Nu na kin nu kite . He alonau ana tolabe ateliya ya pagasisi , kaiwena nuwau no ginol yawiyawi ge etotohi ona na ginola gamwaliyaa .
02010002	Inoke sauga mulaa , nuku liwanan natumiyau ge tubumiyau eliyalil Itipita ali hehegan ga ya apapanak-an ola ge etotohi bolo ya ginolil gamwaliyaa kaiweliya . Inoke nuku atena te nau Yehoba . ”
02010003	Inoke Mosese ge Eloni hi na kin elana ge hi ba , “ Yehoba ama Hibilu wama Yabowaine i ba ola hiwe : ‘ Hauna sauga abwe nu awatauwagau ? No gamagal u talamwagil nihi egon nihi na nihi tapwaloloem elau .
02010004	Ebo nu kaisel , yaka bwaligumwa na ba sagagai * nihi nem wam panuwa nihi pakalaopop .
02010005	Nihi gewi nabi bilibili nihi yabom , nige bosowaina ta kite . Bugul gegewena bolo kehe kalakalapatina nige i aapanakil ge hi minaa wami eyowaa , i ola al ebwakil lamwaliya , nihi an habal .
02010006	Alomwau am tolabe gegewel ge Itipita gegewel wami limi nihi pakalaopop . He logabola ololana o nige sauga etega tamamiyau ge tubumiyau hi kikite , i telipunaa lan toto labi ya hi holave ana siga sauga ya . ’ ” Yaka Mosese ena i pek kin elana ge i eguluwai .
02010007	Inoke kin ana tolabe hi baek elana hi ba , “ Paehila tau ya ala nak ni pem ? Isileli nu talamwagil nihi na nihi tapwalolo Yehoba heliya wali Yabowaine elana . Age nige u atena Itipita i logabola ? ”
02010008	Inoke Mosese ge Eloni hi en pasikalil hi na kin elana ge i baek elal i ba , “ Nuku nok , nuku na nuku tapwalolo Yehoba wami Yabowaine elana . Yaa no wasa ga nu pem henalau nihi nok . ”
02010009	Anana Mosese i lahe i ba , “ Gegewema ya naha egon , alomeyau wama wawayau ge toliki , wama bolau ge yowau , i ola al wama sipi , goti ge bulumwakau , kaiwena hagali naha ginol Yehoba ana awatauwan kaiwena . ”
02010010	Yaka kin i ba , “ Nigeya hot ! Binimala yowau ge wawayau na talamwagil , he tunahot Yehoba i lalabemiu ! Ya atena ya , ama nak ku aawaginol !
02010011	Besena bolau ya nihi nok nihi tapwalolo Yehoba elana , ni ola wami awanun . ” Yaka Mosese ge Eloni hi patuna owaowa-agil hi tagil .
02010012	Yaka Yehoba i baek Mosese elana i ba , “ Nimwam u paeluek Itipita ana labi gegewena elal , inoke sagagai ali yawi nihi nem ge bugul siusiunil bolo kehe kalakalapatina nige i aapapanak-agil nihi anil . ”
02010013	Inoke Mosese wana suki i paeluek Itipita ana labi gegewena elal , yaka Yehoba mana babaliman i patowa lan o ge bulin o . Lan i gan mweluluga , yaka sagagai hi masal .
02010014	Ali yawi bwabwatana hi you vin , panuwa gamwana gegewena hi pakalaopop . Yawi ololana o nige sauga etega i gagan , ge nige al ni gagan .
02010015	Inoke panuwa hi pomwi ge bikeliya * i pit . Bugul siusiunil eyowaa ginebi ge ai huwalu enowaliya bolo nige kehe kalakalapatina i aapanakil , gegewel hi an habal . Ebwakil ge mwawin lamwaliya alalawal , gegewena hi pwamowasel .
02010016	Inoke etimwawa kin Mosese ge Eloni i yogaagil ge i baek elal i ba , “ Iyaka ya gegi Yehoba wami Yabowaine elana , i ola al eliyamiu .
02010017	No gegi ku nuwayoho al pamaisena , ge ku awanun Yehoba wami Yabowaine elana logabola nanakina ya ni ahe yoho . ”
02010018	Inoke Mosese kin i eguluwan i na i awanun Yehoba elana .
02010019	Yaka Yehoba mana i pil pasikal i tabwa yalas gasigasisena , inoke sagagai i yu latalatahinil ge i yu payopayou-agil hi na Hoga Keketina . He nige al sagagai etega i miminaa Itipita .
02010020	Yaa Yehoba kin atena i pagasisi , yaka Isileli nige i tatalamwagil hi eegon .
02010021	Yaka Yehoba i baek Mosese elana i ba , “ Nimwam u paeluek labulabumwa , inoke gogou kubwa Itipita gamwana gegewena ni yabom , ge gamagalau nihi babalalu gegegi . ”
02010022	Yaka Mosese nimana i paeluwek labulabumwa , inoke lan eton Itipita bwalibwaligena i gogou hot .
02010023	Itipita nige bosowailiya avaliyau ge avaliyau nihi pekitikiti-agil , ge lan eton o nige gamagal etega wana limi i tataluwai . Yaa Isileli wali abamina i mwananal .
02010024	Yaka kin Mosese i yogaan ge i baek elana i ba , “ Ku nok , ku na ku tapwalolo Yehoba elana . He alomiyau wami yowau ge wawayau nuku nok , yaa wami sipi , goti ge bulumwakau nihi mina . ”
02010025	Yaa anana Mosese i lahe i ba , “ Nigeya ! Nu talamwagima wama bwasumu naha ahel , yaka enuna naha powon pwabwaligel ge enuna naha powonagil al Yehoba wama Yabowaine elana .
02010026	He alomeyau ya te wama bwasumu , nige etega ni mimina . Bwasumu enuna naha hilel inoke naha tapwalolo Yehoba wama Yabowaine elana . Yaa naha vin ga abwe naha atena hauna bwasumu naha powonagil elana . ”
02010027	Yaa Yehoba kin atena i pagasisi , inoke nige nuwana ni talamwagil nihi egon .
02010028	Yaka i baek Mosese elana i ba , “ U egonik hot matawa ! Bahi al na kikitewa ! Lan toto na kitewa , inoke nu aliga ! ”
02010029	Anana Mosese i lahe i ba , “ I waisi . Ni ola wam baaba . Nige nu kikiteyau al . ”
02011001	He Yehoba iyaka i ba haba Mosese elana i ba , “ Logabola maisena al na patuna Itipita wali kin ge wana gamagalau elal . Enaa inoke ni talamwagimiu nuku egon . He nige tage ni talamwagimiu ya , yaa ni patuna owaowa-agimiu .
02011002	Ge nu ba Isileli bolau ge yowau nihi nok Itipita bolo hi miminaa labeliyaa , inoke tuwan ana isela gold ge silba nihi awanuni elal . ”
02011003	( He Yehoba Itipita ateliya i pameimei inoke heliya Isileli hi awatauwagil . I ola al , Itipita elana Mosese alana i bwaya kin ana tolabe ge gamagalau gegewel mataliyaa . )
02011004	Inoke Mosese i ba vevehe al kin elana i ba , “ Yehoba i ba ola hiwe : ‘ Bulin nuwana Itipita na nosolaan .
02011005	Inoke gamaun melutauil gegewel nihi aliga , ni telipunaa owa kin towasawasa natum elana ni na ana siga totuwalali loloyowanina witi ana towowowol natuna . I ola al , bwasumu gegewel natuliyau gamaun nihi aliga .
02011006	Itipita gamwana gegewena kahikahin bwabwatana ni masal , kahin ololana o nige sauga etega i gagan , ge nige al ni gagan .
02011007	Yaa Isileli elal ni bwagum , nige ni oola wanuka etega ni tatawol gamagal o ebo bwasumu elal . Inoke nu atena nau Yehoba Isileli ali hehegan ya ginol pagetoga Itipita elal . ’ ”
02011008	Yaka Mosese i ba al i ola , “ Am tolabe gegewel nihi nem nihi loepwakoku maniniwa ge nihi ba , ‘ Alomwau ge wam gamagalau gegewel nuku egonan . ’ Yaka enaa abwe na egon . ” Inoke Mosese i huga nabi ge kin i eguluwai .
02011009	He valila Yehoba i baek Mosese elana i ba , “ Kin anam nige ni hahago , inoke ginol yawiyawi ni gewi na ginolil Itipita . ”
02011010	Inoke Mosese ge Eloni ginol yawiyawi gegewel o hi ginolil kin matanaa , yaa Yehoba kin atena i pagasisi inoke Isileli nige i tatalamwagil ge wana panuwa nihi eguluwan .
02012001	Itipita elana Yehoba i baek Mosese ge Eloni eliyalil i ola ,
02012002	“ Waikena ya nuku teli baliman ana waikena houwan .
02012003	Nu ba boda Isileli elal : Waikena ya ana lan elulutega elana , tau maisena ge maisena sipi natuna o ebo goti natuna ni hile wana limi ana heniheni kaiweliya .
02012004	Ebo tau etega wana limi ana heniheni nige nihi gegewi ge nige bosowailiya bwasumu bwabwaligena nihi an haba , inoke avaliyau ge wali heliyamwau bolo labeliyaa nihi an livaso . Nuku golugoluwa gamagal ali gewi elana ge toto i bosowaina gamagal maisena ge maisena ni an ana luvi .
02012005	Sipi o ebo goti melutauil nuku hilel , wali baliman maisena , tuwaliya sasapona .
02012006	Nihi matahikagil bubun ana siga waikena houwan ana lan potinina ( 14 ) vekokoyavi , yaka boda Isileli gegewel bwasumu bolo o nihi lolil .
02012007	Saliyana enuna nihi ahe inoke nihi abutek limi toto hi anana ana nog kokowanaa ge ana ai labi labui elana .
02012008	Bulin toto o bunumwina nuku ton inoke nuku an ginebi awenuwa hohogana ge pwalawa nige alona yis hi vivikuhiya .
02012009	Bahi kolena o ebo liligana nuku an , yaa tuwana gabomwina gegewena , balomana , aena ge elokena , nuku ton ni mola bubun inoke nuku an .
02012010	Bahi ginolina etega nuku aan teli ge mweluluga ni pwapwawa . Ebo ni gan , inoke nuku ton ginaha elana ge ni wai .
02012011	He wami aanan ana logugui i ola hiwe . Ami kaliko nuku hipwa bubun , aemiu aana nuku pahe , ge wami suki nuku pihikan nimamiwa yaka bosowaimiu egon . Ge nuku aanan pwamweyaha . Nopalegi hagalena to nau Yehoba kaiweu .
02012012	“ Bulin toto o Itipita na nosolaan , yaka gamagal ge bwasumu gamaun melutauil na lolil , inoke yabowaineyau bolo Itipita hi kululuek elal alaliya na teli lowan . Nau Yehoba .
02012013	Saliya toto nog kokowanaa ge ana ai labi labui elana ni tabwa limi toto ku miminaa ali etotohi . Sauga saliya na kite , inoke na nopalegemiu . Inoke sauga toto Itipita na lolil , logabola nanakina ya komiu nige nuku pwapwawa .
02012014	“ Lan ya nuku nuwahikan , yaka eliyana heyan ge heyan hagali nuku ginol nau Yehoba o nuwahikan kaiwena . Ami logugui o ni mihot .
02012015	Pwalawa toto nige alona yis hi vivikuhiya nuku an lan ali gewi seben . Lan houwan elana , yis gegewena nuku bugul yohil wami limiya , kaiwena lan houwan ana siga lan sebenina ebo etega pwalawa toto alona yis hi vivikuhiya ni an , iya nige no gamagal i oola .
02012016	Lan houwan i ola al lan sebenina nuku nogogo ge nuku tapwalolo . Lan bolo ya bahi tuwalali , iyai te amiu nuku ligaliga .
02012017	Pwalawa nige alona yis hi vivikuhiya hagalena nuku ginol , kaiwena lan o gegewemiu ya nul tagilagimiu Itipita . Heyan ge heyan hagali toto e ana nuwahikan nuku ginol . Ami logugui o ni mihot .
02012018	Inoke waikena houwan ana lan potinina ( 14 ) kokoyavi ana siga lan tuwenti wanina ( 21 ) kokoyavi , pwalawa toto nige alona yis hi vivikuhiya nuku an .
02012019	Inoke lan seben bahi yis ni gagan wami limiya . Ebo towoho o ebo bwabwali etega pwalawa toto alona yis hi vikuhiya ni an , iya nige no gamagal i oola .
02012020	Hauna labi nuku minaa , pwalawa toto nige alona yis hi vivikuhiya nuku anan . Bahi pwalawa toto alona yis hi vikuhiya nuku aan . ”
02012021	Yaka Mosese Isileli wali tonowakau i yogaagil ge i baek elal i ba , “ Maisena ge maisena nuku nok sipi o ebo goti natuna nuku hile alomiyau natumiyau kaiwemiu , yaka nuku tagapaaliga Nopalegi bwasumona kaiwena .
02012022	Bwasumu saliyana nuku hol mwaha elana , yaka mwawin alana hisopa nuku pikin ge nuku pahunek saliya ana mwaha gamwanaa , inoke nuku abutek wami limi ana nog kokowanaa ge ana ai labi labui elana . Bahi etega nuku tatagil limiya ana siga mweluluga .
02012023	Sauga Yehoba ni nosola Itipita ni lolil , he saliya ni kite nog kokowanaa ge ana ai labi labui elalil , yaka limi ni nopalegi . Yaomal ana Anelose nige ni uulutuk wami limiya ge ni lololimiu .
02012024	“ Logugui ya ni mihot , inoke sauga gegewena alomiyau ge tubutubumiyau nuku henapuan .
02012025	Sauga nuku tuka panuwa toto Yehoba i bateli ni pewa eliyamiu , yaka nuku ginol ni ola to .
02012026	Sauga ebo natumiyau nihi nel nihi ba , ‘ Hagali ya puna ga i ola ? ’
02012027	yaka analiya nuku lahe nuku ba , ‘ Nopalegi hagalena te Yehoba ta nuwahikan , kaiwena valila Itipita elana Isileli wala limi i nopalegel , yaka Itipita i lolil ge kila i pwamolola . ’ ” Mosese wana baaba o Isileli hi hago , yaka hi loepwakoku ge hi tapwalolo .
02012028	Inoke hi ginol i ola Yehoba wana baaba Mosese ge Eloni elal .
02012029	Bulin nuwana , Yehoba Itipita ali gamaun melutauil i lolil gegewel hi aliga , i telipunaa kin towasawasa natuna elana i na ana siga todibula natuna . I ola al bwasumu ali gamaun gegewel hi aliga .
02012030	Bulin o , kin alonau ana tolabe ge Itipita gegewel hi kenu lut . Yaka kahin bwabwatana i masala Itipita , kaiwena limi maisena ge maisena aliga nige i kakala .
02012031	Bulin maisena o elana , kin Mosese ge Eloni i yogaagil ge i baek elal i ba , “ Nuku egon ! Alomiyau ge Isileli no panuwa ku eguluwan ! Ku na ku tapwalolo Yehoba elana ni ola wami awanun elau .
02012032	Wami sipi , goti ge bulumwakau nuku ahel ni ola wami baaba , yaka nuku egon . He nuku awanun al Yehoba ni muloluagau . ”
02012033	Itipita Isileli hi patotoel etimwawa wali panuwa nihi eguluwan ge hi baek elal hi ba , “ Ebo nuku mina , nasi naha aliga haba ! ”
02012034	He pwalawa iyaka hi pahun , yaa nigeya ga yis hi tetelek , inoke ginebi ana etuwalali hi bugulan , kaliko elana hi osiya ge hi kalivai .
02012035	Yaka Isileli hi ginol ola valila Mosese wana baaba elal , hi na tuwan ana isela gold ge silba ginebi ge kaliko waiwaisana hi awanunil Itipita elal .
02012036	Yehoba Itipita ateliya i pameimei Isileli hi awatauwagil , inoke wali bugubugul hi pek elal i ola wali awanun . Yaka Isileli Itipita wali gogomwau hi bugul egonan .
02012037	Yaka Isileli Lamesese hi tataluwan hi na Sukot . Bolau ali gewi i ola sikis handeled tausan ( 600,000 ) , yaa yowau ge wawayau nige hi vavasilel .
02012038	Gamagalau getogal hi gewi avaliyau Isileli hi egonan . Isileli wali sipi , goti ge bulumwakau ali yawi bwabwatal hi ahel avaliyau hi tagil .
02012039	Pwalawa nige alona yis hi vivikuhiya toto hi pwatanem Itipita , hi ahe hi ton ali beleid . He ali pwalawa nige ga alona yis hi vivikuhu , kaiwena Itipita hi patuna owaowa-agil inoke nige wali sauga ge aliya nihi lovivina-an bubun .
02012040	Isileli wali minamina Itipita elana baliman ana gewi po handeled ge teti ( 430 ) .
02012041	Baliman po handeled ge teti ana lan mowamowasena elana te Yehoba wana gamagalau ali un gegewel hi tagilem Itipita .
02012042	Bulin o Yehoba i silawa ge i nulil tagilagil Itipita . Inoke baliman maisena maisena bulin toto o Isileli heyan ge heyan nihi silawa Yehoba ana nuwahikan kaiwena .
02012043	He liwanina i ola to . Yehoba i baek Mosese ge Eloni elal i ba , “ Nopalegi hagalena ana logugui i ola hiwe . “ Bolo nige boda Isileli i oola bahi nihi aan .
02012044	He wami totuwalali loloyowanina toto iyaka ku pwamola bosowaina ni an , ebo tuwana buhuna kunisina iyaka ku tomwa yoho .
02012045	Yaa tonawanawa ge totuwalali molana gaganina bolo sauga kaukaubwana ya hi miminaa gamwamiwa , bahi nihi aan .
02012046	“ Nopalegi hagalena bwasumona maisena nuku anana limi maisena gamwanaa . Bahi ginolina etega nuku tatagilan limi o tolinaa ge bahi tutuwana etega nuku gagabom .
02012047	Boda Isileli gegewel hagali ya nihi ginol .
02012048	“ Bwabwali toto i miminaa wami panuwaa , ebo nuwana Nopalegi Hagalena ni ginol Yehoba ana awatauwan kaiwena , he bolau gegewel wana limi ana heniheni gamwaliyaa gotomwa yoho paganina nihi ahe . Ebo ni ola o , inoke bosowaina hagali enowana ni anan ni ola Isileli towohina hot . Yaa bolo nige gotomwa yoho paganina hi aahe , bahi nihi aan .
02012049	Towoho ge bwabwali bolo hi miminaa wami panuwaa , ami logugui i maisena ya . ”
02012050	He Isileli gegewel hi ginol ola Yehoba wana baaba Mosese ge Eloni eliyalil .
02012051	Yaka lan o eliyana Yehoba Isileli ali un i nulil tagilagil Itipita .
02013001	Yaka Yehoba i baek Mosese elana i ba ,
02013002	“ Gamaun melutauil gegewel nuku pwabwabwalena-agil elau . Komiu Isileli ami gamaun ge wami bwasumu ali gamaun gegewel nau kaiweu . ”
02013003	Yaka Mosese i baek gamagal elal i ba , “ Lan ya hagalena nuku mimi awaawaginol wami abanuwahikan , kaiwena lan ya elana Yehoba alona wana gasisi i ahemiu ku tagilem Itipita wami abaloloyowana . He ebo lan ya nuku mipwawa , bahi pwalawa alona yis hi vikuhiya nuku aan .
02013004	Lan ebe waikena Abib * gamwanaa Itipita ku eeguluwan .
02013005	He Yehoba i bateli tubumiyau elal Kenani , Hiti , Amoli , Pelisi , Hivi ge Yebusi wali labi ni pewa eliyamiu . Inoke sauga ni nul tukagimiu labi malumalulina o eliyana , hagali nuku ginol baliman maisena maisena ana waikena houwan elana ni ola hiwe .
02013006	Pwalawa toto nige alona yis hi vivikuhiya nuku anan lan ana gewi seben , inoke lan mowamowasena elana hagali nuku ginol Yehoba kaiwena .
02013007	Pwalawa toto nige alona yis hi vivikuhiya nuku anan lan seben o gamwaliyaa . Bahi yis o ebo pwalawa alona yis hi vikuhu ni gagan wami panuwaa .
02013008	Hagali ana lan elana nuku baek natumiyau elal nuku ba , ‘ Ginol ya ta ginol , kaiwena Yehoba ta nuwahikan hauna i ginol kaiwela sauga ta tagilem Itipita . ’
02013009	Hagali ya wami abanuwahikan , ni ola etotohi hi teli nimamiwa o ebo lamwamiwa . Ni panuwahikagimiu Yehoba wana Logugui nuku baubaunan , kaiwena Yehoba alona wana gasisi i ahemiu ku tagilem Itipita .
02013010	Baliman maisena maisena logugui ya nuku ginol hikahikani ana sauga hot elana .
02013011	“ Sauga Yehoba ni nulimiu nuku tuka Kenani wali labiya ge ni pewa eliyamiu , i ola wana bateli eliyamiu ge tubumiyau elal ,
02013012	inoke natumiyau gamaun melutauil ge wami bwasumu ali gamaun melutauil nuku guyauan Yehoba elana . * He bolo ya gegewel heliya Yehoba kaiwena .
02013013	Sipi natuna nuku ahe donki natuna gamaun nuku pwamola pasikal . Ebo nige nuku pwapwamola pasikal , inoke mwamwalina nuku tagaapwal . Natumiyau bolau gamwaliyaa gamaun gegewel nuku pwamola pasikalil .
02013014	Bwaliga ebo natumiyau nihi nel eliyamiu nihi ba , ‘ Ginol ya ana sapu ga i ola ? ’ yaka nuku baek elal nuku ba , ‘ Yehoba wana gasisi elana i ahela ta tagilem Itipita wala abaloloyowana .
02013015	Itipita wali kin atena i pagasisi ge i lopwalila bahi ta eegon , inoke Yehoba Itipita ali gamaun ge wali bwasumu ali gamaun gegewel i lolil . Heiya te kaiwena bwasumu ali gamaun melutauil gegewel ta powonagil Yehoba elana , ge natulau gamaun ta pwamola pasikalil . ’
02013016	Ginol ya wami abanuwahikan , ni ola etotohi hi teli nimamiwa o ebo lamwamiwa . Ni panuwahikagimiu Yehoba alona wana gasisi i ahemiu ku tagilem Itipita . ”
02013017	Sauga Itipita wali kin gamagal i talamwagil hi egon , Yabowaine nige i nunulil hi nonoek kamwasa kaukaubwana elana , labi Pilisitiya gamwanaa . Kaiwena Yabowaine i ba , “ Ebo gamagalau haveyan nihi pwawa , tab abwe wali nuwatu nihi pil ge nihi sikal Itipita ? ”
02013018	Yaa Yabowaine i nul painagil hi noek Hoga Keketina ana kamwasaa ula kekevana gamwanaa . He sauga Isileli hi tagilem Itipita , wali elohaveyan iyaka hi lovivina-an nonowe .
02013019	Mosese Yosepa tutuwana i noahe , kaiwena valila Yosepa i ba Isileli nihi bateli nihi ginol ola . Valila Yosepa i ba , “ Tunahot Yabowaine ni matahikagimiu ge ni ahemiu nuku na labi o elana , inoke nuku papasila te sauga o elana tutuwau al nuku kalivai . ”
02013020	Isileli Sukot hi eguluwan hi na hi holaviya Etama ula kekevana bebenaa .
02013021	Lana Yehoba i houwaagil i miminaa yaluyalu i milil i ola kokola elana ge kamwasa i pankitel . Bulina i houwaagil i miminaa ginaha i milil i ola kokola elana ge kamwasa i pwamwananal . Inoke bosowailiya lana ge bulina nihi nawanawa .
02013022	Lana yaluyalu i milil i ola kokola ge bulina ginaha i milil i ola kokola , sauga gegewena hi miminaa gamagalau awoliyaa .
02014001	Yaka Yehoba i baek Mosese elana i ba ,
02014002	“ Nu ba Isileli elal , nihi nopil nihi na nihi holaviya Pi Hahilot labenaa , Migadol ge Hoga Keketina ali nuwanuwanaa . Nihi holaviya hoga bebenaa , ge Bal Sepon ni minek hoga labi etega al .
02014003	Yaka kin ni nuwatu ni ba , ‘ Isileli nuwaliya i gewagewa ge hi nonobwagabwaga ya . Nige wali abanok , kaiwena ula kekevana i kausil . ’
02014004	Atena na pagasisi inoke ni tatauliulil-agimiu , yaa alonau wana tolohaveyan na lakel ge wasau ni lelu . Yaka Itipita nihi atena te nau Yehoba . ” Inoke Isileli hi ginol ola to .
02014005	Sauga Itipita wali kin i hago gamagalau iyaka hi egonan , inoke alonau ana tolabe wali nuwatu hi pil ge hi ba , “ I bwe ta ginol ola ! Isileli iyaka ta talamwagil hi egon , yaka nige al nihi tutuwalali kaiwela ! ”
02014006	Inoke kin wana waga momomol ge wana tolohaveyan i lovivina-agil .
02014007	Waga momomol bolo waiwaisal ali gewi sikis handeled ( 600 ) ge Itipita ana waga momomol gegewel al , ginebi ali tomatahikan , i ahel alonau .
02014008	Yehoba kin atena i pagasisi , inoke kin i tatauliulil Isileli eliyaa , heliya aloliya wali atimatuwa hi nawanawa .
02014009	Itipita ana tolohaveyan , ginebi wali hosi ge waga momomol gegewel ge ali tomatahikan , Isileli hi tataulilil-agil . Inoke hi kukuhikagil wali abaholaviya Hoga Keketina bebenaa Pi Hahilot labenaa , ge Bal Sepon i minek hoga labi etega al .
02014010	Sauga Isileli hi kite kin alonau wana tolohaveyan iyaka hi nopakelakelaubwa hi nenem eliyaa , inoke hi lovakun ge labe kaiwena hi yoga ha Yehoba elana .
02014011	Yaka hi baek Mosese elana hi ba , “ Ga i ola ! Age nige salai i gagana Itipita ge u ahema ha nem ula kekevana elana naha yaomal ? I bwe ge matama u pwamwa ha tagilem Itipita ?
02014012	Iyaka ha pwawa i ola valila ha ba haba elam Itipita , ha ba , ‘ U telema ya naha tuwalali Itipita elal . ’ Binimala naha tuwalali kaiweliya , inoke nige naha yayaomal ula kekevana elana . ”
02014013	Yaka analiya Mosese i lahe i ba , “ Bahi lovakun ! Ku milil gagasisi , inoke nuku kite Yehoba hauna ni ginol ge ni pwamwalimiu lan ebe . Itipita bolo ya ku kita pwamwatomwal , nige al nuku kikitel .
02014014	Yehoba iya ni lohaveyan kaiwemiu , yaa komiu nuku mibabakuhu ya . ”
02014015	Yaka Yehoba i baek Mosese elana i ba , “ Ga i ola ge labe kaiwena ku yoga eliyau ? U ba Isileli nihi nawa nok awoliyaa .
02014016	Wam suki u latahin ge u paeluek hogaa , inoke ni maleli ge Isileli nihi nosola nuwanuwanaa datu pwatanaa .
02014017	Itipita ateliya na pagasisi , inoke nihi tatauliulil emiwa , yaka abwe kin alonau wana tolohaveyan , wana waga momomol ge ali tomatahikan , na lakel ge wasau ni lelu .
02014018	Na lakel inoke nihi atena te nau Yehoba . ”
02014019	Yaka Yabowaine wana anelose , iya i miminaa boda Isileli awoliyaa , i sikal i na eliyaa . I ola al yaluyalu i milil i ola kokola i sikal i na eliyaa ,
02014020	i miminaa boda Itipita ge boda Isileli ali hawawala . Inoke bulin bwabwaligena yaluyalu Itipita i pagogouil , yaa Isileli i pwamwananalil , yaka bulin o nige bosowailiya nihi petupatupa-agil .
02014021	Mosese nimana i paeluek hogaa , inoke bulin bwabwaligena Yehoba babaliman gasigasisena i patowa hoga i yu pamaleli ge nuwanuwana i dato .
02014022	Inoke Isileli hi nosola datu pwatanaa , hoga i talmilil i ola baba labena awoliyaa ge gegebaliyaa .
02014023	Yaka Itipita avaliyau wali hosi ge waga momomol gegewel ge ali tomatahikan , hi tatauliulil Isileli eliyaa hi na hi ulutuk hogaa .
02014024	Kelaubwa lan ni gan , Yehoba i minaa yaluyalu ge ginaha hi milil i ola kokola elana inoke matana i lilowana Itipita eliyalil ge nuwaliya i pagewagewa .
02014025	Yaka wali waga momomol ali wil i patalsup ge ali momomol i pulowan . Yaka Itipita hi ba , “ Ta egonan ! Yehoba Isileli i label ge i lohaveyan elala . ”
02014026	Yaka Yehoba i baek Mosese elana i ba , “ Nimwam u paeluek hogaa , inoke hoga ni bini sikal Itipita avaliyau wali waga momomol ge ali tomatahikan ni yabomwil . ”
02014027	Yaka lan i gan Mosese nimana i paeluek hogaa , inoke hoga i bini sikal abanaa . Itipita nuwaliya nihi lou , yaa Yehoba i aliyohiliek hogaa .
02014028	Hoga i sikal , inoke Itipita ana tolohaveyan ginebi wali waga momomol ge ali tomatahikan , bolo hi tatauliulil hi ulutuk hogaa , gegewel i yabomwil , nige etega i mwamwal .
02014029	He Isileli hi nosola datu pwatanaa , hoga i talmilil i ola baba labena awoliyaa ge gegebaliyaa .
02014030	Inoke lan o Yehoba Isileli i pwamwalil Itipita nimaliyaa , ge Isileli Itipita bwaliwawagal * hi kitel gilesaa .
02014031	Sauga Isileli Yehoba wana gasisi bwabwatana hi kite Itipita i pakokovel , inoke hi lovakunan , yaka hi melteli iya ge wana totuwalali Mosese elal .
02015001	Yaka Mosese alonau Isileli wona ya hi wonaan Yehoba elana : Na wona Yehoba elana kaiwena Itipita i pakokovel hoti , hosi ge ali tomatahikan i aliyohiliek hogaa .
02015002	Yehoba iya o libu gasigasisena , iya i pwamwalau . Iya no Yabowaine , inoke na tobalan , iya nam wana Yabowaine , inoke na lowasawasa-an .
02015003	Yehoba iya toasiyala ; iya alana Yehoba , iyoho ya i gangan .
02015004	Kin wana tolohaveyan ge wana waga momomol i aliyohiliek hogaa ; wana toematana waiwaisal hi ununa Hoga Keketina .
02015005	Hoga i yabomwil ; i ola pat hi lobek limwana .
02015006	Yehoba , nimwam awom ana gasisi i bwata ; Yehoba , nimwam awom topihigelgel i tagalekaleka-agil .
02015007	Wam gasisi eliyana am topihigelgel u bwata lakel ; wam huga i tau i ola ginaha ge hi kalas haba hi ola musamusa .
02015008	Wam yana eliyana hoga u huven papahe ; i milil sapu i ola baba ; hoga limwalimwanina i milil i gasisi .
02015009	Ama topihigelgel hi hanaha hi ba , “ Ta tatauliulil-agil inoke ta kukuhikagil , ge wali gogomwau ta ahe ta guyauan , he toto nuwala gegewena ta bugulan . Haveyan kilepana ta ahe inoke ta apapanak-agil . ”
02015010	Yehoba , wam yana elana hoga u huven yaka i yabomwil , hi lobek hi ola patbon hoga lolovakunina elana .
02015011	Yehoba , henala eba ni ola owa yabowaine ona gamwaliyaa ? Nige etega . Henala eba ni ola owa , kaiwena u bwabwalena hot ? Nige etega . Henala eba i bosowaina ginol yawiyawi gasigasisena ni ginol ni ola owa ? Nige etega .
02015012	Nimwam awom u paelu , yaka bilibili ama topihigelgel i tinonil .
02015013	Yaka u pwamwalima inoke alona wam nunuwana nu houwa-agima , wam gasisi elana nu nulima ge naha tuka panuwa toto aloma owa ta minaa .
02015014	Panuwa ona wasa nihi hago , yaka alona wali lovakun nihi ginuginu . Lovakun Pilisitiya ni yowanil ,
02015015	panuwa Idom ana tonowakau ateliya ni bwanabwana , Mowabi ana toasiyalau nihi ginuginu , ge Kenani gamagaliliyau tuwaliya ni sasawowol .
02015016	Lovakun ge ati bwanabwana nihi kalaopopwi . Yehoba , wam gasisi nihi kite yaka nihi mibabakuhu ana siga naha nopalegel , ama wam gamagal bolo u pwamwalima .
02015017	Inoke abwe nu ahema ge nu en telema wam oya elana . Yehoba , panuwa o iyaka u hile wam abamina , labi bwabwalena toto Babala totom u ginol .
02015018	Yehoba , owa nu tologugui sauga gegewena nige ni momowasi .
02015019	He Isileli hoga hi nosolaan hi nawaa datu pwatanaa , yaa sauga Itipita wali waga momomol ginebi wali hosi ge ali tomatahikan hi ulutuk hogaa , yaka Yehoba hoga i pabini pasikal ge i yabomwil .
02015020	Inoke Eloni nuna Miliyami , iya palopita , wana tambalin i ahe , yaka evenakau gegewel i houwaagil ginebi wali tambalin hi sagasaga .
02015021	Miliyami i wona i ola : Ku wona Yehoba elana kaiwena Itipita i pakokovel hoti , hosi ge ali tomatahikan i aliyohiliek hogaa .
02015022	Yaka Mosese Isileli i nulil Hoga Keketina hi tataluwai hi noek Sula Ulaina elana , labi kekekevana . Lan eton hi nawanawa uleya , yaa nige wewel etega hi pwapwawa .
02015023	Sauga hi vin panuwa Mala , he wewelina amnana i nak , yaka nige bosowailiya nihi im . ( Heiya te kaiwena alana hi tun Mala . ) *
02015024	Yaka gamagalau Mosese hi lovehawol-an , ge hi nel hi ba , “ Hauna ta im e ? ”
02015025	Yaka Mosese i awanun nabinabi Yehoba elana , inoke Yehoba ebwakil etega i pankite ge i ahe i alilowana wewela , yaka wewel amnana i waisi . He panuwa o elana Yehoba Isileli ali logugui i pek ge i labosel .
02015026	I ba , “ Ebo nau Yehoba wami Yabowaine anau nuku hago bubun , wami ginol ni sapu matawa ge no logugui gegewena nuku henapuan , inoke gila ololana ya pek Itipita elal nige etega na pepewa . Nau Yehoba ami topwapwamolu . ”
02015027	Yaka abwe hi na Ilima . He wewel bwanapitpit elulutega eluwa ( 12 ) ge deit puna sebenti ( 70 ) heliya iyoho to , inoke hi holaviya wewel bebenaa .
02016001	Isileli ali boda Ilima hi tataluwai , inoke waikena eluwana ana lan piptinina hi na hi vin Sini Ulaina elana , Ilima ge Sainai ali luwaluwala .
02016002	He Isileli ali boda heliya iyoho to ula kekevana elana , yaka Mosese ge Eloni hi lovehawol-agil
02016003	hi ba , “ Binimala Yehoba ni lolima Itipita . Valila ama lolan i bwaya ge aanan nige bosowaima naha an haba . Yaa komiu ku ahema ha nem ula kekevana ya elana inoke galebu kaiwena gegewema naha aliga . ”
02016004	Yaka Yehoba i baek Mosese elana i ba , “ Sauga ya aanan na ligin paloem labulabumwa kaiwemiu . Lan maisena maisena gamagalau nihi tagilan lan maisena ana luvi nihi ahe . Inoke eliyana na labosel ebo no logugui nihi henapuan o ebo nigeya .
02016005	Lan sikisina elana lan labui ana luvi nihi ahe ge nihi lovivina-an . ”
02016006	Inoke Mosese ge Eloni hi baek Isileli gegewel elal hi ola , “ Nasi kokoyavi nuku atena te Yehoba heiya te i ahemiu ku tagilem Itipita .
02016007	I ola al , mweluluga Yehoba mwananalina namanamalina nuku kite , kaiwena wami lovehawol iya eliyana iyaka i hago . He ama wana totuwalali ya , inoke nige ku lolovehawal eliyama . ”
02016008	Yaka Mosese i ba vevehe al i ba , “ Yehoba iya kokoyavi ami lolan ni pewa ge mweluluga aanan ni bwata ni pewa , kaiwena wami lovehawol iya eliyana iyaka i hago . Ama nige ku lovehawol-agima , Yehoba te ku lovehawol-an . ”
02016009	Yaka Mosese i baek Eloni elana i ba , “ U ba Isileli ali boda elal nihi nem nihi talmilila Yehoba awonaa , kaiwena wali hawohawol iyaka i hago . ”
02016010	He Eloni iyoho i baaba Isileli ali boda elal , yaka mataliya hi lipwatanik ula kekevana elana ge Yehoba mwananalina namanamalina hi kite i masala yaluyaluwa .
02016011	Yaka Yehoba i baek Mosese elana i ba ,
02016012	“ Isileli wali hawohawol iyaka ya hago . He nu baek elal nu ba , ‘ Vekokoyavi lolan nuku an ge mweluluga aanan ni bwata nuku an . Inoke nuku atena te nau Yehoba wami Yabowaine . ’ ”
02016013	Kokoyaviya bwasumu kuweli * ali yawi bwabwatana hi you vin abaholavi hi pakalaopop . Mweluluga bekubeku hunhunina abaholavi i yao painan bilibili pwatanaa .
02016014	Sauga bekubeku hunhunina i kevakeva , yaka bugul etega i masal bilibili pwatanaa , i alalavi ge i lokekeisi .
02016015	Sauga Isileli hi kite , yaka hi penelnel-agil hi ba , “ Hauna gun e ? ” kaiwena nige hi atena hauna eba o . Yaa Mosese i baek elal i ola , “ Aanan toto Yehoba i pewa amiu , heiya te .
02016016	Yehoba wana logugui i ola hiwe , ‘ Ami luvi toto bosowaimiu te nuku ahe . Wami limi ana heniheni gamagal maisena maisena ana luvi kom eit * nuku ahe . ’ ”
02016017	Yaka Isileli hi na hi ahe i ola to . Enuna i bwata hi ahe ge enuna nige i bwabwata hi ahe .
02016018	Yaa sauga eluviluvi elana hi luvi , gegewel hi ahe bubun . Bolo i bwata hi ahe ali luvi nige i lilika , ge bolo nige i bwabwata hi ahe ali luvi nige i lalau . Gegewel hi ahe paolaolaek wali limi ana heniheni ana luvi .
02016019	Yaka Mosese i baek elal i ba , “ Bahi etega nuku aan teli bwaligumwa kaiwena . ”
02016020	Yaa enuna Mosese anana nige hi hahago , yaka awalehina hi an teli . Lan i gan iyaka i kinol ge i bweyan , inoke Mosese i huga eliyalil .
02016021	Mweluluga gegewena gamagal maisena ge maisena i ahe paolaolaek wana limi ana heniheni ana luvi . Sauga sabwelu iyaka i kalakalas , toto nige hi aahe i wayui .
02016022	Lan sikisina elana lan labui ana luvi hi ahe , gamagal maisena ge maisena ana luvi kom sikistin ( 16 ) hi ahe . Yaka boda wali tohouwa hi nem Mosese wana wasa hi pek .
02016023	Inoke i baek elal i ba , “ Yehoba wana logugui i ola hiwe , ‘ Bwaligumwa Sabwata lan veyaho , i bwabwalena Yehoba elana . Toto ku uumun , nuku umun , ge toto ku liliga , nuku liga . He toto nuku an teli , nuku teli bwaligumwa kaiwena . ’ ”
02016024	Inoke hi ginol ola Mosese wana baaba . Enuna hi teli ana siga mweluluga , yaa nige i kikinol ge nige i bwebweyan .
02016025	Yaka Mosese i baek elal i ba , “ Lan ebe aanan ya nuku an , kaiwena Sabwata veyaho ana lan te , i bwabwalena Yehoba elana . Lan ya nige aanan etega nuku pwapwawa bilibili pwatanaa .
02016026	Lan sikis amiu nuku ahiahi , yaa lan sebenina elana , lan Sabwata , nige aanan etega nuku pwapwawa . ”
02016027	Yaa lan sebenina elana gamagal enuna hi tagil hi na tage aliya nihi ahi , yaa nige etega hi pwapwawa .
02016028	Inoke Yehoba i baek Mosese elana i ba , “ Hauna sauga abwe no logugui nuku henapuan ?
02016029	Nuku nuwahikan nau Yehoba lan veyaho ya pewa , inoke lan sikisina elana amiu na pewa lan eluwa ana luvi . Lan sebenina elana maisena maisena ni minaa abanaa , bahi etega ni tatagil . ”
02016030	Inoke lan sebenina elana gamagalau hi veyaho .
02016031	He Isileli aanan alana hi tun manna . * Ana awa i ola pwatum yayanana etega , ge amnana i ola bisket alona luvi hi vikuhu .
02016032	Mosese i ba , “ Yehoba wana logugui i ola hiwe , ‘ Manna kom eit nuku teli hikan ha mul kaiweliya . Inoke aanan nihi kite , toto ya pewa ku anana uleya sauga ya ahe tagilagimiu Itipita . ’ ”
02016033	Inoke Mosese i baek Eloni elana i ba , “ Manna kom eit nu wage , nu usan ulugomwa gamwanaa , inoke nu teliya Yehoba matanaa ha mul kaiweliya . ”
02016034	Inoke Eloni i ginol ola Yehoba wana baaba Mosese elana . Manna i usan ulugomwa gamwanaa ge sauga mulaa i teli Bateli ana Dedewaga gamwanaa pat mamanana sasapona labui awoliyaa , bolo logugui ana leleli i gana tuwaliyaa .
02016035	Isileli manna hi anan uleya baliman ana gewi poti ( 40 ) ana siga hi vin labi Kenani .
02016036	( He wali eluviluvi ipah * gamwanaa , omel ali gewi elulutega . )
02017001	Isileli ali boda Sini Ulaina hi eguluwai , inoke hi nawanawa panuwa ge panuwa elal i ola Yehoba wana baaba . Hi holaviya Lepidim , yaa nige ali wewel im i gagan .
02017002	Yaka Mosese hi lovehawol-an hi ba , “ Wewel nu pem naha im . ” Analiya Mosese i lahe i ba , “ Ga i ola ku lovehawol-agau ? Ga i ola Yehoba ku labose ? ”
02017003	Yaa gamagalau hi walem nabi , inoke Mosese hi hawolan hi ba , “ I bwe u ahema ha tagilem Itipita ? He nasi alomeyau natumeyau ge wama bwasumu naha aliga walem kaiwena . ”
02017004	Yaka Mosese i awanun nabinabi Yehoba elana i ba , “ Ga na ginol ola gamagalau ya elal ? Kelaubwa nihi loipat-agau . ”
02017005	Yaka Yehoba Mosese anana i lahe i ba , “ Alomwau Isileli wali tonowakau enuna ku notagil gamagalau awoliyaa , ge suki toto Naile u lololiya nu noahe .
02017006	Na talmilila awomwa pat pwatanaa oya Sainai . Pat nu lol , inoke wewel ni sani tagil gamagalau nihi im . ” Inoke Mosese i ginol ola to Isileli wali tonowakau mataliyaa .
02017007	Yaka panuwa alana i tun Masa ge Meliba , * kaiwena Isileli hi hawohawol ge Yehoba hi labose , sauga toto hi nel hi ba , “ Yehoba iyahe avala o ebo nigeya ? ”
02017008	Sauga Isileli heliya iyoho panuwa Lepidim , inoke Amaleki hi nem hi lohaveyan elal .
02017009	Yaka Mosese i baek Yosuwa elana i ba , “ Bolau enuna nu hilel ge ku na alomiyau Amaleki nuku lohaveyan . Bwaligumwa nau na talmilila oyaa ge suki toto Yehoba i pem na pihikan . ”
02017010	Yosuwa i ginol ola Mosese wana baaba , inoke hi na avaliyau ge Amaleki hi lohaveyan . Yaa Mosese alonau Eloni ge Huli hi na hi ha oyaa .
02017011	Sauga ebo Mosese nimana i lalatahin inoke Isileli hi gagasisi , sauga ebo nimana i teteli lowan inoke Amaleki hi gagasisi .
02017012	Mosese nimana i alaliga , inoke pat hi teli ge i misiyowa pwatanaa . Yaka Eloni ge Huli hi talmilila labena labui , nimana hi piheyagil , inoke nimana i mihot ana siga sabwelu i lobek .
02017013	Inoke Yosuwa Amaleki wali tolohaveyan i pakokovel .
02017014	Yaka Yehoba i baek Mosese elana i ba , “ Amaleki ku pakokovel liwanina nu leli lowan bukiya , ginebi ge no bateli toto ya ba : nau abwe Amaleki na apapanak-agil hoti ge nige al wasaliya ni gagan panayawiya . Nu leli lowan wami abanuwahikan , inoke nu vasili Yosuwa ni hago . ”
02017015	Mosese abapowon pat i pahe inoke bwasumu i powonan Yehoba elana , yaka abapowon alana i tun , “ Yehoba o Toematana . ”
02017016	I ba , “ Yehoba ala toematana ni houwa-agila . Heyan ge heyan Yehoba ni lohaveyan Amaleki elal . ”
02018001	Mosese yawana Yetilo , Midiyani wali topowon , wasa i hago bugul gegewena Yabowaine i ginol wana gamagalau Isileli ge Mosese kaiweliya , sauga i nulil hi tagilem Itipita .
02018002	He valila Mosese lagona Sipola alonau natunau bolau eluwa i patunal hi sikal yawana elana ge i matahikagil .
02018003	( Mosese natuna gamaun alana i tun “ Gesomi , ” * kaiwena i ba , “ Panuwa getoga elana ya mibwabwali . ”
02018004	Natuna eluwana alana i tun “ Eliyesa , ” * kaiwena i ba , “ Nam wana Yabowaine i labeyau inoke Itipita wali kin nige i lololau . ” )
02018005	Sauga Mosese alonau Isileli iyoho hi holaviya oya bwabwalena labenaa ula kekevana elana , yaka Yetilo alonau Mosese lagona ge natunau bolau eluwa , hi nok nihi na elana .
02018006	He mulaa abwe i vin , baaba i patuna Mosese elana i ba , “ Nau yawam , alowau lagom ge natumwau bolau eluwa ha nonowa . ”
02018007	Inoke Mosese i tagil i na yawana i kite , i kululu elana ge i nalo . Hi mulolu ge hi peliwaliwan-agil wali minamina kaiwena , yaka hi sikal hi na hi ulutuk Mosese wana epanapana gamwanaa .
02018008	Mosese bugul gegewena toto Yehoba i ginolil kin alonau Itipita gamagaliliyau eliyalil ge Isileli i pwamwalil , i wasaan Yetilo elana . I ola al pulowan toto hi pwawa kamwasaa ge Yehoba ga i pwamwalil ola i wasaan .
02018009	Yetilo wasa gegewena o i hago inoke i yaliyaya ,
02018010	ge i ba , “ Yehoba ta tobalan , kaiwena i pwamwalimiu kin ge Itipita gamagaliliyau elal . Yehoba ta tobalan , kaiwena wana gamagalau i pwamwalil Itipita nimaliyaa .
02018011	Iyaka ya atena Yehoba iya yabowaine gegewel i bwata lakel , kaiwena sauga Itipita Isileli hi apapanak-agil , inoke i pwamwalil . ”
02018012	Mosese yawana Yetilo bwasumu enuna i pwatanim , yaka maisena hi powon pwabwalige ge enuna hi powonagil al Yehoba elana . Yaka aanan hi ginol , inoke Eloni ge Isileli wali tonowakau gegewel hi nem avaliya Mosese yawana hi anan Yehoba matanaa .
02018013	Lan i gan inoke Mosese gamagalau i payatalal . He gamagalau Mosese hi milil painan mweluluga ana siga bulin i gan hi matamatan wali sauga kaiwena .
02018014	Sauga Mosese yawana i kite bugul gegewena toto Mosese i ginolil , inoke i neli i ba , “ Ga i ola ge bugul gegewena ya u giginol gamagalau kaiweliya ? Hauna kaiwena maisem tuwalali ya u ginol mwaumwau-an ge gamagalau hi milil painagiwa mweluluga ana siga bulin i gan hi matamatan yatala kaiwena ? ”
02018015	Anana Mosese i lahe i ba , “ Ya ginol ola o , kaiwena gamagalau hi nem eliyau nuwaliya Yabowaine wana nuwatu nihi atena .
02018016	Sauga ebo gamagalau labui bugul etega kaiwena nihi awabalgig , inoke nihi nem eliyau ge na payatalal , yaka Yabowaine anana ge wana logugui na ba pamasal elal . ”
02018017	Yaka Mosese yawana i ba , “ Kamwasa toto u ginol e nige i wawaisi .
02018018	Owa ge bolo hi nem eliyam tuwamiu ku paaliga . He tuwalali i pulowan hot , nige bosowaim maisem nu ginol .
02018019	Am henapu na baunan nu hago ! He Yabowaine alom ge ni labewa ! Owa nu tobaaba Yabowaine elana gamagalau kaiweliya , ge wali awabalgig nu pwatanik elana .
02018020	Yabowaine anana ge wana logugui nu pankitel , ge minamina waiwaisana ana kamwasa ge pagan bolo nihi ginol nu paatenal .
02018021	Yaa gamagalau toatena enuna nu hilel , bolo Yabowaine hi lovakunan , i bosowaina ali mel ta teli ge nige bosowaina gamagalau nuwaliya nihi gove gogomwau eliyalil . Nu hilel inoke nu telel gamagalau wali tohouwa , boda tausan wali tohouwa , boda handeled maisena wali tohouwa , boda pipti wali tohouwa ge boda elulutega wali tohouwa .
02018022	Gamagalau nihi payatalal sauga gegewena . Pulowan bwabwatal gegewena nihi pwatanim elam , yaa toto i mweyaha totoliya nihi pasapu . Pulowan nihi waliwali-an inoke ni mweyaha elam .
02018023	He Yabowaine wana nuwatu kaiwem i ola to . Ebo nu ginol ola o , nige tuwam ni alaliga , ge gamagalau ya gegewel nihi sikalan abaliyaa alona wali yaliyaya . ”
02018024	Mosese , yawana anana i hago ge i ginol ola wana baaba .
02018025	Gamagalau toatena enuna i hilel Isileli gamwaliya , inoke i telel boda tausan wali tohouwa , boda handeled maisena wali tohouwa , boda pipti wali tohouwa ge boda elulutega wali tohouwa .
02018026	Gamagalau hi papayatalal sauga gegewena . Pulowan bwabwatal gegewena hi pwatanik Mosese elana , yaa toto i mweyaha totoliya hi pasapu .
02018027	Yaka Mosese yawana i patuna i egon , i sikal i na wana panuwa .
02019001	Isileli Lepidim hi tataluwai hi na hi vin Sainai Ulaina kekevana elana . He valila Itipita hi eguluwan enaa , waikena etonina ana lan houwan te hi vin labi o elana . Inoke hi na hi holaviya oya Sainai awonaa .
02019002	
02019003	Inoke Mosese i na i ha oyaa Yabowaine elana . Yaka Yehoba i yogem oya pwatanaa Mosese elana i ba , “ Nu ba Isileli , Yakobo tubutubunau elal , nu ba ola hiwe .
02019004	‘ Yehoba i ba : Iyaka ku kite hauna ya ginol Itipita elal , i ola al ku atena ya kalivaimiu i ola magisubu natuna i kalivai openaa , ge ya ahemiu ku nem elau .
02019005	Inoke ebo anau nuku hago ge no logugui gegewena nuku henapuan , komiu no gamagalau . Panayawi mamanana nau no panayawi , yaa komiu no hilihili gamagaliliyau .
02019006	Komiu boda bwabwalena nau kaiweu , komiu nuku ola topowon ge no tuwalali bwabwalena nuku ginol . ’ He nu ba ola to Isileli eliyalil . ”
02019007	Inoke Mosese i sikal i lau , yaka i na Isileli wali tonowakau i yoga gogonil ge bugul gegewena toto Yehoba i baunan elana i wasaanik elal .
02019008	Gamagal gegewel anana hi lahe hi ba , “ Bugul gegewena toto Yehoba i baunan naha ginol . ” Inoke gamagal wali baaba Mosese i ahe ge i na ni wasaanik Yehoba elana .
02019009	Gamagal wali baaba i baunanik Yehoba elana , yaka Yehoba i baek elana i ba , “ Na nowa yaluyalu babalona elana , inoke gamagal anau nihi hago alou owa ta baaba ge nihi abulilewa elam sauga gegewena . ”
02019010	Inoke Yehoba i ba vevehe al i ba , “ Nu na gamagal elal , nu ba lan ya ge bwaligumwa nihi abubunil nihi yanayana ge ali kaliko nihi ul .
02019011	Nihi lovivina bolu kaiwena , inoke bolu nau Yehoba na lau oya Sainai elana gamagalau gegewel mataliyaa .
02019012	Siga nu ginol painan oya punaa , ge nu baek gamagalau elal nu ba , ‘ Nuku matahikagimiu bahi nuku haha oyaa o ebo puna nuku popoti . Ebo gamagal etega ni poti , nasi nihi lopaaliga .
02019013	Bahi nihi lilib , yaa nihi loipati , o ebo egipoyo elana nihi howa . He bahi tuwana nihi pipihikan . Bwasumu ge gamagal ali logugui i maisena ya , nihi aliga . ’ Yaa sauga ebo bwagigi hi yu hikan anana gamagalau nihi hago , yaka abwe bosowailiya nihi noha oya punaa . ”
02019014	Yaka Mosese i loem oyaa ge i baek gamagal elal i ba , “ Nuku abubunimiu nuku yanayana , ge ami kaliko nuku ul .
02019015	Nuku lovivina bolu kaiwena ge Yehoba ni lau nuku kite . Ge bahi alomiyau ge lagomiyau nuku kekenu toyawa . ”
02019016	Lan etonina elana mwelulugaa , panuwa i lopinamal ge i logulumwawa , yaka yaluyalu babalona i masala oyaa ge bwagigi anana bwabwatana hi hago . Inoke gamagal gegewel abaholaviya lovakun kaiwena hi ginu .
02019017	Yaka Mosese gamagalau i nulil hi tagilem abaholaviya hi na hi talmilil oya punaa ge avaliya Yabowaine nihi petupatupa-agil .
02019018	Yehoba i loek oya Sainai pwatanaa hiwo eliyana , inoke kasu oya i pahabobu . Kasu bwabwatana i haha i ola hiwo bwabwatana hi ton kasona , oya i lamwalamwaniu nabiyan ,
