02019019	ge bwagigi anana i bwabwata nawa . Inoke Mosese i baaba , yaka anana Yabowaine i lahe gulumwawa elana .
02019020	Inoke Yehoba i lau oya Sainai pwatanaa i ola to . Yaka i yoga Mosese elana ni na ni ha oyaa . Inoke i na i ha ,
02019021	ge Yehoba i baek elana i ba , “ Nu na nu lau ge gamagalau nu lopwalil bahi siga nihi lilikaan nihi nenem nihi kikiteyau . Ebo siga nihi likaan , nasi nihi gewi nihi aliga . ”
02019022	( Bwagana topowon , heliya hi noknok Yehoba elana , he houwan ga nihi pwabwabwalena-agil nihi yanayana . Ebo nigeya , alona wana huga ni lahel . )
02019023	Mosese i baek Yehoba elana i ba , “ Nige bosowaina gamagal nihi ha oyaa , kaiwena owa u ba , ‘ Oya u teli ni bwabwalena ge siga nu ginol painan . ’ ”
02019024	Anana Yehoba i lahe i ba , “ Nu lau ge Eloni nu en alom nuku nem . Yaa topowon ge gamagalau bahi siga nihi lilikaan ge nihi nenem elau , eba alou no huga na lahel . ”
02019025	Yaka Mosese i na i lau gamagalau elal ge wali wasa i pek hauna Yehoba i baunan elana .
02020001	Yabowaine i ba i ola hiwe ,
02020002	“ Nau Yehoba wami Yabowaine , ya ahemiwa Itipita wami abaloloyowana .
02020003	“ Bahi yabowaine etega al nuku kukululuek elana , nau maiseu ya .
02020004	“ Bahi gogoginol etega nuku giginol kaiwemiu , ebo labulabum bugulina kakanunina , ebo panayawi bugulina kakanunina , o ebo hoga bugulina kakanunina .
02020005	Bahi nuku kukululuek gogoginol etega elana o ebo nuku tatapwaloloek elana , kaiwena nau Yehoba wami Yabowaine nige ya tatalam o toawalaka ni gan . Lahi na pek o topihigelgel elal . Lahi ya ni kalapapanet natuliyau , tubuliyau ge tubuliyau natuliyau elal .
02020006	Yaa bolo hi nunuwana-agau ge no logugui hi henapuan , na nunuwana-agil heyan ge heyan nige ni momowasi .
02020007	“ Bahi nau Yehoba wami Yabowaine alau nuku lulumen bwabwage , kaiwena ebo etega alau ni lumen bwabwage abwe na lahe .
02020008	“ Lan Sabwata nuku nuwahikan ge nuku teli ni bwabwalena .
02020009	Wami tuwalali nuku ginol lan sikis gamwanaa ,
02020010	yaa lan sebenina elana lan veyaho i bwabwalena elau . Lan yaka bahi etega ni tutuwalali , ebo komiu , ebo natumiyau , ebo wami totuwalali , ebo wami bwasumu , o ebo bwabwali bolo hi miminaa wami panuwaa .
02020011	Nau Yehoba , panayawi , labulabum , hoga , ge buguliliyau gegewel ya ginolil lan sikis gamwanaa , yaa lan sebenina ya veyaho . Heiya te kaiwena lan Sabwata ya ba muloluan ge ya teli i bwabwalena .
02020012	“ Tamwam ge hinam nu awatauwagil , inoke yawalim ana minamina ni yapu panuwa toto na pewa elana .
02020013	“ Bahi taulol .
02020014	“ Bahi ganawal .
02020015	“ Bahi kaoma .
02020016	“ Bahi woliwoli kakakawi .
02020017	“ Alom wana limi , ebo lagona , ebo wana totuwalali bolau ge yowau , ebo wana bulumwakau , wana donki ge wana bugul gegewena , bahi etega matam ni momomoni-an . ”
02020018	He gamagalau gulumwawa ge bwagigi anana hi hago , i ola al pinamal ge oya i kasukasu hi kite , yaka lovakun kaiwena hi ginuginu . Inoke hi talmililek laha ,
02020019	ge hi baek Mosese elana hi ba , “ Owa nu baaba eliyama ge naha laegan elam . Yaa bahi Yabowaine totona ni baaba eliyama , eba naha aliga . ”
02020020	Analiya Mosese i lahe i ba , “ Bahi lovakun . Yabowaine i nem wana gasisi amnana nuku anbose , inoke iya ana lovakun ni minaa eliyamiu ge bahi nuku gegegi eliyana . ”
02020021	Yaa gamagalau iyoho ya hi milimilil laha , inoke Mosese maisena i noha yaluyalu babalona elana , toto Yabowaine i miminaa .
02020022	Yaka Yehoba i baek Mosese elana i ba , “ Nu baek Isileli elal ni ola hiwe . Bahi yabowaine etega al nuku giginol , nau maiseu ya . ” Yaka abwe i ba wali abapowon ga nihi tal ola iya ana tapwalolo kaiwena .

02023001	Yehoba logugui enuna i pek elal te wali ginol ni sapu sauga ebo avaliyau hi wasaagil ge ebo topayatala ni pakotil .

02023015

02023020	Yehoba i ba , “ No anelose na patuna ni houwa-agimiu ge ni ahemiu nuku tuk labi Kenani , yaka gamagaliliyau na takel awomiwa . Yaa nige na tatakel sauga pamaisena . Kekeisi kekeisi na takel awomiwa , ana siga labi gegewena nuku ahe . He nuku matahikagimiu bahi nuku tapwaloloek wali yabowaineyau elal ge bahi alomiyau nuku tutubwi pamaisena . ”
02023021

02024001	Yehoba i baek Mosese elana i ba , “ Alomwau Eloni , Nadab , Abihu ge Isileli wali tonowakau ali gewi sebenti nuku ha oyaa eliyau . Nuku minek laha ge nuku tapwalolo elau .
02024002	Owa maisem ya te bosowaim nu nem labewa , yaa alomwau bahi nihi nenem labewa , ge gamagalau bahi nihi haha oyaa . ”
02024003	Yaka Mosese i na i lau Yehoba wana baaba ge wana logugui gegewena i wasaanik gamagalau elal . Inoke gegewel pamaisena anana hi lahe hi ba , “ Bugul gegewena toto Yehoba i baunan naha ginol . ”
02024004	Inoke Mosese Yehoba wana baaba gegewena i leli lowan . Lan i gan mweluluga kekeisi i na oya punaa , yaka pat i pahe abapowon i ginol , ge pat elulutega eluwa al i pamilil , ali gewi i olaolaek Isileli ali un .
02024005	Yaka hevalau enuna i hilel ge i patunal bulumwakau hi powonagil Yehoba elana , enuna hi powon pwabwaligel ge enuna hi powonagil heliheliyam powonina .
02024006	Mosese bwasumu saliyaliya awalehina i ahe i holek mwaha gamwanaa , ge awalehina i ahe abapowon i hol seuseulan .
02024007	Yaka buki toto Yehoba wana bateli eliyalil ana logugui i leli lowana , i ahe i vasili gamagalau tanaliyaa . Yaka hi talam hi ba , “ Yehoba anana naha henapuan , ge bugul gegewena toto i baunan naha ginol . ”
02024008	Yaka Mosese saliya ana mwaha i ahe gamagalau i hol seuseul-agil , ge i ba , “ Saliya ya bateli toto alomiu Yehoba ku pebabateli-agimiu i patunahot . Bateli o ana logugui i ola baaba gegewena toto iyaka ya vasili eliyamiu . ”
02024009	Yaka Mosese alonau Eloni , Nadab , Abihu ge Isileli wali tonowakau ali gewi sebenti hi na hi ha oyaa ,
02024010	inoke Isileli wali Yabowaine hi kite . Aena gabulanaa bugul mamanana sasapona ana awa i ola pat sapaya , * ge i namanamal i ola alalati bwagatau labulabum namanamalina .
02024011	Yaa Yabowaine nige nak etega i giginol Isileli wali tonowakau elal . Hi kite , inoke hi anan ge hi im Yehoba matanaa . *
02024012	Yehoba i baek Mosese elana i ba , “ U nem u ha oyaa elau ge nu miminaa te . Pat mamanana sasapona labui abwe na pewa , toto gamagalau ali logugui ge ali ba pagasisi iyaka ya leli . ”
02024013	Mosese alona ana tolabe Yosuwa hi lovivina ge nihi ha oya bwabwalena .
02024014	Inoke Mosese i baek tonowakau elal i ba , “ Ku matamatan te abaholaviya ana siga naha sikalim . He Eloni ge Huli iyahei alomiyau , inoke ebo gamagalau labui bugul etega kaiwena nihi awabalgig , nihi nok nihi kitel . ”
02024015	Sauga Mosese i na i ha oyaa , yaka yaluyalu oya i yabom ,
02024016	ge Yehoba mwananalina namanamalina i lau oya Sainai . Isileli hi kite ana awa i ola ginaha tautauina oya pwatanaa . He lan sikis yaluyalu oya i kaus , ana siga lan sebenina elana abwe Yehoba i yogem yaluyalu gamwanaa Mosese elana .
02024017	
02024018	Yaka Mosese i nosola yaluyalu gamwanaa ge i na i ha oya pwatanaa . He i miminaa oyaa lan poti ge bulin poti .
02025001	Yehoba i baek Mosese elana i ba ,
02025002	“ Nu baek Isileli elal wali mulolu nihi pwatanim elau . Henala atena i talam , wana mulolu ni pwatanim ge nu ahe nau kaiweu . ” Yaka bugul bolo Isileli nihi pwatanim i baunanik , ololana gold , silba , kopa , hihiu kaliko waiwaisana kaiwena , ge bwasumu kunisina , i ola al ebwakil waiwaisana alana akesiya , enonu , mwawin bwaleliya waiwaisana ge pat waiwaisal . Yaka Yehoba i ba :
02025003	
02025004	
02025005	
02025006	
02025007	
02025008	“ Nu ba limi bwabwalena nihi tal kaiweu ge na miminaa gamwaliyaa .
02025009	Limi bwabwalena ya ginebi ge bugubugulina gegewena nuku ginol ni olaolaek toto na pankitewa . ” Aban Bwabwalena Hot gamwanaa Bateli ana Dedewaga hi teliya . Yehoba i ba dedewaga nihi ginol ebwakil alana akesiya ge gold elana . Yaka i ba :
02025010	Aban Bwabwalena Hot gamwanaa Bateli ana Dedewaga hi teliya . Yehoba i ba dedewaga nihi ginol ebwakil alana akesiya ge gold elana . Yaka i ba :
02025011	
02025012	
02025013	
02025014	
02025015	
02025016	
02025017	“ Gold enona nu ahe dedewaga ana heguna nu ginoliya , wami gegi ana abayakiyakil . Heguna o ana yapu 110 sentamita ge ana manamana 66 sentamita .
02025018	Gold nu ahe bwasumu labui opeliya gaganina nu bub ginolil ,
02025019	etegana ni minaa buhuna etega , eluwana ni minaa buhuna etega . Ginebi heguna nu ginolil toyawe .
02025020	Opeliya nihi anal inoke heguna nihi pahabobu . Awoliya nihi pempewa ge maniniliya ni lau heguna elana .
02025021	Pat mamanana sasapona labui toto abwe na pewa nu teliya dedewaga gamwanaa , inoke ana heguna nu pom .
02025022	Ta petupatupa-agilaa to . Na minaa Bateli ana Dedewaga ana heguna pwatanaa bwasumu labui opeliya gaganina ali luwaluwala , inoke alou owa ta liwaliwan ge no logugui na pewa Isileli kaiweliya . ” Aban Bwabwalena gamwanaa etuwalali eton . * Etegana beleid bwabwalena ana teibol . Yehoba i ba teibol nihi ginol ebwakil alana akesiya ge gold elana . Yaka i ba :
02025023	Aban Bwabwalena gamwanaa etuwalali eton . * Etegana beleid bwabwalena ana teibol . Yehoba i ba teibol nihi ginol ebwakil alana akesiya ge gold elana .  Yaka i ba :
02025024

02025028	
02025029	
02025030	“ Beleid bwabwalena nuku teliya teibol ya pwatanaa ge sauga gegewena ni miminaa maniniwa . ” Eluwana , odam ginebi abaliya . Yehoba i ba ,
02025031	“ Gold enona nu ahe odam abaliya nu ginoliya . ” Odam abaliya lalana ona i gan inoke odam hi teliya lalana ona eliyalil .

02028001	Nu ba talim Eloni alonau natunau Nadaba , Abihu , Eliyesa ge Idamal nihi nem elam , inoke nu teli getogaagil Isileli gegewel al elal nihi topowon eliyau .
02028002	Kaliko bwabwalel nu ginolil talim Eloni kaiwena , inoke ana awa ni waisi ge gamagalau nihi awatauwan . Yehoba i ba kaliko bolo hiwe nihi ginolil topowon bwabwatana Eloni kaiwena : holahola yayapona hot , * holahola yayapona , holahola etegana alana ipod , babagal ana kama , kowakowa ana eyabom , ge wasikewa . Ge kaliko nihi ginolil al Eloni natunau kaiweliya . Yehoba i ba hihiu ali kala bulu , pepol ge keketina ginebi hihiu kaliko waiwaisana kaiwena ge gold nihi ahe holahola etegana alana ipod * nihi ginol . Ana egimwan labui nihi hek vevelanaa ge nihi loek eputetenaa inoke kaliko ipod ni kukulatahin . Pat waiwaisal labui alaliya kaneliyan nihi teliya ana egimwan elal , tau vevelana pwatanaa . Pat labui ya elana Isileli ali un alaliya nihi leliya , pat etega alan sikis ge eluwana alan sikis . Yehoba i ba :
02028003	
02028004	
02028005	
02028006	Yehoba i ba hihiu ali kala bulu , pepol ge keketina ginebi hihiu kaliko waiwaisana kaiwena ge gold nihi ahe holahola etegana alana ipod † nihi ginol . Ana egimwan labui nihi hek vevelanaa ge nihi loek eputetenaa inoke kaliko ipod ni kukulatahin . Pat waiwaisal labui alaliya kaneliyan nihi teliya ana egimwan elal , tau vevelana pwatanaa . Pat labui ya elana Isileli ali un alaliya nihi leliya , pat etega alan sikis ge eluwana alan sikis . Yehoba i ba :

02028010	
02028011	
02028012	“ Pat nu telel ipod ana egimwan elal Isileli ali un elulutega eluwa etotoheliya . Inoke alaliya Eloni ni kalivai vevelana pwatanaa , yaka nau Yehoba no gamagalau na nuwahikagil sauga gegewena . ” Kaliko etegana Yehoba i ba nihi ginol te babagal ana kama , ana yapu ge ana manamana nihi olaolaek tuwenti tu sentamita ( 22 cm ) . Nihi hel gabom gamwana ni gan ni ola nabwa . Pat waiwaisal elulutega eluwa nihi am hikan babagal ana kama elana . Pat maisena ge maisena elana Isileli ali un alaliya nihi leliya , pat etega alan etega . Babagal ana kama nihi ginol ola to , inoke nihi am hikan ipod ana egimwan elal nige ni sosogu . Yaka Yehoba i ba ,
02028015	Kaliko etegana Yehoba i ba nihi ginol te babagal ana kama , ana yapu ge ana manamana nihi olaolaek tuwenti tu sentamita ( 22 cm ) . Nihi hel gabom gamwana ni gan ni ola nabwa . Pat waiwaisal elulutega eluwa nihi am hikan babagal ana kama elana . Pat maisena ge maisena elana Isileli ali un alaliya nihi leliya , pat etega alan etega . Babagal ana kama nihi ginol ola to , inoke nihi am hikan ipod ana egimwan elal nige ni sosogu .  Yaka Yehoba i ba ,

02028020	
02028021

02028029	“ Sauga ebo Eloni ni ulutuk Aban Bwabwalena gamwanaa , Isileli ali un alaliya ni kalivai iyoho hi mina babagal ana kama elana , inoke nau Yehoba no gamagalau na nuwahikagil sauga gegewena .
02028030	Ulim ge Tamim nu usan babagal ana kama gamwanaa , inoke sauga ebo Eloni ni tuk Aban Bwabwalena gamwanaa maniniwa , ni kalivail babagalinaa . Inoke bugul bolo i papatuwalali no nuwatu i loloyaan no gamagalau kaiweliya , ni kalivail babagalinaa nau Yehoba maniniwa . ” Yehoba i ba holahola yayapona * ana kala bulu nihi ginol . Isela ge kal ona nihi pakuki painan holahola buhuna toto i kuki lau elana . Yehoba i ba :
02028031	Yehoba i ba holahola yayapona ‡ ana kala bulu nihi ginol . Isela ge kal ona nihi pakuki painan holahola buhuna toto i kuki lau elana .  Yehoba i ba :
02028032	
02028033	
02028034	
02028035	“ Eloni holahola yayapona ya ni galoi abwe ni tuwalali kaiweu . Sauga ebo ni ulutuk Aban Bwabwalena elana ni nem nau Yehoba matawa o ebo ni tagil al , kal butuliya ni gan inoke nige ni aaliga . ” Eloni kokowana ana eyabom ni gan al . Yehoba i ba gold nihi bub pamanamana , ana leleli nihi ginol yaka nihi am hikanek eyabom elana . Leleli toto nihi lelelian gold elana ni ba , “ Bwabwalena Yehoba elana . ” Yehoba i ba :
02028036	Eloni kokowana ana eyabom ni gan al . Yehoba i ba gold nihi bub pamanamana , ana leleli nihi ginol yaka nihi am hikanek eyabom elana . Leleli toto nihi lelelian gold elana ni ba , “ Bwabwalena Yehoba elana . ” Yehoba i ba :
02028037	
02028038	“ Leleli o ni minaa Eloni lamwanaa . He sauga ebo Isileli wali mulolu nihi pwatanim nihi pwabwabwalena elau , yaka wali gegi Eloni ni kalivai . Sauga gegewena leleli ni teli lamwanaa , inoke nau Yehoba gamagalau na awa sapusapu-agil .
02028039	“ Nu ba hihiu kaliko waiwaisana kaiwena nihi ahe holahola yayapona hot * nihi ginoliya , i ola al hihiu kaliko waiwaisana kaiwena elana kowakowa ana eyabom nihi ginoliya . Hihiu ali kala tomaha nihi ahe matan nihi palul ginol , yaka eliyana wasikewa nihi ginol .
02028040	“ Nu ba holahola yayapol hot , wasikewa ge kowakowa ana eyabom nihi ginolil Eloni natunau kaiweliya , inoke ali awa ni waisi ge gamagalau nihi awatauwagil . ” Yehoba i ba Eloni alonau natunau nihi pagaloil kaliko bolo o elal ge nihi pwabwabwalena-agil tuwalali kaiwena .
02028041	Yehoba i ba Eloni alonau natunau nihi pagaloil kaliko bolo o elal ge nihi pwabwabwalena-agil tuwalali kaiwena .
02028042	
02028043	
02030001	Bugul etonina Aban Bwabwalena gamwanaa te bugul bwalena waiwaisana ana abatonton . Yehoba i ba nihi ginol ebwakil alana akesiya ge gold elana . Yaka i ba :
02030002	
02030003	
02030004	
02030005	
02030006	
02030007	“ Mweluluga gegewena sauga Eloni odam ni pabolol ge ni abubunil , yaka bugul bwalena waiwaisana ni ton ana abatontona .
02030008	Ge kokoyavi gegewena sauga odam ni tonil , bugul bwalena waiwaisana ni ton al . Inoke heyan ge heyan bugul bwalena waiwaisana topowon nihi tonton ge kasona ni haha nau Yehoba maniniwa . ” Baliman maisena ge maisena Eloni bugul bwalena waiwaisana ana abatonton ni pwabwabwalena .
02030009	
02030010	
02030011	Yehoba i ba , “ Sauga Isileli ali gewi nuku vasili , tau maisena ge maisena yawalina molana ni pwamola nau Yehoba elau . Inoke sauga gamagalau ali gewi nuku vasili , nige logabola nanakina etega nuku pwapwawa . Tau maisena ge maisena silba kekeisi ni pewa elam ge nuku patuwalali Petupatupa Limena ana tuwalali kaiwena . ”
02030012	
02030013	
02030014	
02030015	
02030016	
02030017	Bugul eluwana Petupatupa Limena tolinaa gana gamwanaa heiya abaulul . Yehoba i ba abaulul nihi ginol kopa elana . Sauga topowon nihi tuk Limi elana , houwa nimaliya ge aeliya nihi ul .
02030018	
02030019	
02030020	
02030021	
02030022	Yehoba i ba enonu waiwaisana nihi ginol inoke limi tapwalolo bugubugulina nihi hol seuseulan . Ge i ba bugul enuna bwaleliya waiwaisal nihi vikuhu ge nihi ton limi tapwalolowa .

02031001	Yehoba i ba Besaleli ge Oholiyab iyaka i hilel limi tapwalolo nihi taltal .

02031010	
02031011	
02031012	Yehoba i ba lan Sabwata i bwabwalena inoke nihi teli ni bwabwalena sauga gegewena .
02031013	
02031014	
02031015	
02031016	
02031017	
02031018	Sauga Yehoba i baaba haba Mosese elana oya Sainai pwatanaa , yaka pat mamanana sasapona labui i pek elana , bolo bateli ana logugui nimana elana i leli tuwaliyaa .
02032001	Sauga i yapu Mosese i minamina oyaa nige i sisikal , inoke gamagal hi nogogo Eloni elana ge hi ba , “ Tau toto Mosese i ahela ta tagilem Itipita , iya ga ? Nige ta aatena hauna gun i gan elana . Inoke wala yabowaine etega u ginol ge ni nulila . ”
02032002	Yaka analiya Eloni i lahe i ba , “ Komwakomwa gold toto lagomiyau , ge natumiyau yowau ge bolau hi papahe , ku palo ge ku pwatanim elau . ”
02032003	Yaka gamagalau gegewel bolo ali komwakomwa gold i gan , hi ahe ge hi pwatanik Eloni elana .
02032004	Inoke Eloni gold i ahe i pawayui ge bulumwakau natuna melutauina kakanununa etega i ginol . Yaka gamagal hi ba , “ Isileli wala yabowaine te , toto i nulila ge ta tagilem Itipita . ”
02032005	Sauga Eloni gamagalau wali yaliyaya i kite , yaka pat i pahe abapowon i ginol bulumwakau gold awonaa , ge i ba , “ Bwaligumwa hagali ta ginol Yehoba kaiwena . ”
02032006	Lan i gan mweluluga kekeisi , gamagalau bwasumu hi bugul pwatanim . Enuna hi ton pwabwaligel , ge enuna hi powonagil heliheliyam powonina , inoke aanan hi ginol . Yaka hi misiyo hi anan ge hi imwim , inoke hi lutan ge neganega paganina hi awaawaginol .
02032007	Yaka Yehoba i baek Mosese elana i ba , “ Etimwawa u sikal u na u lau , kaiwena wam gamagalau bolo u nulil hi tagilem Itipita , iyaka hi gegi ge hi towaagau .
02032008	Kamwasa toto ya ba nihi toulil iyaka hi tataluwai . Gold hi ahe bulumwakau kakanununa hi ginoliya , yaka hi kululuek elana ge bwasumu hi powonan elana . Hi ba , ‘ Isileli wala yabowaine te , toto i nulila ta tagilem Itipita . ’
02032009	Iyaka ya atena gamagal ya ateliya i pat .
02032010	Bahi nu kakausau . Ya huga elal ge nuwau na apapanak-agil , yaa owa tubutubumwau nihi gewi na pewa nihi tabwa boda bwabwatana . ”
02032011	Yaa Mosese i awanun lawalawakik Yehoba , iya wana Yabowaine elana , i ba , “ Yehoba , i bwe ge u huga nabi wam gamagalau elal , bolo wam gasisi bwabwatana elana u ahel tagilagil Itipita ?
02032012	Nasi Itipita nihi ba , ‘ Age nuwatu nanakina kaiwena te Yehoba i nulil tagilagil , nuwana ni lolil oyaa ge ni gulil habal panayawiya . ’ Bahi nu huhuga , nu laumwal , ge bahi nak toto o nu giginol wam gamagalau elal .
02032013	Wam totuwalali Abalahama , Aisake ge Yakobo nu nuwahikagil . Valila totom alam u papasila-an , inoke u bateli elal u ba , ‘ Tubutubumwau nihi gewi na pewa , ali gewi ni ola putum hawawala . Inoke panuwa gegewena ya na pek ni ola no bateli , ge ni mihot elal . ’ ”
02032014	Inoke Yehoba wana nuwatu i pil ge nak toto tage ni ginol wana gamagalau elal i nuwayoho .
02032015	Yaka pat mamanana sasapona labui bolo bateli ana logugui Yehoba i leli tuwaliyaa , Mosese i ahe ge i na i lau . He ali leleli i minaa labeliya labui elal .
02032016	Yabowaine totona pat mamanana sasapona i talil , ge totona ali leleli i lelel tuwaliyaa .
02032017	Yosuwa i hago gamagal hi loloi , inoke i baek Mosese elana i ba , “ Anan ya hago abaholaviya i ola te lohaveyan i gagan . ”
02032018	Anana Mosese i lahe i ba , “ Anan ana hago nige i oola ebo tagalaka i gan ge hi loloi . Ana hago nige i oola ebo hi pakokovel ge hi lolokahin . He anan toto ya hago i ola te hi wonawona . ”
02032019	Sauga Mosese i nem abaholavi labenaa , bulumwakau gogoginolina i kite ge gamagalau hi sagasaga i kitel , inoke i huga nabi . Yaka pat mamanana sasapona labui i alilowan oya punaa ge hi tal mamagebal .
02032020	Inoke bulumwakau gogoginol i ahe , i ton ginaha elana , ge i wowol i tabwa papakova . Inoke i na i yoholowan Isileli ali wewel elana ge i ba hi im .
02032021	Yaka i baek Eloni elana i ba , “ Gamagalau ya hauna hi ginol elam ge u nulil pagegel gegi bwabwatana ya hi ginol ? ”
02032022	Yaka anana Eloni i lahe i ba , “ Tonowak , bahi nu huhuga elau . U atena ya gamagalau pagan nanakina iyaka hi tounuwe .
02032023	Hi baem elau hi ba , ‘ Tau toto Mosese i ahela ta tagilem Itipita iya ga ? Nige ta aatena hauna i gan elana . He wala yabowaine etega u ginol ge ni nulila . ’
02032024	Yaka ya baek elal ya ba , ‘ Tuwamiu ana isela gold elana hi ginoliya ku palo . ’ Inoke hi ginol hi ola , ge hi pwatanim elau . Inoke ya alilowana ginaha elana ge hi tabwa bulumwakau kakanununa toto ya . ”
02032025	Mosese i kite Eloni gamagalau i teli yohil hi ginoginol bwagabwaga ya , inoke totoliya ali talawasi hi ginol ali topihigelgel elal .
02032026	Inoke i talmilila abaholavi ana abauluulutuka , ge i yoga i ba , “ Bolo nuwamiu nuku minaa Yehoba wana boda elana , he nuku nem elau . ” Inoke un Libai gegewel hi nogogo hi na elana .
02032027	Yaka i baek elal i ba , “ Yehoba , Isileli wala Yabowaine , i ba i ola hiwe , ‘ Komiu maisena ge maisena wami elohaveyan kilepana nuku ahe . Inoke abaholavi nuku nem nowaan , nuku telipunaa buhuna etega nuku nok buhuna etega , yaka talimiyau ge alomiyau nuku lolil . ’ ”
02032028	Inoke un Libai hi na hi ginol ola Mosese wana baaba . Yaka lan o elana gamagal ali gewi tili tausan ( 3,000 ) hi gopapaaliga-agil .
02032029	Mosese i ba un Libai elal i ba , “ Yehoba wana baaba ku henapuan yaka talimiyau ge natumiyau ku lolil . Inoke lan ebe Yehoba i ba muloluagimiu ge iyaka i pwabwabwalena-agimiu wana tuwalali kaiwena . ”
02032030	Lan i gan , yaka Mosese i baek gamagalau elal i ba , “ Gegi toto ku ginol i nak hot . Sauga ya na ha oyaa Yehoba elana . Tabam bosowaina na awanun elana inoke abwe wami gegi ni nuwaehik . ”
02032031	Inoke Mosese i sikal , i na i ha oyaa Yehoba elana ge i baek elana i ba , “ Gamagalau ya gegi toto hi ginol i nak hot . Gold hi ahe wali yabowaine gogoginol hi ginol ge hi kululuek elana .
02032032	Ya awanun elam te wali gegi u nuwayoho . Ebo nigeya , he alau u leke yoho buki toto wam gamagalau alaliya u leleliya . ”
02032033	Anana Yehoba i lahe i ba , “ Nigeya ! Bolo hi gegi elau heliya te alaliya na leke yoho no bukiya .
02032034	U nok u na gamagalau nu nulil nuku na panuwa toto iyaka ya baunaniwa . He no anelose ni nohouwa awomiwa . Yaa ebo no sauga ni pwawa , abwe gamagalau wali gegi na lahe . ”
02032035	Yaka abwe Yehoba gamagalau i lahel kasiyebwa nanakina elana , kaiwena hi kululuek bulumwakau gogoginol , toto gold elana Eloni i ginoliya .
02033001	Yehoba i baek Mosese elana i ba , “ Alomwau gamagalau bolo u ahel tagilagil Itipita , panuwa ya nuku tataluwai , nuku nok nuku na labi toto ya bateli Abalahama , Aisake ge Yakobo elal , ya ba , ‘ Nau abwe na pek tubutubumiyau elal . ’
02033002	Anelose etega na patuna ni houwa awomiwa , yaka Kenani , Amoli , Hiti , Pelisi , Hivi ge Yebusi na takel yohil .
02033003	Nuku na panuwa malumalulina , yaa nau nige na nonowa alowau komiu , eba na apapanak-agimiu kamwasaa , kaiwena atemiu i pat . ”
02033004	Sauga gamagalau baaba pupulowanina o hi hago , inoke hi lokahin , yaka nige tuwan ana isela etega hi papahe .
02033005	He Yehoba iyaka i ba haba Mosese elana i ba , “ Nu baek Isileli elal nu ba , ‘ Atemiu i pat . Bwagana ebo sauga kekeisi ya na nowa alowau komiu , yaa nasi na apapanak-agimiu . Inoke tuwamiu ana isela nuku palo , yaka abwe na nuwatu al hauna na ginol eliyamiu . ’ ”
02033006	Yaka oya Sainai elana Isileli tuwaliya ana isela hi palo , nige al hi papahe .
02033007	Sauga ebo Isileli hi hoholavi panuwa etega elana , yaka Mosese epanapana ni ahe ni pamilil kekeisi ana bwaga ni gan wali abaholavi elana . Inoke epanapana o alana hi tun “ Petupatupa Limena . ” Henala ebo Yehoba wana nuwatu ni loyaan , ni nok ni na Petupatupa Limena elana abaholavi tolinaa .
02033008	Sauga ebo Mosese ni tagilem abaholaviya ge ni nanawa Petupatupa Limena kaiwena , yaka gamagalau nihi talmilila wali epanapana ana nog elal , ge nihi gagayawa-an , ana siga ni na ni tuk Petupatupa Limena gamwanaa .
02033009	Yaka yaluyalu toto i milil i ola kokola ni lau ni milila Petupatupa Limena ana nog elana , inoke Yehoba alona ge Mosese nihi baaba .
02033010	Sauga yaluyalu i milil i ola kokola gamagalau nihi kite Petupatupa Limena ana nog elana , inoke nihi talmilila wali epanapana ana nog elal ge nihi tapwalolo .
02033011	Yehoba alona ge Mosese hi pepeliwaliwan-agil , i ola gamagal alona ge alona hi liwaliwan . Yaka Mosese ni sikal abaholaviya , yaa ana tolabe heval Yosuwa , Nan natuna , i miminaa Petupatupa Limena elana .
02033012	Mosese i baek Yehoba elana i ba , “ Valila u babaem elau u babaa , ‘ Gamagalau u nulil , ’ yaa nige no wasa u pepem bubun henala alou ge naha nok . I ola al u baem elau u ba , ‘ Ya atena bubuniwa ge ya yaliyaya kaiwem . ’
02033013	Ebo u yaliyaya kaiweu , he wam pagan u pankiteyau , inoke na atenawa bubun ge na payaliyaya-agiwa . Nu nuwahikan al gamagalau ya heliya wam hilihili gamagaliliyau . ”
02033014	Anana Yehoba i lahe i ba , “ Nau na nowa alou owa , inoke na paveyaho-agiwa . ”
02033015	Yaka Mosese i baek elana i ba , “ Ebo nige nu nenem aloma owa , bahi nu babaa panuwa ya naha tataluwai .
02033016	He gamagalau ga nihi atena ola tage u yaliyaya kaiweu ge wam gamagalau kaiweliya , ebo nige aloma owa ta nonok ? Owa u minaa eliyama , inoke toto ya i pagetoga-agima gamagalau gegewel al elal panayawiya . ”
02033017	Inoke Yehoba i baek Mosese elana i ba , “ Na ginol ni ola wam awanun , kaiwena ya atena bubuniwa ge ya yaliyaya kaiwem . ”
02033018	Yaka Mosese i ba , “ Ebo i ola , he mwananalim namanamalina nu pankiteyau . ”
02033019	Yaka Yehoba i ba , “ No waisi gegewena na pahouwa maninimwa , ge alau Yehoba na lumen tanamwa . Henala ebo na atilomwan-an , inoke na atilomwan-an , ge henala ebo na nuwaleyan-an , inoke na nuwaleyan-an .
02033020	Yaa nige bosowaina maniniu nu kite , kaiwena ebo etega maniniu ni kite , nasi ni aliga .
02033021	Abamina iyahe labewa i bosowaina nu talmilila pat etega eliyana .
02033022	Sauga mwananaliu namanamalina ni palegewa , yaka na telewa pat malelena golinaa , ge nimwau elana na pahabobowa ana siga na nopalegewa .
02033023	Yaka nimwau na ahe yoho , inoke eputeteu nu kite , yaa maniniu nige nu kikite . ”
02034001	Yehoba i baek al Mosese elana i ba , “ Pat mamanana sasapona labui nu gotalil ni ola bolo houwan . Baaba bolo ya leli pat houwan elal ge u tagagebal , he na leli al pat vavalul elal .
02034002	Nu lovivina , yaka bwaligumwa mweluluga nu ha oya Sainai ge nu nem elau oya pwatanaa .
02034003	Bahi gamagal etega alom nuku nenem o ebo ni gagan oyaa . Ge bahi sipi o ebo bulumwakau nihi anana oya punaa . ”
02034004	Inoke Mosese pat mamanana sasapona labui i gotalil i ola bolo houwan , yaka lan i gan mweluluga , i noahel ge i ha oya Sainai , i ola Yehoba wana baaba .
02034005	Yehoba yaluyalu elana i lau i talmilil alona Mosese , inoke alana i lumen Yehoba . *
02034006	Yaka i nopanet Mosese manininaa , ge i yoga i ba , “ Nau Yehoba , Yabowaine toatilomwan ge tonuwaleyan , nige etimwawa ya huhuga , nunuwana ya kalaopopwi ge ya giginol i ola no baaba .
02034007	No gamagalau ya nunuwana-agil heyan ge heyan nige ni momowasi , wali nak ge wali gegi ya nunuwayoho . Yaa bolo hi gegegi ali lahi nige ni kakala . Lahi ya ni kalapapanet natuliyau , tubuliyau ge tubuliyau natuliyau elal . ”
02034008	Etimwawa Mosese i kululu maninina i pahanalowanek bilibiliya inoke i tapwalolo ,
02034009	ge i ba , “ Babala , ebo tunahot u yaliyaya kaiweu , ya awanun elam nu nem aloma owa . Gamagalau ya ateliya i pat , yaa wama nak ge wama gegi u nuwayoho , ge u ahema ama wam hilihili gamagaliliyau sauga gegewena . ”
02034010	Inoke anana Yehoba i lahe i ba , “ Sauga ya no bateli na ginol eliyamiu . Isileli mataliyaa ginol yawiyawi na ginolil , ololal nige sauga etega ya giginol panayawi labena etega boda etega mataliyaa . Boda bolo hi minaa labemiwa nihi kite hauna nau Yehoba na ginol kaiwemiu , inoke nuwaliya nihi ahe ge nihi lovakun .
02034011	“ Logugui toto na pewa lan ya nuku henapuan . He nau abwe Amoli , Kenani , Hiti , Pelisi , Hivi ge Yebusi na takel awomiwa .
02034012	Yaa nuku matahikagimiu bahi alomiyau panuwa toto ku nonoek gamagaliliyau nuku pepebabateli-agimiu , eba nihi paona-agimiu .
02034013	Wali abapowon ona nuku tagalekaleka-an , pat bolo hi pamilil wali abakululu nuku tagagebagebal-an , ge ebwakil bolo hi pamilil wali yabowaine Asela * etotohena nuku gogabogabomwil .
02034014	Bahi nuku kukululuek yabowaine getoga etega elana , kaiwena nau Yehoba nige ya tatalam o toawalaka ni gan .
02034015	“ Bahi alomiyau panuwa o gamagaliliyau nuku pepebabateli-agimiu . Kaiwena sauga nihi kululu ge bwasumu nihi powonan wali yabowaine elal , yaka abwe nihi yoga pahemiu ge wali powon enona nuku an .
02034016	I ola al , ebo natumiyau bolau panuwa o yowauiliyau nihi alolonagil , yaka yowau o natumiyau nihi nulil pagegel ge nihi kululuek wali yabowaineyau elal .
02034017	“ Bahi yabowaine gogoginol etega nuku giginol ge nuku kukululuek elana .
02034018	“ Pwalawa nige alona yis hi vivikuhiya hagalena nuku ginol , ni ola no baaba eliyamiu . Weikena Abib * gamwanaa lan seben pwalawa nige alona yis hi vivikuhiya nuku an , kaiwena waikena o gamwanaa te ku tagilem Itipita .
02034019	“ Natumiyau gamaun melutauil , avaliyau wami bulumwakau , sipi ge goti natuliyau gamaun melutauil , gegewel nau kaiweu .
02034020	Sipi natuna nuku ahe donki natuna gamaun nuku pwamola pasikal . Yaa ebo nige nuku pwapwamola pasikal , inoke mwamwalina nuku tagaapwal . Natumiyau gamaun melutauil gegewel nuku pwamola pasikalil . “ Bahi etega nimana enoenovana ge ni nenem eliyau .
02034021	“ Wami tuwalali nuku ginolil lan sikis gamwanaa , yaa lan sebenina elana nuku veyaho . Bwagana wami tuwalali i bwaya ololana pelpel o ebo pahi ali sauga , nuku veyaho .
02034022	“ Pahi Hagalena * nuku ginol hikahikani sauga nuku telipuna witi nuku pahe . I ola al , Epanapana Hagalena nuku ginol hikahikani sauga pahi gegewena ni mowasi .
02034023	“ Baliman maisena gamwanaa hagali eton nuku ginolil , inoke eliyana wami bolau gegewel nihi nem nihi tapwalolo nau Babala Yehoba , Isileli wami Yabowaine elau .
02034024	Boda tomaha tomaha ona na takel awomiwa , inoke wami labi na pwabwata . Sauga ebo hagali eton ya nuku ginolil ge nuku tapwalolo elau , nige gamagal etega wami panuwa ni oe .
02034025	“ Sauga bwasumu nuku powonan elau , bahi ginebi pwalawa toto alona yis hi vikuhiya . Bwasumu toto nuku lol Nopalegi Hagalena kaiwena , bahi etega nuku an teli mweluluga kaiwena .
02034026	“ Baliman maisena ge maisena wami bilibili enowaliya toto ni matuwa houwa nuku pwatanim nau Yehoba no limiya . “ Bahi goti natuna bunumwina nuku liligaa hinana hulina suina elana . ”
02034027	Yaka Yehoba i baek Mosese elana i ba , “ Baaba bolo o nu leli lowan , kaiwena no bateli toto ya ginol owa ge Isileli eliyamiu ana logugui ona i ola to . ”
02034028	Mosese alona Yehoba hi miminaa oyaa lan poti ge bulin poti , nige i aanan ge nige i iim . Yehoba wana bateli ana logugui i leli pat mamanana sasapona labui tuwaliyaa , baaba o Logugui Elulutega .
02034029	Sauga Mosese i loem oyaa , pat mamanana sasapona labui bolo bateli ana logugui Yehoba i leli tuwaliyaa , i noahe . Yaa nige i aatena te maninina i namanamal kaiwena alona Yehoba hi liwaliwan .
02034030	He Eloni ge gamagalau gegewel Mosese maninina hi kite i namanamal , inoke hi lovakun nige hi nonoek labenaa .
02034031	Yaa Mosese Eloni ge boda wali tohouwa gegewel i yogaagil hi na elana , inoke i baaba elal .
02034032	Yaka abwe Isileli gegewel hi nogogo elana , inoke logugui gegewena toto Yehoba i pek oya Sainai , i baunanik elal .
02034033	Sauga Mosese i baaba haba , yaka kama i ahe maninina i kaus .
02034034	Yaa ebo ni tuk Petupatupa Limena elana , yaka kama ni ahe yoho ge alona Yehoba nihi baaba . Sauga ni tagil Yehoba wana baaba ni baunanik Isileli elal ,
02034035	inoke maninina nihi kite i namanamal . Yaka ni kaus al ana siga ni sikal alona Yehoba nihi baaba .
02035001	Mosese boda Isileli gegewel i pamigogoil ge i baek elal i ba , “ Logugui bolo Yehoba i ba nuku toulil i ola hiwe .
02035002	Wami tuwalali nuku ginol lan sikis gamwanaa , yaa lan sebenina elana lan veyaho i bwabwalena nau Yehoba elau . Lan o henala ebo tuwalali etega ni ginol nihi lopaaliga .
02035003	Bahi ginaha nuku toton wami abaholaviya lan Sabwataa .
02035004	Mosese i baek boda Isileli gegewel elal i ba , “ Yehoba wana baaba i ola hiwe .
02035005	Henala atena i talam , inoke bugul bolo i gan elana ni ahe ni pwatanim ge ni muloluan Yehoba elana . ” Yaka bugul bolo nihi pwatanim Mosese i baunanik , ololana gold , silba , kopa , hihiu kaliko waiwaisana kaiwena , ge bwasumu kunisina , i ola al ebwakil waiwaisana alana akesiya , enonu , mwawin bwaleliya waiwaisana ge pat waiwaisal . Yaka bugul bolo abwe nihi ginolil i baunagil i ola hiwe : limi , Bateli ana Dedewaga , beleid bwabwalena ana teibol , odam ali abateli , bugul bwalena waiwaisana ana abatonton , abapowon , abaulul , gana , nog ge topowon ali kaliko .
02035006	Yaka bugul bolo nihi pwatanim Mosese i baunanik , ololana gold , silba , kopa , hihiu kaliko waiwaisana kaiwena , ge bwasumu kunisina , i ola al ebwakil waiwaisana alana akesiya , enonu , mwawin bwaleliya waiwaisana ge pat waiwaisal .
02035007	
02035008	
02035009	
02035010	Yaka bugul bolo abwe nihi ginolil i baunagil i ola hiwe : limi , Bateli ana Dedewaga , beleid bwabwalena ana teibol , odam ali abateli , bugul bwalena waiwaisana ana abatonton , abapowon , abaulul , gana , nog ge topowon ali kaliko .
02035011	
02035012	
02035013	
02035014	
02035015	
02035016	
02035017	
02035018	
02035019	
02035020	Isileli gegewel Mosese hi eguluwan hi na wali epanapana elal .
02035021	Inoke bolo ateliya i talam ge hi yaliyaya , wali mulolu hi pwatanim Yehoba elana Petupatupa Limena ana taltal kaiwena , i ola al ana etuwalali gegewena ge topowon ali kaliko kaiwena .
02035022	Bolo ateliya i talam , bolau ge yowau , tuwan ana isela gold ona , ololana komwakomwa , niman aana ge bobot , hi pwatanim ge hi muloluan Yehoba elana .
02035023	Bolo hihiu ali kala bulu , pepol ge keketina o ebo hihiu kaliko waiwaisana kaiwena * hi gan elal , bolo goti pupunona hi gan elal , bolo sipi kunisina hi kale i ket hi gan elal , ge bolo bwasumu kunisiliya waiwaisana hi gan elal , he hi ahel inoke hi pwatanim .
02035024	Bolo hi yaliyaya silba ge kopa nihi pwatanim , hi ginol ola ge hi muloluan Yehoba elana . Ge bolo ebwakil alana akesiya i gan elal , hi pwatanim totaltal nihi patuwalali .
02035025	Yowau bolo losalosa ana toatena sipi pupunona hi losa i tabwa hihiu ali kala bulu , pepol ge keketina , o ebo palakes hi losa i tabwa hihiu kaliko waiwaisana kaiwena , yaka hi pwatanim .
02035026	Yowau bolo hi yaliyaya ge goti pupunona ana losalosa hi atena , hi losa i tabwa hihiu .
02035027	Tohouwa pat waiwaisal ona , kaneliyan ge enuna al , hi pwatanim inoke totuwalali nihi teliya topowon bwabwatana ana kaliko ipod ana egimwan elal ge nihi am hikan babagal ana kama elana .
02035028	Bugul bwaleliya waiwaisal ona ge olibe enonona hi pwatanim , inoke totuwalali nihi patuwalali odam ali wewel , i ola al enonu toto epaepaenonu ge bugul bwalena waiwaisana toto hi toton nihi ginolil .
02035029	Isileli bolau ge yowau bolo ateliya i talam , alona wali yaliyaya wali mulolu hi pwatanim Yehoba elana tuwalali kaiwena , toto Yehoba i baunanek Mosese elana nihi ginol .
02035030	Yaka Mosese i baek Isileli elal i ba , “ Yehoba Besaleli , Uli natuna , Huli tubuna , ana un Yuda , iyaka i hile ,
02035031	inoke Yayaluwana eliyana i pakalaopopwi siba ge aatena i pek elana tuwalali tomaha tomaha kaiweliya .
02035032	Lokilkil ali un puna i atenal bubun ni ginola gold , silba ge kopa elal ,
02035033	pat waiwaisal ali vagavagal i atena , ge ebwakil ana taltal ge ana kilkil i atena . He bugul tomaha tomaha ali tuwalali i atena .
02035034	Alona ge Oholiyab , Ahisamak natuna , ana un Dani , Yehoba siba i pek elal gamagalau enuna al tuwalali nihi paatenal .
02035035	Siba i pek elal tuwalali gegewena hi atena . Lokilkil ana un puna hi atena , ge palupalul hi atena yaka matan hi ginol hihiu ali kala bulu , pepol ge keketina ge hihiu kaliko waiwaisana kaiwena elal . He tuwalali tomaha ge tomaha hi atena bubun .
02036001	“ He Yehoba siba ge aatena iyaka i pek Besaleli ge Oholiyab avaliyau totuwalali enuna al elal limi bwabwalena ana taltal gegewena hi atena . Inoke tuwalali o nihi ginol ni ola Yehoba wana baaba . ”
02036002	Yaka Besaleli ge Oholiyab avaliyau totuwalali bolo Yehoba aatena i pek elal ge hi yaliyaya tuwalali kaiwena , Mosese i yogaagil hi nok elana .
02036003	Inoke mulolu gegewena bolo Isileli hi pwatanim limi bwabwalena ana taltal kaiwena , Mosese i bugul pek elal . Yaa Isileli heliya iyoho ya mweluluga maisena ge maisena hi nemnem wali mulolu hi teliteli .
02036004	Yaka bolo limi bwabwalena hi taltal tuwalali hi paveyaho ga ,
02036005	ge hi na hi baek Mosese elana hi ba , “ Mulolu bolo gamagal hi pwatanim i bwata lake te tuwalali toto Yehoba i ba elala ta ginol . ”
02036006	Inoke Mosese i ba , “ Bolau ge yowau bahi bugul etega al nihi lolovivina-an ge nihi mumulolu-an limi bwabwalena kaiwena . ” Yaka wana baaba hi palelu abaholaviya . Inoke gamagal nige al bugul etega hi pwapwatanim ,
02036007	kaiwena toto iyaka hi pwatanim , tuwalali gegewena tage nihi ginol ana luvi i bwata lake .
02036008	Hihiu ali kala bulu , pepol ge keketina ginebi hihiu kaliko waiwaisana kaiwena hi ahe , inoke kaliko ana awa waiwaisana toto nihi anala limi pwatanaa hi palul .
02036009	
02036010	
02036011	
02036012	
02036013	
02036014	Hihiu toto goti pupunona hi ginoliya hi ahe , inoke kaliko labuina toto nihi anal kaliko houwan pwatanaa hi palul .
02036015	
02036016	
02036017	
02036018	
02036019	Sipi kunisina hi kale i ket ge bwasumu kunisiliya waiwaisana hi ahe , inoke epahabobu labui hi ginolil bolo nihi anal kaliko labui pwataliyaa .
02036020	Ebwakil alana akesiya hi ahe baba tomaha ona hi ginolil , maisena maisena ana miha 4.5 mita ge ana manamana 70 sentamita . Baba maisena maisena puna labui hi tagil buhuna etega . Puliya ali abamisiyo hi ginola silba elana i ola vaiyal ana ulubwal . Ge epagapagasisi hi ginolil bolo nihi telel pabalabala ge baba ona nihi kukuhikagil , yaka bosowaina baba ona nihi teli tubwitubwi-agil ni tabwa baba maisena .

02036035	Hihiu ali kala bulu , pepol ge keketina ginebi hihiu kaliko waiwaisana kaiwena hi ahe , inoke kaliko labui hi ginolil , etegana limi ana babatomwa ge eluwana ana abatuk . Ge kaliko bolo o ali kokola al hi ginolil .
02036036

02037001	Besaleli ebwakil alana akesiya ge gold i ahe yaka dedewaga i ginol .
02037002	
02037003	
02037004	
02037005	
02037006	Gold enona i ahe dedewaga ana heguna i ginoliya , gamagalau wali gegi ana abayakiyakil . Heguna o ana yapu 110 sentamita ge ana manamana 66 sentamita .
02037007	Gold i ahe bwasumu labui opeliya gaganina i bub ginolil ,
02037008	etegana i minaa buhuna etega , eluwana i minaa buhuna etega . Ginebi heguna i ginolil toyawe .
02037009	Opeliya hi anal inoke heguna hi pahabobu . Awoliya hi pempewa ge maniniliya i lau heguna elana .
02037010	Ebwakil alana akesiya ge gold hi ahe yaka beleid bwabwalena ana teibol hi ginoliya .
02037011	
02037012	
02037013	
02037014	
02037015	
02037016	
02037017	Gold enona hi ahe odam abaliya hi ginoliya . Odam abaliya lalana ona i gan inoke odam hi teliya lalana ona eliyalil .
02037018	
02037019	
02037020	
02037021	
02037022	
02037023	
02037024	
02037025	Ebwakil alana akesiya ge gold hi ahe bugul bwalena waiwaisana ana abatonton hi ginoliya .
02037026	
02037027	
02037028	
02037029	
02039001	Hihiu ali kala bulu , pepol ge keketina hi ahe topowon ali kaliko hi palul yaka nihi galoi sauga nihi tuwalali limi bwabwalena gamwanaa . I ola al kaliko bwabwalel enuna hi ginolil Eloni kaiwena , i ola Yehoba wana baaba Mosese elana . Hihiu ali kala bulu , pepol ge keketina ginebi hihiu kaliko waiwaisana kaiwena ge gold hi ahe holahola etegana alana ipod hi ginol . Ana egimwan labui hi ginol hi hek tau vevelanaa ge hi loek eputetenaa inoke kaliko ipod i kukulatahin . Pat waiwaisal labui alaliya kaneliyan hi teliya ana egimwan elal , tau vevelana pwatanaa . Pat labui ya elana Isileli ali un alaliya hi leliya , pat etega alan sikis ge eluwana alan sikis . Hihiu ali kala bulu , pepol ge keketina ginebi hihiu kaliko waiwaisana kaiwena ge gold hi ahe kaliko etegana alana babagal ana kama hi ginol . Ana yapu ge ana manamana hi olaolaek tuwenti tu sentamita ( 22 cm ) . Hi hel gabom gamwana i gan i ola nabwa . Pat waiwaisal elulutega eluwa hi am hikan babagal ana kama elana . Pat maisena ge maisena elana Isileli ali un alaliya hi leliya , pat etega alan etega . Babagal ana kama hi ginol ola to , inoke hi am hikan ipod ana egimwan elal nige i sosogu . Holahola yayapona ana kala bulu hi palul . Isela ge kal ona hi pakuki painan holahola buhuna toto i kuki lau elana . Hihiu kaliko waiwaisana kaiwena hi ahe topowon ali sulu ge kokowaliya ana eyabom hi ginol al . Hihiu ali kala bulu , pepol ge keketina ginebi hihiu kaliko waiwaisana kaiwena hi ahe ali wasikewa hi ginol . Gold hi bub pamanamana , ana leleli hi ginol , yaka hi am hikanek topowon bwabwatana kokowana ana eyabom elana . Leleli toto hi lelelian gold elana i ba , “ Bwabwalena Yehoba elana . ” Inoke gegewena hi pwamowasi ge hi pwatanik Mosese elana .
02039002	Hihiu ali kala bulu , pepol ge keketina ginebi hihiu kaliko waiwaisana kaiwena ge gold hi ahe holahola etegana alana ipod hi ginol . Ana egimwan labui hi ginol hi hek tau vevelanaa ge hi loek eputetenaa inoke kaliko ipod i kukulatahin . Pat waiwaisal labui alaliya kaneliyan hi teliya ana egimwan elal , tau vevelana pwatanaa . Pat labui ya elana Isileli ali un alaliya hi leliya , pat etega alan sikis ge eluwana alan sikis .

02039008	Hihiu ali kala bulu , pepol ge keketina ginebi hihiu kaliko waiwaisana kaiwena ge gold hi ahe kaliko etegana alana babagal ana kama hi ginol . Ana yapu ge ana manamana hi olaolaek tuwenti tu sentamita ( 22 cm ) . Hi hel gabom gamwana i gan i ola nabwa . Pat waiwaisal elulutega eluwa hi am hikan babagal ana kama elana . Pat maisena ge maisena elana Isileli ali un alaliya hi leliya , pat etega alan etega . Babagal ana kama hi ginol ola to , inoke hi am hikan ipod ana egimwan elal nige i sosogu .

02039022	Holahola yayapona ana kala bulu hi palul . Isela ge kal ona hi pakuki painan holahola buhuna toto i kuki lau elana .
02039023	
02039024	
02039025	
02039026	
02039027	Hihiu kaliko waiwaisana kaiwena hi ahe topowon ali sulu ge kokowaliya ana eyabom hi ginol al . Hihiu ali kala bulu , pepol ge keketina ginebi hihiu kaliko waiwaisana kaiwena hi ahe ali wasikewa hi ginol . Gold hi bub pamanamana , ana leleli hi ginol , yaka hi am hikanek topowon bwabwatana kokowana ana eyabom elana . Leleli toto hi lelelian gold elana i ba , “ Bwabwalena Yehoba elana . ”
02039028

02039032	Inoke gegewena hi pwamowasi ge hi pwatanik Mosese elana .
02039033

02039037	
02039038	
02039039	
02039040	
02039041	
02039042	He Isileli tuwalali gegewena iyaka hi pwamowasi haba , i ola Yehoba wana baaba Mosese elana .
02039043	Inoke Mosese wali tuwalali i hile ge i pwawa iyaka hi ginol i ola Yehoba wana baaba . Inoke Mosese i awanun Yehoba ni muloluagil .
02040001	Yehoba i baek Mosese elana i ba , “ Weikena ana lan houwan elana Petupatupa Limena nu pamilil . ”
02040002	
02040003	
02040004	
02040005	
02040006	
02040007	
02040008	
02040009	
02040010	
02040011	
02040012	
02040013	
02040014	
02040015	
02040016	Mosese bugul gegewena i ginolil i ola Yehoba wana baaba .
02040017	Inoke baliman eluwana ana waikena telipuna ana lan houwan elana Petupatupa Limena hi pamilil .
02040018	Mosese baba ona puliya ali abamisiyo i telel , yaka baba ona i pamililil ge epagapagasisi i pasolal . * Yaka abwe kaliko bolo limi ana abatuk ge ana babatomwa ali kokola i pamilil .
02040019	Inoke kaliko labui i anal limi o pwatanaa , yaka epahabobu labui * i anal pwatanaa al . He i ginol i ola Yehoba wana baaba .
02040020	Yaka Mosese pat mamanana sasapona labui i ahe i teli Bateli ana Dedewaga gamwanaa . Dedewaga ana kewa i pahola ge ana heguna , gegi ana abayakiyakil , i teli pwatanaa .
02040021	Inoke i nanatukana Limi gamwanaa , yaka kaliko mamanana i pakuki ge Bateli ana Dedewaga i kaus , i ola Yehoba wana baaba .
02040022	Teibol i nanatukan al Petutupa Limena gamwanaa , i teliya limi labena aluwabwa kaliko mamanana tolinaa .
02040023	Inoke pwalawa bwabwalena i teli pwatanaa Yehoba matanaa , i ola Yehoba wana baaba .
02040024	Yaka odam ginebi abaliya i nanatukan Petupatupa Limena gamwanaa , i teliya limi labena yavana , teibol i awoni .
02040025	Inoke odam i tonil Yehoba awonaa , i ola Yehoba wana baaba .
02040026	Abatonton gold hi ginoliya i nanatukan Petupatupa Limena gamwanaa ge i teliya kaliko awonaa .
02040027	Inoke bugul bwaleliya waiwaisana i ton pwatanaa , i ola Yehoba wana baaba .
02040028	Yaka kaliko i pakuki limi ana abauluulutuk elana ,
02040029	inoke abapowon i teliya awonaa . Yaka eliyana bwasumu ge pwalawa i powonagil pwabwaligel , i ola Yehoba wana baaba .
02040030	Yaka abaulul i teliya Petupatupa Limena ge abapowon ali nuwanuwana , ge wewel i hol .
02040031	Inoke Mosese ge Eloni alonau natunau hi papatuwalali nimaliya ge aeliya hi ulula .
02040032	Sauga ebo nihi ulutuka Petupatupa Limena elana o ebo nihi na abapowon elana , inoke nimaliya ge aeliya nihi ul ga , i ola Yehoba wana baaba .
02040033	Yaka Mosese Petupatupa Limena ge abapowon i gana pipinil , ge kaliko etega i pakuki ana abauluulutuk i kaus . Inoke Mosese tuwalali gegewena i pwamowasi .
02040034	Yaka yaluyalu Petupatupa Limena i yabom ge Yehoba mwananalina namanamalina i pakalaopop .
02040035	He Mosese nige bosowaina ni ulutuka Petupatupa Limena gamwanaa , kaiwena yaluyalu i lau ge Yehoba mwananalina namanamalina i pakalaopop .
02040036	Isileli wali minawanawa gegewena gamwanaa , sauga ebo yaluyalu ni ha ge ni noegon Petupatupa Limena pwatanaa , yaka Isileli nihi galaegon ge nihi toulil .
02040037	Yaa ebo nige ni haha , he nige nihi gagalaegon .
02040038	Sauga gegewena wali minawanawa elana , lana yaluyalu toto Yehoba i miminaa nihi kite Petupatupa Limena pwatanaa , ge bulina nihi kite ginaha i tautau yaluyaluwa .
06001001	Yehoba wana totuwalali Mosese , ana tolabe Yosuwa Nan natuna . Mosese wana yaomal enaa , inoke Yehoba i baek Yosuwa elana i ba ,
06001002	“ No totuwalali Mosese iyaka i aliga . Inoke sauga ya , alomwau Isileli gegewel nuku lovivina wewel Yolidani nuku kalapanet-an ge nuku nok labi toto ya pepewa eliyamiu .
06001003	Hauna labi nuku nawaan , he iyaka ya talamwan eliyamiu , i ola no bateli Mosese elana .
06001004	Bilibili toto na pewa ni telipunaa ula kekevana elana ni tukik ni na ana siga Lebanoni oyana elal . Wami bilibili ni sikala wewel bwabwatana Yupeleitis elana . Hiti wali labi gegewena ni ahe ge ni lok ni na ana siga Hoga Mediteleiniya .
06001005	Nige gamagal etega ni papakokovewa yawalim miminana elana . Na labewa ni ola Mosese ya labe . Nige na eguluwagiwa , alou owa ya sauga gegewena .
06001006	“ He nu gasisi ge atem ni matuwa , kaiwena owa gamagalau ya nu nulil ge nuku na nuku minaa panuwa toto ya bateli tubumiyau elal .
06001007	I yai te nu gasisi ge atem ni matuwa . Nu matahikagiwa logugui gegewena toto no totuwalali Mosese i pewa nu henapuan . Nu toulil pasapu , bahi nu liliolak labem awomwa o ebo gegebamwa , inoke hauna labi nu noek ge hauna ebo nu ginol , nasi ni waisi .
06001008	Nu nuwahikan Logugui ana buki ya nu vasili hikahikani . Lana ge bulina nu minuwanuwatu-an , inoke nu matahikagiwa ge logugui gegewena toto hi leli lowan nu henapuagil . Inoke nu mibubun ge hauna gun ebo nu ginol nasi ni waisi hot .
06001009	Iyaka ya ba haba eliyam te nu gasisi ge atem ni matuwa . Bahi lovakun ge bahi ati bwanabwana , kaiwena hauna labi nu noek , nau Yehoba wam Yabowaine alom ya . ”
06001010	Yosuwa i baek un maisena ge maisena wali tohouwa elal i ba ,
06001011	“ Ku nopain abaholaviya ge nuku baek gamagalau elal nuku ba , ‘ Wami bugubugul ge amiu nuku lovivina-an , kaiwena lan eton ya i mina abwe ta egon , Wewel Yolidani ta kalapanet-an ge ta nok labi toto Yehoba wala Yabowaine i pepem wala panuwa . ’ ”
06001012	Yaka i baek al un Lubeni , Gada ge un Manasa awalehina elal i ba ,
06001013	“ Ku nuwahikan Yehoba wana totuwalali Mosese wana baaba eliyamiu i ba , ‘ Yehoba wami Yabowaine iyaka i paveyaho-agimiu , ge bilibili toto ya Wewel Yolidani labi leu nati i pewa eliyamiu wami panuwa . ’
06001014	Natumiyau ge wami bwasumu nihi miminaa te wami panuwaa e , yaa komiu tolohaveyan gegewemiu wami elohaveyan nuku bugulan , inoke nuku houwa-agima ge wewel Yolidani ta kalapanet-an . Ama talimiyau nuku labema ga
06001015	ana siga Yehoba wala Yabowaine ni paveyaho-agima ni ola iyaka i ginol eliyamiu , ge bilibili toto Yehoba i pepem naha ahe ge naha minaan . Enaa abwe nuku sikalim wami panuwa ya elana , toto Yehoba wana totuwalali Mosese i pewa eliyamiu Wewel Yolidani labena leu nati . ”
06001016	Inoke Yosuwa anana hi lahe hi ba , “ Bugul gegewena naha ginol ni ola hauna toto iyaka u baunan eliyama . Ge ebo hauna labi elana nu patunama , nasi naha nok .
06001017	Wam baaba naha henapuan ni ola valila Mosese wana baaba ha henapuan . He ha awanun ya te Yehoba wala Yabowaine ni minaa eliyam , ni ola valila i minaa Mosese elana .
06001018	Henala ebo ni awatautau-agiwa ge nige wam baaba ni hehenapu-an , he ni aliga . I yai te nu gasisi ge atem ni matuwa . ”
06002001	Panuwa Sitim elana Yosuwa , Nan natuna , tokenan eluwa i patuna sumel i ba , “ Ku na panuwa Kenani ku anugayawa-an , Yeliko al ge . ” Yaka hi nok hi ginol ola . Sauga hi na hi tuk Yeliko , inoke bulin o hi na hi minaa yova toganawal mani kaiwena alana Leyabi wana limiya .
06002002	Gamagalau enuna Yeliko ana kin wana wasa hi pek hi ba , “ Bulin ebe Isileli enuna hi nem hi tuk ge panuwa hi anugayawa-an . ”
06002003	Inoke kin baaba i patuna Leyabi elana i ba , “ Gamagalau bolo hi nem hi ulutuk wam limiya u ahel nihi tagil , kaiwena hi nem panuwa gamwana gegewena hi anugayawa-an . ”
06002004	Mulaa abwe elopapatuna hi vin , he Leyabi tokenan eluwa iyaka i ahel i na limi pwatanaa ge i pabun sumel mwawin palakes * nuwaliya gabulanaa , bolo i payane wana limi pwatanaa . Inoke i baek kin wana elopapatuna elal i ba , “ Gamagalau hi nem no limiya , yaa nige ya aatena te ga hi noem . Sabwelu lobelobekina elana kelaubwa panuwa ana nog nihi kaus te hi egon . Nige ya aatena ga hi noek , yaa ebo etimwawa nuku tatauliulil eliyaa , nasi nuku kukuhikagil . ”
06002005	
06002006	
06002007	Inoke kin wana elopapatuna hi tagil ge tokenan hi loyaagil kamwasaa , hi na ali siga wewel Yolidani ana abakalakalapaneta . Sauga elopapatuna hi tagil , inoke panuwa ana nog hi kaus .
06002008	Mulaa abwe tokenan hi kenu , Leyabi i na i ha limi pwatanaa
06002009	ge i baek elal i ba , “ Ya atena Yehoba labena ya iyaka i pewa eliyamiu , ge gamagalau gegewema labi ya elana ha lovakun nabi kaiwemiu ge wama gasisi gegewena i mowasi .
06002010	Wasamiu ha hago sauga ku tagilem Itipita Yehoba Hoga Keketina i pakekepa awomiwa ge ku kalapanet-an . Ha hago al Amoli wali kin labui bolo Yolidani labi leu nati , Sihon ge Ogi , avaliyau ge wali gamagalau ku lolil ge ku pwamowasel hoti .
06002011	Sauga wasamiu ha hago , ha lovakun nabi ge wama gasisi gegewena i mowasi , kaiwena ha atena Yehoba wami Yabowaine iya labulabum natiya ge panayawi ali Yabowaine .
06002012	He nuku papasila Yehoba alanaa te tutuwau nuku muloluagil ni ola nau ya muloluagimiu . Etotohi etega ku baunanim ,
06002013	inoke na atena tunahot age alowau nam ge nain , nuwau ge taliwau , avaliyau ge natuliyau nige nuku aapapanak-agima , yaa nuku pwamwalima yaomal elana . ”
06002014	Inoke tokenan Leyabi anana hi lahe hi ba , “ Ebo yawalimiu ni nak , lahena Yehoba yawalima ni apanak al . Ebo nige nu wawasa-agima , inoke sauga Yehoba labi ya ni pem elama , naha muloluagimiu ge naha pwamwalimiu . ”
06002015	Yeliko ana gana pat elana hi ginoliya , he Leyabi wana limi iyoho i minaa gana o tuwanaa . Inoke hihiu etega i ahe ge tokenan eluwa i pakuki lowagil wana windowa .
06002016	He mulaa abwe i pakuki lowagil , i baek ga elal i ba , “ Ku nok ku na oyaa , inoke bahi kin wana toloya nihi pwapwawamiu . Nuku bunsumiewa ga to lan eton , ana siga ami toloya nihi sikal , inoke abwe nuku nok wami kamwasaa . ”
06002017	Inoke bolau hi baek Leyabi elana hi ba , “ He bateli toto u ba ha papasila-an nige wana gasisi ni gagan eliyama ebo nige nu giginol ni ola hiwe .
06002018	Sauga naha tuk wami labiya , hihiu toto keketina ei nu gimwana windo toto nu pakuki lowagima elana . I ola al , tamwam ge hinam , numwau ge tutumwau gegewel , nu ahel alomwau nuku minaa wam limiya .
06002019	Ebo etega ni tagilem wam limiya ni nawanawa kamwasaa ge naha lol , he wana nak lahena totona ni pwawa , ana woliwoli nige ni nenem elama . Yaa ebo bolo alomwau nuku mina etega naha lol , lahena ama naha pwawa .
06002020	Ge ebo nu wasaagima , he bateli toto u ba ha papasila-an nige wana gasisi ni gagan ge nige naha papaolaolaek . ”
06002021	Yaka analiya Leyabi i lahe i ba , “ Ee , ni ola wami baaba . ” Yaka abwe i patunal hi egon , inoke hihiu keketina i ahe ge i gimwan windowa .
06002022	Tokenan hi na hi ha oyaa ge hi minek ga to lan eton . Toloya tokenan hi loyaagil kamwasaa , yaa nige hi pwapwawal , inoke hi sikal Yeliko .
06002023	Yaka abwe tokenan eluwa hi loem oyaa , wewel Yolidani hi kalapanet-an ge hi sikal Yosuwa elana . Inoke bugul gegewena toto i gan elal hi wasaan elana .
06002024	Yaka hi ba , “ Ha atena tunahot Yehoba labi Kenani bwabwaligena iyaka i teli nimalaa . He gamagal gegewel hi lovakun nabi kaiwela ge wali gasisi i mowasi . ”
06003001	Lan i gan mweluluga kekeisi , Yosuwa alonau ge Isileli gegewel hi lut Sitim hi eguluwan , inoke hi na Wewel Yolidani elana . Yaka hi holaviya ga to , mulaa abwe nihi kalapanet .
06003002	Lan etonina elana , inoke tohouwa hi nopain abaholaviya ,
06003003	ge hi baek gamagalau elal hi ba , “ Sauga topowon un Libai nuku kitel Yehoba wala Yabowaine wana Bateli ana Dedewaga nihi kalivai , yaka abaholavi nuku eguluwan ge nuku toulilil .
06003004	Inoke kamwasa nihi pankitemiu , kaiwena nige sauga etega ku nonoem labi ya elana . Bahi nuku nonok Bateli ana Dedewaga labenaa , ami bwaga ni gan ana yapu ni ola kilomita maisena . ”
06003005	Yaka Yosuwa i baek gamagalau elal i ba , “ Ku pwabwabwalena-agimiu , kaiwena bwaligumwa Yehoba ginol yawiyawi enuna ni ginolil gamwalaa . ”
06003006	Lan i gan mwelulugaa inoke Yosuwa i baek topowon elal i ba , “ Bateli ana Dedewaga ku kalivai ge nuku nohouwa gamagalau awoliyaa . ” Inoke hi ginol ola Yosuwa wana baaba .
06003007	Yehoba i baek Yosuwa elana i ba , “ Lan ebe na telipuna alam na teli heyan boda Isileli mataliyaa . Inoke nihi atena nau alou owa , i ola valila alou Mosese .
06003008	Nu baek topowon bolo Bateli ana Dedewaga ana tokaval elal nu ba , ‘ Sauga nuku pulivin Wewel Yolidani bebenaa , yaka nuku gailau ge nuku talmilil wewel gamwanaa . ’ ”
06003009	Inoke Yosuwa i baek boda Isileli elal i ba , “ Ku noanim ga , inoke Yehoba wala Yabowaine wana baaba na wasaan nuku hago .
06003010	Lan ya bugul etega ni gan , inoke nuku atena age Yabowaine yawalina gaganina iyahe avala ge abwe Kenani , Hiti , Hivi , Pelisi , Gegasi , Amoli ge Yebusi towohiliyau ni takel yohil kaiwemiu .
06003011	He panayawi mamanana ana Babala wana Bateli ana Dedewaga nasi ni houwa-agimiu ni na ni lau Wewel Yolidani elana .
06003012	Inoke sauga topowon bolo Dedewaga hi kalivai aeliya nihi teli Yolidani elana , yaka wewel toto i sani loem natiya nasi ni kekepa ge ni tub papahe abana maisena . ( He i ola al bolau ali gewi elulutega eluwa nuku hilel un maisena ge maisena gamwaliyaa . ) ”
06003013	
06003014	Witi tomwatomwa ana sauga inoke banata i sani Wewel Yolidani elana . Sauga Isileli wali abaholavi hi eguluwai hi na Yolidani nihi kalapanet-an , inoke topowon Dedewaga hi kalivai ge hi houwa gamagalau awoliyaa . Sauga toto topowon aeliya hi teli wewel gamwanaa ,
06003015	
06003016	yaka wewel toto i sani loem natiya i kekepa . Wewel i tub papahe labi etega ana bwaga i yapu elal , panuwa alana Adama , Saletan labenaa . Wewel toto i sani lok i na Hoga Alialigana elana i kekepa hot , inoke gamagalau bosowailiya nihi kalapanet Yeliko gegelinaa .
06003017	Topowon bolo Yehoba wana Bateli ana Dedewaga hi kalivai hi talmilil bubun bilibili kekevana elana Yolidani ana luwaluwala , yaka Isileli hi noknok ana siga gegewel hi kalapanet haba .
06004001	Sauga Isileli gegewel wewel Yolidani hi kalapanet-an haba , he Yehoba iyaka i ba haba Yosuwa elana i ba ,
06004002	“ Bolau elulutega eluwa nuku hilel Isileli ali un maisena ge maisena gamwaliyaa .
06004003	Yaka nuku baek elal pat elulutega eluwa nihi aheliya Yolidani ana luwaluwala , toto topowon hi taltalmilila , ge nihi kalivail nihi na nihi teleliya panuwa toto nasi bulina nuku holaviya . ”
06004004	Inoke Yosuwa bolau elulutega eluwa bolo iyaka i hilel haba un maisena ge maisena gamwaliyaa , i yoga gogonil
06004005	ge i baek elal i ba , “ Ku na ku lau Yolidani ana luwaluwala Yehoba wala Yabowaine wana Bateli ana Dedewaga awonaa , yaka tomaha pat maisena ona nuku ahe nuku kalivail vevelamiwa , un maisena maisena nihi bwasowan .
06004006	Pat bolo o ni panuwahikagila hauna Yehoba i ginol elala . Bwaliga ebo natumiyau nihi nelimiu nihi ba , ‘ Pat bolo ya ali sapu ga i ola ? ’
06004007	yaka nuku ba , ‘ Valila wewel Yolidani i kekepa sauga Yehoba wana Bateli ana Dedewaga hi kalivai panetan . ’ Pat bolo o boda Isileli heyan ge heyan ni panuwahikagil . ”
06004008	Inoke bolau o hi ginol ola Yosuwa wana baaba . Hi na pat elulutega eluwa hi ahel wewel Yolidani ana luwaluwala , ali gewi i ola un Isileli ali gewi , i ola Yehoba wana baaba Yosuwa elana . Inoke hi kalivail ge hi na hi teli wali abaholaviya .
06004009	Yaka pat elulutega eluwa , bolo iyaka hi aheliya Yolidani ana luwaluwala labi toto topowon hi taltalmilila , pat o Yosuwa abwe i pahe . He pat bolo o heliya iyoho to ana siga lan ebe .
06004010	He gamagalau etimwawa hi kalapanet haba , yaa topowon bolo Dedewaga hi kalivai hi talmilila Yolidani ana luwaluwala ana siga Yehoba wana baaba gegewena Yosuwa elana Isileli hi ginol haba , i ola ana logugui Mosese i baunan Yosuwa elana .
06004011	Inoke abwe gamagalau mataliyaa , Dedewaga ge topowon bolo ana tokaval hi kalapanet al .
06004012	Bolau bolo un Lubeni , Gada ge un Manasa awalehina hi lovivina lohaveyan kaiwena ge hi kalapanet gamagalau gegewel awoliyaa , i ola Mosese wana baaba elal .
06004013	He ali gewi poti tausan ( 40,000 ) te avaliya Yehoba hi kalapanet hi na Yeliko abwabwina elana lohaveyan kaiwena .
06004014	Lan o elana Yehoba Yosuwa alana i teli heyan Isileli gegewel mataliyaa , inoke hi awatauwan yawalina ana sauga miminana , i ola valila Mosese hi awatauwan .
06004015	He liwanina i ola to . Yehoba i baek Yosuwa elana i ba ,
06004016	“ U baek topowon bolo Bateli ana Dedewaga hi kalivai elal nihi hem Yolidani nihi eguluwai . ”
06004017	Inoke Yosuwa i baek topowon elal i ba , “ Ku hem wewel Yolidani ku eguluwan . ”
06004018	Yaka topowon bolo Yehoba wana Bateli ana Dedewaga hi kalivai , hi ha Yolidani hi eguluwan . Sauga hi piliha datuwa , inoke wewel i tub sikal ge banata i sani al .
06004019	He baliman ana weikena houwan * ana lan elulutega elana te gamagalau Yolidani hi kalapanet-an . Yaka hi na hi holaviya panuwa Gilgal , Yeliko labi leu nati .
06004020	Pat elulutega eluwa bolo hi aheliya wewel Yolidani gamwanaa Yosuwa i pahe panuwa o elana .
06004021	Inoke i baek boda Isileli elal i ba , “ Bwaliga ebo tubutubumiyau nihi nelimiu nihi ba , ‘ Pat bolo ya ali sapu ga i ola ? ’
06004022	yaka nuku baek elal nuku ba , ‘ Yolidani wewelina i kekepa , inoke bilibili kekevana elana Isileli hi kalapanet . ’
06004023	Nuku ba ola o , kaiwena Yehoba wala Yabowaine Yolidani wewelina i pakekepa kaiwemiu ana siga ku kalapanet-an , i ola valila Hoga Keketina i pakekepa kaiwema , ana siga ha kalapanet-an .
06004024	I ginol ola o inoke gamagalau gegewel panayawiya nihi atena Yehoba iya Togasisi , ge komiu Yehoba wami Yabowaine nuku awatauwan sauga gegewena . ”
06005001	Amoli wali kin bolo Yolidani labena leu pai ge Kenani wali kin bolo Hoga Mediteleiniya bebenaa , gegewel wasa hi hago Yehoba Yolidani wewelina i pakekepa ana siga boda Isileli gegewel hi kalapanet haba . Inoke hi lovakun nabi ge nige wali gasisi i gagan tage avaliyau Isileli nihi lohaveyan .
06005002	Sauga o elana Yehoba i baek Yosuwa elana i ba , “ Nibuka enuna nuku bub ge Isileli melubolau tuwaliya buhuna kunisina nuku gotomwa yoho . ” *
06005003	Yaka Yosuwa nibuka i bub ge i ba Isileli melubolau gegewel tuwaliya buhuna kunisina hi gotomwa yoho . Inoke panuwa o alana hi tun Gibeyat Halalot . *
06005004	Yosuwa i ginol ola o , puna i ola hiwe . He Isileli melubolau gegewel bolo hi tagilem Itipita , tuwaliya buhuna kunisina iyaka hi gotomwa yoho . Yaa sauga hi nawanawa ula kekevana elana , wawayau bolo hi abil nige etega tuwana buhuna kunisina hi gogotomwa . Isileli hi nononawanawa ula kekevana elana baliman poti , inoke gamwanaa bolau bolo sauga hi tagilem Itipita wali baliman bosowailiya lohaveyan , gegewel iyaka hi aliga haba , kaiwena Yehoba wana logugui nige hi hehenapuan . Yaka ali lahi hi pwawa i ola Yehoba wana baaba elal , heliya panuwa malumalulina toto Yehoba i bateli tubuliyau elal nige hi kikite .
06005005	
06005006	
06005007	Ha vavalul tamaliyau hi milahel , inoke heliya te Yosuwa i ba ge tuwaliya buhuna kunisina hi gotomwa yoho , kaiwena nige hi giginol uleya .
06005008	Sauga bolau gegewel gotomwa yoho paganina hi ahe haba , yaka hi minaa ga wali abaholaviya ana siga ali kakaini i mwau .
06005009	Inoke Yehoba i baek Yosuwa elana i ba , “ Lan ebe wami miloloyowan Itipita elana puluwawena iyaka ya ahek yoho . ” Yaka panuwa o alana hi tun Gilgal . * Alan o i mihot ana siga lan ebe .
06005010	Sauga Isileli heliya iyoho wali abaholaviya Gilgal , Yeliko abwabwina elana , inoke Nopalegi ana nuwahikan hagalena hi ginol waikena ana lan potinina kokoyavena elana .
06005011	Nopalegi hagalena i mowasi , hi kenu lan i gan , yaka lan o elana hi telipuna Kenani enowana hi anan . Bali enona enuna hi ekeke , enuna hi wowol yaka beleid toto nige alona yis hi vivikuhiya hi umun . Inoke lan o ge i nok Kenani enowana hi mimi anani .
06005012	Lan toto Isileli hi telipuna Kenani enowana hi anan , yaka aanan toto manna i lomowasi ge nige etega al hi pwapwawa . Kaiwena baliman o ge i nok , Kenani enowana hi mimi anani .
06005013	Lan etega Yosuwa iyoho Yeliko gegelinaa , inoke matana i lihin tau etega * i kite i taltalmilil awonaa , wana elohaveyan kilepana iyaka i momol tagilan abanaa ge i pihikan . Yaka Yosuwa i na elana ge i neli i ba , “ Owa ama tolabe etega o ebo ama topihigelgel ? ”
06005014	Tau o i ba , “ Nigeya , ya nem te kaiwena nau Yehoba wana tolohaveyan wali tohouwa . ” Inoke Yosuwa alona wana awatauwan i talpo maninina i pahanalowanek bilibiliya ge i ba , “ Tonowak , hauna nuwam nu baunan nau wam totuwalali elau ? ”
06005015	Yaka Yehoba wana tolohaveyan wali tohouwa i baek Yosuwa elana i ba , “ Aem ana os u leke , kaiwena bilibili toto u talmilila i bwabwalena . ” Inoke Yosuwa i ginol ola to .
06006001	( He panuwa Yeliko hi gane painan , inoke Isileli kaiweliya ana abauluulutuk hi lokausan ge hi matahikan bubun , hi lopwali bahi gamagal etega ni tutuk o ebo ni tatagil . )
06006002	Inoke Yehoba i baek Yosuwa elana i ba , “ U kite , Yeliko iyaka ya teli nimwamwa , ginebi ana kin ge ana tolohaveyan gegewel .
06006003	Lan maisena maisena alomwau ge wam tolohaveyan gegewel panuwa nuku nopainan pamaisena . Nuku ginol ola to lan ali gewi sikis .
06006004	Topowon ali gewi seben bwagigi bolo sipi ali hon nihi noahel , nihi nohouwa Bateli ana Dedewaga awonaa ge nihi yuyu . Lan sebenina elana , panuwa nuku nopainan paseben , ge topowon bwagigi nihi noyuyu .
06006005	Sauga ebo nu hago bwagigi nihi yu hikan , inoke nu ba gamagalau gegewel nihi yala analiya ni bwata . Yaka gana ni maguli ge gamagalau nihi nopasapu nihi na nihi tuk . ”
06006006	Inoke Yosuwa Nan natuna topowon i yoga gogonil ge i baek elal i ba , “ Yehoba wana Bateli ana Dedewaga ku ahe ge ku kalivai . Inoke alomiyau ali gewi seben bwagigi nihi noahel nihi nohouwa Bateli ana Dedewaga awonaa ge nihi yuyu . ”
06006007	Inoke i baek gamagalau elal i ba , “ Ta nok , ta na panuwa ta nopainan ! He tolohaveyan enuna nihi nohouwa hot Yehoba wana Dedewaga awonaa . ”
06006008	Sauga Yosuwa i baaba haba gamagalau elal , yaka topowon ali gewi seben hi nohouwa Yehoba wana Bateli ana Dedewaga awonaa ge bwagigi hi noyuyu .
06006009	Tolohaveyan enuna hi nohouwa bwagigi ali toyuyu awoliyaa , ge enuna al hi nomula Dedewaga enaa . He bwagigi iyoho hi kahikahin .
06006010	Yaa Yosuwa iyaka i ba haba gamagalau elal i ba , “ Bahi yala , bahi anamiu ni bwabwata , ge bahi baaba etega nuku babaunan . Lan toto na ba , ‘ Ku yala , ’ he abwe nuku yala . ”
06006011	Yaka Yehoba wana Bateli ana Dedewaga hi kalivai panuwa hi nopainan pamaisena , i ola Yosuwa wana baaba . Inoke hi sikal wali abaholaviya ge hi kenu .
06006012	Lan i gan mweluluga kekeisi , Yosuwa i lut inoke i ba topowon Yehoba wana Bateli ana Dedewaga hi kalivai al .
06006013	Yaka topowon seben bolo bwagigi ali toyuyu hi nohouwa al Dedewaga awonaa bwagigi hi noyuyu . I ola al tolohaveyan enuna hi nohouwa Dedewaga awonaa ge enuna hi nomula Dedewaga enaa . He bwagigi iyoho hi kahikahin .
06006014	Inoke lan eluwana elana panuwa hi nopainan pamaisena al , yaka abwe hi sikal wali abaholaviya . Hi ginol ola to lan ali gewi sikis .
06006015	Lan sebenina elana panuwa abwe i mwamwananal , inoke Isileli hi lut hi na Yeliko hi nopainan , i ola toto hi giginol lan sikis gamwanaa . Yaa lan toto o abwe panuwa hi nopainan paseben .
06006016	Wali nopain pasebenina elana topowon bwagigi hi yu hikan , yaka Yosuwa i baek gamagalau elal i ba , “ Ku yala ! Kaiwena Yehoba panuwa iyaka i pem elala !
06006017	Yeliko ana tomina ge bugubugulina gegewena Yehoba i ba pwatanek iya elana ta apapanak-agil . Yaa Leyabi yova toganawal mani kaiwena alonau ge wana limi ana tomina gegewel bahi etega nuku aapapanak-agil , kaiwena wala tokenan i label ge i pabun sumel .
06006018	He nuku matahikagimiu bugul bolo Yehoba i ba pwatanek iya elana , bahi nuku aahel , eba totomiu ami nak nuku ginol . Ebo etega nuku ahe , he nasi apapanak Yehoba ni ba pwatanem Isileli gegewela elala .
06006019	Silba ge gold gegewena ginebi bugul bolo hi ginola kopa ge aiyan elal , ta pwabwabwalena-agil Yehoba kaiwena , ge ta pwahinil gogomwau ana abateliya Yehoba wana limi gamwanaa . ”
06006020	Sauga gamagalau hi hago topowon bwagigi hi yu hikan , yaka hi yala . Inoke Yeliko ana gana i maguli ge tolohaveyan gegewel hi nopasapu hi na hi tuk Yeliko gamwanaa ge hi ahe .
06006021	Yaka panuwa hi apapanak-an hoti i ola Yehoba wana baaba . Wali elohaveyan kilepana elana bolau , yowau , wawayau ge toliki ginebi ge wali bulumwakau , sipi ge donki hi lolil habal .
06006022	Yaka Yosuwa i baek tokenan eluwa bolo valila Yeliko hi anugayawa-an elal i ba , “ Ku na ku tuk Leyabi wana limiya , inoke alonau tutunau gegewel ku enil nihi nem , ni ola wami bateli elana . ”
06006023	Inoke hevalau toanugayawa hi na hi tuk , yaka Leyabi alonau tamana , hinana , nunau ge tutunau gegewel hi en tagilagil . Inoke hi na hi telel Isileli wali abaholavi tolinaa .
06006024	Inoke Isileli wali tolohaveyan Yeliko bwabwaligena ge bugubugulina gegewena hi ton olan . Yaa silba ge gold gegewena ginebi bugul bolo hi ginola kopa ge aiyan elal , hi bugulagil ge hi na hi pwahinil gogomwau ana abateliya Yehoba wana limiya .
06006025	Inoke Yosuwa Leyabi ge tutunau gegewel yawaliliya i pwamwal , kaiwena bolau bolo valila i patunal hi na Yeliko hi anugayawa-an , Leyabi i label ge i pabun sumel . He tubutubunau heliya iyoho hi minaa boda Isileli gamwaliyaa ana siga lan ebe .
06006026	Sauga toto o , Yosuwa bateli gasigasisena i baunan i palopisai i ba , “ Tau toto ebo ni lut ge panuwa Yeliko e ni tal pasikal , Yehoba tau o ni nuwamut-an nak ni pwawa . Sauga ebo panuwa ana wauwau ni sepa , he natuna gamaun ni aliga . Ge sauga ebo panuwa ana gana ana nog ni pamilil , he natuna melumelu ni aliga . ”
06006027	Yehoba i minek Yosuwa elana , inoke wasana i lelu Kenani ana labi bwalibwaligena elana .
06007001	Valila Yeliko ge bugubugulina gegewena Yehoba i ba pwatanek iya elana i ba Isileli nihi apapanak-agil , * yaa wana logugui o hi leke . He tau etega alana Eikan , iya Kami natuna , Simli tubuna , Selaa tubutubunina , ana un Yuda , Yeliko bugubugulina enuna i ahel . Inoke Yehoba i huga nabi Isileli elal .
06007002	Yosuwa bolau enuna i patunaliem Yeliko nihi na panuwa Ai , Betel labi nati , Bet-aben labenaa . I baek elal i ba , “ Nuku na nuku ha labi o nuku anugayawa-an . ” Inoke bolau hi ginol ola Yosuwa wana baaba .
06007003	Sauga hi sikal Yosuwa elana inoke wana wasa hi pek hi ba , “ Bahi tolohaveyan gegewel nu papatunal nihi nana nihi lolohaveyan panuwa Ai elal . Heliya nige hi gegewi to , inoke besena te tausan eluwa o ebo eton ( 2,000 o ebo 3,000 ) nu patunal , yaka panuwa nihi ahe . Bahi nu babaa tolohaveyan gegewel nihi nonok ge tuwaliya nihi nonopaaliga bwabwage . ”
06007004	Inoke Yosuwa tolohaveyan ali gewi i ola tausan eton ( 3,000 ) i patunal hi na hi ha hi haveyan , yaa Ai wali tolohaveyan Isileli hi pakokovel .
06007005	Yaka hi takeliya panuwa ana abauluulutuk elana hi loek labilabiya hi na ali siga labi toto pat hi ahiahiya , * oya punaa . Inoke sauga Isileli hi laulau labilabiya , ali gewi teti sikis ( 36 ) , Ai hi lolil . Inoke boda Isileli hi lovakun nabi nige wali gasisi i gagan .
06007006	Inoke Yosuwa alonau ge Isileli wali tohouwa nuwanak kaiwena ali kaliko hi kukuleli , papakova hi yoho heyan kokowaliyaa , ge hi talpo bilibili pwatanaa Yehoba wana Bateli ana Dedewaga awonaa ana siga kokoyavi .
06007007	Inoke Yosuwa i baek Yehoba elana i ba , “ Babala Yehoba , hauna kaiwena u ahema wewel Yolidani ha kalapanet-an ? Age nu telema boda Amoli nimaliyaa ge nihi apapanak-agima ? Binimala valila naha minek ya to wewel Yolidani labena etega .
06007008	O Babala , nige ya aatena hauna gun na baunan eliyam . Ama topihigelgel wama tolohaveyan hi pakokovel ge hi lou sikal .
06007009	Sauga Kenani ge labi ya towohiliyau gegewel al wasa nihi hago , yaka nihi nem nihi haveyan elama ge nihi pwamowasema . Yaka abwe hauna nu ginol ge bahi alam bwabwatana nihi babaa lowan ? ”
06007010	Yaa Yehoba i baek Yosuwa elana i ba , “ U lut ! Hauna kaiwena u talpo bilibiliya ge u kenukenu ?
06007011	Isileli ku gegi , no bateli eliyamiu ana logugui iyaka ku leke . Valila Yeliko bugubugulina ya ba pwatanem elau ya ba nuku apapanak-agil , yaa bugul enuna ku ahe totomiu kaiwemiu . Ku kaoma , ku alahagil , yaka ginebi ge wami bugubugul ku pwahin pamaisena .
06007012	Inoke apapanak iyaka ya ba pwatanewa Isileli eliyamiu . Heiya te kaiwena ge nige bosowaimiu nuku talmilil gagasisi ami topihigelgel awoliyaa , yaa ku lou sikal . He bugubugul bolo ya ba pwatanem elau ya ba nuku apapanak-agil , ebo nige nuku aahek yoho gamwamiwa ge nuku aapapanak-agil , he nige al na miminaa eliyamiu .
06007013	“ Nu na gamagalau nu lovivina-agil nihi talmilil maniniwa . Nu baek elal nu ba , ‘ Nuku abubunimiu nuku yanayana bwaligumwa kaiwena . Kaiwena Yehoba Isileli wala Yabowaine , i ba : O Isileli ! Bugul bolo ya ba pwatanem elau ya ba nuku apapanak-agil , he enuna iyoho gamwamiwa . Nige bosowaimiu nuku talmilil gagasisi ami topihigelgel awoliyaa ana siga bugul bolo o nuku ahek yohil .
06007014	“ ‘ Bwaligumwa mweluluga un ge un nuku nem nuku talmilil maniniwa . Yaka un toto na hile , * pwahiya ge pwahiya nihi notagil . Yaka pwahiya toto na hile , tini ge tini nihi notagil . Yaka tini toto na hile , tau ge tau nihi notagil .
06007015	Henala ebo na pwawa , he bugubugul bolo ya ba nuku apapanak-agil iyoho elana . Alonau natunau nuku lolil , yaka tuwaliya ginebi ge wana gogomwau gegewel nuku ton ginahaa . Nuku ginol ola , kaiwena nau Yehoba no bateli eliyamiu ana logugui i leke ge Isileli i papapuluwawi-agimiu . ’ ”
06007016	Lan i gan mweluluga kekeisi Yosuwa i ba Isileli un ge un hi notagil , inoke Yehoba un Yuda i hile .
06007017	Yaka i ba un Yuda pwahiya ge pwahiya hi notagil , inoke Yehoba pwahiya Selaa i hile . Yaka i ba pwahiya Selaa tini ge tini hi notagil , inoke Yehoba tini Simli i hile .
06007018	Yaka Yosuwa i ba tini o tau ge tau hi notagil , inoke Eikan , Kami natuna , Simli tubuna , Selaa tubutubunina , ana un Yuda Yehoba i pwawa .
06007019	Yaka Yosuwa i baek Eikan elana i ba , “ Natu , nu baaba tunahot , wam gegi nu ba tagilan , inoke Yehoba , iya Isileli wala Yabowaine , alana ni wasawasa ge gamagalau nihi tobalan . No wasa nu pem hauna u ginol , bahi nu aalahan eliyau . ”
06007020	Anana i lahe i ba , “ I tunahot ! Iyaka ya gegi Yehoba Isileli wala Yabowaine matanaa . He ya ginol ola hiwe .
06007021	Yeliko bugubugulina gamwaliyaa , Babiloni kalikona yayapona ana awa waiwaisana , mani silba ali gewi tu handeled ( 200 ) , * ge gold ba maisena ana pulowan i ola 575 glem ( grams ) ya kitel . Yaka ya mata momoniagil ge ya ahel . Heliya iyoho ya sumel bilibiliya no epanapana gamwanaa , ge silba i minaa paiya . ”
06007022	Inoke Yosuwa elopapatuna i patunal hi patalelu hi na epanapana elana . Yaka bugul bolo o hi pwawal i sumeliya to , i ola wana baaba .
06007023	Inoke bugubugul bolo o gegewel hi ahel hi pwatanik Yosuwa ge Isileli gegewel elal , yaka hi vatalil Yehoba manininaa .
06007024	Inoke Yosuwa alonau ge Isileli gegewel Eikan , Selaa tubutubunina , ginebi silba , kaliko yayapona , gold , i ola al natunau bolau ge yowau , wana bulumwakau , wana donki , wana sipi , wana epanapana ge wana bugubugul gegewena bolo hi gan elana , hi ahel hi na Eikol Abwabwina elana .
06007025	Yaka Yosuwa i baek Eikan elana i ba , “ Hauna kaiwena ge nak u pwatanim elala ? He lan ebe Yehoba nak ni ginol eliyam . ” Yaka Isileli gegewel Eikan alonau natunau hi loipat-agil ge hi aliga , inoke abwe tuwaliya ge wali bugubugul gegewena hi tonil ginaha elana .
06007026	Yaka pat pahipahi bwabwatana hi pahe pwataliyaa , ge pat bolo o heliya iyoho ana siga lan ebe . Yaka Yehoba nige al i huhuga Isileli eliyalil . He panuwa o alana Yosuwa i tun Eikol * Abwabwina ge alan o hi lumelumeni ana siga sauga ya .
06008001	Yehoba i ba yaka Yosuwa alonau wana tolohaveyan hi nok al Ai , yaka saugena o Ai hi pakokovel , yaka panuwa hi ton ge hi pasamwalekaleka .

06008030	Sauga etegana al Yosuwa alonau ge Isileli gegewel hi na Oya Ebal , inoke Yosuwa pat i pahe abapowon etega i ginol Yehoba Isileli wali Yabowaine kaiwena .
06008031	I ginol i ola ana logugui , toto valila Yehoba wana totuwalali Mosese i baunan Isileli elal ge i leli wana Logugui ana Buki gamwanaa i ba , “ Pat bwabwaligel bolo nige etuwalali aiyan elana hi tatal pasapu-agil te nuku ahe abapowon nuku pahe . ” Yaka abapowon o pwatanaa bwasumu enuna hi powon pwabwaligel Yehoba elana ge enuna hi powonagil heliheliyam powonina .
06008032	Inoke labi o elana Mosese wana logugui toto valila i leli , Yosuwa i leli papanet pat pwataliyaa * Isileli gegewel mataliyaa .
06008033	He Isileli gegewel , bolo Isileli hot ge bolo bwabwali , avaliyau wali tonowakau , totuwalali alaliya bwabwatana , ge toasiyala , hi talmilila Yehoba wana Bateli ana Dedewaga bebena labui elal , awoliya i noek topowon bolo hi kaval elal , un Libai . Boda etega hi talmilila Oya Gelisim punaa ge boda etega hi talmilila Oya Ebal punaa . He hi talmilil i ola valila Yehoba wana totuwalali Mosese i ba nihi ginol ge gamagalau ba mulolu ana baaba nihi hago . *
06008034	Yaka abwe Yosuwa Logugui gegewena ginebi ba mulolu ana baaba ge ba nuwamut ana baaba i vasili elal , i ola toto Mosese i leli lowan Logugui ana Buki gamwanaa .
06008035	Logugui maisena ge maisena bolo Mosese i leli , Yosuwa i vasili boda Isileli elal , * ginebi ana yowau ge ana wawayau , i ola al bwabwali bolo hi minaa elal .
06009001	Gibiyon hi hago Isileli ga hi ginol ola Yeliko ge Ai elal , yaka gamagalau enuna hi patunal Yosuwa elana . Kakawi etega hi ginol : kaliko bebeyaunana hi galoi , aeliya aana nanakina hi pahe , yaka beleid toto iyaka i kevakeva ge i wado hi noahe . Yaka hi baek Yosuwa elana hi ba , “ Ama ha neem labi yayapona . Nuwama ta pebabateli-agila alomeyau komiu ta mibubun . ” Yaka hi pebabateli-agil i ola to ge Yehoba alana hi papasila-an bateli ana patunahot kaiwena . Lan eton i mowasi , abwe Isileli hi hago te Gibiyon nige ana bwaga i yayapu . Yaka wali tohouwa hi ba , “ Iyaka ta papasila Yehoba alana elana . He bahi yawaliliya ta aapanak , yaa nihi totuwalali elala . ” Inoke Yosuwa i baek Gibiyon elal i ba , “ Heyan ge heyan nige ni momowasi nuku totuwalali ebwakil nuku gelagela ge wewel nuku wagiwagi no Yabowaine wana limi tapwalolo kaiwena . ” Inoke Yosuwa wana nuwatu hi talamwi ge hi ginol i ola to .

06009016	Lan eton i mowasi , abwe Isileli hi hago te Gibiyon nige ana bwaga i yayapu . Yaka wali tohouwa hi ba , “ Iyaka ta papasila Yehoba alana elana . He bahi yawaliliya ta aapanak , yaa nihi totuwalali elala . ”
06009017
