27012002	Bolo hi aliga ge tuwaliya i kenukenu bilibili gamwanaa , hi gewigewi nihi lut al . Enuna yawal mihomihotina nihi pwawa ge enuna puluwawi ge nak mihomihotina nihi pwawa .
27012003	Bolo tonuwa sapu ge pagan sasapona hi panpankiti-an gamagalau hi gewi elal , maniniliya ni namanamal ni ola alalati bwagatau labulabum namanamalina ge ni ola putum , sauga gegewena nige ni momowasi .
27012004	“ Owa Daniyela , am pankite ya ana baaba nu sume gamagalau elal , ana buki nu papi kaus ana siga sauga mowamowasena . He gamagalau nihi gewi nihi patalelu nemnowa nuwaliya wali aatena nihi pwabwata . ”
27012005	Yaka nau Daniyela matau ya lipwatanik anelose labui al ya kitel , etega i minaa wewel labena etega ge etegana i minaa labena etega .
27012006	Anelose toto kaliko wakewakekena waiwaisana i galoi i minaa hawawala wewel pwatanaa , inoke anelose labui o etegana i nel elana i ba , “ Sauga lolovakunina ya ana yapu ga ni ola ge abwe ni mowasi ? ”
27012007	Inoke anelose toto kaliko wakewakekena waiwaisana i galoi nimana labui i latahin labulabumwa , yaka i papasila Yabowaine toto yawalina i mihot alanaa ge i ba , “ Ana yapu ni ola baliman eton ge awalehina . Sauga gamagal toto gamagalau bwabwalel i apapanak-agil wana gasisi ana sauga ni so , he bugul bolo ya nihi mowasi . ”
27012008	Wana baaba ya hago , yaa nige nuwau i sasapu . Inoke ya nel , “ Tonowak , bugul bolo ya gegewel ali abapwamowasi ga ni ola ? ”
27012009	Anau i lahe i ba , “ Daniyela , bahi nu nuwanuwatu kaiwena , nu nowa ya , kaiwena baaba ya nihi misumi ga ana siga sauga mowamowasena .
27012010	Gamagalau nihi gewi , labose o eliyalil Yehoba ni abubunil ge nihi yanayana , yaa nak ana toginol nak nihi mimi awaawaginol ya . Nak ana toginol nige nuwaliya ni sasapu , yaa tonuwa sapu baaba ana sapu nihi atena .
27012011	“ Lan maisena ge maisena ana powon nihi paveyaho ge toapapanak bwaibwaikikinina nihi pamilil , yaka toto o enaa lan ali gewi 1,290 * nihi gan .
27012012	Bolo ebo nihi abulilek ge alona wali atimatuwa nihi matamatan ana siga lan ali gewi 1,335 nihi mowasi , Yehoba ni muloluagil .
27012013	“ Yaa owa , nu nowa alom wam nuwa laumwal nu mina ana siga wam lan ali abapwamowasi . Nu aliga ge nu veyaho , inoke sauga mowamowasena elana nu lut al ge molam toto Yehoba i lovivina-an nu ahe . ”
32001001	Sauga etegana Yehoba i baek Yona , Amitai natuna elana i ba ,
32001002	“ Nu na Ninibe panuwa bwabwatana , ge nu papaatena nu ba nau na lahel , kaiwena wali ginol nanakina i bwata matawa . ”
32001003	Yaa Yona nuwana Yehoba ni lou luwai ge ni na Sipein . Inoke i na i lau panuwa Yopa , waga etegana i pwawa i nana labi o elana . Yaka wana kamwasa i pwamola , inoke i gaiha ge i kuki tage ni na Sipein ge ana bwaga ni gan Yehoba elana .
32001004	Yaka abwe Yehoba mana bwabwatana hot i patowa hoga pwatanaa . Wowol ana gasisi kaiwena kelaubwa waga ni pasamwalekaleka .
32001005	Waga ana totuwalali gegewel hi lovakun , inoke maisena maisena labe kaiwena hi yoga wali yabowaineyau elal . Inoke usan toto hi usan hi yoho palo hogaa , yaka waga ni mweyaha . Yaa Yona iyoho waga gamwanaa ge i kenu mati .
32001006	Abwe kapten i na elana ge i ba , “ Gan , ga i ola ge u kenu mati ? U lut ge u awanun wam yabowaine elana ! Tab eba ni nuwanakagila ge ni pwamwalila . ”
32001007	Waga ana totuwalali hi pebaaba-agil hi ola , “ Sula ta ab * ge ta loyaan henala wana gegi ge nak ya i masal . ” Inoke sula hi ab ge Yona hi pwawa .
32001008	Yaka hi nel elana hi ba , “ U ba bubun eliyama . Owa wam gegi kaiwena nak ya i masal eliyala o nigeya ? Hauna wam tuwalali ? Hauna labi elana u noem ? Hapanuwa gamagalina owa ? ”
32001009	Inoke analiya i lahe i ba , “ Nau Hibilu gamagalina , ya kululu Yehoba , Yabowaine labulabumwa , iya panuwa ge hoga ali toginol . ”
32001010	Inoke hi lovakun nabi . He hi atena te Yehoba i lou luwai , kaiwena iyaka wali wasa i pek ola . Inoke hi baek elana hi ba , “ Ga i ola ge u ginol ola ? ”
32001011	Yaa wowol iyaka i gagasisi nawa , inoke hi baek elana hi ba , “ Hauna gun naha ginol eliyam ge wowol ya ni mowasi ? ”
32001012	Yona i baek elal i ba , “ Ku alipalowau hogaa inoke ni mainum . Ya atena nau no gegi kaiwena , heiya te wowol bwabwatana ya i masal eliyamiu . ”
32001013	He totuwalali nige nuwaliya i oola , yaka hi logasisi tage waga nihi leva tukan panuwaa . Yaa nige bosowailiya , kaiwena wowol iyaka i gasisi hot .
32001014	Inoke hi yoga ha Yehoba elana hi ba , “ Oo Yehoba , ha awanun elam , bahi nu babaa naha yayaomal kaiwena tau ya yawalina ha apanak . Bahi nu babaa tage gegi i minaa eliyama kaiwena tau etegana ha payaomal . Bahi nu lalahema , kaiwena owa u ba te wowol ya i masal . ”
32001015	Inoke Yona hi ahe ge hi alipalo hogaa , yaka abwe wowol bwabwatana i mowasi ge i mainum .
32001016	Ginol o kaiwena totuwalali Yehoba hi lovakunan nabiyan , inoke bwasumu etega hi powonan elana ge hi bateli nihi kukululu eliyana .
32002001	Inoke Yehoba moti bwabwatana etegana i patuna i na Yona i tinon , ge i miminaa tinena gamwanaa lan eton ge bulin eton .
32002002	Yona iyoho moti tinena gamwanaa , inoke i awanun wana Yabowaine Yehoba elana ,
32002003	i ba : O Yehoba , no minanakina elana ya yoga elam , inoke anau u lahe . Yaomal hot elana ya awanun labe kaiwena , inoke anau u hago .
32002004	U alipalowau hogaa ya lau limwan gamwanaa hot , hoga i mipainagau . Wam bagol bwabwatal hi bini pwatawa .
32002005	Ya ba , “ Iyaka u patuna owaowa-agau matamwa , yaa matau na lihin al elam wam Limi Bwabwalena elana . ”
32002006	Hoga i yabomwau kelaubwa na unun , limwan i mipainagau , lumun * kaunu i avan .
32002007	Ya lobek ya na paiya hot o siga oya wali siun i telipunaa , ya lau ya na Tuma , iya nige bosowaina gamagal naha tagila . Yaa owa , Yehoba no Yabowaine , yawaliu u momol heyanem panuwa milalauina o elana .
32002008	Sauga yawaliu kelaubwa ni mowasi , Yehoba ya nuwahikagiwa . No awanun i ha elam i na wam Limi Bwabwalena elana .
32002009	Bolo hi kukululuek yabowaine kakawel elal , iyaka hi towaagiwa , nige hi nunuwana-agiwa .
32002010	Yaa alou no ba mulolu bwasumu na powonan eliyam , ge na ginol ni ola no bateli eliyam . Pwamwal i noem Yehoba eliyam .
32002011	Inoke Yehoba i ba moti i na Yona i mamanuvi-an datuwa .
32003001	Yaka paeluwana Yehoba i baek Yona elana i ba ,
32003002	“ Nu na Ninibe panuwa bwabwatana , ge wasa toto ya baunan elam nu wasaan elal . ”
32003003	Inoke Yona Yehoba anana i hago ge i na Ninibe . He Ninibe panuwa bwabwatana hot , ebo gamwana ta nawaan nasi lan eton ta nawanawa-an .
32003004	Lan houwan elana , Yona i telipuna i nawanawa panuwa gamwanaa , inoke i papaatena i ba , “ Lan poti ni mowasi abwe Yehoba Ninibe ni pasamwalekaleka . ”
32003005	Ninibe gamagaliliyau Yabowaine wana baaba hi abulilek-an . Inoke i telipunaa bolo alaliya bwabwatal i na bolo alaliya kekeisi elal , hi ba ali galebu nihi palahikan ge kaliko toto bwasumu pupunona elana hi ginoliya nihi galoi . *
32003006	Sauga Ninibe ana kin i hago Yona ga i ba ola , inoke i lutem wana abamina wawasana elana ge wasawasa kalikona i palo yoho tuwanaa , yaka kaliko toto bwasumu pupunona elana hi ginoliya i galoi ge i misiyowa papakova gamwanaa .
32003007	Inoke baaba i patuna i na Ninibe ana tomina gegewel elal i ba : Logugui hiwe i noem nau kin alowau ge o tolabe elama . Bahi gamagal o ebo bwasumu etega , ebo bulumwakau , sipi o goti , aanan ni aan ge wewel ni iim .
32003008	Gamagalau ge bwasumu tuwaliya nihi os kaliko toto bwasumu pupunona elana hi ginoliya , inoke nihi awanun gagasisi Yabowaine elana . Yaka wali pagan nanakil ali en nihi pek ge wali lohalohaveyan nihi paveyaho .
32003009	Ebo ta ginol ola , tab abwe Yabowaine ni atilomwan-agila ge wana nuwatu ni pil , yaka ana huga ni mowasi ge nige ta yayaomal ?
32003010	Sauga Yabowaine gamagalau wali ginol i kite ge i kite wali pagan nanakil ali en iyaka hi pek , inoke i atilomwan-agil , nige i aapapanak-agil i oola valila wana baaba .
32004001	He Yona nige i yayaliyaya Yehoba wana nuwatu kaiwena inoke i huga .
32004002	Yaka i awanun Yehoba elana i ba , “ O Yehoba , valila nau iyoho no panuwaa , he ya atena ya te Ninibe nige nu lalahel ! Heiya kaiwena etimwawa ya lou tage na nok Sipein . Kaiwena ya atena owa Yabowaine toatilomwan ge tonuwaleyan , nige etimwawa u huhuga , nunuwana u kalaopopwi , ge etimwawa wam nuwatu nu pil nige gamagalau nu aapapanak-agil .
32004003	O Yehoba , sauga ya yawaliu nu ahe . Nige nuwau na molu , nuwau na aliga . ”
32004004	Yaa anana Yehoba i lahe i ba , “ Wam sapu i gan ge nu huga ? ”
32004005	Inoke Yona i tagil i na panuwa tolinaa labi balimana . Ana pwapwaligum etegana i ginol , inoke i misiyowa liguligumwina elana ge i matamatan ni kite Yehoba panuwa Ninibe ni lahe o ebo nigeya .
32004006	Yaka abwe Yehoba Yabowaine hihiu etegana i pasiun i hek Yona pwatanaa ana pwapwaligum , inoke tuwana amnana ni pawaisi . Yona nuwana i waisi hot hihiu o kaiwena .
32004007	Yaa panuwa abwe i mwamwananal , Yehoba i ba mwatamwata etegana hihiu i an inoke i aliga .
32004008	Sabwelu iyaka i ha , inoke Yehoba mana babaliman kalakalasina i patowa ge sabwelu Yona kaununa i yane , inoke tuwana i pweyata . Nuwana ni aliga , yaka i ba , “ Binimala na aliga , nige nuwau na molu . ”
32004009	Yaa Yabowaine i baek elana i ba , “ Wam sapu i gan ge hihiu baena u huga ? ” Yaka i ba , “ Ibwe , ya huga nabi , nuwau na aliga . ”
32004010	Inoke Yehoba i ba , “ Owa u nuwanuwatu hihiu ya kaiwena , yaa nige u papasiun ge nige bugul etega u giginol kaiwena . Bulin maisena i siun ge bulin etega al i aliga .
32004011	He Ninibe , iya panuwa bwabwatana , gamwanaa gamagal ali gewi wan handeled tuwenti tausan ( 120,000 ) yayaluwaliya i gogou , avaliyau ge bwasumu hi gewi . Age bahi nau na nuwanuwatu kaiweliya ? ”
40001001	Yeisu Keliso ana lihu i ola hiwe . Yeisu Keliso iya Deibid tubutubunina , Deibid iya Abalahama tubutubunina .
40001002	Abalahama natuna Aisake , Aisake natuna Yakobo , Yakobo natunau Yuda ge talinau ,
40001003	Yuda natunau Peles ge Sela , hinaliya Tama , Peles natuna Hesiloni , Hesiloni natuna Lama ,
40001004	Lama natuna Aminadaba , Aminadaba natuna Nason , Nason natuna Salimon ,
40001005	Salimon natuna Bowasa , hinana heiya Leyabi , Bowasa natuna Obedi , hinana heiya Ludi , Obedi natuna Diyesi ,
40001006	Diyesi natuna Kin Deibid . Deibid natuna Solomon , hinana heiya toto valila Ulaiya lagona ,
40001007	Solomon natuna Lehobowam , Lehobowam natuna Abaidiya , Abaidiya natuna Asa ,
40001008	Asa natuna Yehosepat , Yehosepat natuna Yolama , Yolama natuna Usaiya ,
40001009	Usaiya natuna Yotami , Yotami natuna Ehasi , Ehasi natuna Hesekaiya ,
40001010	Hesekaiya natuna Manasa , Manasa natuna Eimon , Eimon natuna Yosaiya ,
40001011	Yosaiya natunau Yehoyasin ge talinau , sauga toto Babiloni hi nem
40001012	Isileli hi ahel ge hi na hi telel Babiloni inoke enaa : Yehoyasin natuna Seyaltiyel , Seyaltiyel natuna Selababel ,
40001013	Selababel natuna Abiuda , Abiuda natuna Elayakim , Elayakim natuna Eiso ,
40001014	Eiso natuna Seidok , Seidok natuna Asim , Asim natuna Eliuda ,
40001015	Eliuda natuna Eliyesa , Eliyesa natuna Meitan , Meitan natuna Yakobo ,
40001016	ge Yakobo natuna Yosepa , Meli lagona . Meli i ab Yeisu , heiya te ta ba Mesaiya .
40001017	He inoke Abalahama ana siga Deibid ta pwawa heyan ali gewi potin , Deibid ana siga sauga toto Isileli hi telel Babiloni heyan ali gewi potin , ge sauga toto o ana siga Mesaiya i masal heyan ali gewi potin .
40001018	Yeisu Keliso wana masal i ola hiwe . Hinana Meli alona ge Yosepa hi kawakawalolu . Nigeya ga hi aalolon , hi pwawa Meli iyaka i liyan Yayaluwa Bwabwalena wana gasisi eliyana .
40001019	Yosepa wana pagan i sapu ge nige nuwana Meli ni papuluwawi-an boda mataliyaa , inoke i nuwatu tage wali kawakawalolu ni leke sume .
40001020	I nuwanuwatu ola o , yaka ana kenonou elana Yehoba wana anelose i masala elana ge i ba , “ Yosepa , Deibid tubuna , bahi nu lolovakun te Meli nu ahe lagom , kaiwena wana liyan i neem Yayaluwa Bwabwalena elana .
40001021	Abwe ni ab natuna melutau , inoke alana nu tun Yeisu , * kaiwena wana gamagalau ni pwamwalil wali gegi elana . ”
40001022	He i masal i ola to , inoke Yehoba wana baaba toto palopita etega i pamasal i tabwa tunahot ,
40001023	i ba , “ Gamaina matabubuwa ni liyan ge ni ab natuna melutau , inoke alana nihi tun Imanuwela . ” Imanuwela ana sapu heiya “ Yehoba avala . ”
40001024	Sauga Yosepa i kenu lut , inoke Meli i alolonan i ola Yehoba wana anelose wana baaba eliyana .
40001025	Yaa nige alona hi kekenu toyawa ana siga i ab natuna melutau . Inoke Yosepa wawaya alana i tun Yeisu .
40002001	Yeisu hi ab Bedeliyema , Yudiya ana labi elana , sauga toto Helodi iya wali kin . Inoke tosiba enuna hi loem nati hi nem Yelusalema ,
40002002	yaka hi nel hi ba , “ Wawaya toto hi ab tage Yudiya wali kin iya ga ? Ana etotohi putum ha kitek nati , inoke ha nem ge naha kululu elana . ”
40002003	Sauga Kin Helodi wasa ya i hago i nuwanuwatu nabi , i ola al Yelusalema ana tomina hi gewigewi .
40002004	Topowon bwabwatal ge Logugui ana topankite i yoga gogonil ge i nelil i ba , “ Mesaiya ga nihi aba ? ”
40002005	Hi ba , “ Bedeliyema , Yudiya ana labi elana , kaiwena palopita i leli i ola hiwe :
40002006	Komiu Bedeliyema , Yudiya ana labi elana , nige bosowaina ta ba alamiu nige i bwabwata kaiwena tohouwa etega ni masal gamwamiwa inoke no gamagalau Isileli ni nulil . ”
40002007	Yaka Helodi i ba tosiba hi nem alonau hi liwan sumi , inoke i nelil hauna sauga hot putum ya i masal .
40002008	Yaka abwe i patunal hi na Bedeliyema i ba , “ Ku na ga wawaya nuku loyaan bubun . Sauga ebo nuku pwawa inoke no wasa nuku pem , yaka nau al ge na na na kululu elana . ”
40002009	Tosiba kin anana hi hago inoke hi nawanawa al , yaka putum toto hi kitek nati hi kite al . He sauga hi kite , hi yaliyaya bubun hot . Inoke putum i houwaagil ana siga i veyahowa awan toto wawaya i miminaa pwatanaa .
40002010	
40002011	Yaka hi na hi ulutuk limiya ge wawaya hi kite alona hinana Meli , inoke hi loepwakoku ge hi kululu elana . Wali gogomwau ana nabwa hi pwela inoke wali mulolu hi pek , gold , plenkinsens * ge enonu toto alana meya .
40002012	Kenonou elana Yehoba i baek elal bahi nihi sisikal Helodi elana , inoke hi noek kamwasa getoga elana hi na wali panuwaa .
40002013	Sauga tosiba hi egon , yaka Yosepa ana kenonou elana Yehoba wana anelose i masal elana ge i ba , “ Helodi nasi wawaya ni loyaan nuwana ni tagapaaliga . U lut , wawaya alona ge hinana u ahel ge ku lou ku na Itipita . Inoke nuku miminaa ga o ana siga na ba , yaka abwe nuku sikal . ”
40002014	Yaka Yosepa i lut , wawaya alona ge hinana i ahel inoke bulina hi egon hi na Itipita ,
40002015	ge hi miminaa ga o ana siga Helodi i aliga . He i masal i ola to , inoke Yehoba wana baaba toto palopita etega i pamasal i tabwa tunahot , i ba , “ Natu ya yogaan i tagila Itipita . ”
40002016	Sauga Helodi i atena age tosiba hi kakawe , inoke i huga nabi . Yaka wana tolohaveyan i patunal ge wawayau melutauil Bedeliyema ge ana labi gegewena , bolo wali baliman eluwa ge gabulanaa , hi tagapaaligal . I golugoluwa sauga toto tosiba hi pamasal ge putum i masal .
40002017	He i masal i ola to , inoke Yelemaiya wana baaba i tabwa tunahot , i ba :
40002018	Anan etega hi hago Lama elana , kahin nuwanuwanakina hot . Letiyeli i kahin natunau kaiweliya , nige nuwana nihi payaliyaya kaiwena iyaka hi aliga .
40002019	Wali minamina ana siga Helodi i aliga , inoke Itipita elana Yehoba wana anelose i masal Yosepa ana kenonou elana
40002020	ge i ba , “ U lut , wawaya alona ge hinana u ahel ge ku sikal labi Isileli , kaiwena toto nuwana wawaya ni lol iyaka i aliga . ”
40002021	Inoke Yosepa i lut , wawaya alona ge hinana i ahel ge hi sikal labi Isileli .
40002022	Yaa sauga i hago Akeleyas i tabwa kin labi Yudiya elana , tamana Helodi abana i milahe , inoke Yosepa i lovakun nok to labi o elana . Ana kenonou elana Yehoba i baek elana inoke i nok i na Galili ana labi elana ,
40002023	ge i na i miminaa panuwa Nasaleta . He i masal i ola to , inoke palopitau wali baaba i tabwa tunahot , hi ba , “ Gamagalau nihi ba iya gagama Nasaleta . ”
40003001	Saugena o Diyon Tobabitaiso i nem ge i papaatena labi Yudiya wali ula gamwanaa labi kekevana elana .
40003002	I ba , “ Wami pagan nanakina ana en nuku pek , kaiwena Yehoba wana abalogugui ana sauga i kelaubwa . ”
40003003	Diyon bana te palopita Aiseya i baunan sauga toto i ba : Gamagal etega to i “ Babala wana kamwasa ku lovivina-an , wana kela ku pasapu . ”
40003004	Diyon ana kaliko heiya kaliko toto kamel pupunona elana hi ginoliya ge henuwanina ana wasikewa bulumakau kunisina elana hi ginoliya . Aana heiya sagagai * ge luvi toto uleya .
40003005	Gamagalau hi nem elana hi neem Yelusalema , hi neem Yudiya labena gegewena , ge labi gegewena toto wewel Yolidani labenaa .
40003006	Wali gegi hi wasaan inoke i pababitaisol wewel Yolidani elana .
40003007	Boda Palisi ge boda Sadiusi hi gewi i kitel hi nenem tage ni pababitaisol , inoke i baek elal i ba , “ Komiu ku ola mwata ! Henala i baewa eliyamiu ge nuwamiu Yehoba wana lahi toto i nenem nuku louwi ?
40003008	Ebo tunahot wami gegi iyaka ana en ku pek , he enona ni masal yawalimiu elana .
40003009	Bahi nuku nuwatu tage nuku ba , ‘ Ama tamama Abalahama , bosowaima ya te Yehoba wana lahi naha louwi . ’ Na ba eliyamiu Yehoba i bosowaina pat ya ni ahel ge Abalahama tubunau ni ginolil .
40003010	He wana kenumu iyaka i lovivina-an ebwakil ewahililiya ni gotomwa ge nihi maguli . Ebwakil gegewel bolo enowaliya nige i wawaisi ni govel ge ni yoho tukagil ginaha elana .
40003011	“ Nau ya pababitaisomiu wewel elana kaiwena wami pagan nanakina ana en iyaka ku pek . Yaa toto i nenem ewa , iya alana i bwata , nau alau nige i bwabwata . Nau nige no waisi i gagan ge tage bosowaiu aena ana os na kalivai . He iya abwe ni pababitaisomiu Yayaluwa Bwabwalena ge ginaha elana .
40003012	Wana sobel iyoho i pihikan nimanaa , yaka i tetelipuna wana witi enona alona ge musana ni ase , inoke abwe enona hot ni bugulan ni teliya wana gonuwa , ge musana ni ton ginaha elana toto nige sauga etega ni bobolu . ”
40003013	Saugena o Yeisu i neem Galili i na wewel Yolidani , inoke i baek Diyon elana i ba , “ Nu pababitaisowau . ”
40003014	Yaa Diyon nuwana Yeisu wana nuwatu ni pil , yaka i ba , “ Binimala owa te nu pababitaisowau . Ga i ola ge u nem elau ? ”
40003015	Anana Yeisu i lahe i ba , “ Sauga e ta ginol ni ola ga no nuwatu . Ebo ta ola o , nasi Yehoba wana nuwatu ta paolaolaek . ” Inoke Diyon i talam .
40003016	Diyon Yeisu i pababitaiso yaka Yeisu i gaihem wewela . Inoke sauga o labulabum i mwapwela ge Yehoba Yayaluwana i kite i ola bunibuni i laulau i nem elana .
40003017	Yaka anan etega i loem labulabumwa i ba , “ Toto ya iya natu nunuwanina hot ; ya yaliyaya nabiyan iya kaiwena . ”
40004001	Inoke Yayaluwa Bwabwalena Yeisu i nul i na uleya labi kekevana elana ge Seitani Yeisu ni labose .
40004002	Lan poti ge bulin poti Yeisu galebu i palahikan ge i awaawanun , inoke i galebu .
40004003	Yaka Seitani i nem elana ge i labose i ba , “ Ebo tunahot owa Yehoba Natuna , u ba pat ya elal inoke nihi tabwa aanan . ”
40004004	Anana Yeisu i lahe i ba , “ Buki Bwabwalena i ba , ‘ Nige tage gamagal aanan awawana ni an ge yawalina ni gan , yaa baaba gegewena toto i neem Yehoba awanaa ni hago inoke yawalina ni gan . ’ ”
40004005	Yaka Seitani Yeisu i nul hi na Yelusalema , awan bwabwalena , ge i patalmilil Limi Bwabwalena pwatanaa hot .
40004006	Inoke i baek elana i ba , “ Ebo tunahot owa Yehoba Natuna , u supeni lau , kaiwena Buki Bwabwalena i ba : Yehoba ni ba wana nimaliya elana nihi pihikagiwa , inoke nige aem etega nu tutupaan pat elana . ”
40004007	Anana Yeisu i lahe i ba , “ Buki Bwabwalena i ba al , ‘ Bahi Yehoba wam Yabowaine nu lalabose . ’ ”
40004008	Yaka Seitani Yeisu i nul al hi na oya mihahaina hot elana ge abalogugui gegewena panayawiya ge ana gogomwau i pankite .
40004009	Inoke i ba , “ Bugul gegewena o nasi na pewa elam , ebo nu loepwakoku ge nu kululu elau . ”
40004010	Anana Yeisu i lahe i ba , “ Seitani , u egon hot eliyau ! Kaiwena Buki Bwabwalena i ba , ‘ Nu kululu Yehoba wam Yabowaine elana , iya maisena ya te nu tapwalolo elana . ’ ”
40004011	Inoke Seitani Yeisu i eguluwan ge aneloseyau hi nem ana labe hi pek .
40004012	Sauga Yeisu wasa i hago Diyon iyaka hi teli dela , inoke i sikal i na Galili .
40004013	Nige i miminaa Nasaleta , yaa i na i minaa Kapeniyama , awan etega Hoga Galili bebenaa , iyoho un Sebuloni ge un Napitalai wali labi elana .
40004014	He i masal i ola to , inoke palopita Aiseya wana baaba i tabwa tunahot , i ba :
40004015	Un Sebuloni ge un Napitalai wali labi elana , labi toto hoga ana kamwasaa , labi toto wewel Yolidani labena leunati elana , ge Galili elana , bolo nige
40004016	gamagalau hi miminaa gogou elana inoke mwananal bwabwatana nihi kite , hi miminaa yaomal gogouina elana , inoke mwananal ni yana eliyalil .
40004017	Inoke saugena o Yeisu wana papaatena i telipuna-an i ba , “ Wami pagan nanakina ana en nuku pek , kaiwena Yehoba wana abalogugui ana sauga i kelaubwa . ”
40004018	Yeisu i nawanawa Hoga Galili bebenaa inoke tologi labui i kitel , alona ge talina , etega Saimon toto alana Pita ge etega Andulu . Wali vineya hi ahe ge hi logilogi hogaa .
40004019	Inoke i baek elal i ba , “ Ku nem ku toulilau , inoke na paatenamiu komiu nuku tabwa gamagalau ali tologi . ”
40004020	Etimwawa wali vineya hi eguluwan ge hi toulil .
40004021	I nawanawa al yaka gamagalau eluwa al i kitel , Yemesa Sebedi natuna alona ge talina Diyon . Avaliya ge tamaliya Sebedi hi miminaa wagaa , wali vineya hi lovilovivina . Inoke Yeisu i yogaagil ,
40004022	yaka etimwawa wali waga ge tamaliya hi eguluwagil ge hi toulil .
40004023	Yeisu Galili ana labi gegewena i nopainan , inoke i panpankiti wali limi tapwalolowa , Yehoba wana abalogugui wasana waiwaisana i papaatena-an , ge gamagalau ali kasiyebwa ge ali gila tomaha ge tomaha i pwamolol .
40004024	Wasana hi palelu Siliya ana labi gegewena , inoke gamagalau ali kasiyebwa tomaha ge tomaha gegewena hi pwatanim elana , bolo hi youlolomwan , bolo yayaluwa bibikel hi ulutuk elal , bolo hi kikiuha ge bolo tuwaliya i elolol , inoke i pwamolol .
40004025	Boda bwabwatana hi toulil , hi neem labi Galili , labi Dekapolis , Yelusalema , Yudiya ge labi toto wewel Yolidani labena leunati .
40005001	Yeisu boda i kitel inoke i na i ha oyaa ge i misiyo . Yaka wana tohago hi nogogo elana ,
40005002	inoke awana i pwela i panpankiti elal i ba :
40005003	Bolo hi atena yayaluwaliya kaiwena Yehoba wana
40005004	Bolo hi kahin Yehoba i muloluagil , kaiwena ni payaliyaya-agil .
40005005	Bolo hi hanalau Yehoba i muloluagil , kaiwena wana bateli panuwana nihi pwawa .
40005006	Bolo hi galebu ge hi walem kaiwena yayaluwaliya ni pakalaopop .
40005007	Bolo avaliyau hi kaiwena i atilomwan-agil .
40005008	Bolo nige ateliya i bibiki Yehoba i muloluagil , kaiwena Yehoba nihi kite .
40005009	Bolo huga ana topabakuhu Yehoba i muloluagil , kaiwena ni ba , “ Heliya natuwau . ”
40005010	Bolo hi palomwanagil kaiwena Yehoba awana kaiwena Yehoba wana
40005011	Ebo gamagalau hi kitemiu ku toulilau inoke hi ba sigasiga-agimiu , hi palomwanagimiu ge wasamiu hi wasa panapanak-an , ebo hi ginol ola o , Yehoba i muloluagimiu .
40005012	Nuku yaliyaya hot , kaiwena molamiu bwabwatana iyoho labulabumwa . He palopitau houhouwel hi palomwanagil i ola ya to .
40005013	Komiu wami tuwalali panayawi gamwanaa i ola hoga wana tuwalali . Yaa ebo hoga ana gasisi ge amnana ni so , nige bosowaina ta pahogahoga al . Nige al wana tuwalali i gagan , inoke ta aliyoho ge gamagalau nihi poti .
40005014	Komiu ku ola mwananal panayawi gamwanaa . Ebo panuwa etega nihi ginol oya pwatanaa , nasi gamagalau gegewel nihi kite .
40005015	Nige sauga etega gamagal odam ni toton yaka ulun ni aahe ni popom lowan . Nasi ni teliya teibol pwatanaa , inoke mwananal ni pek halan o ana tomina gegewel elal .
40005016	Komiu wami mwananal ni yana gamagalau elal ni ola al to , inoke wami ginol waiwaisana nihi kite ge Tamamiu labulabumwa alana nihi tobalan .
40005017	Bahi nuku nuwatu tage ya nem Mosese wana Logugui ge palopitau wali panpankiti na leke yoho . Nige ya nenem tage na lekel yohil , ya nem na patunahotil .
40005018	Ya ba tunahot eliyamiu , ana siga labulabum ge panayawi nihi mowasi , nige Logugui ana baaba kekeisi etega ni yayaomal ana siga gegewena ni tabwa tunahot .
40005019	Henala ebo logugui kekeisi etega nige ni hehenapu-an ge gamagalau enuna al ni pankitel nihi ginol ola , he alana ni kekeisi Yehoba wana abalogugui elana . Yaa henala logugui ni henapuan ge gamagalau ni pankitel , he alana ni bwaya Yehoba wana abalogugui elana .
40005020	Palisi ge Logugui ana topankite hi ba tage heliya wali pagan i sapu , yaa na baewa eliyamiu , ebo nige wami pagan heliya wali pagan ni wawaisi lake , he nige bosowaimiu nuku ulutuk Yehoba wana abalogugui elana .
40005021	Iyaka ku hago Mosese wana logugui gamagalau houhouwel elal i ola hiwe , “ Bahi taulol . Henala ebo ni taulol nasi lahi ni pwawa . ”
40005022	Yaa nau ya ba eliyamiu , henala ebo ni huga talina elana nasi lahi ni pwawa , henala ebo talina ana ba ni apapanak-an nasi nihi pakot , ge henala ebo ni ba , “ Kokona owa ! ” i bosowaina ni na ginaha ni pwawa Gehena .
40005023	Inoke ebo nu nem limi bwabwalena elana tage wam mulolu u pepek Yehoba elana ge abwe nu nuwatu talim i hugaagiwa bugul etega kaiwena ,
40005024	he wam mulolu nu teli limi bwabwalena elana nu na ga alom ge talim maninimiu nuku abubun . Yaka abwe nu sikalim ge wam mulolu nu pek Yehoba elana .
40005025	Ebo gamagal etega ni wolewa ge ni ahewa nuku na nu kot , he etimwawa alom woliwoli o nuku pasapu ga kamwasaa mulaa abwe nuku vin abakot elana . Ebo nigeya , nasi ni telewa toyatala elana , inoke toyatala ni telewa pulisiman nimaliyaa ge nihi telewa dela .
40005026	Ya ba tunahot elam , nige bosowaina nu tagil ana siga am vaga gegewena nu leke haba .
40005027	Iyaka ku hago Mosese wana logugui i ola hiwe , “ Bahi alom lagona nu loloneganega-an . ”
40005028	Yaa nau ya ba eliyamiu , henala ebo yova etega ni gagayawa-an ge nuwana alona nihi kenu , iya iyaka i loneganega-an nuwatu elana .
40005029	Ebo matam toto labi awomwa ni pagegewa , nu bwana yoho . I waisi te ebo nige tuwam gabomwina etega ni gagan , bahi tuwam bwalibwaligena nihi aaliyoho Gehena elana .
40005030	I ola al , ebo nimwam toto awom ni pagegewa , nu gotomwa yoho . I waisi te ebo nige tuwam gabomwina etega ni gagan , bahi tuwam bwalibwaligena nihi aaliyoho Gehena elana .
40005031	Mosese wana logugui i ba i ola hiwe , “ Henala ebo nuwana lagona ni towani , houwan ga wana towa wasana ni leli lowan inoke ni pek yova elana . ”
40005032	Yaa nau ya ba eliyamiu , ebo tau etega bwagana lagona nige i gaganawal ni towani , ge abwe yova o ni alolon al , he tau wana gegi kaiwena inoke yova o i tabwa toganawal . I ola al , tau toto yova eguluwan o ni alolonan , he iya i ganawal .
40005033	Iyaka ku hago al Mosese wana logugui gamagalau houhouwel elal i ola hiwe , “ Bahi wam papasila nu leleke , yaa nu ginol ni ola wam bateli Yehoba elana . ”
40005034	Yaa nau ya ba eliyamiu , bahi sauga etega nu papasila . Bahi nu ba , “ O sila labulabum , ” kaiwena Yehoba wana abamina to .
40005035	Bahi nu ba “ O sila panayawi , ” kaiwena aena ana abateli te . Bahi nu ba , “ O sila Yelusalema , ” kaiwena Kin bwabwatana wana panuwa to .
40005036	Bahi nu papasila kokowam elana , kaiwena nige bosowaina nu ba ge kokowam pupunona etega ni yanayana o ebo nu ba ge etega ni biki .
40005037	Iyai ya te nu ba , “ E ” o ebo “ Nigeya ” . Hauna gun al nu lumen i neem Seitani elana .
40005038	Iyaka ku hago Mosese wana logugui i ola hiwe , “ Ebo gamagal etega , alona matana maisena ni apanak , lahena iya al matana maisena nihi apanak . Ebo alona ninina maisena ni tagagebal , lahena iya al ninina maisena nihi tagagebal . ”
40005039	Yaa nau ya ba eliyamiu , ebo gamagal etega ni ginol panak elam , bahi nu lalahe . Ebo gamagal etega gegenam toto awomwa ni taganepal , he nu tagena pil gegenam toto gegebamwa nu pek ni taganepal al .
40005040	I ola al , ebo gamagal etega ni telewa kot elana ge tage am holahola ni ahe , inoke am kaliko babalona toto tultul kaiwena nu talamwan al elana .
40005041	Ebo tolohaveyan etega am logugui ni ginol tage ana kaval nu kalivai hawawal kekeisi ni yapu , he nu kalivai hawawal yayapona elana .
40005042	Ebo gamagal etega ni awanun elam , nu pek elana ; ebo gamagal etega wam bugul ni patalam , bahi nu kakaise .
40005043	Iyaka ku hago tage Mosese wana logugui i ba , “ Wam heliyamwau nu nunuwana-agil , am topihigelgel nu hugaagil . ”
40005044	Yaa nau ya ba eliyamiu , ami topihigelgel nuku nunuwana-agil ge bolo hi palomwanagimiu nuku awanun kaiweliya ,
40005045	inoke nuku ola Tamamiu labulabumwa natunau . Kaiwena i ba sabwelu ni ha ge ni yana gamagalau nanakil ge gamagalau waiwaisal elal , ge kehe i patuna bolo wali pagan i sapu ge bolo wali pagan nige i sasapu elal .
40005046	Ebo bolo hi nunuwana-agimiu ya te nuku nunuwana-agil , ga i ola ge Yehoba ni pwamolamiu ? Takis ana toahi hi giginol i oola al to , bwagana heliya nige gamagalau waiwaisal i oola .
40005047	Ebo talimiyau ya te nuku ba mulolu elal , nige i gegetoga toto gamagalau gegewel hi giginol . Bolo nige toabulilek i oola , hi giginol i oola al to .
40005048	Inoke komiu wami pagan bwalibwaligena ni waisi ni ola Tamamiu labulabumwa wana pagan bwalibwaligena i waisi .
40006001	Sauga ebo ginol waiwaisana etega nuku ginol , bahi nuku giginola gamagalau mataliyaa ge tage ginol waiwaisana o nihi kite . Ebo nuku ola o , he Tamamiu labulabumwa nige ni pwapwamolamiu .
40006002	Inoke sauga ebo bugul etega nu pek togulagula elal , bahi nu yoyoga pwapwati ni oola tokakakawi wali pagan . Heliya hi giginol ola limi tapwalolowa ge kamwasaa , kaiwena nuwaliya gamagalau nihi tobalagil . Ya ba tunahot eliyamiu , molaliya gegewena iyaka hi ahe haba .
40006003	Yaa ebo bugul etega nu pek togulagula elal , bahi nimwam toto gegebam ni aatena nimwam toto awomwa ga i ginol ola .
40006004	Nu ginol sume ya . Tamwam bugul gegewena toto u ginol sume i kite , inoke iya molam ni pewa .
40006005	Sauga ebo nuku awanun , bahi nuku oola tokakakawi . Heliya nuwaliya nihi talmilil ge nihi awanun limi tapwalolowa ge kamwasa lala elana , kaiwena nuwaliya gamagalau nihi kitel . Ya ba tunahot eliyamiu , molaliya gegewena iyaka hi ahe haba .
40006006	Sauga ebo nu awanun , nu ulutuk lumwa , nog nu kaus inoke nu awanun Tamwam elana , iya nige ta kikite . Tamwam bugul gegewena toto u ginol sume i kite , inoke iya molam ni pewa .
40006007	Sauga ebo nuku awanun , bahi baaba bwagabwaga nuku babaa pipili ni oola bolo nige toabulilek i oola . Heliya hi nuwatu tage Yabowaine wali awanun ni hago kaiwena wali awanun i yapu .
40006008	Bahi nuku oola heliya . Nigeya ga nuku aawanun Tamamiu elana , he iyaka i atena hauna nuwamiu .
40006009	Inoke nuku awanun ni ola hiwe : Tamama labulabumwa , alam bwabwalena ama gamagal naha awatauwan ,
40006010	wam logugui ni nem , wam nuwatu gamagal naha ginol panayawiya ni ola hi giginol labulabumwa .
40006011	Lan ya enona nu pem eliyama .
40006012	Wama gegi nu nuwayoho , ni ola alomeyau wali gegi iyaka ha nuwayoho .
40006013	Bahi nu tetelema lawakik elana , yaa nu pwamwalima gegi elana . Kaiwena owa tologugui , sauga gegewena nige ni momowasi . Ibwe . I ola .
40006014	Ebo alomiyau wali gegi eliyamiu nuku nuwayoho , inoke Tamamiu labulabumwa wami gegi ni nuwayoho al .
40006015	Yaa ebo alomiyau wali gegi nige nuku nunuwayoho , Tamamiu wami gegi nige ni nunuwayoho .
40006016	Sauga ebo galebu nuku palahikan awanun kaiwena , bahi ami awa nuku papanuwaleyan ni oola tokakakawi . Heliya ali awa hi panuwaleyan kaiwena nuwaliya gamagalau gegewel nihi kitel galebu hi palahikan . Ya ba tunahot eliyamiu , molaliya gegewena iyaka hi ahe haba .
40006017	Sauga ebo galebu nu palahikan awanun kaiwena , maninim nu ul ge kokowam nu paenonu ,
40006018	inoke bahi gamagalau nihi aatena te galebu u palahikan . Tamwam toto nige ta kikite , iya ya te ni atena . Tamwam bugul gegewena toto u ginol sume i kite , inoke iya molam ni pewa .
40006019	Bahi gogomwau nuku pwapwahin kaiwemiu panayawiya , kaiwena panayawiya wala bugul mwatamwata ge pwaha hi apanak , ge tokaoma hi ulutuk ge hi kaoma .
40006020	Gogomwau nuku pwahin kaiwemiu labulabumwa , kaiwena labulabumwa mwatamwata ge pwaha nige bosowaina bugul nihi apanak , ge tokaoma nige bosowailiya nihi ulutuk ge nihi kaoma .
40006021	Hauna labi wam gogomwau nihi minaa , nasi yayaluwam ni minaa al to .
40006022	Matala i ola tuwala ana odam . Ebo matam ni waisi , nasi mwananal tuwam bwalibwaligena ni kalaopopwi .
40006023	Yaa ebo matam ni nak , he nasi gogou tuwam bwalibwaligena ni kalaopopwi . Ebo mwananal toto yayaluwamwa i gogou , he gogou ana bwata geb o !
40006024	Nige bosowaina gamagal etega ni tuwalali babala eluwa elal . Nasi etega ni nunuwana-an ge ni awatauwan , yaa etega ni hugaan ge ni pihigelgel-an . Nige bosowaina pamaisena nuku tuwalali Yehoba ge gogomwau elal .
40006025	He na baewa eliyamiu , bahi nuku nuwanuwatu nabi yawalimiu kaiwena ge nuku ba , “ Hauna naha an ge hauna naha im ? ” I ola al bahi nuku nuwanuwatu tuwamiu kaiwena ge nuku ba , “ Hauna kaliko naha galoi ? ” Yawal te ana nuwatu i bwata , aanan ana nuwatu nige i bwabwata , age ? Ge tuwan ana nuwatu te i bwata , kaliko ana nuwatu nige i bwabwata , age ?
40006026	Ku nuwatu ga bwasumu kaiweliya , bolo hi youyou hawawala . Heliya nige hi pelpel , nige hi kenken , ge nige hi papahi , yaa Tamala labulabumwa i papaanil . He komiu ku bwata , bwasumu nige hi bwabwata . I ola , age ?
40006027	Ebo komiu etegana ni nuwanuwatu yawalina kaiwena , tab bosowaina wana nuwanuwatu eliyana yawalina ana sauga kekeisi ni payapu ? Nigeya hot !
40006028	I ola al , hauna kaiwena nuku nuwanuwatu kaliko kaiwena ? Ku nuwatu ga mula toto waluwaluwa wali siun kaiwena . Heliya nige hi tutuwalali , nige ali kaliko hi helhel .
40006029	Yaa na baewa eliyamiu , kin Solomon ana kaliko , bwagana kaliko waiwaisana hot , ana awa ana waisi nige i oola mula ya etega .
40006030	Inoke ta atena Yehoba mwawin waluwaluwa ali kama i pek , mwawin o lan e ta kite i siun , yaa bwaligumwa ni aliga ge nihi ton ginaha elana . Age komiu ami kama nige ni pepewa al ? Komiu wami abulilek nige i bwabwata .
40006031	Inoke bahi nuku nuwanuwatu ge nuku ba “ Hauna naha an ? ” o “ Hauna naha im ? ” o ebo “ Hauna naha galoi ? ”
40006032	Bolo nige hi aabulilek , sauga gegewena bugul ololal o hi loyaan . He Tamamiu labulabumwa iyaka i atena haba komiu nuwamiu bugul bolo ona o .
40006033	Yaa Yehoba wana abalogugui ge pagan sasapona toto iya nuwana nuku loyaan houwan , inoke abwe bugul bolo o gegewena ni pewa al eliyamiu .
40006034	Bahi nuku nuwanuwatu bwaligumwa kaiwena , kaiwena hauna gun bwaligumwa ni masal eliyamiu iya bwaligumwa ana pulowan . Lan maisena ge maisena ana pulowan i gan , bahi pulowan o nuku papaetulan al .
40007001	Bahi alomiyau nuku aawa naknakagil , yaka Yehoba nige ni aawa naknakagimiu .
40007002	Yehoba wana awa naknak eliyamiu nasi ni olaolaek wami awa naknak alomiyau elal . He luvi toto ku ginol ge ku pek alomiyau elal , heiya te abwe nuku ahe .
40007003	Ga i ola ge ebwakil mumusana u gagayawa-an talim matanaa , yaa ebwakil bwabwaligena iyoho owa matamwa nige u nunuwatu-an ?
40007004	Ebo ebwakil bwabwaligena iyoho matamwa , ga i ola ge nu baek talim elana nu ba , “ Ebwakil mumusana na ahe tagilan matamwa ? ”
40007005	Tokakakawi owa ! Houwan ga ebwakil bwabwaligena nu ahe tagilan owa matam elana , inoke matam ni mwananal , he abwe bosowaim ebwakil mumusana nu ahe tagilan talim matanaa .
40007006	Bahi bugul bwabwalena nuku pepek wanuka elal , eba nihi misikal ge nihi talimiu . Bahi wami abalaga nuku aalihinek bobu awoliyaa , eba nihi poti lolowan .
40007007	Nuku awanun inoke Yehoba ni pewa ; nuku loya inoke nuku pwawa ; nuku pitipiti inoke nog ni mwapwela eliyamiu .
40007008	Kaiwena henala i awanun ni ahe , henala i loya ni pwawa , ge henala i pitipiti nog ni mwapwela eliyana .
40007009	Ga i ola ebo komiu etega natuna ni awanun aanan kaiwena , nasi pat ni pek ?
40007010	O ebo ni awanun moti kaiwena , age nasi mwata ni pek ?
40007011	Komiu , bwagana gamagalau nanakil , sauga gegewena bugul waiwaisana ku pekpek natumiyau elal . Inoke ta atena bubun Tamala labulabumwa bugul waiwaisana nasi ni pek bolo hi awanun elal .
40007012	Pagan toto nuwamiu gamagalau nihi ginola eliyamiu , nuku ginol ni ola al elal . Mosese wana Logugui ge palopitau wali panpankiti i ola to .
40007013	Nuku ulutuka abatuk toto i kikipu elana . Gehena ana abatuk i magaga ge ana kamwasa i mweyaha , inoke gamagalau hi gewi hi nawaan .
40007014	Yaa yawal ana abatuk i kikipu ge ana kamwasa i pulowan , inoke bolo hi pwawa nige hi gegewi .
40007015	Nuku matahikagimiu bahi topankite kakakawel analiya nuku hahago . Hi nem eliyamiu ali kamakama i ola sipi , hi tounuwa , yaa yayaluwaliya elana hi ola wanuka bekikina .
40007016	Wali ginol enona nuku kite inoke nuku atenal . Oine enona nige ta kikibwaa pepesala elana , age ? Kapoi enona nige ta kikibwaa dawodawowo elana , age ?
40007017	I ola al , ebwakil waiwaisana enona amnana i waisi , yaa ebwakil nanakina enona amnana i nak .
40007018	Nige bosowaina ebwakil waiwaisana enona ni nak , ge nige bosowaina ebwakil nanakina enona ni waisi .
40007019	Ebwakil gegewena bolo enoliya nige i wawaisi nihi govel ge nihi alitukan ginaha elana .
40007020	He topankite kakakawel wali ginol enona nuku kite inoke nuku atenal .
40007021	Nige tage gamagalau bolo hi ba elau hi ba , “ Babala , babala ” gegewel nihi ulutuk Yehoba wana abalogugui elana . Yaa henala Nam labulabumwa wana nuwatu ni paolaolaek , iya ya te ni ulutuk .
40007022	Sauga lan mowamowasena ni vin , gamagalau nihi gewi nihi ba elau nihi ba , “ Babala , babala , alam elana Yehoba wana baaba ha pamasal , alam elana ha ba inoke yayaluwa bibikel hi tagil , ge alam elana ginol yawiyawi ha ginolil . ”
40007023	Inoke na baek elal na ba , “ Nige ya aatenamiu . Ku egonan , komiu nak ana toginol . ”
40007024	Inoke henala no baaba ya ni hago ge ni ginol ola , he iya i ola tau toto wana nuwatu i sapu ge wana limi i tala pat pwatanaa .
40007025	Kehe i lonabi , banata i sani ge mana i towa gagasisi limi o elana , yaa nige i mamaguli , kaiwena abataltal i minek pat pwatanaa .
40007026	Henala no baaba ya ni hago ge nige ni giginol ola , he iya i ola tau toto nige wana nuwatu i sasapu ge wana limi i tala gilesa pwatanaa .
40007027	Kehe i lonabi , banata i sani ge mana i towa gagasisi limi o elana , inoke i maguli , ge wana maguli butuna i bwata .
40007028	Yeisu i baaba haba inoke boda nuwaliya hi ahe wana panpankiti kaiwena .
40007029	Nige i panpankiti i oola Logugui ana topankite , i ba bubun ya alona ge wana gasisi .
40008001	Sauga Yeisu i loem oyaa , boda bwabwatana hi toulil .
40008002	Tolepelo etega i nem i loepwakoku Yeisu awonaa inoke i ba , “ Babala , ebo nuwam , i bosowaina nu abubunau . ”
40008003	Yeisu nimana i paelu tau i pihikan , yaka i ba , “ E , nuwau . Tuwam ni waisi ! ” Inoke sauga o ana lepelo i mowasi .
40008004	Yaka Yeisu i baek elana i ba , “ Bahi gamagal etega wana wasa nu pepek . U nok u na ga topowon elana ge tuwam ni hile . Bwasumu ni powonan Yehoba elana , ni ola Mosese wana logugui , inoke gamagalau nihi atena tunahot tuwam iyaka i waisi . ”
40008005	Sauga Yeisu i ulutuk Kapeniyama , Loma wali tolohaveyan ali tohouwa etega i nem Yeisu elana ge i awanun labe kaiwena .
40008006	I ba , “ Babala , no totuwalali iyoho i kenukenu limiya , tuwana i elolol ge i lomwan nabi . ”
40008007	Yeisu i baek elana i ba , “ Ta nok ta na na pwamolu . ”
40008008	Tohouwa Yeisu anana i lahe i ba , “ Babala , bahiwa . Kaiwena nau nige no waisi i gagan ge tage na ahewa nu nem no limiya . Nu ba ya , inoke no totuwalali ni molu .
40008009	Ya atena bosowaim nu ginol ola , kaiwena nau ya minaa no tonowakau bwabwatal wali logugui gabulanaa , ge gabulawa no tolohaveyan hi gan . Ebo na ba etegana elana , ‘ U nok , ’ inoke ni nok , ge ebo na ba etegana al elana , ‘ U nem , ’ inoke ni nem . Ge ebo na baek no totuwalali elana , ‘ Toto ya u ginol , ’ inoke ni ginol . ”
40008010	Sauga Yeisu baaba o i hago , inoke nuwana i ahe , yaka i baek bolo hi tatauliulil elal i ba , “ Ya ba tunahot eliyamiu , nige gamagal etega ya pwapwawa Isileli gamwaliyaa wana abulilek ana bwata i oola te tau ya .
40008011	Na ba eliyamiu , gamagalau nihi gewi nihi neem sabwelu i heheya ge i lolobeka inoke Yehoba wana abalogugui elana avaliyau Abalahama , Aisake ge Yakobo nihi misiyo ge nihi anan .
40008012	Yaa Isileli , bwagana tage heliya abalogugui gamagaliliyau , nasi nihi alitagil-agil gogouwa , yaka nihi kahikahin ge niniliya ni alavekilal . ”
40008013	Inoke Yeisu i baek tolohaveyan ali tohouwa elana i ba , “ U sikal ! Nasi na ginol ni ola wam abulilek . ” Inoke sauga o wana totuwalali i molu .
40008014	Sauga Yeisu i na Pita wana limiya , i kite Pita yawana nevenak i kenukenu , i kasiyebwa tuwana i waiwai .
40008015	Nimana i pihikan yaka tuwana waiwaina i mowasi , inoke i lut ge aanan i ginol i pek Yeisu i anan .
40008016	Sabwelu i lobek inoke bolo yayaluwa bibikel hi ulutuk elal , hi gewi hi pwatanim Yeisu elana . I ba ya inoke yayaluwa bibikel hi tagil , ge tokasiyebwa gegewel i pwamolol .
40008017	I ginol ola inoke palopita Aiseya wana baaba i tabwa tunahot , i ba , “ Iya ala kasiyebwa i ahe yoho ge ala gila i kalivai . ”
40008018	Sauga Yeisu i kite boda hi mipainan , yaka i ba wana tohago elal nihi alupanet nihi na labena etega al .
40008019	Logugui ana topankite etega i nem elana ge i ba , “ Topankite , hapanuwa nu noek , nasi na touliliwa . ”
40008020	Anana Yeisu i lahe i ba , “ Wanuka bekikina ali gol i gan , ge bwasumu bolo hi youyou hawawala ali vata i gan , yaa nau Gamagal Natuna nige no abamina i gagan ge na kenuwa . ”
40008021	Tau etega al , iya Yeisu wana tohago , i baek elana i ba , “ Babala , u talamwagau na na ga na matamatan nam ni yaomal ge na teli , abwe na touliliwa . ”
40008022	Yaa Yeisu i baek elana i ba , “ U toulilau . Toyaomal abwe wali toyaomal nihi teli . ”
40008023	Yeisu i gaiha wagaa yaka wana tohago hi heulil , inoke hi kuki .
40008024	Sauga kekeisi mana gasigasisena i towa hogaa inoke bagol i hol likalika waga gamwanaa . Yaa Yeisu i kenu .
40008025	Yaka wana tohago hi na Yeisu hi palut ge hi baek elana hi ba , “ Babala , u pwamwalima ! Kelaubwa naha yaomal te ! ”
40008026	Inoke analiya i lahe i ba , “ Hauna kaiwena ku lovakun ? Wami abulilek nige i bwabwata . ” Inoke i lut i talmilil ge i ba mana ge bagol nihi bakuhu , inoke i laumwal hot .
40008027	Gamagalau nuwaliya hi ahe ge hi ba , “ Hauna kaba gamagal e ? Bwagana mana ge bagol , anana hi hago . ”
40008028	Sauga Yeisu hoga i alupanet-an i na i tan Gadala wali labiya , bolau labui i pwawal hi tagilem salaiya . Yayaluwa bibikel hi holaviya elal , inoke wali pagan i nak hot , nige bosowaina gamagalau nihi nanawaa kamwasa o eliyana .
40008029	Yaka hi yogayoga hi ba , “ Yehoba Natuna owa , nasi ga nu ginol ola-agima ? Age nuwam nu lahema ? Yaa nige lahi ana sauga i oola te . ”
40008030	Bobu ali yawi bwabwatana hi miminaa to hi anan , nige ali bwaga i yayapu .
40008031	Inoke yayaluwa bibikel hi awanun Yeisu elana hi ba “ Ebo nu patuna owaowa-agima , nu patunama naha ulutuk bobu eliyalil . ”
40008032	Yaka i baek elal i ba , “ Ku egon ! ” Inoke hi tagil ge hi ulutuk bobu eliyalil . Yaka bobu ali yawi gegewel hi patalelu loek labilabiya , hi na hi lau hogaa ge hi unun .
40008033	Bolo bobu hi matahikagil etimwawa hi patalelu hi na panuwaa inoke bugul gegewena hi wasaan , ge hi wasaan hauna i masal bolau eliyalil , bolo yayaluwa bibikel hi miminaa elal .
40008034	Yaka gamagalau gegewel hi tagilem panuwaa Yeisu nihi kite . Sauga hi kite , hi awanun gagasisi elana tage wali labi ni eguluwan .
40009001	Yeisu i gaiha wagaa ge i alupanet i sikal i na wana awana .
40009002	Inoke gamagalau enuna toelolol etega hi pwatanim elana , i kenuwa wana abakenuwa . Sauga Yeisu wali abulilek i kite , i baek toelolol elana i ba , “ Natu , atem ni matuwa ! Wam gegi Yehoba matanaa iyaka ya nuwayoho . ”
40009003	Yaka Logugui ana topankite enuna hi pebaaba-agil hi ba , “ Tau ya i ba bwagabwaga , Yehoba i hewa likaan . ”
40009004	Wali nuwatu Yeisu i atena yaka i ba , “ Hauna kaiwena nuwatu nanakina ku nuwatuan atemiwa ?
40009005	I mweyaha te ebo na ba , ‘ Wam gegi Yehoba matanaa iyaka ya nuwayoho . ’ Yaa i pulowan te ebo na ba , ‘ U lut ge u nawanawa . ’ *
40009006	He toto pupulowanina na baunan ge na ginol , inoke nuku atena al te Gamagal Natuna wana gasisi i gan panayawiya gegi ni nuwayoho . ” Inoke i baek toelolol elana i ba , “ U lut , wam abakenu u ahe ge u sikal wam limiya . ”
40009007	Inoke tau i lut ge i sikal wana limiya .
40009008	Sauga boda hi kite , inoke nuwaliya hi ahe ge Yehoba hi tobalan , kaiwena gasisi ololana o i pek gamagalau elal .
40009009	Yeisu awan o i eguluwai i nawanawa al , inoke takis ana toahi etegana , alana Mataiyo , i kite i misiyowa wana abatuwalaliya . Yaka i baek elana i ba , “ U toulilau . ” Inoke Mataiyo i lut ge i toulil .
40009010	Yeisu iyoho i aanan Mataiyo wana limiya , inoke takis ana toahi ge togegi hi gewi hi nem avaliyau Yeisu ge wana tohago hi anan .
40009011	Palisi enuna hi kite pwawa , inoke hi nel wana tohago elal hi ba , “ Hauna kaiwena wami topankite alonau takis ana toahi ge togegi hi anan toyawa ? ”
40009012	Yeisu baaba ya i hago inoke i ba , “ Tomolu nige nuwaliya tosawasawal , tokasiyebwa ya te nuwaliya .
40009013	Ku nok ku na ga baaba ya ana sapu ku loyaan , i ba , ‘ Nau nige nuwau bwasumu powopowonina , nuwau atilomwan paganina . ’ He ya nem nige tage bolo hi ba ‘ Ama tosasapol ’ ge na yogaagil , yaa ya nem togegi te na yogaagil . ”
40009014	Yaka Diyon Tobabitaiso wana tohago hi nem Yeisu elana ge hi nel hi ba , “ Hauna kaiwena ama alomeyau ge Palisi galebu ha palahikan awanun kaiwena , yaa wam tohago nige sauga etega hi oola ? ”
40009015	Yeisu analiya i lahe i ba , “ Ebo alolon ana hagali nihi ginol , tab toalolon melutauina wana heliyamwau nihi kahin , sauga ebo iya iyoho avaliya ? Nigeya ! Yaa ana sauga abwe ni vin , inoke topihigelgel toalolon melutauina ni ahek gamwaliyaa , yaka abwe galebu nihi palahikan .
40009016	“ Kaliko vavaluna nige ta aahe ge holahola bebeyaunana mwahawanina ta bwabwaliniya , kaiwena ebo kaliko vavaluna ni kin pahipahi inoke mwahawan o ni pwabwata .
40009017	I ola al , nige oine vavaluna ta hoholek ana patuna bebeyaunana goti kunisina gamwanaa . Ebo ta ginol ola o , he goti kunisina ni maleli , oine ni maligin ge goti kunisina ni nak . He oine vavaluna ta holek te ana patuna goti kunisina vavaluna gamwanaa , inoke nihi waisi lalabui . ”
40009018	Yeisu wana baaba o gamwanaa , yaka Yudiya wali tohouwa etegana i nem i loepwakoku awonaa ge i ba , “ Natu meluyovana abwe i aliga ya te . U nem u na nimwam u teli tuwanaa inoke yawalina ni sikal . ”
40009019	Inoke Yeisu i lut ge alona hi nok , ge wana tohago hi nok al avaliya .
40009020	Yova etegana kasiyebwa welolo i ahe baliman ana gewi elulutega eluwa , i noheem Yeisu enaa inoke ana kaliko buhuna i pihikan .
40009021	Totona i nuwatu i ba , “ Ebo ana kaliko ya te na pihikan , inoke na molu . ”
40009022	Yeisu i tagena sikal i kite , yaka i ba , “ Natu , atem ni matuwa ! Wam abulilek i pwamolowa . ” Inoke sauga o elana ge i nok , yova iyaka i molu .
40009023	Sauga Yeisu i ulutuk tohouwa wana limiya , igo ana toyuyu ge boda bolo hi nok ge hi lolokahin i kitel .
40009024	Yaka i baek elal i ba , “ Ku egonan . Galok nige i aaliga , i kenu ya . ” Yaa wana baaba hi nivali .
40009025	Sauga gamagalau hi tagilan , yaka Yeisu i na i tuk galok wana lumwa , nimana i ahe inoke i lut .
40009026	Yaka Yeisu wana ginol o wasana i lelu labi o i soli .
40009027	Yeisu awan o i eguluwai i nawanawa al , inoke tomatakai labui hi noulil ge hi yogayoga hi ba , “ Deibid Tubuna , u atilomwan-agima . ”
40009028	Sauga i na i ulutuk limiya , yaka tomatakai hi nem elana ge i nelil i ba , “ Tab ku abulilek-agau bosowaiu matamiu na panana ? ” Anana hi lahe hi ba , “ Ibwe , Babala . ”
40009029	Yaka mataliya i pihikan ge i ba , “ Ni masal eliyamiu ni ola wami abulilek . ”
40009030	Yaka mataliya i mwapwela . Yeisu anana i gasisi i baek elal i ba , “ Bahi gamagal etegana wana wasa nuku pepek . ”
40009031	Yaa sauga hi egon Yeisu wasana hi palelu labi o elana .
40009032	Sauga bolau ya hi tagitagil limiya , tau etega yayaluwa bibikena hi holaviya elana ge nige anana i gagan , hi pwatanim Yeisu elana .
40009033	Sauga Yeisu yayaluwa bibikena i patuna owaowani , inoke tau ya anana i gan . Gamagalau gegewel nuwaliya hi ahe ge hi ba , “ Nige sauga etegana bugul ololana ya ta kikiteya Isileli gamwanaa . ”
40009034	Yaa Palisi hi ba , “ Yayaluwa bibikel wali tohouwa wana gasisi elana te yayaluwa bibikel i papatuna owaowa-agil . ”
40009035	Yeisu i na i nopain panuwa bwabwatal ge awan kekeisi eliyalil . Inoke i panpankiti wali limi tapwalolowa , i papaatena Yehoba wana abalogugui wasana waiwaisana , ge gamagalau i pwamolol , bolo ali gila ge kasiyebwa tomaha ge tomaha .
40009036	Sauga boda i kitel , atena i lomwanagil , kaiwena tuwaliya i sasawowol ge nige ali tolabe , hi ola sipi bolo nige ali tomatahikan .
40009037	Inoke i baek wana tohago elal i ba , “ Eyowa i bwaya enona iyaka i matuwa , yaa totuwalali nige hi gegewi .
40009038	He nuku awanun Babala toneyowa elana inoke totuwalali ni patunal nihi na wana eyowaa ge enona nihi pahi . ”
40010001	Yeisu wana tohago elulutega eluwa i yogaagil hi nok elana , ge gasisi i pek elal yayaluwa bibikel nihi patuna owaowa-agil ge gamagalau nihi pwamolol , bolo ali gila ge ali kasiyebwa tomaha ge tomaha .
40010002	Apostolowau elulutega eluwa alaliya i ola hiwe : houwan , Saimon , toto hi ba Pita , ge talina Andulu ; Yemesa Sebedi natuna , ge talina Diyon ;
40010003	Pilipi ge Batolomiu ; Tomas ge Mataiyo toto takis ana toahi ; Yemesa Alipiyos natuna ge Tadiyas ;
40010004	Saimon toto i neem boda Seloti elal , ge Yudasa Isikaliyota , iya Yeisu i wasaan .
40010005	Yeisu tohago elulutega eluwa bolo ya i papatunal nihi tagil , inoke i ba pagasisel i ba , “ Bahi nuku nonoek bolo nige Isileli gamagaliliyau i oola wali labi elana , o ebo Sameliya wali panuwa elal .
40010006	Nuku noek ya te boda Isileli ana sipi yayaomalil elal .
40010007	Nuku nok nuku papaatena nuku ba , ‘ Yehoba wana abalogugui ana sauga iyaka i kelaubwa . ’
40010008	Tokasiyebwa nuku pwamolol , toaliga nuku palutil , tolepelo nuku abubunil , ge yayaluwa bibikel nuku patuna owaowa-agil . Ku ahe nige molana , nuku pek bahi molana .
40010009	Bahi mani gold ge silba ge kopa nuku loloke wami pwaos elana ge nuku nonoahe ;
40010010	bahi kaliko ana nabwa nuku nonoahe wami nawanawa kaiwena , bahi holahola labuina , o aemiu aana o suki nuku nonoahe . Bahi nuku nuwanuwatu , kaiwena totuwalali ana logugui te matahikanina ni gan .
40010011	Sauga nuku ulutuk panuwa etega o awan etega elana , gamagal waiwaisana etegana nuku loyaana to , inoke nuku miminaa wana limiya ana siga nuku egon .
40010012	Sauga nuku ulutuk limiya , nuku baek elal nuku ba , ‘ Minamina waiwaisana Yehoba ni pewa eliyamiu . ’
40010013	Ebo gamagalau bolo limi o nihi yaliyaya kaiwemiu , wami ba mulolu minamina waiwaisana kaiwena ni mihot . Ebo nigeya , komiu ya te minamina waiwaisana nuku pwawa , yaa heliya nigeya .
40010014	Ebo nige nihi yayaliyaya kaiwemiu ge nige wami baaba nihi hahago , inoke limi o o ebo panuwa o nuku eguluwan ge aemiu papakovana nuku hapul yoho .
40010015	Ya ba tunahot eliyamiu , lan yatala elana Sodoma ge Gomola ali lahi ni pulowan , yaa panuwa o ali lahi nasi ni pulowan hot .
40010016	Ya papatunamiu i ola sipi hi nana ewalili sosokal gamwaliyaa . He nuku siba ni ola mwata ge nuku henapu ni ola bunibuni .
40010017	Nuku matahikagimiu , kaiwena gamagalau enuna abwe nihi ahemiu nihi telemiu kot elana ge hihiu elololina nihi ahe nihi nibinibihagimiu wali limi tapwalolo elana .
40010018	Alau kaiwena nihi ahemiu ge nihi telemiu tologugui ge kin mataliyaa , inoke wasa waiwaisana nuku wasaan elal ge bolo nige Yudiya i oola elal .
40010019	Sauga nihi ahemiu nuku na kot kaiwena , bahi nuku nuwanuwatu hauna nuku baunan o ebo ga nuku ba ola . Sauga toto o eliyana hauna baaba ku babaunan nasi Yehoba ni pewa .
40010020	He nige i oola tage komiu te nuku baaba , yaa Tamamiu Yayaluwana ni minaa eliyamiu ge iya te ni baaba .
40010021	Gamagalau taliliyau nihi wasaagil inoke tologugui nihi lopaaligal . Taman nihi ginol ni ola al to natuliyau elal . Wawayau nihi lut hinaliyau ge tamaliyau nihi pihigelgel-agil , inoke nihi pek tologugui nihi lopaaligal .
40010022	Alau kaiwena gamagalau gegewel nihi pihigelgel-agimiu , yaa henala ebo ni talmilil gagasisi ana siga abapwamowasi elana pwamwal ni pwawa .
40010023	Sauga ebo nihi palomwanagimiu awan etegana elana inoke nuku lou nuku na awan etegana al . Ya ba tunahot eliyamiu , wami tuwalali nige nuku pwapwamowasi Isileli wali awan gegewena elal inoke Gamagal Natuna ni nem .
40010024	Tovavasili nige wana topankite i bwabwata lake ; totuwalali nige wana babala i bwabwata lake . He nau lomwan ya pwawa , komiu al nasi lomwan nuku pwawa .
40010025	I waisi ya te tovavasili ni ola wana topankite , ge totuwalali ni ola wana babala . Nau tonlimi , he hi ba tage nau Tamudulele , inoke komiu no limi ana heniheni , nasi alan nanakil hot abwe nihi tunewa eliyamiu .
40010026	He gamagalau bahi nuku lolovakun-agil , kaiwena bugul kaukausil abwe nihi mwapwela ge bugul misusumel abwe nihi masal .
40010027	Hauna gun ya baunaniwa eliyamiu gogouwa , nuku baubaunan mwananala ; hauna gun ya walgumuan tanamiwa , abwe limi pwatanaa nuku yoga pwapwati .
40010028	Bahi bolo tuwan hi tagapaaliga yaa nige bosowailiya yayaluwa nihi tagapaaliga nuku lolovakun-agil . He Yehoba te nuku lovakunan , iya bosowaina tuwan ge yayaluwa ni apapanak-agil Gehena elana .
40010029	Awaawa labui hi palian toya maisena , age ? Yaa nige etegana ni sosogu bilibiliya tage Tamala nige ni aatena .
40010030	I ola al komiu kaunumiu pupunona gegewena iyaka i vasili haba ge i atena bubunimiu .
40010031	Inoke bahi nuku lolovakun . Komiu maisena ge maisena awaawa gegewel molaliya ku bwata lake .
40010032	Henala gamagalau mataliyaa ni ba pamasal tage iya no gamagal , he nau na ba pamasal ni ola al to Nam labulabumwa elana .
40010033	Yaa henala gamagalau mataliyaa ni alahagau , he nau al na alahan Nam labulabumwa elana .
40010034	Bahi nuku nunuwatu tage ya nem ge panayawi ni laumwal . Ya nem nige tage laumwal ni gan , yaa ya nem inoke nasi haveyan ni gan .
40010035	Ya nem inoke gamagalau wali minamina na tagawali . Tau ni pihigelgel tamana elana , yova ni pihigelgel hinana elana , ge tau lagona ni pihigelgel yawana nevenak elana .
40010036	Gamagal ana topihigelgel nihi noem tutunau elal .
40010037	Henala ebo tamana ge hinana i nunuwana-agil nabiyan yaa nau nige i nunuwana-agau nabiyan , he nige bosowaina ta ba , ‘ Iya no tohago . ’ Henala ebo natuna tauina o ebo yovana i nunuwana-an nabiyan yaa nau nige i nunuwana-agau nabiyan , he nige bosowaina ta ba , ‘ Iya no tohago . ’
40010038	Henala ebo nige wana kolos ni kakalivai ge ni totoulilau , he nige bosowaina ta ba , ‘ Iya no tohago . ’
40010039	Henala ebo ni labose yawalina ni pwawa , nasi ni payaomal , ge henala ebo yawalina ni payaomal nau kaiweu , nasi yawalina ni pwawa .
40010040	Henala i atupahemiu , he i atupaheyau , ge henala i atupaheyau , he i atupahe toto i patunau .
40010041	Henala Yehoba wana elopapatuna ni atupahe kaiwena iya Yehoba wana elopapatuna , nasi molana ni ahe ni ola Yehoba wana elopapatuna molana ; henala tau sasapona ni atupahe kaiwena iya tau sasapona , nasi molana ni ahe ni ola tau sasapona molana .
40010042	Henala ebo wewel tultul ni wage ge ni pek bolo tokekeisi ya etegana elana kaiwena iya no tohago , ya ba tunahot eliyamiu , molana nige ni kakala abwe ni ahe . ”
40011001	Yeisu wana tohago elulutega eluwa i ba pagasisel i mowasi , yaka panuwa o i eguluwai i nok i na i panpankiti ge i papaatena labi Galili panuwana ona elal .
40011002	Diyon Tobabitaiso iyoho dela , Keliso wana tuwalali wasana i hago inoke wana tohago i patunal hi na
40011003	Yeisu hi neli hi ba , “ Owa gamagal toto Diyon i babaunan tage abwe ni nem , o age naha matamatan gamagal etega al kaiwena ? ”
40011004	Yeisu analiya i lahe i ba , “ Nuku sikal Diyon wana wasa nuku pek hauna iyaka ku hago ge ku kite :
40011005	tomatakai mataliya hi panana , bolo aeliya nanakina hi nawanawa , tolepelo tuwaliya i waisi , totanatui baaba hi hago , toaliga hi lut ge togulagula Wasa Waiwaisana ana papaatena iyaka hi hago .
40011006	Toto nige i nunuwa lalabui kaiweu Yehoba i muloluan . ”
40011007	Diyon wana tohago hi sikasikal , inoke Yeisu i liwaliwan boda elal Diyon kaiwena i ba , “ Sauga ku na uleya Diyon elana , hauna nuwamiu nuku kite ? Tab ku nok tage gamagal etega nuku kite wana nuwatu nige i gagasisi , i ola widiwidi i olak ya te mana eliyana ?
40011008	Ebo nigeya , he hauna nuwamiu nuku kite ? Age tau etega kaliko waiwaisana i galoi ? Yaa bolo kaliko waiwaisana hi galoi hi miminaa kin wali limiya .
40011009	Yaa ku na hauna nuwamiu nuku kite ? Age palopita etega ? Ibwe ! He na baewa eliyamiu iya alan palopita i bwata lake .
40011010	He Diyon bana te palopita etega i lelelian , Yehoba i ba : No elopapatuna na patuna houwan awomwa , iya kamwasa ni lovivina-an kaiwem .
40011011	Ya ba tunahot eliyamiu , bolo hi masal panayawiya , gegewel Diyon Tobabitaiso i bwata lakel . Yaa henala alana i kekeisisi hot Yehoba wana abalogugui elana , he iya Diyon i bwata lake .
40011012	I telipuna sauga Diyon i papaatena ana siga lan ebe , gamagalau nanakil hi haveyan Yehoba wana abalogugui elana , hi labose tage nihi ahe .
40011013	Mosese wana Logugui ge palopitau gegewel Yehoba wana abalogugui ana nem hi wasaan pwatanim ana siga Diyon .
40011014	Ge Diyon iya Ilaitiya toto palopita i ba i nenem . He binimala nuku abulilek-an te .
40011015	Ebo tanamiu i gan , baaba ya nuku hago .
40011016	Gamagalau ha bolo lan ebe , hauna elana na papatini-agil ? Heliya hi ola wawayau hi sisigaopop hi misiyowa abamaket elana , inoke enuna hi yoga avaliyau elal hi ba :
40011017	Alolon ana igo ha yu Nuwanak wonana ha
40011018	He gamagalau ha bolo lan ebe wali pagan i ola to wawayau o wali pagan hi lolopalapalaviyan . Kaiwena Diyon i nem ge galebu i palahikan awanun kaiwena , ge oine nige i iim , inoke gamagalau hi ba , ‘ Yayaluwa bibikena i holaviya elana . ’
40011019	Ge nau Gamagal Natuna ya nem , ya anan ge ya imwim , yaka hi ba , ‘ Tau ya iya tohoni ge toimwim , iya takis ana toahi ge togegi wali heliyam . ’ Yaa siba toto i noem Yehoba elana mulina ta kite ge ta awa tutunahoti . ”
40011020	Yeisu i baaba panuwa kaiweliya , bolo ginol yawiyawi i gewi i ginola gamwaliyaa , inoke i awa naknakagil , kaiwena pagan nanakina ana en nige hi pepek .
40011021	I ba , “ Eeu ! Kolasin geb , bwaliga nuku nak ! Eeu ! Betesaida geb , bwaliga nuku nak ! Binimala ginol yawiyawi toto ya ginola eliyamiu na ginola Taya ge Saidoni elal , he beyaunana kaliko toto bwasumu pupunona elana hi ginoliya nihi galoi ge tuwaliya nihi papakove , inoke nihi pamasalil te iyaka wali gegi ana en hi pek .
40011022	Na baewa eliyamiu , yatala ana lan elana , Taya ge Saidoni ali lahi ni pulowan , yaa komiu ami lahi nasi ni pulowan hot .
40011023	“ Ga i ola komiu Kapeniyama ! Age nuwamiu alamiu nuku teli heyan natiya ? Yaa nasi nihi alipalomiu nuku lau Gehena . Binimala ginol yawiyawi toto ya ginola eliyamiu na ginola Sodoma elana , he pagan nanakina ana en nihi pek yaka nige lahi nihi pwapwawa , inoke panuwa Sodoma iyoho ya ni minamina ana siga lan ebe .
40011024	Na baewa eliyamiu , yatala ana lan elana , komiu ami lahi ni pulowan hot , yaa Sodoma ali lahi nige ni pupulowan . ”
40011025	Sauga o elana Yeisu i ba , “ Nam , labulabum ge panayawi ali Babala , ya tobalagiwa kaiwena wam abalogugui ana aatena u sume tosiba ge toatena elal ge iyaka u pamasal bolo hi ola wawayau elal .
40011026	Ibwe Nam , kaiwena wam nuwatu i ola .
40011027	“ Aatena gegewena Nam iyaka i pem elau ge na pamasal gamagalau elal . Nige etega i aatenau , iyai te Nam , ge nige etega Nam i aatena , iyai te nau Natuna ge bolo na hilel Nam na pamasal elal .
40011028	“ Komiu bolo tuwamiu i aliga ge ami kalikalivai i pulowan , gegewemiu nuku nem eliyau inoke na paveyaho-agimiu .
40011029	Kalikalivai toto na pewa nuku ahe ge nuku vavasiliya eliyau , kaiwena ya hanalau ge no pagan i meimei , inoke veyaho nuku pwawa .
40011030	Kaiwena kalikalivai toto na pewa i aimweyaha ge usan toto na pewa nige i pupulowan . ”
40012001	Saugena o elana , Sabwata etegana Yeisu i nosola witi ana eyowa etega gamwanaa . Wana tohago hi galebu inoke witi enona hi lokibwaan ge hi an .
40012002	Sauga Palisi hi kitel , inoke hi baek Yeisu elana hi ba , “ U kite , wam tohago Sabwata ana logugui hi leke . ”
40012003	Yeisu analiya i lahe i ba , “ Age Deibid liwanina nige ku vavasili ga , ga i ginol ola sauga alonau ge alonau hi galebu ?
40012004	He Deibid i na i ulutuk Yehoba wana limiya inoke beleid bwabwalena toto hi teliya Yehoba manininaa , topowon i ahe i pek Deibid ge alonau elal ge hi an . Beleid o hi an , bwagana logugui i ba tage bahi nihi aan , topowon ya te nihi an .
40012005	Age Mosese wana Logugui nige ku vavasili ga , toto i ba topowon Sabwata maisena ge maisena nihi tuwatuwalali limi bwabwalena elana ? He Sabwata ana logugui iyaka hi leke to , yaa nige wali nak i gagan .
40012006	Na baewa eliyamiu , gamagal etega iyahe te , iya limi bwabwalena alana i bwata lake .
40012007	Yehoba wana baaba etega ana sapu nige ku aatena , toto i ba , ‘ Nau nuwau atilomwan paganina , nige nuwau bwasumu powopowonina . ’ Binimala baaba ya ana sapu nuku atena , he no tohago nige nuku aawa naknakagil , heliya nige wali nak i gagan .
40012008	Kaiwena nau Gamagal Natuna , nau Sabwata ana Babala . ”
40012009	Yeisu i nawanawa al i na i ulutuk panuwa o wali limi tapwalolowa .
40012010	Tau etega iyoho to , nimana labi etega i aliga . Palisi nuwaliya Yeisu ana woliwoli nihi ginol , inoke hi neli hi ba , “ Wala logugui ga i ba ola ? I bosowaina ya gamagal etega ta pwamolu lan Sabwataa o nigeya ? ”
40012011	Yaka i baek elal i ba , “ Komiu etega , ebo wana sipi etega i gan ge lan Sabwataa ni soguek gola , nasi ni pihikan ge ni momol heyan , age ?
40012012	He sipi bugul bwabwatana , yaa gamagal bugul bwabwatana hot . Inoke Logugui i talam ginol waiwaisana ta ginol lan Sabwataa . ”
40012013	Yaka i baek tau o elana i ba , “ Nimwam u paelu . ” Inoke nimana i paelu , ge nimana iyaka i waisi i ola nimana labuina .
40012014	Yaa Palisi hi tagil , hi na hi nuwanuwatu ga nihi ginol ola ge Yeisu nihi lopaaliga .
40012015	Palisi wali nuwatu Yeisu i atena inoke panuwa o i eguluwai . Gamagalau hi gewi hi toulil ge wali tokasiyebwa gegewel i pwamolol ,
40012016	yaa i lopwalil bahi nihi wawasaan te henala iya .
40012017	He i ginol ola to , inoke Yehoba wana baaba toto palopita Aiseya i pamasal i tabwa tunahot , i ba :
40012018	No totuwalali hiwe , toto ya hile , ya nunuwana-an ge ya yaliyaya-an . Yayaluwau na pek elana , ge iya no logugui sasapona
40012019	Nige ni aawabalgig ge nige ni yogayoga , nige ni babaa loloi kamwasaa .
40012020	Kaliyou toto i kom nige ni pipigabom , odam toto i tolau nige ni pwapwabolu . He i ola al gamagalau bolo Ni tuwalali ana siga Yehoba
40012021	Iya alana elana gamagalau gegewel mel nihi teli .
40012022	Gamagalau enuna tau etega hi pwatanim , matana i kai ge nige bosowaina ni baaba , kaiwena yayaluwa bibikena i holaviya elana . Yeisu i pwamolu inoke anana i mwapwela ge matana i panana .
40012023	Yaka gamagalau gegewel nuwaliya hi ahe ge hi ba , “ Bi ola ge iya Deibid Tubuna ? ”
40012024	Yaa sauga Palisi hi hago yaka hi ba , “ Yayaluwa bibikel wali tohouwa , Tamudulele , wana gasisi elana te yayaluwa bibikel i papatuna owaowa-agil . ”
40012025	Yeisu wali nuwatu i atena inoke i baek elal i ba , “ Ebo abalogugui etega boda ni palabui ge totoliya nihi lohaveyan , he abalogugui o nasi ni mowasi . Ge ebo panuwa etega o ebo un etega boda ni palabui ge totoliya nihi lohaveyan , he nasi nige ni gagasisi .
40012026	I ola al , ebo Seitani totona wana boda ni patuna owaowa-agil , he totoliya hi lohaveyan elal to , inoke wana abalogugui ni mowasi .
40012027	Ku ba tage Tamudulele wana gasisi elana yayaluwa bibikel ya papatuna owaowa-agil . He ebo ku ba ola o , inoke henala wana gasisi elana ge komiu wami tohago yayaluwa bibikel hi papatuna owaowa-agil ? He wami tohago wami gegi nihi pamasal .
40012028	Yaa ebo Yehoba Yayaluwana wana gasisi elana ge yayaluwa bibikel ya papatuna owaowa-agil , he Yehoba wana logugui iyaka i nem haba eliyamiu .
40012029	“ Nige bosowaina gamagal etega ni ulutuk asiyala * wana limiya ge wana gogomwau ni bugulan , age ? Ebo nuwana , inoke ni yowan hikan ga , abwe wana limi bugubugulina ni bugul egonan .
40012030	“ Henala nige i miminaa eliyau , iya o topihigelgel . Henala ebo nige alou ha gogogon pahipahi , iya tolopetaki .
40012031	Na baewa eliyamiu , henala ebo pagan nanakina ni ginol ge ebo ni ba bwagabwaga ge Yehoba ni awatautau-an , he bosowaina ya gegi toto o Yehoba ni nuwayoho . Yaa henala ni ba bwagabwaga ge Yayaluwa Bwabwalena ni awatautau-an , he gegi toto o Yehoba nige ni nunuwayoho .
40012032	Henala ebo Gamagal Natuna ni ba panapanak-an , he bosowaina ya gegi toto o Yehoba ni nuwayoho . Yaa henala Yayaluwa Bwabwalena ni ba panapanak-an , he gegi toto o Yehoba nige ni nunuwayoho , sauga ya o ebo sauga i nenem .
40012033	“ Ebo ebwakil waiwaisana , he enona i waisi . Ebo ebwakil nanakina , he enona i nak . Ebo enona ta kite inoke ebwakil ta atena , ebo ebwakil waiwaisana ebo ebwakil nanakina .
40012034	Komiu Palisi ku ola mwata ! Komiu gamagalau nanakil , inoke nige bosowaina baaba waiwaisana nuku baunan . Nigeya hot ! Hauna ebo atela i pakalaopopwi , heiya te i tatagila hohopelaa .
40012035	Gamagal toto waiwaisana pagan waiwaisana ni enoni , ni ola waisi toto i pwahin atenaa . Gamagal toto nanakina pagan nanakina ni enoni , ni ola nak toto i pwahin atenaa .
40012036	“ Na baewa eliyamiu , yatala ana lan elana gamagal maisena ge maisena ana kot ni gan baaba nanakina gegewena kaiwena , toto i baunan .
40012037	Ebo wami baaba baaba waiwaisana , Yehoba ni awa wawaisi-agimiu . Ebo wami baaba baaba nanakina , Yehoba ni awa sigasiga-agimiu . ”
40012038	Inoke Palisi ge Logugui ana topankite enuna hi baek Yeisu elana hi ba , “ Topankite , nuwama ginol yawiyawi etega nu ginol naha kite . ”
40012039	Yeisu analiya i lahe i ba , “ Heyan sisigal komiu , nige ku miminaa Yehoba elana , inoke nuwamiu abapankite na ginol eliyamiu . Yaa nige abapankite etega na pepewa , iyai te toto i masala palopita Yona elana .
40012040	I ola lan eton ge bulin eton Yona i miminaa moti bwabwatana tinenaa , i ola al lan eton ge bulin eton nau Gamagal Natuna na minaa bilibili gamwanaa .
40012041	Lan yatala elana gamagalau Ninibe nihi lut ge nihi awa sigasiga-agimiu , kaiwena Yona wana papaatena hi hago inoke wali gegi ana en hi pek . He gamagal etega iyahe te , iya Yona i bwata lake , yaa komiu nige wana papaatena ku hahago ge nige wami gegi ana en ku pepek .
40012042	Lan yatala elana labi Seba wali kuin ni lut ge ni awa sigasiga-agimiu , kaiwena iya i neem labi yayapona elana nuwana Solomon wana panpankiti sisibana ni hago . He gamagal etega iyahe te , iya Solomon i bwata lake , yaa komiu nige anana ku hahago . ”
40012043	“ Sauga yayaluwa bibikena i ulutagilem gamagal etega elana , inoke i na ula bwagabwaga i tatapainan wana abaveyaho i loya , yaa nige etega i pwapwawa .
40012044	Yaka i ba , ‘ Na sikal ga abau elana toto ya eguluwai . ’ Sauga i sikal , abamina o i kite , hi hala ge hi abubun , yaa enonovana ya .
40012045	Inoke i egon i na wana pan yayaluwa bibikel ali gewi seben al i ahel , heliya wali pagan nanakina hot , yaka alonau hi ulutuk ge hi holaviya abamina o elana . Inoke gamagal o wana minamina houhouwena i nak , yaa mulaa i nak nabi hot . He nasi ni masal ni ola to heyan sisigal lan ebe elal . ”
40012046	Yeisu iyoho i baaba boda elal inoke hinana ge talinau hi vin , hi talmilil noleleya , nuwaliya nihi baaba elana .
40012047	Inoke gamagal etega wana wasa i pek , i ba , “ Hinam ge talimwau heliya huwo hi taltalmilil noleleya o , nuwaliya nihi baaba elam . ”
40012048	Anana Yeisu i lahe i ba , “ Henala nain , ge henalau taliwau ? ”
40012049	Yaka nimana i huliek wana tohago elal ge i ba , “ Nain ge taliwau heliya hiwe !
40012050	Henala ebo Nam labulabumwa wana nuwatu ni ginol , iya te taliu , nu ge nain . ”
40013001	Lan o elana Yeisu i ulutagilem limiya i nok i na hoga bebenaa ge i misiyo .
40013002	Boda bwabwatana hot hi nogogo ge hi mipainan , inoke i gaiha waga etega elana ge i misiyo , yaa gamagalau hi talmilila datuwa .
40013003	I liwan gohalibe inoke bugul i gewi i baunan eliyalil . I ba , “ Tau etega i nok eyowaa witi pwatumwina i yohi .
40013004	Sauga pwatum i yohi , enuna hi talek kamwasaa inoke bwasumu hi you tal ge hi anil .
40013005	Enuna hi talek manapatpata , ali bilibili waiwaisana nige i bwabwata . Etimwawa hi siun , kaiwena ali bilibili nige i babalu .
40013006	Yaa sauga sabwelu i ha , witi siunina i tonil yaka hi yakiwa , kaiwena ewahililiya nige i lalau bubun .
40013007	Pwatum enuna hi talek mwawin pepesala gamwaliyaa , yaka mwawin pepesala hi siun gagasisi inoke witi hi gig paaligal .
40013008	Pwatum enuna hi talek bilibili waiwaisana elana inoke hi enon , tomaha ona enoliya . Enuna enoliya wan handeled , enuna sikisti , enuna teti .
40013009	Ebo tanamiu i gan , he no baaba nuku hago . ”
40013010	Yeisu wana tohago hi nem elana ge hi neli hi ba , “ Hauna kaiwena u liwan gohalibe gamagalau elal ? ”
40013011	Yeisu analiya i lahe i ba , “ Yehoba wana abalogugui ana nuwatu misusumena iyaka i pamasal eliyamiu , yaa nige i papamasal eliyalil .
40013012	Henala wana aatena i gan , abwe Yehoba ni paetulan , inoke Yehoba ana aatena ni bwata hot eliyana . Henala Yehoba ana aatena nige i gagan eliyana , hauna valila wana aatena kekeisi , Yehoba ni ahek yoho .
40013013	Ya liwan gohalibe eliyalil puna kaiwena hi gagayawa yaa nige hi kikite , hi lalaegan yaa nige hi hahago ge hi aatena .
40013014	He eliyalil palopita Aiseya wana leleli i tabwa tunahot i ba : Nuku mimi lalaegan , yaa nuku mimi gagayawa , yaa nige nuku kikite .
40013015	Kaiwena gamagalau ya ateliya i gasisi , tanaliya hi pikaus , ge mataliya hi pagin . Binimala nigeya , yaka nihi kite mataliyaa , nihi hago tanaliyaa , ge nihi atena ateliyaa , inoke nihi nuwasikal elau ge na pwamolol .
40013016	Yaa komiu ku waisi kaiwena matamiu i mwananal ge tanamiu i mwapwela .
40013017	Ya ba tunahot eliyamiu , palopitau ge Yehoba wana gamagalau houhouwel hi gewi nuwaliya hot hauna komiu ku kite heliya nihi kite , yaa nige hi kikite , ge nuwaliya hot hauna komiu ku hago ya panpankiti-an heliya nihi hago , yaa nige hi hahago .
40013018	Ku laegan ga inoke pwatum ana toyohi ana ba gohalibe ana sapu nuku hago .
40013019	Sauga ebo gamagal etega Yehoba wana abalogugui wasana ni hago , yaa ana sapu nige ni aatena , nasi Seitani ni nem ge hauna toto hi luwan atenaa ni kaluoe . He heiya te pwatum toto i talek kamwasaa .
40013020	Pwatum toto i talek manapatpata , he heiya gamagalau bolo wasa waiwaisana hi hago ge etimwawa hi ahe hi teliek ateliyaa ginebi wali yaliyaya .
40013021	Yaa bugul maisena , wasa waiwaisana nige hi nuwanuwatu-an bubun ateliyaa , ewahililiya nige i lalau bubun , inoke wali sauga nige i yayapu . Sauga ebo pulowan hi pwawa o ebo gamagalau hi palomwanagil wasa waiwaisana kaiwena , etimwawa yayaluwaliya hi pil ge hi towani .
40013022	Pwatum toto i talek mwawin pepesala gamwaliyaa , he heiya gamagalau bolo wasa waiwaisana hi hago , yaa hi nuwanuwatu panayawi yawalina kaiwena ge hi nuwa gogomwau , inoke bugul bolo ya wasa waiwaisana hi gig paaliga ge nige enona i gagan .
40013023	Pwatum toto i talek bilibili waiwaisana elana , he heiya gamagalau bolo wasa waiwaisana hi hago ge hi atena ana sapu . Hi enon , enuna enoliya wan handeled , enuna sikisti , enuna teti . ”
40013024	Yeisu ba gohalibe etega al i liwanan elal i ba , “ Yehoba wana abalogugui i ola hiwe . Tau etega witi pwatumwina waiwaisana i yohi wana eyowaa .
40013025	Bulin etega gamagalau gegewel hi kenukenu , inoke ana topihigelgel etega i nem mwawin nanakina pwatumwina i yohi witi gamwaliyaa ge i egon .
40013026	Sauga witi i siun ge i enon telipuna , inoke mwawin nanakina i masal .
40013027	Tau o wana totuwalali hi nem elana hi ba , ‘ Tonowak , witi pwatumwina waiwaisana u yohi wam eyowaa , age ? Yaa mwawin nanakina ga i noem ? ’
40013028	Analiya i lahe i ba , ‘ Topihigelgel etega i ginol te . ’ Totuwalali hi nel hi ba , ‘ Tab nuwam ama naha nok ge naha awaha yoho ? ’
40013029	Analiya i lahe i ba , ‘ Bahiwa , kaiwena ebo mwawin nanakina nuku awaha yoho , nasi witi enuna alona nuku pulut toyawe .
40013030	Ali toto labui nihi siun toyawa ga , ana siga pahi ana sauga . Sauga o elana na ba topahi elal na ola : Mwawin nanakina nuku pulut houwan ge nuku kin abwe ta ton , inoke witi nuku ahe ge nuku pahe no gonu elana . ’ ”
40013031	Yeisu ba gohalibe etega al i liwanan , i ba , “ Yehoba wana abalogugui i ola ebwakil alana masted pwatumwina , tau etega i ahe ge i luwan wana eyowaa .
40013032	He iya pwatum gegewena wali tokekeisi , yaa sauga i siun ge i bwata , bugul gegewena bolo hi siun eyowaa i bwata lakel . I tabwa ebwakil etegana inoke bwasumu bolo hi youyou hawawala hi nem ali vata hi ginola lalana elana . ”
40013033	Yeisu ba gohalibe etega al i liwanan , i ba , “ Yehoba wana abalogugui i ola yis , yova etega i ahe ge i telek pwalawa ana bwaya beig eton gamwanaa , inoke yis i tuwalali ana siga pwalawa gegewena i tuk solaan . ”
40013034	Yeisu i liwan gohalibe inoke bugul bolo ya gegewena i baunan boda elal ; ba gohalibe ya te eliyana ge bugul enuna ni liwanan elal .
40013035	Inoke palopita wana baaba i tabwa tunahot i ba : Awau na pwela ge na ba gohalibe ; bugul misusumel na liwanagil , bolo hi misumi sauga toto
40013036	Inoke Yeisu boda i tataluwagil ge i ulutuk limiya . Wana tohago hi nem elana hi ba , “ Mwawin nanakina i siun eyowaa ana ba gohalibe u sokal eliyama . ”
40013037	Analiya i lahe i ba , “ Tau toto witi pwatumwina waiwaisana i yohi , heiya Gamagal Natuna .
40013038	Eyowa heiya panayawi , ge witi pwatumwina waiwaisana heiya Yehoba wana abalogugui gamagaliliyau . Mwawin nanakina heiya Seitani wana gamagalau ,
40013039	ge topihigelgel toto mwawin nanakina pwatumwina i yohi , heiya Seitani . Pahi ana sauga heiya sauga mowamowasena , ge topahi heiya aneloseyau .
40013040	“ Mwawin nanakina nihi awaha yoho ge nihi ton ginaha elana , he nasi ni ola al sauga mowamowasena elana .
40013041	Gamagal Natuna wana aneloseyau ni patunal , yaka bugul bolo gamagalau i pasogol ge hi gegi ge bolo pagan nanakina hi awaawaginol , gegewel nihi awaha yohil wana abalogugui elana .
40013042	Nihi alitukagil ginaha bwabwatana elana inoke nihi kahin ge niniliya ni alavekilal .
40013043	Inoke tosasapol nihi yana ni ola sabwelu mwananalina Tamaliya wana abalogugui elana . Ebo tanamiu i gan , inoke no baaba nuku hago . ”
40013044	Yehoba wana abalogugui i ola gogomwau bwabwatana hi yamwi eyowa etega elana ge hi yaomal luwai . Tau etega i pwawa inoke i sume pasikal . I yaliyaya bubun gogomwau o kaiwena , inoke i nok i na wana bugul gegewena i palian , manina i ahe ge eyowa i pwamola .
40013045	Yehoba wana abalogugui i ola al hiwe . Gogomwau ana topali etega bag waiwaisana i loyaagil .
40013046	Sauga etega bag waiwaisana hot molana bwabwatana i pwawa , inoke i nok i na wana bugul gegewena i palian , manina i ahe ge bag o i pwamola .
40013047	Yehoba wana abalogugui i ola al vineya hi galaan hogaa , inoke moti tomaha ge tomaha hi ona .
40013048	Sauga i kalaopop , tologi hi momol heyan gilesaa . Yaka hi misiyo ge moti hi pwaputil , bolo waiwaisal hi teli kekeha , bolo nanakil hi aliyohil .
40013049	He nasi ni ola to sauga mowamowasena elana . Aneloseyau nihi nem , tonanakil ge towaisi nihi walel , bolo nanakil nihi teli getogaagil .
40013050	Nihi alitukagil ginaha bwabwatana elana , inoke nihi kahin ge niniliya ni alavekilal .
40013051	Yeisu wana tohago i nelil i ba , “ Tab nuwamiu i sapu bugul bolo ya kaiweliya ? ” Anana hi lahe hi ba , “ Ibwe . ”
40013052	I baek elal i ba , “ He logugui ana topankite gegewel , bolo iyaka hi tabwa tohago Yehoba wana abalogugui kaiwena , heliya hi ola tonlimi toto bugul vavalul ge bugul bebeyaunal i aheya wana holaviya ge i teli tagilagil . ”
40013053	Sauga Yeisu ba gohalibe bolo ya i liwanan haba , yaka panuwa o i eguluwan
40013054	i nok i na totona wana panuwaa . I panpankiti wali limi tapwalolowa , inoke gamagalau nuwaliya hi ahe hi ba , “ Wana aatena ga i aheya ? Ga i ola ge i bosowaina ginol yawiyawi ni ginol ?
40013055	He iya kapenta natuna age ? Hinana alana Meli , talinau Yemesa , Yosepa , Saimon ge Yudasa .
40013056	Nunau gegewel iyehe avalau . He i ola , age ? Inoke wana aatena ge wana siba ga i aheya ? ”
40013057	Inoke ateliya i elolol ge Yeisu hi pihigelgel-an . Yeisu i baek elal i ba , “ Gamagalau gegewel palopita hi awatauwan , yaa tutunau ge wana panuwa gamagaliliyau ya te nige hi aawatauwan . ”
40013058	Ginol yawiyawi nige i gegewi i ginola panuwa o elana kaiwena nige hi aabulilek-an .
40014001	Sauga toto o Helodi , iya Galili wali tologugui , Yeisu wasana i hago ,
40014002	inoke i baek wana totuwalali elal i ba , “ Diyon Tobabitaiso tei , i lutem yaomal elana . Heiya te kaiwena wana gasisi i gan ge ginol yawiyawi i awaawaginol . ”
40014003	He valila Helodi Helodiyas i oe alona hi alolon , Helodiyas iya Helodi talina Pilipi , lagona . Diyon i mimi baaba Helodi elana i ba i ola , “ Nige bosowaina nu alolonan . ” Baena , inoke Helodi wana totuwalali i patunal Diyon hi lib hi yowan ge hi teli dela .
40014004	
40014005	Helodi nuwana ni tagapaaliga , yaa gamagalau i lovakunagil , kaiwena Diyon hi abulilek-an iya palopita etega .
40014006	Helodi wana lan ab elana , Helodiyas natuna meluyovana i sagasaga boda mataliyaa . Wana sagasaga Helodi i yaliyaya-an hot ,
40014007	inoke i papasila i ba , “ O sila nam , ebo hauna gun nu awanuni , nasi na pewa . ”
40014008	Hinana i baek elana inoke iya i baek Helodi elana , i ba , “ Diyon Tobabitaiso mwamwalina nu gotomwa , balomana nu loke mwaha elana , nu pwatanim ge nu pem eliyau na kite . ”
40014009	Kin nuwana i nak , yaa i ba nihi ginol ni ola galok wana nuwatu , kaiwena iyaka i papasila bolo hi na pati o elana mataliyaa .
40014010	Inoke i ba Diyon mwamwalina hi gotomwa del elana .
40014011	Balomana hi loke mwahaa inoke hi pwatanim hi pek yova elana ge iya i pwatanik hinana elana .
40014012	Yaka Diyon wana tohago hi nem , tuwana hi ahe ge hi na hi teli salaiya , inoke hi nok hi na Yeisu wana wasa hi pek .
40014013	Yeisu wasa i hago inoke panuwa o i eguluwai , i heya wagaa ge hi na papaeliya ge nihi mimwaumwau . Gamagalau wana egon wasana hi hago , yaka wali panuwa hi eguluwagil ge aeliyaa hi tatauliulil .
40014014	Yeisu i gailau , inoke sauga boda i kitel atena i lomwanagil ge wali tokasiyebwa i pwamolol .
40014015	Sauga panuwa i kokoyavi , wana tohago hi nem elana hi ba , “ Panuwa ya ana bwaga i gan ge kelaubwa bulin ni gan . Boda u patunal nihi na awan elal ge aliya nihi pwapwamola . ”
40014016	Analiya Yeisu i lahe i ba , “ Bahi nihi egon . Komiu aanan etegana nuku pek nihi an . ”
40014017	Hi baek elana hi ba , “ Beleid nimala panuna ge moti eluwa ya te i gan eliyama . ”
40014018	Yaka i ba , “ Ku pwatanim eliyau . ”
40014019	Yaka abwe i ba gamagalau nihi misiyoan mwawin pwatanaa , yaka beleid nimala panuna ge moti eluwa i ahe , matana i lihin labulabumwa ge i ba mulolu Yehoba elana . Inoke beleid i pigebagebal-an , i pek wana tohago elal ge heliya abwe hi guyauan gamagalau elal .
40014020	Gamagalau gegewel hi anan tineliya i kiya , inoke wali an teli tohago hi abubun , ana egowa elulutega eluwa .
40014021	Bolo hi anan , bolau ali gewi tabam paib tausan , yaa evenakau ge wawayau ali gewi nige hi aahe .
40014022	Inoke Yeisu i ba wana tohago nihi gaiha wagaa nihi houwa nihi alupanet labi etega ge iya gamagalau ni patunal nihi egonan .
40014023	I patunal hi egonan i mowasi , inoke iya maisena i na i ha oyaa ge i awanun . Bulin i gan iya maisena i miminaa to ,
40014024	he waga iyaka ana bwaga i gan panuwa elana , bagol waga i tagapagenagena-an nabiyan , kaiwena mana i yu pahanal .
40014025	Mweluluga kekeisi tili kilok ge sikis kilok ali hawawala , inoke Yeisu i nem eliyalil i nawaa hoga pwatanaa .
