40014026	Wana tohago hi kite i nawanawa hoga pwatanaa inoke hi lovakun hi ba , “ Gagayumwa ! ” Inoke hi loi ginebi ge wali lovakun .
40014027	Yaka etimwawa Yeisu i baek elal i ba , “ Atemiu ni matuwa ! Nau te . Bahi lovakun ! ”
40014028	Pita i ba , “ Babala , ebo tunahot owa , u ba na nawaa hoga pwatanaa ge na nowa elam . ”
40014029	Anana Yeisu i lahe i ba , “ U nem . ” Inoke Pita i gailau i nawanawa hoga pwatanaa i nok Yeisu elana .
40014030	Yaa sauga mana i kite , yaka i lovakun ge i telipuna lobek , inoke i yoga i ba , “ Babala , u pwamwalau ! ”
40014031	Etimwawa Yeisu nimana i paelu ge i pihikan , yaka i ba , “ Wam abulilek nige i bwabwata ! Hauna kaiwena u nuwa lalabui ? ”
40014032	Sauga hi gaiha wagaa yaka mana i mwatomwa .
40014033	Inoke bolo hi miminaa wagaa hi kululu elana hi ba , “ Tunahot , owa Yehoba natuna . ”
40014034	Hoga hi alupanet-an hi na hi tan panuwa Genesaleta .
40014035	Gamagalau Yeisu hi kite inoke hi atena iya to , yaka wasa hi palelu awanina gegewena elal ge tokasiyebwa gegewel hi pwatanim .
40014036	Yaka hi awanun elana tokasiyebwa ana kaliko buhuna ya nihi pibose , inoke bolo hi pibose , gegewel hi molu .
40015001	Palisi ge Logugui ana topankite enuna hi neem Yelusalema hi na Yeisu elana ge hi neli hi ba ,
40015002	“ Ga i ola ge wam tohago logugui toto i neem tubulau elal hi hewa likaan ? Nimaliya nige hi uul i oola logugui o ana kamwasa , mulaa abwe nihi anan . ”
40015003	Analiya Yeisu i lahe i ba , “ Ga i ola ge komiu Yehoba wana logugui ku hewa likaan ge ku golugoluwa totomiu wami panpankiti elana , toto i noem tubumiyau elal ?
40015004	Kaiwena Yehoba i ba , ‘ Tamwam ge hinam nu awatauwagil ’ ge i ba , ‘ Henala ebo tamana ge hinana ni ba panakil nihi tagapaaliga . ’
40015005	Yaa komiu ku ba ola hiwe : Ebo bugul enuna i gan gamagal etega elana tage tamana ge hinana ali labe kaiwena , i waisi ya ebo nige ni pepek elal ge tamana ge hinana nige ni aawatauwagil . Komiu ku ba i bosowaina ya ni baek elal ni ba , ‘ Bugul bolo tage ya pepewa iyaka ya ba pwatanek Yehoba elana , he yaka nige na pepewa . ’ Ku ba ola o , inoke Yehoba wana logugui ku hewa likaan to ge ku golugoluwa totomiu wami panpankiti elana toto i noem tubumiyau elal .
40015006	
40015007	Tokakakawi komiu ! Palopita Aiseya i ba bubun ya , kaiwemiu valila i lelelian i ola hiwe : Yehoba i ba ,
40015008	‘ Gamagalau ya hohopeliyaa hi awatauwagau , yaa ateliya ana bwaga i yapu elau .
40015009	Wali tapwalolo eliyau i ola bugul bwagabwaga , gamagalau wali nuwatu hi
40015010	Yeisu boda i yogaagil inoke niman ana ulul bana i baek elal i ba , “ Ku laegan ! Nuwamiu ni sapu !
40015011	Toto i tuka awalaa nige i papabikela , yaa toto i tagilem awalaa heiya te gamagal i pabikela . ”
40015012	Yaka tohago hi nem elana ge hi ba , “ Tab u atena Palisi ateliya i elolol wam baaba ya kaiwena ? ”
40015013	Yeisu analiya i lahe i ba , “ Bugul gegewena toto Nam labulabumwa nige i luluwan abwe nihi pulut yoho .
40015014	Ku telel ! Heliya tohouwa mataliya kakaina . Ebo tomatakai wana pan tomatakai ni nul , nasi ali toto labui nihi soguek gola . ”
40015015	Pita i ba , “ Ba gohalibe ya u sokal eliyama . ”
40015016	Yaka Yeisu i baek elal i ba , “ Age nigeya ga nuwamiu i sasapu ?
40015017	Age nige ku aatena toto i tuka awalaa i loek tinelaa yaka abwe i noek wana kamwasaa ?
40015018	Yaa toto i tagilem awalaa , he i neem atelaa inoke heiya te gamagalau i pabikela .
40015019	Kaiwena nuwatu nanakina i neem atelaa : taulol , ganawal , lubwala , kaoma , woliwoli kakawi ge loloba .
40015020	Heiya te gamagalau i pabikela ; yaa nimala nige ta uul ge aanan ta an nige i papabikela . ”
40015021	Yeisu panuwa o i eguluwai , i nok i na Taya ge Saidoni wali labi elana .
40015022	He Kenani yovana etegana i miminaa labi o elana , iya nige Isileli gamagalina i oola . I nem Yeisu elana ge i yogayoga i ba , “ Babala , Deibid Tubuna , u atilomwan-agau ! Kaiwena yayaluwa bibikena i holaviya natu meluyovana elana ge i papalomwan-an nabiyan . ”
40015023	Yeisu anana nige i lalahe , nige baaba etega i babaunan . Inoke wana tohago hi nem elana ge hi ba gagasisi elana hi ba , “ Yova u patuna owaowani , kaiwena i nonoyogayoga elaa . ”
40015024	Yaka Yeisu i ba , “ Nam i patunau ya nem boda Isileli wali sipi yayaomalil ya te kaiweliya . ”
40015025	Yaka yova i nem i loepwakoku elana ge i ba , “ Babala , u labeyau . ”
40015026	Anana i lahe i ba , “ Tabam nige i sasapu ebo na labewa . Nige bosowaina wawayau aliya ta ahe ge ta alihinek wanuka elal . ” *
40015027	Yaka yova i ba , “ Ibwe , Babala . Yaa wanuka aanan mumwina , toto i soguem tutuliya wana teibol elana hi an , inoke i bosowaina ya nu labeyau . ”
40015028	Inoke Yeisu i ba , “ Yova , wam abulilek i bwata . Ni masal ni ola wam nuwatu . ” Inoke sauga o elana natuna i molu .
40015029	Yeisu panuwa o i eguluwai i nawanawa Hoga Galili bebenaa . Yaka abwe i na i ha oyaa ge i misiyo .
40015030	Inoke boda bwabwatana hi nem elana ge tokasiyebwa hi gewi hi pwatanim , bolo tonohomhom , tomatakai , bolo aeliya i kom , bolo analiya i nak ge enuna al , inoke hi telel Yeisu aenaa ge i pwamolol .
40015031	Gamagalau nuwaliya hi ahe , kaiwena hi kite bolo analiya i nak hi baaba , bolo aeliya i kom hi pasapu , tonohomhom hi nobubun ge tomatakai mataliya hi panana . Inoke Isileli wali Yabowaine hi tobalan .
40015032	Yeisu wana tohago i yogaagil hi nem elana inoke i ba , “ Gamagalau ya nuwau i nakagil , kaiwena lan eton avalau ta mina , yaka nige aliya i gagan . Nige nuwau i oola galegalebol ya na patuna pasikalil , kaiwena eba nasi nihi wesal kamwasaa . ”
40015033	Wana tohago hi baek elana hi ba , “ Panuwa ya ana bwaga i gan , aanan ga ta aheya ge boda ya ta paanil ? ”
40015034	Yaka Yeisu i nelil i ba , “ Beleid ehila eliyamiu ? ” Hi ba , “ Nimala panuna labui ge moti kekeisi ehila ya . ”
40015035	I ba boda hi misiyoan bilibiliya ,
40015036	yaka beleid seben i ahel alona ge moti , i ba mulolu Yehoba elana , i pigebagebal-an , inoke i pek wana tohago elal ge heliya hi guyauan gamagalau elal .
40015037	Gegewel hi anan tineliya i kiya , inoke wali an teli tohago hi abubun , ana egowa seben hi ahe .
40015038	Bolo hi anan , bolau ali gewi po tausan , yaa evenakau ge wawayau ali gewi nige hi aahe .
40015039	Yeisu boda i patunal hi egon inoke i gaiha wagaa i na Magadan ana labi elana .
40016001	Palisi ge Sadiusi enuna hi nem Yeisu elana , nuwaliya nihi labose inoke hi ba , “ Ginol yawiyawi etega nu ginol , inoke naha atena tunahot wam gasisi i neem Yehoba elana . ”
40016002	Yeisu analiya i lahe i ba , “ Ebo sabwelu wana sauga lobek inoke ku ba , ‘ Bwaligumwa ni mainum kaiwena labulabum i ket , ’
40016003	ge ebo mweluluga inoke ku ba , ‘ Nasi kehe ni lau kaiwena labulabum i ket ge i biki . ’ I bosowaimiu labulabum ana awa nuku eunaan , yaa sauga toto Yehoba i teli ana etotohi nige bosowaimiu ana awa nuku eunaan .
40016004	Heyan sisigal komiu , nige ku miminaa Yehoba elana , inoke nuwamiu abapankite na ginol eliyamiu . Yaa nige abapankite etega na pepewa , iyai te toto i masala palopita Yona elana . He i ola al nau abwe na lut al . ” Inoke Yeisu i tataluwagil ge i egon .
40016005	Sauga hoga hi alupanet-an , tohago hi nuluwan nige beleid etega hi aahe .
40016006	Yeisu i baek elal i ba , “ Matamiu ni mwaun ge nuku matahikagimiu Palisi ge Sadiusi wali yis kaiwena . ”
40016007	Tohago hi peawaawota-agil hi ola , “ I ba ola o kaiwena nige beleid etega ta pwapwatanim . ”
40016008	Yeisu wali baaba i atena inoke i baek elal i ba , “ Wami abulilek nige i bwabwata ! Ga i ola ge ku peawaawota-agimiu beleid kaiwena .
40016009	Age nige ga nuwamiu i sasapu ? Tab ku nuwahikan valila beleid nimala panuna ya pigebagebal-an bolau paib tausan kaiweliya ? He an teli ana egowa ehila ku ahe ?
40016010	Tab ku nuwahikan beleid seben ya pigebagebal-an bolau po tausan kaiweliya ? He an teli ana egowa ehila al ku ahe ?
40016011	Ga i ola ge nige nuwamiu i sasapu te nau nige ya baaba eliyamiu beleid kaiwena ? Yaa nau ya ba , ‘ Nuku matahikagimiu Palisi ge Sadiusi wali yis kaiwena . ’ ”
40016012	Abwe tohago hi atena nige i baaba nihi matahikagil yis toto beleid kaiwena , yaa i ba nihi matahikagil Palisi ge Sadiusi wali panpankiti kaiwena .
40016013	Yeisu i nok i na panuwa Sisaliya Pilipai ana labi elana , inoke wana tohago i nelil totona bana , i ba , “ Gamagalau hi ba tage Gamagal Natuna iya henala ? ”
40016014	Anana hi lahe hi ola , “ Enuna hi ba owa Diyon Tobabitaiso , enuna hi ba owa Ilaitiya , ge enuna al hi ba owa Yelemaiya o ebo palopita etega . ”
40016015	I baek elal i ba , “ Yaa komiu , ku ba tage henala nau ? ”
40016016	Saimon Pita anana i lahe i ba , “ Owa Mesaiya , Yabowaine yawalina gaganina Natuna . ”
40016017	Yeisu i baek elana i ba , “ Saimon Yona natuna , Yehoba i muloluagiwa ! Kaiwena gamagalau panayawiya nuwatu ya nige hi pepewa , yaa Nam labulabumwa i pewa .
40016018	Nau na baewa eliyam , owa Pita , * inoke pat ya pwatanaa no boda ekelesiya na tal , ge Seitani wana boda nige wali gasisi tage nihi bwata lake .
40016019	He ki na pewa elam ge wam gasisi ni gan Yehoba wana abalogugui gamwanaa ; inoke hauna toto nu lopwali panayawiya , nasi Yehoba ni lopwali labulabumwa , ge hauna toto nu talamwan panayawiya , nasi Yehoba ni talamwan labulabumwa . ”
40016020	Inoke Yeisu wana tohago i ba pagasisel bahi gamagal etega wana wasa nihi pepek te iya Mesaiya .
40016021	Sauga o elana ge i nok , Yeisu i pamasal wana tohago elal i ba , “ Na na ga Yelusalema inoke Yudiya wali tohouwa , topowon bwabwatal ge Logugui ana topankite nihi palomwanagau nabiyan ge nihi lopaaligau , inoke lan eton ni mowasi abwe na lut al . ”
40016022	Pita Yeisu i ahe hi na hi mihuwala , inoke i ba lopwali i ba , “ Babala , bahi ni oola to ! Bugul ya bahi ni mamasal eliyam . ”
40016023	Yaka Yeisu i tagena sikal , i baek Pita elana i ba , “ Seitani , u miegon eliyau ! Owa u ola abasogu eliyau , kaiwena wam nuwatu nige i nonoek Yehoba wana kamwasaa , i noek gamagalau wali nuwatu elana . ”
40016024	Inoke Yeisu i baek wana tohago elal i ba , “ Ebo etega nuwana ni toulilau , totona wana waisi ni towani , inoke ana kolos ni ahe ni kalivai ge ni toulilau .
40016025	Kaiwena henala ebo nuwana totona yawalina ni pwamwal , nasi ni payaomal , yaa henala ebo yawalina ni payaomal nau kaiweu , he nasi yawalina ni pwawa .
40016026	Hauna ana waisi ebo gamagal etega panayawi gegewena ni ahe ni logugui-an , yaa yawalina hot ni payaomal . He nige bugul etega bosowaina ni ahe ge yawalina ni pwamola pasikal .
40016027	Kaiwena Gamagal Natuna i nenem ginebi Tamana wana wasawasa ge alonau wana aneloseyau , inoke abwe gamagalau gegewel ni pwamolal ni ola wali tuwalali .
40016028	Ya ba tunahot eliyamiu , gamagalau enuna heliya iyahe te Gamagal Natuna nihi kite ga ni nem alona ge wana logugui , mulaa abwe nihi yaomal . ”
40017001	Lan esiwa ( 6 ) i mowasi , inoke Yeisu tohago eton i ahel , Pita , Yemesa alona ge talina Diyon , alonau hi na hi ha oya mihahaina elana , heliya ya .
40017002	Inoke ana awa gegetogana i masal mataliyaa . Maninina i namanamal i ola sabwelu ge ana kaliko i wawakeki hot ge i namanamal .
40017003	Inoke tohago eton hi kite Mosese ge Ilaitiya hi masal , avaliya Yeisu hi liwaliwan .
40017004	Yaka Pita i baek Yeisu elana i ba , “ Babala , i waisi te kila iyehe ee . Ebo nuwam , inoke gonu eton na ginolil , etegana owa , etegana Mosese , ge etegana Ilaitiya . ”
40017005	Sauga Pita iyoho i baaba , yaka yaluyalu namanamalina i pahabobol , inoke anan etega i neem yaluyaluwa i ba , “ Toto ya natu nunuwanina hot ; ya yaliyaya nabiyan iya kaiwena . Nuku laegan elana ! ”
40017006	Sauga tohago anan ya hi hago , yaka hi lovakun nabi ge maniniliya hi pwabun sumek bilibiliya .
40017007	Yeisu i nem eliyalil , i pihikagil ge i ba , “ Ku lut . Bahi lovakun . ”
40017008	Mataliya hi lihin , yaa nige gamagal etega hi kikite , Yeisu maisena ya .
40017009	Sauga hi laulau oyaa , inoke Yeisu i baek elal i ba , “ Bahi gamagal etega wana wasa nuku pepek bugul toto ku kikite kaiwena , ana siga Gamagal Natuna ni lutem yaomala . ”
40017010	Inoke tohago Yeisu hi neli hi ba , “ Hauna kaiwena Logugui ana topankite hi ba tage Ilaitiya ni nem houwa , mulaa abwe Mesaiya ni nem ? ”
40017011	Yeisu analiya i lahe i ba , “ Tunahot Ilaitiya ni nem houwa , inoke bugul gegewena ni abubun .
40017012	Yaa na baewa eliyamiu , Ilaitiya iyaka i nem haba , yaa gamagalau nige hi aatena , inoke bugul bolo hi nuwatuan hi ginol ya eliyana . I ola al , nau Gamagal Natuna abwe nihi palomwanagau . ”
40017013	Inoke tohago hi atena age Diyon Tobabitaiso bana te ge i ba , “ Ilaitiya iyaka i nem haba . ”
40017014	Sauga hi sikal hi na boda elal , yaka tau etega i nem Yeisu elana , i loepwakokuwa manininaa
40017015	ge i ba , “ Babala , natu nu atilomwan-an . I kikikiuha ge i nuwaleyan hot . Sauga i gewi ni sogu ginaha elana o ebo wewel elana .
40017016	Ya pwatanim wam tohago elal , yaa nige bosowailiya nihi pwamolu . ”
40017017	Yaka Yeisu i ba , “ Ee komiu , nige wami abulilek i gagan ge nuwatu gegewena ku pil getogaan ! Yaka sauga i yapu te alowau komiu ta miminaa e ! Paehila na palahikan kaiwemiu ? Geman ku pwatanim elau . ”
40017018	Yeisu i baek yayaluwa bibikena elana inoke i tagil , ge sauga o geman i molu .
40017019	Inoke tohago heliya ya hi nem Yeisu elana ge hi neli hi ba , “ Hauna kaiwena ama nige bosowaima naha ba ge yayaluwa bibikena ni tagil ? ”
40017020	Analiya i lahe i ba , “ Kaiwena nige wami abulilek i bwabwata . Ya ba tunahot eliyamiu , ebo wami abulilek i gan , bwagana wana kekeisisi ni ola ebwakil toto masted pwatumwina , bosowaimiu nuku baek oya ya elana nuku ba , ‘ Abam u miluwai , u na huwo , ’ yaka ni ginol ola . Ebo wami abulilek i gan , nige bugul etega i pupulowan tage nige bosowaimiu nuku ginol .
40017021	Yaa yayaluwa bibikena ololana o nige bosowaina ta ba ni tagil , iyai te ebo ta awanun ge galebu ta palahikan awanun o kaiwena . ” *
40017022	Sauga tohago hi nem hi migogo Galili elana , inoke i baek elal i ba , “ Gamagal Natuna kelaubwa abwe nihi talamwan gamagalau nimaliyaa ,
40017023	inoke nihi lopaaliga ge lan etonina elana abwe ni lut al . ” Yaka tohago nuwaliya i nak nabi .
40017024	Sauga Yeisu alonau wana tohago hi nem Kapeniyama , Limi Bwabwalena ana takis ana toahi hi nem Pita hi neli hi ba , “ Age nige wami topankite Limi Bwabwalena ana takis i pwapwamola ? ”
40017025	Pita analiya i lahe i ba , “ Nigeya ! He i pwapwamola . ” Yaka Pita i na i ulutuk limiya . Nigeya ga baaba etega i babaunan , inoke Yeisu i ba houwa i ola , “ Saimon , wam nuwatu ga i ola ? Panayawi ana kin takis hi aaheya henalau elal — tutuliyau elal o ebo gamagalau getogal elal ? ”
40017026	Anana Pita i lahe i ba , “ Gamagalau getogal elal . ” Yaka Yeisu i ba , “ He inoke nige bosowaina kin natunau takis nihi pwamola . I ola al , nau binimala bahi takis na pwapwamola Nam wana limi kaiwena .
40017027	Yaa bahi Limi Bwabwalena ana takis ana toahi ta papahugal . He u nok u na hogaa ge am yawon nu alipalo . Moti toto nu kos houwan nu ahe , gamwana nu pitanal , inoke mani nu pwawa ana bwata i bosowaina wala takis . Nu ahe nu na owa ge nau wala takis nu pwamola . ”
40018001	Saugena o tohago hi nem Yeisu elana ge hi neli hi ba , “ Henala alana i bwata Yehoba wana abalogugui elana ? ”
40018002	Yaka wawaya kekeisi etega i yogaan ge i patalmilil mataliyaa ,
40018003	inoke i ba , “ Ya ba tunahot eliyamiu , ebo nige wami pagan nuku pipil ge nuku oola wawayau kekeisi , he nige nuku uulutuk Yehoba wana abalogugui elana .
40018004	Henala ebo ni hanalau ni ola wawaya ya , he iya alana i bwata Yehoba wana abalogugui elana .
40018005	Ge henala alau elana wawaya etegana ololana ya ni yoga pahe , iya i yoga paheyau .
40018006	Ebo pat pupulowanina ta gimwan gamagal mwamwalinaa ge ta alipalo limwana ni unun , he lahi o nige i bwabwata hot . Yaa Yehoba lahi bwabwatana hot ni pek gamagal elana , henala ebo tokekeisi etegana toto i abulilem elau ni pagegi ge ni sogu , tokekeisi ololana wawaya ya .
40018007	Eeu , panayawi geb ! Panayawi i nak kaiwena bugul bolo gamagalau hi pagegel hi gewi . Tunahot bugul ya nihi masamasal , yaa henala toto ali topapamasal , he ana lahi ni bwata .
40018008	Ebo nimwam etega o ebo aem etega ni pagegewa , nu gotomwa yoho . I waisi te ebo nimwam etega o ebo aem etega nige ni gagan ge yawal hot nu pwawa , bahi nimwam labui ge aem labui nihi aalitukagiwa ginaha mihomihotina elana .
40018009	Ebo matam etega ni pagegewa , nu bwana yoho . I waisi te ebo matam maisena ge yawal hot nu pwawa , bahi matam labui nihi aalitukagiwa Gehena elana .
40018010	Nuku matahikagimiu bahi wawayau tokekeisi ya etegana nuku teteli lowan . Kaiwena na baewa eliyamiu , wali aneloseyau sauga gegewena hi miminaa Nam labulabumwa manininaa .
40018011	Nau Gamagal Natuna ya nem totatayaomal na pwamwalil .
40018012	Ga ku nuwatu ola ? Ebo gamagal etega wana sipi elulu bwagabwaga ( 100 ) ge etegana ni tatayaomal , ga ni ginol ola ? Nasi ali toto naenti naen ni eguluwagil nihi miminaa oyaa , yaka iya ni na sipi toto i yaomal ni loyaan .
40018013	Ya ba tunahot eliyamiu , sauga ebo ni pwawa , wana yaliyaya ni bwata hot sipi maisena ya kaiwena , wana yaliyaya nige ni bwabwata hot ali toto naenti naen kaiweliya bolo nige hi yayaomal .
40018014	He i ola al , Tamamiu labulabumwa nige wana nuwatu i oola tage tokekeisi ya etegana ni yaomal .
40018015	Ebo talim pagan nanakina ni ginol elam , u nok u na elana ge ami toto labui ya , wana gegi nu pamasal elana . Ebo anam ni hago , he talim iyaka u ahe pasikal .
40018016	Yaa ebo anam nige ni hahago , yaka gamagal maisena o labui alomwau nuku nok , inoke ni ola Mosese wana logugui : gamagalau labui o eton nihi ba , ‘ E , ha kite , ’ mulaa abwe woliwoli ta patunahot .
40018017	Ebo heliya analiya nige ni hahago , yaka nu pamasal toekelesiya elal . Ebo toekelesiya analiya nige ni hahago , inoke ana nuwatu nu ginol ni ola iya togegi o ebo takis ana toahi etega .
40018018	Ya ba tunahot eliyamiu , hauna toto nuku lopwali panayawiya nasi Yehoba ni lopwali labulabumwa , ge hauna toto nuku talamwan panayawiya nasi Yehoba ni talamwan labulabumwa .
40018019	Na baewa eliyamiu , ebo komiu ami toto labui wami nuwatu ni maisena ge nuku awanun bugul etega kaiwena , he Nam labulabumwa ni ginol ola kaiwemiu .
40018020	Kaiwena ebo labui o eton alau elana nuku migogo , he nau iyoho alomiu . ”
40018021	Yaka Pita i nem Yeisu elana ge i neli i ba , “ Babala , ebo taliu pagan nanakina ni ginol elau , wana gegi na nuwayoho paehila ? Age besena paseben ? ”
40018022	Anana Yeisu i lahe i ba , “ Bahi nu nunuwayoho paseben , yaa nu nuwayoho pagewigewi ge sauga gegewena .
40018023	He Yehoba wana abalogugui paganina i ola hiwe . Kin etega nuwana wana totuwalali ali vaga ni loyaan .
40018024	Sauga i telipuna vaga i loyaloya , tau etega hi pwatanim ana vaga ana bwata i ola kina ali gewi miliyon maisena .
40018025	Nige bosowaina ni pwamola , inoke wana tonowak i ba wana bugul gegewena ge iya alonau ge natunau nihi paliagil nihi tabwa tololoyowan , inoke mani ni ahe ge ana vaga ni lekeya .
40018026	Totuwalali i loepwakoku matanaa inoke i awanun nabinabi i ba , ‘ U palahikan ge u matamatan ga , inoke abwe gegewena na pwamola . ’
40018027	Wana tonowak i atilomwan-an inoke i sokal ge ana vaga i nuwayoho .
40018028	Sauga totuwalali o i tagil , wana pan totuwalali etega i pwawa , tau o ana vaga i gan eliyana ana bwata i ola kina ehila ya . I lib hikan mwamwalina elana ge i ba , ‘ Am vaga u pwamola eliyau . ’
40018029	Yaka wana pan totuwalali i loepwakoku ge i awanun nabinabi i ba , ‘ U palahikan ge u matamatan ga , inoke abwe na pwamola . ’
40018030	Yaa i towa , inoke i ba nihi teli tukan dela ana siga ebo ana vaga ni pwamola .
40018031	Totuwalali enuna al avaliya hi kite pagan nanakina i ginol alona elana . Nuwaliya i nak nabi , inoke hi nok hi na wali tonowak elana ge bugul gegewena hi wasaan .
40018032	Wali tonowak totuwalali o i yogaan ge i ba , ‘ Totuwalali sisigana owa . Am vaga gegewena eliyau iyaka ya nuwayoho , i ola wam awanun elau .
40018033	He binimala owa al alom nu atilomwan-an , ni ola nau ya atilomwan-agiwa . ’
40018034	Wana tonowak i huga inoke i patuna nihi teli tukan dela ni lahi ana siga ebo ana vaga ni pwamola . ”
40018035	Inoke Yeisu i ba , “ He Nam labulabumwa ni ginol ni ola al to eliyamiu , ebo talimiyau wali gegi nige nuku nunuwayoho atemiwa . ”
40019001	Sauga Yeisu baaba ya i baunan haba , inoke labi Galili i eguluwai i nok i na labi Yudiya toto wewel Yolidani labena leunati .
40019002	Boda bwabwatana hi toulil , inoke tokasiyebwa hi gewi i pwamolol labi o elana .
40019003	Palisi enuna hi nok elana tage nihi labose , inoke hi neli hi ba , “ Tab wala logugui i talam bosowaina tau lagona ni towani , ebo towa puna etega i nuwatu pwawa ? ”
40019004	Analiya i lahe i ba , “ Age Buki Bwabwalena elana nige ku vavasili te abatelipuna elana Toginol ‘ gamagalau i ginolil tau ge yova ’ ?
40019005	Ge i ba , ‘ Heiya kaiwena tau tamana ge hinana ni miluwagil ni na alona ge lagona nihi mipamaisena , inoke ali toto labui nihi ola tuwan maisena . ’
40019006	Inoke heliya nige al hi oola eluwa , yaa heliya hi ola maisena . Yehoba iyaka i tubwel toyawel , he bahi gamagal etega ni teteli pwamwaumwau-agil . ”
40019007	Yaka Palisi hi neli hi ba , “ Owa u ba ola o , yaa hauna kaiwena Mosese wana logugui i ba tau towa ana pepa ni pek lagona elana , inoke abwe ni patuna ge ni egon ? ”
40019008	Analiya Yeisu i lahe i ba , “ Kaiwena atemiu i gasisi ge ami papaatena i esowal hot , inoke heiya te kaiwena Mosese i talam ge lagomiyau nuku towaagil . Yaa abatelipuna elana nige ana logugui i oola to .
40019009	Na ba eliyamiu , ebo tau etega bwagana lagona nige i gaganawal ni towani , ge yova getoga ni alolonan , iya i ganawal . ”
40019010	Yaka wana tohago hi baek elana hi ba , “ Ebo tau ge yova wali alolon ana logugui ni ola o , he i waisi te bahi ta aalolon . ”
40019011	Yeisu i baek elal i ba , “ Nuwatu ya nige gamagalau gegewel kaiweliya i oola , iyai ya te bolo Yehoba i pek eliyalil .
40019012	Gamagalau enuna nige bosowailiya nihi alolon kaiwena hi abil ali gila i gan . Enuna nige bosowailiya nihi alolon gamagalau wali nuwatu kaiwena ge ginol enuna hi ginol eliyalil . Ge enuna nige hi aalolon kaiwena hi pwabwabwalena-agil Yehoba wana abalogugui kaiwena . Henala ebo bosowaina logugui ya ni ahe , inoke ni ahe . ”
40019013	Gamagalau enuna wawayau hi pwatanim Yeisu elana , tage nimana ni teli pwataliyaa ge ni awanun kaiweliya , yaa wana tohago gamagalau hi haveyanagil .
40019014	Yaka Yeisu i ba , “ Wawayau ku talamwagil nihi nem eliyau , bahi nuku lolopwalil , kaiwena Yehoba wana abalogugui i minaa ololana o eliyalil . ”
40019015	Inoke nimana i teli tuwaliyaa ge i awanun kaiweliya , yaka abwe panuwa o i eguluwan .
40019016	Tau etega i nem Yeisu elana i neli i ola , “ Topankite , hauna ginol waiwaisana na ginol ge yawal mihomihotina na pwawa ? ”
40019017	Anana Yeisu i lahe i ba , “ Hauna kaiwena waisi bana ge u nel eliyau ? Maisena ya te iya towaisi hot . Ebo nuwam yawalim nu pwawa , Yehoba wana logugui nu henapuagil . ”
40019018	Yaka tau i nel i ba , “ Hauna logugui bolo ? ” Yeisu i ba , “ Bahi taulol , bahi ganawal , bahi kaoma , bahi woliwoli kakawi ,
40019019	tamwam ge hinam nu awatauwagil , ge alom nu nunuwana-an ni ola totom u nunuwana-agiwa . ”
40019020	Yaka tau i baek elana i ba , “ Bolo ya gegewel iyaka ya paolaolaek . Hauna toto al ya kalaan ? ”
40019021	Anana Yeisu i lahe i ba , “ Ebo nuwam nu ola towaisi hot , nu na wam gogomwau nu paliagil , manina nu pek togulagula elal , inoke abwe nu gogomwau labulabumwa . Inoke nu nem nu toulilau . ”
40019022	Sauga tau o baaba ya i hago , inoke i egon alona ge wana nuwanak , kaiwena iya togogomwau .
40019023	Inoke Yeisu i baek wana tohago elal i ba , “ Ya ba tunahot eliyamiu , togogomwau wali ulutuk i pulowan Yehoba wana abalogugui elana .
40019024	Na baewa al eliyamiu , i pulowan te bwasumu toto kamel ni ulusola evaneya golinaa , i ola al i pulowan hot tologogomwau wali ulutuk Yehoba wana abalogugui elana . ”
40019025	Sauga tohago baaba ya hi hago , ateliya i you nabi inoke hi neli hi ba , “ Ebo i ola o , he henala ge bosowaina ni mwal ? ”
40019026	Yeisu matana i lihikan elal ge i ba , “ Bugul ya gamagalau nige bosowailiya , yaa Yehoba bugul gegewena i bosowaina . ”
40019027	Yaka Pita i baek elana i ba , “ Yaa ga i ola ama ? Wama bugul gegewena iyaka ha eguluwagil , inoke ha nem ha touliliwa . Nasi hauna gun abwe ni gan kaiwema ? ”
40019028	Yeisu i baek elal i ba , “ Ya ba tunahot eliyamiu , sauga Gamagal Natuna ni tabwa kin panayawi vavaluna elana ge abamina wawasana elana ni minaa , inoke komiu o tototoulil ami toto elulutega eluwa tologugui wali abamina nuku ahe ge Isileli ali un elulutega eluwa nuku logugui-agil .
40019029	Ge henala ebo wana limi , ebo talinau , ebo nunau , ebo tamana , ebo hinana , ebo natunau , o ebo wana bilibili ni tataluwagil alau kaiwena , ni ahe pwabwaya al pwatanaa , ge yawalina mihomihotina ni pwawa .
40019030	Yaa bolo sauga ya hi mihouwa , hi gewi abwe nihi mimula , ge bolo sauga ya hi mimula hi gewi abwe nihi mihouwa . ”
40020001	Yehoba wana abalogugui i ola hiwe . Tau etega mweluluga kekeisi i tagil gamagalau enuna ni patalamwil ge nihi tuwalali wana oine ana eyowa elana .
40020002	I baek elal i ba , “ Lan ya na pwamolamiu silba maisena ni olaolaek lan maisena molana . ” Heliya hi ba , “ I waisi , ” inoke i patunal nihi tuwalali wana oine ana eyowa elana .
40020003	Yaka naen kilok elana i tagil al , gamagalau enuna i kitel hi taltalmilil abamaket elana , hi mimibwagabwaga ya .
40020004	Inoke i baek elal i ba , “ Komiu al ge , nuku na nuku tuwalali no oine ana eyowa elana , inoke molamiu na pewa bubun , nige na giginol panak eliyamiu . ”
40020005	Inoke hi nok . Alalati bwagatau ge tili kilok elana i tagil ge i ginol i ola al .
40020006	Kelaubwa paib kilok yaka i tagil al ge gamagalau enuna i pwawal hi taltalmilil . Inoke i nelil i ba , “ Hauna kaiwena ku taltalmilil e , lan bwabwaligena ku mibwabwage ? ”
40020007	Anana hi lahe hi ba , “ Kaiwena nige gamagal etega i aahema tuwalali kaiwena . ” Yaka i baek elal , “ Komiu al ge nuku na nuku tuwalali no oine ana eyowa elana . ”
40020008	Iyaka i kokoyavi hot , inoke toneyowa i baek totuwalali ali tomatahikan elana i ba , “ Totuwalali u yogaagil ge molaliya nu pek , nu telipunaa bolo ya ahel mulaa elal ge nu pwamowasiya bolo ya ahel houwan elal . ”
40020009	Bolo hi tuwalali telipuna paib kilok kokoyavi hi nem ge molaliya hi ahe ana bwata i ola lan bwabwaligena molana , tomaha silba maisena maisena ona .
40020010	Inoke sauga bolo i ahel houwan hi nem , hi nuwatu tage nasi molaliya nihi ahe pwabwaya , yaa heliya al ge , gegewel hi ahe silba maisena maisena ona .
40020011	Sauga molaliya hi ahe , toneyowa hi lovehawol-an ,
40020012	hi ba , “ Gamagalau ya bolo u ahel mulaa hi tuwalali sauga kakaubwaina , ama sabwelu kalakalasina elana ha loaliga lan bwabwaligena , yaa u pwamolama i olaolaek ya heliya . ”
40020013	Analiya i lahe i baek avaliya etega elana i ba , “ Heliyam , nige ya giginol panak eliyam . Ewasi u talam lan bwabwaligena nu tuwalali molam silba maisena , age ?
40020014	Molam u ahe ge u egon . Nuwau tau toto ya ahe mulaa molana na pek elana ni ola ya pewa elam .
40020015	Age nige bosowaiu totou no mani na ahe ge na ginol ni ola hauna ya nuwatuan ? Nau gamagalau ya muloluagil , he ga i ola ge u lomwaketa eliyau ? ”
40020016	Inoke Yeisu i ba , “ He i ola to , bolo sauga ya hi mimula abwe nihi mihouwa , ge bolo sauga ya hi mihouwa abwe nihi mimula . ”
40020017	Sauga Yeisu i nanawa Yelusalema kaiwena , wana tohago elulutega eluwa i ahel inoke heliya ya abwe i baaba elal , i ola ,
40020018	“ Iyaka ta nanawa Yelusalema kaiwena , inoke Gamagal Natuna abwe nihi talamwan topowon bwabwatal ge Logugui ana topankite nimaliyaa . Iya nihi logugui-an ni yaomal
40020019	ge nihi teli bolo nige Yudiya i oola nimaliyaa . Inoke heliya nihi lamwa tunatuna-an , nihi nibinibihan ge nihi lokolosan . Lan etonina elana abwe ni lutem yaomala . ”
40020020	Sebedi lagona i nem Yeisu elana , alonau natunau bolau labui , Yemesa ge Diyon , inoke i loepwakoku Yeisu matanaa ge i awanun elana .
40020021	Yeisu i baek elana i ba , “ Hauna nuwam ? ” Yaka i ba , “ Nu bateli eliyau , sauga ebo wam abalogugui nu ahe , natuwau labui ya , etegana ni misiyowa labem awomwa ge etegana ni misiyowa gegebamwa . ”
40020022	Yeisu i baek elal i ba , “ Nige ku aatena te hauna gun ku awanuni . Bosowaimiu ya lomwan ana kom toto abwe na imwa nuku imwa ? ” Anana hi lahe hi ba , “ Ibwe , bosowaima ya . ”
40020023	Yaka i baek elal i ba , “ Tunahot , abwe nuku imwa no kom elana , yaa nige bosowaiu na ba henala ni misiyowa labeu awowa o ebo henala ni misiyowa gegebawa . Abamina bolo ya Nam i lovivina-an bolo i hilel ya te kaiweliya . ”
40020024	Sauga tohago ali toto elulutega wasa ya hi hago , yaka ateliya i elolol Yemesa ge Diyon kaiweliya .
40020025	Yaka tohago Yeisu i yoga gogonil hi nok elana ge i ba , “ Ku atena , bolo Yehoba nige hi aabulilek-an , wali tologuguiyau hi logugui-agil ge wali tohouwa wali logugui hi pagasisi avaliyau elal .
40020026	Yaa komiu bahi nuku oola . Henala ebo nuwana alana ni bwata gamwamiwa , ni tabwa wami totuwalali .
40020027	Ge henala ebo nuwana ni ola tohouwa , ni tabwa wami elopapatuna .
40020028	He i ola nau Gamagal Natuna nige tage ya nem nuku tuwalali eliyau , yaa ya nem na totuwalali eliyamiu , ge yawaliu na talamwan gamagalau nihi gewi na pwamola pasikalil . ”
40020029	Sauga Yeisu alonau wana tohago Yeliko hi eguluwai , yaka boda bwabwatana hi tatauliulil Yeisu enaa .
40020030	Tomatakai labui hi misiyowa kamwasa bebenaa , ge sauga hi hago Yeisu i nopalegel , inoke hi yoga hi ba , “ Babala , Deibid Tubuna , u atilomwan-agima . ”
40020031	Boda hi ba lalaagil ge hi baek elal tage nihi mikekei , yaa heliya abwe hi yoga balbalgig hi ba , “ Babala , Deibid Tubuna , u atilomwan-agima . ”
40020032	Yeisu i notalmilil , yaka i yogaagil ge i nelil i ba , “ Hauna gun nuwamiu na ginol kaiwemiu ? ”
40020033	Anana hi lahe hi ba , “ Babala , nuwama matama nu panana . ”
40020034	Yeisu i atilomwan-agil ge mataliya i pihikan , yaka sauga o elana mataliya hi panana inoke hi toulil .
40021001	Yeisu ge wana tohago Yelusalema hi nopakelakelaubwa hi vin Betepage Oya Olibe awanina elana , inoke wana tohago eluwa i patunal nihi houwa .
40021002	I baek elal i ba , “ Nuku nok nuku na awan toto maninilaa , donki etega alona ge natuna iyahe tei nuku pwawal hi am hikagil . Nuku lekel inoke nuku pwatanim eliyau .
40021003	Ebo gamagal etega ni nelimiu , nuku baek elana nuku ba , ‘ Babala nuwana , ’ inoke nasi ni talamwagil ya . ”
40021004	Bugul ya i gan inoke palopita wana baaba i tabwa tunahot toto i ba :
40021005	Saiyoni gamagaliliyau Ku kite , wami kin i nenem eliyamiu . Iya wana pagan i meimei , he i heya donki natuna elana .
40021006	Tohago hi nok ge hi ginol i ola Yeisu wana baaba eliyalil .
40021007	Donki alona ge natuna hi ahel hi pwatanim , yaka ali kaliko hi yao pwataliyaa inoke Yeisu i yawaha ge i misiyo .
40021008	Boda bwabwatana ali kaliko hi vatal kamwasaa ge enuna al hi na vegavega ginebi lamwana hi govel ge hi yao kamwasaa .
40021009	Inoke boda bolo hi nohouwa Yeisu awonaa ge bolo hi nawaa enaa hi yoga hi ba : Hosana ! Deibid Tubuna ta tobalan ! Yehoba ni ba muloluan , Hosana ! Yehoba ta tobalan !
40021010	Sauga Yeisu i ulutuk Yelusalema , gamagalau gegewel ateliya i waiwai yaka hi nel hi ba , “ Henala o ? ”
40021011	Boda analiya hi lahe hi ba , “ Palopita Yeisu te , i neem Nasaleta , Galili awanina . ”
40021012	Yeisu i ulutuk Limi Bwabwalena elana inoke bolo hi lolopalipali ge bolo hi lolopwapwamola i takel . Mani ana tololopatal wali teibol ge bolo bunibuni hi palipali wali abamisiyo i yoho pwapwati .
40021013	I baek elal i ba , “ Buki Bwabwalena elana Yehoba wana baaba hi lelelian i ba , ‘ No limi alana nuku tun tapwalolo limena , ’ yaa komiu ku ginol i ola tokaoma wali abamina . ”
40021014	Limi Bwabwalena elana tomatakai ge bolo aeliya nanakina hi nem elana inoke i pwamolol .
40021015	Yaa topowon bwabwatal ge Logugui ana topankite ginol yawiyawi Yeisu i ginolil hi kite , ge i ola al wawayau hi kitel hi yogayoga Limi Bwabwalena elana hi ba , “ Hosana ! Deibid Tubuna ta tobalan , ” inoke ateliya i elolol .
40021016	Yaka hi baek Yeisu elana hi ba , “ Tab u hago wawayau ga hi babaa ola o ? ” Yeisu analiya i lahe i ba , “ Ibwe . Yaa ga i ola komiu ? Age buki nige ku vavasili toto i ba , ‘ Wawayau iyaka u paatenal inoke wawayau memelol am tobal nihi baunan ’ ? ”
40021017	Inoke Yeisu i eguluwagil i na i tagil Yelusalema i eguluwan , yaka i nok i na Bedani ge i kenuek to .
40021018	Lan i gan mweluluga kekeisi , Yeisu i sikal i nanawa Yelusalema kaiwena , inoke i galebu .
40021019	Yudiya wali poga puna etega i kite kamwasa bebenaa , yaka i nok i na elana nuwana enowana enuna ni kibwa ni an , yaa nige etega i pwapwawa , lamwana awawana ya . Inoke i baek ebwakil elana i ba , “ Nige sauga etega al nu eenon . ” He yaka lamwana i yakiwa .
40021020	Sauga tohago hi kite inoke nuwaliya hi ahe . Yaka hi nel , “ Ga i ola ge poga etimwawa lamwana i yakiwa ? ”
40021021	Yeisu analiya i lahe i ba , “ Ya ba tunahot eliyamiu , ebo nuku abulilek ge nige nuku nunuwa lalabui , bosowaimiu ya te nuku ginol ni ola hauna ya ginol poga ya elana . He nige bugul ya maisena i oola , nasi bosowaimiu ya nuku baek oya ya elana nuku ba , ‘ U egon u na totom u aliyohiwa hogaa , ’ inoke ni ginol ola .
40021022	Ebo nuku abulilek , hauna gun nuku awanuni Yehoba elana inoke nuku pwawa ” .
40021023	Yeisu i ulutuk Limi Bwabwalena ana gana gamwanaa ge i panpankiti , inoke topowon bwabwatal ge panuwa ana tonowakau hi nem elana ge hi neli hi ba , “ Hauna logugui wana gasisi elana ge bugul bolo ya u awaawaginol ? Henala wam gasisi i pewa ? ”
40021024	Yeisu analiya i lahe i ba , “ Nau al ge nel etega na neli ga eliyamiu . Ebo nuku lahe , inoke abwe na baunan eliyamiu henala wana logugui elana ge bugul bolo ya ya awaawaginol .
40021025	Diyon Tobabitaiso gamagalau i pababitaisol . Logugui o ga i neem ? Yehoba elana , o ebo gamagalau elal ? ” Yaka hi peliwaliwan-agil hi ba , “ Ebo ta ba , ‘ Logugui o i neem Yehoba elana , ’ inoke nasi ni ba , ‘ He hauna kaiwena ge Diyon nige ku aabulilek-an ? ’
40021026	Yaa ebo ta ba , ‘ Logugui o i neem gamagalau elal , ’ he boda ta lovakunagil , kaiwena hi abulilek te Diyon iya palopita . ”
40021027	Inoke Yeisu anana hi lahe hi ba , “ Nige ha aatena . ” Yaka i ba , “ Ebo nigeya , he nau al ge nige na babaunan te henala wana logugui elana ge bugul bolo ya ya awaawaginol . ”
40021028	“ He ga ku nuwatu ola ? Tau etega natunau labui , inoke i nok gamaun elana ge i ba , ‘ Natu , lan ebe u na ga u tuwalali eyowaa . ’
40021029	Tamana anana i lahe i ba , ‘ Nige nuwau , ’ yaa mulaa abwe wana nuwatu i pil ge i nok .
40021030	Tamaliya i nok natuna labuina elana ge i ba al , ‘ Natu , lan ebe u na ga u tuwalali eyowaa . ’ Tamana anana i lahe i ba , ‘ Nam , i waisi , abwe na nok , ’ yaa nige i nonok .
40021031	Ali toto labui ya , henala tamaliya wana nuwatu i paolaolaek ? ” Hi ba , “ Toto gamaun . ” Inoke Yeisu i baek elal i ba , “ Ya ba tunahot eliyamiu , gamagalau nanakil ololal takis ana toahi ge yowau bolo togaganawal , heliya iyaka hi nanawa Yehoba wana abalogugui kaiwena , yaa komiu hiwe ku minamina ee .
40021032	Kaiwena Diyon Tobabitaiso i nem eliyamiu pagan waiwaisana ana kamwasa i pankitemiu , yaka nige ku aabulilek-an , yaa takis ana toahi ge yowau bolo togaganawal hi abulilek-an . Ge bwagana iyaka ku kitel hi ola o , yaa komiu wami nuwatu nige ku pipil tage Diyon wana papaatena nuku abulilek-an . ”
40021033	Yeisu i ba , “ Ba gohalibe etega al na baunan nuku hago . Gamagal etega wana eyowa i ginol , oine i luwan , i gana painan , gol etega i ken oine enona ana abapotipoti suina kaiwena , ge gonu etega i tal eyowa ana tomatahikan wali abaminamina . I ginol haba , inoke abwe i pek gamagalau enuna elal ge nihi patuwalali , yaka iya i egon i na panuwa getoga .
40021034	“ Sauga oine enona i matuwa , inoke toneyowa wana totuwalali i patunal tomatahikan elal , tage oine enona nihi wali , enuna tomatahikan nihi ahe , enuna toneyowa ni ahe .
40021035	Tomatahikan totuwalali hi libil ; etegana hi nibinibihan , etegana hi tagapaaliga ge etegana hi loipati .
40021036	Toneyowa wana totuwalali enuna al i patunal , abwe kekeisi hi gewi al , inoke tomatahikan pagapaganina maisena ya hi ginol al eliyalil .
40021037	Mowamowasena , natuna i patuna eliyalil i ba , ‘ Natu nasi nihi awatauwan . ’
40021038	“ Yaa sauga tomatahikan toneyowa natuna hi kite , yaka hi pebaaba-agil hi ba , ‘ Toneyowa natuna te , toto abwe eyowa ni ahe tamana wana yaomal enaa . Ku nem ta tagapaaliga , inoke eyowa ta ahe ni minem eliyala . ’
40021039	Inoke hi lib ge hi alitagil-an oine ana eyowa tolinaa , yaka hi tagapaaliga . ”
40021040	Yaka Yeisu i nel i ba , “ Sauga ebo toneyowa ni sikalim , nasi ga ni ginol ola tomatahikan elal ? ”
40021041	Topowon bwabwatal ge Palisi hi ba , “ Gamagalau nanakil ya nasi ni tagapaaligal , inoke wana eyowa ni pek tomatahikan getogal elal , tomatahikan waiwaisal bolo sauga oine enona ni matuwa , nihiwali bubun ge enona toto toneyowa kaiwena nihi pek eliyana . ”
40021042	Inoke Yeisu i baek elal i ba , “ Age Buki Bwabwalena ana baaba nige ku vavasili , toto i ba , ‘ Pat toto totaltal hi awa nanakan ge hi towani , Yehoba iyaka i ahe limi ana kokola gasigasisena i ginoliya . Toto ya Babala wana ginol , ana kite abanuwa ahi . ’
40021043	“ Inoke na baewa eliyamiu , Yehoba wana abalogugui ni ahek yoho komiu Yudiya eliyamiu , ge ni pek gamagalau elal bolo yawaliliya enowana waiwaisana toto abalogugui o bosowaina .
40021044	Henala ni soguwa pat ya elana ni tal mwamwaol , ge ebo pat ya ni soguwa gamagal etega pwatanaa , nasi ni tagamukumuku-an . ”
40021045	Sauga topowon bwabwatal ge Palisi ba gohalibe bolo Yeisu i baunagil hi hago , hi atena i baaba kaiweliya .
40021046	Inoke kamwasa hi loya Yeisu nihi lib ge nihi yowan , yaa boda hi lovakunagil , kaiwena gamagalau Yeisu hi abulilek-an te iya palopita .
40022001	Yeisu i ba gohalibe al gamagalau elal i ba ,
40022002	“ Yehoba wana abalogugui i ola hiwe . Kin etega hagali i ginol natuna melutauina wana alolon kaiwena .
40022003	Wana totuwalali i patunal hi na gamagalau bolo i awanunil elal wali wasa hi pek nihi nem hagali elana , yaa gamagalau o hi towa .
40022004	“ Inoke wana totuwalali enuna al i patunal i ba , ‘ Bolo ya awanunil hagali kaiwena wali wasa nuku pek aanan iyaka ya lovivina-an . Nuku ba : Bulumakau momomonel iyaka ha punel ge bugul gegewena iyaka ha lovivina-agil . Ku nem ya hagali elana . ’
40022005	“ Yaa heliya nige yayaluwaliya i nonoek , inoke etegana i na wana eyowaa , etegana i na wana sitowaa ,
40022006	ge enuna totuwalali hi libil , hi nibihil ge hi tagapaaligal .
40022007	Kin i huga nabi , inoke wana tolohaveyan i patunal hi na totaulol hi tagapaaligal ge wali panuwa hi ton yoho .
40022008	“ Inoke i ba wana totuwalali elal , ‘ Alolon ana hagali iyaka ya lovivina-an , yaa bolo ya awanunil hi sigasiga ge nige hi nenem .
40022009	Ku na kamwasa lala elana . Ebo henalau nuku pwawal , nuku ba nihi nem hagali elana . ’
40022010	Inoke totuwalali hi nok hi na kamwasa elal ge gamagalau gegewel bolo hi pwawal , waiwaisal ge nanakil , hi ahel hi pwatanim , yaka hagali limena i kalaopop .
40022011	“ Sauga kin i ulutuk hagali limena elana ge gamagalau i kitel , yaka tau etega i kite pwawa alolon hagalena kalikona * nige i gagaloi .
40022012	I neli i ba , ‘ Heliyam , ga i ola u nem u tuk ge nige alolon hagalena kalikona u gagaloi ? ’ Yaa tau o nige kin anana i lalahe .
40022013	Inoke kin i baek wana totuwalali elal i ba , ‘ Nimana ge aena ku gimwan ge nuku alitagil-an gogouwa , ni kahikahin ge ninina ni alavekilal . ’ ”
40022014	Inoke Yeisu i ba , “ Hi gewi Yehoba i yogaagil , yaa ehila ya te i hilel . ”
40022015	Inoke Palisi Yeisu hi eguluwai hi na hi nuwatu loyaloya ga nihi ginol ola ge Yeisu nihi paona ge wana baaba eliyana ana woliwoli nihi ginol .
40022016	Inoke wali gamagalau enuna hi patunal hi na Yeisu elana , avaliyau ge gamagalau enuna bolo nunuwaliya Helodi wana logugui . Hi baek elana hi ba , “ Topankite , ha atena owa tobaaba tunahot ge wam panpankiti Yehoba kaiwena i sapu hot . Nige gamagal etega u lolovakun-an , kaiwena nige u gogoluek gamagalau wali siba ana miha elana .
40022017	Inoke nu ba naha hago . Mosese i ba mani naha pek Yehoba elana . He wam nuwatu ga i ola ? I waisi ya takis naha pwamola Sisa elana o age bahiwa ? ”
40022018	Yeisu wali nuwatu nanakina iyaka i atena , inoke i baek elal i ba , “ Tokakakawi hot komiu ! Hauna kaiwena ku laboseyau tage nuku paonau ?
40022019	Mani etega ku pankiteyau , toto tage takis ku pwapwamolaya . ” Yaka mani silba etega hi ahe hi pek elana i kite ,
40022020	inoke i nelil i ba , “ Henala kakanununa ya ? Ge henala alana hi leli mani ya tuwanaa ? ”
40022021	Anana hi lahe hi ba , “ Sisa . ” Inoke Yeisu i baek elal i ba , “ Toto Sisa kaiwena nuku pek Sisa elana , ge toto Yehoba kaiwena nuku pek Yehoba elana . ”
40022022	Wana baaba ya hi hago inoke nuwaliya hi ahe , yaka Yeisu hi eguluwai ge hi egon .
40022023	Lan toto o elana , Sadiusi hi nem Yeisu elana . He Sadiusi nige wali abulilek i oola tage toyaomal nihi lut , inoke Yeisu hi neli hi ba ,
40022024	“ Topankite , Mosese i ba ebo tau etega ni alolon , nige natunau ge ni aliga , inoke abuabulina talina ni alolonan ge ebo natuliyau ni gan , heliya nihi tabwa tau toto i alaliga natunau .
40022025	Sauga etega tau etega alonau talinau , ali toto seben . Gamaun i alolon , nige natunau , yaka i aliga , inoke abuabulina talina i alolonan .
40022026	Pagan o maisena i gan al loena elana , i ola al etonina , ge i ola al ana siga gegewel hi pwawa .
40022027	Inoke mowamowasena , abwe yova al i aliga .
40022028	Ebo tunahot toyaomal abwe nihi lut , he lut enaa ali toto seben gamwaliyaa henala ge yova o lagona hot ? Kaiwena gegewel hi alolonan ga . ”
40022029	Yeisu analiya i lahe i ba , “ Komiu ku gegi hot , kaiwena Buki Bwabwalena ana baaba ge Yehoba wana gasisi nige ku aatena .
40022030	Sauga ebo toyaomal nihi lut , nihi ola aneloseyau labulabumwa , nige nihi aalolon .
40022031	Yaa toyaomal wali lut bana , age Buki Bwabwalena nige ku vavasili ge nuku atena hauna gun Yehoba i baunan eliyamiu ?
40022032	I ba , ‘ Sauga ya nau Abalahama , Aisake ge Yakobo wali Yabowaine . ’ Yehoba i ba ola o , inoke ta atena gamagalau ya yawaliliya nige i yayaomal hot . Yehoba iya nige toaliga hot wali Yabowaine i oola , yaa bolo yawaliliya gaganina wali Yabowaine . ”
40022033	Yeisu wana baaba ya boda hi hago , inoke nuwaliya hi ahe wana panpankiti kaiwena .
40022034	Palisi hi hago Yeisu Sadiusi iyaka i ba pamikekei-agil inoke Palisi hi nogogo .
40022035	Yaka avaliya etegana , Logugui ana toatena , Yeisu i labose ge i neli i ba ,
40022036	“ Topankite , hauna logugui i bwata Mosese wana Logugui elana ? ”
40022037	Anana Yeisu i lahe i ba , “ ‘ Yehoba wam Yabowaine nu nunuwana-an ginebi ge atem bwalibwaligena , yawalim bwalibwaligena ge wam nuwatu bwalibwaligena . ’
40022038	Logugui ya iya logugui bwabwatana ge logugui houwan .
40022039	Ge logugui labuina i ola al to , i ba , ‘ Alom nu nunuwana-an ni ola totom u nunuwana-agiwa . ’
40022040	Mosese wana Logugui gegewena ge palopitau wali panpankiti , puliya i talmilila logugui labui ya elal . ”
40022041	He Palisi iyoho Yeisu hi mimipainan , inoke i nelil i ba ,
40022042	“ Ga ku nuwatu ola Mesaiya kaiwena ? Henala tubuna iya ? ” Yaka hi ba , “ Iya Deibid tubuna . ”
40022043	Inoke Yeisu i nelil al i ba , “ He ga i ola ge Deibid i baaba Yayaluwa Bwabwalena wana nuwatu elana ge Mesaiya i awa babala-an ? Kaiwena Deibid i ba ,
40022044	‘ Yehoba i baek no Babala elana i ba : U misiyowa labeu awowa ana siga am topihigelgel
40022045	He Deibid Mesaiya i awa babala-an , inoke ga i ola ge tage iya Deibid tubuna ? ”
40022046	Nige etega bosowailiya Yeisu anana nihi lahe , inoke nige sauga etega al bosowailiya nihi labose ge nel etega nihi neli Yeisu elana .
40023001	Inoke Yeisu i baek boda elal ge wana tohago elal i ba ,
40023002	“ Logugui ana topankite ge Palisi heliya Mosese wana Logugui ana toatena ge ana totalisi .
40023003	Inoke analiya nuku hago ge wali baaba gegewena nuku toulil , yaa bahi nuku giginol ni oola hauna hi giginol , kaiwena toto hi papaatena-an , nige hi giginol i oola .
40023004	Wali logugui i gewi inoke ami kalikalivai pupulowanina hi pewa , yaa heliya nige bugul etega hi giginol tage pulowan etega nihi kalivai .
40023005	Bugul gegewena bolo hi ginol , he hi ginolil kaiwena nuwaliya gamagalau nihi kitel ge nihi atena tage heliya towaisi . Nabwa bolo Buki Bwabwalena puna ona hi lokeya ge hi am hikan lamwaliyaa , nabwa bolo ya hi ginol pwabwaya . I ola al , kula toto ali kaliko buhuna ana kula hi payapu .
40023006	Hagali elana nuwaliya nihi misiyowa yau toto gamagalau bwabwatal wali yau elana , ge limi tapwalolo elana nuwaliya nihi misiyo houwa gamagalau maniniliyaa .
40023007	Ebo gamagalau nihi pwawal abamaket elana , nuwaliya te gamagalau ginebi ge wali awatauwan nihi pata ateu owa eliyalil ge nihi awa babala-agil .
40023008	Bahi alomiyau nihi aawa babala-agimiu , kaiwena wami Babala maisena ya ge gegewemiu ku awa talitalin ya .
40023009	Bahi panayawi gamagalina etega nuku aawa tamani , kaiwena Tamamiu maisena ya , iya iyoho labulabumwa .
40023010	Bahi gamagalau nihi aawa tohouwa-agimiu , kaiwena wami tohouwa maisena , iya Mesaiya .
40023011	Henala ebo alana i bwata gamwamiwa , iya ni tabwa wami totuwalali .
40023012	Henala ebo totona ni teli heyan , Yehoba ni teli lowan , ge henala totona ni teli lowan , Yehoba ni teli heyan .
40023013	Eeu , Logugui ana topankite ge Palisi geb ! Tokakakawi komiu , bwaliga nuku nak ! Yehoba wana abalogugui ana nog ku kausa gamagalau maniniliyaa . He komiu nige ku uulutuk , ge bolo nuwaliya nihi ulutuk wali kamwasa ku kaus .
40023014	Eeu , Logugui ana topankite ge Palisi geb ! Tokakakawi komiu , bwaliga nuku nak ! Abuabulau wali limi ge wali gogomwau ku aahe ku lologugui-an bwabwage , ge i ola al wami awanun ku papayapu-an gamagalau tanaliyaa tage nihi hagomiu . Wami pagan o kaiwena , inoke nasi ami lahi ni bwata hot . *
40023015	Eeu , Logugui ana topankite ge Palisi geb ! Tokakakawi komiu , bwaliga nuku nak ! Kamwasa gegewena ku labose haba inoke gamagal etega nuwana nuku gove , nuku ahe ge ni toulilimiu . Komiu Gehena ana gamagalau , yaa sauga gamagal ya ku ahe , ku paatena inoke i tabwa Gehena ana gamagal hot .
40023016	Eeu geb ! Komiu tonul nanakil matamiu i kai , bwaliga nuku nak ! Komiu ku ba , ‘ Ebo gamagal etega ni papasila Limi Bwabwalena elana , i bosowaina ya wana bateli ni leke yoho ; yaa ebo gamagal etega ni papasila Limi Bwabwalena ana gold elana , he nige bosowaina wana bateli ni leke yoho . ’
40023017	Komiu tosigasiga matamiu i kai . Hauna toto i bwata , gold i bwata o ebo Limi Bwabwalena i bwata ? He Limi Bwabwalena ana bwabwalena kaiwena inoke gold i bwabwalena .
40023018	Komiu ku ba al , ‘ Ebo gamagal etega ni papasila pat elal bolo hi vatal abapowon , i bosowaina ya wana bateli ni leke yoho ; yaa ebo gamagal etega ni papasila bwasumu toto hi popowonan elana , he nige bosowaina wana bateli ni leke yoho . ’
40023019	Tomatakai komiu ! Hauna toto i bwata , bwasumu i bwata o ebo abapowon i bwata ? He abapowon ana bwabwalena kaiwena inoke bwasumu i bwabwalena .
40023020	Inoke sauga ebo gamagal etega ni papasila abapowon elana , i papasila abapowon elana ginebi ge bwasumu toto hi popowonan .
40023021	I ola al , sauga ebo gamagal etega ni papasila Limi Bwabwalena elana , i papasila Limi Bwabwalena elana ge Yehoba toto i miminaa o elana .
40023022	Ge sauga ebo gamagal etega ni papasila labulabum elana , i papasila Yehoba wana abamina wawasana elana ge iya elana .
40023023	Eeu , Logugui ana topankite ge Palisi geb ! Tokakakawi komiu , bwaliga nuku nak . Awenuwa ololana kusai , boboyuwa ge kemanana ku wali paelulutega ge awahinena maisena ku pek Yehoba elana wami mulolu , i ola ana logugui . Logugui o ku toulil nabiyan , yaa Yehoba wana logugui ana nuwatu bwabwatal ku nuluwagil nige ku giginol , logugui ololal wala ginol ni sapu , avalau ta atilomwan-agil ge ta baaba tunahot . Binimala logugui bolo ya nuku henapuan ge awenuwa ali logugui nuku henapuan al .
40023024	Komiu tonul nanakil matamiu i kai ! Logugui bolo ali nuwatu nige i bwabwata ku toulil bubun , yaa logugui bwabwatal ku nuluwagil . Komiu uluulu ku ahek yoho ami wewel elana , yaa kamel bwabwaligena nige ku kikite inoke ku tinon alona wewel .
40023025	Eeu , Logugui ana topankite ge Palisi geb ! Tokakakawi komiu , bwaliga nuku nak ! Komiu ku ola gamagalau kom ge mwaha eputeteliya hi ul , yaa gamwaliya nige hi uul . Tola ku abubun , yaa kaoma ge naknak paganina i kalaopop atemiwa .
40023026	Komiu Palisi matamiu i kai ! Houwan kom ge mwaha gamwaliya nuku ul bubun inoke noleleya abwe ni yanayana .
40023027	Eeu , Logugui ana topankite ge Palisi geb ! Tokakakawi komiu , bwaliga nuku nak ! Komiu ku ola salai toto hi abubun ge hi paisela . Noleleya ana awa i waisi , yaa gamwanaa tomati tutuwana ge bweyanina i kalaopop .
40023028	He i ola al , noleleya gamagalau hi kitemiu tage komiu ku waisi , yaa lokalokakawi ge nak paganina i kalaopop atemiwa .
40023029	Eeu , Logugui ana topankite ge Palisi geb ! Tokakakawi komiu , bwaliga nuku nak ! Palopitau ali salai ku ginol ge tonowakau houhouwel bolo wali pagan i sapu salailiya ku paisela .
40023030	Yaka ku ba tage binimala komiu iyoho tubumiyau houhouwel wali sauga elana , nige nuku giginol ni ola heliya hi ginol , palopitau nige nuku lolopaaligal .
40023031	Ku ba ola o , he iyaka ku pamasalimiu age komiu totaulol tubuliyau , bolo palopitau hi lolopaaligal .
40023032	He ku ginol pwataniwa ya ! Inoke pagan toto tubumiyau hi telipuna-an nuku pwamowasi !
40023033	Komiu ku ola mwata ! Mwata natunau komiu ! Nige bosowaina nuku mwal , he komiu iyaka Gehena .
40023034	Inoke na baewa eliyamiu , palopitau ge tosiba bwabwatal ge topankite ya papatunal eliyamiu . Enuna nuku lolil , enuna nuku lokolosil , enuna nuku nibinibihagil wami limi tapwalolo gamwanaa , ge enuna nuku takel pwatapwatagil nihi nok panuwa tomaha ge tomaha elal .
40023035	Inoke taulol gegewena ana lahi komiu nuku pwawa , taulol toto gamagalau wali pagan sasapona hi lolil , i telipunaa Eibol hi lol ana siga Sakalaiya , Balakaiya natuna , komiu Yudiya ku lol Limi Bwabwalena ge abapowon ali hawawala .
40023036	Ya ba tunahot eliyamiu , taulol bolo gegewena o lahena nihi paheya komiu heyan ya eliyamiu .
40023037	Eeu geb Yelusalema ana tomina ! Komiu palopitau ku lolil ge bolo Yehoba i patunal eliyamiu ku loipatagil . Sauga i gewi nuwau wami gamagalau na bugul papahel , ni ola kamkam meluyovana natunau i bugul papahel opena gabulanaa , yaa nige nuwamiu i oola .
40023038	He inoke wami Limi Bwabwalena Yehoba ni galaluwai ge ni enonovan .
40023039	Na baewa eliyamiu , nige al nuku kikiteyau ana siga na sikalim al , inoke sauga o nuku tobalagau nuku ba , ‘ Yehoba ni ba muloluan , iya i nem Babala alana elana ! ’ ”
40024001	Sauga Yeisu i ulutagilem Limi Bwabwalena elana nuwana ni egon , inoke wana tohago hi nem elana hi ba , “ Matam i nok , Limi Bwabwalena ana awaawaginol u kite . ”
40024002	Yeisu analiya i lahe i ba , “ Limi ya gegewena iyoho ku kikite . Ya ba tunahot eliyamiu , pat bolo hi ahe limi ya hi ginoliya , nige etega ni miminaa abanaa , gegewena abwe nihi pasamwalekaleka . ”
40024003	Yeisu i na i ha Oya Olibe elana i misiyo , inoke wana tohago ya awawal hi nem elana hi ba , “ Wama wasa ga u pem , hauna sauga ge abwe bugul toto bana u babaunan ni masal ? Ge wam nem ge sauga mowamowasena ana etotohi ga ni ola ? ”
40024004	Yeisu analiya i lahe i ba , “ Nuku matahikagimiu , bahi gamagal etega ni papagegemiu .
40024005	Kaiwena gamagalau nihi gewi abwe alau elana nihi nem ge nihi ba , ‘ Nau Mesaiya ! ’ inoke gamagalau nihi gewi nihi pagegel .
40024006	Elohaveyan butuna nuku hagowa labemiwa ge haveyan wasana nuku hagoek laha , yaa bahi atemiu ni bwanabwana . Bugul ololana o ni gan ga , yaa sauga mowamowasena nige ga ni nenem .
40024007	Boda ge boda nihi lohaveyan , i ola al abalogugui ge abalogugui nihi lohaveyan . Galebu bwabwatana ge mwaniknik nihi masal labi tomaha ge tomaha elal .
40024008	Nak bolo ya nihi masal houwa ga , ni ola ab lomwanina i telipuna ga mulaa abwe wawaya i masal .
40024009	Inoke nihi libimiu , nihi telemiu abalahi elana ge nihi tagapaaligamiu . Nau kaiweu inoke gamagalau gegewel nihi pihigelgel-agimiu .
40024010	Sauga o elana , gamagalau nihi gewi tapwalolo ana abulilek ana en nihi pek , avaliyau nihi wasaagil tologugui elal ge nihi pihigelgel-agil .
40024011	Palopitau kakakawel nihi gewi nihi masal inoke gamagalau nihi gewi nihi pagegel .
40024012	Pagan nanakina ni bwatabwata ya , inoke gamagalau wali nunuwana avaliyau elal ni kekeisi ,
40024013	yaa henala ebo ni talmilil gagasisi ana siga abapwamowasi elana mwal ni pwawa .
40024014	Yehoba wana abalogugui wasana waiwaisana nihi papaatena-an panayawi mamanana elana ge gamagalau labena gegewena elana nihi atena , inoke abwe sauga mowamowasena ni vin .
40024015	‘ Toapapanak bwaibwaikikinina ’ toto Daniyela i babaunan abwe nuku kite ni talmilila Limi Bwabwalena elana — he komiu bolo buki ya ana tovavasili nuwamiu ni sapu baaba ya kaiwena .
40024016	Inoke sauga o bolo hi miminaa Yudiya elana nihi lou nihi na nihi ha oyaa .
40024017	Ebo gamagal etega iyoho i minamina wana limi pwatanaa toto hi tal paabwab , bahi ni lalau ge ni uulutuk wana limiya bugul etega ni aahe , ni lou ya .
40024018	Ebo gamagal etega iyoho i tuwatuwalali eyowaa , bahi ni sisikal panuwaa ge ana kaliko etegana ni aahe .
40024019	Sauga o elana nasi ni pulowan hot yowau toliyan ge topapaalahul elal . Eeu , hauna nak geb o !
40024020	He nuku awanun Yehoba elana inoke bahi tultul ana sauga elana o ebo Sabwataa ge nuku lolou .
40024021	Kaiwena sauga o elana miloloyowan bwabwatana hot ni masal , ololana o nige sauga etega i mamasal panayawi ana abatelipuna elana ana siga sauga ya . I ola al nige ni gagan sauga mulaa .
40024022	Binimala Yehoba nak o ana sauga nige ni papakaubwa , he nige gamagal etega ni mwamwal . Yaa gamagalau bolo iyaka i hilel kaiweliya te sauga ana yapu abwe ni pakaubwa .
40024023	Sauga o elana ebo gamagal etega ni baewa eliyamiu ni ba , ‘ Ku kite , Keliso iya hiwe , ’ o ebo etegana al ni ba , ‘ Iya huwo , ’ bahi nuku aabulilek-an .
40024024	Kaiwena keliso kakakawel ge palopitau kakakawel abwe nihi masal ge ginol yawiyawi nihi ginolil gamagalau wali abanuwa ahi , nuwaliya Yehoba wana hilihili gamagaliliyau nihi pagegel , yaa nige bosowailiya .
40024025	He wami wasa ya pewa pahuwala te .
40024026	Ebo gamagal etega ni baewa eliyamiu ni ba , ‘ Iya iyoho to uleya o , ’ bahi nuku nonok , o ebo etegana ni ba , ‘ Iya hiwe limi gamwanaa e , ’ bahi nuku aabulilek-an .
40024027	Kaiwena Gamagal Natuna wana nem ni ola pinamal , i pinamalek nati ge mwananalina i na i vin pai .
40024028	Ebo bweyan ga i minaa , etimwawa te okok nihi na ge nihi tagul pwehik .
40024029	Miloloyowan o ana abapwamowasi elana , sabwelu ni gogou , waikena nige al ni yayana , putum nihi soguem labulabumwa , ge togasisi bolo hawawala nihi lamwalamwaniu .
40024030	Sauga o elana Gamagal Natuna wana nem ana etotohi ni masal labulabumwa . Tomipanayawi gegewel nihi kahin , ge Gamagal Natuna nihi kite i nenem yaluyalu pwatanaa , ginebi wana gasisi ge wana wasawasa .
40024031	Bwagigi anana bwabwatana nihi yu inoke wana aneloseyau ni patunal nihi na panayawi bebena esopali ge wana hilihili gamagaliliyau nihi bugul gogonil , nihi telipunaa panayawi buhuna etega nihi na nihi pwamowasiya buhuna etega .
40024032	Abaatena nuku aheya poga elana . Sauga ebo ta kite lamwana i titin , inoke ta atena waiwai ana sauga iyaka i kelaubwa . *
40024033	I ola al , sauga ebo nuku kite bugul gegewena bolo ya liwanagil nihi masal , nuku atena Gamagal Natuna wana sauga nem iyaka i kelaubwa hot .
40024034	Ya ba tunahot eliyamiu , heyan bolo ya nige nihi aaliga haba , inoke bugul gegewena bolo ya nihi masal .
40024035	Labulabum ge panayawi nihi mowasi , yaa nau no baaba nige ni momowasi .
40024036	Nige gamagal etega i aatena hauna lan o ebo hauna sauga . He bwagana aneloseyau labulabumwa , nige hi aatena , ge nau al Natuna nige ya aatena , Nam ya te i atena .
40024037	I ola valila Nowa wana sauga eliyana , he nasi ni ola al Gamagal Natuna wana nem ana sauga eliyana .
40024038	Sauga toto nigeya ga nub i haha , gamagalau hi aanan , hi loloimwim ge hi loloalalolon , hi olaola o ana siga Nowa i na i ulutuk waga gamwanaa .
40024039	Nige etega i nuwanuwatu hauna abwe ni gan , ana siga nub i ha , gegewel hi unun ge hi aliga . He nasi ni ola al to Gamagal Natuna wana nem eliyana .
40024040	Sauga o , bolau labui nihi tuwatuwalali eyowaa , etegana nihi ahe egonan , etegana ni mina .
40024041	Yowau labui nihi tuwalali witi enona nihi wowowol aliya kaiwena , etegana nihi ahe egonan , etegana ni mina .
40024042	Inoke nuku matahikagimiu , kaiwena nige ku aatena hauna lan ge wami Babala ni nem .
40024043	Nuku nuwahikan te : binimala ebo tonlimi ni atena hauna sauga bulina ge tokaoma ni nem , inoke ni silawa ge ni lopwali bahi tokaoma wana limi ni leleke ge ni tutuk .
40024044	Nuku lovivina-agimiu , kaiwena Gamagal Natuna wana nem atemiu ni payou , sauga toto nige nuku aatena te ni vin .
40024045	Nuku ola totuwalali henahenapona ge wana nuwatu i sapu , inoke wana babala i teli totuwalali gegewel ni matahikagil ge aliya ni pek aanan ana sauga hot elana .
40024046	Ebo wana babala ni sikalim ge ni kite tuwalali ya i awaawaginol , he nasi ni waisi eliyana .
40024047	Ya ba tunahot eliyamiu , wana babala ni teli wana bugul gegewena ni matahikagil .
40024048	Yaa ga i ola ebo totuwalali o ni sigasiga ge ni nuwatu atenaa ni ba , ‘ No tonowak nasi nige etimwawa ni sisikalim , ’
40024049	inoke ni telipuna wana pan totuwalali ni nibinibihil ge alonau toimwim nihi anan ge nihi imwim .
40024050	He wana babala abwe ni sikalim ge atena ni payou , kaiwena wana sikal ana lan ge ana sauga nige i aatena .
40024051	Totuwalali ya ni tagapanapanak-an , ge ni teli tosigasiga ge tokakakawi ali abalahi elana , ni kahikahin ge ninina ni alavekilal . ”
40025001	Inoke Yeisu i baek elal i ba , “ Sauga o Yehoba wana abalogugui ni ola hiwe . Galokau ali gewi elulutega wali odam hi ahe , hi tagil hi na hi matamatan tokawakawalolu melutauina ni sikalem yova wana limiya , inoke alona ge yova nihi ahel nihi en tukagil .
40025002	Ali toto nimala panuna sisigal ge ali toto nimala panuna henahenapol .
40025003	Bolo sisigal wali odam hi ahe , yaa odam ana wewel enuna al nige hi aahe .
40025004	Bolo henahenapol odam ana wewel enuna hi holek patuna elal inoke hi noahe ginebi ge wali odam .
40025005	Tau wana nem i esowal , yaka galokau gegewel mataliya i kenukenu nabi ge hi kenu .
40025006	Bulin nuwana gamagal etega i nem i yoga i ba , ‘ Tokawakawalolu melutauina i nenem . Ku nok ku na ku kite . ’
40025007	Yaka galokau gegewel hi lut ge wali odam hi abubun .
40025008	Bolo sisigal hi baek bolo henahenapol elal hi ba , ‘ Wewel enuna ku pem , wama odam iyaka i bobolu . ’
40025009	Analiya hi lahe hi ba , ‘ Nigeya . Nige bosowaila komiu ge ama . Ku nok ku na ga sitowaa ge wami odam ana wewel enuna nuku pwamola . ’
40025010	Yaa sauga hi nanawa wewel pwapwamola kaiwena , yaka tokawakawalolu melutauina i vin . Galokau bolo hi lovivina avaliya hi ulutuk alolon ana hagali elana , inoke nog hi kaus .
40025011	Mulaa abwe galokau sisigal hi nem ge hi ba , ‘ Babala , babala , nog u pwela naha ulutuk . ’
40025012	Yaa analiya i lahe i ba , ‘ Ya ba tunahot eliyamiu , nige ya aatenamiu . ’ ”
40025013	Inoke Yeisu i ba , “ Nuku matahikagimiu , kaiwena nige ku aatena hauna lan o ebo hauna sauga wami Babala ni nem . ”
40025014	Inoke Yeisu i baek elal i ba , “ Sauga o Yehoba wana abalogugui ni ola hiwe . Tau etega nuwana ni egon ni na labi getoga , yaka wana totuwalali i yogaagil ge wana bugul gegewena i pek elal nihi matahikan .
40025015	Silba ana gewi tausan nimala panuna i pek totuwalali etegana elana , tausan eluwa i pek eluwana elana ge tausan maisena i pek etonina elana . I golugoluwa maisena ge maisena wana aatena ana bwata elana , inoke i pek i ola . I pek eliyalil inoke i egon i na labi getoga .
40025016	Tau toto silba ana gewi tausan nimala panuna i ahe , etimwawa i na i patuwalali inoke tausan nimala panuna al i pwawa .
40025017	Ge tau toto tausan eluwa i ahe , i na i ginol ola al inoke tausan eluwa al i pwawa .
40025018	Yaa tau toto tausan maisena i ahe i nok i na bilibili i ken ge wana tonowak wana mani i yamwi .
40025019	Sauga i yapu abwe wali tonowak i sikalim , inoke wana totuwalali i yogaagil , nuwana ni atena wana mani ga hi patuwalali ola .
40025020	Tau toto silba ana gewi tausan nimala panuna i ahe , i nem i pek wana tonowak elana , ginebi ge tausan nimala panuna al . Inoke i ba , ‘ Babala , tausan nimala panuna valila u pem . U kite , tausan nimala panuna al ya pwawa . ’
40025021	Wana tonowak i baek elana i ba , ‘ Owa totuwalali waiwaisana ge henahenapona . U ginol bubun . Bugul bolo nige hi gegewi u matahikagil bubunil , inoke na telewa bugul nihi gewi nu matahikagil . U nem alou owa ta yaliyaya pamaisena . ’
40025022	Tau toto tausan eluwa i ahe , i nem al ge i ba , ‘ Babala , tausan eluwa valila u pem . U kite , tausan eluwa al ya pwawa . ’
40025023	Wana tonowak i baek elana i ba , ‘ Owa totuwalali waiwaisana ge henahenapona . U ginol bubun . Bugul bolo nige hi gegewi u matahikagil bubunil , inoke na telewa bugul nihi gewi nu matahikagil . U nem alou owa ta yaliyaya pamaisena . ’
40025024	Tau toto tausan maisena i ahe , i nem elana ge i ba , ‘ Babala , ya atena owa wam logugui i gasisi , kaiwena aanan toto nige u pepel , he u keken ge u papahe wam limiya . He gamagalau getogal hi tuwalali enona i mamasal , inoke owa u bubugulan .
40025025	Inoke ya lovakunagiwa , ya na bilibili ya ken ge wam mani ya yamwi . U kite , wam mani te ya pasikal elam e . ’
40025026	Inoke wana tonowak i baek elana i ba , ‘ Owa totuwalali nanakina ge totuwalali pweyapweyatana . U atena ya te aanan toto nige ya pepel ya keken ge ya papahe no limiya . Ge u atena gamagalau getogal hi tuwalali enona i mamasal , inoke nau ya bubugulan .
40025027	He binimala no mani nu na nu teli benki elana nihi patuwalali , inoke sauga na sikalim ge na ahe pasikal , ginebi ge ana etulan , toto hi patuwalali ana enona .
40025028	Mani ku ahek elana ge ku pek tau toto wana mani ana bwata tausan elulutega elana .
40025029	Kaiwena henala i gan eliyana , abwe Yehoba ni pek pwabwaya al inoke ni malul . Yaa henala nige i gagan eliyana , bwagana toto kekeisi i minaa eliyana , Yehoba abwe ni ahe yoho .
40025030	Totuwalali nanakina ya nuku alitagil-an tola gogou elana , inoke ni kahikahin ge ninina ni alavekilal . ’
40025031	Sauga Gamagal Natuna ni nem alonau aneloseyau gegewel ge iya ni tabwa kin , inoke ni misiyowa wana abamina wawasana elana ge ni logugui .
40025032	Tomipanayawi gegewel nihi migogo matanaa inoke ni asel ni telel boda labui elana , ni ola sipi ana tomatahikan sipi ge goti i asel ge i teli pwamwaumwau-agil .
40025033	Sipi ni telel labena awonaa ge goti ni telel gegebanaa .
40025034	Yaka kin ni baek bolo hi minek labena awonaa elal ni ba , ‘ Komiu bolo Nam i muloluagimiu , ku nem ku ulutuk abalogugui elana , toto Yehoba i lovivina-an kaiwemiu sauga panayawi i ginol .
40025035	Kaiwena ya galebu inoke aanan ku pem ya an , ya walem inoke wewel ku pem ya im , ya mibwabwali inoke ku yoga paheyau ,
40025036	ya bokaboka inoke kaliko ku pem ya galoi , ya kasiyebwa inoke ku matahikagau , ya miminaa dela inoke ku nem ku kiteyau . ’
40025037	Tosasapol anana nihi lahe nihi ba , ‘ Babala , hauna sauga ha kitewa u galebu ge aanan ha pewa u an , o ebo u walem ge wewel ha pewa u im ?
40025038	Hauna sauga ha kitewa u mibwabwali ge ha yoga pahewa , o ebo u bokaboka ge kaliko ha pewa u galoi ?
40025039	Hauna sauga ha kitewa u kasiyebwa o ebo u miminaa dela ge ha nowa ha kitewa ? ’
40025040	Inoke kin analiya ni lahe ni ba , ‘ Ya ba tunahot eliyamiu , hauna gun ebo ku ginola taliwau ya kekeisisi etega elana , he i ola ku ginola eliyau . ’
40025041	Yaka ni baek bolo hi miminaa gegebanaa elal ni ba , ‘ Komiu bolo ami lahi Yehoba iyaka i baunan , ku egonik ku na ginaha mihomihotina elana , toto Yehoba i lovivina-an Seitani alonau ge wana aneloseyau kaiweliya .
40025042	Kaiwena ya galebu nige aanan ku pepem , ya walem nige wewel ku pepem ,
40025043	ya mibwabwali nige ku yoyoga paheyau , ya bokaboka nige kaliko ku pepem , ya kasiyebwa ge ya miminaa dela nige ku mamatahikagau . ’
40025044	Heliya al anana nihi lahe nihi ba , ‘ Babala , hauna sauga ha kitewa u galebu o ebo u walem , u mibwabwali o ebo u bokaboka , u kasiyebwa o ebo u miminaa dela , ge nige ha lalabewa ? ’
40025045	Analiya ni lahe ni ba , ‘ Ya ba tunahot eliyamiu , hauna gun ebo nige ku giginola bolo ya kekeisisi etega elana , he i ola nige ku giginola eliyau . ’
40025046	Inoke nihi na lahi mihomihotina elana , yaa tosasapol nihi na yawal mihomihotina elana . ”
40026001	Sauga Yeisu baaba ya gegewena i baunan haba inoke i baek wana tohago elal i ba ,
40026002	“ Ku atena ya te lan labui ya i mina abwe Nopalegi Hagalena ana sauga , inoke Gamagal Natuna nihi lib ge nihi talamwan nihi lokolosan . ”
40026003	Sauga o topowon bwabwatal ge Yudiya wali tohouwa hi nogogo topowon bwabwatal wali tohouwa , alana Kaiyapa wana limiya ,
40026004	inoke hi nuwatu loyaloya ga nihi ola ge Yeisu nihi lib sume ge nihi lopaaliga .
40026005	Hi ba , “ Bahi ta giginola hagali ana sauga elana , eba abwe boda ta pahugal ge nihi lohaveyan . ”
40026006	Yeisu iyoho Bedani Saimon tolepelo wana limiya ,
40026007	inoke yova etega i nem elana patuna ana awa waiwaisana i noahe , gamwanaa , enonu bwalena waiwaisana ge molana bwabwatana . Inoke sauga Yeisu i misiyo ge i anan , enonu i holek Yeisu kokowanaa .
40026008	Tohago hi kite inoke ateliya i elolol ge hi ba , “ Hauna kaiwena enonu ya i apapanak-an bwabwage ?
40026009	Binimala ta palian yaka mani bwabwatana ta ahe ge ta pek togulagula elal . ”
40026010	Yeisu wali baaba i atena inoke i baek elal i ba , “ Hauna kaiwena ge yova ya ku anagebigebi-an ? Ginol waiwaisana hot te i ginol eliyau e .
40026011	Togulagula alomiyau ya sauga gegewena , yaa nau nige sauga gegewena alomiu i oola .
40026012	Sauga kekeisi abwe na aliga . Yova ya enonu bwalena waiwaisana i holek tuwawa , inoke i ola tuwau iyaka i abubun haba o teliteli kaiwena .
40026013	Ya ba tunahot eliyamiu , panayawi mamanana elana , hauna labi elana ebo wasa waiwaisana ya nihi papaatena-an , bugul toto yova ya i ginol nihi liwanan , iya ana abanuwahikan . ”
40026014	Inoke tohago ali toto elulutega eluwa etegana alana Yudasa Isikaliyota , i nok i na topowon bwabwatal elal
40026015	ge i ba , “ Hauna gun nuku pem ebo Yeisu na wasaan eliyamiu ge nuku lib ? ” Inoke mani silba ana gewi teti hi vasili ge abwe nihi pek elana .
40026016	Sauga o Yudasa i telipuna Yeisu wana nawanawa i gagayawa-an , kamwasa i loya ge Yeisu ni teli nimaliyaa ge nihi lib .
40026017	Pwalawa toto nige alona yis hi vivikuhiya hagalena ana lan telipuna elana , tohago hi nem Yeisu elana ge hi neli hi ba , “ Hauna labena elana nuwam aanan naha lovivina-an kaiwem , inoke ta anan ni ola Nopalegi Hagalena ana logugui ? ”
40026018	Yaka analiya i lahe i ba , “ Nuku nok nuku na Yelusalema , tau etega elana , ge nuku baek elana nuku ba , ‘ Topankite i ba : No sauga iyaka i kelaubwa . Alowau no tohago Nopalegi Hagalena enona naha ginola wam limiya . ’ ”
40026019	Inoke tohago hi ginol i ola Yeisu wana baaba elal ge aanan hi lovivina-an Nopalegi Hagalena kaiwena .
40026020	Sauga bulin i gan , Yeisu alonau wana tohago ali toto elulutega eluwa hi misiyo hi anan .
40026021	Hi aanan ee , yaka Yeisu i baek elal i ba , “ Ya ba tunahot eliyamiu , gamwamiwa etega nasi abwe ni wasaagau . ”
40026022	Ateliya i lomwan nabi inoke maisena ge maisena i nelnel Yeisu elana i ba , “ Babala , nau nige i oola age ? ”
40026023	Yeisu analiya i lahe i ba , “ Gamagal etega iya alou nimama i lau mwaha maisena gamwanaa , nasi abwe ni wasaagau .
40026024	Gamagal Natuna nau na aliga ni ola Buki Bwabwalena ana baaba , yaa gamagal toto ni wasaagau nuwau i nakan , kaiwena bwaliga ana lahi ni bwaya . Binimala valila tau o bahi hinana ni aab , inoke lahi bwabwatana nige ni pwapwawa . ”
40026025	Inoke Yudasa , toto abwe Yeisu ni wasaan , i ba , “ Topankite , nau nige i oola age ? ” Yaka Yeisu i baek elana i ba , “ Nigeya , he owa . ”
40026026	Sauga hi aanan , Yeisu beleid i ahe , i ba mulolu Yehoba elana yaka i pigebagebal-an i pek wana tohago elal ge i ba , “ Ku ahe ku an . Toto ya iya tuwau . ”
40026027	Inoke oine ana kom i ahe , i ba mulolu Yehoba elana inoke i pek elal ge i ba , “ Gegewemiu nuku im .
40026028	Toto ya saliyau , iya bateli vavaluna i patunahot . Saliyau ni lau inoke gamagalau nihi gewi wali gegi Yehoba ni yakil yoho .
40026029	Na baewa eliyamiu , oine toto ya nige al na iim , ana siga alowau komiu abwe oine vavaluna ta im Nam wana abalogugui elana . ”
40026030	Yaka wona etega hi wonaan ge hi tagil hi na Oya Olibe .
40026031	Yeisu i baek wana tohago elal i ba , “ Bulin ebe nasi abwe gegewemiu nuku lou luwagau , kaiwena Buki Bwabwalena i ba , ‘ Sipi ali tomatahikan na lol inoke sipi nihi tatawaliwali tomaha ge tomaha nihi nonoek . ’
40026032	Yaa no lut al enaa , na houwa na na Galili , yaka mulaa abwe nuku nem . ”
40026033	Inoke Pita Yeisu anana i lahe i ba , “ Bwagana ebo alowau gegewel nihi lou , yaa nau nige na lolou luwagiwa . ”
40026034	Yeisu i baek Pita elana i ba , “ Ya ba tunahot eliyam , bulin ebe kamkam melutauina nigeya ga ni kakahin , inoke nu alahagau paeton . ”
40026035	Yaa Pita i baek elana i ba , “ Nige na aalahagiwa , bwagana ebo alou owa ta yaomal . ” Yaka tohago gegewel hi baaba hi ola al Pita wana baaba .
40026036	Yeisu alonau ge wana tohago hi nok hi na labi toto alana Getesemani , inoke i baek elal i ba , “ Ku minaa te , na na ga na awanun huwo . ”
40026037	Pita ge Sebedi natunau labui i ahel alonau hi nok , inoke sauga o atena i lomwan nabi .
40026038	Yaka i baek elal i ba , “ Ateu i lomwan nabi , lomwan o kelaubwa ni paaligau . Ku miminaa te ge alowau komiu ta silawa . ”
40026039	I peliluwagil nige ana bwaga i gagan , inoke i talpo bilibiliya ge i awanun i ba , “ Nam , ebo bosowaina , inoke lomwan ana kom ya bahi ni nenem eliyau . Yaa bahi nau no nuwatu , owa ya wam nuwatu . ”
40026040	Inoke i sikal tohago eton elal ge i kitel hi kenukenu . I baek Pita elana i ba , “ Ga i ola ge nige bosowaimiu auwa maisena ya alowau komiu ta silawa ?
40026041	Nuku silawa ge nuku awanun , inoke bahi lawakik kaiwena ge nuku sosogu . Yayaluwamiu nuwana waisi ni ginol , yaa tuwamiu i pweyata . ”
40026042	I nok palabuina al i na i awanun i ba , “ Nam , ebo wam nuwatu i ola lomwan ana kom ya na im haba ge nige bosowaina nu ahe yoho , inoke ni ola ya wam nuwatu . ”
40026043	Sauga i sikal , i kitel al hi kenukenu , kaiwena mataliya i aliga nabi .
40026044	Inoke i tataluwagil , i nok al i na i awanun paetonina , wana baaba maisena ya .
40026045	Yaka i sikal al tohago elal ge i ba , “ Age komiu iyahe ya ku kenukenu ? Ku kite , sauga iyaka i vin ge Gamagal Natuna nihi talamwan gamagalau nanakil nimaliyaa .
40026046	Ku lut ta noewa elal . Tau toto i tatalamwagau sauga ya iyaka i vin ! ”
40026047	Sauga Yeisu iyoho ya i baaba inoke Yudasa i vin , iya Yeisu wana tohago bolo elulutega eluwa avaliya etega . Alonau ge boda bwabwatana , bolo topowon bwabwatal ge Yudiya wali tohouwa hi patunal . He elohaveyan kilepana ge ebwakil toguina hi noahe .
40026048	Yeisu ana towasa etotohi etega iyaka i baunanik haba boda elal i ba , “ Tau toto na nalo heiya te nuku lib ge nuku yowan . ”
40026049	Inoke sauga Yudasa i vin i nopasapu i na Yeisu elana i ba “ Ateu owa topankite , ” yaka i nalo .
40026050	Yeisu i baek elana i ba , “ Heliyam , bugul toto kaiwena ge u nem , u ginol . ” Inoke gamagalau hi noha Yeisu elana ge hi lib .
40026051	Bolo avaliya Yeisu , etegana wana elohaveyan kilepana i momol tagilanem abanaa , inoke topowon bwabwatal wali tohouwa wana totuwalali etega tanana i goyoho .
40026052	Yeisu i baek elana i ba , “ Wam elohaveyan kilepana u teli pasikal abanaa , kaiwena henala ebo kilepa elana ni lohaveyan , kilepa elana al nihi loliya .
40026053	Age nige ku aatena bosowaiu na yoga Nam elana labe kaiwena , inoke sauga o aneloseyau ali boda bwabwatana ni patunal nihi nem nihi lohaveyan kaiweu ?
40026054	Yaa ebo na ginol ola , nige bosowaina Buki Bwabwalena ana baaba ni tabwa tunahot , toto i ba tage ni masal ni ola te sauga e . ”
40026055	Sauga o Yeisu i baek boda elal i ba , “ Age nau toawatautau ge topihigelgel inoke haveyan kilepana ge ebwakil toguina ku noahe ge ku nem tage nuku libau ! Lan gegewena ya miminaa Limi Bwabwalena elana ya panpankiti inoke nige ku lilibau .
40026056	Bugul gegewena toto ya i masal inoke Buki Bwabwalena toto palopitau hi lelelian ni tabwa tunahot . ” Inoke sauga o wana tohago gegewel hi lou luwai .
40026057	Bolo Yeisu hi lib hi pwatanik Kaiyapa , topowon bwabwatal wali tohouwa , wana limiya , Logugui ana topankite ge Yudiya wali tohouwa hi nogogowa to .
40026058	Pita Yeisu i noulil ana bwaga i gan ana siga hi vin topowon bwabwatal wali tohouwa wana bakubakuwa . Pita i tuk bakubaku gamwanaa inoke alonau ge totuwalali hi misiyo , nuwana ni kite hauna nihi ginol Yeisu elana .
40026059	Topowon bwabwatal avaliyau ge Yudiya wali tologugui gegewel , Yeisu ana woliwoli kakawi hi loyaan ge bosowaina nihi ba ni aliga .
40026060	Yaa nige etegana hi pwapwawa , bwagana gamagalau hi gewi hi nem ge wali ba kakakawi hi baunan . Yaka mulaa abwe gamagalau labui hi nem
40026061	ge hi ba , “ Tau ya i ba , ‘ Nau bosowaiu Yehoba wana Limi Bwabwalena na pasamwalekaleka inoke lan eton gamwanaa na tal al . ’ ”
40026062	Yaka topowon bwabwatal wali tohouwa i lut ge i baek Yeisu elana i ba , “ Ga i ola ge nige analiya u lalahe ? Baaba toto hi baunan kaiwem , ana sapu ga i ola ? ”
40026063	Yaa Yeisu i mikekei . Inoke topowon bwabwatal wali tohouwa i baek elana i ba , “ Yabowaine yawalina gaganina alana elana nu baaba tunahot , ge wama wasa nu pem ebo owa Mesaiya Yehoba Natuna , o nigeya . ”
40026064	Anana Yeisu i lahe i ba , “ I ola te wam baaba ei . He na baewa eliyamiu , bwaliga abwe nau Gamagal Natuna nuku kiteyau na misiyowa Yehoba Togasisi labena awonaa ge na neem yaluyalu pwatanaa . ”
40026065	Yaka topowon bwabwatal wali tohouwa i huga , inoke totona ana kaliko i kukuleli ge i ba , “ Tau ya totona i ba heyan ge Yehoba alana i teli lowan . He besena to . Nige al ta loloya tage gamagalau nihi nem ge nihi baaba tau ya kaiwena . Iyaka ku hago i ba likalika .
40026066	Ga ku nuwatu ola ? ” Anana hi lahe hi ba , “ I bosowaina hot ni aliga . ”
40026067	Inoke maninina hi kuluve ge nimaliya elana hi nibinibihan . Enuna hi taganepanepal-an
40026068	ge hi ba , “ Age owa Mesaiya ? He u baem eliyama henala ge i nibihiwa . ”
40026069	Pita i misiyowa bakubakuwa , inoke topowon bwabwatal wali tohouwa wana totuwalali galokau avaliya etega i nem elana ge i ba , “ He owa al ge Yeisu gagama Galili alona etega . ”
40026070	Gamagalau gegewel mataliyaa inoke i alaha i ba , “ Nige ya aatena te hauna gun u babaunan ei . ”
40026071	Yaka i na i tagil abauluulutuk elana , inoke galok etega al Pita i kite ge i baek gamagalau bolo hi minamina o elal i ba , “ Tau ya iya Yeisu gagama Nasaleta alona etega . ”
40026072	Inoke Pita i alaha palabuina , i papasila ge i ba , “ Tau o nige ya aatena . ”
40026073	Sauga nige i yayapu , yaka gamagalau bolo hi taltalmilil o hi nem Pita elana hi ba , “ Tunahot owa Yeisu wana boda avaliya etega , kaiwena anam ana gun i pamasaliwa owa gagama Galili . ”
40026074	Inoke Pita i papasila i ba , “ Ya baaba tunahot , tau o nige ya aatena . Binimala nige na babaa tunahot , Yehoba ni laheyau . ” Sauga o kamkam melutauina i kahin ,
40026075	inoke Pita Yeisu wana baaba i nuwatuan toto i ba : “ Kamkam melutauina nige ga ni kakahin inoke nu alahagau paeton . ” Yaka i na i tagil tola ge i kahin nabi .
40027001	Mweluluga kekeisi topowon bwabwatal gegewel avaliyau ge Yudiya wali tohouwa Yeisu ana logugui hi ginol ge nihi lopaaliga .
40027002	Inoke hi yowan ge hi en hi na hi teli Pilato , Loma wali gavana nimanaa .
40027003	Yudasa , Yeisu ana towasa , sauga i kite Yudiya hi ba Yeisu ni aliga , i nuwaleyan inoke mani silba ana gewi teti i pasikal topowon bwabwatal ge tohouwa elal .
40027004	I ba , “ Ya gegi hot , kaiwena Yeisu nige wana nak i gagan inoke ya wasaan eliyamiu ge abwe nuku lopaaliga . ” Hi baek elana hi ba , “ Wama hauna ei ! Totom am pulowan tei . ”
40027005	Inoke Yudasa mani i yoho teli Limi Bwabwalena gamwanaa ge i egon i na i gadisowa .
40027006	Topowon bwabwatal mani hi ahe ge hi ba , “ Mani toto ya i saliya , inoke Logugui nige i tatalam ta ahe ge ta teli Limi Bwabwalena ana mani ana pwahin elana . ”
40027007	Yaka mani o ana logugui hi ginol ge hi ahe bilibili etega hi pwamolaa tomibwabwali ali salai . Hi pwamolaa gamagal etega elana iya ulun ana toabab .
40027008	Heiya te kaiwena ana siga lan ebe bilibili o alana hi tun Panasasaliya .
40027009	Yaka palopita Yelemaiya wana baaba i tabwa tunahot toto i ba , “ Mani toto Isileli gamagaliliyau hi talamwan ge tau o nihi pwamolaya , ana bwaya silba ana gewi teti , hi ahe
40027010	ge ulun ana toabab wana bilibili hi pwamolaya , i ola Yehoba wana baaba eliyau . ”
40027011	Yeisu i talmilil Pilato matanaa , iya Loma wali gavana , inoke i neli i ba , “ Owa Yudiya wali kin ? ” Yeisu i ba , “ He i ola te wam baaba ei . ”
40027012	Topowon bwabwatal ge Yudiya wali tohouwa Yeisu hi wole , yaa bwagana nige wana nak i gagan , nige etega analiya i lalahe .
40027013	Inoke Pilato i baek elana i ba , “ Tab u hago bugul ehila kaiwena ge hi wolewa ? ”
40027014	Yaa Yeisu nige kekeisi etega analiya i lalahe , inoke Pilato nuwana i ahe .
40027015	Baliman maisena ge maisena , Nopalegi Hagalena ana sauga elana , toulutuk dela toto ebo Yudiya nihi hile , Pilato ni sokal ge ni tagil .
40027016	He sauga o elana tau etega i miminaa dela , alana Balabas , iya wana pagan nanakina kaiwena inoke wasana i bwaya .
40027017	Inoke sauga boda hi nogogo , Pilato i nelil i ba , “ Henala nuwamiu na sokal kaiwemiu , Balabas o ebo Yeisu toto hi ba Mesaiya ? ” *
40027018	I ba ola o , kaiwena i atena bubun Yeisu hi lamwa pulowanan te hi ahe ge hi teli nimanaa .
40027019	Pilato iyoho abakot elana inoke lagona baaba i patuna eliyana i ba , “ Tau ei nige wana gegi , bahi bugul etega nu giginol elana . Bulin ya kenonou iya kaiwena ge ya lovakun nabi . ”
40027020	Yaa topowon bwabwatal ge Yudiya wali tohouwa boda ali pel hi teli ge nihi ba Pilato Balabas ni sokal ge Yeisu nihi lopaaliga .
40027021	Yaka Pilato gamagalau i nelil i ba , “ Ali toto eluwa ya , henala nuwamiu na sokal ? ” Hi ba , “ Balabas . ”
40027022	Inoke i nelil al i ba , “ Hauna gun na ginol Yeisu toto hi ba Mesaiya kaiwena ? ” Gegewel hi ba , “ U lokolosan ! ”
40027023	Yaka Pilato i nelil i ba , “ Hauna kaiwena ge na lokolosan ? Hauna nak i ginol ? ” Abwe hi yoga balbalgig hot hi ba , “ U lokolosan ! ”
40027024	Pilato i atena nige al bosowaina kamwasa etega ni ginol , ge boda kelaubwa haveyan nihi ginol . Inoke wewel i ahe nimana i ul yoho boda mataliyaa ge i ba , “ Tau ya wana yaomal bahi ana woliwoli etega ni nenem eliyau . Ana logugui i minewa eliyamiu . ”
40027025	Gamagalau gegewel hi ba , “ Wana yaomal ana woliwoli ni nem ama eliyama ge natumeyau elal . ”
40027026	Inoke Balabas i sokal kaiweliya , ge i ba tolohaveyan hihiu eloelolina hi ahe Yeisu hi nibinibihan , yaka i teli tolohaveyan nimaliyaa nihi lokolosan .
40027027	Pilato wana tolohaveyan Yeisu hi en pwatanik logugui ana limi bwabwatana gamwanaa , inoke hi ba tolohaveyan bwalibwaligel hi nogogo ge Yeisu hi mipainan .
40027028	Ana kaliko hi leke yoho inoke kaliko yayapona matana pepol i ola kin ali kaliko , hi ahe ge hi pagaloi .
40027029	Pepesala hi ahe hi ginol ana hanahana ge hi teli kokowanaa . Suki etega hi ahe hi teli nimana awonaa i ola kin wali pagan , inoke hi loepwakoku matanaa ge hi talatalawasi-an hi ba , “ Atema owa , Yudiya wali kin ! ”
40027030	Tuwana hi lokukuluvi-an ge suki hi ahe kokowana hi lololi .
40027031	Sauga hi talatalawasi-an i mowasi , inoke kaliko yayapona hi leke yoho ge totona ana kaliko hi pagaloi . Inoke hi en tagilan ge nihi na nihi lokolosan .
