40027032	Sauga Yeisu hi en hi nanawa lokolos kaiwena , tau etega hi pwawa gagama Sailini , alana Saimon , inoke hi palawakik ge Yeisu ana kolos ni kalivai .
40027033	Hi vin panuwa etega alana Goligota . ( Goligota ana sapu heiya “ Pana Babaloma ” )
40027034	Inoke oine alona ge valam etega amnana hohogana hi vikuhiya ge hi pek elana , yaa sauga i im bose , i towani nige nuwana ni im .
40027035	Sauga hi lokolosan i mowasi , inoke tolohaveyan ana kaliko hi wali , yaka pat hi ahe galavenu etega hi galavenu-an , inoke eliyana kaliko ana pwahin tomaha tomaha hi guyauan elal . †
40027036	Inoke hi misiyowa to ge hi matahikan .
40027037	Ana woliwoli hi lele inoke hi tagahikana kokowana pwatanaa , i ba , “ Yeisu , Yudiya wali Kin . ”
40027038	Tokaoma labui alonau hi lokolosil . Etegana ana kolos hi pamilila labena awonaa ge etegana labena gegebanaa .
40027039	Gamagalau bolo hi nonopapalegi-an mataliya i nok hi kite , yaka kaunuliya hi loniknikan ge hi lamwa tunatuna-an
40027040	hi ba , “ Valila u ba tage Limi Bwabwalena nu pasamwalekaleka ge lan eton gamwanaa nu tal al . He sauga ya totom u pwamwaliwa . Ebo owa Yehoba natuna , kolos u loluwan . ”
40027041	Topowon bwabwatal , avaliyau Logugui ana topankite ge Yudiya wali tohouwa , hi lamwa tunatuna-an i ola al to .
40027042	Hi ba , “ Gamagalau getogal i pwamwalil , yaa nige bosowaina totona ni pwamwal . Tage iya Isileli wali kin ! Totona kolos ni loluwan inoke naha abulilek-an .
40027043	Yehoba ana mel i teli . Ta kite ga sauga ya tab Yehoba nuwana ni pwamwal , kaiwena i ba , ‘ Nau Yehoba Natuna . ’ ”
40027044	Ge tokaoma bolo alonau hi lokolosil , heliya Yeisu hi sinalian al i ola to .
40027045	Alalati bwagatau , panuwa gegewena i gogou ana siga tili kilok .
40027046	Tili kilok ana labi elana , Yeisu analiya elana i yoga nabiyan i ba , “ Eloi , eloi , lama sabakitani ? ” Baaba o ana sapu heiya , “ No Yehoba , no Yehoba , hauna kaiwena ge u miluwagau ? ”
40027047	Gamagalau enuna bolo hi taltalmilila o , anana hi hago yaka hi ba , “ Ilaitiya i yogaan to . ” ‡
40027048	Sauga o gamagal etega i patalelu i na balou i ahe , i pahun oine manumanunina elana ge i vinum , inoke i teliek suki matanaa ge i paelu heyan Yeisu i im .
40027049	Yaka alonau hi ba , “ Ta matamatan ga ta kite tab Ilaitiya ni nem ge ni pwamwal . ”
40027050	Yeisu i yoga nabiyan al , inoke yawalina i talamwan i mowasi .
40027051	Kaliko mamanana toto hi pakuki ge Limi Bwabwalena gamwana hi baba tomwaya , sauga o i maleli telipunek natiya i na i lau paiya . Mwaniknik i masal inoke bilibili i lamwalamwaniu ge pat hi mamagebal .
40027052	Salai i mwapwela inoke Yehoba wana gamagalau bolo hi aliga houwa , hi gewi hi lutan .
40027053	Ali salai hi lut luwan , ge Yeisu wana lut al enaa hi na hi ulutuk Yelusalema ge gamagalau hi gewi eliyalil hi masala .
40027054	Tolohaveyan bolo hi miminaa o avaliya wali tohouwa Yeisu hi matahikan , mwaniknik amnana hi anbose ge bugul gegewena toto i gan hi kite , inoke hi lovakun nabi ge hi ba , “ Tunahot iya Yehoba Natuna ! ”
40027055	Yowau hi gewi hi talmililek laha ge mataliya i nok Yeisu hi gayawaan . Yowau bolo ya valila Yeisu hi toulil , avaliya hi neem Galili ge hi matahikan .
40027056	Gamwaliyaa , Meli Magidala yovana , valihina Meli toto Yemesa ge Yosepa hinaliya , ge etega al Sebedi natunau hinaliya .
40027057	Sauga panuwa i kokoyavi , towasawasa etega gagama Alimadiya , alana Yosepa , i nem , iya al Yeisu wana tohago etega .
40027058	I nok i na Pilato elana ge i awanun Yeisu tuwana ni ahe , inoke Pilato i ba nihi pek elana .
40027059	Yosepa Yeisu tuwana i ahe , kaliko vavaluna elana i osiya ,
40027060	ge i na i teli totona wana salai vavaluna gamwanaa , toto abwe i ken tukan pat elana . Inoke pat bwabwatana etega i pakul pwatanik ge salai awana i paankaus , yaka i eguluwai .
40027061	He Meli , Magidala yovana , alona ge valihina hi misiyowa to , awoliya i nok salaiya .
40027062	Sabwata ana lan lovivina i mowasi , lan i gan al , inoke topowon bwabwatal ge Palisi hi nok Pilato elana .
40027063	Yaka hi baek elana hi ba , “ Tonowak , ha nuwahikan tokakawi toto o , sauga nigeya ga i yayaomal i ba , ‘ Lan eton ni mowasi inoke abwe na lut al . ’
40027064	Inoke nu ba tolohaveyan nihi na salai nihi matahikan ana siga lan etonina ni mowasi . Ebo nige ta giginol ola o , tab wana tohago nihi nok nihi na tuwana nihi ahe ge nihi baek gamagalau elal nihi ba , ‘ Iyaka i lut al . ’ Inoke lokakawi toto ya nasi ni bwata hot , nige ni oola toto houhouwena . ”
40027065	Pilato i baek topowon bwabwatal ge Palisi elal i ba , “ I waisi , no tolohaveyan enuna nuku ahel nuku na nuku telel salai nihi matahikan . Nuku nok , ge bugul gegewena nuku ginol toto bosowaimiu nuku ginol ge salai ana matahikan ni waisi . ”
40027066	Inoke hi na hihiu etega hi papi hikan salai bebena elana ge pat elana wali abaeuna , yaka tolohaveyan hi telel salai hi matahikan .
40028001	Lan Sabwata i mowasi , yaka wik ana lan houwan elana mweluluga kekeisi hot , Meli Magidala yovana alona ge valihina hi na hi kenan salaiya .
40028002	Mwaniknik bwabwatana i masal . Yehoba wana anelose etega i loem labulabumwa i na salaiya , pat i pakul yoho ge i misiyowa pwatanaa .
40028003	Maninina i namanamal i ola pinamal ge ana kaliko i yanayana i ola apwapwali .
40028004	Tolohaveyan bolo salai hi matamatahikan hi lovakun nabi ge hi ginu , inoke hi sogu bilibiliya , nige hi lamwalamwaniu , hi ola toaliga .
40028005	Anelose i baek yowau elal i ba , “ Bahi lovakun ! Ya atena Yeisu toto hi lokolosan ku loyaan .
40028006	He nige i gagan te , iyaka i lut , i ola wana baaba . Ku nem abana ku kite , toto i kenukenuwa .
40028007	Yaka etimwawa ku nok ku na wana tohago wali wasa nuku pek nuku ba , ‘ Iyaka i lutem yaomala ge ni houwa awomiwa ni na Galili . Abwe nuku kiteya to . ’ He wami wasa iyaka ya pewa te . ”
40028008	Inoke yowau etimwawa salai hi tataluwai , hi lovakun , yaa yaliyaya ateliya i kalaopopwi , inoke hi patalelu hi na wana tohago wali wasa nihi pek .
40028009	Hi nanawa kamwasaa yaka Yeisu i pwawal ge i ba , “ Atewau komiu . ” Hi nem hi loepwakoku , aena hi pihikan ge hi kululu elana .
40028010	Inoke Yeisu i baek elal i ba , “ Bahi lovakun ! Ku na taliwau wali wasa ku pek nihi na Galili , abwe nihi kiteyauek to . ”
40028011	Yowau hi nanawa kamwasaa , inoke tolohaveyan enuna bolo salai ana tomatahikan hi sikal hi na Yelusalema , ge bugul gegewena toto i masal hi wasaan topowon bwabwatal elal .
40028012	Inoke topowon bwabwatal avaliyau ge Yudiya wali tohouwa hi nogogo ge wali logugui etega hi ginol , inoke mani bwabwatana hi pek tolohaveyan elal .
40028013	Yaka hi baek elal hi ba , “ Nuku ba gamagalau elal , ‘ Ha kenu mati bulina te wana tohago hi nem tuwana hi ahe . ’
40028014	Ebo wasa ya Pilato ni hago , ama abwe naha ba pasapu eliyana inoke nige nak etega nuku pwapwawa . ”
40028015	Inoke tolohaveyan mani hi ahe ge hi ginol i ola topowon bwabwatal wali baaba elal . He gamagalau Yudiya wasa hi palelu ana siga lan ebe , tage Yeisu wana tohago hi na tuwana hi ahe .
40028016	Tohago ali toto elulutega maisena hi na Galili , oya toto valila Yeisu i baunan eliyalil .
40028017	Sauga hi kite , hi kululu elana , yaa enuna hi nuwa lalabui .
40028018	Yeisu i pelinok eliyalil inoke i ba , “ Logugui ge gasisi gegewena labulabumwa ge panayawiya , iyaka Nam i pem elau .
40028019	He ku na gamagalau labi gegewena elal inoke nuku patohago-agil : nuku pababitaiso-agil Tamala alana elana , Natuna ge , Yayaluwa Bwabwalena ge ,
40028020	i ola al logugui gegewena toto ya baunan eliyamiu nuku pankitel ge nihi toulil . Tunahot nau alomiu sauga gegewena ana siga panayawi ana abapwamowasiya . ”
41001001	Yeisu Keliso Yehoba Natuna , wasana waiwaisana ana abatelipuna i ola to
41001002	palopita Aiseya i lelelian , Yehoba i ba : No elopapatuna na patuna houwa awomwa , iya wam kamwasa ni lovivina-an kaiwem .
41001003	Gamagal etega to i yogayoga uleya labi kekevana elana , i ba , “ Babala wana kamwasa ku lovivina-an wana kela ku pasapu . ”
41001004	Inoke Diyon i nem uleya gamagalau i papababitaisol ge i papaatena i ba , “ Wami pagan nanakina ana en nuku pek ge nuku babitaiso , inoke Yehoba wami gegi ni nuwayoho . ”
41001005	Gamagalau hi nem elana , hi neem Yudiya labena gegewena ge Yelusalema . Wali gegi hi wasaan inoke i pababitaisol wewel Yolidani elana .
41001006	Diyon ana kaliko heiya kaliko toto kamel pupunona elana hi ginoliya , ge henuwanina ana wasikewa bulumakau kunisina elana hi ginoliya . Aana heiya te sagagai * ge luvi toto uleya .
41001007	I papaatena i ba ola hiwe , “ Toto i nenem ewa , iya alana i bwaya , nau alau nige i bwabwaya . Nau nige no waisi i gagan tage bosowaiu na lokululu ge aena ana os ana hihiu na leke .
41001008	Nau ya pababitaisomiu wewel elana , yaa iya abwe ni pababitaisomiu Yayaluwa Bwabwalena elana . ”
41001009	Sauga o elana Yeisu i neem Nasaleta , labi Galili , inoke Diyon Yeisu i pababitaiso wewel Yolidani elana .
41001010	Yeisu i gaihem wewela , inoke sauga o i kite labulabum i mwapwela ge Yayaluwa Bwabwalena i kite i ola bunibuni i laulau elana .
41001011	Yaka anan etega i loem labulabumwa i ba , “ Owa natu nunuwanina hot ; ya yaliyaya nabiyan kaiwem . ”
41001012	Sauga o elana Yayaluwa Bwabwalena Yeisu i patuna i na uleya .
41001013	Lan poti i miminaa uleya alonau ge bwasumu bekikil , inoke Seitani Yeisu i papalawakik . Abwe aneloseyau hi nem ge Yeisu ana labe hi pek .
41001014	Kin Helodi Diyon i teli dela , enaa inoke Yeisu i na Galili ge Yehoba wasana waiwaisana i papaatena-an ,
41001015	i ba , “ Sauga iyaka i vin , Yehoba wana abalogugui ana sauga iyaka i kelaubwa . Wami gegi ana en nuku pek ge wasa waiwaisana nuku abulilek-an . ”
41001016	Yeisu i nawanawa Hoga Galili bebenaa , inoke tologi labui i kitel , Saimon alona ge talina Andulu , wali vineya hi ahe ge hi logilogi hogaa .
41001017	Yeisu i baek elal i ba , “ Ku nem ku toulilau , inoke na paatenamiu komiu nuku tabwa gamagalau ali tologi . ”
41001018	Etimwawa wali vineya hi eguluwan ge Yeisu hi toulil .
41001019	I nawanawa kekeisi al , inoke Yemesa , Sebedi natuna , alona ge talina Diyon i kitel wagaa , wali vineya hi lovilovivina .
41001020	Nige i matamatan inoke i yogaagil , yaka tamaliya Sebedi alonau ge wana totuwalali hi eguluwagiliya wagaa ge Yeisu hi toulil .
41001021	Hi na Kapeniyama , inoke lan Sabwata elana Yeisu i na limi tapwalolowa ge i panpankiti .
41001022	Gamagalau nuwaliya hi ahe wana panpankiti kaiwena . Nige i panpankiti i oola Logugui ana topankite , i ba bubun ya alona ge wana gasisi .
41001023	Sauga o elana tau etega iyoho to yayaluwa bibikena i holaviya elana . Inoke yayaluwa bibikena tau i pabaaba , ge i yoga i ba ,
41001024	“ Yeisu gagama Nasaleta , ga i ola ge u nem eliyama ? Age nuwam nu apapanak-agima ? Ya atenawa ya , owa Yehoba wana Gamagal Bwabwalena ! ”
41001025	Yeisu i ba lalaan i ba , “ U mikekei ! U tagil elana ! ”
41001026	Yayaluwa bibikena wana gasisi kaiwena tau tuwana i ginu nabi , inoke yayaluwa bibikena i loi ge i tagil , tau o i eguluwai .
41001027	Gamagalau nuwaliya hi ahe inoke hi nelnel avaliyau elal hi ba , “ Hauna kaba panpankiti e ? I vavaluna ge wana gasisi i gan ! Tau ya , bwagana i baaba yayaluwa bibikel elal , anana hi hago . ”
41001028	Inoke Yeisu wasana etimwawa i lelu Galili ana labi gegewena elana .
41001029	Sauga limi tapwalolo hi eguluwai , inoke avaliyau Yemesa ge Diyon hi na Saimon ge talina Andulu wali limiya .
41001030	Saimon yawana nevenak i kasiyebwa , tuwana i waiwai , iyoho i kenu wana abakenuwa , inoke Yeisu wana wasa hi pek .
41001031	Inoke i na elana , nimanaa i aheya ge i kukupalut . Yaka tuwana waiwaina i mowasi , inoke aanan i ginol i pek Yeisu ge alonau elal .
41001032	Kokoyavi o , sabwelu i lobek enaa , inoke gamagalau tokasiyebwa gegewel ge bolo yayaluwa bibikel hi ulutuk elal , hi ahel ge hi pwatanik Yeisu elana .
41001033	Panuwa ana tomina gegewel hi nogogo hi na limi o ana bakubaku hi pakalaopop ,
41001034	inoke bolo ali kasiyebwa tomaha ge tomaha , Yeisu i pwamolol . I ola al yayaluwa bibikel hi gewi i patuna owaowa-agil , yaa nige i tatalam yayaluwa bibikel nihi baaba , kaiwena hi atena te henala iya .
41001035	Mweluluga kekeisi hot , nigeya ga i mwamwananal , Yeisu i lut , limi i eguluwai ge i na labi etega toto nige gamagalau hi miminaa , inoke i awanun Tamana elana .
41001036	Saimon ge alonau hi na hi loyaan ,
41001037	ge sauga hi pwawa hi baek elana hi ba , “ Gamagalau gegewel hi loyaagiwa . ”
41001038	Yeisu analiya i lahe i ba , “ Ta nok ta na labena etega al , awan bolo gegelilaa ona , inoke na papaatena al elal . Heiya te kaiwena ge ya nem . ”
41001039	Yaka Galili labena gegewena i nawaan , i papaatena wali limi tapwalolowa ge yayaluwa bibikel i takel tagilagil gamagalau elal .
41001040	Tolepelo etega i nem Yeisu elana i loepwakoku ge i awanun elana i ba , “ Ebo nuwam , i bosowaina nu abubunau . ”
41001041	Yeisu alona ge wana atilomwan , nimana i paelu tau o i pihikan inoke i ba , “ E , nuwau . Tuwam ni waisi ! ”
41001042	Sauga o elana , ana lepelo i mowasi ge tuwana i waisi .
41001043	Yaka Yeisu tau o i ba pagasisi ge i patuna i egon i ba ,
41001044	“ Bahi gamagal etega wana wasa nu pepek . U nok u na ga topowon elana ge tuwam ni hile . Bwasumu ni powonan Yehoba elana am abwabubun kaiwena , ni ola Mosese wana Logugui , inoke gamagalau nihi atena tunahot tuwam iyaka i waisi . ”
41001045	Yaa nige i giginol ola Yeisu wana baaba , i egon ge i telipuna i lowasawasa-an labena gegewena . Bugul o kaiwena inoke nige bosowaina Yeisu ni nomasamasal panuwa etega gamwanaa , eba boda nihi gewi hot , yaa i miminek ya labi bolo nige gamagalau hi miminaa . Yaa bwagana i ola o , gamagalau hi nemnem elana , hi noem labena gegewena .
41002001	Lan enuna i mowasi , yaka abwe Yeisu i sikal al i na Kapeniyama . Gamagalau wasa hi hago iyaka i vin ,
41002002	ge hi gewi hi nowanik hi na elana . Inoke limi gamwana i kalaopop nige abamina etega al i gagan , i ola al limi ana nog tolinaa al ge . Yaka Yeisu i papaatena eliyalil .
41002003	Bolau esopali hi nem toelolol etega hi kalivai pwatanim .
41002004	Nuwaliya nihi pwatanik Yeisu elana , yaa nige bosowailiya kaiwena gamagalau hi gewi hot . Limi pwatana i abwab , inoke hi kalivai hi na hi ha limi pwatanaa ge limi pwatana hi pwelaa labi toto Yeisu i miminaa . Yaka toelolol ginebi wana abakenu hi pakuki lowan Yeisu manininaa .
41002005	Yeisu wali abulilek i kite , inoke i baek toelolol elana i ba , “ Natu , wam gegi Yehoba matanaa iyaka ya nuwayoho . ”
41002006	Logugui ana topankite enuna heliya iyoho to avaliyau hi misiyo , yaka totoliya hi nuwanuwatu hi ola ,
41002007	“ Hauna kaiwena tau ya i ba ola o ? Iya i ba bwagabwaga ge Yehoba i hewa likaan ! Nige gamagal etega bosowaina gegi ni nuwayoho , Yehoba maisena ya te bosowaina . ”
41002008	Yeisu etimwawa i atena hauna hi nuwanuwatu-an ateliyaa , yaka i baek elal i ba , “ Hauna kaiwena bugul ya ku nuwanuwatu-agil ?
41002009	I mweyaha te ebo na ba , ‘ Wam gegi Yehoba matanaa iyaka ya nuwayoho . ’ Yaa i pulowan te ebo na ba , ‘ U lut , wam abakenu u ahe ge u nawanawa . ’ *
41002010	He toto pupulowanina na baunan ge na ginol , inoke nuku atena al te Gamagal Natuna wana gasisi i gan panayawiya gegi ni nuwayoho . ” Inoke i ba toelolol elana i ba ,
41002011	“ Na baewa elam , u lut wam abakenu u ahe ge u sikal wam limiya . ”
41002012	Inoke tau i lut , wana abakenu i ahe ge i notagil gamagalau gegewel mataliyaa . Gegewel nuwaliya hi ahe ge Yehoba hi tobalan hi ba , “ Nige sauga etega bugul ololana ya ha kikite . ”
41002013	Yeisu i na al i nawanawa Hoga Galili bebenaa . Gamagalau boda bwabwatana hot hi na elana ge i panpankiti elal .
41002014	Yaka abwe i nawanawa al , inoke takis ana toahi etega alana Libai , iya Alipiyos natuna , i kite i misiyowa wana abatuwalaliya . Inoke i baek elana i ba , “ U toulilau . ” Yaka Libai i lut ge i toulil .
41002015	Yaka abwe i na Libai wana limiya . He takis ana toahi ge togegi hi gewi Yeisu hi toulil , inoke enuna hi nok avaliyau Yeisu ge wana tohago hi anan toyawa .
41002016	Logugui ana topankite enuna , heliya Palisi , hi kite Yeisu alonau togegi ge takis ana toahi hi anan , inoke hi nel wana tohago elal hi ba , “ Hauna kaiwena alonau gamagalau bolo ololal o hi anan toyawa ? ”
41002017	Yeisu wali baaba i hago inoke i baek elal i ba , “ Tomolu nige nuwaliya tosawasawal , tokasiyebwa ya te nuwaliya . Ya nem nige tage bolo hi ba ‘ Ama tosasapol ’ ge na yogaagil , yaa ya nem togegi te na yogaagil . ”
41002018	Lan etegana Diyon Tobabitaiso wana tohago ge Palisi galebu hi palahikan tapwalolo kaiwena . Inoke gamagalau enuna hi nem Yeisu elana hi neli hi ba , “ Hauna kaiwena Diyon wana tohago ge Palisi wali tohago galebu hi palahikan awanun kaiwena , yaa owa wam tohago nigeya ? ”
41002019	Yeisu analiya i lahe i ba , “ Ebo alolon ana hagali nihi ginol , tab toalolon melutauina wana heliyamwau galebu nihi palahikan , sauga ebo iya iyoho avaliya ? Nigeya ! Ebo toalolon melutauina iyoho avaliya , nige bosowaina nihi ginol ola .
41002020	Yaa ana sauga abwe ni vin , inoke topihigelgel toalolon melutauina ni ahek gamwaliyaa , yaka lan o elana abwe galebu nihi palahikan .
41002021	Kaliko vavaluna nige ta aahe ge holahola bebeyaunana mwahawanina ta bwabwaliniya , kaiwena ebo kaliko vavaluna ni kin pahipahi inoke mwahawan o ni pwabwata .
41002022	I ola al , nige oine vavaluna ta hoholek ana patuna bebeyaunana goti kunisina gamwanaa . Ebo ta ginol ola o , he oine ana gasisi kaiwena goti kunisina ni maleli , inoke ni nak ge oine ni maligin . He oine vavaluna ta holek te ana patuna goti kunisina vavaluna gamwanaa . ”
41002023	Sabwata etega Yeisu i nosola witi ana eyowa etega gamwanaa . Wana tohago hi nawanawa yaka witi enona hi lokibwaan ge hi an .
41002024	Palisi hi baek Yeisu elana hi ba , “ U kite , hauna kaiwena wam tohago Sabwata ana logugui hi leke ? ”
41002025	Yeisu analiya i lahe i ba , “ Age Deibid liwanina nige ku vavasili ga , ga i ginol ola sauga alonau ge alonau hi galebu ge nuwaliya aanan etega nihi an ?
41002026	He saugena o Abaiyada i topowon bwabwatana , inoke Deibid i na i ulutuk Yehoba wana limiya , yaka beleid bwabwalena toto hi teliya Yehoba manininaa , topowon i ahe i pek Deibid i an . Yaa logugui i ba tage bahi gamagal etega beleid o ni aan , topowon ya te nihi an . Ge enuna al i pek alonau elal hi an . ”
41002027	Yaka i baek al elal i ba , “ Yehoba Sabwata i ginol gamagal kaiweliya , nige i oola tage gamagal i ginolil Sabwata kaiwena .
41002028	Inoke nau Gamagal Natuna , nau Sabwata al ana Babala . ”
41003001	Sauga etega Yeisu i na i ulutuk limi tapwalolowa , tau etega iyoho to , nimana labi etega i aliga .
41003002	Gamagalau enuna nuwaliya Yeisu ana woliwoli nihi ginol , inoke mataliya hi lihikan elana ebo tau o ni pwamolu Sabwataa .
41003003	Yeisu i baek tau toto nimana alialigana elana i ba , “ U lut , u nem u talmilil gamagalau gegewel mataliyaa . ”
41003004	Inoke Yeisu gamagalau i nelil i ba , “ Logugui ga i ba ola Sabwata kaiwena ? Pagan waiwaisana ta ginol o ebo pagan nanakina ? Gamagal yawalina ta pwamolu o ebo ta apanak ? ” Yaa gamagalau hi mikekei , nige anana hi lalahe .
41003005	Yeisu alona ge wana huga matana i lipwapwati elal , ge nuwana i nak kaiwena ateliya i gasisi , inoke i baek tau o elana i ba , “ Nimwam u paelu . ” Inoke nimana i paelu , ge nimana iyaka i waisi .
41003006	Yaka Palisi hi tagil hi na avaliyau ge gamagalau enuna bolo nunuwaliya Helodi wana logugui hi migogo , ge hi liwaliwan ga nihi ginol ola ge Yeisu nihi lopaaliga .
41003007	Yeisu alonau wana tohago panuwa hi eguluwan hi na Hoga Galili papaelinaa , ge gamagalau Galili boda bwabwatana hi nouliulil .
41003008	I ola al , Yeisu wana ginol wasana gamagalau hi hago , inoke hi gewi hi neem Yudiya , Yelusalema , labi Idumiya , wewel Yolidani labena leunati , ge labena Taya ge Saidoni elal .
41003009	Kaiwena boda i bwata hot , inoke i baek wana tohago elal waga etega nihi lovivina-an nonowe ge ni heya , inoke gamagalau bahi nihi mimipapahe .
41003010	He gamagalau hi gewi valila i pwamolol , inoke bolo hi kasiyebwa hi logasisi nuwaliya Yeisu tuwana nihi pihikan ge nihi molu .
41003011	Sauga ebo gamagalau bolo yayaluwa bibikel hi holaviya elal Yeisu nihi kite , yaka nihi sogu manininaa ge nihi yoga nihi ba , “ Owa Yehoba Natuna . ”
41003012	Yaa Yeisu yayaluwa bibikel i lolopwalil bahi nihi wawasaan te henala iya .
41003013	Yeisu i na i ha oyaa , inoke bolau bolo nuwana i yogaagil hi nem elana .
41003014	Inoke ali toto elulutega eluwa i hilel ge ali boda alana i tun apostolo . I baek elal i ba , “ Iyaka ya hilemiu alowau komiu , inoke abwe na patunamiu nuku tagil wasa waiwaisana nuku papaatena-an ,
41003015	ge wami gasisi ni gan yayaluwa bibikel nuku patuna owaowa-agil . ”
41003016	Bolo i hilel ali toto elulutega eluwa alaliya i ola hiwe : Saimon ( alana al i tun Pita ) ;
41003017	Yemesa ge talina Diyon , Sebedi natunau ( alaliya al Yeisu i tun Bowaneges , ana sapu heiya Gulumwawa Natunau ) ;
41003018	Andulu , Pilipi , Batolomiu , Mataiyo , Tomas , Yemesa toto Alipiyos natuna , Tadiyas , Saimon toto i neem boda Seloti elal ,
41003019	ge Yudasa Isikaliyota , iya Yeisu i wasaan .
41003020	Yeisu i na i tuk limi etega elana , yaka boda bwabwatana hi nogogo al hi na elana . He iya alonau wana tohago nige wali sauga i gagan ge tage nihi anan .
41003021	Sauga tutunau wasa hi hago tage nige i aanan , inoke hi nok nuwaliya nihi en , kaiwena hi ba , “ Iyaka i kokona . ”
41003022	Logugui ana topankite bolo hi neem Yelusalema hi ba , “ He Tamudulele i ulutuk elana tei . Ge yayaluwa bibikel wali tohouwa wana gasisi elana te yayaluwa bibikel i papatuna owaowa-agil . ”
41003023	Yaka Yeisu i yogaagil ge i liwan gohalibe elal i ba , “ Tab Seitani bosowaina wana boda bolo yayaluwa bibikel ni patuna owaowa-agil ?
41003024	Ebo abalogugui etega boda ni palabui ge totoliya nihi lohaveyan , abalogugui o nasi nige ni gagasisi .
41003025	O ebo un etega boda ni palabui ge totoliya nihi lohaveyan , nasi nige ni gagasisi .
41003026	He i ola te Seitani wana abalogugui . Ebo boda nihi palabui ge nihi lohaveyan wali boda elana , nasi nige ni gagasisi , inoke wana abalogugui ni mowasi .
41003027	“ Nige gamagal etega bosowaina ni ulutuk asiyala * wana limiya ge wana gogomwau ni bugulan . Ebo nuwana , inoke ni yowan hikan ga , abwe wana limi bugubugulina ni bugul egonan .
41003028	“ Na baewa eliyamiu , henala ebo pagan nanakina ni ginol ge ebo ni ba bwagabwaga ge Yehoba ni awatautau-an , he bosowaina ya gegi toto o Yehoba ni nuwayoho .
41003029	Yaa henala ni ba bwagabwaga ge Yayaluwa Bwabwalena ni awatautau-an , he gegi toto o Yehoba nige ni nunuwayoho , kaiwena iya gegi mihomihotina i ginol . ”
41003030	Yeisu i ba ola o , kaiwena Logugui ana topankite hi baaba hi ba , “ Yayaluwa bibikena iyaka i ulutuk elana . ”
41003031	Yaka Yeisu hinana ge talinau hi vin ge hi talmilil noleleya , inoke gamagal etega hi patuna i na i tuk tage ni yogaan .
41003032	Yaa boda heliya iyoho Yeisu hi mipainan , inoke abwe wana wasa hi pek hi ba , “ Hinam ge talimwau heliya huwo noleleya o hi loyaagiwa . ”
41003033	Yeisu i nel i ba , “ Henala nain ge henalau taliwau ? ”
41003034	Inoke matana i lipwapwati gamagalau bolo hi mipainan elal ge i ba , “ Nain ge taliwau heliya hiwe !
41003035	Henala ebo Yehoba wana nuwatu ni ginol iya te taliu , nu ge nain . ”
41004001	Lan etega Yeisu i panpankiti Hoga Galili bebenaa . Boda bwabwatana hot hi nogogo ge hi mipainan , inoke i gaiha waga etega elana , i ota tagil noleleya ge i misiyo , yaa gamagalau hi minaa datuwa .
41004002	Wana panpankiti elana i liwan gohalibe inoke bugul i gewi i baunan eliyalil . I ba ,
41004003	“ Ku laegan ! Tau etega i nok eyowaa , witi pwatumwina i yohi .
41004004	Sauga pwatum i yohi , enuna hi talek kamwasaa inoke bwasumu hi you tal ge hi anil .
41004005	Enuna hi talek manapatpata , ali bilibili waiwaisana nige i bwabwata . Etimwawa hi siun , kaiwena ali bilibili nige i babalu .
41004006	Yaa sauga sabwelu i ha , witi siunina i tonil yaka hi yakiwa , kaiwena ewahililiya nige i lalau bubun .
41004007	Pwatum enuna hi talek mwawin pepesala gamwaliyaa , yaka mwawin pepesala hi siun gagasisi inoke witi hi gig paaligal , inoke nige hi eenon .
41004008	Pwatum enuna hi talek bilibili waiwaisana elana inoke hi siun , hi bwata ge hi enon , tomaha ona enoliya . Enuna enoliya teti , enuna sikisti , ge enuna al wan handeled . ”
41004009	Yaka Yeisu i ba , “ Ebo tanamiu i gan , he no baaba nuku hago . ”
41004010	Sauga Yeisu i mimwaumwau , inoke tohago bolo ali toto elulutega eluwa , avaliyau ge enuna al bolo avaliya Yeisu hi nawanawa , hi nem elana ge hi nel ba gohalibe ona ali sapu kaiwena .
41004011	Yeisu analiya i lahe i ba , “ Yehoba wana abalogugui ana nuwatu misusumena iyaka i pamasal eliyamiu , yaa bolo tola ba gohalibe elana ya te ya liwaliwan elal .
41004012	Ya ginol ola o , inoke nihi mimi gagayawa , yaa nige nihi kikite , nihi mimi lalaegan , yaa nige nihi hahago ge nihi aatena . Binimala nihi atena , inoke nihi nuwasikal Yehoba elana ge wali gegi ni nuwayoho . ”
41004013	Inoke Yeisu i baek elal i ba , “ Age ba gohalibe ya ana sapu nige ku aatena ? Ebo nige ku aatena , abwe ga nuku ola ge enuna al ali sapu nuku atena ?
41004014	Tau toto i na eyowaa ge pwatum i yohi , iya i ola wasa waiwaisana ana toyohi .
41004015	Gamagalau enuna , heliya hi ola pwatum bolo hi talek kamwasaa . Sauga wasa waiwaisana hi hago , inoke Seitani ni nem ge hauna toto toyohi i luwan ateliyaa ni kaluoe .
41004016	Enuna , heliya hi ola pwatum bolo hi talek manapatpata . Sauga wasa waiwaisana hi hago , inoke etimwawa hi ahe hi teliek ateliyaa ginebi ge wali yaliyaya .
41004017	Yaa bugul maisena , wasa waiwaisana nige hi nuwanuwatu-an bubun ateliyaa , ewahililiya nige i lalau bubun , inoke wali sauga nige i yayapu . Sauga ebo pulowan hi pwawa o ebo gamagalau hi palomwanagil wasa waiwaisana kaiwena , etimwawa yayaluwaliya hi pil ge hi towani .
41004018	Enuna al , heliya hi ola pwatum bolo hi talek mwawin nanakil pepesala gamwaliyaa . Heliya wasa waiwaisana hi hago ,
41004019	yaa abwe panayawi yawalina ana nuwanuwatu , gogomwau ana nunuwana ge tuwan ana payaliyaya ana nuwatu i tuk elal . Inoke bugul bolo ya wasa waiwaisana hi gig paaliga ge nige enona i gagan .
41004020	Yaa gamagalau enuna , heliya hi ola pwatum bolo hi talek bilibili waiwaisana elana . Sauga wasa waiwaisana hi hago , inoke hi ahe ge hi teliek ateliyaa , inoke hi enon , enuna enoliya teti , enuna sikisti ge enuna al wan handeled . ”
41004021	Yeisu i baek al elal i ba , “ Ebo gamagal etega odam ni ton ge ni pwatanim ga ni teliya ? Ulun ni ahe ni pom lowan ? Age ni teliek bwana toto abakenu gabulanaa ? Nigeya , nasi ni teliya teibol pwatanaa .
41004022	He bugul misusumel abwe nihi masal , ge bugul bolo gamagalau hi pahabobu abwe nihi masal mwananala .
41004023	Ebo tanamiu i gan , inoke no baaba nuku hago . ”
41004024	Yeisu i ba al , “ Baaba toto ku hago nuku nuwanuwatu-an bubun . Ebo nuku nuwanuwatu-an bubun heiya te nuku atena bubun . He luvi toto ku ginol ge ku pek alomiyau elal , heiya te abwe nuku ahe , ge ana etulan enuna al nuku ahe .
41004025	Henala wana aatena i gan , abwe Yehoba ni paetulan . Henala Yehoba ana aatena nige i gagan eliyana , hauna valila wana aatena kekeisi , Yehoba ni ahek yoho . ”
41004026	Yeisu i ba al , “ Yehoba wana abalogugui i ola hiwe . Tau etega witi pwatumwina i yohi wana eyowaa .
41004027	Bulina ni kenu ge lana ni lut , pwatum iyoho hi siusiun ge hi bwatabwata , yaa nige i aatena te ga hi siun ola .
41004028	Pwatum totona i siun bilibiliya ge abwe i enon : houwan nuwana i gan , abwe lanina i gan inoke enona i tagil .
41004029	Sauga enona i matuwa , yaka wana kilepa i ahe i na witi i tomwatomwa , kaiwena iyaka pahi ana sauga . ”
41004030	Yeisu i ba al , “ Hauna elana binimala Yehoba wana abalogugui ta papatini-aniya , o age hauna ba gohalibe elana ta pwamwananaliya ?
41004031	He i ola ebwakil toto alana masted pwatumwina , iya pwatum gegewel bolo ta luluwan eyowaa wali tokekeisi hot .
41004032	Sauga ta luwan ge i siun , inoke bugul gegewel bolo hi siun eyowaa i bwata lakel , lalana i lobwata inoke bwasumu bolo hi youyou hawawala ali vata hi ginola ligumwina elana . ”
41004033	Ba gohalibe ololana o hi gewi al Yeisu i baunan , inoke eliyana i papaatena gamagalau elal , i golugoluwa wali aatena elana .
41004034	Ba gohalibe eliyana ya te i baaba gamagalau elal , yaa ebo heliya ya alonau ge wana tohago , inoke bugul gegewena i pwapwamwananal elal .
41004035	Lan toto o kokoyavi hot elana , Yeisu i baek wana tohago elal i ba , “ Ta egon ! Ta alupanet ta na labena etega al . ”
41004036	Inoke tohago gamagalau hi eguluwagil ge hi na hi gaiha waga toto Yeisu i minaa ge i papaatena , yaka avaliya hi kuki , ge avaliyau waga enuna al hi lilitoyawa .
41004037	Mana gasigasisena i towa hogaa , inoke bagol i hol likalika wagaa , kelaubwa waga ni kalaopop ge ni lobek .
41004038	Yeisu iyoho i kenu aipunaa , kokowana i teliya kebeyalu pwatanaa . Yaka tohago hi na Yeisu hi palut ge hi baek elana hi ba , “ Topankite , ga i ola ge nige u nuwanuwatu kaiwema ? Kelaubwa naha yaomal te . ”
41004039	Inoke Yeisu i lut i talmilil , yaka i baek mana elana i ba , “ U mwatomwa , ” ge i baek al bagol elana i ba , “ U bakuhu . ” Yaka mana i mwatomwa ge hoga i laumwal hot .
41004040	Yaka i baek wana tohago elal i ba , “ Hauna kaiwena ku lovakun ? Age nigeya ga wami abulilek i gagan ? ”
41004041	Tohago hi lovakun nabi yaka hi penelnel-agil hi ba , “ Henala tau ya ? Bwagana mana ge bagol , anana hi hago . ”
41005001	Hoga hi alupanet-an hi na hi tan Gelasa wali labiya .
41005002	Sauga Yeisu i gailoem wagaa , yaka tau etega yayaluwa bibikel hi holaviya elana , i neem salaiya i na Yeisu elana .
41005003	Tau ya i miminaa salaiya , ge nige bosowaina gamagalau nihi yowan hikan , bwagana ebo sen hi ahe hi yowaniya .
41005004	Sauga i gewi sen elana nimana ge aena hi yowaniya , yaa sen i kukutomwatomwa-agil , ge aiyan toto aena hi tagahikaniya i tatagagebagebal-an . Nige gamagal etega bosowaina ni pabakuhu .
41005005	Lan ge bulin i nononawanawa salaiya ge bwateti elal , i nonoyogayoga ge nibuka i aahe totona tuwana i lolokakaini-an .
41005006	Sauga tau o Yeisu i kitek laha , inoke i patalelu i na i loepwakoku awonaa .
41005007	I yoga anana i bwata hot i ba , “ Yeisu , owa Yehoba Mihahaina Hot Natuna , nasi ga nu ginol ola-agau ? Nu papasila Yehoba alana elana nige nu lalaheyau ! ”
41005008	He i yoga ola o , kaiwena Yeisu iyoho ya i baaba tau o elana i ba , “ Yayaluwa bibikena , u tagil tau ya elana ! ”
41005009	Inoke Yeisu i neli i ba , “ Alamwek ? ” Yaka yayaluwa bibikel tau hi pabaaba , ge i ba , “ Alau Boda , kaiwena ha gewi . ”
41005010	Ge i awanun hikahikani Yeisu elana i ba , “ Bahi nu papatuna owaowa-agima labi ya elana . ”
41005011	Bobu ali yawi bwabwatana hi anana to labilabiya , nige ali bwaga i yayapu elal .
41005012	Inoke yayaluwa bibikel hi awanun Yeisu elana hi ba , “ U patunama naha na bobu elal , ge nu talam naha ulutuk elal . ”
41005013	Yeisu i talam inoke yayaluwa bibikel hi tagil tau o elana ge hi na hi ulutuk bobu eliyalil . Bobu ali yawi o gamwanaa ali gewi tabam tu tausan , gegewel hi patalelu loek labilabiya , hi na hi lau hogaa , inoke hi unun .
41005014	Bolo bobu hi matahikagil etimwawa hi patalelu hi na panuwa bwabwatana ge awan kekeisi ona elal , inoke bugul ya wasana hi wasaan . Yaka gamagalau hi nok ge nihi kite hauna gun i gan .
41005015	Sauga hi na Yeisu elana , inoke tau toto valila yayaluwa bibikel ali boda hi holaviya elana , hi kite i misiyo kaliko i galoi ge wana nuwatu iyaka i sapu , inoke gamagalau hi lovakun .
41005016	Bugul o ana topekiti gamagalau wali wasa hi pek hauna i gan tau toto yayaluwa bibikel hi holaviya elana , ge hauna i masal bobu elal .
41005017	Inoke gamagalau hi telipuna hi awanun gagasisi Yeisu elana tage wali labi ni eguluwan .
41005018	Sauga Yeisu i gaigaiha wagaa , inoke tau toto valila yayaluwa bibikel hi holaviya elana , i awanun Yeisu elana i ba , “ Nuwau na nowa alou owa . ”
41005019	Yeisu nige i tatalam , yaa i ba , “ U sikal u na wam panuwaa , inoke tutumwau wali wasa nu pek hauna Yehoba i ginol kaiwem , ge wana mulolu eliyam ana bwata nu wasaan elal . ”
41005020	Yaka tau o i egon ge bugul toto Yeisu i ginol elana i lowasawasa-an labi Dekapolis gamwanaa . Inoke gamagalau gegewel nuwaliya hi ahe .
41005021	Yeisu Hoga Galili i alupanet-an i sikal al i na i tan , inoke boda bwabwatana hi nogogo elana . Iya iyoho hoga bebenaa ,
41005022	inoke Yudiya wali limi tapwalolo ana tohouwa etega , alana Yailo , i nem . Sauga Yeisu i kite , inoke i loepwakoku aenaa ,
41005023	ge i awanun gagasisi i ba , “ Natu meluyovana i kasiyebwa nabi , kelaubwa ni aliga . U nem u na nimwam u teli tuwanaa , inoke ni molu . ”
41005024	Inoke Yeisu alona hi nok . Gamagalau boda bwabwatana hot hi nouliulil , enuna hi nawaa awonaa ge luluna labi labui .
41005025	Yova etegana iyoho avaliya , iya kasiyebwa welolo i ahe , baliman ana gewi elulutega eluwa saliyana i laulau .
41005026	Tosawasawal hi gewi hi sawasawal , ge wana mani gegewena iyaka i pwamowasiya elal , yaa nige kekeisi etega i momolu , ana kasiyebwa abwe i nak hot .
41005027	Sauga Yeisu wasana i hago , inoke i na boda gamwaliyaa , i noheem Yeisu enaa ge ana kaliko buhuna i pihikan ,
41005028	kaiwena totona i nuwatu i ba , “ Ebo ana kaliko ya te na pihikan , inoke na molu . ”
41005029	Sauga yova Yeisu ana kaliko i pihikan , inoke sauga o saliyana i bakuhu nige al i lalau , ge amnana i anbose ana kasiyebwa iyaka i mowasi .
41005030	Yeisu etimwawa i atena gasisi iyaka i tagil elana , inoke i tagena sikal boda elal ge i nel i ba , “ Henala o kaliko i pihikan ? ”
41005031	Wana tohago anana hi lahe hi ba , “ U kite gamagalau ha gewi nabi te ha nopahipahi-agiwa ee , yaka u neli u ba , ‘ Henala i pihikagau ? ’ ”
41005032	Yaa Yeisu iyoho ya matana i lililipwapwati , nuwana ni kite henala ana kaliko i pihikan .
41005033	Yova o i atena hauna i masal elana , inoke alona wana lovakun ge wana ginu i nem i loepwakoku Yeisu awonaa . Inoke hauna gun i gan elana ge hauna i ginol , gegewena i wasaan bubun Yeisu elana .
41005034	Inoke Yeisu i baek yova elana i ba , “ Natu , wam abulilek i pwamolowa . U egon alom ge wam yaliyaya , kasiyebwa ya nige al ni sisikal elam . ”
41005035	Yeisu iyoho ya i baaba , inoke gamagalau enuna hi noem limi tapwalolo ana tohouwa , Yailo , wana limiya , ge hi baek elana hi ba , “ Natum iyaka i aliga . Topankite wana sauga bahi nu aapapanak-an al . ”
41005036	Yeisu gamagalau wali baaba i hago , yaa nige i gogoluek elal , inoke i baek limi tapwalolo ana tohouwa elana i ba , “ Bahi lovakun ! Iyai te nu abulilek . ”
41005037	Yeisu nige i tatalam tage gamagal etega alonau nihi nok , iyai te Pita , ge Yemesa alona ge talina Diyon .
41005038	Sauga hi vin limi tapwalolo ana tohouwa wana limiya , Yeisu gamagalau i kitel ge i hago analiya i gewi , hi lolokahin ge hi kahikahin lopili , analiya i bwaya .
41005039	Inoke i na i ulutuk limi gamwanaa , yaka i ba , “ Ga i ola ge anamiu i gewi ge ku lolokahin ? Wawaya nige i aaliga , i kenu ya . ”
41005040	Yaa wana baaba gamagalau hi nivali . Yeisu i ba gamagalau hi tagilan , inoke wawaya tamana ge hinana , avaliyau tohago bolo alonau , i ahel ge hi na hi tuk lum toto wawaya i kenuwa .
41005041	Nimana i ahe ge i baek elana , “ Talita koum ! ” * Baaba ya ana sapu heiya “ Galok , na baewa elam , u lut ! ”
41005042	Inoke sauga o i lut talmilil ge i nonawanawa . He wana baliman elulutega eluwa . Inoke bolo alonau hi tuk , nuwaliya hi ahe ginol o kaiwena .
41005043	Inoke Yeisu i ba pagasisel bugul o bahi nihi wawasaan gamagal etega elana , ge i ba aanan etega nihi ahe nihi pek wawaya ni an .
41006001	Yeisu panuwa o i tataluwai , inoke alonau wana tohago hi sikal hi na totona wana awana .
41006002	Lan Sabwata elana i na i panpankiti wali limi tapwalolowa . Gamagalau hi gewi wana panpankiti hi hago inoke ateliya i you , ge hi ba , “ Wana aatena ga i aheya ? Wana siba ga i noem ge ginol yawiyawi i ginolil ?
41006003	Iya kapenta tei , Meli natuna , ge iya Yemesa , Yosepa , Yudasa ge Saimon taliliya . He nunau heliya iyahe te avalau e . ” Inoke ateliya i elolol ge Yeisu hi pihigelgel-an .
41006004	Yeisu i baek elal i ba , “ Gamagalau gegewel palopita hi awatauwan , yaa tutunau ge wana panuwa gamagaliliyau ya te nige hi aawatauwan . ”
41006005	Yaka nige bosowaina ginol yawiyawi ni ginola to , iyai te nimana i teli tokasiyebwa ehila ya tuwaliyaa ge i pwamolol .
41006006	Inoke Yeisu atena i you kaiwena nige wali abulilek i gagan . Yaka Yeisu i nopain awan maisena ge maisena i panpankiti gamagalau elal .
41006007	Inoke wana tohago ali toto elulutega eluwa i yogaagil hi nok elana , ge gasisi i pek elal yayaluwa bibikel nihi patuna owaowa-agil , yaka eluwa eluwa i patunal nihi tagil .
41006008	Ali logugui i pek elal i ba , “ Bahi bugul etega nuku aahe wami nawanawa kaiwena , suki ya te nuku ahe . Bahi aanan o ebo kaliko ana nabwa nuku nonoahe , ge bahi mani nuku uusan ami belet ana pwaos elana .
41006009	Aemiu ana os nuku pahe , yaa ami holahola bahi ni eeluwa .
41006010	Ebo nuku ulutuk panuwa etega elana ge gamagal etega ni yoga pahemiu , inoke nuku minaa wana limiya ana siga panuwa o nuku eguluwai .
41006011	Ebo panuwa etega nige nihi yayaliyaya kaiwemiu ge nige wami baaba nihi hahago , inoke panuwa o nuku eguluwan ge aemiu papakovana nuku hapul yoho . Nuku ginol ola , inoke nihi atena abwe ali lahi nihi pwawa . ”
41006012	Inoke hi tagil ge hi na hi papaatena hi ba , “ Wami gegi ana en nuku pek . ”
41006013	I ola al , yayaluwa bibikel hi gewi hi patuna owaowa-agil , ge tokasiyebwa hi gewi tuwaliya hi paenonu inoke hi pwamolol .
41006014	Kin Helodi Yeisu wana tuwalali wasana i hago , kaiwena Yeisu alana wasana iyaka i lelu . Gamagalau enuna hi ba , “ Diyon Tobabitaiso iyaka i lutem yaomala . Heiya te kaiwena wana gasisi i gan ge ginol yawiyawi i awaawaginol . ”
41006015	Yaa enuna hi ba , “ Iya Ilaitiya . ” Ge enuna al hi ba , “ Iya palopita etega , i ola palopitau bolo houhouwel . ”
41006016	Yaa Helodi , sauga Yeisu wasana i hago , inoke i ba , “ He Diyon to ! Valila ya ba mwamwalina hi gotomwa , yaa abwe i lutem yaomala . ”
41006017	He valila Helodi Helodiyas i oe alona hi alolon , Helodiyas iya Helodi talina Pilipi , lagona . Diyon i mimi baaba Helodi elana i ba i ola , “ Nige bosowaina talim lagona nu alolonan . ” Baena , inoke Helodi wana totuwalali i patunal hi na Diyon hi lib , inoke hi yowan ge hi teliya dela .
41006018	
41006019	Inoke Helodiyas Diyon i hugaan nuwana ni lol . Yaa nige i bosowaina ,
41006020	kaiwena Helodi Diyon i lovakunan , i atena iya tau sasapona ge totuwalali bwabwalena , inoke i matahikan ya . Bwagana Diyon wana baaba nuwana i gewagewa-an , yaa nuwana te sauga gegewena wana baaba ni laeganan .
41006021	Sauga etega abwe Helodiyas wana sauga waiwaisana i pwawa ge Diyon ni lol , lan toto Helodi wana lan ab ana nuwahikan i ginol . Lan o elana aanan bwabwatana i ginol gamaman ana totuwalali bwabwatal avaliyau tolohaveyan wali tohouwa ge Galili wali tonowakau bwabwatal kaiweliya .
41006022	Helodiyas natuna meluyovana i na i tuk i saga , inoke Helodi alonau ge bolo hi ulutuk pati o elana , wana sagasaga kaiwena hi yaliyaya nabi . Inoke kin Helodi i baek galok o elana i ba , “ Hauna gun ebo nuwam nu awanuni , inoke na pewa . ”
41006023	Inoke i papasila i ba , “ O sila nam , hauna gun ebo nu awanuni , bwagana ebo no abalogugui awalehina , nasi na talamwan elam . ”
41006024	Inoke galok i tagil i na hinana elana i nel i ba , “ Hauna gun na awanuni kin elana ? ” Hinana i ba , “ Diyon Tobabitaiso balomana . ”
41006025	Sauga o galok etimwawa i sikal i na i tuk kin elana ge wana awanun i baunan i ba , “ Nuwau sauga ya Diyon Tobabitaiso mwamwalina nu gotomwa , balomana nu loke mwaha elana , nu pwatanim ge nu pem eliyau na kite . ”
41006026	Yaka kin nuwana i nak nabi , yaa nige tage galok wana awanun ni towani , kaiwena iyaka i papasila bolo hi na pati o elana mataliyaa .
41006027	Inoke sauga o , kin i baek wana tolohaveyan etega elana ni na Diyon mwamwalina ni gotomwa ge balomana ni pwatanik elana . Yaka tau o i nok i na dela , Diyon mwamwalina i gotomwa ,
41006028	ge i loke mwaha gamwanaa , inoke i pwatanik i na i pek galok elana , yaka abwe galok i na i pek hinana elana .
41006029	Sauga Diyon wana tohago wasa hi hago , inoke hi nok hi na tuwana hi ahe ge hi na hi teli salaiya .
41006030	Inoke apostolowau hi sikal hi na Yeisu elana , ge tuwalali bolo hi ginolil ge toto hi panpankiti-an , gegewena hi wasaan elana .
41006031	He gamagalau hi gewi hi nem nowa , Yeisu alonau wana tohago nige wali sauga waiwaisana i gagan ge tage nihi anan . Inoke i baek wana tohago elal i ba , “ Komiu awawamiu , alowau komiu ta na papaeliya , inoke nuku veyaho kekeisi ga . ”
41006032	Yaka heliya ya awawal , hi heya wagaa hi nana papaeliya .
41006033	Yaa gamagalau hi gewi hi kitel hi kuki tagil , ge hi atena te Yeisu alonau ge wana tohago heliya to . Inoke hi noem panuwa tomaha ona , ge aeliyaa hi patalelu hi na hi vin houwa labi toto Yeisu ge wana tohago hi nonoek .
41006034	Sauga Yeisu i gailau , boda bwabwatana i kitel , inoke atena i lomwanagil kaiwena heliya hi ola sipi nige ali tomatahikan . Inoke i telipuna bugul hi gewi i panpankiti-an elal .
41006035	Yaka panuwa i kokoyavi , inoke wana tohago hi nem elana hi ba , “ Panuwa ya ana bwaga i gan ge kelaubwa bulin ni gan .
41006036	Gamagalau u patunal nihi egon nihi na awan bwabwatal ge awan kekeisi ona elal bolo kelaubwaa , ge aliya nihi pwapwamola . ”
41006037	Yaa Yeisu analiya i lahe i ba , “ Komiu aanan etegana nuku pek nihi an . ” Tohago hi baek elana hi ba , “ Age nuwam mani silba ana gewi tu handeled naha ahe naha na beleid naha pwamola ge naha pek nihi an ? ”
41006038	Inoke Yeisu i baek elal i ba , “ Beleid ehila eliyamiu ? Ku na ga ku kite . ” Sauga hi na hi kite , inoke hi ba , “ Nimala panuna ya , ge moti eluwa . ”
41006039	Inoke Yeisu i baek wana tohago elal gamagalau ali pwahin ona nihi ginolil , ge nihi ba nihi misiyoan mwawin pwatanaa .
41006040	Yaka gamagalau hi misiyo ali pwahin tomaha tomaha , pwahin enuna ali gewi wan handeled ge enuna ali gewi pipti .
41006041	Inoke Yeisu beleid nimala panuna ge moti eluwa i ahe , matana i lihin labulabumwa ge i ba mulolu Yehoba elana . Inoke beleid i pigebagebal-an , i pek wana tohago elal ge heliya abwe hi guyauan gamagalau elal . Moti eluwa al i pigebagebal-an , i pek wana tohago elal ge hi guyauan gamagalau elal .
41006042	Gamagalau gegewel hi anan tineliya i kiya ,
41006043	inoke wali an teli tohago hi abubun , beleid ge moti ali egowa elulutega eluwa .
41006044	Bolo hi anan , bolau ali gewi paib tausan .
41006045	Sauga o , Yeisu i ba wana tohago hi gaiha wagaa nihi houwa nihi alupanet nihi na Betesaida , ge iya gamagalau ni patunal nihi egonan .
41006046	Wana tohago hi kuki enaa , inoke iya i na i ha oyaa ge i awanun .
41006047	Panuwa iyaka i kokoyavi , waga iyoho ya hoga Galili nuwanaa , ge Yeisu maisena ya iyoho panuwaa .
41006048	I kite tohago hi leva alaliga , kaiwena mana i yu pahanal . Inoke mweluluga kekeisi tili kilok ge sikis kilok ali hawawala , Yeisu i nem eliyalil i nawaa hoga pwatanaa . Kelaubwa ni nopalegel ,
41006049	yaka hi kite i nawanawa hoga pwatanaa inoke hi nuwatu tage iya gagayumwa . Inoke hi loi ,
41006050	kaiwena gegewel hi kite ge hi lovakun . Yaa etimwawa Yeisu i baek elal i ba , “ Atemiu ni matuwa ! Nau te . Bahi lovakun ! ”
41006051	Yaka i gaiha wagaa , inoke mana i mwatomwa . Tohago nuwaliya hi ahe hoti ,
41006052	kaiwena bwagana hi kite beleid nimala panuna ya i ahe boda i paanil , yaa Yeisu wana gasisi nige hi aatena bubun , kaiwena wali aatena i pulowan .
41006053	Hoga hi alupanet-an hi na hi tan panuwa Genesaleta , inoke waga ana anka hi alipalo .
41006054	Sauga hi gailoem wagaa , gamagalau Yeisu hi kite ge hi atena iya to .
41006055	Yaka gamagalau hi patalelu hi na panuwa tomaha ona labi o elana , inoke tokasiyebwa hi ahel ge ginebi wali abakenu hi kalivail , inoke ebo Yeisu wasana ga hi hagoek , yaka tokasiyebwa hi pwatanik elana .
41006056	Hauna labi i nonoek , ebo panuwa bwabwatal o ebo awan kekeisi bolo hi minaa uleya , gamagalau tokasiyebwa hi pwatanik ge hi teleliya abamaket elana . Hi awanun elana tokasiyebwa Yeisu ana kaliko buhuna ya nihi pibose , inoke bolo hi pibose , gegewel hi molu .
41007001	Palisi ge Logugui ana topankite enuna hi neem Yelusalema hi na Yeisu hi mipainan .
41007002	Hi kite Yeisu wana tohago enuna hi anan , inoke hi nuwatu tage nimaliya i biki , kaiwena nimaliya nige hi uul i oola wali tapwalolo ana logugui , toto Palisi hi panpankiti-an .
41007003	He Palisi ge Yudiya gegewel nige nihi aanan ga ana siga nimaliya nihi ul ni ola wali tapwalolo ana logugui , toto i neem tubuliyau elal .
41007004	Ebo nihi neem abamaket elana , nigeya ga nihi aanan ana siga nihi highig . I ola al logugui hi gewi i neem tubuliyau elal hi toulil , ololana kom , ulun ge mwaha ali ulul .
41007005	Inoke Palisi ge Logugui ana topankite Yeisu hi neli hi ba , “ Ga i ola ge wam tohago logugui toto i neem tubulau elal nige hi totoulil , yaa nimaliya nige hi uul yaka hi anan ? ”
41007006	Analiya i lahe i ba , “ Tokakakawi komiu ! Palopita Aiseya i ba bubun ya , kaiwemiu valila i lelelian i ola hiwe : Yehoba i ba , ‘ Gamagalau ya hohopeliyaa hi awatauwagau , yaa ateliya ana bwaga i yapu elau .
41007007	Wali tapwalolo eliyau i ola bugul bwagabwaga , gamagalau wali nuwatu hi panpankiti-an tage Yehoba wana logugui . ’
41007008	Komiu Yehoba wana logugui ku towani , ge logugui bolo gamagalau hi ginolil ku kukuhikan . ”
41007009	Inoke i ba vevehe al i ba , “ Age komiu ku siba te Yehoba wana logugui ku towani , inoke totomiu wami logugui ku pagasisi !
41007010	He Yehoba wana logugui Mosese i baunan i ba , ‘ Tamwam ge hinam nu awatauwagil , ’ ge i ba , ‘ Henala ebo tamana ge hinana ni ba panakil nihi tagapaaliga . ’
41007011	Yaa komiu ku ba ola hiwe : Ebo bugul enuna i gan gamagal etega elana tage tamana ge hinana ali labe kaiwena , he i waisi ya ebo nige ni pepek elal ge nige ni lalabel . Komiu ku ba i bosowaina ya ni baek elal ni ba , ‘ Bugul bolo tage ya pepewa iyaka ya ba pwatanek Yehoba elana , he yaka nige na pepewa . ’
41007012	
41007013	Ku ba ola o , he yaka Yehoba wana logugui ku hewa likaan to , ge ku golugoluwa totomiu wami panpankiti elana toto i noem tubumiyau elal . Ge i ola al , bugul ololana o hi gewi ku ginolil . ”
41007014	Yeisu boda i yogaagil al hi na elana ge i ba , “ Gegewemiu ku laegan elau , ge bugul ya nuwamiu ni sapuan .
41007015	Toto i tuka awalaa nige i papabikela , yaa toto i tagilem gamagalau elala heiya te i pabikela .
41007016	Ebo tanamiu i gan , inoke no baaba nuku hago . ”
41007017	Yeisu boda i eguluwagil i na i tuk limi gamwanaa , inoke wana tohago hi na hi neli ba gohalibe o ana sapu kaiwena .
41007018	Yeisu i ba , “ Age nigeya ga nuwamiu i sasapu ? Age nige ku aatena toto i neem tola ge i tuka awalaa nige i papabikela ?
41007019	Kaiwena nige i loloek atelaa , i loek tinelaa ge i nopasapu i noek wana kamwasaa . ” ( I ba ola o , inoke i ba aanan gegewel i bosowaina ta anan ya , nige nihi papabikela . )
41007020	Inoke i ba vevehe al i ba , “ Toto i tagilem gamagalau elala heiya te i pabikela .
41007021	Kaiwena nuwatu nanakina i neem awaa atelaa : loneganega , kaoma , taulol , ganawal ,
41007022	tomemek , pihigelgel paganina , kakawi , neganega pagapaganina , matamomoni , loloba , hanaha ge sigasiga .
41007023	Nak bolo ya gegewel hi neem atelaa , ge heliya te i papabikela ! ”
41007024	Yeisu awan o i eguluwan i na labena Taya . I na i tuk limi etega elana , nige nuwana gamagalau nihi atena te iya iyoho , yaa nige bosowaina ni mibunsumi .
41007025	Yova etegana natuna meluyovana yayaluwa bibikena i ulutuk elana , Yeisu wasana i hago inoke i na i loepwakoku Yeisu aenaa ,
41007026	ge i awanun elana yayaluwa bibikena ni patuna owaowani natuna elana . He yova ya nige Yudiya yovana i oola , hi aba labena Ponisiya , Siliya gamwanaa .
41007027	Yeisu i baek elana i ba , “ Tabam nige i sasapu ebo na labewa . Wawayau nihi anan houwan ga . Nige bosowaina wawayau aliya ta ahe ge ta alihinek wanuka elal . ” *
41007028	Yova o Yeisu anana i lahe i ba , “ Ibwe , Babala . Yaa wanuka bolo teibol gabulanaa wawayau wali an pwamumum hi aan , inoke bosowaina ya nu labeyau . ”
41007029	Inoke Yeisu i baek elana i ba , “ Wam baaba o kaiwena yayaluwa bibikena natum iyaka i eguluwan , inoke nu sikal ga wam limiya . ”
41007030	Yova i sikal wana limiya , inoke natuna i kite i kenuwa wana abakenuwa , ge yayaluwa bibikena iyaka i eguluwai .
41007031	Yeisu Taya ana labi i eguluwai , i nosolaa Saidoni , i na i lau Hoga Galili , ge i na labena Dekapolis elana .
41007032	Labena o elana gamagalau enuna tau etega hi pwatanik Yeisu elana , tau o tanana i tui ge baaba i ba hapuhapul-an . Inoke hi awanun Yeisu elana nimana ni teli tau o elana ge ni pwamolu .
41007033	Yeisu tau o i ahe boda hi eguluwagil hi na hi mimwaumwau , inoke nimana i teli tananaa , iya nimana i kuluve , ge tau o memena i pihikan .
41007034	Yeisu matana i lihin labulabumwa , i yana yoho ge i baek tau elana i ba , “ Epata , ” ana sapu heiya , “ U mwapwela ! ”
41007035	Sauga o elana , tau tanana i mwapwela , memena i palamwalamwaniu ge i baaba bubun .
41007036	Yeisu i ba lopwalil bahi gamagal etega wana wasa nihi pepek . Yaa bwagana i lolopwal , yaka abwe wana ginol wasana hi papalelu .
41007037	Bolo wasa hi hago nuwaliya hi ahe hoti , yaka hi ba , “ Bugul gegewena i ginol bubunil ! Totanatui tanaliya i pwela baaba hi hago , ge bolo analiya i nak hi baaba . ”
41008001	Sauga etega al boda bwabwatana hi nogogo Yeisu elana , aliya i mowasi , inoke Yeisu wana tohago i yogaagil hi nem elana ge i ba ,
41008002	“ Gamagalau ya nuwau i nakagil , kaiwena lan eton avalau ta mina , yaka nige aliya i gagan .
41008003	Ebo galegalebol ya na patunal nihi sikal wali awana , nasi nihi wesal kamwasaa , kaiwena enuna hi neem labena yayapona elal . ”
41008004	Wana tohago hi baek elana hi ba , “ Panuwa ya ana bwaga i gan , aanan ga ta aheya ge gamagalau ta paanil ? ”
41008005	Inoke Yeisu i nelil i ba , “ Beleid ehila eliyamiu ? ” Hi ba , “ Nimala panuna eluwa ya . ”
41008006	Yaka i ba boda hi misiyoan bilibiliya , inoke beleid seben i ahel ge i ba mulolu Yehoba elana , i pigebagebal-an inoke i pek wana tohago nihi guyauan gamagalau elal , inoke hi ginol ola .
41008007	Moti kekeisi enuna i gan al , inoke Yeisu i ahel , i ba mulolu Yehoba elana kaiweliya , ge i ba wana tohago hi guyauan al .
41008008	Gamagalau hi anan tineliya i kiya , inoke abwe wali an teli tohago hi abubun ge ana egowa nimala panuna eluwa hi ahe .
41008009	Bolo hi anan , bolau ali gewi tabam po tausan . Sauga i patunal hi egonan ,
41008010	iya i gaiha wagaa , inoke alonau wana tohago hi kuki hi na labena Dalmanuta .
41008011	Palisi enuna hi nem avaliya Yeisu hi awabalgig . Nuwaliya nihi labose inoke hi ba , “ Ginol yawiyawi etega u ginol , inoke naha atena tunahot wam gasisi i neem Yehoba elana . ”
41008012	Yeisu yayaluwana i pulowan inoke i yana yoho nabiyan ge i ba , “ Hauna kaiwena komiu heyan ya nuwamiu abapankite na ginol eliyamiu ? Ya ba tunahot eliyamiu , nige abapankite etega na giginol nuku kikite . ”
41008013	Inoke i eguluwagil , i sikal i na i ha wagaa , ge alonau wana tohago hi kuki hi alupanet hi na labi etega al .
41008014	Tohago hi nuluwan nige beleid etega hi aahe , beleid maisena ya te i miminaa wagaa .
41008015	Yeisu wana tohago i ba pagasisel i ba , “ Matamiu ni mwaun ge nuku matahikagimiu Palisi wali yis ge Helodi wana yis kaiwena . ”
41008016	Tohago hi peawaawota-agil hi ola , “ I ba ola o kaiwena nige beleid etega ta pwapwatanim . ”
41008017	Tohago wali peawaawota Yeisu i atena , inoke i baek elal i ba , “ Ga i ola ge ku peawaawota-agimiu beleid kaiwena ? Age nige nuwamiu i sasapu ge ku aatena ga ? Age wami abulilek i pulowan !
41008018	Age matamiu i gan , yaa nige ku kikite , tanamiu i gan , yaa nige ku hahago ! Ge nige ku nunuwahikan ?
41008019	Tab ku nuwahikan sauga beleid nimala panuna ya pigebagebal-an ge gamagalau paib tausan hi an , sauga o an teli ana egowa ehila ku ahe ? ” Tohago hi ba , “ Elulutega eluwa . ”
41008020	Yaka i ba , “ Ge sauga al beleid nimala panuna eluwa ya pigebagebal-an , gamagalau ali gewi po tausan kaiweliya , sauga o an teli ana egowa ehila al ku ahe ? ” Tohago hi ba , “ Nimala panuna eluwa . ”
41008021	Yaka Yeisu i baek elal i ba , “ He , age nigeya ga nuwamiu i sasapu ? ”
41008022	Yeisu alonau ge wana tohago hi na hi tan Betesaida , inoke gamagalau enuna tomatakai etega hi en pwatanim ge hi awanun Yeisu nimana ni teli elana .
41008023	Yeisu tomatakai nimana i ahe ge i en hi tagil hi na panuwa bebenaa . Yaka Yeisu tomatakai matana i kuluve ge nimana i teli elana , inoke i neli i ba , “ Tab bugul etega u kite ? ”
41008024	Tomatakai matana i lihin yaka i ba , “ E , gamagalau ya kitel , yaa ali awa i ola ebwakil hi nononawanawa . ”
41008025	Yeisu nimana i teli al tomatakai matanaa , inoke matana i mwapwela , nige al i kakai , ge bugul gegewena i kite bubun .
41008026	Yeisu tau o i patuna i egon i ba , “ Bahi nu tutuk sikal panuwa ya elana , yaa nu egon nu na wam awana . ”
41008027	Inoke Yeisu alonau ge wana tohago hi egon hi na Sisaliya Pilipai awanina ona elal . Hi nawanawa kamwasaa inoke i nelil i ba , “ Gamagalau hi ba tage henala nau ? ”
41008028	Anana hi lahe hi ba , “ Enuna hi ba owa Diyon Tobabitaiso , enuna hi ba owa Ilaitiya , ge enuna al hi ba owa palopitau ona etega . ”
41008029	Inoke i ba , “ Yaa komiu , ku ba tage henala nau ? ” Pita anana i lahe i ba , “ Owa Mesaiya . ”
41008030	Inoke Yeisu wana tohago i ba pagasisel bahi gamagal etega wana wasa nihi pepek iya henala .
41008031	Yaka Yeisu i telipuna i pamasal wana tohago elal i ba , “ Gamagal Natuna abwe palopalomwan gegewena ni pwawa , inoke Yudiya wali tohouwa , topowon bwabwatal ge Logugui ana topankite abwe nihi towani ge nihi lopaaliga , inoke lan eton ni mowasi abwe ni lut al . ”
41008032	Baaba ya i pwamwananal bubun elal . Inoke Pita Yeisu i ahe hi na hi mihuwala , ge i telipuna i lopwali baaba o bahi ni babaunan .
41008033	Yaka Yeisu i tagena sikal , matana i nok wana tohago elal , ge Pita i yana lalaan i ba , “ Seitani , u miegon eliyau ! Wam nuwatu nige i nonoek Yehoba wana kamwasaa , i noek gamagalau wali nuwatu elana . ”
41008034	Inoke Yeisu boda avaliyau ge wana tohago i yogaagil hi nok elana ge i ba , “ Ebo etega nuwana ni toulilau , totona wana waisi ni towani , ana kolos ni ahe ni kalivai , * ge ni toulilau .
41008035	Kaiwena henala ebo nuwana totona yawalina ni pwamwal , nasi ni payaomal , yaa henala ebo yawalina ni payaomal nau kaiweu ge wasa waiwaisana kaiwena , he nasi yawalina ni pwamwal .
41008036	Hauna ana waisi ebo gamagal etega panayawi gegewena ni ahe ni logugui-an , yaa yawalina ni payaomal ?
41008037	He nige bugul etega bosowaina ni ahe ge yawalina ni pwamola pasikal .
41008038	Ebo gamagal etega ni puluwawi-agau ge no baaba ni puluwawi-an heyan golu gegetogal ge sisigal ya gamwaliyaa , he nau Gamagal Natuna na puluwawi-an , sauga ebo na sikalim alou Nam wana wasawasa ge alowau aneloseyau bwabwalel . ”
41009001	Inoke Yeisu i baek elal i ba , “ Ya ba tunahot eliyamiu , gamagalau enuna heliya iyahe te Yehoba wana abalogugui nihi kite ga ni nem alona ge wana gasisi , mulaa abwe nihi yaomal . ”
41009002	Lan esiwa ( 6 ) i mowasi , inoke Yeisu tohago eton i ahel , Pita , Yemesa ge Diyon , alonau hi na hi ha oya mihahaina etega elana , hi na heliya ya hi mimwaumwau . Inoke ana awa gegetogana i masal mataliyaa .
41009003	Ana kaliko i wawakeki hot ge i namanamal , kaliko bolo gamagalau panayawi hi ulil nige etega wana wawakeki i oola .
41009004	Inoke tohago eton hi kite Ilaitiya ge Mosese hi masal , avaliya Yeisu hi liwaliwan .
41009005	Yaka Pita i baek Yeisu elana i ba , “ Topankite , i waisi te kila iyahe ee . Inoke gonu eton naha ginolil , etegana owa , etegana Mosese , ge etegana Ilaitiya . ”
41009006	He Pita alonau ge alonau hi lovakun , inoke nuwana i gewagewa ge i baaba ya .
41009007	Inoke yaluyalu i nem i pahabobol , ge anan etega i neem yaluyaluwa i ba , “ Toto ya natu nunuwanina hot . Nuku laegan elana . ”
41009008	Sauga o tohago mataliya hi lipwapwati , yaa nige gamagal etega al hi kikite , Yeisu maisena ya .
41009009	Sauga hi laulau oyaa , inoke Yeisu i baek tohago elal i ba , “ Bahi gamagal etega wana wasa nuku pepek bugul toto ku kikite kaiwena , ana siga Gamagal Natuna ni lutem yaomala . ”
41009010	Hi ginol ola Yeisu wana baaba , yaa totoliya ya hi peliwaliwan-agil hi ba , “ Ana sapu ga i ola ge lutem yaomala bana i baaba ? ”
41009011	Inoke hi nel Yeisu elana hi ba , “ Hauna kaiwena Logugui ana topankite hi ba tage Ilaitiya ni nem houwa , mulaa abwe Mesaiya ni nem ? ”
41009012	Yeisu tohago analiya i lahe i ba , “ Tunahot Ilaitiya ni nem houwa , inoke bugul gegewena ni abubun . Yaa hauna kaiwena Buki Bwabwalena i ba Gamagal Natuna lomwan ni pwawa ge nihi pihigelgel-an ?
41009013	Yaa na ba eliyamiu , Ilaitiya iyaka i nem haba ge gamagalau bugul bolo hi nuwatuan hi ginol ya eliyana , i ola to Buki Bwabwalena i baunan iya kaiwena . ”
41009014	Yeisu alonau ge wana tohago ali toto eton hi sikal hi na avaliyau elal , inoke hi kite boda bwabwatana tohago hi mipainan-agil , ge avaliyau Logugui ana topankite hi awaawabalgig .
41009015	Sauga gamagalau gegewel Yeisu hi kite , ateliya i you ge hi patalelu hi na elana avaliya hi mulolu .
41009016	Yeisu i nelil i ba , “ Alomiyau Logugui ana topankite hauna gun ku awabalgigi ? ”
41009017	Tau etega iyoho boda gamwanaa , Yeisu anana i lahe i ba , “ Topankite , natu ya pwatanim eliyam , kaiwena yayaluwa bibikena i ulutuk elana ge nige bosowaina ni baaba .
41009018	Sauga ebo yayaluwa bibikena wana gasisi ni lut elana , ni gaisogu bilibiliya , polu ni tagil awanaa , ni alavekilal ge ni toelolol . Ya baek wam tohago elal tage yayaluwa nihi patuna owaowani , yaa nige bosowailiya . ”
41009019	Yaka Yeisu i ba , “ Ee komiu , nige wami abulilek i gagan ! Iyaka sauga i yapu te alowau komiu ta miminaa e ! Paehila na palahikan kaiwemiu ? Geman ya ku pwatanim elau . ”
41009020	Yaka geman hi pwatanim elana . Sauga yayaluwa bibikena Yeisu i kite , yaka geman i pakikiuha al , inoke i gaisogu bilibiliya , i kul nawanawa ge polu i tagil awanaa .
41009021	Yeisu i nel geman tamana elana i ba , “ Hauna sauga kasiyebwa ya i telipuna elana ? ” Tamana i ba , “ Vetiga kekeisina te kasiyebwa ya i masal .
41009022	Sauga hi gewi ni tagapasoguek ginahaa o ebo wewela , ge tage ni aliga . Ebo bosowaim , inoke nu atilomwan-agima ge nu labema . ”
41009023	Yeisu i ba , “ Ga i ola ge u ba , ‘ Ebo bosowaim ? ’ Henala ebo ni abulilek , Yehoba i bosowaina bugul gegewena ni ginol elana . ”
41009024	Etimwawa geman tamana i ba masal , “ Ya abulilek . Yaa nige no abulilek i bwabwata , inoke nu labeyau ge ni bwata . ”
41009025	Sauga Yeisu i kite boda iyoho hi nenemnem elal , inoke i baek yayaluwa bibikena elana i ba , “ Yayaluwa toto gamagalau tanaliya u papatui ge nige bosowailiya nihi baaba , na baewa elam , u ulutagil geman elana , ge bahi nu tutuk sikal al elana ! ”
41009026	Yaka yayaluwa bibikena i loi ge geman i pakikiuha nabiyan , inoke i ulutagil elana . He geman ana awa i ola hot toaliga ali awa , inoke gamagalau hi ba , “ Iyaka i aliga . ”
41009027	Yaa Yeisu i aheya nimanaa ge i kukupalut , inoke i talmilil .
41009028	Sauga Yeisu i na i tuk limi gamwanaa , inoke wana tohago , heliya ya , hi neli hi ba , “ Hauna kaiwena ama nige bosowaima naha ba ge yayaluwa bibikena ni tagil ? ”
41009029	Yeisu analiya i lahe i ba , “ Yayaluwa bibikena ololana o nige bosowaina ta ba ni tagil , iyai te ebo ta awaawanun . ”
41009030	Panuwa o hi eguluwai ge hi nosolaa labi Galili gamwanaa . Yeisu nige nuwana gamagalau nihi atena te alonau ge wana tohago ga hi noek ,
41009031	kaiwena iya nuwana ni panpankiti wana tohago elal . I baek elal i ba , “ Gamagal Natuna kelaubwa abwe nihi talamwan gamagalau nimaliyaa , inoke nihi lopaaliga ge lan etonina elana abwe ni lut al . ”
41009032	He tohago nige nuwaliya i sasapu Yeisu wana baaba o kaiwena , yaa hi puluwawi yaka nige hi neneli elana .
41009033	Yeisu alonau ge wana tohago hi na hi vin Kapeniyama . Sauga hi na hi tuk limiya , yaka wana tohago i nelil i ba , “ Hauna ku awabalgigi kamwasaa ? ”
41009034	Hi mikekei nige analiya i gagan , kaiwena kamwasa elana hi peawaawabalgig te henala eba gamwaliyaa alana i bwata .
41009035	Yeisu i misiyo , yaka wana tohago elulutega eluwa i yogaagil hi nok elana ge i ba , “ Henala ebo nuwana ni tabwa tohouwa , totona ni teli lowan ni mimula hot , ge ni tabwa totuwalali alonau gegewel elal . ”
41009036	Inoke Yeisu wawaya kekeisi etega i ahe i patalmilil gamwaliyaa ge nimana i latapainan wawaya henuwaninaa . Inoke i baek elal i ba ,
41009037	“ Henala ebo alau elana wawaya kekeisi etegana ololana ya ni yoga pahe , he iya i yoga paheyau ; ge henala ebo ni yoga paheyau , nige tage nau ya te i yoga paheyau , yaa i yoga pahe al toto i patunau . ”
41009038	Diyon i baek Yeisu elana i ba , “ Topankite , tau etega ha kite alam elana yayaluwa bibikena i patuna owaowa-agil , inoke ha lopwali bahi ni giginol al , kaiwena iya nige avala etega i oola . ”
41009039	Yeisu i ba , “ Bahi nuku lolopwali . Nige bosowaina gamagal etega alau elana ginol yawiyawi ni ginol ge sauga o baaba nanakina al ni baunan kaiweu .
41009040	Kaiwena henala ebo nige i pipihigelgel elala , he iya avala .
41009041	Ya ba tunahot eliyamiu , henala ebo wewel ni wage ni pewa nuku im kaiwena komiu Keliso wana tohago , he molana nige ni kakala abwe ni ahe .
41009042	“ Ebo pat pupulowanina ta gimwan gamagal mwamwalinaa ge ta alipalo hogaa , he lahi o nige i bwabwata hot . Yaa Yehoba lahi bwabwatana hot ni pek gamagal elana , henala ebo tokekeisi etegana toto i abulilem elau ni pagegi ge ni sogu , tokekeisi ololana wawaya ya .
41009043	Ebo nimwam etega ni pagegewa , nu gotomwa yoho . I waisi te nimwam etega nige ni gagan ge yawal hot nu pwawa , bahi nimwam labui nu uulutuk Gehena elana , ginaha toto nige sauga etega ni totobolu . *
41009045	Ge ebo aem etega ni pagegewa , nu gotomwa yoho . I waisi te aem etega nige ni gagan ge yawal hot nu pwawa , bahi aem labui nihi aalitukagiwa Gehena elana . †
41009047	Ebo matam etega ni pagegewa , nu bwana yoho . I waisi te matam maisena ge nu ulutuk Yehoba wana abalogugui elana . Yaa bahi matam labuina ni miminaa , ebo ni pagegewa ge matam labui nihi alitukagiwa Gehena elana .
41009048	He panuwa o elana , kinol bolo gamagalau hi anil nige nihi aaliga , ge ginaha nige ni totobolu .
41009049	“ He no tohago gegewel labose pupulowanil bolo amnaliya i ola ginaha nihi pwawa , inoke eliyana nihi matuwa .
41009050	“ Hoga bugul waiwaisana , yaa ebo ana gasisi ge amnana ni so , nige bosowaina ta pahogahoga al . Ebo alan bwabwatana kaiwena nuku awabalgig , inoke komiu ku ola hoga toto hohogana iyaka i so . Bahi nuku oola , yaa alomiyau ge alomiyau nuku mibubun . ”
41010001	Yeisu panuwa o i eguluwai i na Yudiya wali labi elana ge abwe wewel Yolidani i kalapanet-an i na labena leunati . Yaka boda bwabwatana al hi nok elana ge i panpankiti elal i ola sauga gegewena i giginol .
41010002	Palisi enuna hi nok elana tage nihi labose , inoke hi neli hi ba , “ Tab wala logugui i talam bosowaina tau lagona ni towani ? ”
41010003	Yeisu analiya i lahe i ba , “ Mosese logugui i pewa , ga i ba ola ? ”
41010004	Hi ba , “ Mosese wana logugui i talam tau towa ana pepa ni ginol ni pek yova elana , inoke abwe ni patuna ge ni egon . ”
41010005	Yeisu i ba , “ Kaiwena atemiu i gasisi ge ami papaatena i esowal hot , heiya te kaiwena Mosese logugui ya i leli kaiwemiu .
41010006	Yaa nuku nuwahikan te abatelipuna elana , sauga Yehoba panayawi ge labulabum i ginol , inoke ‘ gamagal i ginolil tau ge yova . ’
41010007	‘ Heiya te kaiwena tau tamana ge hinana ni miluwagil ni na alona ge lagona nihi mipamaisena ,
41010008	inoke ali toto labui nihi ola tuwan maisena . ’ Inoke heliya nige al hi oola eluwa , yaa heliya hi ola maisena .
41010009	Yehoba iyaka i tubwel toyawel , he bahi gamagal etega ni teteli pwamwaumwau-agil . ”
41010010	Sauga hi sikal limiya , inoke wana tohago hi neli bugul ya kaiwena .
41010011	Yeisu analiya i lahe i ba , “ Ebo tau etega lagona ni towani ge yova getoga ni alolonan , iya i ganawal .
41010012	I ola al , ebo yova etega lagona ni towani ge tau getoga ni alolonan , yova o i ganawal . ”
41010013	Gamagalau enuna wawayau hi pwatanik Yeisu elana tage nimana ni teli tuwaliyaa ge ni awanun kaiweliya , yaa wana tohago gamagalau hi haveyanagil .
41010014	Sauga Yeisu i kitel , inoke i huga ge i baek elal i ba , “ Wawayau ku talamwagil nihi nem elau , bahi nuku lolopwalil , kaiwena Yehoba wana abalogugui i minaa ololana o eliyalil .
41010015	Ya ba tunahot eliyamiu , ebo gamagal etega Yehoba wana abalogugui nige ni yayaliyaya-an ge ni aahe ni oola wawayau kekeisi wali ahe , he iya nige ni uulutuk elana . ”
41010016	Yaka Yeisu wawayau i ahel , i telel aenaa , nimana i teli tuwaliyaa ge i awanun Yehoba ni muloluagil .
41010017	Sauga Yeisu i telipuna i nawanawa , inoke tau etega i patalelu nok elana i loepwakoku awonaa ge i neli i ba , “ Topankite waiwaisana , hauna na ginol ge yawal mihomihotina na pwawa ? ”
41010018	Yeisu i baek elana i ba , “ Hauna kaiwena u awa wawaisi-agau ? Nige towaisi etega i gagan , Yehoba maisena ya te towaisi .
41010019	He u atena ya te logugui i ba , ‘ Bahi taulol , bahi ganawal , bahi kaoma , bahi woliwoli kakawi , bahi nuwa govigovi , tamwam ge hinam nu awatauwagil . ’ ”
41010020	Yaka tau o i ba , “ Topankite , no sauga wawaya ana siga sauga ya , logugui bolo ya gegewel iyaka ya paolaolaek . ”
41010021	Yeisu matana i lihikan tau elana alona ge wana nunuwana , yaka i ba , “ Bugul maisena ya te nige u giginol . U na wam gogomwau gegewel u paliagil , manina nu pek togulagula elal , inoke abwe nu gogomwau labulabumwa . He u nem u toulilau . ”
41010022	Baaba o kaiwena tau ana awa i ul , inoke i egon alona ge wana nuwanak , kaiwena iya togogomwau .
41010023	Yeisu matana i lipwapwati wana tohago elal ge i ba , “ Togogomwau wali ulutuk i pulowan nabi Yehoba wana abalogugui elana ! ”
41010024	Tohago ateliya i you Yeisu wana baaba kaiwena . Yaka i ba vevehe al i ba , “ Natuwau , Yehoba wana abalogugui ana uluulutuk i pulowan !
41010025	He i pulowan te bwasumu toto kamel ni ulusola evaneya golinaa , i ola al i pulowan hot tologogomwau wali ulutuk Yehoba wana abalogugui elana . ”
41010026	Baaba o kaiwena yaka abwe tohago ateliya i you nabi , inoke hi penelnel-agil hi ba , “ Ebo i ola o , he henala ge bosowaina ni mwal ? ”
41010027	Yeisu matana i lihikan elal ge i ba , “ Bugul ya gamagalau nige bosowailiya , yaa Yehoba iya bosowaina gamagalau ni pwamwalil . Yehoba bugul gegewena i bosowaina . ”
41010028	Yaka Pita i baek elana i ba , “ Yaa ga i ola ama ? Wama bugul gegewena iyaka ha eguluwagil , inoke ha nem ge ha touliliwa . ”
41010029	Yeisu Pita anana i lahe i ba , “ Ya ba tunahot eliyamiu , henala ebo wana limi , ebo talinau , ebo nunau , ebo hinana ge tamana , ebo natunau o ebo wana bilibili ni eguluwagil alau kaiwena ge wasa waiwaisana kaiwena ,
41010030	he sauga ya elana ni ahe pwabwaya al pwatanaa . Wana limi nihi gewi , ge talinau , nunau , hinanau , natunau ge bilibili nihi gewi ni pwawal-ge i ola al palopalomwan ni pwawa . Ge sauga mulaa yawalina mihomihotina ni pwawa .
41010031	Yaa bolo sauga ya hi mihouwa , hi gewi abwe nihi mimula , ge bolo sauga ya hi mimula hi gewi abwe nihi mihouwa . ”
41010032	Yeisu alonau ge wana tohago i houwaagil hi nanawa Yelusalema kaiwena . Tohago ateliya i bwanabwana , i ola al bolo hi nawaa eliyaa hi lovakun . Inoke wana tohago ali toto elulutega eluwa i ahel al hi na hi mimwaumwau , ge wali wasa i pek hauna gun abwe ni gan elana .
41010033	I baek elal i ba , “ Iyaka ta nanawa Yelusalema kaiwena , inoke Gamagal Natuna abwe nihi talamwan topowon bwabwatal ge Logugui ana topankite nimaliyaa . Iya nihi logugui-an ni yaomal ge nihi teli bolo nige Yudiya i oola nimaliyaa .
41010034	Inoke heliya nihi lamwa tunatuna-an , nihi lokukuluvi-an , nihi nibinibihan ge nihi lopaaliga . Lan etonina elana abwe ni lutem yaomala . ”
41010035	Sebedi natunau , Yemesa ge Diyon , hi nok hi na Yeisu elana hi ba , “ Topankite , nuwama nu ginol ni ola wama nuwatu . ”
41010036	Yeisu i nelil i ba , “ Hauna nuwamiu na ginol kaiwemiu ? ”
41010037	Anana hi lahe hi ba , “ Sauga ebo nu misiyowa wam wasawasa ge wam abalogugui elana , nu talam ama toto eluwa , etegana ni misiyowa labem awomwa ge etegana ni misiyowa gegebamwa . ”
41010038	Yeisu i ba , “ Nige ku aatena hauna gun ku awanuni . Bosowaimiu ya lomwan ana kom toto abwe na imwa , nuku imwa ? Ge babitaiso toto abwe na babitaisowa , * bosowaimiu ya nuku babitaisowa ? ”
41010039	Yemesa ge talina hi ba , “ Ibwe . Bosowaima ya . ” Inoke Yeisu i ba , “ Tunahot , kom toto na imwa , komiu abwe nuku imwa , ge babitaiso toto na babitaisowa , komiu abwe nuku babitaisowa .
41010040	Yaa nige bosowaiu na ba henala ni misiyowa labeu awowa ge henala ni misiyowa gegebawa . Abamina bolo ya Yehoba i lovivina-an bolo i hilel ya te kaiweliya . ”
41010041	Sauga tohago bolo ali toto elulutega wasa ya hi hago , yaka ateliya i elolol Yemesa ge Diyon eliyalil .
41010042	Yaka Yeisu tohago i yoga gogonil hi nok elana ge i ba , “ Ku atena , bolo Yehoba nige hi aabulilek-an , wali tologuguiyau hi logugui-agil ge wali tohouwa wali logugui hi pagasisi avaliyau elal .
41010043	Yaa komiu bahi nuku oola . Henala ebo nuwana alana ni bwata gamwamiwa , ni tabwa wami totuwalali .
41010044	Ge henala ebo nuwana ni ola tohouwa , ni tabwa alonau gegewel wali elopapatuna .
41010045	He bwagana nau Gamagal Natuna , ya nem nige tage nuku tuwalali eliyau , yaa ya nem na totuwalali eliyamiu , ge yawaliu na talamwan gamagalau nihi gewi na pwamola pasikalil . ”
41010046	Yeisu alonau ge wana tohago iyaka hi na hi vin Yeliko . Ge sauga avaliyau ge boda bwabwatana wali sauga egon elana , tomatakai etega alana Batimeyo , ( ana sapu heiya Timeyo natuna ) , i misiyowa kamwasa bebenaa ge i loloawaawanun gamagalau elal .
41010047	Sauga wasa i hago Yeisu gagama Nasaleta i nanawa , inoke i yoga i ba , “ Yeisu , Deibid Tubuna , u atilomwan-agau ! ”
41010048	Gamagalau hi gewi hi ba lalaan ge hi baek elana tage ni mikekei , yaa abwe i yoga balbalgig i ba , “ Deibid Tubuna , u atilomwan-agau ! ”
41010049	Yeisu i notalmilil , yaka i ba , “ Ku yogaan ni nem . ” Yaka gamagalau hi yoga tomatakai elana hi ba , “ U yaliyaya ! U lut u nem ! Yeisu i yogaagiwa ! ”
41010050	Ana kaliko babalona i aliteli , yaka i lut supeni i nok i na Yeisu elana .
41010051	Yeisu tomatakai i neli i ba , “ Hauna gun nuwam na ginol kaiwem ? ” Tomatakai i ba , “ Topankite , nuwau matau ni waisi . ”
41010052	Inoke Yeisu i ba , “ U egon , wam abulilek iyaka i pwamolowa . ” Sauga o elana Batimeyo matana i waisi ge Yeisu i toulil .
41011001	Yeisu alonau ge wana tohago Yelusalema hi nopakelakelaubwa hi vin Betepage ge Bedani Oya Olibe awanina elal , inoke wana tohago eluwa i patunal nihi houwa .
41011002	I baek elal i ba , “ Nuku nok nuku na awan toto maninilaa , ge sauga nuku ulutuk , donki natuna etega iyahe tei nuku kite hi am hikan , nige sauga etega gamagal etega i heheya pwatanaa . Nuku leke inoke nuku pwatanim te .
41011003	Ebo gamagal etega ni nelimiu ni ba , ‘ Hauna kaiwena donki natuna ku leleke ei ? ’ nuku baek elana nuku ba , ‘ Babala nuwana , yaa nige sauga ni yayapu inoke naha pasikalim al . ’ ”
41011004	Yaka tohago hi nok hi na panuwaa , ge donki natuna hi pwawa hi am hikana limi etega ana nog bebenaa , i talmilila kamwasaa . Sauga hi lekaleka ,
41011005	gamagalau bolo hi taltalmilila o hi nel elal hi ba , “ Hauna kaiwena ge donki natuna ku leleke ei ? ”
41011006	Analiya hi lahe i ola hauna Yeisu i baunan eliyalil , inoke gamagalau hi talam ge tohago donki hi ahe hi egon .
41011007	Sauga hi pwatanik Yeisu elana , ali kaliko hi yao eputetenaa , inoke Yeisu i yawaha i misiyo .
41011008	Gamagalau hi gewi ali kaliko hi yao kamwasaa , yaka enuna al hi na kamwasa bebenaa , vegavega ginebi lamwana hi govel ge hi yao kamwasaa .
41011009	Inoke bolo hi nohouwa Yeisu awonaa ge bolo hi nawaa enaa hi yoga hi ba , “ Hosana ! Babala ta tobalan ! ” “ Yehoba ni ba muloluan , iya i nem Babala alana elana ! ”
41011010	“ Yehoba ni ba muloluan , iya i nem wala Kin , tubula Deibid wana abalogugui i pwatanim ! ” “ Hosana ! Yehoba mihahaina hot ta tobalan ! ”
41011011	Yeisu i na i vin Yelusalema , inoke i na i tuk Limi Bwabwalena elana . Matana i lipwapwati bugul gegewena i kitel , yaa iyaka i kokoyavi , inoke alonau wana tohago elulutega eluwa Yelusalema hi eguluwai hi na Bedani .
41011012	Hi kenu lan i gan , yaka Bedani hi eguluwai hi nanawa Yelusalema kaiwena , inoke Yeisu i galebu .
41011013	Poga * etega i kitek laha , lamwana iyaka i siun ge i noyan , inoke i nok i na ni kite tab enona i gan . Sauga i nok i na gegelinaa , i kite nige enona i gagan , lamwana ya , kaiwena nigeya ga poga wali sauga enon i oola .
41011014	Yaka i baek ebwakil elana i ba , “ Nige al gamagal etega enom ni kikibwa ge ni aan . ” Inoke wana tohago baaba o hi hago .
41011015	Sauga Yeisu i vin Yelusalema , i na i ulutuk Limi Bwabwalena elana , inoke bolo hi lolopalipali ge bolo hi lolopwapwamola i takel . Mani ana tololopatal wali teibol ge bolo bunibuni hi palipali wali abamisiyo i yoho pwapwati ,
41011016	ge gamagalau i lopwalil bahi wali bugubugul nihi kakaval solaa Limi Bwabwalena ana gana gamwanaa .
41011017	Inoke i panpankiti gamagalau elal i ba , “ Buki Bwabwalena elana Yehoba wana baaba hi lelelian i ba , ‘ No limi alana nuku tun tapwalolo limena gamagalau gegewel kaiweliya , ’ yaa komiu ku ginol i ola tokaoma wali gol . ”
41011018	Topowon bwabwatal ge Logugui ana topankite wasa ya hi hago , inoke kamwasa hi loya ga nihi ola ge Yeisu nihi lopaaliga , kaiwena boda nuwaliya i noek wana panpankiti elana inoke topowon bwabwatal Yeisu hi lovakunan .
41011019	Sauga bulin i gan , inoke Yeisu alonau ge wana tohago Yelusalema hi eguluwai .
41011020	Lan i gan mweluluga , Yeisu alonau ge wana tohago hi nanawa kamwasaa Yelusalema kaiwena , inoke poga hi kite iyaka i aliga , aliga i telipunaa lamwanaa i na i lau ewahilina elana .
41011021	Pita Yeisu wana baaba i nuwahikan , inoke i baek elana i ba , “ Topankite , matam i nok ! Nolu ebwakil o u ba nuwamutan , he iyaka i aliga ge lamwana i yakiwa . ”
41011022	Yeisu Pita anana i lahe i ba , “ Yehoba nu abulilek-an .
41011023	Ya ba tunahot eliyamiu , ebo gamagal etega ni baek oya ya elana ni ba , ‘ U egon u na totom u aliyohiwa hogaa ’ ge ebo ni abulilek te nasi ni masal ni ola wana baaba ge ebo nige ni nunuwa lalabui , inoke oya ni miegon .
41011024	He na baewa eliyamiu , hauna gun ebo nuku awanuni Yehoba elana , nuku abulilek te iyaka ku pwawa , inoke Yehoba ni pewa eliyamiu .
41011025	Ge sauga ebo nuku awaawanun ge alomiu etega wana gegi eliyamiu nuku nuwatu , he nuku nuwayoho , inoke Tamamiu labulabumwa wami gegi ni nuwayoho .
41011026	Yaa ebo alomiyau wali gegi nige nuku nunuwayoho , he Tamamiu labulabumwa wami gegi nige ni nunuwayoho . ” †
41011027	Yeisu alonau ge wana tohago hi na hi vin al Yelusalema , inoke sauga i nawanawa Limi Bwabwalena ana gana gamwanaa , yaka topowon bwabwatal avaliyau Logugui ana topankite ge panuwa ana tonowakau hi na elana ,
41011028	ge hi neli hi ba , “ Hauna logugui wana gasisi elana ge bugul bolo ya u awaawaginol ? Henala wam gasisi i pewa ? ”
41011029	Yeisu analiya i lahe i ba , “ Nel etega ga na neli eliyamiu . Ebo nuku lahe , inoke abwe na baunan eliyamiu henala wana logugui elana ge bugul bolo ya ya awaawaginol .
41011030	He ku ba ga na hago ! Diyon Tobabitaiso gamagalau i pababitaisol . Logugui o ga i neem ? Yehoba elana , o ebo gamagalau elal ? ”
41011031	Yaka hi peliwaliwan-agil hi ba , “ Ebo ta ba , ‘ Logugui o i neem Yehoba elana , ’ inoke nasi ni ba , ‘ He hauna kaiwena ge Diyon nige ku aabulilek-an ? ’
41011032	Yaa ebo ta ba , ‘ Logugui o i neem gamagalau elal ’ , he boda ta lovakunagil , kaiwena hi abulilek te tunahot Diyon iya palopita . ”
41011033	Inoke Yeisu anana hi lahe hi ba , “ Nige ha aatena . ” Yaka i ba , “ Ebo nigeya , he nau al ge nige na babaunan te henala wana logugui elana ge bugul bolo ya ya awaawaginol . ”
41012001	Yaka Yeisu i liwan gohalibe elal i ba , “ Tau etega wana eyowa i ginol , oine i luwan , i gane painan , gol etega i ken oine enona ana abapotipoti suina kaiwena , ge gonu i tal eyowa ana tomatahikan wali abaminamina . I ginol haba , inoke abwe i pek gamagalau enuna elal ge nihi patuwalali , yaka iya i egon i na panuwa getoga .
41012002	Sauga oine enona i matuwa , inoke toneyowa wana totuwalali etega i patuna i na tomatahikan elal tage oine enona enuna ni ahe elal ge ni pwatanik elana .
41012003	Yaa tomatahikan totuwalali o hi lib , hi nibinibihan ge hi patuna pasikal ninimana ya .
41012004	Wana totuwalali etega al i patuna elal , inoke tau o kaununa hi lol ge hi tagapanapanak-an .
41012005	Yaka totuwalali etegana al i patuna , ge iya hi tagapaaliga . Abwe hi gewi al i patunal hi nok , yaka enuna hi nibinibihagil ge enuna hi tagapaaligal .
41012006	“ Totuwalali gegewel iyaka i patunal haba , he natuna maisena ya te iyoho i mina ge tage abwe ni patuna , natuna toto i nunuwana-an . Inoke iya mowamowasena abwe i patuna elal ge i ba , ‘ Natu nasi nihi awatauwan . ’
41012007	“ Yaa sauga tomatahikan hi kite , inoke hi pebaaba-agil hi ba , ‘ Toneyowa natuna te , toto tage abwe eyowa ni ahe tamana wana yaomal enaa . Ku nem ta tagapaaliga , inoke eyowa ni minem eliyala . ’
41012008	Yaka hi na hi lib , hi tagapaaliga , ge tuwana hi alitagil-an eyowa ana gana tolinaa . ”
41012009	Inoke Yeisu i nel i ba , “ He toneyowa nasi ga ni ginol ola tomatahikan elal ? Iya ni nem tomatahikan ni tagapaaligal , inoke oine ana eyowa ni guyauan gamagalau getogal elal .
41012010	Tab Buki Bwabwalena ku vasili , toto ana baaba i ba ola ya : ‘ Pat toto totaltal hi awa nanakan ge hi towani , Yehoba iyaka i ahe limi ana kokola gasigasisena i ginoliya .
41012011	Toto ya Babala wana ginol , ana kite abanuwa ahi hot . ’ ”
41012012	Inoke Yudiya wali tohouwa kamwasa hi loya ge Yeisu nihi lib ge nihi yowan , kaiwena hi atena ba gohalibe ya Yeisu i liwanan ana nuwatu i noek heliya eliyalil . Yaa hi lovakun boda kaiweliya inoke hi eguluwai ge hi egonan .
41012013	Inoke abwe Palisi enuna , avaliyau ge gamagalau enuna bolo nunuwaliya Helodi wana logugui , hi patunal hi na Yeisu elana tage nihi neli ge ana woliwoli etega nihi aheya wana baaba elana .
41012014	Yaka hi na hi ba , “ Topankite , ha atena owa tobaaba tunahot . Nige gamagal etega u lolovakun-an , kaiwena nige u gogoluek gamagalau wali siba ana miha elana , yaa wam panpankiti Yehoba wana kamwasa kaiwena i sapu hot . He Mosese i ba mani naha pek Yehoba elana . I waisi ya takis naha pwamola Sisa elana o age bahiwa ?
41012015	Naha pwamola o age bahi naha pwapwamola ? ” Yaa wali kakawi Yeisu i atena , inoke i baek elal i ba , “ Hauna kaiwena ku laboseyau tage nuku paonau ? Mani silba etega ku pwatanim na kite . ”
41012016	Yaka etega hi ahe hi pek elana i kite , inoke i nelil i ba , “ Henala kakanununa ya ? Ge henala alana hi leli mani ya tuwanaa ? ” Anana hi lahe hi ba , “ Sisa . ”
41012017	Inoke Yeisu i baek elal i ba , “ Toto Sisa kaiwena nuku pek Sisa elana , ge toto Yehoba kaiwena nuku pek Yehoba elana . ” Inoke nuwaliya hi ahe Yeisu wana baaba kaiwena .
41012018	Yaka Sadiusi enuna hi na Yeisu elana . He Sadiusi nige wali abulilek i oola tage toyaomal nihi lut , inoke Yeisu hi neli hi ba ,
41012019	“ Topankite , Mosese logugui i lelelian kaiwela i ba , ‘ Ebo tau etega ni alolon , nige natunau ge ni aliga , inoke abuabulina talina ni alolonan ge ebo natuliyau ni gan , heliya nihi tabwa toto i alaliga natunau . ’
41012020	Sauga etega tau etega alonau talinau , ali gewi seben . Gamaun i alolon , nige natuna i gagan , inoke i aliga .
41012021	Yaka loenaa alona ge abuabul hi alolon , iya al ge nige natuna i gagan , inoke i aliga al . Pagan maisena o i gan al etonina elana ,
41012022	ge i ola ya to gegewel elal . Ali toto seben abuabul o hi alolonan , nige natuliyau i gagan , yaka hi aliga haba . Inoke mowamowasena abwe yova al i aliga .
41012023	Ebo tunahot toyaomal abwe nihi lut , he lut enaa ali toto seben gamwaliyaa henala ge yova o lagona hot ? Kaiwena gegewel hi alolonan ga . ”
41012024	Yeisu analiya i lahe i ba , “ Ku gegi hot , kaiwena Buki Bwabwalena ana baaba ge Yehoba wana gasisi nige ku aatena .
