41012025	Sauga ebo toyaomal nihi lut , nihi ola aneloseyau labulabumwa , nige nihi aalolon .
41012026	Yaa toyaomal wali lut bana — age ginaha i tau ebwakil lamwanaa liwanina nige ga ku vavasili Mosese wana buki elana ? Liwan ya i pamasal Yehoba i baek Mosese elana i ba , ‘ Sauga ya nau Abalahama , Aisake ge Yakobo wali Yabowaine . ’
41012027	Yehoba i ba ola o , inoke ta atena gamagalau ya yawaliliya nige i yayaomal hot . Yehoba iya nige toaliga hot wali Yabowaine i oola , yaa bolo yawaliliya gaganina wali Yabowaine . Komiu ku gegi hot . ”
41012028	Logugui ana topankite etega iyoho i lalaegan Yeisu alonau ge Sadiusi hi liwaliwan . I hago Yeisu Sadiusi wali nel i lahe bubun , inoke i na i nel Yeisu elana i ba , “ Yehoba wana logugui gamwaliyaa , hauna toto i bwata hot ? ”
41012029	Anana i lahe i ba , “ Toto i bwata hot , heiya hiwe , ‘ Komiu boda Isileli , ku hago ! Yehoba wala Yabowaine iya maisena ya .
41012030	Yehoba wam Yabowaine nu nunuwana-an ginebi ge atem bwalibwaligena , yawalim bwalibwaligena , wam nuwatu bwalibwaligena ge wam gasisi bwalibwaligena . ’
41012031	Eluwana i ola hiwe , ‘ Alom nu nunuwana-an ni ola totom u nunuwana-agiwa . ’ Nige logugui etega al bolo ya i bwabwata lakel . ”
41012032	Logugui ana topankite i baek Yeisu elana i ba , “ Topankite , wam baaba i waisi to . Tunahot te u ba , ‘ Yehoba iya maisena ya , ge nige etega al . ’
41012033	Inoke kila bosowaila ta nunuwana-an ginebi ge atela bwalibwaligena , wala nuwatu bwalibwaligena ge wala gasisi bwalibwaligena , ge avalau ta nunuwana-agil ni ola totola ta nunuwana-agila . Logugui labui o ali nuwatu i bwata hot , yaa bwasumu ta powonan ge wala mulolu ta pek Yehoba elana ana nuwatu nige i bwabwata . ”
41012034	Yeisu iyaka i atena Logugui ana topankite i liwan bubun , inoke i baek elana i ba , “ Owa nige am bwaga i yayapu Yehoba wana abalogugui elana . ” Inoke gamagalau nige sauga etega al bosowailiya nihi labose ge nel etega nihi neli Yeisu elana .
41012035	Sauga Yeisu i panpankiti Limi Bwabwalena gamwanaa , gamagalau i nelil i ba , “ Ga i ola ge Logugui ana topankite hi ba tage Mesaiya iya Deibid tubuna ?
41012036	He Yayaluwa Bwabwalena wana nuwatu elana inoke Deibid i ba , ‘ Yehoba i baek no Babala elana i ba : U misiyowa labeu awowa ana siga am topihigelgel na teli lowagil aem gabulanaa ! ’
41012037	He Deibid Mesaiya i awa babala-an , inoke ga i ola ge tage iya Deibid tubuna ? ” Inoke boda bwabwatana ginebi ge wali yaliyaya Yeisu wana panpankiti hi laeganan .
41012038	Yeisu iyoho i panpankiti gamagalau elal inoke i ba , “ Nuku matahikagimiu Logugui ana topankite kaiweliya . Heliya nuwaliya kaliko yayapona nihi galoi ge nihi nonawanawa , inoke ebo gamagalau nihi pwawal abamaket elana , nuwaliya te gamagalau ginebi ge wali awatauwan nihi pata ateu owa eliyalil .
41012039	Limi tapwalolo elana nuwaliya nihi misiyo houwa gamagalau maniniliyaa , ge hagali elana nuwaliya nihi misiyowa yau toto gamagalau bwabwatal wali yau elana .
41012040	Abuabulau wali limi ge wali gogomwau hi aahe hi lologugui-an bwabwage , ge i ola al wali awanun hi papayapu-an gamagalau tanaliyaa tage nihi hagol . Wali pagan o kaiwena , inoke nasi ali lahi ni bwata hot . ”
41012041	Limi Bwabwalena gamwanaa Yeisu i na i misiyowa mulolu ana abateliteli labenaa , ge gamagalau i gagayawa-agil hi na mani hi teliteli . Togogomwau hi gewi hi na mani bwabwatana hi teli ,
41012042	yaka abwe abuabul gugulana etega i nok i na toya eluwa i telel .
41012043	Inoke Yeisu wana tohago i yogaagil hi nok elana ge i ba , “ Ya ba tunahot eliyamiu , abuabul gugulana ya wana mulolu gamagalau gegewel wali mulolu i bwata lake .
41012044	Heliya mani enuna hi teli , yaa wali tupwa i bwata iyoho i mina . Yaa iya , togulagula , wana mani gegewena toto tage wana aanan kaiwena , iyaka i teli haba . ”
41013001	Sauga Yeisu i ulutagilem Limi Bwabwalena elana , yaka wana tohago etega i baek elana i ba , “ Topankite , matam ga i nok ! Pat bwabwatal ge Limi Bwabwalena ana taltal waiwaisana u kite ! ”
41013002	Yeisu anana i lahe i ba , “ Limi Bwabwalena waiwaisana ya iyoho u kikite . Yaa pat bolo hi ahe Limi ya hi ginoliya , nige etega ni miminaa abanaa , gegewena abwe nihi pasamwalekaleka . ”
41013003	Inoke Yeisu alonau ge wana tohago hi na hi ha Oya Olibe , ge i misiyo awona i noek Limi Bwabwalena elana . Inoke Pita , Yemesa , Diyon ge Andulu , heliya ya awawal , hi nel elana hi ba ,
41013004	“ Wama wasa ga u pem , hauna sauga ge abwe bugul bolo baliya u babaunan ni masal ? Ge wali masal ana etotohi ga ni ola ? ”
41013005	Yaka Yeisu i baek elal i ba , “ Nuku matahikagimiu , bahi gamagal etega ni papagegemiu .
41013006	Kaiwena gamagalau nihi gewi abwe alau elana nihi nem ge nihi ba , ‘ Nau Mesaiya ! ’ inoke gamagalau nihi gewi nihi pagegel .
41013007	Elohaveyan butuna nuku hagowa labemiwa ge haveyan wasana nuku hagoek laha , yaa bahi atemiu ni bwanabwana . Bugul ololana o ni gan ga , yaa sauga mowamowasena nige ga ni nenem .
41013008	Boda ge boda nihi lohaveyan , i ola al abalogugui ge abalogugui nihi lohaveyan . Mwaniknik ge galebu bwabwatana nihi masal labi tomaha ge tomaha elal . Nak bolo ya nihi masal houwa ga , ni ola ab lomwanina i telipuna ga mulaa abwe wawaya i masal .
41013009	Nuku matahikagimiu , kaiwena gamagalau abwe nihi libimiu ge nihi ahemiu nihi telemiu kot elana , ge hihiu elololina nihi ahe nihi nibinibihagimiu wali limi tapwalolowa . Alau kaiwena abwe nuku talmilil tologugui ge kin mataliyaa , inoke wasa waiwaisana nuku wasaan elal .
41013010	He wasa waiwaisana nihi papaatena-an houwan gamagalau gegewel elal , inoke mulaa abwe sauga mowamowasena ni vin .
41013011	Sauga ebo nihi libimiu ge nihi ahemiu nuku na kot kaiwena , bahi nuku nuwanuwatu hauna nuku baunan ge ni labemiu . Ana sauga elana , hauna ebo Yehoba ni pamasal eliyamiu , inoke nuku baunan , kaiwena baaba toto ku babaunan nige totomiu i oola , yaa Yayaluwa Bwabwalena iya te ni baaba .
41013012	Gamagalau taliliyau nihi wasaagil tologugui elal inoke nihi lopaaligal . Taman nihi ginol ni ola al to natuliyau elal . Wawayau nihi lut tamaliyau ge hinaliyau nihi pihigelgel-agil , inoke nihi pek tologugui nihi lopaaligal .
41013013	Alau kaiwena gamagalau gegewel nihi pihigelgel-agimiu , yaa henala ebo ni talmilil gagasisi ana siga abapwamowasi elana mwal ni pwawa .
41013014	‘ Toapapanak bwaibwaikikinina ’ abwe nuku kite ni talmilila abamina toto iya nige alana i gagana — he komiu bolo buki ya ana tovavasili nuwamiu ni sapu baaba ya kaiwena . Inoke sauga o bolo hi miminaa Yudiya elana nihi lou nihi na nihi ha oyaa .
41013015	Ebo gamagal etega iyoho i minamina wana limi pwatanaa toto hi tal paabwab , bahi ni lalau ge ni uulutuk wana limiya bugul etega ni aahe , ni lou ya .
41013016	Ebo gamagal etega iyoho i tuwatuwalali eyowaa , bahi ni sisikal panuwaa ge ana kaliko etegana ni aahe .
41013017	Sauga o elana nasi ni pulowan hot yowau toliyan ge topapaalahul elal . Eeu , hauna nak geb o !
41013018	He nuku awanun Yehoba elana inoke bahi nak o ni mamasal tultul ana sauga elana .
41013019	Kaiwena sauga o elana miloloyowan bwabwatana hot ni masal , ololana o nige sauga etega i mamasal abatelipuna elana sauga toto Yehoba panayawi i ginol , ana siga sauga ya . I ola al nige ni gagan sauga mulaa .
41013020	Binimala Yehoba nak o ana sauga nige ni papakaubwa , he nige gamagal etega ni mwamwal , yaa gamagalau bolo iyaka i hilel kaiweliya te sauga ana yapu iyaka i pakaubwa .
41013021	Sauga o elana ebo gamagal etega ni baewa eliyamiu ni ba , ‘ Ku kite , Keliso iya hiwe , ’ o ebo etega al ni ba , ‘ Iya huwo , ’ bahi nuku aabulilek-an .
41013022	Kaiwena keliso kakakawel ge palopitau kakakawel abwe nihi masal ge ginol yawiyawi nihi ginolil gamagalau wali abanuwa ahi , nuwaliya Yehoba wana hilihili gamagaliliyau nihi pagegel , yaa nige bosowailiya .
41013023	He nuku matahikagimiu , kaiwena wami wasa iyaka ya pewa pahuwala pulowan gegewel bolo abwe nihi masal kaiweliya .
41013024	Miloloyowan o ni mowasi enaa , inoke sabwelu ni gogou , waikena nige al ni yayana ,
41013025	putum nihi soguem labulabumwa , ge togasisi bolo hawawala nihi lamwalamwaniu .
41013026	Sauga o elana , gamagalau Gamagal Natuna nihi kite , i nenem yaluyalu gamwanaa , ginebi wana gasisi ge wana wasawasa .
41013027	Inoke wana aneloseyau ni patunal nihi na panayawi bebena esopali ge wana hilihili gamagaliliyau nihi bugul gogonil , nihi telipunaa buhuna etega nihi na nihi pwamowasiya buhuna etega .
41013028	Abaatena nuku aheya poga elana . Sauga ebo ta kite lamwana i titin , inoke ta atena waiwai ana sauga iyaka i kelaubwa . *
41013029	I ola al , sauga ebo nuku kite bugul gegewena bolo ya liwanagil nihi masal , nuku atena Gamagal Natuna wana sauga nem iyaka i kelaubwa hot .
41013030	Ya ba tunahot eliyamiu , heyan bolo ya nige nihi aaliga haba , inoke bugul gegewena bolo ya nihi masal .
41013031	Labulabum ge panayawi nihi mowasi , yaa nau no baaba nige ni momowasi .
41013032	Nige gamagal etega i aatena hauna lan o ebo hauna sauga . He bwagana aneloseyau labulabumwa , nige hi aatena , ge nau al Natuna nige ya aatena , Nam ya te i atena .
41013033	Inoke nuku matahikagimiu ge nuku silawaagimiu , kaiwena nige ku aatena hauna sauga ge abwe Gamagal Natuna ni nem .
41013034	He i ola tau etega iyaka i egon i na labi getoga : wana limi iyaka i eguluwana wana totuwalali elal ge nihi matahikan , totuwalali maisena ge maisena wali tuwalali iyaka i guyauan , ge iyaka i ba totuwalali etega nog ni matahikan ge bahi ni kekenu .
41013035	He nuku silawaagimiu , kaiwena nige ku aatena hauna sauga ge abwe tonlimi ni sikalim , bulin i gangan , o ebo bulin nuwanaa , o age ebo kamkam i kahikahin , o ebo lan i gangan .
41013036	Bahi tage komiu iyoho ku kenukenu ge etimwawa ni vin pwawamiu .
41013037	Inoke na baewa eliyamiu , ge na baek al gamagalau gegewel elal , ‘ Nuku silawa ! ’ ”
41014001	Lan eluwa ya i mina yaka Nopalegi Hagalena ana sauga , i ola al pwalawa toto nige alona yis hi vivikuhiya hagalena . Inoke topowon bwabwatal avaliyau ge Logugui ana topankite kamwasa hi loya ga nihi ola ge Yeisu nihi lib sume ge nihi lopaaliga .
41014002	Hi ba , “ Bahi ta giginola hagali ana sauga elana , eba abwe gamagalau nihi lohaveyan . ”
41014003	Yeisu iyoho Bedani i aanan Saimon tolepelo wana limiya . Inoke yova etega i nem elana patuna ana awa waiwaisana i noahe , gamwanaa , enonu bwalena waiwaisana ge molana bwabwatana , alana nad . Inoke patuna awana i tagayoho ge enonu i holek Yeisu kokowanaa .
41014004	Bolo alonau hi aanan enuna ateliya i elolol , inoke hi pebaaba-agil hi ba , “ Hauna kaiwena enonu i apapanak-an bwabwage ?
41014005	Binimala ta palian yaka molana mani silba ali gewi tili handeled ge pwatanaa al ta ahe , ge ta pek togulagula elal . ” Inoke hi anagebigebi-an nabiyan .
41014006	Yeisu i baek elal i ba , “ Nuku pialiyoho ya . Hauna kaiwena ge ku anagebigebi-an ? Ginol waiwaisana te i ginol eliyau e .
41014007	Togulagula alomiyau ya sauga gegewena , ge sauga toto ebo nuwamiu nuku label , bosowaimiu ya nuku label . Yaa nau nige sauga gegewena alomiu i oola .
41014008	Bugul toto i gana eliyana ge i nuwatuan ni ginol kaiweu , he iyaka i ginol . Enonu i holek tuwawa , he i ola tuwau iyaka i abubun haba o teliteli kaiwena .
41014009	Ya ba tunahot eliyamiu , panayawi mamanana elana , hauna labi elana ebo wasa waiwaisana nihi papaatena-an , bugul toto yova ya i ginol nihi liwanan , iya ana abanuwahikan . ”
41014010	Inoke Yudasa Isikaliyota , tohago bolo ali toto elulutega eluwa avaliya etegana , i egon i na topowon bwabwatal elal i ba ni label ge Yeisu nihi lib .
41014011	Topowon bwabwatal nuwaliya i waisi nabi Yudasa wana baaba kaiwena , ge hi bateli abwe mani nihi pek elana . Inoke Yudasa i telipuna Yeisu wana nawanawa i gagayawa-an , kamwasa i loya ge Yeisu ni teli nimaliyaa ge nihi lib .
41014012	Pwalawa toto nige alona yis hi vivikuhiya hagalena ana lan telipuna elana , Yudiya wali pagan te sipi natuna etega nihi lol Nopalegi Hagalena kaiwena . Inoke tohago Yeisu hi neli hi ba , “ Hauna labena elana nuwam naha noek ge aanan naha lovivina-an kaiwem , inoke ta anan ni ola Nopalegi Hagalena ana logugui ? ”
41014013	Inoke wana tohago eluwa i patunal i baek elal i ba , “ Nuku nok nuku na nuku tuk Yelusalema , tau etega wewel ana ulubwal i kalivai abwe ni pwawamiu . Nuku noulil ,
41014014	nuku na limi toto elana ni ulutuka , inoke nuku baek tonlimi elana nuku ba , ‘ Topankite i ba : Hauna lum u talamwan ge alowau no tohago Nopalegi Hagalena enona naha ginola ge naha an ? ’
41014015	Inoke iya abwe limi gamwana bwabwatana toto natiya ni pankitemiu , iyaka hi abubun haba . Inoke nuku na aanan nuku lovivina-an kaiwela . ”
41014016	Inoke tohago hi nok hi na Yelusalema , ge bugul gegewena hi pwawa i ola to Yeisu wana baaba elal . Inoke Nopalegi Hagalena enona hi lovivina-an .
41014017	Sauga bulin i gan , yaka Yeisu alonau ge wana tohago ali toto elulutega eluwa hi na hi vin .
41014018	Sauga hi misiyo ge hi aanan teibol elana , inoke i baek tohago elal i ba , “ Ya ba tunahot eliyamiu , gamwamiwa etega nasi abwe ni wasaagau , he iya iyahe te avala ta aanan e . ”
41014019	Tohago ateliya i lomwan nabi , inoke maisena ge maisena i nelnel Yeisu elana i ba , “ Nau nige i oola , age ? ”
41014020	Yeisu analiya i lahe i ba , “ Ami toto elulutega eluwa gamwamiwa , etega nasi abwe ni wasaagau , iya ge nau nimama i lau mwaha maisena gamwanaa .
41014021	Gamagal Natuna nau na aliga ni ola Buki Bwabwalena wana baaba , yaa gamagal toto ni wasaagau nuwau i nakan , kaiwena bwaliga ana lahi ni bwaya . Binimala valila tau o bahi hinana ni aab , inoke lahi bwabwatana nige ni pwapwawa . ”
41014022	Sauga hi aanan , Yeisu beleid i ahe , i ba mulolu Yehoba elana yaka i pigebagebal-an i pek wana tohago elal ge i ba , “ Ku ahe ku an . Toto ya iya tuwau . ”
41014023	Inoke oine ana kom i ahe , i ba mulolu Yehoba elana , i pek elal ge gegewel hi im .
41014024	Sauga i pek elal i ba , “ Toto ya saliyau , iya bateli vavaluna i patunahot . Saliyau ni lau gamagalau nihi gewi kaiweliya .
41014025	Ya ba tunahot eliyamiu , oine nige al na iim , ana siga Yehoba wana abalogugui elana abwe oine vavaluna na im . ”
41014026	Yaka wona etega hi wonaan ge hi tagil hi na Oya Olibe .
41014027	Yeisu i baek wana tohago elal i ba , “ Nasi abwe gegewemiu nuku lou luwagau , kaiwena Buki Bwabwalena i ba , ‘ Sipi ali tomatahikan na lol inoke sipi nihi tatawaliwali tomaha ge tomaha nihi nonoek . ’
41014028	Yaa no lut al enaa , na houwa na na Galili , yaka mulaa abwe nuku nem . ”
41014029	Inoke Pita Yeisu anana i lahe i ba , “ Bwagana ebo alowau gegewel nihi lou , yaa nau nige na lolou luwagiwa . ”
41014030	Yeisu i baek Pita elana i ba , “ Ya ba tunahot eliyam , bulin ebe kamkam melutauina nigeya ga ni kakahin palabui , inoke nu alahagau paeton . ”
41014031	Yaa Pita i ba balbalgig i ba , “ Nige na aalahagiwa , bwagana ebo alou owa ta yaomal . ” Yaka gegewel hi baaba hi ola al Pita wana baaba .
41014032	Yeisu alonau ge wana tohago hi nok hi na labi toto alana Getesemani , inoke i baek elal i ba , “ Ku minaa te , na na ga na awanun . ”
41014033	Pita , Yemesa ge Diyon i ahel alonau hi nok , inoke sauga o atena i lomwan nabi .
41014034	Yaka i baek elal i ba , “ Ateu i lomwan nabi , lomwan o kelaubwa ni paaligau . Ku miminaa te ge nuku silawa . ”
41014035	I peliluwagil nige ana bwaga i gagan , inoke i talpo bilibiliya ge i awanun Tamana elana ebo bosowaina , inoke bahi ni tutuk lomwan ana sauga elana .
41014036	I awanun i ba , “ Nam ! Nam ! Bugul gegewena i bosowaim . He lomwan ana kom ya u ahek yoho eliyau . Yaa bahi nau no nuwatu , owa ya wam nuwatu . ”
41014037	Inoke i sikal tohago eton elal ge i kitel hi kenu mati . I baek Pita elana i ba , “ Saimon , age owa iyahe u kenukenu ? Ga i ola ge nige bosowaim auwa maisena ya nu silawa ?
41014038	Nuku silawa ge nuku awanun , inoke bahi lawakik kaiwena ge nuku sosogu . Yayaluwamiu nuwana waisi ni ginol , yaa tuwamiu i pweyata . ”
41014039	I nok palabuina al i na i awanun ola to wana awanun houhouwena .
41014040	Sauga i sikal , i kitel al hi kenukenu , kaiwena mataliya i aliga nabi . He nige hi aatena Yeisu anana ga nihi lahe ola .
41014041	Yaka i na i awanun al . Sauga i sikal paetonina tohago elal , i ba , “ Age komiu iyahe ya ku kenukenu ? Besemiu kenu ! Ku kite , sauga iyaka i vin ge Gamagal Natuna nihi talamwan gamagalau nanakil nimaliyaa .
41014042	Ku lut ta noewa elal . Tau toto i tatalamwagau sauga ya iyaka i vin ! ”
41014043	Sauga Yeisu iyoho ya i baaba , inoke Yudasa i vin , iya Yeisu wana tohago bolo elulutega eluwa avaliya etega . Alonau ge boda bwabwatana , bolo topowon bwabwatal , Logugui ana topankite ge Yudiya wali tohouwa hi patunal . He elohaveyan kilepana ge ebwakil toguina hi noahe .
41014044	Yeisu ana towasa etotohi etega iyaka i baunanik haba boda elal i ba , “ Tau toto na nalo heiya te nuku lib ge nuku yowan , inoke nuku en egonan ge nuku matahikan . ”
41014045	Sauga Yudasa i vin , i nopasapu i na Yeisu elana i ba , “ Topankite , ” inoke i nalo .
41014046	Yaka gamagalau hi na Yeisu hi lib ge hi yowan .
41014047	Bolo hi taltalmilila Yeisu labenaa , avaliya etega wana elohaveyan kilepana i momol tagilanem abanaa , inoke topowon bwabwatal wali tohouwa wana totuwalali etega tanana i goyoho .
41014048	Yeisu i baek elal i ba , “ Age nau toawatautau ge topihigelgel inoke haveyan kilepana ge ebwakil toguina ku noahe ge ku nem tage nuku libau ?
41014049	Lan gegewena alowau ya komiu Limi Bwabwalena elana ya panpankiti , inoke nige ku lilibau . Yaa ni masal ni ola te , inoke Buki Bwabwalena ana baaba ni tabwa tunahot . ”
41014050	Inoke sauga o wana tohago gegewel hi lou luwai .
41014051	Heval etegana , kaliko maisena ya te i minaa tuwanaa , iyoho Yeisu i noulil . Ana kaliko hi kukuhikan tage hi lilib ,
41014052	yaa kaliko i lou luwan nimaliyaa , ge i lou bobokana ya .
41014053	Yeisu hi ahe hi pwatanik topowon bwabwatal wali tohouwa wana limiya , yaka topowon bwabwatal gegewel , avaliyau Yudiya wali tohouwa ge Logugui ana topankite hi nogogowa to .
41014054	Pita Yeisu i noulil ana bwaga i gan ana siga hi na hi ulutuk topowon bwabwatal wali tohouwa wana bakubakuwa . Inoke alonau totuwalali hi misiyowa to , ge iya i amwaligu ginaha elana .
41014055	Topowon bwabwatal avaliyau ge Yudiya wali tologugui gegewel , Yeisu ana woliwoli hi loyaan ge bosowaina nihi ba ni aliga . Yaa nige etegana hi pwapwawa .
41014056	Gamagalau hi gewi wali ba kakakawi hi baunan Yeisu kaiwena , yaa wali baaba nige i oolaolaek .
41014057	Inoke gamagalau enuna hi nem ge Yeisu hi wole kakawe hi ba ,
41014058	“ Ama tau ya wana baaba ha hago i ba , ‘ Limi Bwabwalena ya gamagalau nimaliya elana hi tal na pasamwalekaleka , inoke lan eton gamwanaa etegana na tal al , toto nige ni oola gamagalau wali taltal . ’ ”
41014059	Yaa bwagana heliya hi ba ola o , wali baaba nige i oolaolaek al .
41014060	Topowon bwabwatal wali tohouwa i lut ge i talmilil tonogogo gegewel mataliyaa , yaka i nel Yeisu elana i ba , “ Ga i ola ge nige analiya u lalahe ? Baaba toto hi baunan kaiwem , ana sapu ga i ola ? ”
41014061	Yaa Yeisu i mikekei nige anana etega i lalahe . Inoke topowon bwabwatal wali tohouwa i nel al elana i ba , “ Owa Mesaiya , Yehoba Towasawasa Natuna , o ebo nigeya ? ”
41014062	Yeisu anana i lahe i ba , “ Nau heiya te . He abwe nau Gamagal Natuna nuku kiteyau na misiyowa Yehoba Togasisi labena awonaa , ge na neem yaluyalu pwatanaa . ”
41014063	Yaka topowon bwabwatal wali tohouwa i huga , inoke totona ana kaliko i kukuleli ge i ba , “ He besena to . Nige al ta loloya tage gamagalau nihi nem ge nihi baaba tau ya kaiwena .
41014064	Iyaka ku hago i ba likalika . Ga ku nuwatu ola ? ” Inoke gegewel hi talam hi ba , “ I bosowaina hot ni aliga . ”
41014065	Inoke gamagalau enuna Yeisu hi kuluve , ge kaliko hi ahe matana hi am kaus , yaka nimaliya elana hi nibinibihan ge hi ba , “ Ebo owa palopita , inoke u baem eliyama , henala ge i nibihiwa ? ” Inoke topowon bwabwatal wali pulisiman Yeisu hi ahe ge hi nibinibihan .
41014066	Pita iyoho paiya bakubakuwa , inoke topowon bwabwatal wali tohouwa wana totuwalali galokau avaliya etega i nem to .
41014067	Sauga i kite i amwaamwaligu , inoke i gayawaan bubun ge i ba , “ He owa al ge Yeisu gagama Nasaleta alona etega . ”
41014068	Yaa Pita i alaha i ba , “ Nige ya aatena hauna gun u babaunan ei . ” Inoke i na i tagil abauluulutuk elana . Yaka kamkam melutauina etega i kahin .
41014069	Galok totuwalali Pita i kite al , inoke i baek gamagalau bolo hi taltalmilil o elal i ba , “ Tau ya iya avaliya etega . ”
41014070	Yaka Pita i alaha palabuina . Sauga nige i yayapu , gamagalau bolo hi taltalmilil labenaa hi baek elana hi ba , “ Tunahot owa Yeisu wana boda avaliya etega , kaiwena owa gagama Galili . ”
41014071	Inoke Pita i papasila i ba , “ Ya baaba tunahot , tau toto bana ku babaa ei , nige ya aatena . Binimala nige na babaa tunahot , Yehoba ni laheyau . ”
41014072	Sauga o kamkam melutauina i kahin palabuina , inoke Pita Yeisu wana baaba i nuwatuan toto i ba , “ Kamkam melutauina nige ga ni kakahin palabui , inoke nu alahagau paeton . ” Yaka Pita atena i lomwan nabi ge i kahin .
41015001	Mweluluga kekeisi hot , topowon bwabwatal avaliyau Yudiya wali tohouwa , Logugui ana topankite ge tologugui gegewel wali nuwatu hi pamaisena . Inoke Yeisu hi yowan ge hi en hi na hi teli Pilato nimanaa .
41015002	Pilato Yeisu i neli i ba , “ Owa Yudiya wali kin ? ” Yeisu i ba , “ He i ola te wam baaba ei . ”
41015003	Topowon bwabwatal Yeisu ana woliwoli i gewi hi baunan .
41015004	Yaka Pilato i nel al i ba , “ Wali baaba nige nu lalahe ? U kite , woliwoli i gewi te hi baunan kaiwem e ! ”
41015005	Yaa Yeisu topowon bwabwatal wali woliwoli nige etega i lalahe , inoke Pilato nuwana i ahe .
41015006	Baliman maisena ge maisena , Nopalegi Hagalena ana sauga elana , toulutuk dela toto ebo Yudiya nihi hile , Pilato ni sokal ge ni tagil .
41015007	He sauga o elana , tau etega alana Balabas alonau ge wana pan topihigelgel heliya iyoho dela , heliya nige nuwaliya Loma wali logugui , inoke sauga etega hi lut ge hi taulol .
41015008	Boda hi na Pilato elana ge hi awanun toulutuk dela etega ni sokal kaiweliya , ni ola to i giginol baliman maisena ge maisena elana .
41015009	Inoke Pilato i nel i ba , “ Tab nuwamiu komiu Yudiya wami kin na sokal kaiwemiu ? ”
41015010	I ba ola o , kaiwena i atena bubun hot , topowon bwabwatal Yeisu hi lamwa pulowanan te hi ahe ge hi teli nimanaa .
41015011	Yaa topowon bwabwatal boda ali pel hi teli * ge nihi ba Pilato Balabas ni sokal ge bahi Yeisu ni sosokal .
41015012	Yaka Pilato boda i nelil al i ba , “ Hauna gun na ginol toto ku ba Yudiya wali kin kaiwena ? ”
41015013	Yaka hi yoga hi ba , “ U lokolosan ! ”
41015014	Inoke Pilato i nelil i ba , “ Hauna kaiwena ge na lokolosan ? Hauna nak i ginol ? ” Abwe hi yoga balbalgig hot hi ba , “ U lokolosan ! ”
41015015	Pilato nuwana boda nuwaliya ni pwawaisi , yaka Balabas i sokal kaiweliya . Inoke i ba tolohaveyan hihiu eloelolina hi ahe Yeisu hi nibinibihan , yaka i teli tolohaveyan nimaliyaa nihi lokolosan .
41015016	Tolohaveyan Yeisu hi en pwatanik logugui ana limi bwabwatana gamwanaa , inoke wali pan tolohaveyan gegewel hi yoga gogonil .
41015017	Kaliko yayapona matana pepol i ola kin ali kaliko , hi ahe ge hi pagaloi . Pepesala hi ahe hi ginol ana hanahana ge hi teli kokowanaa .
41015018	Inoke hi yoga elana hi ba , “ Atema owa , Yudiya wali kin . ”
41015019	Inoke suki etega hi ahe kokowana hi lololi , ge tuwana hi lokukuluvi-an . Yaka hi loepwakoku awonaa ge ana awatauwan hi ginol .
41015020	Sauga hi talatalawasi-an i mowasi , inoke kaliko yayapona matana pepol hi leke yoho ge totona ana kaliko hi pagaloi . Inoke hi en tagilan ge nihi na nihi lokolosan .
41015021	Tau etega hi pwawa kamwasaa , gagama Sailini , alana Saimon , Aleksenda ge Lupas tamaliya , i neem tola i nana i tutuk Yelusalema . Inoke hi palawakik ge Yeisu ana kolos ni kalivai .
41015022	Yeisu hi en pwatanik hi na panuwa alana Goligota . ( Goligota ana sapu heiya “ Pana Babaloma . ” )
41015023	Inoke oine alona ge valam etega alana meya hi vikuhiya ge hi pek tage ni im , yaa nige i iim .
41015024	Inoke hi tagahikan kolos elana ge hi pamilil . Yaka tolohaveyan ana kaliko hi wali , yaka pat hi ahe galavenu etega hi galavenu-an , inoke eliyana kaliko ana pwahin tomaha tomaha hi guyauan elal . †
41015025	Mweluluga naen kilok elana te Yeisu hi lokolosan .
41015026	Ana woliwoli hi lele inoke hi tagahikan i ba , “ Yudiya wali kin . ”
41015027	Tokaoma eluwa alonau hi lokolosil . Etegana ana kolos hi pamilila labena awonaa ge etegana labena gegebanaa .
41015028	Inoke Buki Bwabwalena ana baaba i tabwa tunahot , i ba , “ Iya al ge , alonau ya logugui ana toleke . ” ‡
41015029	Gamagalau bolo Yeisu hi nonopapalegi-an mataliya i nok hi kite , yaka kaunuliya hi loniknikan ge hi lamwa tunatuna-an hi ba , “ Valila u ba tage Limi Bwabwalena nu pasamwalekaleka ge lan eton gamwanaa nu tal al .
41015030	He kolos u loluwan ge totom nu pwamwaliwa ! ”
41015031	Topowon bwabwatal ge Logugui ana topankite Yeisu hi lamwa tunatuna-an i ola al to . Totoliya hi pebaaba-agil hi ba , “ Gamagalau getogal i pwamwalil , yaa nige bosowaina totona ni pwamwal .
41015032	Tage iya Mesaiya ! Tage iya Isileli wali kin ! Totona kolos ni loluwan inoke ta kite ge ta abulilek-an . ” Ge bolo alonau hi lokolosil , heliya al Yeisu hi sinalian .
41015033	Alalati bwagatau , panuwa gegewena i gogou ana siga tili kilok kokoyavi .
41015034	Tili kilok elana , Yeisu analiya elana i yoga nabiyan i ba , “ Eloi , eloi , lama sabakitani ? ” Baaba o ana sapu heiya , “ No Yehoba , no Yehoba , hauna kaiwena ge u miluwagau ? ”
41015035	Gamagalau enuna bolo hi taltalmilila o , anana hi hago yaka hi ba , “ Ku laegan , Ilaitiya § i yogaan to . ”
41015036	Tau etega i patalelu i na balou i ahe , i pahun oine manumanunina elana ge i vinum , inoke i teliek suki matanaa ge i paelu heyan Yeisu i im . Yaka i ba , “ Ta matamatan ga ta kite tab Ilaitiya ni nem ge ni ahe kolos elana . ”
41015037	Yeisu i yoga anana i bwata , inoke yawalina i mowasi .
41015038	Kaliko mamanana toto hi pakuki ge Limi Bwabwalena gamwana hi baba tomwaya , i maleli telipunek natiya i na i lau paiya .
41015039	Tolohaveyan wali tohouwa toto i talmilila Yeisu manininaa , wana yoga i hago ge wana yaomal i kite , yaka i ba , “ Tunahot tau ya Yehoba Natuna ! ”
41015040	Yowau enuna hi talmililek laha ge mataliya i nok Yeisu hi gagayawa-an . Gamwaliyaa Meli Magidala yovana , valihina Meli toto heval Yemesa ge Yosepa hinaliya , ge etega al Salome .
41015041	He sauga Yeisu iyoho Galili , yowau bolo ya hi toulil ge hi matahikan . Yowau hi gewi al bolo alonau hi na Yelusalema , heliya al iyoho to .
41015042	Lan Sabwata ana lan lovivina , ge lan ni gan Sabwata . Inoke sauga panuwa i kokoyavi ,
41015043	Yosepa gagama Alimadiya atena i pamatuwa , i nok i na Pilato elana ge Yeisu tuwana i awanuni . He Yosepa iya gamagal alana bwabwatana etega Yudiya wali tologugui gamwaliyaa , ge iya al i matamatan Yehoba wana abalogugui kaiwena .
41015044	Sauga Pilato wasa i hago tage Yeisu iyaka i aliga , atena i you , inoke tolohaveyan wali tohouwa i yogaan ge i neli ebo tunahot Yeisu iyaka i aliga .
41015045	Pilato wana wasa i pek i tunahot , inoke Pilato Yeisu tuwana i talamwan Yosepa ni ahe .
41015046	Yosepa kaliko waiwaisana enuna i pwamola , inoke i nok i na Yeisu tuwana i ahe kolos elana , kaliko elana i osiya , ge i na i teli salaiya toto hi ken tukan pat elana . Inoke pat bwabwatana etega hi pakul pwatanik ge salai awana hi paankaus .
41015047	He Meli Magidala yovana ge Meli toto Yosepa hinana hi kite Yeisu ga hi teliya .
41016001	Lan Sabwata i mowasi , * Meli Magidala yovana alonau Meli toto Yemesa hinana ge Salome , hi na enonu bwalena waiwaisana hi pwamolal tage abwe nihi na Yeisu tuwana nihi paenonu .
41016002	Inoke wik ana lan houwan elana , mweluluga kekeisi sauga sabwelu abwe i ha ya , hi nanawa salai kaiwena ,
41016003	ge hi nonobaaba hi ba , “ Henala nasi pat toto salai awana ana epaankaus ni pakul yoho kaiwela ? ”
41016004	Yaa sauga hi vin salaiya ge mataliya i ha , hi kite pat iyaka hi pakul yoho . He pat , pat bwabwatana hot .
41016005	Inoke hi ulutuk salai gamwanaa , yaka heval etega hi kite ana kaliko i wawakeki , i misiyowa salai gamwanaa labi toto nimaliya awona elana . Inoke hi lovakun nabi .
41016006	Inoke i ba , “ Bahi lovakun ! Ya atena Yeisu gagama Nasaleta toto hi lokolosan , ku loyaan . He iyaka i lut , nige i gagan te . Abana ku kite toto hi teliya .
41016007	He ku nok ku na wana tohago avaliya Pita wali wasa nuku pek nuku ba , ‘ Ni houwa awomiwa ni na Galili . Abwe nuku kiteya to , i ola wana baaba eliyamiu . ’ ”
41016008	Inoke yowau avaliya wali lovakun ge wali nuwanuwatu hi ulutagil ge salai hi patalelu luwai . He nige hi babaaek gamagal etega elana , kaiwena hi lovakun .
41016009	Sauga Yeisu i lutem yaomala , wik ana lan houwan mweluluga kekeisi elana , inoke i masal houwa Meli Magidala yovana elana , toto valila yayaluwa bibikel ali gewi seben i patuna owaowa-agiliya elana .
41016010	Iya i na bolo valila avaliya Yeisu wali wasa i pek , heliya iyoho nuwaliya i nak ge hi kahikahin .
41016011	Yaa sauga Meli wana baaba hi hago i ba , “ Yeisu iyaka i lut ge ya kiteya matawa , ” he wana baaba nige hi aabulilek-an .
41016012	Toto ya enaa , Yeisu i masala bolau eluwa elal , yaa ana awa i getoga . Bolau o Yelusalema iyaka hi eguluwai hi nanawa panuwa etega elana .
41016013	Sauga hi atena age iya Yeisu , yaka hi sikal hi na avaliyau wali wasa hi pek , yaa wali baaba nige hi aabulilek-an .
41016014	Yaka abwe al Yeisu i masal wana tohago ali toto elulutega maisena elal wali sauga aanan elana . Yeisu i baek elal i ba , “ Ga i ola ge nige ku aabulilek ? Atemiu i gasisi inoke bolo hi kiteyau no lut al enaa ge wami wasa hi pewa , wali baaba nige ku aabulilek-an . ”
41016015	I baek elal i ola , “ Ku na panayawi labena gegewena ge wasa waiwaisana nuku papaatena-an gamagalau gegewel elal .
41016016	Toto ebo ni abulilek ge ni babitaiso , iya ni mwal . Yaa toto ebo nige ni aabulilek , he iya lahi ni pwawa .
41016017	Ge bolo hi abulilek , Yehoba gasisi ni pek elal inoke ginol yawiyawi nihi awaawaginol , ololana alau elana yayaluwa bibikel nihi patuna owaowa-agil , anan getoga ona nihi baubaunan ,
41016018	nimaliya elana mwata nanakil nihi ahel , ebo wewel lelelamwina nihi im nige ni aapanakil , ge nimaliya nihi teli tokasiyebwa elal inoke nihi molu . ”
41016019	Sauga Babala Yeisu i baaba haba tohago elal , inoke i ha labulabumwa , ge i misiyowa Yehoba labena awonaa .
41016020	Yaka tohago hi tagil hi na labena gegewena ge wasa waiwaisana hi papaatena-an . Babala i label inoke wali papaatena i patunahot , kaiwena ginol yawiyawi hi ginolil gamagalau hi kite .
42001001	Ateu owa Tiyopilo . Valila gamagalau hi gewi bugul bolo hi masal gamameya wasana iyaka hi leli ,
42001002	hi golugoluwa bolo hi kiteya mataliyaa wali wasa elana . Heliya hi kiteya mataliyaa i telipunaa ana abatelipuna elana , ge heliya hi ola Yehoba wana baaba ana totuwalali inoke wasa o hi baunan eliyama .
42001003	He nau bugul bolo ona o ya asimuli-an bubun , ya telipunaa ana abatelipuna elana , inoke ya nuwatu te wasaliya na vatal bubun ge na leli lowan owa gamagal bwabwatana Tiyopilo kaiwem .
42001004	Inoke nu atena te toto hi panpankiti-an eliyam i tunahot .
42001005	Helodi Yudiya wali kin wana sauga logugui , he topowon etegana iyoho alana Sakalaiya , iya Abaidiya wana boda ana gamagal etega . Lagona alana Elisabet , iya al topowon houhouwena Eloni tubutubunina etega .
42001006	Ali toto eluwa wali minamina i waisi Yehoba matanaa , he Yehoba wana logugui ge wana baaba gegewena hi henapuan bubun .
42001007	Nige natuliya i gagan , kaiwena Elisabet i kobwas . He alona ge lagona Sakalaiya iyaka hi liki .
42001008	Sauga etegana Sakalaiya wana boda wali sauga tuwalali , he Sakalaiya iya iyoho topowon wali tuwalali i awaawaginol Yehoba matanaa .
42001009	Yaka pat hi galavenu-an i ola topowon ali logugui , ge gamagal etega nihi hile ni ulutuk Yehoba wana Limi Bwabwalena gamwanaa ge bugul bwalena waiwaisana ni ton ana abatonton pwatanaa . Hi pwawa Sakalaiya te ni ginol , inoke i ulutuk Limi Bwabwalena gamwanaa .
42001010	He bugul bwalena waiwaisana ana sauga tonton elana , gamagalau boda bwabwatana heliya iyoho tola hi awaawanun .
42001011	Inoke Babala wana anelose etega i masal Sakalaiya elana i talmilila abatonton labena awonaa .
42001012	Sauga Sakalaiya anelose i kite , inoke atena i you ge i lovakun .
42001013	Yaa anelose i baek elana i ba , “ Sakalaiya , bahi lovakun ! Wam awanun iyaka Yehoba i hago . He lagom Elisabet natum melutauina ni ab , inoke alana nu tun Diyon .
42001014	Iya nuwam ni pwawaisi ge ni payaliyaya-agiwa , ge gamagalau nihi gewi nihi yaliyaya wana masal kaiwena ,
42001015	kaiwena iya alana ni bwata Babala matanaa . Bahi oine ge wewel gasigasisena ni iim . He sauga hinana abwe ni ab ya te Yayaluwa Bwabwalena ni kalaopopwi .
42001016	Iya boda Isileli nihi gewi ni ahel pasikalil nihi nem Babala eliyana , heliya wali Yabowaine .
42001017	Wana pagan ge wana gasisi ni ola palopita Ilaitiya , ge iya ni nohouwa Babala awonaa . Iya tamataman aloliyau ge natuliyau ni ahel maniniliya ni abubun , ge bolo Yehoba hi awatautau-an ni ahel pasikalil nuwatu waiwaisana nihi ahe ni ola bolo tosasapol wali nuwatu . He gamagalau ni lovivina-agil Babala wana nem kaiwena . ”
42001018	Inoke Sakalaiya i baek anelose elana i ba , “ Ga na ola ge na atena wam baaba i tunahot ? Kaiwena nau iyaka ya liki , ge lagou al iyaka i liki . ”
42001019	Anelose Sakalaiya anana i lahe i ba , “ Nau Gabeliyel , sauga gegewena ya talmilila Yehoba manininaa , iya i patunau ya nem na liwaliwan eliyam ge wasa waiwaisana ya na wasaan eliyam .
42001020	He nige no baaba u aabulilek-an , inoke nu talpwakum ge nige bosowaina nu baaba ana siga bugul bolo ya nihi masal . He sauga toto Yehoba i hile eliyana te no baaba ni tunahot . ”
42001021	Sauga o elana gamagalau heliya iyoho hi matamatan Sakalaiya kaiwena , ge hi nuwa gewagewa ga i ola ge i minabi Limi Bwabwalena gamwanaa .
42001022	Sauga i tagil nige bosowaina ni baaba elal , nimana ya te i papatuwalali , inoke gamagalau hi atena te pankite etega i masal elana Limi Bwabwalena gamwanaa .
42001023	Sakalaiya wana sauga tuwalali i mowasi , inoke abwe i sikal i na wana panuwaa .
42001024	Wana sikal enaa , inoke lagona Elisabet i liyan . He weikena nimala panuna nige i nonomasamasal , i miminaa ya te limiya .
42001025	Inoke Elisabet i ba , “ Babala i atilomwan-agau , yaka bugul ya i ginol kaiweu ge o puluwawi i ahek yoho gamagalau mataliyaa . ”
42001026	Elisabet wana liyan ana weikena sikisina gamwanaa , Yehoba anelose Gabeliyel i patuna i na labi Galili panuwana alana Nasaleta ,
42001027	gamaina matabubuwa etega elana . Iya alona ge tau etega alana Yosepa , iya Deibid tubutubunina , hi kawakawalolu . Gamaina matabubuwa o alana Meli .
42001028	Anelose i na elana ge i ba , “ Ateu owa Meli . Babala i minaa eliyam ge iyaka i muloluagiwa . ”
42001029	Meli anelose wana baaba o i hago , yaka atena i bwanabwana nabi inoke i nuwatu loyaloya ge i ba , “ Ba mulolu ya ana sapu ga i ola ? ”
42001030	Yaa anelose i baek elana i ba , “ Meli , bahi lovakun . Yehoba iyaka i muloluagiwa .
42001031	He abwe nu liyan ge wawaya melutauina nu ab , yaka alana nu tun Yeisu .
42001032	Iya ni tobwabwatana gamagalau mataliyaa , ge nihi awa Tomihahaina Hot Natuna-an . Tubuna Deibid wana abalogugui Yehoba Yabowaine ni pek elana ,
42001033	ge iya ni tabwa Yakobo tubutubunau wali kin mihomihotina . Wana abalogugui nige ni momowasi . ”
42001034	Inoke Meli i nel anelose elana i ba , “ Ga ni masal ola ? Kaiwena nau nigeya ga sauga etega alou tau etega ha kekenu . ”
42001035	Anana anelose i lahe i ba , “ Yayaluwa Bwabwalena ni lau eliyam , ge Tomihahaina Hot wana gasisi ni yabomwiwa . Inoke wawaya toto abwe nu ab ni bwabwalena ge nihi awa Yehoba Natuna-an .
42001036	U kite , tutum Elisabet valila gamagalau hi awa kobwakobwasi ge bwagana iyaka i liki , he iyaka i liyan ge wana weikena sikisina te .
42001037	Nige bugul etega i pupulowan tage Yehoba nige bosowaina ni ginol . ”
42001038	Yaka Meli anelose anana i lahe i ba , “ Nau Babala wana totuwalali loloyowanina . He ni masal eliyau ni ola toto u baunan . ” Inoke anelose Meli i eguluwan .
42001039	Sauga toto o elana , Meli i lut ge etimwawa i egon , i na Yudiya awanina etega , iyoho labi oyana gaganina elana .
42001040	Sauga i vin , yaka i na i ulutuk Sakalaiya wana limiya ge i pata ateu owa Elisabet elana .
42001041	Sauga Meli wana pata ateu owa Elisabet i hago , inoke wawaya i lamwalamwaniu tinenaa . Elisabet Yayaluwa Bwabwalena i kalaopopwi ,
42001042	inoke i baaba anana i bwata i ba , “ Yehoba iyaka i muloluagiwa , am mulolu yowau gegewel ali mulolu i bwata lake . Ge wawaya toto abwe nu ab Yehoba i muloluan al .
42001043	Ga i ola ge owa no Babala hinana o awatauwan bwabwatana u ginol ge u nem u kiteyau ?
42001044	Sauga wam pata ateu owa ya hago i tuk tanawa , inoke wawaya i yaliyaya ge i lamwalamwaniu tinewa .
42001045	Yehoba i muloluagiwa , kaiwena u abulilek te Babala ni ginol ni ola wana baaba eliyam . ”
42001046	Inoke Meli i ba : Atewa Babala ya tobalan ,
42001047	ge yayaluwau i yaliyaya Yehoba no Topwamwal elana .
42001048	Ya tobalan kaiwena bwagana nau wana totuwalali nige no waisi i gagan , iya i atilomwan-agau . He sauga ya ge sauga i nenem heyan ge heyan nihi baaba kaiweu nihi ba , “ Yehoba i muloluan . ”
42001049	Ya tobalan kaiwena Yehoba Togasisi bugul bwabwatal i ginolil kaiweu . He iya i bwabwalena .
42001050	Heyan ge heyan elal , bolo hi awatauwan wana atilomwan i gangan elal .
42001051	Nimana elana ginol bwabwatal i ginolil , ge bolo totoliya hi teli heyagil ge hi nuwatu tage alaliya i bwata , wali boda i tagalekaleka-an .
42001052	Tologugui bwabwatal i ahek yohil abaliyaa ge i teli lowagil , inoke bolo nige alaliya i gagan i teli heyagil .
42001053	Bugul waiwaisal i guyauan togalebu elal hi kalaopopwi , yaa togogomwau i patuna yohil nimaliya enoenovana ya .
42001054	Wana totuwalali boda Isileli i label , ge nige i nunuluwan te ni atilomwan-agil ,
42001055	ni ola wana bateli tubulau elal , ni ola wana bateli Abalahama ge tubutubunau heyan ge heyan elal .
42001056	He Meli i miminaa ga to Elisabet eliyana sauga ana yapu i ola weikena eton , yaka abwe i sikal i na wana awana .
42001057	Elisabet wana ab ana sauga i pwawa , inoke i ab natuna melutauina .
42001058	Wana heliyamwau ge tutunau wasa hi hago te Babala Elisabet i muloluan nabiyan , inoke avaliya hi yaliyaya toyawa .
42001059	Wawaya wana lan eit * i pwawa inoke hi nowanik ge ana gotomwa yoho paganina nihi ginol . Tage tamana Sakalaiya alana nihi tun pwatanek elana ,
42001060	yaa hinana i ba , “ Bahiwa ! Alana nuku tun Diyon . ”
42001061	Yaka hi baek elana hi ba , “ Tutumiyau gamwaliyaa , nige etega alana i oola to . ”
42001062	Inoke nimaliya hi patuwalali ge eliyana tamana hi neli nuwana hauna alan ni tun wawaya elana .
42001063	Sakalaiya abaleleli etega i awanuni elal , inoke i leli i ba , “ Iya alana Diyon . ” Inoke gegewel ateliya i you .
42001064	Sauga o elana Sakalaiya awana i mwapwela ge bosowaina ni baaba , yaka i telipuna i baaba ge Yehoba i tobatobal-an .
42001065	He wali heliyamwau gegewel bugul o hi kite inoke hi lovakun nabi . Yaka bugul ya gegewel wasaliya i lelu i na panuwa gegewel elal bolo hi minaa Yudiya labi oya gaganina elana .
42001066	Gamagalau gegewel bolo wasana hi hago hi nuwanuwatu-an ge hi nel hi ba , “ Wawaya ya bwaliga ni tabwa hauna kaba gamagal ? ” Kaiwena hi atena te Babala i matahikan ge i labe .
42001067	Diyon tamana Sakalaiya Yayaluwa Bwabwalena i kalaopopwi inoke i palopisai Yehoba wana baaba i baunan i ba :
42001068	Babala ta tobalan , iya Isileli wala Yabowaine , iya i nem kila wana gamagalau ni labela ge ni sokalila .
42001069	Wana totuwalali Deibid tubutubunau gamwaliyaa , Topwamwal gasigasisena etega i pamilil kaiwela ,
42001070	i ola houhouwena wana bateli palopitau bwabwalel hi baunan .
42001071	Topwamwal o iya ni pwamwalila ala topihigelgel ge bolo nige hi nunuwana-agila elal .
42001072	Inoke tubulau i atilomwan-agil , ge wana bateli toto iya totona i ginol i nuwahikan .
42001073	He iya i ba papasila tubula Abalahama elana ,
42001074	i bateli te ni pwamwalila ala topihigelgel nimaliyaa , yaka nige ta lolovakun , yaa yawalila miminana ta tapwatapwalolo eliyana , ge wala pagan ni sapu ge ni waisi matanaa .
42001075	
42001076	He owa natu , abwe gamagalau nihi ba owa Tomihahaina Hot wana palopita etega , kaiwena nu nohouwa Babala awonaa ge kamwasa nu lovivina-an iya kaiwena .
42001077	He nasi wana gamagalau nu pankitel wala Yabowaine atilomwan i kalaopopwi ge wana pagan i meimei , inoke nuwana wali gegi ni nuwayoho ge pwamwal nihi pwawa . Iya sabwelu mwananalina ni patunem labulabumwa ,
42001078	
42001079	inoke bolo hi minaa gogouwa ge yaomal ligumwina elana ni yanel , ge ni nulila mibubun ana kamwasa elana ta nanawa .
42001080	Wawaya i bwabwata nawa ge yayaluwana al i mamatuwa nawa . Inoke i na i miminek uleya labi kekevana elana ana siga lan toto wana tuwalali i telipuna-an boda Isileli mataliyaa .
42002001	Saugena o Sisa Ogastas logugui etega i ginol gamagalau gegewel bolo hi minaa Loma wana abalogugui gamwanaa , ali gewi nihi ahe ge alaliya nihi leli lowan alan ana buki gamwanaa .
42002002	Alan leleli toto ya abwe pamaisena hi ginol , sauga toto Kuliniyasi wana sauga gavana labi Siliya elana .
42002003	Toto o kaiwena , inoke gamagal maisena ge maisena i nok i na wana mumuga panuwana elana ge alana nihi leli lowan alan ana buki gamwanaa .
42002004	Yosepa al ge labi Galili panuwana Nasaleta i eguluwan i na Yudiya panuwana Bedeliyema , Deibid wana mumugaa , kaiwena iya kin Deibid tubutubunina .
42002005	Alona ge Meli toto valila i kawakawalolu-an hi nok ge alaliya nihi leli lowan . He saugena o Meli iyaka i liyan .
42002006	Sauga heliya iyoho Bedeliyema , inoke wana sauga ab i pwawa ,
42002007	yaka natuna gamaun melutauina i ab . Inoke kaliko i ahe wawaya tuwana i avan painan ge i pakenuwa bulumakau mwaheliyaa , kaiwena nige abamina i gagan kaiweliya limi bwabwali gamwanaa .
42002008	Labi o elana sipi ali tomatahikan enuna heliya iyoho to panuwa labenaa , bulina wali sipi hi matahikagil .
42002009	Yehoba wana anelose etega i masal elal ge Yehoba wana wasawasa namanamalina i yana painanagil inoke hi lovakun nabi .
42002010	Yaa anelose i baek elal i ba , “ Bahi lovakun ! Yaliyaya bwabwatana wasana waiwaisana ya pwatanim eliyamiu , yaliyaya ya gamagalau gegewel kaiweliya .
42002011	Lan ebe Deibid wana mumuga panuwana elana Topwamwal hi ab kaiwemiu , iya Keliso Babala .
42002012	He ana euna ni ola hiwe : wawaya melumelu etega nuku kite kaliko hi ahe tuwana hi avan painan ge hi pakenuwa bulumakau mwaheliyaa . ”
42002013	Yaka sauga o aneloseyau labulabumwa boda bwabwatana hot hi masal avaliya anelose o , ge Yehoba hi tobatobal-an hi ba ,
42002014	“ Yehoba labulabumwa ta awa wasawasa-an , ge panayawiya gamagalau nihi mibubun , iya i yaliyaya-agil . ”
42002015	Sauga aneloseyau sipi ali tomatahikan hi eguluwagil hi sikal labulabumwa , inoke sipi ali tomatahikan hi pebaaba-agil hi ba , “ Ta egon ta na Bedeliyema , inoke bugul toto iyaka i masal ge wasana Babala i baunan elala ta kite . ”
42002016	Inoke hi egon hi nopatapatalelu hi na Meli alona ge Yosepa hi pwawal , ge wawaya hi kite iyoho i kenukenu bulumakau mwaheliyaa .
42002017	Sauga wawaya hi kite haba , inoke hauna toto anelose i baunan elal wawaya kaiwena hi wasaan .
42002018	Gamagalau gegewel bolo sipi ali tomatahikan wali wasa hi hago nuwaliya hi ahe .
42002019	Yaa Meli bugul gegewena bolo i hago ge i kitel i teliya atenaa ge i nuwanuwatu kaiweliya .
42002020	He sipi ali tomatahikan hi sikal wali sipi elal . Yehoba hi awa wasawasa-an ge hi tobatobal-an bugul gegewena bolo hi hago ge hi kitel kaiweliya . He i masal i ola ya te anelose i baunan eliyalil .
42002021	Sauga wawaya wana lan eit i pwawa , inoke tuwana buhuna kunisina hi gotomwa yoho ge alana hi tun Yeisu , i ola alan toto valila anelose i baunan houwan mulaa abwe hinana i liyanan .
42002022	Sauga iyaka i pwawa ge Meli alona ge Yosepa abwabubun paganina nihi ginol , * ni ola Mosese wana logugui ana baaba . Inoke wawaya hi ahe ge hi pwatanik Yelusalema nihi guyauan Yehoba elana ,
42002023	ni ola Yehoba wana logugui hi leli Buki Bwabwalena gamwanaa i ba , “ Gamaun melutauil gegewel nuku pwabwabwalena-agil Yehoba elana . ”
42002024	I ola al bunibuni eluwa hi ahe nihi powonan Yehoba elana Meli ana abwabubun kaiwena , ni ola Yehoba wana logugui ana baaba i ba , “ Bunibuni awa etega eluwa o ebo bunibuni awa getoga natunau eluwa ni pwatanik . ”
42002025	Tau etegana i miminaa Yelusalema alana Simiyon , wana pagan i sapu ge i abulilek hot Yehoba elana . Yayaluwa Bwabwalena i minaa eliyana ge i matamatan Isileli wali Topwamwal kaiwena .
42002026	Yayaluwa Bwabwalena wana pamasal eliyana tage nigeya ga ni yayaomal ana siga Mesaiya toto Yehoba i bateli ni kiteya matanaa .
42002027	Inoke Yayaluwa Bwabwalena Simiyon i nul i na i ulutuk Limi Bwabwalena gamwanaa . Yosepa ge Meli wawaya Yeisu hi hin tukan nihi ginol elana ni ola Mosese wana Logugui ,
42002028	inoke Simiyon wawaya i ahe nimana elana i hin ge Yehoba i tobalan i ba :
42002029	Babala , sauga ya iyaka bosowaina nau wam totuwalali loloyowanina nu talamwagau laumwal elana na yaomal , ni ola valila u bateli eliyau .
42002030	Kaiwena iyaka totou matau elana wam pwamwal gamagalina ya kite ,
42002031	toto u lovivina-an gamagalau gegewel kaiweliya ge nihi kite .
42002032	Iya mwananal , inoke bolo nige Yudiya i oola ni yanel ge wam kamwasa nihi atena , ge ama wam gamagalau Isileli ni yanema ge ni pawasawasa-agima .
42002033	He wawaya tamana ge hinana nuwaliya hi ahe Simiyon wana baaba kaiwena , toto i baunan wawaya kaiwena .
42002034	Yaka Simiyon i baek elal i ba , “ Yehoba ni muloluagimiu , ” ge i baek wawaya hinana Meli elana i ba , “ U hago ! Wawaya ya Yehoba i hile boda Isileli nihi gewi ni palutil pwamwal nihi pwawa ge nihi gewi al iya kaiwena nihi sogu nak nihi pwawa . Yehoba i teli iya ana etotohi , yaa gamagalau nihi gewi nihi awa nanakan ,
42002035	inoke wali nuwatu misusumena ni masal mwananala . He owa , lomwan amnana ni ola elohaveyan kilepana atem ni howa . ”
42002036	Yova etegana iya palopita alana Ana , Penuweli natuna , ana un Aseli ge iyaka i liki nabi . Valila i alolon alona ge lagona hi minamina baliman ana gewi seben ,
42002037	abwe lagona i yaomal ge i abuabul . He sauga ya wana baliman ana gewi eiti po . Nige sauga etega Limi Bwabwalena i eeguluwan , bulin ge lan awanun kaiwena ana galebu ni palahikan ni awaawanun ge ni tapwatapwalolo Yehoba elana .
42002038	Sauga o elana iya al i nok i na wawaya elana ge i ba mulolu Yehoba elana , inoke wawaya kaiwena i baaba gamagalau gegewel elal bolo hi matamatan Yehoba Yelusalema ni sokal .
42002039	Sauga Yosepa alona ge Meli Yehoba wana logugui ana nuwatu gegewena hi ginol haba Limi Bwabwalena eliyana , inoke aloliya wawaya hi sikal hi na wali awana Nasaleta labi Galili elana .
42002040	He wawaya i bwabwata nawa ge i gagasisi nawa ; siba i kalaopopwi ge Yehoba wana mulolu i minaa eliyana .
42002041	Baliman maisena ge maisena Yeisu tamana ge hinana hi noknok Yelusalema Nopalegi Hagalena kaiwena .
42002042	Sauga Yeisu wana baliman ana bwata elulutega eluwa , inoke alonau tamana ge hinana hi nok hi na Hagali o kaiwena , i ola tamana ge hinana hi giginol .
42002043	Hagali i mowasi , yaka gamagalau hi sikasikal wali panuwaa . He geman Yeisu i minaa Yelusalema , yaa tamana ge hinana nige hi aatena .
42002044	Hi nuwatu tage iya iyoho boda gamwaliyaa avaliya hi notoyawa , inoke lan o bwalibwaligena hi nawanawa . Yaka abwe hi loyaan tutuliyau ge wali heliyamwau gamwaliyaa .
42002045	Yaa nige hi pwapwawa , inoke hi sikal al hi na hi loyaan Yelusalema .
42002046	He lan etonina elana abwe hi pwawa Limi Bwabwalena gamwanaa alonau logugui ana topanpankiti hi misiyo ge hi liwaliwan . Iya wali baaba i lalaegan-an ge i nelnel .
42002047	Bolo wana baaba hi hago , gegewel nuwaliya hi ahe kaiwena alona ge wana aatena topankite wali nel i lahe bubun .
42002048	Sauga tamana ge hinana hi kite , nuwaliya hi ahe hoti . Yaka hinana i baek elana i ba , “ Natu , ga i ola ge pagan ya u ginol eliyama ? Alou ge tamwam ha nuwanuwatu nabi ge ha loyaloya kaiwem . ”
42002049	Anana i lahe i ba , “ Ga i ola ge ku loyaagau ? Age nige ku aatena na minaa ga Nam wana limiya ? ”
42002050	Yaa wana baaba ana sapu nige hi aatena .
42002051	Yaka abwe alonau tamana ge hinana hi sikal hi na Nasaleta , ge i henapuagil . Inoke hinana bugul bolo hi gan i nuwahikan bubun ge i teliya atenaa .
42002052	He Yeisu wana baliman ge wana siba i bwabwata nawa , ge i ola al Yehoba ge gamagalau hi yaliyaya-an nabiyan .
42003001	Sauga toto Sisa Taibeliyas wana sauga logugui ana baliman piptin elana , Pontiyas Pilato i gavana labi Yudiya elana , Helodi i tologugui labi Galili elana , talina Pilipi i tologugui labi Ituliya ge Telekonitis elal , Lisaniyas i tologugui labi Abilini elana ,
42003002	ge Anasa alona Kaiyapa heliya topowon bwabwatal wali tohouwa . He saugena o Diyon Sakalaiya natuna i miminaa uleya labi kekevana elana inoke Yehoba anana i gan elana .
42003003	Yaka i na panuwa gegewel elal bolo hi minaa wewel Yolidani labenaa , ge i papaatena gamagalau elal i ba , “ Wami pagan nanakina ana en nuku pek ge nuku babitaiso , inoke Yehoba wami gegi ni nuwayoho . ”
42003004	I masal i ola toto palopita Aiseya i lelelian wana buki gamwanaa , i ba : Gamagal etega to i yogayoga uleya labi kekevana elana , i ba , “ Babala wana kamwasa ku lovivina-an , wana kela ku pasapu .
42003005	Opop gegewena nuku pakalaopopwil , oya ge manahinhin gegewel nuku ken lowagil ni olaolaek . Kamwasa bolo hi lilikomkom nuku ken pasapu , ge kela bolo lohalhalina nuku pasapusapu .
42003006	Inoke gamagalau gegewel Yehoba wana pwamwal nihi kite . ”
42003007	Boda bwabwatana hi nowanik hi na Diyon elana tage ni pababitaisoil , inoke i baek elal i ba , “ Komiu ku ola mwata ! Henala i baewa eliyamiu ge nuwamiu Yehoba wana lahi toto i nenem nuku louwi ?
42003008	Ebo tunahot wami gegi iyaka ana en ku pek , he enona ni masal yawalimiu elana . Bahi tage nuku ba , ‘ Ama tamama Abalahama , bosowaima ya te Yehoba wana lahi naha louwi . ’ Na baewa eliyamiu , Yehoba i bosowaina te pat ya ni ahel ge Abalahama tubunau ni ginolil .
42003009	He wana kenumu iyaka i lovivina-an ebwakil ewahililiya ni gotomwa ge nihi maguli . Ebwakil gegewel bolo enowaliya nige i wawaisi ni govel ge ni yoho tukagil ginaha gamwanaa . ”
42003010	Yaka boda hi nel Diyon elana hi ba , “ He binimala hauna gun naha ginol ? ”
42003011	Analiya i lahe i ba , “ Henala ebo ana holahola eluwa , he etega ni guyauan toto nige ana holahola i gagan elana , ge henala ebo aana i gan , ni ginol ni ola al to . ”
42003012	Takis ana toahi enuna hi nok hi na tage ni pababitaisoil , inoke hi nel elana hi ba , “ Topankite , binimala hauna naha ginol ? ”
42003013	Yaka wali nel i lahe i ba , “ Bahi takis nuku aahe likaan gamagalau elal , yaa ana bwata toto logugui i baunan te nuku ahe . ”
42003014	Tolohaveyan enuna hi nel elana hi ba , “ Yaa ga i ola ama ? Binimala hauna naha ginol ? ” Yaka wali nel al i lahe i ba , “ Bahi gamagalau nuku papalawakikil ge wali mani nihi pepewa , ge bahi nuku wowolel kakawel ge nihi pwapwamolamiu , yaa besena te molamiu toto ku aahe elana nuku minaa . ”
42003015	He gamagalau Mesaiya wana nem kaiwena hi matamatan , inoke ateliyaa hi nuwatu ge hi nel hi ba , “ Diyon iya Mesaiya eba ? ”
42003016	Yaa Diyon i baek gegewel elal i ba , “ Nau ya pababitaisomiu wewel elana , yaa etega iyoho i nenem iya alana i bwata hot , nau alau nige i bwabwata . Nau nige no waisi i gagan tage bosowaiu aena ana os ana hihiu na leke . He iya abwe ni pababitaisomiu Yayaluwa Bwabwalena ge ginaha elana .
42003017	Wana sobel iyoho i pihikan nimanaa , yaka i tetelipuna wana witi enona alona ge musana ni ase , inoke abwe enona hot ni bugulan ni teliya wana gonuwa , ge musana ni ton ginaha elana toto nige sauga etega ni bobolu . ”
42003018	He Diyon baaba ololana o hi gewi i baunanagil , inoke eliyana gamagalau i ba pagasisel ge wasa waiwaisana i papaatena-an elal .
42003019	Yaa Helodi , Galili wali tologugui , wana pagan nanakina Diyon i baunanek eliyana , kaiwena talina lagona Helodiyas i oe ge pagan nanakina hi gewi al i ginolil .
42003020	Inoke Helodi wana pagan nanakina i paetulan al ge Diyon i yowan i paulutuk-an dela .
42003021	Sauga Diyon gamagalau gegewel i pababitaisoil , inoke Yeisu al i pababitaiso . He Yeisu iyoho i awaawanun inoke labulabum i mwapwela ,
42003022	yaka Yayaluwa Bwabwalena ana awa i ola bunibuni i lau elana . Ge anan etega i loem labulabumwa i ba , “ Owa natu nunuwanina hot , ya yaliyaya nabiyan kaiwem . ”
42003023	Sauga Yeisu wana baliman tabam i ola teti ( 30 ) , inoke abwe wana tuwalali i telipuna . He gamagalau hi nuwatu te Yeisu tamana Yosepa . Yosepa tamana Heli ,
42003024	Heli tamana Madati , Madati tamana Libai , Libai tamana Meleki , Meleki tamana Yanai , Yanai tamana Yosepa ,
42003025	Yosepa tamana Madatiyas , Madatiyas tamana Emos , Emos tamana Neiham , Neiham tamana Esili , Esili tamana Nagai ,
42003026	Nagai tamana Madi , Madi tamana Madatiyas , Madatiyas tamana Semeina , Semeina tamana Yoseki , Yoseki tamana Yoda ,
42003027	Yoda tamana Yowanani , Yowanani tamana Lesa , Lesa tamana Selababel , Selababel tamana Seyaltiyel , Seyaltiyel tamana Neli ,
42003028	Neli tamana Meleki , Meleki tamana Adi , Adi tamana Kosami , Kosami tamana Elimadam , Elimadam tamana Eli ,
42003029	Eli tamana Yosuwa , Yosuwa tamana Eliyesa , Eliyesa tamana Yolim , Yolim tamana Madati , Madati tamana Libai ,
42003030	Libai tamana Simiyon , Simiyon tamana Yuda , Yuda tamana Yosepa , Yosepa tamana Yonam , Yonam tamana Elayakim ,
42003031	Elayakim tamana Meleya , Meleya tamana Mena , Mena tamana Matada , Matada tamana Neitan , Neitan tamana Deibid ,
42003032	Deibid tamana Diyesi , Diyesi tamana Obedi , Obedi tamana Bowasa , Bowasa tamana Salimon , Salimon tamana Nason ,
42003033	Nason tamana Aminadaba , Aminadaba tamana Edmin , Edmin tamana Ani , Ani tamana Hesiloni , Hesiloni tamana Peles , Peles tamana Yuda ,
42003034	Yuda tamana Yakobo , Yakobo tamana Aisake , Aisake tamana Abalahama , Abalahama tamana Tela , Tela tamana Naho ,
42003035	Naho tamana Selag , Selag tamana Liu , Liu tamana Peleg , Peleg tamana Ebe , Ebe tamana Sela ,
42003036	Sela tamana Keinan , Keinan tamana Apakad , Apakad tamana Semi , Semi tamana Nowa , Nowa tamana Lemeki ,
42003037	Lemeki tamana Metuisela , Metuisela tamana Inok , Inok tamana Yaledi , Yaledi tamana Mahalalil , Mahalalil tamana Keinan ,
42003038	Keinan tamana Inosi , Inosi tamana Seti , Seti tamana Adama , Adama tamana Yehoba .
42004001	Yeisu i sikalem wewel Yolidani Yayaluwa Bwabwalena i kalaopopwi , inoke Yayaluwa Bwabwalena i nul i na uleya labi kekevana elana ,
42004002	ge lan poti Seitani Yeisu i papalawakik . Lan bolo ona o elal Yeisu nige bugul etega i aan , he lan mowamowasena elana abwe i galebu nabi .
42004003	Inoke Seitani Yeisu i labose ge i baek elana i ba , “ Ebo tunahot owa Yehoba Natuna , u ba pat ya elana ni tabwa aanan . ”
42004004	Yeisu Seitani anana i lahe i ba , “ Buki Bwabwalena i ba , ‘ Nige tage gamagal aanan awawana ni an ge yawalina ni gan . ’ ”
42004005	Inoke Seitani Yeisu i nul hi na hi ha oya mihahaina elana ge etimwawa abalogugui gegewena panayawiya i pankite .
42004006	Inoke i baek elana i ba , “ Gasisi gegewena na pewa eliyam ge abalogugui bolo ya ginebi ge gogomwauina nu logugui-agil . Kaiwena iyaka Yehoba i pem eliyau , ge ebo nuwau , bosowaiu ya te na pek gamagal etega elana .
42004007	He ebo nu kululu eliyau , bugul bolo ya gegewena owa kaiwem . ”
42004008	Yeisu Seitani anana i lahe i ba , “ Buki Bwabwalena i ba , ‘ Nu kululu Yehoba wam Yabowaine elana , iya maisena ya te nu tapwalolo elana . ’ ”
42004009	Yaka Seitani Yeisu i nul hi na Yelusalema ge i patalmilil Limi Bwabwalena pwatanaa hot . Inoke i baek elana i ba , “ Ebo tunahot owa Yehoba Natuna , u supeni lowa te .
42004010	Kaiwena Buki Bwabwalena i ba : Yehoba ni ba wana aneloseyau elal nihi matahikagiwa bubun
42004011	ge nimaliya elana nihi pihikagiwa , inoke nige aem etega nu tutupaan pat elana . ”
42004012	Inoke Yeisu Seitani anana i lahe i ba , “ Buki Bwabwalena i ba , ‘ Bahi Yehoba wam Yabowaine nu lalabose . ’ ”
42004013	Seitani lawakik bolo o i ginol Yeisu elana i pwamowasi , inoke i eguluwan ge i matamatan wana sauga etega al .
42004014	Yeisu alona Yayaluwa Bwabwalena wana gasisi i sikal i na Galili , ge wasana i lelu labi o gegewena elana .
42004015	I na wali limi tapwalolowa i panpankiti , inoke gamagalau gegewel hi tobalan .
42004016	Inoke Yeisu i na Nasaleta , awan toto eliyana ge i bwataa , yaka lan Sabwata eliyana i na i tuk limi tapwalolowa i ola sauga gegewena i giginol . I talmilil Buki Bwabwalena ni vasili ,
42004017	inoke palopita Aiseya wana buki hi pek eliyana . Buki o i pwela ge ana leleli i pwawa toto i ba i ola hiwe :
42004018	Yehoba Yayaluwana i minaa eliyau , kaiwena enonu i holek pwatawa inoke i hileyau wasa waiwaisana na papaatena-an togulagula elal . I patunau ge na ba bolo yowayowanil elal sokal nihi pwawa , ge na ba tomatakai elal mataliya nihi panana . I patunau bolo ali hehegan hi apapanak-an ali pulowan na abubun ,
42004019	ge na baek gamagalau elal na ba , “ Sauga iyaka i vin ge Babala wana gamagalau ni pwamwalil . ”
42004020	Inoke Yeisu buki i bili ge i pek pasikal buki ana tomatahikan elana , yaka i misiyo ge ni panpankiti . Gamagalau gegewel limi tapwalolo gamwanaa mataliya hi lihikan elana .
42004021	Inoke i baek elal i ba , “ Buki Bwabwalena ana baaba toto abwe sauga ya ku hago , he lan ebe iyaka i tabwa tunahot . ”
42004022	Gamagalau gegewel Yeisu hi ba tobalan , ge nuwaliya hi ahe wana baaba waiwaisal kaiweliya . Inoke hi ba , “ He iya Yosepa natuna age ? ”
42004023	Yeisu i baek elal i ba , “ Ya atena nasi wami baaba etega nuku baunanim eliyau nuku ba , ‘ Doketa , totom u sawaliwa . ’ Ge nasi nuku ba , ‘ Bugul bolo u ginolil Kapeniyama elana ge wasana ha hago , he nu ginol al te totom wam panuwa elana e . ’ ”
42004024	Yaka i ba al i ba , “ Ya ba tunahot eliyamiu , nige palopita etega wana panuwa gamagaliliyau hi yayaliyaya-an .
42004025	Na baewa eliyamiu , tunahot Ilaitiya wana sauga elana abuabulau hi gewi hi miminaa Isileli gamwanaa . He baliman eton ge awalehina nige kehe i lalau , yaka galebu bwabwatana i masal panuwa o ana labi gegewena elana .
42004026	Yaa Yehoba nige Ilaitiya i papatuna i nana abuabulau bolo o etega i lalabe , i patuna i noek ya te abuabul etega nige Isileli yovana i oola , iya i miminaa awan Selepat panuwa Saidoni ana labiya .
42004027	He i ola al palopita Ilaisa wana sauga elana , tolepelo hi gewi hi miminaa Isileli gamwanaa , yaa Ilaisa nige etega i pwapwamolu , Naman labi Siliya gamagalina ya te i pwamolu . ”
42004028	Gamagalau gegewel limi tapwalolo gamwanaa , sauga baaba o hi hago inoke hi huga nabi .
42004029	Yaka hi lut ge Yeisu hi momol tagilan panuwa tolinaa , ge hi pwatanik oya toto panuwa hi ginola , lamwanaa . Wali nuwatu tage nihi pwabun yohek lebwalebwala ,
42004030	yaa i nosolaa boda gamwaliyaa ge i egon .
42004031	Inoke Yeisu i nok i na Kapeniyama Galili awanina bwabwatana , ge lan Sabwata elana i na limi tapwalolowa ge i panpankiti gamagalau elal .
42004032	Gegewel nuwaliya hi ahe wana panpankiti kaiwena , kaiwena i baaba alona ge wana gasisi .
42004033	Tau etega iyoho to limi tapwalolo gamwanaa , yayaluwa bibikena i holaviya elana . Inoke yayaluwa bibikena tau i pabaaba ge i yoga anana i bwata i ba ,
42004034	“ Ei ! Yeisu gagama Nasaleta , ga i ola ge u nem eliyama ? Age nuwam nu apapanak-agima ? Ya atenawa ya , owa Yehoba wana Gamagal Bwabwalena . ”
42004035	Yeisu i ba lalaan i ba , “ U mikekei ! U tagil elana ! ” Yaka yayaluwa bibikena tau o i tagapasoguwa bilibiliya gamagalau gegewel mataliyaa , ge i ulutagil nige tau tuwana i aapanak .
42004036	Gamagalau gegewel nuwaliya hi ahe , inoke hi nelnel avaliyau elal hi ba , “ Hauna kaba baaba e ? Tau ya alona wana gasisi i baaba yayaluwa bibikel elal inoke hi ulutagil . ”
42004037	Yaka Yeisu wasana i lelu labi o gegewena elal .
42004038	Yeisu limi tapwalolo i eguluwan , i nok i na Saimon wana limiya . Saimon yawana nevenak i kasiyebwa , tuwana i waiwai nabi , yaka hi awanun Yeisu elana ge ni labe .
42004039	Inoke i na i talmilil labenaa ge anana i gasisi i ba kasiyebwa ni egon . Yaka tuwana waiwaina i mowasi , inoke sauga o i lut ge aanan i ginol i pek Yeisu ge alonau elal .
42004040	Sabwelu lobelobekina elana , gamagalau avaliyau bolo ali kasiyebwa tomaha ge tomaha , gegewel hi ahel ge hi pwatanik Yeisu elana . Nimana i teliya maisena ge maisena tuwaliyaa inoke gegewel i pwamolol .
42004041	I ola al yayaluwa bibikel hi tagilem gamagalau hi gewi elal ge hi yoga hi ba , “ Owa Yehoba Natuna . ” Yaa Yeisu i ba lopwalil ge nige i tatalamwagil nihi baaba , kaiwena hi atena te iya Mesaiya .
42004042	Mweluluga kekeisi , Yeisu panuwa o i eguluwan i na labi etega elana toto nige gamagalau hi miminaa . Gamagalau hi loyaloya Yeisu kaiwena , ge sauga hi pwawa , inoke hi labose tage nihi lopwali ge bahi ni eegon .
42004043	Yaa i baek elal i ba , “ Yehoba wana abalogugui wasana waiwaisana na papaatena-an ga panuwa enuna al elal , kaiwena i patunau ya nem ge tuwalali o na ginol . ”
42004044	Inoke i na Yudiya wali labi gegewena ge i papaatena wali limi tapwalolo elal .
42005001	Lan etega Yeisu i talmilila Hoga Genesaleta * ana talbwasiya , inoke gamagalau hi gewi hi nowanik hi na hi mipahipahi elana Yehoba wana baaba hi lalaegan .
42005002	He Yeisu tologi wali waga eluwa i kiteliya datuwa hi eguluwan ge hi na wali vineya hi ulul .
42005003	Inoke i na i ha waga etega elana , toto Saimon wana waga , yaka i baek elana i hone tagilan nige ana bwaga i yayapu datuwa . Inoke i misiyo wagaa ge i panpankiti gamagalau elal .
42005004	Sauga wana baaba i pwamowasi , yaka i baek Saimon elana i ba , “ Waga u gotagilan ni na limwana , inoke wami vineya nuku yoho palo ge moti nuku logel . ”
42005005	Saimon Yeisu anana i lahe i ba , “ Tonowak , bulin yayapona ha logasisi nabi nige moti etega ha lologe . Yaa wam baaba kaiwena , he vineya na yoho palo . ”
42005006	Sauga hi ginol ola o , yaka moti hi gewi nabi hi ona ge kelaubwa vineya nihi hanalabulabuan .
42005007	Inoke hi lokani avaliyau elal bolo hi miminaa waga labuina elana nihi gonok ge nihi label . Sauga avaliyau hi vin elal , yaka waga labui hi usan pakalaopop ge kelaubwa nihi lobek .
42005008	Saimon Pita ginol o i kite , inoke i loepwakokuwa Yeisu manininaa ge i ba , “ Babala , u eguluwagau , nau togegi . ”
42005009	He Saimon Pita alonau ge alonau nuwaliya hi ahe moti bolo hi logel ali gewi kaiwena .
42005010	I ola al Saimon alonau eluwa , Yemesa ge Diyon Sebedi natunau , nuwaliya hi ahe . Yaka Yeisu i baek Saimon elana i ba , “ Bahi lovakun . Sauga ya ge i nok owa gamagalau ali tologi . ”
42005011	Inoke hi na hi gotuk , yaka bugul gegewena hi tataluwagil ge Yeisu hi toulil .
42005012	Sauga Yeisu iyoho panuwa etega elana , tau etega i miminaa to , iya kasiyebwa lepelo tuwana bwalibwaligena i apapanak-an . Sauga tau o Yeisu i kite , inoke i na i loepwakoku elana ge maninina i pahanalowanek bilibiliya , yaka i awanun nabinabi elana i ba , “ Babala , ebo nuwam , i bosowaina nu abubunau . ”
42005013	Yeisu nimana i paelu tau o i pihikan , yaka i ba , “ E , nuwau . Tuwam ni waisi ! ” Inoke sauga o ana lepelo i mowasi .
42005014	Yaka Yeisu i ba pagasisi elana i ba , “ Bahi gamagal etega wana wasa nu pepek , yaa u nok u na ga topowon elana ge tuwam ni hile . Bwasumu ni powonan Yehoba elana am abwabubun kaiwena , ni ola Mosese wana Logugui , inoke gamagalau nihi atena tunahot tuwam iyaka i waisi . ”
42005015	Yaka abwe Yeisu wana ginol wasana i lelu nabi , inoke boda hi nemnem elana wana baaba nihi laeganan ge ni pwamolol ali kasiyebwa elana .
42005016	Yaa sauga i gewi boda ni eguluwagil ge ni na labi bolo nige gamagalau hi miminaa ni awaawanun .
42005017	Lan etega Yeisu i panpankiti gamagalau elal . Palisi avaliyau ge Logugui ana topankite heliya iyoho to hi misiyo o , hi neem labi Galili awanina gegewena elal , ge hi neem Yelusalema ge Yudiya labena gegewena elana . He Babala wana gasisi i minaa Yeisu elana ge tokasiyebwa i pwamolol .
42005018	Bolau enuna toelolol etega i minaa wana abakenuwa hi kalivai pwatanim , hi labose tage nihi tuk limi gamwanaa ge nihi pakenuwa Yeisu manininaa .
42005019	Yaa nige bosowailiya nihi kalivai tukan , kaiwena gamagalau hi gewi hot . Limi pwatana i abwab , inoke hi kalivai hi na hi ha limi pwatanaa ge limi pwatana hi pwela . Yaka ginebi ge wana abakenu hi pakuki lowan boda ali luwaluwala Yeisu manininaa .
42005020	Sauga wali abulilek Yeisu i kite , inoke i baek toelolol elana i ba , “ Alou , wam gegi Yehoba matanaa iyaka ya nuwayoho . ”
42005021	Logugui ana topankite avaliyau ge Palisi totoliya hi penuwanuwatu-agil hi ola , “ Henala tau ya ? Iya i ba bwagabwaga ge Yehoba i hewa likaan ! Nige gamagal etega bosowaina gegi ni nuwayoho , Yehoba maisena ya te bosowaina . ”
42005022	Wali nuwatu Yeisu i atena , inoke i baek elal i ba , “ Hauna kaiwena bugul ya ku nuwanuwatu-agil atemiwa ?
42005023	I mweyaha te ebo na ba , ‘ Wam gegi Yehoba matanaa iyaka ya nuwayoho . ’ Yaa i pulowan te ebo na ba , ‘ U lut ge u nawanawa . ’ †
42005024	He toto pupulowanina na baunan ge na ginol , inoke nuku atena al te Gamagal Natuna wana gasisi i gan panayawiya gegi ni nuwayoho . ” Inoke i baek toelolol elana i ba , “ Na baewa eliyam , u lut wam abakenu u ahe ge u sikal wam limiya . ”
42005025	Etimwawa i lut gamagalau gegewel mataliyaa , ge wana abakenu toto i kenukenuwa i ahe , inoke Yehoba i tobatobal-an i sikal wana limiya .
42005026	Gamagalau gegewel nuwaliya hi ahe , inoke Yehoba hi tobatobal-an ge alona wali lovakun hi ba , “ Bugul toto lan ebe ta kite i getoga hot . ”
42005027	Toto o enaa , Yeisu i tagil panuwa tolinaa inoke takis ana toahi etega alana Libai i kite i misiyowa wana abatuwalaliya . I baek elana i ba , “ U toulilau . ”
42005028	Inoke Libai i lut , bugul gegewena i tataluwai ge Yeisu i toulil .
42005029	Yaka Libai aanan bwabwatana i ginola wana limiya Yeisu kaiwena . He takis ana toahi hi gewi ge gamagalau enuna al hi gewi aloliyau hi anan .
42005030	Yaa Palisi enuna avaliyau ge logugui ana topankite enuna , heliya boda Palisi , Yeisu wana tohago hi lovehawol-agil hi ba , “ Hauna kaiwena alomiyau takis ana toahi ge togegi ku anan ge ku imwim toyawa ? ”
42005031	Yeisu analiya i lahe i ba , “ Tomolu nige nuwaliya tosawasawal , tokasiyebwa ya te nuwaliya .
42005032	Ya nem nige tage bolo hi ba ‘ Ama tosasapol ’ ge na yogaagil , yaa ya nem togegi na yogaagil inoke wali gegi ana en nihi pek . ”
42005033	Gamagalau enuna hi baek Yeisu elana hi ba , “ Diyon wana tohago sauga hi gewi galebu hi papalahikan ge hi awaawanun . He Palisi wali tohago hi giginol i ola al to . Yaa owa wam tohago nihi mimi anan ge nihi mimi imwim . ”
42005034	Yeisu analiya i lahe i ba , “ Ebo alolon ana hagali nihi ginol , he nige bosowaina nuku ba toalolon melutauina wana heliyamwau galebu nihi palahikan , sauga iya iyoho avaliya .
42005035	Yaa ana sauga abwe ni vin , inoke topihigelgel toalolon melutauina nihi ahek gamwaliyaa , yaka lan o eliyana abwe galebu nihi palahikan . ”
42005036	Yeisu ba gohalibe ya i baunan elal i ba , “ Nige holahola vavaluna ta kukuleli ge buhuna ta aahe holahola bebeyaunana mwahawanina ta bwabwaliniya . Ebo ta ginol ola o , he holahola vavaluna iyaka ta apanak , ge bwalin vavaluna nige alona holahola bebeyaunana ali awa ni oolaolaek .
42005037	I ola al , nige oine vavaluna ta hoholek ana patuna bebeyaunana goti kunisina gamwanaa . Ebo ta ginol ola o , he oine vavaluna ana gasisi kaiwena goti kunisina ni maleli inoke oine ni maligin ge goti kunisina ni nak .
42005038	He oine vavaluna ta holek te ana patuna goti kunisina vavaluna gamwanaa .
42005039	“ Oine vavaluna nige ana nuwan i gagana gamagal toto oine bebeyaunana i im tounuwe eliyana . Kaiwena nasi ni ba , ‘ Oine bebeyaunana te amnana i waisi . ’ ”
42006001	Sabwata etega Yeisu i nosola witi ana eyowa etega gamwanaa . Wana tohago witi enona hi lokibwaan inoke hi mut nimaliyaa musana i lobabal ge enona hi an .
42006002	Palisi enuna hi nelil hi ba , “ Hauna kaiwena Sabwata ana logugui ku leke ? ”
42006003	Yeisu analiya i lahe i ba , “ Age nige Deibid liwanina ku vavasili ga , ga i ginol ola sauga alonau ge alonau hi galebu ?
42006004	He Deibid i na i ulutuk Yehoba wana limiya , yaka beleid bwabwalena toto hi teliya Yehoba manininaa , topowon i pek elana ge i ahe i an , inoke enuna i pek alonau hi an . Yaa logugui i ba tage bahi gamagal etega beleid o ni aan , topowon ya te nihi an . ”
42006005	Inoke i baek elal i ba , “ Nau Gamagal Natuna , nau Sabwata ana Babala . ”
42006006	Sabwata etegana al , Yeisu i na i ulutuk limi tapwalolowa ge i panpankiti gamagalau elal . Tau etega iyoho to , nimana labi awonaa i aliga .
42006007	Palisi avaliyau ge logugui ana topankite Yeisu ana woliwoli etegana hi loyaan , inoke mataliya hi lihikan elana ebo tau o ni pwamolu Sabwataa .
42006008	Yaa Yeisu wali nuwatu i atena , inoke i baek tau toto nimana alialigana elana i ba , “ U lut , u nem u talmilil gamagalau gegewel mataliyaa . ” Yaka tau o i lut ge i na i talmilil .
42006009	Inoke Yeisu i baek elal i ba , “ Nel etega na neli eliyamiu . Logugui ga i ba ola Sabwata kaiwena ? Pagan waiwaisana ta ginol o ebo pagan nanakina ? Gamagal yawalina ta pwamolu , o ebo ta apanak ? ”
42006010	Yaka matana i lipwapwati gamagalau gegewel elal , inoke i baek tau elana i ba , “ Nimwam u paelu . ” Yaka tau o i ginol i ola to , inoke nimana i waisi .
42006011	Yaa Palisi avaliyau ge logugui ana topankite hi huga nabi , yaka heliya ya awawal hi liwaliwan hauna nihi ginol Yeisu elana .
42006012	Sauga o elana Yeisu i na i ha oyaa ge ni awanun , inoke bulin o i awanun matavi Yehoba elana .
42006013	Sauga lan i gan , inoke wana tohago i yogaagil hi nem elana ge gamwaliyaa ali toto elulutega eluwa i hilel ge ali boda alana i tun apostolowau .
42006014	He apostolowau o alaliya i ola hiwe : Saimon ( alana al i tun Pita ) , talina Andulu , Yemesa , Diyon , Pilipi , Batolomiu ,
42006015	Mataiyo , Tomas , ge Yemesa toto Alipiyos natuna , Saimon toto hi ba iya boda Seloti etega ,
42006016	Yudasa toto Yemesa natuna , ge Yudasa Isikaliyota , iya Yeisu i wasaan .
42006017	Yeisu alonau ge wana apostolowau hi loem oyaa , inoke i na i talmilila abwab etega elana . Wana tohago boda bwabwatana heliya iyoho to , avaliyau ge gamagalau boda bwabwatana hot , heliya hi neem Yelusalema ge Yudiya wali labi gegewena elal , ge hi neem panuwa bolo hi minaa hoga bebenaa Taya ge Saidoni wali labiya .
42006018	Hi nem wana baaba hi laeganan ge ali kasiyebwa elana i pwamolol . Bolo yayaluwa bibikena i holaviya elal ge i apapanak-agil i pwamolol ,
42006019	ge gamagalau gegewel hi labose Yeisu nihi pihikan , kaiwena gasisi i tagilem eliyana yaka gegewel i pwamolol .
42006020	Yeisu matana i nok wana tohago elal inoke i ba : Komiu bolo ku gulagula , Yehoba i muloluagimiu , kaiwena wana abalogugui i minewa eliyamiu .
42006021	Komiu bolo sauga ya ku galebu , Yehoba i muloluagimiu , kaiwena iya ni pakalaopop-agimiu . Komiu bolo sauga ya ku kahin , Yehoba i muloluagimiu , kaiwena iya ni panivalimiu .
42006022	Ebo gamagalau hi kitemiu Gamagal Natuna ku toulil ge nihi pihigelgel-agimiu , nihi teli tagilagimiu wali limi tapwalolowa , nihi ba sisinali-agimiu , ge nihi wasa panapanak-agimiu , ebo hi ginol ola o , Yehoba i muloluagimiu .
42006023	Sauga o elana nuwamiu ni waisi ge wami yaliyaya kaiwena nuku saga , kaiwena molamiu bwabwatana iyoho labulabumwa . He tubuliyau valila pagan bolo o hi ginola palopitau elal .
42006024	Yaa komiu togogomwau sauga ya , bwaliga nuku nak , kaiwena wami minamina waiwaisana iyaka ku pwawa haba .
42006025	Komiu bolo sauga ya ku an tinikiya , bwaliga nuku nak , kaiwena abwe nuku galebu . Komiu bolo sauga ya ku nival , bwaliga nuku nak , kaiwena abwe nuku kahin nuwanuwanak hot .
42006026	Ebo gamagalau gegewel nihi awa wawaisi-agimiu , bwaliga nuku nak . He tubuliyau valila pagan toto o hi ginola palopitau kakakawel elal .
42006027	Yeisu i ba vevehe al i ba , “ Komiu bolo ku lalaegan eliyau na baewa eliyamiu : ami topihigelgel nuku nunuwana-agil , bolo hi pihigelgel-agimiu wami pagan ni waisi elal ,
42006028	bolo hi ba Yehoba ni nuwamutagimiu , nuku awanun ni ba muloluagil , ge bolo ami hehegan hi apapanak-an , nuku awanun kaiweliya .
42006029	Ebo gamagal etega gegenam labena etega ni taganepal , he nu tagena pil labena etega al nu pek ni taganepal . Ebo gamagal etega am kama babalona toto tultul kaiwena ni ahe , he am holahola al nu talamwan ni ahe .
42006030	Henala ebo bugul etega ni awanuni eliyam , he nu pek ya , ge ebo gamagal etega wam bugul etega ni ahe , bahi nu babaa gagasisi ge ni pepewa pasikal .
42006031	Pagan bolo nuwamiu tage gamagalau nihi ginola eliyamiu , heiya te nuku ginola elal .
42006032	“ Yaa ebo bolo hi nunuwana-agimiu ya te nuku nunuwana-agil , ga i ola ge nuku nuwatu tage abwe Yehoba ni pwamolamiu ? He nunuwana ololana o , bwagana heliya togegi , hi giginol ola bolo hi nunuwana-agil elal .
42006033	Ebo bolo wali pagan i waisi eliyamiu ya te wami pagan ni waisi elal , ga i ola ge nuku nuwatu tage abwe Yehoba ni pwamolamiu ? He pagan ololana o bwagana heliya togegi hi giginol ola to .
42006034	Ebo bugul nuku pek ya te bolo ku atenal abwe nihi pasikal eliyamiu , ga i ola ge nuku nuwatu tage abwe Yehoba ni pwamolamiu ? He bwagana heliya togegi , bugul hi pepek wali pan togegi elal bolo hi atenal abwe nihi pwamola paolaolaek .
42006035	Yaa ami topihigelgel nuku nunuwana-agil ge wami pagan ni waisi elal . Bugul nuku pek ge bahi nuku nuwanuwatu te nihi pwamola pasikal eliyamiu . Nuku ginol ola o , inoke abwe mola bwabwatana nuku ahe , ge komiu nuku tabwa Tomihahaina Hot natunau . He iya gamagalau nanakil ge bolo nige hi papata ateu owa eliyana i muloluagil .
42006036	Gamagalau nuku atilomwan-agil , ni ola Tamamiu i atilomwan-agil . ”
42006037	Yaka i ba vevehe al i ba , “ Bahi alomiyau nuku aawa naknakagil , yaka Yehoba nige ni aawa naknakagimiu . Bahi nuku ba , ‘ Heliya gamagalau nanakil , ’ yaka Yehoba nige ni babaa ola al to kaiwemiu . Alomiyau wali gegi nuku nuwayoho , yaka Yehoba wami gegi ni nuwayoho .
42006038	Nuku guguyau alomiyau eliyalil , inoke Yehoba ni guyau eliyamiu . Iya egowa ni usan tu , bwalibwaligena ni kalaopop ge ni pololobabal , inoke ni pewa eliyamiu . He luvi toto ku ginol ge ku pek alomiyau elal , heiya te abwe nuku ahe . ”
42006039	Yeisu ba gohalibe ya i baunan elal i ba , “ Nige bosowaina tomatakai etega wana pan tomatakai ni nul . Ebo ni ginol ola o , nasi ali toto eluwa nihi soguek gola .
42006040	Tovavasili nige wana topankite i bwabwata lake . Yaa maisena ge maisena , ebo wana vavasili ni pwamowasi , he abwe ni ola wana topankite .
42006041	“ Ga i ola ge ebwakil mumusana u gagayawa-an talim matanaa , yaa ebwakil bwabwaligena iyoho owa matamwa nige u nunuwatu-an ?
42006042	Ebo ebwakil bwabwaligena nige u kikite iyoho owa matamwa , ga i ola ge nu baek talim elana nu ba , ‘ Taliu , ebwakil mumusana na ahe tagilan matamwa . ’ Tokakawi owa ! Houwan ga ebwakil bwabwaligena nu ahe tagilan owa matam elana , inoke matam ni mwananal , he abwe bosowaim ebwakil mumusana nu ahe tagilan talim matanaa . ”
42006043	“ Nige bosowaina ebwakil waiwaisana enon nanakina ni enoni . I ola al , nige bosowaina ebwakil nanakina enon waiwaisana ni enoni .
42006044	Ebwakil maisena ge maisena enowaliya ta kite inoke ta atena ebo ebwakil waiwaisana o ebo ebwakil nanakina . Nige bosowaina kapoi enona ta kibwaa pepesala elana , o ebo oine enona ta kibwaa dawodawowo elana .
42006045	Gamagal toto waiwaisana pagan waiwaisana ni enoni , ni ola waisi toto i pwahin atenaa . Gamagal toto nanakina pagan nanakina ni enoni , ni ola nak toto i pwahin atenaa . Hauna ebo atela i pakalaopopwi heiya te i tatagila hohopelaa . ”
42006046	Inoke Yeisu i ba vevehe al i ba , “ Hauna kaiwena ku ba eliyau , ‘ Babala , Babala , ’ ge nige no baaba ku hehenapu-an ?
42006047	Henala ebo ni nem eliyau ge no baaba ni hago ge ni henapuan , he gamagal ololana o ana ba papatini etega na papatini-an .
42006048	Iya i ola limi ana totaltal toto bilibili i ken lowan i na paiya pat gasigasisena elana , inoke limi i pamilil pat o elana . Sauga banata i sani , i na limi i lol , yaa nige bosowaina ni palamwalamwaniu , kaiwena tau o limi i tal pamatuwa .
42006049	Yaa henala no baaba i hago ge nige ni hehenapu-an , he iya i ola tau toto wana limi i pamilil bwabwage gilesa pwatanaa , nige ana ekahiyan . Sauga banata i sani ge limi i lol , etimwawa te i maguli , ge wana maguli o butuna i bwata hot . ”
42007001	Sauga Yeisu bugul bolo ona o baliya i baaba haba boda eliyalil , inoke i nok i na panuwa Kapeniyama .
42007002	He Loma wali tolohaveyan ali tohouwa etega iyoho to . Wana totuwalali etega toto i nunuwana-an bubun i kasiyebwa kelaubwa ni aliga .
42007003	Sauga tohouwa Yeisu wasana i hago , inoke Yudiya wali tonowakau bwabwatal enuna i patunal nihi nok elana ge nihi awanuni ni na wana totuwalali ni pwamolu .
42007004	Sauga tonowakau o hi na hi vin Yeisu eliyana , yaka hi awanun nabinabi hi ba , “ Tau o iya gamagal waiwaisana bosowaina te labe nu ginol iya kaiwena .
42007005	He kilau Yudiya i nunuwana-agila , ge iya te wama limi tapwalolo i tal . ”
42007006	Inoke Yeisu alonau hi nok . Kelaubwa nihi vin tolohaveyan ali tohouwa wana limi labenaa , abwe tohouwa o wana heliyamwau i patunal hi na wana baaba hi baunan Yeisu elana hi ba , “ Babala , bahi tuwam nu papaaliga . Nau nige no waisi i gagan ge tage na ahewa nu nem no limiya .
42007007	I ola al , nige ya nunuwatu te no waisi i gan ge totou na nowa elam . Nu ba ya , inoke no totuwalali ni molu .
42007008	Ya atena bosowaim nu ginol ola , kaiwena nau ya minaa no tonowakau bwabwatal wali logugui gabulanaa , ge gabulawa no tolohaveyan hi gan . Ebo na baek etegana elana , ‘ U nok ’ inoke ni nok , ge ebo na baek etegana al elana , ‘ U nem ’ inoke ni nem . Ge ebo na ba no totuwalali elana , ‘ Toto ya u ginol ’ inoke ni ginol . ”
42007009	Sauga Yeisu baaba o i hago , inoke nuwana i ahe , yaka i tagena sikal i baek boda bolo hi noulil elal i ba , “ Na baewa eliyamiu , nige gamagal etega ya pwapwawa Isileli gamwanaa wana abulilek ana bwata i oola te tau ya . ”
42007010	Inoke gamagalau bolo tolohaveyan ali tohouwa i patunal , hi sikal hi na wana limiya , ge hi kite wana totuwalali iyaka i molu .
42007011	Nige sauga i yayapu , yaka abwe Yeisu i na panuwa etega alana Neini . He wana tohago avaliyau ge boda bwabwatana aloliya hi nok .
42007012	Sauga i vin panuwa ana abatuktuk labenaa , gamagalau enuna i pwawal toyaomal etega hi kalivai tagilan . Toyaomal hinana i abuabul ge natuna tauina iyai te maisena o . He gamagalau boda bwabwatana avaliya hinana hi notoyawa .
42007013	Sauga Babala yova o i kite atena i lomwanan , yaka i baek elana i ba , “ Bahi kahin . ”
42007014	Inoke i na toyaomal ana ebwanabwana i pihikan , yaka bolo hi kalivai hi notalmilil . I baek elana i ba , “ Heval ! Ya ba eliyam , u lut ! ”
42007015	Inoke yawalina i sikal i lut i misiyo ge i telipuna i baaba . Yaka abwe Yeisu heval o i pek pasikal hinana elana .
42007016	Gamagalau gegewel hi lovakun ge nuwaliya hi ahe . Inoke Yehoba hi tobatobal-an hi ba , “ Palopita alana bwabwatana etega te i masal elala e , ” ge hi ba , “ Yehoba iyaka i nem kila wana gamagalau ni labela . ”
42007017	He Yeisu wana ginol toto ya wasana i lelu Yudiya wali labi gegewena elana ge labi bolo hi minaa gegelinaa elal .
42007018	Diyon Tobabitaiso wana tohago wana wasa hi pek bugul gegewena kaiweliya toto Yeisu i ginolil . Inoke ali toto eluwa i yogaagil
42007019	ge i patunal nihi na Babala eliyana nihi nel nihi ba , “ Owa gamagal toto Diyon i babaunan tage abwe ni nem , o age naha matamatan gamagal etega al kaiwena ? ”
42007020	Sauga bolau eluwa hi na hi vin Yeisu elana , inoke hi baek elana hi ba , “ Diyon Tobabitaiso i patunama te ha nem e , nuwana ni neliwa ebo owa gamagal toto iya i babaunan tage abwe ni nem , o age naha matamatan gamagal etega al kaiwena . ”
42007021	He sauga o elana , Yeisu gamagalau hi gewi bolo ali gila ge ali kasiyebwa gaganina i pwamolol , yayaluwa bibikena i patuna owaowa-agil ge tomatakai hi gewi mataliya i panana .
