42017033	Henala ebo ni labose yawalina ni pwamwal , nasi ni payaomal , ge henala ebo yawalina ni payaomal , nasi yawalina ni pwamwal .
42017034	Na baewa eliyamiu , bulin o elana gamagalau labui abakenu maisena elana nihi kenuwa , etegana nihi ahe egonan , etegana ni mina .
42017035	Yowau labui nihi tuwalali toyawa witi enona nihi wowowol , etegana nihi ahe egonan , etegana ni mina .
42017036	Bolau labui nihi tuwatuwalali eyowaa , etegana nihi ahe egonan , etegana ni mina . ” †
42017037	Yaka tohago hi nel Yeisu elana hi ba , “ Babala , hauna labi elana ge bugul bolo ya nihi masala ? ” Analiya i lahe i ba , “ Ebo bweyan ga i minaa , inoke okok nihi na ge nihi tagul pwehik . ”
42018001	Yaka Yeisu ba gohalibe etega i liwanan wana tohago elal , inoke ni pankitel te sauga gegewena nihi awaawanun ge bahi nihi veveyaho .
42018002	I ba , “ Toyatala etega i miminaa panuwa etega elana , iya nige Yehoba i aawatauwan ge nige i nuwanuwatu gamagalau kaiweliya .
42018003	He abuabul etega i miminaa al to panuwa maisena o elana , ge i mimi noknok toyatala elana ge i babaa , ‘ Alou ge o topihigelgel ama iyoho ha kotkot . He nu labeyau ge logugui nu pasapu bubun kaiweu . ’
42018004	Sauga i yapu toyatala i towa , nige nuwana i oola ni labe . Mulaa abwe totona i ba , ‘ Bwagana nige Yehoba ya aawatauwan , ge nige ya nuwanuwatu gamagalau kaiweliya ,
42018005	yaa kaiwena abuabul ya o pulowan i awaawaginol , he na labe ge logugui na pasapu bubun kaiwena . Ebo nigeya , he nasi ni mimi nemnem ya , inoke abwe tuwau ni esai . ’ ”
42018006	Inoke Babala i ba , “ Ku hago toyatala nanakina wana baaba .
42018007	He Yehoba wana hilihili gamagaliliyau bolo lan ge bulin hi yogayoga ha eliyana , age nige ni lalabel ge ali logugui ni papasapu ? O age nasi ni esowal ge ni baek elal ni ba , ‘ Ni ola ga ! ’ ? He nige i oola .
42018008	Na baewa eliyamiu , wana gamagalau ni label logugui ni pasapu bubun kaiweliya , ge etimwawa ni ginol ola . Yaa bugul maisena , sauga Gamagal Natuna ni nem , nasi gamagalau panayawiya ni pwawal wali abulilek i gan o ebo nigeya ? ”
42018009	Gamagalau enuna bolo totoliya hi awa sapusapu-agil ge avaliyau gegewel al hi kite lowagil , Yeisu i liwan gohalibe elal i ba ,
42018010	“ Sauga etega bolau labui hi na Limi Bwabwalena elana nihi awanun , etegana Palisi ge etegana takis ana toahi .
42018011	Palisi i talmilil yaka totona bana i awanun i ba , ‘ Yehoba , ya ba mulolu eliyam te nau nige ya oola gamagalau gegewel al , bolo hi kaoma , bolo wali pagan i nak ge bolo hi gaganawal , ge nige ya oola takis ana toahi toto ya .
42018012	Wik maisena gamwanaa lan labui tapwalolo kaiwena galebu ya palahikan . Ge bugul gegewena toto ya pwawa ya wali awalehina ali gewi elulutega , yaka awalehina maisena ya muloluan eliyam . ’
42018013	“ Yaa takis ana toahi i talmililek laha . Nige matana i liliheyanek labulabumwa , yaa babagalina i tagabub ge i ba , ‘ Yehoba , nau togegi nu atilomwan-agau . ’ ”
42018014	Yeisu i ba , “ Na ba eliyamiu , sauga tau ya i sikal wana limiya , iya i sapu Yehoba matanaa , yaa Palisi nigeya . Kaiwena gamagalau gegewel bolo totoliya hi teli heyagil , Yehoba ni teli lowagil , ge bolo totoliya hi teli lowagil , Yehoba ni teli heyagil . ”
42018015	Gamagalau enuna wawayau kekeisisil hi pwatanik Yeisu elana tage nimana ni teli tuwaliyaa ge ni awanun kaiweliya . Sauga tohago hi kitel , inoke hi haveyanagil .
42018016	Yaa Yeisu wawayau i yogaagil hi nok elana ge i ba , “ Wawayau ku talamwagil nihi nem eliyau , bahi nuku lolopwalil , kaiwena Yehoba wana abalogugui i minaa ololana o eliyalil .
42018017	Ya ba tunahot eliyamiu , ebo gamagal etega Yehoba wana abalogugui nige ni yayaliyaya-an ge ni aahe ni oola wawayau kekeisi wali ahe , he iya nige ni uulutuk elana . ”
42018018	Tologugui etegana i nel Yeisu elana i ba , “ Topankite waiwaisana , hauna na ginol ge yawal mihomihotina na pwawa ? ”
42018019	Yeisu i baek elana i ba , “ Hauna kaiwena u awa wawaisi-agau ? Nige towaisi etega i gagan , Yehoba maisena ya te towaisi .
42018020	He u atena ya te logugui i ba , ‘ Bahi ganawal , bahi taulol , bahi kaoma , bahi woliwoli kakawi , tamwam ge hinam nu awatauwagil . ’ ”
42018021	Tau o i ba , “ No sauga wawaya ana siga sauga ya , logugui bolo ya gegewel iyaka ya paolaolaek . ”
42018022	Yeisu baaba o i hago inoke i baek elana i ba , “ Bugul maisena iyoho nigeya ga u giginol . U na wam gogomwau gegewel u paliagil , manina nu pek togulagula elal , inoke abwe nu gogomwau labulabumwa . He u nem u toulilau . ”
42018023	Sauga tau baaba o i hago , inoke nuwana i nak nabi , kaiwena iya togogomwau hot .
42018024	Yeisu tau o i gagayawa-an inoke i ba , “ Togogomwau wali ulutuk i pulowan nabi Yehoba wana abalogugui elana .
42018025	He i pulowan te bwasumu toto kamel ni ulusola evaneya golinaa , i ola al i pulowan hot tologogomwau wali ulutuk Yehoba wana abalogugui elana . ”
42018026	Bolo wana baaba hi hago hi nel elana hi ba , “ Ebo i ola o , he henala ge bosowaina ni mwal ? ”
42018027	Analiya Yeisu i lahe i ba , “ Bugul toto gamagalau nige bosowailiya , he Yehoba iya bosowaina ya . ”
42018028	Inoke Pita i baek elana i ba , “ Yaa ga i ola ama ? Wama bugul gegewena iyaka ha eguluwagil , inoke ha nem ge ha touliliwa . ”
42018029	Yeisu i baek eliyalil i ba , “ Ya ba tunahot eliyamiu , henala ebo wana limi , ebo lagona , ebo talinau , ebo hinana ge tamana , o ebo natunau ni eguluwagil Yehoba wana abalogugui kaiwena ,
42018030	he sauga ya elana ni ahe pwabwaya al pwatanaa . Ge sauga mulaa yawalina mihomihotina ni pwawa . ”
42018031	Yeisu tohago ali toto elulutega eluwa i ahel hi na hi mimwaumwau , inoke i baek elal i ba , “ Iyaka ta nanawa Yelusalema kaiwena , inoke abwe bugul gegewena toto palopitau hi lelelian Gamagal Natuna kaiwena ni tabwa tunahot .
42018032	Nihi teli bolo nige Yudiya i oola nimaliyaa . Inoke heliya nihi lamwa tunatuna-an , nihi talatalawasi-an , nihi lokukuluvi-an ,
42018033	nihi nibinibihan , ge nihi lopaaliga . Lan etonina elana abwe ni lutem yaomala . ”
42018034	Tohago nige nuwaliya i sasapu Yeisu wana baaba o kaiwena . Wana baaba ana sapu nige etega hi aatena , ge nige hi aatena te hauna bana ge i baaba .
42018035	Yeisu i pulivin panuwa Yeliko gegelinaa , he tomatakai etega i misiyowa to kamwasa bebenaa ge i loloawaawanun gamagalau elal .
42018036	Sauga i hago boda hi nopalegi , inoke i nel gamagalau elal i ba , “ Hauna gun hi giginol o ? ”
42018037	Anana hi lahe hi ba , “ Yeisu gagama Nasaleta to i nanawa o . ”
42018038	Inoke i yoga i ba , “ Yeisu , Deibid Tubuna , nu atilomwan-agau ! ”
42018039	Gamagalau bolo hi nohouwa hi ba lalaan ge hi baek elana tage ni mikekei , yaa abwe i yoga balbalgig i ba , “ Deibid Tubuna , nu atilomwan-agau ! ”
42018040	Yeisu i notalmilil , yaka i baek gamagalau elal tomatakai nihi pwatanik elana . Sauga i na Yeisu gegelinaa , yaka Yeisu i nel elana i ba ,
42018041	“ Hauna gun nuwam na ginol kaiwem ? ” Anana i lahe i ba , “ Babala , nuwau matau ni waisi . ”
42018042	Yeisu i baek elana i ba , “ Matam ni waisi . Wam abulilek iyaka i pwamolowa . ”
42018043	Sauga o elana matana i waisi , inoke Yeisu i toulil ge i nonotobatobal Yehoba elana . Sauga gamagalau ginol o hi kite , yaka heliya al ge hi tobatobal Yehoba elana .
42019001	Yeisu i na i ulutuk panuwa Yeliko ge ni nosolaa gamwanaa .
42019002	Tau etega iyoho to alana Sakiusa , iya takis ana toahi wali tohouwa etega , ge iya togogomwau .
42019003	I labose nuwana Yeisu ni kite iya hauna kaba tau , yaa nige bosowaina , kaiwena i kaubwa ge boda i bwata .
42019004	Inoke i patalelu houwa boda awoliyaa i na ebwakil alana sikamole i pane ge Yeisu ni kite , kaiwena nasi ni neem to .
42019005	Sauga Yeisu i pulivin labi o elana , inoke matana i lihin ge i baek elana i ba , “ Sakiusa , etimwawa u lau , kaiwena lan ebe na minaa wam limiya . ”
42019006	Inoke sauga o i pani lau , yaka Sakiusa ginebi ge wana yaliyaya Yeisu i ahe hi na wana limiya .
42019007	Gamagalau gegewel hi kite inoke hi baaba Yeisu kaiwena hi ba , “ Tau ya iyaka i na i minaa togegi etega wana limiya . ”
42019008	Yaa Sakiusa i talmilil , yaka i baek Babala elana i ba , “ Tonowak , no gogomwau na wali inoke nasi awalehina na pek togulagula elal . Ge ebo valila gamagal etega ya kakawe ge wana mani ya ahe likaan , he nasi paesopali na pwamola pasikal . ”
42019009	Yeisu i baek elana i ba , “ Lan ebe Yehoba limi ya ana heniheni i pwamwalil . He tau ya iya al ge Abalahama tubutubunina etega .
42019010	He Gamagal Natuna i nem totatayaomal ni loyaagil ge ni pwamwalil . ”
42019011	Gamagalau heliya iyoho Yeisu wana baaba o hi lalaegan . Yaka i ba vevehe al ge ba gohalibe etega i liwanan elal , kaiwena iyaka Yelusalema i nopakelakelaubwa ge gamagalau hi nuwatu te Yehoba wana abalogugui sauga kekeisi ya abwe ni masal .
42019012	I ba , “ Towasawasa etega i nana panuwa yayapona elana ge nihi teli iya wana labi ana kin , yaka abwe ni sikalim al .
42019013	Wana totuwalali ali toto elulutega i yogaagil , yaka maisena ge maisena mani silba handeled maisena ona i pek elal , ge i baek elal i ba , ‘ Mani ya nuku patuwalali ana siga na sikalim . ’ I ginol ola o , yaka abwe i egon .
42019014	Yaa wana panuwa gamagaliliyau hi pihigelgel-an , inoke elopapatuna hi patunal hi na panuwa toto i nonoek ge hi ba , ‘ Nige nuwama tau ya ni tabwa wama kin . ’
42019015	He towasawasa o hi teli iya wana labi ana kin ge i sikal i na wana panuwaa . Sauga i sikal , inoke i ba , ‘ Totuwalali bolo valila mani ya pek elal nuku yogaagil nihi nem elau . Nuwau na atena mani ga hi patuwalali ola , ge ana etulan ehila al hi pwawa . ’
42019016	Totuwalali houwan i nok i ba , ‘ Tonowak , valila mani silba handeled maisena u pem , he ya patuwalali ge ana etulan handeled paelulutega al ya pwawa . ’
42019017	Anana i lahe i ba , ‘ Owa totuwalali waiwaisana , u ginol bubun . Kaiwena bugul bolo nige ali nuwatu i bwabwata u matahikagil bubunil , he na telewa panuwa ali gewi elulutega nu matahikagil . ’
42019018	Totuwalali eluwana i nok elana i ba , ‘ Tonowak , valila mani silba handeled maisena u pem , he ya patuwalali ge ana etulan handeled panimala panuna al ya pwawa . ’
42019019	Wana tonowak i baek elana i ba , ‘ Na telewa panuwa ali gewi nimala panuna nu matahikagil . ’
42019020	Yaka totuwalali etegana al i nok elana i ba , ‘ Tonowak , valila mani silba handeled maisena u pem , he iya hiwe . Kaliko malelena kekeisi ya ahe ya os ge ya teli hikan .
42019021	Ya lovakunagiwa , kaiwena wam logugui i gasisi . Bugul toto gamagalau getogal hi teli tukan , he u aahe tagilan , ge aanan toto nige u pepel , he u keken ge u papahe wam limiya . ’
42019022	Wana tonowak i baek elana i ba , ‘ Owa totuwalali nanakina , he totom wam baaba ni sikal eliyam ge ni taliwa . U atena ya te no logugui i gasisi ge bugul toto gamagalau getogal hi teli tukan , ya aahe tagilan , ge aanan toto nige ya pepel , ya keken ge ya papahe no limiya .
42019023	He binimala nu na no mani nu teli benki elana ge nihi patuwalali , inoke sauga na sikalim ge na ahe pasikal , alona ge ana etulan , toto hi patuwalali ana enona . ’
42019024	Inoke i baek bolo hi talmilila gegelinaa elal i ba , ‘ Mani ku ahe eliyana , ge ku pek tau toto wana mani ana bwata silba handeled paelulutega elana . ’
42019025	Hi baek elana hi ba , ‘ Tonowak , iya iyaka silba handeled paelulutega i ahe . ’
42019026	Analiya i lahe i ba , ‘ Na baewa eliyamiu , henala i gan eliyana , abwe Yehoba ni pek pwabwaya al . Yaa henala nige i gagan eliyana , bwagana toto kekeisi i minaa eliyana , Yehoba abwe ni ahe yoho .
42019027	He bolo hi pihigelgel eliyau ge nige nuwaliya na tabwa wali kin , ku na ku ahel ge ku pwatanim hiwe , inoke nuku tagapaaligal matawa . ’ ”
42019028	Yeisu ba gohalibe ya i liwanan haba , inoke i novevehe al ni nok ni na Yelusalema .
42019029	Sauga i vin Betepage ge Bedani Oya Olibe awanina labeliyaa , inoke wana tohago eluwa i patunal nihi houwa . I baek elal i ba ,
42019030	“ Nuku nok nuku na awan toto maninilaa , ge sauga nuku ulutuk , donki natuna etega iyahe tei nuku kite hi am hikan , nige sauga etega gamagal etega i heheya pwatanaa . Nuku leke inoke nuku pwatanim te .
42019031	Ebo gamagal etega ni nelimiu ni ba , ‘ Hauna kaiwena donki natuna ku leleke ei ? ’ nuku baek elana nuku ba , ‘ Babala nuwana . ’ ”
42019032	He bolo i patunal hi nok ge hi pwawa i ola ya te Yeisu i baunan elal .
42019033	Sauga donki natuna ana sisiu hi lekaleka , yaka tondonki hi nel elal hi ba , “ Hauna kaiwena donki natuna ku leleke ei ? ”
42019034	Analiya hi lahe hi ba , “ Babala nuwana . ”
42019035	Inoke donki natuna hi ahe ge hi pwatanik Yeisu elana , yaka ali kaliko hi yao eputetenaa , ge Yeisu hi pamisiyo pwatanaa .
42019036	I nawanawa ee , yaka gamagalau ali kaliko hi yao kamwasaa .
42019037	Sauga i na i vin Oya Olibe ana kela laulau gegelinaa , inoke wana tohago boda bwabwatana nuwaliya i waisi nabi . Ginol yawiyawi gegewena bolo i ginolil ge hi kite hi nuwatuagil , yaka hi telipuna Yehoba hi tobatobal-an analiya i bwata .
42019038	Hi ba , “ Yehoba ni ba muloluan , iya kin i nem Babala alana elana ! Yehoba labulabumwa ta awa wasawasa-an , iya ge kila i pamibubun-agila ! ”
42019039	Palisi enuna iyoho to boda gamwaliyaa hi baek Yeisu elana hi ba , “ Topankite , wam tohago u ba pahenapol nihi mikekei . ”
42019040	Analiya Yeisu i lahe i ba , “ Na baewa eliyamiu , ebo nihi mikekei , he nasi pat nihi yogayoga . ”
42019041	Yeisu Yelusalema i nopakelakelaubwa ge sauga matana i nok i kite , inoke baena i kahin
42019042	i ba , “ Binimala komiu lan ebe nuku atena te hauna gun bosowaina ni pamibubun-agimiu . Yaa age nige bosowaimiu nuku kite .
42019043	Sauga i nenem abwe ami topihigelgel nihi nem nihi lohaveyan eliyamiu , inoke nihi mipainagimiu , yaka wami abaulutuk ge wami abatagil gegewena nihi mikaukaus-an .
42019044	Wami panuwa nihi pasamwalekaleka yaka nige al pat etega ni miminaa abanaa , ge ana tomina nihi tagapapaaligal . Bugul bolo ya nihi masal , kaiwena Yehoba i nem nuwana ni pwamwalimiu , yaa nige ku aatena . ”
42019045	Yeisu i na i ulutuk Limi Bwabwalena elana , inoke bolo hi lolopalipali i takel .
42019046	I baek elal i ba , “ Buki Bwabwalena elana Yehoba wana baaba hi lelelian i ba , ‘ No limi iya tapwalolo limena ’ yaa komiu ku ginol i ola tokaoma wali gol . ”
42019047	Lan maisena ge maisena Yeisu i panpankiti Limi Bwabwalena ana gana gamwanaa . He topowon bwabwatal avaliyau Logugui ana topankite ge panuwa ana tonowakau nuwaliya nihi lol .
42019048	Yaa nige kamwasa etega bosowailiya nihi pwawa ge eliyana nihi lopaaliga , kaiwena gamagalau gegewel hi mimi lalaegan-an ge nuwaliya i noek wana baaba eliyana .
42020001	Lan etega Yeisu i panpankiti gamagalau elal Limi Bwabwalena ana gana gamwanaa ge wasa waiwaisana i papaatena-an . Topowon bwabwatal avaliyau Logugui ana topankite ge panuwa ana tonowakau hi na eliyana
42020002	ge hi neli hi ba , “ Wama wasa ga nu pem . Hauna logugui wana gasisi eliyana ge bugul bolo ya u awaawaginol ? Henala wam gasisi i pewa ? ”
42020003	Analiya i lahe i ba , “ Nau al ge nel etega na neli ga eliyamiu . He ku ba ga na hago .
42020004	Diyon Tobabitaiso gamagalau i pababitaisol . Logugui o ga i neem ? Yehoba elana , o ebo gamagalau elal ? ”
42020005	Yaka hi peliwaliwan-agil hi ba , “ Ebo ta ba , ‘ Logugui o i neem Yehoba elana , ’ inoke nasi ni ba , ‘ He hauna kaiwena ge Diyon nige ku aabulilek-an ? ’
42020006	Yaa ebo ta ba , ‘ Logugui o i neem gamagalau elal , ’ he nasi boda nihi loipatagila , kaiwena hi abulilek te Diyon iya palopita . ”
42020007	Inoke Yeisu anana hi lahe hi ba , “ Nige ha aatena te logugui o ga i neem . ”
42020008	Yaka Yeisu i ba , “ Ebo nigeya , he nau al ge nige na babaunan te henala wana logugui elana ge bugul bolo ya ya awaawaginol . ”
42020009	Inoke Yeisu ba gohalibe ya i liwanan gamagalau elal i ba , “ Tau etega wana eyowa i ginol ge oine i luwan , inoke abwe i pek gamagalau enuna elal ge nihi patuwalali . Yaka iya i egon i na i minaa panuwa getoga sauga yayapona .
42020010	Sauga oine enona i matuwa , inoke toneyowa wana totuwalali etega i patuna i na tomatahikan elal ge oine enona enuna nihi pek elana . Yaa tomatahikan totuwalali o hi nibinibihan ge hi patuna i egon ninimana ya .
42020011	Wana totuwalali etega al i patuna elal , yaka tau o hi nibinibihan ge hi tagapanapanak-an , inoke hi patuna i egon ninimana ya .
42020012	Inoke wana totuwalali etonina i patuna elal , yaka tuwana hi apapanak-an ge hi alitagil-an eyowa ana gana tolinaa .
42020013	Inoke toneyowa i ba , ‘ Ga na ginol ola ? He natu toto ya nunuwana-an na patuna elal , inoke tabana nasi iya nihi awatauwan ! ’
42020014	Yaa sauga tomatahikan hi kite , inoke hi pebaaba-agil hi ba , ‘ He toneyowa natuna te , toto tage abwe eyowa ni ahe tamana wana yaomal enaa . Ta tagapaaliga , inoke eyowa ni minem elala . ’
42020015	Inoke hi lib ge hi alitagil-an oine ana eyowa tolinaa , yaka hi tagapaaliga . ” Yaka abwe Yeisu i nel i ba , “ He toneyowa nasi ga ni ginol ola elal ?
42020016	Iya ni nem tomatahikan ni tagapaaligal , inoke oine ana eyowa ni guyauan gamagalau getogal elal . ” Sauga gamagalau baaba o hi hago , inoke hi ba , “ Bahi ni mamasal ni oola to ! ”
42020017	Yeisu matana i lihikan elal , yaka i nel i ba , “ He baaba hiwe , toto hi lelelian Buki Bwabwalena gamwanaa , ana sapu ga i ola ? Toto i ba , ‘ Pat toto totaltal hi awa nanakan ge hi towani , Yehoba iyaka i ahe limi ana kokola gasigasisena i ginoliya . ’
42020018	Gamagalau gegewel bolo nihi soguwa pat ya elana nihi tal mwamwaol , ge ebo pat ya ni soguwa gamagal etega pwatanaa , nasi ni tagamukumuku-an . ”
42020019	He Logugui ana topankite avaliyau ge topowon bwabwatal kamwasa hi loya ge sauga o elana Yeisu nihi lib ge nihi yowan , kaiwena hi atena ba gohalibe ya Yeisu i liwanan , ana nuwatu i noek heliya eliyalil . Yaa hi lovakun gamagalau kaiweliya .
42020020	He Logugui ana topankite avaliyau ge topowon bwabwatal Yeisu wana nawanawa ge wana ginol ona hi kite hikan bubun . Yaka gamagalau enuna hi patunal nihi na Yeisu nihi gayawaan sume . Heliya hi kakawi tage nuwaliya hot te Yeisu wana baaba nihi hago . Yaa wali nuwatu hot te ebo Yeisu baaba etega ni ba panak inoke nihi paona , yaka abwe nihi teli Loma wali gavana nimanaa ge ni logugui-an .
42020021	Inoke hi neli hi ba , “ Topankite , ha atena hauna u baunan ge u panpankiti-an i tunahot . Nige u golugoluek gamagalau alaliya ana bwata elana , yaa wam panpankiti Yehoba wana kamwasa kaiwena i sapu hot .
42020022	He Mosese i ba mani naha pek Yehoba elana . I waisi ya takis naha pwamola Sisa elana o age bahiwa ? ”
42020023	Yaa wali kakawi i atena , yaka i baek elal i ba ,
42020024	“ Mani silba etega ku pankiteyau . He henala kakanununa ge henala alana hi leli tuwanaa ? ”
42020025	Anana hi lahe hi ba , “ Sisa . ” Inoke i baek elal i ba , “ He toto Sisa kaiwena nuku pek Sisa elana , ge toto Yehoba kaiwena nuku pek Yehoba elana . ”
42020026	Inoke sauga iya iyoho boda gamwaliyaa , nige bosowailiya wana baaba eliyana ge nihi paona . Nuwaliya hi ahe wali nel ana lahena kaiwena , yaka hi mikekei .
42020027	Yaka Sadiusi enuna hi na Yeisu elana . He Sadiusi nige wali abulilek i oola tage toyaomal nihi lut , inoke Yeisu hi neli hi ba ,
42020028	“ Topankite , Mosese logugui i lelelian kaiwela i ba , ‘ Ebo tau etega ni alolon , nige natunau ge ni aliga , inoke abuabulina talina ni alolonan ge ebo natuliyau ni gan , heliya nihi tabwa toto i alaliga natunau . ’
42020029	Sauga etega tau etega alonau talinau ali gewi seben . Gamaun i alolon nige natuna i gagan , inoke i aliga .
42020030	Yaka loena alona ge abuabul hi alolon , inoke iya al i aliga .
42020031	Yaka etonina al alona ge abuabul hi alolon , ge iya al i aliga . Pagan maisena o i gan ali toto seben elal : abuabul o hi alolonan nige natuliyau i gagan iyaka hi aliga haba .
42020032	Inoke mowamowasena abwe yova al i aliga .
42020033	Ebo tunahot toyaomal abwe nihi lut , he lut enaa ali toto seben gamwaliyaa henala ge yova o lagona hot ? Kaiwena gegewel hi alolonan ga . ”
42020034	Analiya Yeisu i lahe i ba , “ Sauga ya elana bolau ge yowau hi alolon .
42020035	Yaa sauga mulaa , gamagalau bolo Yehoba ni ba bosowailiya nihi lut al ge alonau nihi mina , heliya nige nihi aalolon .
42020036	He nihi ola aneloseyau ge nige nihi aaliga . Yehoba i palutil yaomal elana , inoke heliya iya natunau .
42020037	Mosese wana buki i pankitela te toyaomal nihi lut al . Ginaha i tau ebwakil lamwanaa liwanina , he buki i ba te Yehoba iya Abalahama , Aisake ge Yakobo wali Yabowaine .
42020038	Inoke ta atena gamagalau ya yawaliliya nige i yayaomal hot . Yehoba nige toaliga hot wali Yabowaine i oola , yaa bolo yawaliliya gaganina wali Yabowaine . Kaiwena iya eliyana gamagalau gegewel yawaliliya i gan . ”
42020039	Logugui ana topankite enuna Yeisu wana baaba o hi hago inoke hi ba , “ Topankite , iyaka u lahe bubun to . ”
42020040	Inoke nige al bosowailiya nihi labose ge nel etega nihi neli Yeisu elana .
42020041	Inoke Yeisu i baek elal i ba , “ Ga i ola ge hi ba tage Mesaiya iya Deibid tubuna ?
42020042	He Buki Same gamwanaa Deibid totona i ba , ‘ Yehoba i baek no Babala elana i ba : U misiyowa labeu awowa ,
42020043	ana siga am topihigelgel na teli lowagil aem gabulanaa . ’
42020044	He Deibid Mesaiya i awa babala-an , inoke ga i ola ge tage iya Deibid tubuna ? ”
42020045	Gamagalau gegewel iyoho Yeisu wana baaba hi lalaegan , inoke i baek wana tohago elal i ba ,
42020046	“ Nuku matahikagimiu Logugui ana topankite kaiweliya . Heliya nuwaliya kaliko yayapona nihi galoi ge nihi nonawanawa , inoke ebo gamagalau nihi pwawal abamaket elana , nuwaliya te gamagalau ginebi ge wali awatauwan nihi pata ateu owa eliyalil . Limi tapwalolo elana nuwaliya nihi misiyo houwa gamagalau maniniliyaa , ge hagali elana nuwaliya nihi misiyowa yau toto gamagalau bwabwatal wali yau elana .
42020047	Abuabulau wali limi ge wali gogomwau hi aahe hi lologugui-an bwabwage , ge i ola al wali awanun hi papayapu-an gamagalau tanaliyaa tage nihi hagol . Wali pagan o kaiwena , inoke nasi ali lahi ni bwata hot . ”
42021001	Yeisu matana i lihin , yaka togogomwau i kitel hi na wali mulolu hi teliteli mulolu ana abateliteliya Limi Bwabwalena gamwanaa .
42021002	I ola al abuabul gugulana etega i kite i na toya eluwa i telel .
42021003	Inoke i ba , “ Ya ba tunahot eliyamiu , abuabul gugulana ya wana mulolu gamagalau gegewel wali mulolu i bwata lake .
42021004	Bolo ya gegewel mani enuna hi teli , yaa wali tupwa i bwata iyoho i mina . Yaa iya , togulagula , wana mani gegewena toto tage wana aanan kaiwena , iyaka i teli haba . ”
42021005	Tohago enuna hi liwaliwan Limi Bwabwalena ana awa kaiwena hi ba , “ Pat ali awa waiwaisal hi taliya ge gamagalau wali mulolu elal hi paiselaya . ” Inoke abwe Yeisu i ba ,
42021006	“ Bugul gegewel bolo ku kitel e , he sauga i nenem nige pat etega ni miminaa abanaa , gegewena abwe nihi pasamwalekaleka . ”
42021007	Inoke hi nel Yeisu elana hi ba , “ Topankite , hauna sauga ge abwe bugul bolo baliya u babaunan nihi masal ? Ge wali masal ana etotohi ga ni ola ? ”
42021008	Analiya Yeisu i lahe i ba , “ Nuku matahikagimiu , bahi gamagal etega ni papagegemiu . Kaiwena gamagalau nihi gewi abwe alau elana nihi nem ge nihi ba , ‘ Nau Mesaiya ! ’ ge nihi ba , ‘ Sauga mowamowasena iyaka i vin . ’ Yaa bahi nuwamiu ni nonoek elal ge nuku totoulilil .
42021009	Haveyan ge apwaapwanawa wasaliya nuku hago , yaa bahi nuku lolovakun . Bugul ololana o nihi gan ga , yaa nige tage sauga o elana ge sauga mowamowasena ni nem . ”
42021010	Inoke i ba vevehe al elal i ba , “ Boda ge boda nihi lohaveyan , i ola al abalogugui ge abalogugui nihi lohaveyan .
42021011	Mwaniknik , galebu bwabwatana ge kasiyebwa guliguli nihi masal labi tomaha ge tomaha elal . Bugul lolovakunil ge etotohi bwabwatal nihi masalem natiya hawawala .
42021012	“ Yaa mulaa abwe bugul bolo o nihi masal , inoke gamagalau nihi libimiu ge nihi papalomwan-agimiu . Nihi ahemiu nuku na wali limi tapwalolowa ge nihi payatalamiu inoke nihi telemiu dibulaa . Alau kaiwena nihi ahemiu nihi telemiu kin ge tologugui mataliyaa .
42021013	He toto ya kamwasa ni pwela ge wasa waiwaisana nuku wasaan elal .
42021014	Bahi nuku nuwanuwatu houwan hauna nuku baunan ge mwal nuku pwawa .
42021015	Kaiwena nau baaba toto nuku baunan ge siba na pewa , inoke nasi ami topihigelgel nige bosowailiya wami baaba nihi lahe ge nihi ba pakokovemiu .
42021016	Hinamiyau ge tamamiyau , ge i ola al talimiyau , tutumiyau ge wami heliyamwau , nihi wasaagimiu tologugui elal , inoke komiu enuna nihi lopaaligamiu .
42021017	Alau kaiwena gamagalau gegewel nihi pihigelgel-agimiu .
42021018	Yaa nige tuwamiu etega ni bwebwe , he nige kokowamiu pupunona etega ni yayaomal .
42021019	He nuku talmilil gagasisi , inoke yawalimiu hot nuku pwawa . ”
42021020	“ Sauga ebo nuku kite tolohaveyan nihi nem Yelusalema nihi mipainan , yaka nuku atena te sauga kekeisi nihi pasamwalekaleka .
42021021	Inoke sauga o elana bolo hi miminaa Yudiya nihi lou nihi na oyaa ; bolo hi miminaa Yelusalema panuwa nihi eguluwan , ge bolo hi miminaa tola bahi nihi nana nihi uulutuk gamwanaa .
42021022	Kaiwena sauga o Yehoba wana lahi ana sauga , inoke baaba gegewena toto hi lelelian Buki Bwabwalena gamwanaa ni tabwa tunahot .
42021023	Sauga o elana nasi ni pulowan hot yowau toliyan ge topapaalahul elal . Nak bwabwatana ni gan panuwa ya elana , ge Yehoba wana huga ni masal gamagalau ya elal .
42021024	Enuna elohaveyan kilepana elana nihi gopaaligal , enuna nihi paloloyowan-agil ge nihi ahel nihi na nihi miminaa panayawi labena gegewena elal . Yaka bolo nige Yudiya i oola Yelusalema nihi pulilolowan ana siga wali logugui ana sauga ni mowasi . ”
42021025	Yeisu i ba vevehe al i ba , “ Etotohi ona nihi masal sabwelu , weikena , ge putum elal . Ge panayawiya , hoga bagolina ni bini poipoi ge butuliya ni bwata , inoke gamagalau nuwaliya ni gewagewa ge nihi lovakun nabi .
42021026	Gamagalau nihi nuwanuwatu hauna i mamasal panayawiya , yaka lovakun kaiwena mataliya ni ananit . Kaiwena togasisi bolo hawawala nihi lamwalamwaniu .
42021027	Sauga o elana gamagalau Gamagal Natuna nihi kite i nenem yaluyalu gamwanaa , ginebi wana gasisi ge wana wasawasa bwabwatana .
42021028	Sauga bugul bolo o nihi masal telipuna , he komiu nuku mat ge matamiu nuku lihin , kaiwena sauga toto Yehoba ni pwamwalimiu iyaka i kelaubwa . ”
42021029	Inoke Yeisu ba gohalibe ya i baunanik elal i ba , “ Poga ge ebwakil gegewel nuku gayawaagil .
42021030	Sauga ebo nuku kitel lamwaliya i titin , inoke ku atena waiwai ana sauga iyaka i kelaubwa . *
42021031	I ola al , sauga ebo nuku kite bugul gegewel bolo ya liwanagil nihi masal , nuku atena te Yehoba wana abalogugui ana sauga nem iyaka i kelaubwa .
42021032	“ Tunahot ya ba eliyamiu , heyan bolo sauga ya nige nihi aaliga haba , inoke bugul gegewena bolo ya nihi masal .
42021033	Labulabum ge panayawi nihi mowasi , yaa nau no baaba nige ni momowasi . ”
42021034	Yeisu i ba vevehe al i ba , “ Nuku matahikagimiu , bahi aanan , loimwim ge panayawi yawalina ali nuwanuwatu yawalimiu ni aanlowan . Ebo nuku ola o , he nasi lan o atemiu ni payou
42021035	ni ola kimul , kaiwena lan o ni vina gamagalau gegewel panayawiya elal .
42021036	Sauga gegewena nuku silawa ge nuku awaawanun Yehoba elana ni pagasisi-agimiu , inoke sauga bugul gegewena ya nihi masal , nuku mwal ge bosowaimiu nuku talmilil Gamagal Natuna manininaa . ”
42021037	Lan maisena ge maisena Yeisu i panpankiti gamagalau elal Limi Bwabwalena ana gana gamwanaa , ge sauga bulin i gagan , inoke i nana i kekenuwa limi etega elana oya alana Olibe ana labiya .
42021038	Mweluluga kekeisi gamagalau gegewel nihi noknok Limi Bwabwalena elana ge wana papaatena nihi lalaegan .
42022001	Pwalawa toto nige alona yis hi vivikuhiya hagalena , alana etega al hi ba Nopalegi Hagalena , ana lan iyaka i kelakelaubwa .
42022002	He topowon bwabwatal aloliyau ge Logugui ana topankite hi lovakun gamagalau kaiweliya , inoke kamwasa hi loya ge eliyana Yeisu nihi lopaaliga .
42022003	Yaka Seitani i ulutuk Yudasa toto hi ba Isikaliyota eliyana , iya tohago ali toto elulutega eluwa avaliya etega .
42022004	Inoke Yudasa i na topowon bwabwatal avaliyau ge Limi Bwabwalena ana pulisimanau wali tohouwa elal , yaka alonau hi liwaliwan ga ni label ola ge Yeisu nihi lib .
42022005	Heliya hi yaliyaya Yudasa wana nuwatu kaiwena , inoke hi ba abwe mani nihi pek elana .
42022006	Yudasa wali baaba i talamwi , inoke i telipuna Yeisu wana nawanawa i gagayawa-an , kamwasa i loya ge Yeisu ni teli nimaliyaa ge bahi boda nihi aatena .
42022007	Pwalawa toto nige alona yis hi vivikuhiya hagalena ana lan i pwawa . He Yudiya wali pagan te lan o eliyana sipi natuna etega nihi lol Nopalegi Hagalena kaiwena .
42022008	Yeisu Pita ge Diyon i patunal i ba , “ Nuku na Nopalegi Hagalena enona nuku lovivina-an ge ta anan . ”
42022009	Hi nel elana hi ba , “ Hauna labena elana nuwam naha noek ge aanan naha lovivina-an ? ”
42022010	Analiya i lahe i ba , “ Sauga nuku tuk Yelusalema , tau etega wewel ana ulubwal i kalivai abwe ni pwawamiu . Nuku noulil , nuku na limi toto elana ni ulutuka ,
42022011	inoke nuku baek tonlimi elana nuku ba , ‘ Topankite i ba : Hauna lum u talamwan ge elana alowau no tohago Nopalegi Hagalena enona naha ginola ge naha anan ? ’
42022012	Inoke iya abwe limi gamwana bwabwatana toto natiya ni pankitemiu , teibol ge abamisiyo iyaka hi abubun haba . Inoke nuku na aanan nuku lovivina-an to . ”
42022013	Inoke tohago hi nok ge bugul gegewena hi pwawa i ola Yeisu wana baaba elal . Inoke Nopalegi Hagalena enona hi lovivina-an .
42022014	Aanan ana sauga iyaka i pwawa , inoke Yeisu alonau ge wana apostolowau hi misiyo abaanan elana .
42022015	Yaka i baek elal i ba , “ Nuwau hot alowau komiu Nopalegi Hagalena toto ya enona ta an , mulaa abwe lomwan na pwawa ge na yaomal .
42022016	Kaiwena na baewa eliyamiu , nige al na aan , ana siga Yehoba wana abalogugui ni nem inoke Nopalegi Hagalena ana sapu ni masal hot . ”
42022017	Inoke oine ana kom etega i ahe , i ba mulolu Yehoba elana ge i baek tohago elal i ba , “ Toto ya ku ahe ku im guyauan eliyamiu .
42022018	Kaiwena na baewa eliyamiu , oine nige al na iim ana siga sauga toto Yehoba wana abalogugui ni nem . ”
42022019	Inoke beleid i ahe , i ba mulolu Yehoba elana , yaka i pigebagebal-an i pek elal ge i ba , “ Toto ya iya tuwau ya talamwan komiu kaiwemiu . Nuku ginol hikahikani o abanuwahikan . ”
42022020	I ola al , aanan enaa , oine ana kom i ahe ge i ba , “ Oine ya iya bateli vavaluna kaiwena , bateli o saliyau elana ni masala . Saliyau ni lau komiu kaiwemiu .
42022021	“ He gamagal etega abwe ni wasaagau , iya ge nau ama iyehe te abaanan elana e .
42022022	Gamagal Natuna nau na aliga ni ola Yehoba wana nuwatu , yaa gamagal toto ni wasaagau nuwau i nakan , kaiwena bwaliga ana lahi ni bwata . ”
42022023	Inoke tohago hi penelnel-agil henala gamwaliyaa ge nasi ni ginol ola o .
42022024	Tohago totoliya hi peawaawabalgig henala hi nuwatu gamwaliyaa alana i bwata hot .
42022025	Yeisu i baek elal i ba , “ Bolo Yehoba nige hi aabulilek-an , wali kin hi logugui-agil , ge wali tologuguiyau nuwaliya gamagalau nihi ba heyagil nihi ba , ‘ Oo , tonuwa gamagal ! ’
42022026	Yaa komiu bahi nuku oola to . Henala alana i bwata gamwamiwa , he ni ola toto alana i kekeisi , ge toto i tohouwa ni tabwa totuwalali .
42022027	Henala alana i bwata ? Toto i misiyo abaanan elana , o ebo toto i tuwalali aanan i ginol i pwatanik toaanan elana ? He toto i misiyo abaanan elana te alana i bwata , age ? Yaa nau ya minaa gamwamiwa ya ola totuwalali ya .
42022028	“ Alowau komiu pulowan ta kalivai toyawe ge nige ku tataluwagau .
42022029	Inoke wami gasisi ya pepewa nuku logugui , ni ola Nam no gasisi iyaka i pem ya logugui .
42022030	Inoke no abalogugui elana alowau komiu ta anan ge ta imwim abaanan maisena elana , ge tologugui wali abamina nuku ahe Isileli ali un elulutega eluwa nuku logugui-agil . ”
42022031	Yeisu i ba vevehe al i ba , “ Saimon ! Saimon ! Seitani iyaka Yehoba wana talam i ahe ge ni labosemiu , ni ola toeyowa witi enona i labose ge i ase , yaka musana i ahek yoho .
42022032	Yaa nau iyaka ya awanun Yehoba elana kaiwem te bahi wam abulilek ni sosogu . Ge sauga toto nu nuwasikal eliyau , he talimwau nu pagasisi-agil . ”
42022033	Pita Yeisu anana i lahe i ba , “ Babala , ya talamwagau alou owa ta na dela ge alou owa ta yaomal . ”
42022034	Yeisu i baek elana i ba , “ Pita , na baewa eliyam , bulin ebe kamkam melutauina nigeya ga ni kakahin , inoke nu alahagau paeton nu ba , ‘ Tau ya nige ya aatena . ’ ”
42022035	Inoke Yeisu i nel tohago elal i ba , “ Sauga toto valila ya patunamiu ku tagil ge nige wami mani abana , o ebo ami kaliko ana nabwa o ebo aemiu aana ku nonoahe , tab bugul etega ku kalaan ? ” Anana hi lahe hi ba , “ Nigeya . ”
42022036	Yaka i baek elal i ba , “ He sauga ya , ebo wami mani abana o ebo ami kaliko ana nabwa i gan , nuku noahe . Ge ebo nige wami elohaveyan kilepana i gagan , he ami holahola tultul kaiwena nuku palian inoke manina nuku ahe ge etegana nuku pwamola .
42022037	Kaiwena Buki Bwabwalena i ba , ‘ Iya al ge , alonau ge logugui ana toleke , ’ ge na baewa eliyamiu , nasi gamagalau nihi ginol eliyau ni ola to . He bugul gegewena toto hi lelelian kaiweu i tatabwa tunahot te . ”
42022038	Tohago hi baek elana hi ba , “ Babala , u kite , elohaveyan kilepana eluwa hiwe eliyama e . ” Analiya i lahe i ba , “ Besena ! ”
42022039	Inoke Yeisu panuwa bwabwatana i eguluwan i nana Oya Olibe , i ola to sauga gegewena i giginol . He wana tohago alonau hi nok .
42022040	Sauga hi na hi vin , inoke i baek elal i ba , “ Nuku awanun yaka bahi lawakik kaiwena ge nuku sosogu . ”
42022041	Inoke i miluwagil ana bwaga ana yapu i ola ebo pat ta alihin ana yapu . Yaka i loepwakoku ge i awanun i ba ,
42022042	“ Nam , ebo wam nuwatu i ola , he lomwan ana kom ya u ahek yoho eliyau . Yaa bahi nau no nuwatu , owa ya wam nuwatu nu ginol . ”
42022043	Inoke anelose etega i loem labulabumwa i masal elana ge i pagasisi .
42022044	Yeisu yayaluwana i pulowan nabi , inoke i awanun gagasisi , ana alutan i ola saliya i sogu i tal bilibiliya .
42022045	Sauga i awanun haba , inoke i milil i na tohago elal ge i kitel heliya iyoho hi kenukenu , kaiwena nuwanak tuwaliya i paaliga .
42022046	Yaka i nelil i ba , “ Ga i ola ge ku kenukenu ? Ku lut ge ku awanun inoke bahi lawakik kaiwena ge nuku sosogu . ”
42022047	Yeisu iyoho ya i baaba tohago elal , inoke boda etega hi vinan . He tohago bolo elulutega eluwa avaliya etega alana Yudasa i nulil . Iya i na Yeisu elana tage i nanalo .
42022048	Yaa Yeisu i baek elana i ba , “ Yudasa , nu nalowau inoke toto o eliyana Gamagal Natuna nu pek ana topihigelgel elal ? ”
42022049	Sauga wana tohago hi kite hauna abwe ni gan , inoke hi ba , “ Babala , tab wama elohaveyan kilepana elana naha lolil ? ”
42022050	Avaliya etegana wana elohaveyan kilepana i ahe inoke topowon bwabwatal wali tohouwa wana totuwalali tanana labena awonaa i goyoho .
42022051	Yaa Yeisu i baek tohago elal i ba , “ Besena ! ” Yaka nimana i teliya tau o tanana elana ge i waisi al .
42022052	Inoke i baek topowon bwabwatal avaliyau Limi Bwabwalena ana pulisimanau wali tohouwa ge tonowakau elal , heliya hi nowanik ge nihi lib , i ba , “ Age nau toawatautau ge topihigelgel inoke haveyan kilepana ge ebwakil toguina ku noahe ge ku nem ?
42022053	Lan gegewena alowau ya komiu Limi Bwabwalena elana , inoke nige ku lilibau . Yaa sauga ya komiu wami sauga te , sauga ya abalogugui gogogouina wana sauga logugui . ”
42022054	Inoke Yeisu hi lib ge hi en pwatanik topowon bwabwatal wali tohouwa wana limiya . Pita i nouliulil eliyaa ana bwaga i gan .
42022055	He ginaha hi ton limi ana bakubaku ana luwaluwala , inoke Pita i na i misiyo alonau gamagalau bolo ginaha hi mipainan .
42022056	Galok totuwalali etega i kite Pita i misiyo ginaha mwananalina elana , inoke i gayawaan bubun ge i ba , “ Tau ya iya al ge alona etega . ”
42022057	Yaa Pita i alaha i ba , “ Galok , tau ya nige ya aatena . ”
42022058	Sauga nige i yayapu tau etega Pita i kite yaka i ba , “ Owa al ge avaliya etega . ” Anana i lahe i ba , “ Gan , nau nige i oola . ”
42022059	Sauga ana yapu i ola auwa maisena i mowasi , abwe tau etega i ba balbalgig i ba , “ Tunahot tau ya alona etega , kaiwena iya Galili gamagalina . ”
42022060	Anana Pita i lahe i ba , “ Gan , nige ya aatena hauna gun u babaunan ei . ” Pita iyoho ya i baaba inoke sauga o kamkam melutauina i kahin .
42022061	Inoke Babala i tagena pil matana i lihikan Pita elana , yaka abwe Pita Babala wana baaba i nuwatuan , toto i ba , “ Bulin ebe kamkam melutauina nigeya ga ni kakahin inoke nu alahagau paeton . ”
42022062	Inoke i na i tagil tola ge i kahin nabi .
42022063	Bolo Yeisu hi matahikan , hi talawasi-an ge hi nibinibihan .
42022064	Kaliko hi ahe matana hi am kaus ge hi nel elana hi ba , “ Ebo owa palopita , inoke u baem eliyama henala ge i nibihiwa ? ”
42022065	Inoke baaba nanakina i gewi al hi baunan eliyana .
42022066	Panuwa abwe i mwananal ya , yaka Yudiya wali tonowakau aloliyau topowon bwabwatal ge Logugui ana topankite hi migogo , inoke Yeisu hi pwatanik tologugui o elal .
42022067	Hi baek elana hi ba , “ Wama wasa nu pem te ebo owa Mesaiya . ” Analiya i lahe i ba , “ Ebo wami wasa na pewa , he nige nuku aabulilek-agau ,
42022068	ge ebo nel etega na neli eliyamiu , nige nuku lalahe .
42022069	Yaa sauga ya ge ta nanawa maninilaa , nau Gamagal Natuna na misiyowa Yehoba Togasisi labena awonaa . ”
42022070	Inoke gegewel hi nel hi ba , “ He owa Yehoba Natuna ? ” Analiya i lahe i ba , “ Ku ba ola o he heiya te nau e . ”
42022071	Inoke hi ba , “ Iyaka besena to . Nige al ta loloya tage gamagalau nihi nem ge nihi baaba tau ya kaiwena . Kila totola iyaka wana baaba ta hagoem awanaa . ”
42023001	Inoke Yudiya wali tologugui gegewel hi lut ge Yeisu hi ahe hi en pwatanik Pilato elana .
42023002	Yaka hi telipuna hi wole hi ba , “ Tau ya ha pwawa iya wama gamagalau i papankitel panakil . I ba tage bahi takis naha pwapwamola Sisa elana ge totona i ba tage iya Mesaiya ama wama kin . ”
42023003	Yaka Pilato i nel Yeisu elana i ba , “ Owa Yudiya wali kin ? ” Anana Yeisu i lahe i ba , “ He i ola te wam baaba ei . ”
42023004	Inoke Pilato i baek topowon bwabwatal aloliyau ge boda elal i ba , “ Tau ya nige ana woliwoli puna etega ya pwapwawa ge tage ana lahi na baunan . ”
42023005	Yaa heliya hi ba balbalgig hi ba , “ Wana panpankiti elana inoke gamagalau i paawaawauli-agil Yudiya wali labi gegewel elal . I telipunaa labi Galili ge iyaka i nem te panuwa ya elana . ”
42023006	Wali baaba o Pilato i hago , yaka i nel elal i ba , “ Age tau ya Galili gamagalina ? ”
42023007	Sauga Pilato i atena te Yeisu i neem Galili , Helodi wana abaloguguiya , inoke i patuna i na Helodi elana . He saugena o Helodi iya iyoho Yelusalema .
42023008	Sauga Helodi Yeisu i kite nuwana i waisi hot , kaiwena wasana i hago inoke sauga yayapona nuwana te ni kite . He i nuwatu ginol yawiyawi enuna Yeisu ni ginolil ge ni kite .
42023009	Inoke nel i gewi i neli Yeisu elana , yaa nige anana i lalahe .
42023010	Topowon bwabwatal ge Logugui ana topankite hi talmilila to , yaka hi wole panapanak-an .
42023011	Helodi alonau ge tolohaveyan Yeisu hi talawasi-an ge hi nivali . Yaka kaliko yayapona matana waiwaisana hi ahe hi pagaloi , inoke hi patuna pasikal i na Pilato elana .
42023012	He lan o elana , Helodi alona ge Pilato maniniliya hi abubun ge hi heliheliyam al , yaa valila alona ge alona hi pihigelgel .
42023013	Pilato topowon bwabwatal aloliyau tologugui ge gamagalau i yoga gogonil ,
42023014	yaka i baek elal i ba , “ Ewasi tau ya ku en pwatanim eliyau ge ku ba tage gamagalau i pankitel panakil nihi pihigelgel gamaman elana . He matamiwa ya neli bubun woliwoli kaiweliya toto eliyana ge ku wole , yaa nige puna etega ya pwapwawa .
42023015	Helodi al ge nige woliwoli puna etega i pwapwawa , inoke heiya te kaiwena ge i patuna pasikalim eliyama e . Ku kite , iya nige bugul etega i giginol panak ge tage kaiwena ni yaomal .
42023016	He na ba tolohaveyan nihi nibihi , yaka abwe na sokal . ”
42023017	( Baliman maisena ge maisena , Nopalegi Hagalena ana sauga elana , Pilato toulutuk dela maisena ni sokal ge ni tagil . ) *
42023018	Boda hi yoga pamaisena analiya i bwata hi ba , “ Tau ya ni aliga ! Balabas u sokal eliyama ! ”
42023019	( He Balabas iya valila haveyan i palut Yelusalema gamwanaa hi pihigelgel Loma wali gamaman elana , ge gamagal etega i tagapaaliga , inoke toto ya kaiwena hi teli tukan dela . )
42023020	Pilato nuwana Yeisu ni sokal , inoke i baaba al boda elal .
42023021	Yaa heliya hi yogayoga elana hi ba , “ U lokolosan ! U lokolosan ! ”
42023022	Paetonina Pilato i baaba al elal i ba , “ Hauna kaiwena ge na lokolosan ? Hauna nak tau ya i ginol ? Nige nak puna etega ya pwapwawa eliyana ge tage kaiwena ni yaomal . He na ba tolohaveyan nihi nibihi , yaka abwe na sokal . ”
42023023	Yaa hi lawakik ge hi yoga balbalgig analiya i bwaya nuwaliya Pilato Yeisu ni lokolos . Yaka wali yoga o Pilato wana ba lolopwal i ehik .
42023024	Inoke Pilato wali nuwatu i talamwi .
42023025	Tau toto nuwaliya i sokal , toto valila haveyan i palut ge gamagal etega i tagapaaliga . Ge Yeisu i talamwan elal nihi ginol ni ola wali nuwatu .
42023026	Tolohaveyan Yeisu hi en egonan hi nanawa lokolos kaiwena , yaka tau etega hi pwawa gagama Sailini , alana Saimon , i neem tola i nana i tutuk Yelusalema . Inoke hi lib ge Yeisu ana kolos hi pakalivai i nawaa enaa .
42023027	Gamagalau boda bwabwatana Yeisu hi noulil , gamwaliyaa yowau enuna , heliya hi kahikahin Yeisu baena .
42023028	Yeisu i tagena pil i baek elal i ba , “ Yelusalema yowauiliyau , bahi baeu nuku kakahin , yaa totomiu baemiu ge natumiyau baeliya te nuku kahin .
42023029	Kaiwena sauga i nenem abwe nak bwabwatana ni gan ge gamagalau nihi ba , ‘ Yowau bolo hi kobwas heliya hi waisi , kaiwena nige sauga etega natuliyau i gagan ge hi papaalahul . ’
42023030	Yaka sauga o elana gamagalau nihi baek oya elal nihi ba , ‘ Nuku maguli pwatameya , ’ ge nihi baek manahinhin elal , ‘ Nuku yabomwima . ’
42023031	Ebwakil kolena ta ton memena nige i gagasisi , yaa ebo i mati ge ta ton , yaka abwe memena i gasisi hot . Inoke i ola al to , sauga ya gamagalau nak bolo ya hi awaginol , yaa sauga mulaa nak bwabwatana hot abwe ni masal . ”
42023032	Bolau eluwa al , heliya nak ana toginol , tolohaveyan hi enil ge aloliya Yeisu nihi lopaaligal .
42023033	Sauga hi na hi vin panuwa alana hi ba Pana Babaloma , inoke Yeisu hi lokolosana to , alonau ge nak ana toginol labui . Etegana ana kolos hi pamilila labena awonaa , ge etegana labena gegebanaa .
42023034	Yaka Yeisu i ba , “ Nam , wali gegi nu nuwayoho , kaiwena nige hi aatena hauna hi giginol . ” Tolohaveyan ana kaliko hi wali , yaka pat hi ahe galavenu etega hi galavenu-an , inoke eliyana kaliko ana pwahin tomaha tomaha hi guyauan elal .
42023035	Gamagalau hi talmilil Yeisu hi gayawaan , yaka Yudiya wali tologugui hi lamwa tunatuna-an hi ba , “ Gamagalau getogal i pwamwalil . He totona ni pwamwal , ebo iya Mesaiya Yehoba wana hilihili gamagalina . ”
42023036	Tolohaveyan al ge Yeisu hi talawasi-an . Hi noha gegelinaa ge oine manumanunina hi pek ni im ,
42023037	yaka hi baek elana hi ba , “ Ebo owa Yudiya wali kin , he totom u pwamwaliwa . ”
42023038	Leleli etega hi leli , inoke hi tagahikan ana kolos elana kokowana pwatanaa , i ba , “ Toto ya iya Yudiya wali kin . ”
42023039	Nak ana toginol eluwa hi kukuki kolos elana , etegana Yeisu i lamwa tunatuna-an i ba , “ Age owa Mesaiya ? He totom u pwamwaliwa ge ama al nu pwamwalima ! ”
42023040	Yaa etegana alona i ba lalaan i ba , “ Age nige Yehoba u lolovakun-an ? Lahi maisena toto tau ya i pwawa , owa al ge u pwawa .
42023041	Owa ge nau ala lahi i sapu hot , kaiwena toto ta ginol he lahena te . Yaa tau ya nige bugul etega i giginol panak . ”
42023042	Inoke i baek Yeisu elana i ba , “ Yeisu , sauga wam abalogugui ni nem ge nu tabwa kin , nu nuwahikagau . ”
42023043	Anana Yeisu i lahe i ba , “ Tunahot ya ba eliyam , lan ebe alou owa ta minaa labulabumwa . ”
42023044	Alalati bwagatau sabwelu yanana i mowasi ge panuwa gegewena i gogou ana siga tili kilok kokoyavi .
42023045	Kaliko mamanana toto hi pakuki Limi Bwabwalena gamwana hi baba tomwaya , i maleli labi eluwa .
42023046	Inoke Yeisu i yoga anana i bwaya i ba , “ Nam , yayaluwau ya teli nimwam gamwanaa . ” Sauga i ba ola o , inoke yawalina i mowasi .
42023047	Tolohaveyan wali tohouwa i kite hauna gun i gan , inoke Yehoba i tobalan ge i ba , “ Tunahot tau ya iya tosasapona . ”
42023048	Gamagalau gegewel bolo hi migogo ge hi gagayawa , sauga hi kite hauna gun i gan , nuwaliya i nak inoke babagaliliya hi lol ge hi sikalan hi na wali limiya .
42023049	Yaa Yeisu wana heliyamwau ge yowau bolo valila hi toulil avaliya hi neem Galili , gegewel hi talmililek laha ge mataliya i nok bugul bolo ya hi gagayawa-an .
42023050	Tau etegana alana Yosepa , i neem Yudiya awanina etega alana Alimadiya , wana pagan i waisi ge i sapu . Iya i matamatan Yehoba wana abalogugui kaiwena . He iya Yudiya wali tologugui avaliya etega , yaa nige i oolak alonau wali nuwatu ge wali ginol elana .
42023051	
42023052	I nok Pilato elana Yeisu tuwana i patalam ge ni ahe .
42023053	Inoke i na i ahe kolos elana , kaliko waiwaisana elana i osiya ge i na i teli salaiya toto hi ken tukan pat elana . Salai o nige toyaomal etega ga hi teteliya .
42023054	Lan o Sabwata ana lan lovivina , ge kelaubwa Sabwata ni telipuna .
42023055	Yowau bolo valila avaliya Yeisu hi neem Galili , Yosepa hi toulil , inoke salai hi kite , ge hi kite Yeisu tuwana ga hi teli ola .
42023056	Yaka abwe hi sikal hi na wali limiya , inoke sawasawal ge enonu bwalena waiwaisana hi lovivina-an Yeisu tuwana kaiwena . Yaa lan Sabwata hi veyaho i ola Logugui ana baaba .
42024001	Wik ana lan houwan elana , mweluluga kekeisi hot , yowau enonu bwalena waiwaisana toto iyaka hi lovivina-an hi ahe ge hi na salaiya .
42024002	Hi kite pat toto salai awana hi paankausiya iyaka hi pakul yoho ,
42024003	inoke hi na hi tuk salai gamwanaa , yaa nige Babala Yeisu tuwana hi kikite .
42024004	Heliya iyoho hi nuwanuwatu Yeisu tuwana kaiwena , inoke sauga o bolau eluwa ali kaliko i namanamal hi talmilil labeliyaa .
42024005	Yowau hi lovakun nabi yaka hi kululu maniniliya i loek bilibiliya . Yaa bolau eluwa hi baek elal hi ba , “ Hauna kaiwena ge toto yawalina gaganina ku loyaan toyaomal wali abamina elana ?
42024006	Nige i gagan te , iyaka i lut ! Wana baaba nuku nuwahikan , toto i baunan eliyamiu sauga alomiu ku miminaa labi Galili .
42024007	I ba , ‘ Gamagal Natuna nihi talamwan gamagalau nanakil nimaliyaa ge nihi lokolos , lan etonina elana inoke ni lutem yaomala . ’ ”
42024008	Yaka abwe yowau Yeisu wana baaba o hi nuwatuan .
42024009	Sauga hi sikalem salaiya , bugul ya gegewena wasana hi wasaan apostolowau elulutega maisena elal , avaliyau ge tohago gegewel al .
42024010	Yowau bolo wasa o hi wasaan apostolowau elal , heliya Meli Magidala yovana , Yowana , Meli toto Yemesa hinana , aloliyau ge yowau bolo avaliyau al .
42024011	He apostolowau nige yowau wali wasa hi aabulilek-an , kaiwena hi nuwatu tage wali baaba i ola ba bwagabwaga ya .
42024012	Yaa Pita i lut ge i patalelu i na salaiya . I kululu , yaka kaliko awawana ya i kite . Inoke i sikal i na wana limiya ge i nuwanuwatu bugul bolo i gan kaiweliya .
42024013	Lan maisena o elana tohago ali toto eluwa hi nanawa awan alana Emius kaiwena . Emius ge Yelusalema ali hawawal ana yapu i ola ileben kilomita .
42024014	Ali toto eluwa hi nonoliwaliwan bugul gegewena bolo i masal kaiweliya .
42024015	Heliya iyoho hi nonoliwaliwan ge hi nelnel bugul o kaiweliya , yaka Yeisu i noha eliyalil ge aloliya hi notoyawa .
42024016	Hi kite ya , yaa nige mataliya i mwamwapwela ge nihi atena te henala iya .
42024017	Yaka abwe i nelil i ba , “ Sauga ku nawanawa , hauna gun bana ge ku pepeliwaliwan-agimiu ? ” Yaka hi notalmilil , ali awa i nuwaleyan .
42024018	Etegana alana Kaliyopas i baek Yeisu elana i ba , “ Tonawanawa hi gewi iyoho Yelusalema , he tabam owa maisem ya nige u aatena hauna gun i masala o sauga ya elana . ”
42024019	Yaka i nel elal i ba , “ Hauna gun bana ? ” Anana hi lahe hi ba , “ Bugul toto i masal Yeisu gagama Nasaleta elana . Tau ya iya palopita etega , wana baaba ge wana ginol gasigasisena ya , Yehoba matanaa ge gamagalau gegewel mataliyaa .
42024020	Topowon bwabwatal aloliyau ge wama tologugui hi teli gavana nimanaa , inoke i talamwan ni yaomal , yaka abwe hi lokolosan .
42024021	He ama ha nuwatu te Yehoba tau ya i hile iya boda Isileli ni sokalil . Ge bugul etega al , lan eton iyaka i mowasi ge bugul bolo o hi masal .
42024022	He wama boda yowauiliyau enuna atema hi payou . Ewasi mweluluga kekeisi hot hi na salaiya ,
42024023	yaa nige tuwana hi kikite . Sauga hi sikal , inoke hi baem eliyama tage pankite etega i masal aneloseyau hi kitel ge tage hi baek elal hi ba , ‘ Iyaka i lut . ’
42024024	Inoke alomeyau enuna al hi na salaiya ge hi pwawa i ola ya te yowau wali wasa , yaa iya nige hi kikite . ”
42024025	Inoke abwe Yeisu i baek elal i ba , “ Ku sigasiga hot ge atemiu i gasisi , yaka nige etimwawa palopitau wali wasa gegewena ku aabulilek-an .
42024026	Age nige ku aatena e Mesaiya lomwan o ni pwawa ga abwe mulaa ni ulutuk wana wasawasa elana ? ”
42024027	Inoke Buki Bwabwalena ana baaba iya kaiwena i pwamwananal elal , i telipunaa Mosese wana buki elal ge palopitau gegewel wali leleli .
42024028	Hi nawanawa ee , kelaubwa nihi vin awan toto kaiwena hi nonok , inoke Yeisu i ginol i ola te nuwana ni novevehe al .
42024029	Yaa hi awanun nabinabi elana hi ba , “ Aloma owa ta mina , kaiwena kelaubwa bulin ni gan ge panuwa ni gogou . ” Inoke i na i tuk limiya aloliya nihi mina .
42024030	Aanan ana sauga inoke i na alonau hi misiyo abaanan elana . Yaka beleid i ahe ge i ba mulolu Yehoba elana , inoke i pigebagebalan ge i guyauan elal .
42024031	I ginol ola o , yaka abwe mataliya i mwapwela ge hi atena henala iya , yaa i miyaomala mataliyaa .
42024032	Ali toto eluwa hi pebaaba-agil hi ba , “ Sauga ta nawanawa kamwasaa ge i liwaliwan elala Buki Bwabwalena ana baaba i pwamwananal , tunahot atela i waiwai , age ? ”
42024033	He sauga o hi lut ge hi sikal hi na Yelusalema , yaka apostolowau elulutega maisena hi pwawal aloliyau ge aloliyau enuna hi migogo .
42024034	Heliya hi baek bolo eluwa elal hi ba , “ Tunahot Babala iyaka i lut . He i masala Saimon elana . ”
42024035	Inoke bolo eluwa avaliyau wali wasa hi pek hauna i gan elal kamwasaa . Ge hi ba , “ Sauga beleid i ahe ge i pigebagebal-an , inoke abwe ha atena iya Yeisu . ”
42024036	Tohago eluwa heliya iyoho ya hi baaba avaliyau elal , yaka Yeisu i masal i talmilila gamwaliyaa ge i baek elal i ba , “ Atemiu ni laumwal ! ”
42024037	Ateliya i you ge hi lovakun , hi nuwatu tage gagayumwa hi kite .
42024038	Yaka i baek elal i ba , “ Ga i ola ge atemiu i bwanabwana ge nuwamiu i eleluwa ?
42024039	Nimwau ge aeu ku kite . He nau te ! Tuwau ku pibose ge nuku atena . Gagayumwa nige bunumwina ge tutuwana i gagan i oola toto ku kiteya nau eliyau . ”
42024040	Sauga i ba ola o , inoke nimana ge aena i pankitel .
42024041	Heliya hi yaliyaya nabi ge nuwaliya hi ahe , yaa nige ga hi aabulilek-an . Inoke i nelil i ba , “ Tab aanan etega i gan ge na an ? ”
42024042	Inoke moti totonina awahinena hi pek ,
42024043	yaka i ahe ge i an mataliyaa .
42024044	Inoke i baek elal i ba , “ Valila sauga alowau komiu , ya baewa eliyamiu i ola hiwe : bugul gegewena hi lelelian kaiweu Mosese wana logugui elana , palopitau wali leleli elana ge Same elana nihi tabwa tunahot . ”
42024045	Yaka wali nuwatu i ba pwela ge Buki Bwabwalena ana baaba ana sapu nihi atena .
42024046	I baek elal i ba , “ Buki Bwabwalena i ba ola hiwe . Mesaiya lomwan ni pwawa ge ni yaomal , yaka lan etonina elana ni lutem yaomala .
42024047	Inoke iya alana elana nihi papaatena gamagalau labi gegewena elal nihi telipunaa Yelusalema , yaka gamagalau wali gegi ana en nihi pek ge Yehoba wali gegi ni nuwayoho .
42024048	He komiu nuku tabwa bugul gegewena o ali towasa .
42024049	Nau toto Nam i bateli kaiwemiu ya papatuna i nenem eliyamiu . Yaa nuku minaa ga Yelusalema ana siga gasisi ni loem Yehoba elana nuku kalaopopwi . ”
42024050	Yeisu tohago i enil Yelusalema hi eguluwan hi na Bedani ana labiya , inoke nimana i latahin ge i ba muloluagil .
42024051	Iya iyoho i baaba muloluagil , yaka i tataluwagil ge Yehoba i ahe i ha labulabumwa .
42024052	Heliya hi kululu ge hi tapwalolo eliyana , abwe alona wali yaliyaya bwabwatana hi sikal Yelusalema .
42024053	Inoke sauga gegewena hi miminaa Limi Bwabwalena elana Yehoba hi tobatobal-an .
43001001	Mulaa abwe bugul gegewel hi gan , Baaba iyoho i gan , iya alona Yehoba , ge Baaba iya Yehoba .
43001002	Abatelipuna elana iya iyoho alona Yehoba .
43001003	Iya eliyana Yehoba bugul gegewena i ginolil . Binimala iya nigeya , bugul bolo hi gan nige nihi gagan , yaa iya eliyana inoke hi masal .
43001004	Iya elana yawal i gan , ge yawal o iya gamagalau wala mwananal .
43001005	Mwananal i yana gogou gamwanaa , yaa gogou mwananal o nige i aatena .
43001006	Tau etega alana Diyon , iya Yehoba i patuna i nem panayawi .
43001007	Iya i nem mwananal wasana i wasaan , inoke gamagalau gegewel wasa ya nihi hago ge nihi abulilek .
43001008	Iya nige mwananal i oola , yaa i nem mwananal wasana i wasaan .
43001009	Mwananal tutunahotina , toto mwananal ni pek gamagalau gegewel elal , iya i nem panayawi .
43001010	I nem i minaa panayawi , yaa bwagana iya eliyana Yehoba panayawi i ginol , he panayawi gamagaliliyau nige hi aatena te henala iya .
43001011	I nem i minaa totona wana labi elana , yaa wana labi gamagaliliyau nige hi pwapwamwa pahe .
43001012	Yaa bolo hi pwamwa heyan ge alana hi abulilek-an , i talam bosowailiya nihi tabwa Yehoba natunau .
43001013	Hi tabwa Yehoba natunau nige tage panayawi tamanina wana pamasal elana , o ebo gamagalau wali nuwatu elana , yaa Yehoba i ab pavavaluna-agil .
43001014	Baaba i tabwa gamagal , inoke avala ta mina ga sauga kekeisi , mulolu ge baaba tutunahotina i kalaopopwi . Wana wasawasa ha kite , i ola Yehoba Natuna maisena ya wana wasawasa , i neem Tamana elana .
43001015	Wasana Diyon Tobabitaiso i wasaan , i yogayoga i ba , “ Toto ya heiya te bana ge valila ya ba , ‘ Toto i nenem ewa iya i bwata lakeyau , kaiwena iya i gan houwa mulaa abwe ya masal . ’ ”
43001016	Iya mulolu i kalaopopwi , inoke gegewela wana mulolu ta pwawa i pem hikahikani .
43001017	Yehoba Logugui i pek Mosese elana ge iya i pamasal gamagalau elal , yaa mulolu ge baaba tutunahotina i masalem Yeisu Keliso elana .
43001018	Nige sauga etega gamagal etega Yehoba i kikite , yaa Yehoba Natuna maisena ya , iya i ola Yehoba , ge iya alona Tamana hi mitoyawa , iya yaka Yehoba i pankitela .
43001019	Yudiya wali tohouwa bolo Yelusalema , topowon enuna avaliyau ge un Libai enuna al hi patunal hi na Diyon elana hi nel hi ba , “ Henala owa ? ”
43001020	Diyon nige i mimikekei , yaa analiya i lahe ge i ba bubun i ba , “ Nau nige Mesaiya i oola . ”
43001021	Yaka hi neli al hi ba , “ He binimala henala owa ? Owa Ilaitiya ? ” Diyon i ba , “ Nau nige Ilaitiya i oola . ” Yudiya hi nel al hi ba , “ Age owa palopita bwabwatana toto i nenem ? ” Analiya i lahe i ba , “ Nigeya . ”
43001022	Yaka Yudiya hi ba , “ He henala owa ? Ga nu ba ola totom kaiwem ? Nu ba pasapu eliyama , inoke naha na bolo hi patunama wali wasa naha pek bubun . ”
43001023	Diyon Yudiya analiya i lahe palopita Aiseya wana baaba elana i ba , “ Nau toto i yogayoga uleya i ba , ‘ Babala wana kamwasa ku pasapu . ’ ”
43001024	Bolo Yudiya wali tohouwa hi patunal , gamwaliyaa enuna Palisi .
43001025	Heliya hi nel Diyon elana hi ba , “ He hauna kaiwena ge u papababitaiso , ebo owa nige Mesaiya , o Ilaitiya o ebo palopita toto bwabwatana i oola ? ”
43001026	Diyon analiya i lahe i ba , “ Nau wewel elana ya papababitaiso , yaa etega iyoho i talmilila gamwamiwa nige ku aatena .
43001027	Iya i nenem ewa , yaa nau nige no waisi i gagan ge tage aena ana os ana hihiu na sokal . ”
43001028	Bugul gegewena ya i gana Bedani elana , wewel Yolidani labi leunati . He Diyon i papababitaisowa wewel Yolidani elana .
43001029	Hi kenu lan i gan , inoke Diyon matana i nok Yeisu i kite i nanawa elana , yaka i ba , “ Ku kite ! Iya Sipi Natuna toto Yehoba i patunam panayawi gamagaliliyau wali gegi ni ahek yoho !
43001030	Iya te bana ge valila ya ba , ‘ Tau toto i nenem ewa , iya i bwata lakeyau , kaiwena iya i gan houwa mulaa abwe ya masal . ’
43001031	Saugena o nau nige ya aatena henala bana ya babaa , yaa ya nem gamagalau ya pababitaisol wewel elana , puna heiya te iya na pamasal Isileli elal . ”
43001032	Inoke Diyon i wasa al i ba , “ Nau valila nige ya aatena henala i nenem , yaa toto i patunau ge wewel elana gamagalau ya pababitaisol i baem elau i ba , ‘ Tau toto nu kite Yayaluwa Bwabwalena ni lau ge ni minaa elana , he iya te Yayaluwa Bwabwalena elana ni papababitaiso . ’ Inoke Yayaluwa Bwabwalena ya kite i loem labulabumwa i ola bunibuni ge i lau i minaa elana .
43001033	
43001034	Ya kiteya matawa , heiya te ya ba , ‘ Tau ya iya Yehoba Natuna . ’ ”
43001035	Lan i gan al , Diyon iyoho i taltalmilil al alonau ge wana tohago eluwa ,
43001036	ge sauga Diyon Yeisu i kite i nanawa , inoke i ba , “ Ku kite ! Iya Sipi Natuna toto Yehoba i patunam ! ”
43001037	Sauga tohago ali toto eluwa hi hago Diyon baaba o i baunan , yaka hi tatauliulil Yeisu enaa .
43001038	Yeisu i tagena sikal i kitel , yaka i nelil i ba , “ Hauna gun nuwamiu ? ” Tohago hi ba , “ Labai , ga u miminaa ? ” ( Vilan “ Labai ” ana pasikal heiya “ topankite . ” )
43001039	Yeisu analiya i lahe i ba , “ Ku nem yaka nuku kite . ” Inoke avaliya Yeisu hi na wana abamina hi kite , ge lan o avaliya hi miminaa to . He sauga o iyaka po kilok kokoyavi ana labi elana .
43001040	Bolo Diyon wana baaba hi hago ge hi tatauliulil Yeisu enaa , he etegana te Andulu , Saimon Pita talina .
43001041	Inoke houwan hot Andulu i na talina Saimon i loyaan ge wana wasa i pek i ba , “ Mesaiya iyaka ha pwawa . ” ( Vilan “ Mesaiya ” pana Gilik elana ana pasikal hi ba “ Keliso , ” ana sapu heiya “ Yehoba wana hilihili gamagalina . ” )
43001042	Yaka Andulu Saimon i en pwatanik Yeisu elana . Yeisu matana i nok Saimon i gayawaan , yaka i ba , “ Owa Saimon , Diyon natuna , yaa alam ya tun Sipas . ” ( Alan “ Sipas ” ana pasikal pana Gilik elana hi ba “ Pita , ” ana sapu heiya “ pat . ” )
43001043	Lan i gan al , inoke Yeisu i nuwatu ni nok ni na Galili . Pilipi i pwawa ge i baek elana i ba , “ U nem u toulilau . ”
43001044	Pilipi wana panuwa te Betesaida , he panuwa o Andulu ge Pita al wali panuwa .
43001045	Pilipi Nataniyel i pwawa , yaka i baek elana i ba , “ Tau toto wasana Mosese i lelelian Logugui ana buki elana , ge palopitau al hi lelelian , iyaka ha pwawa , iya Yeisu gagama Nasaleta , Yosepa natuna . ”
43001046	Yaka Nataniyel i nel i ba , “ Age bosowaina ya waisi etega ni neem Nasaleta ? ” Yaka Pilipi i ba , “ He u nem ga ta na u kite . ”
43001047	Sauga Yeisu Nataniyel i kite i nanawa elana , yaka i ba , “ Tau ya iya Isileli tutunahotina etega , ge nige kakawi etega i gagana elana . ”
43001048	Inoke Nataniyel i nel Yeisu elana i ba , “ Ga i ola ge u atenau ? ” Yeisu i ba , “ Ya kitewa u misiyo poga punaa , mulaa abwe Pilipi i yogaagiwa . ”
43001049	Yaka Nataniyel i baek Yeisu elana i ba , “ Topankite , owa Yehoba Natuna , ge owa Isileli wali kin ! ”
43001050	Yeisu i ba , “ U abulilek kaiwena ya ba , ‘ Ya kitewaa poga punaa . ’ Toto ya nige i bwabwaya , yaa abwe bugul bwabwayal enuna nu kitel . ”
43001051	Yaka Yeisu i ba al i ba , “ Ya ba tunahot eliyamiu , abwe nuku kite labulabum ni mwapwela ge Yehoba wana aneloseyau nihi haha ge nihi laulau Gamagal Natuna elana . ”
43002001	Lan eluwa i mowasi , abwe alolon hagalena etega hi ginola Galili awanina Kena elana . Yeisu hinana i nok hagali o elana ,
43002002	ge Yeisu alonau wana tohago hi awanunil hi nok al alolon o elana .
43002003	Sauga oine i mowasi , inoke Yeisu hinana i baek elana i ba , “ Iyaka nige wali oine etega al i gagan . ”
43002004	Inoke Yeisu hinana anana i lahe i ba , “ Nevenak , hauna kaiwena baaba ya u baunan elau ? No sauga nigeya ga i pwapwawa . ”
43002005	Yaka Yeisu hinana i baek totuwalali elal i ba , “ Ebo hauna gun ni baunan eliyamiu , nuku ginol ola wana baaba . ”
43002006	Mulaa abwe Yudiya nihi anan , nimaliya ge wali bugubugul nihi ul ni ola wali tapwalolo ana logugui , inoke toto o kaiwena ulubwal pat elana hi ginoliliya ali gewi esiwa ( 6 ) iyoho to , maisena ge maisena bosowaina wewel ni minaa gamwanaa ana bwata ni ola 100 lita . *
43002007	Yaka Yeisu i baek totuwalali elal i ba , “ Wewel ku wage ulubwal nuku pakalaopopwil . ” Inoke wewel hi wage ge ulubwal hi pakalaopopwil i na ana siga awaliyaa .
43002008	Yaka Yeisu i baek totuwalali elal i ba , “ Sauga ya enuna ku wage ge ku na ku pek tau toto hagali i kauni elana . ” Yaka hi ginol i ola Yeisu wana baaba ,
43002009	ge tau toto hagali i kauni wewel toto Yeisu i pil ge i tabwa oine i im bose . Nige i aatena te oine o ga i noem , yaa totuwalali bolo wewel hi wage hi atena . Yaka tau toto hagali i kauni toalolon melutauina i yogaan i nok elana ,
43002010	ge i baek elana i ba , “ Sauga gegewena oine amnana waiwaisana ta teli tagilan houwan , ge sauga gamagalau iyaka hi im nabiyan ge amnaliya i pwawa , inoke abwe oine toto nige amnana i wawaisi hot ta teli tagilan . Yaa owa nige u giginol ola . Oine amnana waiwaisana hot u kukuhikan ana siga sauga ya , abwe u teli tagilan . ”
43002011	Ginol yawiyawi toto ya Yeisu wana ginol yawiyawi houwan hot , i ginola awan Kena elana labi Galili . Ginol o elana wana wasawasa i pamasal , inoke wana tohago hi abulilek-an .
43002012	Alolon hagalena enaa , yaka Yeisu alonau hinana , talinau ge wana tohago hi nok hi na Kapeniyama , inoke hi miminaa ga o lan enuna .
43002013	Sauga iyaka kelaubwa Yudiya wali Nopalegi Hagalena ana sauga , inoke Yeisu i nok i na Yelusalema .
43002014	Yeisu i na Limi Bwabwalena ana bakubakuwa , inoke gamagalau enuna i pwawal bulumakau , sipi ge bunibuni hi lolopalipali , ge enuna hi misiyo wali teibol elana ge mani hi lololopatal .
43002015	Inoke hihiu enuna i ahe enibinibi i ginol , ge eliyana gamagalau avaliyau wali bulumakau ge sipi i takel tagilagil Limi Bwabwalena tolinaa , ge mani ana tololopatal wali teibol i kukupapagena-an ge wali mani i tagakayakaya-an ,
43002016	ge i baek bunibuni ali topalipali elal i ba , “ Bugul bolo ya ku bugul egonagil ! Bahi al Nam wana limi nuku giginol ni oola wami abamaket ! ”
43002017	Yaka tohago Buki Bwabwalena ana baaba hi nuwahikan , toto i ba , “ Wam limi ana nunuwana i tau atewa i ola ginaha . ”
43002018	Yaka Yudiya hi baek Yeisu elana hi ba , “ He ginol yawiyawi etega u ginol naha kite , inoke naha atena tunahot Yehoba wam gasisi i pewa te ginol ya u ginol . ”
43002019	Yeisu Yudiya analiya i lahe i ba , “ Ebo Limi Bwabwalena ya nuku pasamwalekaleka , inoke lan eton elana na pamilil al . ”
43002020	Yudiya Yeisu anana hi lahe hi ba , “ Baliman ana gewi poti sikis te limi ya hi taltali , yaa owa u ba , ‘ Lan eton elana na pamilil al . ’ ”
43002021	Yaa Limi Bwabwalena toto bana ge Yeisu i babaa , he iya tuwana bana .
43002022	Inoke sauga i lutem yaomala , wana tohago wana baaba o hi nuwahikan , inoke Buki Bwabwalena ana baaba ge Yeisu wana baaba hi abulilek-an .
43002023	Sauga Yeisu iyoho Yelusalema Nopalegi Hagalena ana sauga elana , gamagalau hi gewi wana ginol yawiyawi i ginolil hi kite , inoke hi abulilek elana .
43002024	Yaa Yeisu nige i oolak elal ge i memelteli-agil , kaiwena gamagalau gegewel wali nuwatu i atena .
43002025	Nige tage wana aatena i kaubwa ge abwe gamagal etega wana wasa ni pek gamagalau wali nuwatu kaiwena , yaa i atena te hauna iyoho gamagalau ateliyaa .
43003001	Tau etega Yudiya wali tohouwa etegana alana Nikodimas , iya boda Palisi gamagalina etega .
43003002	Bulin etega i na Yeisu elana ge i ba , “ Labai , ha atena owa topankite etega u neem Yehoba elana , kaiwena nige gamagal etega bosowaina ginol yawiyawi ni ginol ni ola owa , ebo Yehoba nige i miminek elana . ”
43003003	Yeisu Nikodimas anana i lahe i ba , “ Ya ba tunahot eliyam , nige bosowaina gamagal etega Yehoba wana abalogugui ni kite ana siga ebo Yehoba ni ab pavavaluna . ”
43003004	Yaa Nikodimas i ba , “ Ebo gamagal etega iyaka i matuwa , ga nihi ab ola-an ? Nige bosowaina ni ulutuk sikal hinana tinenaa ge hinana ni ab paeluwana al . ”
43003005	Yeisu Nikodimas anana i lahe i ba , “ Ya ba tunahot eliyam , nige bosowaina gamagal etega ni ulutuk Yehoba wana abaloguguiya ana siga ebo Yehoba ni ab pavavaluna wewel ge Yayaluwa Bwabwalena elana .
43003006	Gamagal tamana ge hinana tuwana hi ab yawalina i gan , yaa ebo Yayaluwa Bwabwalena gamagal o ni ab pavavaluna , inoke abwe yayaluwana yawalina ni gan .
43003007	Bahi atem ni yoyou no baaba kaiwena , toto ya ba , ‘ Ebo nuwamiu nuku ulutuk Yehoba wana abaloguguiya , he Yehoba ni ab pavavaluna-agimiu . ’
43003008	Mana i towa i yu olak labi toto nuwana ni noek . Butuna ta hago , yaa nige ta aatena te ga i yu noem ge ga i totowa noek . He Yayaluwa Bwabwalena wana tuwalali i ola ya to gamagalau gegewel bolo i ab pavavaluna-agil eliyalil . ”
43003009	Yaka Nikodimas i nel al Yeisu elana i ba , “ Baaba toto u baunan ga ni masal ola ? ”
43003010	Yeisu i ba , “ Owa Isileli wali topankite bwabwatana etega . He ga i ola ge no baaba ana sapu nige u aatena ?
43003011	Ya ba tunahot eliyam , bugul toto ha atena te ha baunan , ge toto ha kite te ha wasaan , yaa komiu wama baaba nige ku aabulilek-an .
43003012	Sauga ebo ya baaba bugul bolo hi masala panayawiya kaiweliya , yaka no baaba nige ku aabulilek-an . He ga abwe nuku abulilek ola ebo na baaba bugul bolo hi masala labulabumwa kaiweliya ?
43003013	Nige gamagal etega i haha labulabumwa , iyai ya te Gamagal Natuna , iya i loem labulabumwa .
43003014	Mosese kopa i ahe mwata kakanununa i ginol ge i teli heyan suki elana uleya , he i ola ya te Gamagal Natuna abwe nihi teli heyan kolos elana ,
43003015	inoke gamagalau gegewel bolo hi abulilek elana yawaliliya hot nihi ahe . ”
43003016	He Yehoba panayawi i nunuwana-an nabiyan , yaka Natuna maisena hot i talamwan , inoke henala ebo ni abulilek-an nige ni yayaomal , yawalina hot ni ahe .
43003017	Yehoba Natuna i patuna i lau panayawiya , nige tage gamagalau panayawi ni pakotil , yaa ni pwamwalil .
43003018	Gamagal toto i abulilek elana nige ana kot i gagan , yaa toto nige i aabulilek , iya ana kot i mowasi ge ana lahi hi baunan haba , kaiwena nige i aabulilek Yehoba Natuna maisena alana elana .
43003019	He yatala puna i ola hiwe : mwananal iyaka i nem i tuk panayawi , yaa gamagalau nuwaliya i noek gogou elana , mwananal nige nuwaliya i oola , kaiwena wali pagan i nak .
43003020	Bolo ginol nanakina hi awaawaginol , mwananal hi pihigelgel-an ge nige hi nonok mwananala , kaiwena nige nuwaliya i oola wali pagan nanakina mwananal ni pamasal .
43003021	Yaa bolo wali ginol i sapu ge i tunahot hi nok mwananala , kaiwena nuwaliya ni mwananal te toto hi ginol hi ginola Yehoba wana gasisi elana .
43003022	Yaka sauga etega Yeisu alonau ge wana tohago hi na labi Yudiya , inoke alonau hi miminek ga o , ge gamagalau i papababitaisol .
43003023	Diyon Tobabitaiso al ge gamagalau i papababitaisol , iya iyoho Ainon awan Salim gegelinaa , kaiwena labi o elana wewel i bwata . Inoke gamagalau hi noknok elana ni pababitaisol .
43003024	He saugena o Diyon nigeya ga hi teteli dela .
43003025	Diyon wana tohago enuna avaliya Yudiya etega hi peawabalgigil highig paganina kaiwena , hauna toto nihi toulil ge bosowailiya nihi sapu Yehoba matanaa .
43003026	Yaka tohago o hi nok hi na Diyon elana hi ba , “ Topankite , tau toto valila alom wewel Yolidani labena leunati ge wasana u wasaan , he iya iyoho sauga e gamagalau i papababitaisol , ge gamagalau gegewel to hi noknok elana o . ”
43003027	Analiya i lahe i ba , “ Nige bosowaina bugul etega ni gan gamagal etega elana iyai te ebo Yehoba ni talamwan elana .
43003028	He komiu totomiu valila ku hago ya te ya ba , ‘ Nau nige Mesaiya i oola , yaa Yehoba i patunau houwan Mesaiya awonaa . ’
43003029	Toalolon melutauina iya te toalolon meluyovana i aahe , yaa toalolon melutauina wana heliyam i matamatan toalolon melutauina alona ge toalolon meluyovana nihi vin , inoke iya iyoho i lalaegan . Inoke sauga toalolon melutauina anana i hago , yaka i yaliyaya nabi . He nau no yaliyaya i ola to , ge no yaliyaya iyaka i olaolaek .
43003030	Iya alana ni bwatabwata ya , ge nau alau ni lolowa ya . ”
43003031	Tau toto i neem natiya , iya gamagalau gegewela i bwata lakela . Tau toto i neem panayawiya , iya panayawi gamagalina ge i baaba bugul bolo hi masamasal panayawiya kaiweliya . Yaa tau toto i neem labulabumwa , iya gamagalau gegewela i bwata lakela .
43003032	Iya bugul bolo i kitel ge i hagoem labulabumwa wasana i wasaan , yaa wana baaba nige gamagal etega i aabulilek-an .
43003033	Yaa henala ebo wana baaba ni abulilek-an , he iya iyaka i patunahot te Yehoba iya tobaaba tunahot .
43003034	Toto Yehoba i patuna iya Yehoba anana i baubaunan , kaiwena Yehoba Yayaluwana i pek elana i kalaopopwi .
43003035	Tamana Natuna i nunuwana-an ge bugul gegewena i teli nimanaa .
43003036	Henala ebo Yehoba Natuna ni abulilek-an , he iya yawalina hot iyaka i pwawa , yaa henala ebo Yehoba Natuna ni towani , yawal o nige ni pwapwawa , yaa Yehoba wana huga i minaa elana .
43004001	Palisi wasa hi hago te Yeisu iyaka gamagalau hi gewi i ahel i patohago-agil ge i pababitaisol , inoke wana tohago iyaka Diyon wana tohago hi gewi lakel .
43004002	He Yeisu nige totona gamagal etega i papababitaiso , wana tohago ya te hi giginol .
43004003	Sauga Yeisu i atena te iya wasana Palisi iyaka hi hago , yaka labi Yudiya i eguluwan ge i sikal al i na labi Galili .
43004004	Kamwasa toto Yeisu i noek , labena Sameliya elana te i nosolaa ,
43004005	inoke i na i vin Sameliya awanina etega alana Saika . Awan o nige ana bwaga i yayapu bilibili toto Yakobo i pek natuna Yosepa elana .
43004006	Wewel kenken etega iyoho to valila Yakobo i ken . Nawanawa kaiwena Yeisu tuwana i aliga , inoke i misiyowa wewel kenken awana bebenaa . Sauga o iyaka i ola alalati bwagatau .
43004007	Sauga o Yeisu wana tohago iyaka hi na panuwaa aanan nihi pwapwamola , inoke abwe Sameliya yovana etega i nok wewel wagi kaiwena . Yaka Yeisu i baek yova elana i ba , “ Tab bosowaina wewel nu wage nu pem na im ? ”
43004008	
43004009	Sameliya yovana i baek Yeisu elana i ba , “ Owa Yudiya gamagalina ge nau Sameliya yovana . He ga i ola ge u baem elau tage wewel na wage nu im ? ” Yova baaba o i baunan , kaiwena Yudiya nige avaliyau Sameliya hi heliheliyam .
43004010	Yeisu yova anana i lahe i ba , “ Binimala nu atena hauna toto Yehoba i guyauan , ge binimala nu atena henala nau ge wewel ya awanun elam , inoke nu awanun elau ge wewel yawalina gaganina na pewa . ” *
43004011	Yaka yova i ba , “ Tonowak , wewel kenken ya i milau , he nige wam ewagiwagi i gagan ge tage wewel nu wage . Wewel yawalina gaganina ga nu aheya ?
43004012	Age owa tubuma Yakobo u bwata lake ? Iya wewel kenken ya i pem elama , ge iya alonau natunau , avaliyau wali sipi ge wali bulumakau , valila wewel kenken ya hi imwimwa . ”
43004013	Yeisu yova anana i lahe i ba , “ Gamagalau gegewel bolo wewel ya hi im , abwe nihi walem al ,
43004014	yaa henala ebo wewel ni im toto nau na pek elana , he nige ni wawalem al . Wewel toto na pek elana ni tabwa wewel i bwanabwana pitpit ge yawal mihomihotina ni pek . ”
43004015	Yova i ba , “ Tonowak , wewel toto o u pem na im , inoke bahi na wawalem al ge bahi na nenem wewel kenken ya elana wewel na wawagi al . ”
43004016	Yeisu i ba , “ U na ga lagom u yogaan ge alom nuku nem . ”
43004017	Yova i ba , “ Nige lagou i gagan . ” Yaka Yeisu yova anana i lahe i ba , “ He tunahot te u ba , ‘ Nige lagou i gagan . ’
43004018	Valila u alolon panimala panuna , ge tau toto sauga ya alom ku mina nige lagom i oola . He ewasi u ba tunahot . ”
43004019	Yova i ba , “ Tonowak , he iyaka ya atenawa age owa palopita etega .
43004020	Ama Sameliya tubumeyau oya ya elana te hi kukululu Yabowaine elana , yaa komiu Yudiya ku ba tage abatapwalolo iyai ya te Yelusalema . ”
43004021	Inoke Yeisu i ba , “ Yova , no baaba ya nu abulilek-an . Sauga i nenem gamagalau nihi kululu Tamaliya elana , yaa nige oya ya elana i oola o ebo Yelusalema elana .
43004022	Komiu Sameliya ku kululuek toto nige ku aatena elana ; yaa ama Yudiya ha kululuek Yabowaine toto ha atena elana , kaiwena pwamwal ana aatena iyaka Yehoba i pamasala ama Yudiya eliyama .
43004023	Yaa sauga i nenem ge iyaka i vin , inoke Yayaluwa Bwabwalena wana gasisi elana gamagalau nihi tapwalolo tunahot Tamaliya elana alona ge wali ginol tutunahotina . He totapwalolo ololal o heliya Tamala i loyaagil .
43004024	Yehoba iya yayaluwa , inoke bolo hi kululu elana Yayaluwa Bwabwalena wana gasisi elana te nihi tapwalolo , alona ge wali ginol tutunahotina . ”
43004025	Yova i ba , “ Ya atena te Mesaiya iyoho i nenem , ge sauga ebo ni nem , inoke abwe bugul gegewena ni pwamwananal eliyama . ” ( He “ Mesaiya ” pana Gilik elana ana pasikal hi ba “ Keliso , ” ana sapu heiya “ Yehoba wana hilihili gamagalina . ” )
43004026	Yeisu anana i lahe i ba , “ He nau te ya baaba elam e . ”
43004027	Sauga o wana tohago hi sikal elana , ge ateliya i you kaiwena hi kite Yeisu i baaba yova etega elana . Yaa nige etega tage ni nel yova elana ni ba , “ Hauna nuwam ? ” o ebo ni nel Yeisu elana ni ba , “ Ga i ola ge u baaba yova elana ? ”
43004028	Yaka yova wana ulubwal i eguluwai ge etimwawa i sikal i na panuwaa . Inoke i baek gamagalau elal i ba ,
43004029	“ Ku nem ga gamagal etega ku kite , iya pagan gegewena bolo ya ginolil i baunan elau . Bi ola ge iya Mesaiya ? ”
43004030	Yaka gamagalau hi gewi panuwa hi eguluwai ge hi nowanik nihi na Yeisu elana .
43004031	Sauga yova i egon enaa , inoke tohago hi baek Yeisu elana hi ba , “ Topankite , aanan ga etega u an . ”
43004032	Yaa analiya i lahe i ba , “ Au i gan , toto komiu nige ku aatena . ”
43004033	Yaka tohago hi pebaaba-agil hi ba , “ Age gamagal etega aanan i pwatanim elana ? ”
43004034	Inoke Yeisu i ba , “ Au heiya te toto i patunau wana nuwatu na ginol ge wana tuwalali na pwamowasi .
43004035	Komiu wami baaba etega ku ba ola hiwe : ‘ Waikena esopali iyoho i mina yaka abwe lovetomwa ge pahi ana sauga . ’ Yaa na baewa eliyamiu , matamiu ni nok eyowa ku kite ! Enona iyaka i matuwa ge bosowaina pahi .
43004036	Sauga e topahi molana i ahiahi , eyowa enona i pahipahi yawal mihomihotina kaiwena . Inoke togalauma ge topahi nihi yaliyaya pamaisena .
43004037	Baaba toto i ba , ‘ Etega i galauma , ge etega al i pahi , ’ he iyaka i tunahot i ola hiwe .
43004038	Sauga ya na patunamiu nuku nok nuku na eyowa toto valila nige ku tutuwalali-an enona nuku pahi . Gamagalau getogal eyowa hi tuwalali-an , ge komiu wali tuwalali enona ku pwawa . ”
43004039	Sameliya awanina o elana gamagalau hi gewi Yeisu hi abulilek-an yova wana wasa kaiwena , toto i ba , “ No pagan gegewena bolo ya ginolil i baunan elau . ”
43004040	Inoke sauga hi na Yeisu elana , yaka hi awanun elana avaliya ga nihi minamina , inoke lan labui Yeisu i minaa ga awan o elana ,
43004041	ge gamagalau hi gewi al hi abulilek Yeisu wana panpankiti kaiwena .
43004042	Yaka gamagalau hi baek yova elana hi ba , “ Nige tage wam baaba ya kaiwena ge ha abulilek , he iyaka totoma wana baaba ha hago ge ha atena tunahot tau ya iya panayawi ana Topwamwal . ”
43004043	Lan labui o i mowasi , yaka Yeisu labi Sameliya i eguluwai ge i nok i na labi Galili .
43004044	( He Yeisu iyaka i ba haba wana tohago elal i ba , “ Palopita etega totona wana panuwa gamagaliliyau nige hi aawatauwan . ” )
43004045	Sauga i na i vin Galili , yaka Galili gamagaliliyau Yeisu wana vin hi yaliyaya-an , kaiwena valila hi na Yelusalema Nopalegi Hagalena kaiwena ge wana ginol gegewena hi kite bolo i ginolil sauga o elana .
43004046	Yeisu i nok al i na Kena , Galili awanina , awan o elana valila wewel i pil ge i tabwa oine . Sauga o elana gamaman ana totuwalali bwabwatana etega natuna melutauina i kasiyebwa Kapeniyama elana .
43004047	Sauga tau o Yeisu wasana i hago te iyaka i sikalem Yudiya ge i vin Galili , inoke i nok i na elana , ge i awanun ni nok ni na natuna ni pwamolu , kaiwena wawaya o ana kasiyebwa iyaka i pulowan .
43004048	Yeisu i baek elana i ba , “ Ebo nige ginol yawiyawi ge abanuwa ahi nuku kikite , he nige nuku aabulilek . ”
43004049	Yaka gamaman ana totuwalali i ba , “ Tonowak , u nem ga ta na natu u kite abwe mulaa ni aliga . ”
43004050	Yeisu i baek elana i ba , “ U sikal , natum nige ni aaliga . ” Tau o Yeisu wana baaba i abulilek-an inoke i egon .
43004051	Iya iyoho ya i nawanawa kamwasaa , yaka wana totuwalali i pwawal ge wana wasa hi pek hi ba , “ Geman iyaka i molu . ”
43004052	Inoke i nelil hauna kilok matana elana ge natuna tuwana i heluwan , yaka hi ba , “ Nolu kokoyavi wan kilok te tuwana i heluwan ge i tultul . ”
43004053	Inoke wawaya tamana i nuwatu nolu kilok matana toto o elana te Yeisu i baek elana i ba , “ Natum nige ni aaliga . ” Yaka tau o alonau ge wana limi ana heniheni gegewel hi abulilek .
43004054	He ginol yawiyawi labuina to Yeisu i ginol sauga i sikalem Yudiya ge i na Galili .
43005001	Sauga etega al , Yeisu i nok i na Yelusalema Yudiya wali tapwalolo hagalena etega kaiwena .
43005002	Yelusalema ana abaulutuk etegana alana hi ba “ Sipi ali Nog ” . Wewel opop etega iyoho abaulutuk o labenaa , alana pana Hibilu hi ba Betesada . Gonu abaminamina ali gewi nimala panuna hi talil painan .
43005003	Gonu o tokasiyebwa hi gewi wali abamina , bolo tomatakai , bolo aeliya i kom , ge bolo nige bosowailiya tuwaliya nihi palamwalamwaniu . *
43005005	Tau etega iyoho to i kasiyebwa baliman ana gewi teti eit .
43005006	Yeisu tau o i kite i kenukenu , ge i atena sauga yayapona hot i kasiyebwa , yaka i neli i ba , “ Tab nuwam nu molu ? ”
43005007	Tokasiyebwa Yeisu anana i lahe i ba , “ Tonowak , sauga wewel i nemunemu , nige o tolabe etega i gagan ge tage ni labeyau ge na gailau wewela . Sauga ebo ya lalabose tage na na na gailau wewela , he gamagal etega iyaka i gailau houwa . ”
43005008	Yaka Yeisu i baek tau elana i ba , “ U lut , wam abakenu u ahe , ge u nawanawa . ”
43005009	Inoke sauga o i molu , i lut , wana abakenu i ahe , ge i nawanawa . He lan Sabwata te bugul ya i gan .
43005010	Inoke Yudiya wali tohouwa hi baek tau toto Yeisu i pwapwamolu elana hi ba , “ Lan Sabwata te lan e . Logugui i lopwali te lan Sabwata elana wam abakenu nu kalivai ge nu nawanawa . ”
43005011	Yaka analiya i lahe i ba , “ Tau toto i pwamolowau i ba , ‘ Wam abakenu u ahe ge u nawanawa . ’ ”
43005012	Yaka Yudiya hi nel hi ba , “ Hauna tau i baewa elam ge wam abakenu u ahe ge u nawanawa ? ”
43005013	Tau toto abwe i molu nige i aatena henala ge i baek elana , kaiwena boda i bwata wewel labenaa ge Yeisu iyaka i lelisola gamwaliyaa .
43005014	Yeisu abwe tau o i pwawaa Limi Tapwalolowa , ge i baek elana i ba , “ U kite , iyaka u molu al . Wam gegi paganina nu paveyaho , eba abwe bugul nanakina hot etega ni gan al elam . ”
43005015	Yaka tau i egon i na Yudiya wali tohouwa wali wasa i pek i ba , “ Age Yeisu te i pwamolowau . ”
43005016	Yudiya Yeisu hi pihigelgel-an ge hi papalomwan-an , kaiwena Yeisu gamagalau i pwamolol Sabwata elana .
43005017	Yaka Yeisu i baek elal i ba , “ Nam iyoho sauga gegewena i tuwatuwalali , ge nau al ya tuwatuwalali . ”
43005018	Inoke Yudiya hi logasisi nabi nuwaliya Yeisu nihi lopaaliga . Nige tage Sabwata ana logugui ya te i leke , yaa Yehoba i awa tamani , he i ola te i ba iya alona Yehoba hi olaolaek .
43005019	Yaka Yeisu i baek Yudiya elal i ba , “ Ya ba tunahot eliyamiu , Yehoba Natuna nige bosowaina bugul etega totona ni ginol , yaa ginol toto i kiteya Tamana elana ya te bosowaina ni ginol . Ginol toto Tamana i giginol , he Natuna al i giginol .
43005020	Tamana Natuna i nunuwana-an , ge ginol toto iya i giginol , gegewena i mimi panpankiti Natuna elana . Ginol toto sauga ya † nige i bwabwata , yaa Tamana ginol bwabwatal hot ni pankite inoke ni awaawaginol , ge komiu nuwamiu nuku ahe .
43005021	Kaiwena Tamana toyaomal i palutil ge yawaliliya i pek , inoke i ola al te Natuna yawal ni pek gamagalau bolo i hihilel elal .
43005022	Etega al , Tamana nige gamagal etega i papakot , yaa yatala ana logugui gegewena i pek Natuna elana ,
43005023	nuwana gamagalau gegewel Natuna nihi awatauwan ni ola Tamana hi awatauwan . Henala ebo Natuna nige i aawatauwan , he Tamana , iya i patuna , nige i aawatauwan . ”
