43005024	Yeisu i ba al , “ Ya ba tunahot eliyamiu , henala ebo no baaba ni hago ge toto i patunau ni abulilek-an , iya iyaka yawal hot i pwawa ge nige ni lalahi , he iyaka yaomal i tataluwan ge i na yawal hot elana .
43005025	Ya ba tunahot eliyamiu , sauga iyoho i nenem — he iyaka i vin — inoke toyaomal Yehoba Natuna anana nihi hago , ge bolo ebo anana nihi hago , yawal hot nihi ahe .
43005026	Tamana iya yawal puna , inoke i ola al i talam Natuna iya yawal puna .
43005027	Iya Gamagal Natuna , inoke Tamana i teli iya gamagalau gegewel ali toyatala .
43005028	“ Bahi atemiu ni yoyou baaba ya kaiwena : sauga iyoho i nenem ge toyaomal bolo salaiya anana abwe nihi hago ,
43005029	inoke nihi lutem ali salaiya . Bolo ginol waiwaisana hi ginol nihi lut yawal hot elana , ge bolo ginol nanakina hi ginol nihi lut lahi nihi pwawa .
43005030	Nige bosowaina bugul etega na ginol totou no nuwatu elana , yaa ya papayatala i ola ya te Nam i baem elau . No papakot i sapu ge i olaolaek , kaiwena nige ya lologasisi tage totou no nuwatu na ginol , yaa toto i patunau wana nuwatu na ginol . ”
43005031	Yeisu i ba al , “ Ebo totou wasau na wasaan , nasi nige ana abulilek ni gagan .
43005032	Yaa etega al iyoho ‡ wasau i wasawasa-an , ge ya atena baaba bolo i baunan kaiweu i tunahot .
43005033	“ Valila gamagalau enuna ku patunal hi na Diyon Tobabitaiso elana , ge Diyon wasa tutunahotina i wasaan elal .
43005034	Nau nige ya nunuwatu tage gamagal etega ni wasa inoke no wasa ni labe ge ni patunahot , yaa Diyon wana wasa ya gopamasal kaiwena nuwau nuku abulilek ge mwal nuku pwawa .
43005035	Diyon iya i ola odam i tau ge i yana , inoke sauga kekeisi ya nuwamiu i noek mwananalina elana ge ku yaliyaya-an .
43005036	“ Yaa no ginol ona hi wasaagau , ge wasa o Diyon wana wasa i bwata lake . Tuwalali bolo ya ginolil Nam i pem elau inoke ya awaawaginol , ge hi pamasalau te Nam i patunau .
43005037	Ge Nam toto i patunau , iya totona wasau i baubaunan . Yaa anana nige sauga etega ku hahago , ge maninina nige ku kikite .
43005038	Komiu wana baaba nige ku aahe ge ku aabulilek-an , kaiwena toto i patuna nige ku aabulilek elana .
43005039	Komiu Buki Bwabwalena ku vavasili ge ku nuwanuwatu-an , kaiwena ku nuwatu te ana baaba elana yawal hot nuku pwawa . He Buki Bwabwalena ana baaba bolo ya hi baaba nau kaiweu ,
43005040	yaa komiu ku towaagau , nige ku nenem elau ge yawal hot ku aahe .
43005041	“ Nige ya nuwanuwatu gamagalau wali tobal kaiwena .
43005042	Yaa ya atenamiu ; ya atena Yehoba ana nunuwana nige i gagan atemiwa .
43005043	Nam alana elana ya nem , yaka komiu ku towaagau , yaa ebo gamagal etega totona alana elana ni nem , he ku yaliyaya-an .
43005044	Nuwamiu te alomiyau nihi tobalagimiu , yaa nige ku lologasisi Yabowaine toto maisena hot ni tobalagimiu . He abwe ga nuku abulilek ola ?
43005045	“ Bahi nuku nunuwatu tage nau na wolemiu Nam elana . Mosese heiya te abwe ni wolemiu , yaa komiu ku nuwatu tage iya ami tolabe .
43005046	Binimala Mosese wana baaba nuku abulilek-an , inoke nau al nuku abulilek-agau , kaiwena wasau i lelelian .
43005047	Yaa kaiwena wana leleli nige ku aabulilek-an , he no baaba abwe ga nuku abulilek-an ola ? ”
43006001	Yaka abwe sauga etega Yeisu Hoga Galili ( o ebo ta ba Hoga Taibeliyas ) i alupanet-an i na labena etega .
43006002	Inoke boda bwabwatana hi nodatu Yeisu hi noulil , kaiwena wana ginol yawiyawi toto tokasiyebwa hi gewi i pwamolol hi kite .
43006003	Yeisu i na i ha oyaa ge alonau wana tohago hi misiyo .
43006004	Sauga o , Yudiya wali Nopalegi Hagalena iyaka i kelaubwa .
43006005	Yeisu matana i nok boda bwabwatana i kitel hi nenem elana , yaka i baek Pilipi elana i ba , “ Nasi aanan ga ta pwamolaa ge gamagalau ya nihi an ? ”
43006006	Yeisu i ba ola o , nuwana Pilipi ni labose , kaiwena iya iyaka i atena te hauna nasi i giginol .
43006007	Pilipi Yeisu anana i lahe i ba , “ Binimala ebo mani silba ali gewi tu handeled ta ahe ge beleid ta pwamolaya , he bwagana ta gotomwatomwa-an pakekeisi ge ta guyauan , yaa nasi nige bosowaina gegewel nihi pwawa . ”
43006008	Yeisu wana tohago etega alana Andulu , iya Saimon Pita talina , i ba masal i ba ,
43006009	“ Geman etega hiwe , ana beleid toto bali hi ginoliya , ali gewi nimala panuna , ge ana moti kekeisi eluwa . Yaa gamagalau gegewel ya nasi nige bosowailiya ! ”
43006010	Yaka Yeisu i ba wana tohago elal i ba , “ Ku ba gamagalau nihi misiyoan . ” He labena o elana mwawin i siun bubun , inoke gamagalau gegewel hi misiyoan mwawin pwatanaa , gamwaliyaa bolau ali gewi tabam paib tausan .
43006011	Inoke Yeisu beleid i ahel i ba mulolu Yehoba elana , yaka abwe i pek wana tohago elal ge hi guyauan gamagalau bolo hi misiyoan elal . Moti i ahel ge i ginol al i ola to . Inoke gamagalau hi anan ana siga ali luvi i pwawa .
43006012	Sauga hi anan ge gegewel tineliya i kiya , yaka Yeisu i baek wana tohago elal i ba , “ An teli gegewena ku bugul papahe , bahi etega ni nanak bwagabwaga . ”
43006013	Inoke an teli hi bugul papahe ge ana egowa elulutega eluwa hi usan pakalaopopwil , an teli o i neem beleid toto bali hi ahe hi ginoliya ali gewi nimala panuna elal .
43006014	Inoke gamagalau bolo Yeisu wana ginol yawiyawi ya hi kite hi ba , “ Tunahot iya palopita toto abwe i nenem panayawi . ”
43006015	Yeisu iyaka i atena te gamagalau nuwaliya nihi nok elana ge nihi palawakik ni tabwa wali kin , yaka maisena ya i egon i na i ha al oyaa .
43006016	Sauga i kokoyavi , Yeisu wana tohago hi na hi lau hoga Galili ,
43006017	hi gaiha wagaa , ge hi kuki nihi alupanet Kapeniyama . Sauga bulin i gan , Yeisu nige ga i sisikal elal .
43006018	Mana gasigasisena i towa ge hoga i bagol .
43006019	Yaka hi levaleva ee ali bwaga ana yapu i ola paib o ebo sikis kilomita , abwe Yeisu hi kite i nawaa hoga pwatanaa i nenem wagaa , inoke hi lovakun .
43006020	Yaa Yeisu i baek elal i ba , “ Bahi lovakun , nau te . ”
43006021	Inoke alona wali yaliyaya Yeisu hi ahe i gaiha wagaa , yaka etimwawa waga i tuk labi toto nuwaliya nihi noek elana .
43006022	Lan i gan al , inoke boda bolo hi eguluwagil hi minaa Hoga Galili labena etega , hi atena nolu waga maisena ya te i gan . Hi atena Yeisu nige alonau ge wana tohago hi gagaiha waga o elana , yaa tohago heliya ya hi kuki ge hi egon .
43006023	He waga enuna hi neem awan Taibeliyas hi tuk hi tana labi o gegelinaa , labi toto elana ge Babala beleid i ahe , i ba mulolu Yehoba elana , ge i pek boda hi an .
43006024	Sauga boda hi kite Yeisu nige i gagan to labi o elana , ge wana tohago al nige hi gagan , inoke hi gaiha waga elal ge hi lelipanet hi na Kapeniyama Yeisu ana loya kaiwena .
43006025	Sauga boda bolo o Hoga Galili hi alupanet-an hi na Kapeniyama , inoke Yeisu hi pwawaa to . Yaka hi baek elana hi ba , “ Topankite , hauna sauga u nem labi ya elana ? ”
43006026	Analiya Yeisu i lahe i ba , “ Ya ba tunahot eliyamiu , nige tage ginol yawiyawi bolo ya ginolil ku kite ge kaiwena ku loyaagau , yaa beleid ya pewa ku an ge tinemiu i kiya kaiwena te ku loyaagau .
43006027	Bahi nuku lologasisi aanan toto abwe ni nak kaiwena . Yaa nuku logasisi aanan toto i mimihot ge ana abapwamowasi yawal mihomihotina , aanan o Gamagal Natuna ni pewa eliyamiu . He Tamana Yehoba iyaka i pamasal te iya i awa wawaisi-an . ”
43006028	Yaka boda hi baek Yeisu elana hi ba , “ Ga naha ginol ola ge tuwalali bolo Yehoba nuwana naha ginolil ? ”
43006029	Analiya i lahe i ba , “ Tuwalali toto Yehoba nuwana i ola hiwe : toto iya i patuna nuku abulilek-an . ”
43006030	Yaka gamagalau hi baek Yeisu elana hi ba , “ Ginol yawiyawi etega u ginol , inoke naha kite ge naha abulilek-agiwa . Tubumeyau valila aanan toto manna hi an uleya , i ola Buki Bwabwalena ana baaba i ba : ‘ Aanan i loem labulabumwa i pek hi an . ’ He hauna gun owa nasi nu ginol ? ”
43006031	
43006032	Yaka Yeisu i baek elal i ba , “ Ya ba tunahot eliyamiu , nige tage Mosese aanan i loem labulabumwa iyaka i pewa , yaa Nam aanan i loem labulabumwa tutunahotina sauga ya i pewa eliyamiu .
43006033	He aanan toto Yehoba i pewa i loem labulabumwa ge yawal hot i pek gamagalau panayawi elal . ”
43006034	Yaka hi ba , “ Tonowak , aanan ya sauga gegewena nu pem naha anan . ”
43006035	Yeisu i baek elal i ba , “ He nau aanan toto yawalimiu ni pewa . Toto ebo ni nem elau nige ni gagalebu , ge toto ebo ni abulilek-agau nige sauga etega ni wawalem al .
43006036	Yaa i ola te ya ba haba eliyamiu : iyaka ku kiteyau , yaa nige ku aabulilek-agau .
43006037	Gamagalau bolo Nam ni pem eliyau , gegewel nihi nem elau , ge sauga nihi nem , nige etegana na papatuna owaowani .
43006038	Kaiwena nau ya loem labulabumwa ge toto i patunau wana nuwatu na ginol , nige nau totou no nuwatu i oola .
43006039	Toto i patunau wana nuwatu te bolo gegewel i pem elau bahi etega na papayaomal , yaa lan mowamowasena elana na palutil yaomal elana .
43006040	Kaiwena Nam wana nuwatu te gamagalau gegewel bolo mataliya i nok Natuna hi kite ge hi abulilek-an , yawaliliya mihomihotina nihi ahe ge lan mowamowasena elana na palutil yaomal elana . ”
43006041	Yudiya Yeisu anana hi hago i ba , “ Nau aanan toto i loem labulabumwa , ” inoke baaba ya kaiwena heliya ya hi loba kaiwena .
43006042	Hi ba , “ Tau ya iya Yeisu , Yosepa natuna . Tamana ge hinana ta atenal ya . He ga i ola ge i ba , ‘ Nau ya loem labulabumwa ’ ? ”
43006043	Yeisu i baek elal i ba , “ Ku bakuhu , bahi loloba gamwamiwa .
43006044	Nige etega bosowaina ni nem elau ebo Nam toto i patunau nige ni nunul pwatanim elau , inoke lan mowamowasena elana na palutem yaomala .
43006045	Palopitau hi leleli hi ba , ‘ Gegewel Yehoba ni pankitel . ’ Inoke bolo Nam wana baaba hi hago ge wali aatena hi aheya elana , he gegewel nihi nem elau .
43006046	Yaa nige tage gamagal etega Nam i kite , yaa toto i neem Yehoba elana , he iya ya te i kite .
43006047	Ya ba tunahot eliyamiu , toto ebo ni abulilek-agau , he iya yawalina hot iyaka i ahe .
43006048	He nau aanan toto yawalimiu ni pewa .
43006049	Tubumiyau aanan toto manna hi an uleya , yaa iyaka hi aliga .
43006050	Yaa aanan toto i loem labulabumwa , gamagal toto ebo ni an nige ni aaliga .
43006051	He nau te aanan yawalina gaganina toto i loem labulabumwa . Ebo gamagal etega aanan ya ni an , inoke yawalina ni mihot sauga gegewena . Aanan ya iya tuwau , toto na talamwan ge gamagalau gegewel panayawiya yawaliliya hot nihi ahe . ”
43006052	Yudiya baaba o hi hago , inoke heliya ya gamwaliyaa hi awabalgig nabi hi ba , “ Tau ya , ga ni ola ge tuwana ni pem ta an ? ”
43006053	Yeisu i baek elal i ba , “ Ya ba tunahot eliyamiu , ebo Gamagal Natuna tuwana nige nuku aan ge saliyana nige nuku iim , nige yawalimiu ni gagan .
43006054	Toto ebo tuwau ni an ge saliyau ni im , iya yawalina mihomihotina i gan , inoke lan mowamowasena elana na palutem yaomala .
43006055	Kaiwena tuwau iya aanan hot ge saliyau iya wewel hot .
43006056	Henala ebo tuwau ni an ge saliyau ni im , iya i minaa elau ge nau ya minaa elana .
43006057	Nam yawalina gaganina i patunau ge iya kaiwena yawaliu i gan . Inoke i ola al to , henala ebo tuwau ni an , he nau kaiweu yawalina ni gan .
43006058	He toto o iya te aanan toto i loem labulabumwa . Tubumiyau aanan toto manna hi an , yaa abwe hi aliga . Yaa henala ebo aanan ya ni an , yawalina ni mihot sauga gegewena . ”
43006059	Yeisu baaba ya i baunana awan Kapeniyama elana , sauga i panpankiti limi tapwalolo gamwanaa .
43006060	Sauga tohago Yeisu wana baaba o hi hago , yaka hi gewi hi ba , “ Panpankiti ya i gasisi hot . Henala nasi ni atena ? ”
43006061	Yeisu i atena te wana tohago hi hawohawol wana baaba o kaiwena , yaka i baek elal i ba , “ Bi ola ge no baaba ya i panuwanuwatu-agimiu ge amnamiu i apanak ?
43006062	Yaa ga i ola ebo binimala nuku kite Gamagal Natuna ni na ni ha wana abamina elana toto valila i miminaa ?
43006063	Yehoba Yayaluwana iya te bosowaina yawal ni pek gamagalau elal , gamagalau totoliya nige bosowailiya . He baaba bolo ya baunanagil eliyamiu iya Yehoba Yayaluwana ge yawal ni pewa .
43006064	Yaa komiu enuna nige ku aabulilek . ” ( He Yeisu iyaka i atena te bolo nige nihi aabulilek-an ge toto abwe ni wasaan Yudiya elal . )
43006065	Yeisu i ba vevehe al i ba , “ Bolo nige ku aabulilek kaiwemiu te ya ba , ‘ Nige etega bosowaina ni nem elau ebo Nam nige aatena ni pepek elana ge ni nem . ’ ”
43006066	Sauga o elana , Yeisu wana tohago hi gewi hi sikal ge nige al hi totoulil .
43006067	Yaka i nel bolo ali toto elulutega eluwa elal i ba , “ Yaa komiu , nuwamiu al nuku egon ? ”
43006068	Saimon Pita Yeisu anana i lahe i ba , “ Babala , henala abwe elana naha noek ? Owa heiya te wam baaba yawal mihomihotina ni pem .
43006069	He iyaka ha atena ge ha abulilek age owa Yehoba wana Gamagal Bwabwalena . ”
43006070	Yeisu i baek elal i ba , “ He nau ami toto elulutega eluwa ya hilemiu , age ? Yaa alomiu etega iya Seitani awana toabina . ”
43006071	Yeisu i baaba Yudasa toto Saimon Isikaliyota natuna bana . He bwagana iya bolo elulutega eluwa avaliya etega , yaa abwe Yeisu ni wasaan .
43007001	Sauga o enaa , yaka abwe Yeisu i nawanawa labi Galili gamwanaa . Nige nuwana ni na ni nawanawa labi Yudiya gamwanaa , kaiwena Yudiya wali tohouwa nuwaliya nihi lopaaliga .
43007002	He Yudiya wali hagali bwabwatana etegana alana Epanapana Hagalena * nu kite Baaba Ona ali Sapu ana Abaloya elana . ana sauga i kelaubwa ,
43007003	inoke Yeisu talinau hi baek elana hi ba , “ Labi ya nu eguluwan nu na Yudiya , inoke wam tohago wam ginol yawiyawi ona nihi kite .
43007004	Ebo gamagal etega nuwana wasana ni bwata ge boda nihi atena , he wana ginol ona nige ni giginol susumian . Ginol yawiyawi ona u awaawaginol , he nu ginola mwananala inoke gamagalau gegewel panayawiya nihi kite . ”
43007005	Bwagana iya talinau , he nige hi aabulilek eliyana .
43007006	Yaka Yeisu i baek talinau elal i ba , “ No sauga hot nigeya ga i pwapwawa , yaa komiu wami sauga ya te sauga gegewena .
43007007	Nige bosowaina gamagalau panayawi nihi pihigelgel-agimiu , yaa nau hi pihigelgel-agau , kaiwena ya baek elal ya ba , ‘ Wami pagan i nak . ’
43007008	Komiu ku nok ku na Yelusalema hagaliya . Nau nigeya ga na nonok , kaiwena no sauga nigeya ga i vivin . ”
43007009	Yeisu baaba o i baunan talinau elal , yaka nige i nonok , i minaa ya Galili .
43007010	Yeisu talinau hi egon hi na hagaliya , eliyaa yaka abwe iya i nok al , yaa nige i nonomasamasal , i nonosusumi ya .
43007011	Hagali gamwanaa Yudiya wali tohouwa Yeisu hi loyaan ge hi nel hi ba , “ Iya ga ? ”
43007012	Boda gamwanaa gamagalau hi loliwaliwan nabi Yeisu kaiwena . Enuna hi ba , “ Iya tau waiwaisana , ” yaka enuna al hi ba , “ Nigeya , iya gamagalau i nul pagegel . ”
43007013	Yaa nige etega i babaa tagil boda bwabwatana gamwanaa , kaiwena Yudiya hi lovakun wali tohouwa elal .
43007014	Hagali iyaka i lilinuwane , yaka Yeisu i na i tuk Limi Bwabwalena ana bakubakuwa ge i panpankiti .
43007015	Yudiya nuwaliya hi ahe wana panpankiti kaiwena , ge hi ba , “ Tau ya nige i vavasili , yaa ga i ola ge wana aatena i bwata ? ”
43007016	Yeisu analiya i lahe i ba , “ No panpankiti ya , nige totou no nuwatu elana i oola , yaa i neem toto i patunau elana .
43007017	Ebo gamagal etega nuwana ni ginol ni ola Yehoba wana nuwatu , inoke abwe ni atena te no panpankiti i neem Yehoba elana , o ebo totou no nuwatu elana .
43007018	Gamagal toto ebo i baaba totona wana nuwatu elana , he nuwana totona ana tobal ni ginol ge wasana ni gan . Yaa toto i tuwalali toto i patuna ana tobal kaiwena , iya tobaaba tunahot ge nige kakawi i gagana elana .
43007019	Mosese Logugui i pewa eliyamiu , age ? Yaa komiu nige etega Logugui o i hehenapu-an . He ga i ola ge nuwamiu nuku lopaaligau ? ”
43007020	Gamagalau Yeisu anana hi lahe hi ba , “ Tabam yayaluwa bibikena i ulutuk elam te u baaba ei ! Henala ge nuwana ni lopaaligawa ? ”
43007021	Yeisu analiya i lahe i ba , “ Ginol yawiyawi etega ya ginol , yaka gegewemiu nuwamiu ku ahe ge ku nuwanuwatu-an .
43007022	Yaa ku nuwatu ga ! Mosese gotomwa yoho paganina ana logugui i pewa eliyamiu , inoke komiu gotomwa yoho paganina ku giginola Sabwata elana . ( He nige tage Mosese i telipuna-an , yaa i neem tubumiyau houhouwel hot elal . )
43007023	He bosowaina wawaya melutauina gotomwa yoho paganina ni ahe Sabwataa ebo ana lan i pwawaa , ge Mosese wana logugui o bahi nuku leleke . † Inoke hauna kaiwena gamagal ya pwamolu hoti Sabwataa ge ku hugaagau ?
43007024	Bahi al nuku hilihiliek bugul ali awa elana , yaa sapu elana te nuku hilihiliya . ”
43007025	Yaka gamagalau Yelusalema enuna hi ba , “ Tau toto tage tohouwa hi lolopaaliga heiya e ?
43007026	Ku kite ! I baaba boda gamwanaa ge tohouwa nige hi babaa lahiek eliyana . Bi ola ge hi atena tau ya iya Mesaiya ?
43007027	Yaa sauga ebo Mesaiya ni nem , nige gamagal etega wana abanem ni aatena . He kila tau toto ya wana abanem ta atena ya . ”
43007028	Yeisu iyoho ya i panpankiti boda elal Limi Bwabwalena gamwanaa , i baaba anana i bwaya i ba , “ He tage ku atenau ge no abanem al ku atena ? Nau nige totou ya nenem . Nam i patunau te ya nem ge iya wana pagan i sapu . Iya nige ku aatena ,
43007029	yaa nau ya atena , kaiwena iya i patunau ge ya neem elana . ”
43007030	Yeisu i ba ola o , inoke Yudiya nuwaliya nihi lib ge nihi yowan . Yaa nige bosowaina gamagal etega nimana ni teli tuwanaa , kaiwena wana sauga nigeya ga i vivin .
43007031	Yaa boda gamwanaa gamagalau hi gewi hi abulilek Yeisu elana , yaka hi ba , “ Sauga ebo Mesaiya ni nem , nasi tab tau ya wana ginol yawiyawi ni lake ? He nigeya , iya te Mesaiya . ”
43007032	Palisi hi hago boda hi lololiwaliwan kekei Yeisu kaiwena i ola to . Yaka avaliyau ge topowon bwabwatal , Limi Bwabwalena ana pulisimanau hi patunal hi nok tage Yeisu nihi lib ge nihi yowan .
43007033	Yaka Yeisu i ba , “ No minamina alowau komiu sauga kakaubwaina ya , inoke abwe na eguluwagimiu ge na sikal na na toto i patunau elana .
43007034	Abwe nuku loyaagau , yaa nige nuku pwapwawau , kaiwena nige bosowaina nuku noek labi toto ya nana ya miminaa . ”
43007035	Yudiya wali tohouwa ya awawal hi pebaaba-agil hi ba , “ Tau ya ga i nonoek ge nasi ta loyaan nige ta pwapwawa ? Age i nana Gilik awanina ona bolo Yudiya hi miminaa , inoke ni panpankiti Gilik elal ?
43007036	Iya i ba , ‘ Abwe nuku loyaagau , yaa nige nuku pwapwawau . ’ Ge i ba , ‘ Nige bosowaina nuku noek labi toto ya nana ya miminaa . ’ He wana baaba o ana sapu ga i ola ? ”
43007037	Hagali ana lan mowamowasena , iya lan bwabwatana hot , Yeisu i lut ge i baaba anana i bwata i ba , “ Toto ebo ni walem , ni nem elau ge ni im .
43007038	He toto ebo ni abulilek-agau , inoke wewel yawalina gaganina ni sani tagilem atenaa , i ola Buki Bwabwalena ana baaba . ”
43007039	Yeisu i baaba Yayaluwa Bwabwalena bana , iya gamagalau bolo hi abulilek Yeisu elana abwe nihi ahe . Sauga o elana Yayaluwa Bwabwalena nigeya ga hi aahe , kaiwena nigeya ga Yehoba Yeisu i papalutem yaomala ge i papawasawasa .
43007040	Boda bwabwatana gamwanaa , gamagalau enuna Yeisu wana baaba o hi hago , yaka hi ba , “ Tunahot tau ya iya palopita toto Yehoba i bateli abwe ni nem . ”
43007041	Enuna al hi ba , “ Iya Mesaiya . ” Yaa enuna hi ba , “ Mesaiya nige ni neneem Galili !
43007042	Buki Bwabwalena i ba Mesaiya abwe ni neem Deibid tubutubunina elana , ge nihi aba Bedeliyema awan toto valila Deibid i miminaa . ”
43007043	Inoke Yeisu kaiwena gamagalau boda hi paeluwa , tomaha wali nuwatu .
43007044	Enuna nuwaliya nihi lib ge nihi yowan , yaa nige gamagal etega nimana i teteli Yeisu tuwanaa .
43007045	Inoke pulisimanau bolo Limi Bwabwalena ana tomatahikan hi sikal hi na topowon bwabwatal avaliyau Palisi elal , yaka abwe heliya hi ba , “ Hauna kaiwena nige ku aahe ge ku pwapwatanim ? ”
43007046	Yaka analiya hi lahe hi ba , “ Nige sauga etega gamagal etega wana baaba i oola tau ya wana baaba ! ”
43007047	Yaka Palisi hi baek pulisimanau elal hi ba , “ Bi ola ge komiu al nuwamiu i liwan ahe ?
43007048	Ama Palisi alomeyau ge tologugui , tab etega ha abulilek elana ?
43007049	Nigeya hot ! He boda ya te hi abulilek elana , heliya Mosese wana Logugui nige hi aatena , heliya Yehoba iyaka i ba haba abwe ni lahel ! ”
43007050	Nikodimas , iya Palisi wali boda etega ge iya valila i nok ga i na Yeisu elana , i baek alonau elal i ba ,
43007051	“ Wala logugui i ba bahi gamagal etega ana logugui ta giginol ebo nigeya ga wana baaba ta hahago kot elana ge ta pwapwawa hauna gun i ginol panak . ”
43007052	Anana hi lahe hi ba , “ He ga i ola , age owa al u neem Galili ? U na ga Buki Bwabwalena u ahe u vasili bubun , inoke abwe nu atena te nige palopita etega ni neneem Galili . ”
43008001	Yaka gamagalau gegewel hi egonan hi na tomaha ona wali limiya , yaa Yeisu i egon i na i ha Oya Olibe .
43008002	Lan i gan al mweluluga kekeisi , Yeisu i sikal i na Limi Bwabwalena ana bakubakuwa , yaka boda hi nowanik hi na hi mipainan , ge iya i misiyo i panpankiti elal .
43008003	Logugui ana topankite avaliyau ge Palisi yova etega hi ahe hi en tukan , yova o hi pwawaa ganawal paganina elana . Inoke hi patalmilil boda mataliyaa ,
43008004	yaka hi baek Yeisu elana hi ba , “ Topankite , yova ya hi pwawa hoti alona tau etega hi gaganawal .
43008005	He Logugui elana Mosese i ba yova gaganawalina ololana ya naha loipati ana siga ni aliga . Yaa owa wam nuwatu ga i ola ? ”
43008006	Nel ya hi neli tage Yeisu nihi paona ge ana woliwoli nihi ginol . Yaa Yeisu i lokululu ge nimana gigina elana i leleli bilibiliya .
43008007	Heliya iyoho ya hi mimi nelnel elana , yaka i mat ge i ba , “ Ebo komiu etega nige gegi etega i giginol , inoke iya pat ni alihouwan yova ya elana . ”
43008008	Yaka i lokululu al ge i leleli bilibiliya .
43008009	Wana baaba o hi hago , yaka maisena ge maisena i egoegon , i telipunaa tonowakau elal i na ana siga gegewel hi egonan haba . Yeisu maisena ya hi eguluwai alona ge yova iyoho ya i taltalmilil .
43008010	Yeisu i mat ge i baek yova elana i ba , “ Vaini , gamagalau gegewel heliya ga ? Nige etega i mimina ge ni pakotiwa ? ”
43008011	Yova Yeisu anana i lahe i ba , “ Tonowak , nige etega . ” Yaka Yeisu i ba , “ Nau al ge nige na papakotiwa . He u egon ge bahi al nu gegegi . ” *
43008012	Yeisu i baek al gamagalau elal i ba , “ Nau panayawi ana mwananal . Toto ebo ni toulilau nige al ni nanawaa gogouwa , iya yawal ana mwananal ni ahe . ”
43008013	Yaka Palisi hi baek elana hi ba , “ Totom wasam te u wasawasa-an ei , he nige bosowaina ana abulilek-an ni gan . ”
43008014	Yeisu Palisi analiya i lahe i ba , “ Bwagana ebo totou wasau na wasawasa-an , he bosowaina ya te ana abulilek-an ni gan , kaiwena ya atena te ga ya noem ge ga ya nonoek . Yaa komiu nige ku aatena te ga ya noem o ebo ga ya nonoek .
43008015	Komiu wami kite ge wami hilihili i ola gamagalau wali hilihili . Yaa nau nige gamagal etega ya hihile ge ana lahi ya babaunan .
43008016	Yaa binimala ebo gamagal etega na hile ge ana logugui na baunan , he no logugui i sapu ge i tunahot , kaiwena nige totou logugui o ya giginol , yaa Nam toto i patunau iya alou .
43008017	Komiu wami logugui elana hi leli lowan te ebo gamagalau eluwa wali wasa ni olaolaek , he i tunahot .
43008018	Nau totou wasau ya wasawasa-an , i ola al Nam toto i patunau , iya al wasau i wasawasa-an . ”
43008019	Yaka Yudiya Yeisu hi neli hi ba , “ He tamwam ga ? ” Analiya i lahe i ba , “ Nau nige ku aatenau , ge Nam al nige ku aatena . Ebo binimala nuku atenau , inoke Nam al nuku atena . ”
43008020	Yeisu baaba bolo ya i baunanagil , sauga iya iyoho i panpankiti Limi Bwabwalena gamwanaa , labi toto mulolu ana abateliteliya . Yaa nige gamagal etega Yeisu i lilib ge ni yowan , kaiwena wana sauga nigeya ga i vivin .
43008021	Yeisu i baek al Yudiya elal i ba , “ Ya eegon , ge abwe nuku loyaagau , yaa nige nuku kikiteyau . He wami gegi elana nuku yaomal . Komiu nige bosowaimiu nuku nem labi toto ya nonoek . ”
43008022	Yaka Yudiya wali tohouwa hi ba , “ Iya i ba , ‘ Komiu nige bosowaimiu nuku nem labi toto ya nonoek . ’ Baaba o ana sapu ga i ola ? Age totona yawalina ni pwamowasi ? ”
43008023	Inoke Yeisu i ba vevehe al i ba , “ Komiu ku neem paiya , nau ya neem natiya . Komiu panayawi toto ya gamagaliliyau , nau nige panayawi toto ya gamagalina i oola .
43008024	Heiya ge kaiwena ya ba , ‘ Wami gegi elana nuku yaomal . ’ He ebo nige nuku aabulilek te ‘ Nau heiya te nau , ’ † inoke wami gegi elana nuku yaomal . ”
43008025	Yaka Yudiya hi neli hi ba , “ Yaa henala owa ? ” Analiya Yeisu i lahe i ba , “ He nau heiya te toto valila ya wasaan eliyamiu .
43008026	Bugul i gewi bosowaiu na baunan kaiwemiu ge ami lahi na ginol . Yaa nige ya babaunan , kaiwena toto i patunau iya tobaaba tunahot ge bugul bolo ya hagowa elana ya te na baunan komiu panayawi gamagaliliyau eliyamiu . ”
43008027	He Yudiya nige hi aatena te Yeisu age i baaba Tamana kaiwena .
43008028	Inoke Yeisu i ba , “ Sauga Gamagal Natuna nuku teli heyan kolos elana , inoke abwe nuku atena te ‘ Nau heiya te nau , ’ ge nuku atena nige bugul etega totou ya giginol , yaa toto Nam i pankiteyau te ya baubaunan .
43008029	He toto i patunau iya alou . Iya nige i mimiluwagau , kaiwena sauga gegewena bugul bolo i yaliyaya-an te ya giginolil . ”
43008030	Gamagalau bolo Yeisu wana papaatena o hi hago , hi gewi hi abulilek-an .
43008031	Yaka Yeisu i baek bolo wana panpankiti hi abulilek-an elal i ba , “ Ebo nuku minaa no panpankiti elana , he komiu no tohago hot .
43008032	Inoke baaba tunahot nuku atena ge baaba tunahot o ni sokalimiu . ”
43008033	Yaka Yeisu anana hi lahe hi ba , “ Ama Abalahama tubutubunau , nige sauga etega ha tutuwalali loloyowan gamagal etega elana . Ga i ola ge u ba , ‘ Baaba tunahot ni sokalimiu ’ ? ”
43008034	Yeisu i baek elal i ba , “ Ya ba tunahot eliyamiu , gamagalau gegewel bolo gegi hi awaawaginol , heliya gegi wana totuwalali loloyowanil .
43008035	Totuwalali loloyowanina nige i mimihot wana babala alonau ge natunau ali boda elana , yaa babala natuna i mihot boda o elana .
43008036	He ebo Yehoba Natuna ni sokalimiu , yaka abwe nuku tabwa gamagalau sokasokalil hot .
43008037	Ya atena te komiu Abalahama tubutubunau . Yaa nuwamiu hot nuku lopaaligau , kaiwena no panpankiti ku towani .
43008038	Bugul bolo ya kiteya Nam elana ya wasawasa-an , yaa komiu pagan bolo ku aheya tamamiu elana te ku giginol . ”
43008039	Inoke anana hi lahe hi ba , “ Ama tamama te Abalahama . ” Yaka abwe Yeisu i ba , “ Ebo binimala Abalahama natunau komiu , he wami ginol ni ola iya wana ginol .
43008040	Baaba tunahot bolo ya hagoem Yehoba elana heiya te ya baunan eliyamiu , yaa komiu nuwamiu hot nuku lopaaligau . Abalahama ginol ololana o nige i giginol .
43008041	He komiu wami ginol i ola ya te tamamiu wana ginol . ” Yaka anana hi lahe hi ba , “ Ama nige ganawal natunau i oola . Ama tamama iyai te Yehoba maisena . ”
43008042	Inoke Yeisu i baek al elal i ba , “ Ebo binimala Yehoba iya tamamiu , he nasi nuku nunuwana-agau , kaiwena nau ya miminaa elana te ya nem e . He nau nige totou ya nenem , iya i patunau .
43008043	Ga i ola ge no baaba nige nuwamiu i sasapuan ? Kaiwena nige nuwamiu i oola no baaba nuku hago .
43008044	Komiu tamamiu Seitani , iya natunau komiu , ge sauga gegewena nuwamiu tamamiu wana nuwatu nuku toulil . I neem abatelipuna elana iya totaulol , ge nige sauga etega i oolak baaba tunahot elana , kaiwena nige baaba tunahot i gagana elana . Sauga ebo i kakawi , he iya wana pagan hot to , kaiwena iya tokakawi ge kakawi paganina gegewel tamaliya .
43008045	Yaa kaiwena nau baaba tunahot ya baubaunan , komiu nige ku aabulilek-agau .
43008046	Age ku nuwatu tage nau togegi ? Ebo ku nuwatu ola o , he no gegi etega nuku pamasal ge nuku patunahot . Yaa ebo ya baaba tunahot , he ga i ola ge nige ku aabulilek-agau ?
43008047	Yehoba natunau Yehoba wana baaba hi hago . Komiu nige Yehoba wana baaba ku hahago , kaiwena komiu nige Yehoba natunau i oola . ”
43008048	Yudiya Yeisu anana hi lahe hi ba , “ Tabam ha ba bubun ya te ha ba owa Sameliya gamagalina ge yayaluwa bibikena i ulutuk elam ! ”
43008049	Yaka analiya i lahe i ba , “ Nige yayaluwa bibikena i uulutuk elau . Nau Nam ya awatauwan , yaa komiu nige ku aawatauwagau .
43008050	Nau nige ya lologasisi tage alau na teli heyan , yaa etegana iyoho nuwana alau ni teli heyan , ge iya Tohilihili sasapona hot .
43008051	Ya ba tunahot eliyamiu , toto ebo no baaba ni henapuan nige bosowaina ni yaomal . ”
43008052	Inoke Yudiya hi baek elana hi ba , “ Yaka abwe ha atena tunahot age yayaluwa bibikena i ulutuk elam ! Abalahama ge palopitau iyaka hi yaomal , inoke owa u ba , ‘ Toto ebo no baaba ni henapuan nige bosowaina ni yaomal . ’
43008053	Tubuma Abalahama iyaka i yaomal ! Age owa u bwata lake ? Ge palopitau al iyaka hi yaomal ! He u nuwatu tage henala owa ? ”
43008054	Yeisu analiya i lahe i ba , “ Ebo binimala totou alau na teli heyan , he nasi alau ni tabwa bugul bwagabwaga ya . Yaa Nam toto komiu ku ba , ‘ Iya wama Yabowaine , ’ iya alau i teliteli heyan .
43008055	He iya nige ku aatena , yaa nau ya atena . Binimala ebo na ba , ‘ Iya nige ya aatena , ’ he nau na tabwa tokakawi ni ola komiu . Yaa iya ya atena ge wana baaba ya henapuan .
43008056	Valila tubumiu Abalahama i nuwatu tage no sauga masal panayawi ni kite , inoke i yaliyaya ; ge sauga i kite , yaka nuwana i waisi . ”
43008057	Yaka Yudiya hi baek elana hi ba , “ Wam baliman nigeya ga pipti i pwapwawa , inoke ga i ola ge u ba tage Abalahama u kite ? ”
43008058	Analiya i lahe i ba , “ Ya ba tunahot eliyamiu , mulaa abwe Abalahama i masal , nau iyoho ya gangan . ” ‡
43008059	Yeisu wana baaba o kaiwena , yaka pat hi ahe tage nihi loipati , yaa i bunsumi , ge abwe Limi Bwabwalena ana bakubaku i eguluwai .
43009001	Sauga Yeisu i nawanawa kamwasaa , inoke tomatakai etega i kite , matana i kaiek hinana tinenaa .
43009002	Wana tohago hi neli hi ba , “ Topankite , henala wana gegi kaiwena ge tau o hi ab matana i kai ? Iya totona wana gegi o ebo hinana ge tamana wali gegi kaiwena ? ”
43009003	Yeisu i ba , “ Nige iya wana gegi o ebo hinana ge tamana wali gegi kaiwena i oola ge matana i kakai . Matana i kai inoke bosowaina Yehoba wana gasisi ni tuwalaliya elana ge gamagalau nihi kite .
43009004	Sauga ya lan iyoho ya i gangan , inoke toto i patunau wana tuwalali ta ginol ga . Bulin i nenem ge nige bosowaina gamagal etega ni tuwalali .
43009005	Sauga nau iyahe panayawiya , he nau panayawi ana mwananal . ”
43009006	Yeisu baaba o i baunan enaa , yaka i kuluvi bilibiliya , kuluvena elana pweyapweya i ginol , ge i ahe i abut tomatakai matanaa .
43009007	Inoke i baek elana i ba , “ U nok u na wewel opop Sailowama elana matam u ul . ” ( Alan Sailowama ana sapu te Papatuna . ) Yaka tau o i nok i na matana i ul , ge i sikal matana i waisi ge bugul i kitel .
43009008	Tau o wana heliyamwau ge gamagalau bolo valila hi kite i loloawanun hi ba , “ Tau toto valila i mimisiyo ge i loloawanun heiya eba e ? ”
43009009	Inoke enuna hi ba , “ Ibwe , tauina te . ” Yaa enuna hi ba , “ Nige i oola . Ana awa ya te i ola iya . ” Yaa tau o totona i ba , “ He nau te . ”
43009010	Yaka hi neli hi ba , “ He ga i ola ge matam u panana ? ”
43009011	Analiya i lahe i ba , “ Tau toto alana hi ba Yeisu , pweyapweya i ginol , i ahe i abut matawa , yaka i ba , ‘ U nok u na Sailowama matam nu ul . ’ Inoke ya na matau ya ul , yaka matau i waisi ge bugul ya kitel . ”
43009012	Inoke hi neli hi ba , “ Tauina iya ga ? ” Analiya i lahe i ba , “ Nige ya aatena . ”
43009013	Inoke gamagalau tau toto valila matana i kai hi ahe ge hi pwatanik Palisi elal .
43009014	He lan Sabwata elana te Yeisu pweyapweya i ginol ge i abut tomatakai matanaa inoke matana i panana .
43009015	Inoke Palisi al hi nel hi ba , “ Ga i ola ge matam i waisi ? ” Analiya i lahe i ba , “ Yeisu pweyapweya i abut matawa , ya na matau ya ul , inoke sauga o matau i waisi ge bugul ya kitel . ”
43009016	Yaka Palisi enuna hi ba , “ Tau ya nige i neneem Yehoba elana , kaiwena Sabwata ana logugui nige i hehenapu-an . ” Enuna al hi ba , “ Ginol yawiyawi ololana o togegi bosowaina ya ni ginol ? ” Yaka ali boda hi paeluwa ge hi awabalgig .
43009017	Inoke abwe Palisi hi nel al tau toto valila matana i kai elana hi ba , “ Yaa owa wam nuwatu ga i ola tau o kaiwena ? Kaiwena owa te matam i abubun . ” Tau o analiya i lahe i ba , “ Iya palopita etega . ”
43009018	Yaa Yudiya wali tohouwa nige hi aabulilek te tau o valila matana i kai ge iyaka i waisi . Inoke tamana ge hinana ali baaba hi patuna hi nem elal ,
43009019	yaka hi nelil hi ba , “ He natumiu e , toto ku ba tage valila ku ab ge matana i kai ? Ga i ola ge sauga ya matana i waisi ? ”
43009020	Tamana ge hinana hi ba , “ Ha atena te iya natuma , ge ha atena te sauga ha ab matana i kai .
43009021	Yaa nige ha aatena te ga i ola ge matana i waisi , o ebo henala matana i sawal ge i mwapwela . He ku neli ; iya iyaka i bwaya , inoke bosowaina totona wasana ni wasaan . ”
43009022	Tamana ge hinana hi ba ola o kaiwena Yudiya wali tohouwa hi lovakunagil . He heliya logugui iyaka hi ginol te henala ebo Yeisu ni awa Mesaiya-an , nasi nihi lopwali bahi avaliya nihi tatapwalolo al wali boda elana .
43009023	Heiya te kaiwena tamana ge hinana hi ba , “ Iya iyaka i bwaya ; ku neli . ”
43009024	Inoke Palisi tau toto valila matana i kai hi yogaan i tuk paeluwana , ge hi baek elana hi ba , “ Nu papasila Yehoba matanaa ge nu baaba tunahot ! Ama ha atena tau o iya togegi . ”
43009025	Yaka i baek elal i ba , “ Nige ya aatena ebo iya togegi o ebo nigeya . Yaa toto ya atena , heiya te valila matau i kai ge sauga ya iyaka i waisi ! ”
43009026	Inoke hi neli hi ba , “ He hauna gun i ginol elam ? Ga i ginol ola ge matam i mwapwela ? ”
43009027	Analiya i lahe i ba , “ Iyaka ya ba haba eliyamiu , yaa komiu nige ku hahago . Hauna kaiwena nuwamiu na baunan al nuku hago ? Tabam komiu al ge nuwamiu nuku tabwa wana tohago . ”
43009028	Yaka hi ba panapanak-an ge hi baek elana hi ba , “ Owa tau o wana tohago , yaa ama Mosese wana tohago .
43009029	Ama ha atena te Yehoba i baaba Mosese elana ge logugui i pek . Tau ei nige ha aatena te ga i noem ! ”
43009030	Inoke analiya i lahe i ba , “ Nuwau i gewagewa-agimiu ! Kaiwena ku ba , ‘ Nige ha aatena ga i noem , ’ yaa iya te matau i abubun ge i waisi .
43009031	Ta atena te Yehoba nige i lalaegan togegi elal . He i laegan te bolo hi awatauwan ge wana nuwatu hi ginol .
43009032	Abatelipuna elana i nem ana siga sauga e , nige sauga etega wasa ta hahago tage gamagal etega toto hi ab matana i kai , matana nihi abubun ge ni waisi .
43009033	Binimala tau ya nige ni nonoem Yehoba elana , he nige bosowaina bugul ololana ya etega ni ginol . ”
43009034	Yaka hi baek elana hi ba , “ Owa gegi elana u masala ge u bwayaa ! Ga i ola ge tage nu panpankiti eliyama ? ” Inoke hi take tagilan ge i egon .
43009035	Yeisu tau wasana i hago te hi take tagilan , inoke i loyaan , ge sauga i pwawa , yaka i baek elana i ba , “ Tab u abulilek Gamagal Natuna elana ? ”
43009036	Tau o i ba , “ Tonowak , henala Gamagal Natuna ? No wasa u pem inoke na abulilek elana . ”
43009037	Yeisu i ba , “ Iyaka u kite haba ; iya te sauga ya alom ku liwaliwan e . ”
43009038	Inoke tau o i ba , “ Babala , iyaka ya abulilek . ” Inoke i loepwakoku ge i kululu Yeisu elana .
43009039	Yeisu i ba , “ Ya nem panayawiya ge gamagalau wali pagan na teli tagilan mwananala , inoke tomatakai mataliya nihi panana , ge bolo tage mataliya waiwaisana mataliya ni kai . ”
43009040	Palisi enuna bolo hi minaa Yeisu labenaa , wana baaba hi hago , yaka hi nel hi ba , “ He ga i ola ? Age u ba tage ama al matama i kai ? ”
43009041	Yeisu i baek elal i ba , “ Binimala ebo nuku ba , ‘ Ama matama i kai , ’ he Yehoba nige ni lalahemiu ni oola komiu togegi . Yaa komiu ku ba , ‘ Ama matama i waisi , ’ inoke wami gegi iyoho nige i momowasi . ”
43010001	Yeisu i ba , “ Ya ba tunahot eliyamiu , henala ebo nige ni uulutuka sipi ali gana ana nog elana , yaa gana ni mwena likaan ge ni tuk , iya tokaoma ge toaluoyaoya .
43010002	Yaa toto ebo ni ulutuka nog elana , iya sipi ali tomatahikan .
43010003	Nog ana tomatahikan nog ni pwela eliyana , yaka ni tuk ge wana sipi alaliya ni lumenil , inoke wana sipi anana nihi hago ge ni nulil tagilagil tola .
43010004	Sauga iyaka wana sipi i nulil ge hi tagil tola , inoke iya ni nohouwa ge sipi nihi noulil , kaiwena anana ana gun hi atena .
43010005	Sipi nige gamagal getoga nihi nonoulil , yaa nihi lou luwan , kaiwena nige anana ana gun hi aatena . ”
43010006	Yeisu ba gohalibe ya i baunan Palisi eliyalil , yaa ana sapu nige hi aatena .
43010007	Yaka i ba vevehe al i ba , “ Ya ba tunahot eliyamiu , nau sipi ali gana ana nog .
43010008	Bolo hi nem houwa gegewel tokaoma ge toaluoyaoya , inoke analiya sipi nige hi hahago .
43010009	He nau nog ; henala ebo ni ulutuka elau iya ni mwal . Iya ni tuk ge ni tagil , inoke mwawin waiwaisana ni pwawa .
43010010	Tokaoma i nem nige bugul getoga kaiwena i oola , yaa kaoma kaiwena , tagapaaliga kaiwena , ge apapanak kaiwena . Yaa nau ya nem inoke no sipi yawaliliya nihi pwawa , yawal kalakalaopopwina .
43010011	“ Nau sipi ali tomatahikan waiwaisana . Sipi ali tomatahikan waiwaisana yawalina i talamwan ni yaomal sipi kaiweliya .
43010012	Tau toto i tuwalali mola kaiwena , iya nige sipi ali tomatahikan hot i oola , ge nige tonsipi i oola . Sauga ebo ni kite wanuka bekikina i nenem yaka sipi ali en ni pek ge ni lou luwagil , inoke wanuka sipi ni taltalagil ge ni takel pwatpwatagil .
43010013	Tau o sipi i lou luwagil , kaiwena i tuwalali mola kaiwena , he nige i nuwanuwatu sipi kaiweliya .
43010014	“ Nau sipi ali tomatahikan waiwaisana . No sipi ya atenal ge heliya hi atenau ,
43010015	i ola te Nam i atenau ge nau Nam ya atena . Ge yawaliu ya talamwan na yaomal sipi kaiweliya .
43010016	No sipi enuna al hi gan , heliya nige gana ya sipiliyau i oola . Heliya al na ahel ge nihi nem . Anau nihi hago , inoke sipi ali yawi ni maisena ge ali tomatahikan ni maisena .
43010017	Nam i nunuwana-agau , kaiwena yawaliu ya talamwan na yaomal — inoke abwe al na ahe pasikal .
43010018	Nige gamagal etega bosowaina yawaliu ni pwamowasi , yaa totou te ya talamwan . No gasisi i gan yawaliu na talamwan na yaomal , ge no gasisi i gan na ahe pasikal . O logugui ya aheya Nam elana i ola to . ”
43010019	Yeisu wana baaba o kaiwena inoke Yudiya boda hi paeluwa al .
43010020	Hi gewi hi ba , “ Yayaluwa bibikena i ulutuk elana ge i kokona tei . Ga i ola ge wana baaba ku lalaegan-an ? ”
43010021	Yaa enuna hi ba , “ Wana baaba nige i oola tau toto yayaluwa bibikena i ulutuk elana . He yayaluwa bibikena bosowaina ya tomatakai mataliya ni abubun ge ni waisi ? Nige bosowaina ! ”
43010022	Saugena o tultul ana sauga , ge Yudiya wali tapwalolo hagalena etega i gan Yelusalema , hagali o wali Limi Bwabwalena ana pwabwabwalena nuwahikanina .
43010023	He Yeisu iyoho i nawanawa abanawanawa etega Limi Bwabwalena ana gana gamwanaa alana hi ba “ Solomon wana Epanapana . ”
43010024	Yaka Yudiya hi na Yeisu hi mipainan ge hi baek elana hi ba , “ Hauna sauga ge abwe nuwama nu ba pasapu ? He nu ba bubun naha hago ebo owa Mesaiya o ebo nigeya ? ”
43010025	Yeisu analiya i lahe i ba , “ Iyaka ya ba haba eliyamiu , yaa komiu nige ku aabulilek-an . Ginol yawiyawi bolo Nam alana elana ya ginolil heliya hi pamasalau ,
43010026	yaa nige ku aabulilek kaiwena komiu nige no sipi i oola .
43010027	No sipi anau hi hago ge ya atenal , inoke heliya hi toulilau .
43010028	Yawal mihomihotina ya pek elal ge nige nihi yayaomal . He nige gamagal etega bosowaina ni kaluoel nimwau elana .
43010029	Heliya Nam i pem elau , ge iya bugul gegewel i bwata lakel . Inoke nige gamagal etega bosowaina ni kaluoel Nam nimanaa .
43010030	Nau alou ge Nam ha maisena ya . ”
43010031	Baaba o kaiwena , inoke Yudiya pat hi pebugul al tage Yeisu nihi loipati .
43010032	Yaa Yeisu i baek elal i ba , “ Ginol waiwaisal hi gewi Nam i pem iyaka ya ginolil ge ku kitel . He hauna toto kaiwena ge nuwamiu nuku loipatagau ? ”
43010033	Yaka anana hi lahe hi ba , “ Nige wam ginol waiwaisal etegana kaiwena i oola ge tage naha loipatagiwa , yaa kaiwena u ba bwagabwaga ge Yehoba u hewa likaan . He owa gamagal ya , inoke u ba tage owa Yabowaine ! ”
43010034	Yeisu analiya i lahe i ba , “ Wami Buki Bwabwalena ana leleli etega Yehoba anana i pamasal i ola hiwe : Nau ya ba , ‘ Komiu yabowaineyau . ’
43010035	Yehoba baaba ya i baunan gamagalau elal ge i ba tage heliya yabowaineyau , ge Buki Bwabwalena ana baaba i tunahot sauga gegewena .
43010036	Inoke sauga nau ya ba , ‘ Nau Yabowaine Natuna , ’ he ga i ola ge ku ba tage ya ba bwagabwaga ge Yehoba ya hewa likaan ? He nau Nam i hileyau ge i patunau ya nem panayawi .
43010037	“ Binimala ebo nige Nam wana tuwalali ya giginol , inoke bahi no baaba nuku aabulilek-an .
43010038	Yaa wana tuwalali ya awaawaginol , inoke ebo nige no baaba ku aabulilek-an , he no tuwalali o nuku abulilek-an . Inoke nuwamiu ni sapu ge nuku atena te Nam i minaa elau ge nau ya minaa Nam elana . ”
43010039	Yaka nuwaliya al Yeisu nihi lib ge nihi yowan , yaa hi pihapul ge i noluwagil .
43010040	Inoke Yeisu i sikal wewel Yolidani i kalapanet-an , ge i na i miminaa labi toto valila Diyon gamagalau i pababitaisoliya .
43010041	Gamagalau hi gewi hi nok elana , ge heliya ya hi baaba hi ola , “ Diyon Tobabitaiso nige ginol yawiyawi etega i giginol , yaa baaba gegewena bolo i baunanagil tau ya kaiwena hi tunahot . ”
43010042	Inoke labi o elana gamagalau hi gewi hi abulilek Yeisu elana .
43011001	Tau etega alana Lasalo i kasiyebwa , iya alonau nunau Meli ge Mata wali panuwa Bedani .
43011002	( Meli toto ya iya te enonu bwalena waiwaisana i holek Babala aenaa , ge kokowana pupunona elana i pwamwagamwaga . He iya nuna Lasalo te i kasiyebwa . )
43011003	Inoke yowau labui ya baaba hi patuna Yeisu elana hi ba , “ Babala , wam heliyam toto u nunuwana-an i kasiyebwa nabi . ”
43011004	Sauga Lasalo wana kasiyebwa wasana Yeisu i hago , inoke i ba , “ Kasiyebwa toto ya nige ana nuwatu i oola tage gamagal ni payaomal , yaa Yehoba wana gasisi ni masal ge gamagalau alana nihi teli heyan . I ola al ginol o eliyana Yehoba Natuna alana nihi teli heyan . ”
43011005	Mata alona ge talina avaliya ge nuliya Lasalo Yeisu i nunuwana-agil .
43011006	Yaa sauga Lasalo wana kasiyebwa wasana i hago , yaka lan eluwa i minaa ga awan toto i miminaa .
43011007	Inoke abwe i baek wana tohago elal i ba , “ Ta sikal ta na Yudiya . ”
43011008	Yaka anana hi lahe hi ba , “ Topankite , abwe ya te Yudiya tage hi loloipat-agiwa , yaka nuwam nu sikal al labi o elana ? ”
43011009	Yeisu tohago analiya i lahe i ba , “ Lan gamwanaa kilok matana auwa ali gewi tuwel mulaa abwe sabwelu ni lobek , age ? He ebo gamagal ni nawanawa lan gamwanaa , aena nige ni tutupaan ge ni sosogu , kaiwena panayawi ana mwananal elana matana i mwananal .
43011010	Yaa ebo i nanawaa bulin gamwanaa , he aena ni tupaan ge ni sogu , kaiwena nige wana mwananal . ”
43011011	I ba ola o , yaka abwe i ba vevehe al i ba , “ Wala heliyam Lasalo i kenu mati ; na nok ge abwe na palut . ”
43011012	Tohago hi baek elana hi ba , “ Babala , ebo i kenu mati , he abwe amnana ni waisi . ”
43011013	Yeisu i baaba Lasalo wana yaomal bana , yaa wana tohago hi nuwatu tage i kenu ya .
43011014	Yaka abwe baaba enona hot i baunan elal i ba , “ Lasalo iyaka i aliga .
43011015	Yaa komiu ami labe kaiwena , inoke ya yaliyaya te nau nige ya miminek o , kaiwena toto ya abwe ni paabulilek-agimiu . He ta egon ta na ta kite . ”
43011016	Yaka Tomas , iya alana etega al Didimas , i baek wana pan tohago elal i ba , “ Ehei , kila al ge ta nok , inoke avala ta yaomal toyawa . ”
43011017	Sauga Yeisu i vin Bedani , inoke wana wasa hi pek te Lasalo hi teli salaiya lan esopali iyaka i mowasi .
43011018	Awan Bedani ge Yelusalema ali bwaga ana yapu tabam i ola ya te kilomita eton ,
43011019	inoke Yudiya hi gewi hi nok hi na Mata alona ge talina Meli elal nuwaliya nihi pwawaisi nuliya wana yaomal kaiwena .
43011020	Sauga Mata wasa i hago Yeisu iyoho i nenem , inoke i tagil limiya i nok ni na ni pwawa kamwasaa , yaa Meli i miminaa limiya .
43011021	Mata i na i vin Yeisu elana , yaka i ba , “ Babala , binimala owa iyahe aloma , he nu nige ni yayaomal .
43011022	Yaa bwagana o , ya atena hauna gun ebo nu awanuni Yehoba elana , sauga ya ni pewa . ”
43011023	Yeisu i baek elana i ba , “ Num abwe ni lut al . ”
43011024	Mata i ba , “ Ya atena te abwe ni lut al lan mowamowasena elana , sauga toto gamagalau gegewel nihi lut al . ”
43011025	Yeisu i baek elana i ba , “ Nau lut al ge yawal . Toto ebo ni abulilek-agau , bwagana ebo ni yaomal , yawalina ni gan ;
43011026	ge toto yawalina gaganina , ebo ni abulilek-agau , nige ni yayaomal . Tab no baaba o u abulilek-an ? ”
43011027	Mata i ba , “ Ibwe Babala , ya abulilek te owa Mesaiya , Yehoba Natuna , toto tage abwe i nenem panayawi . ”
43011028	Sauga i baaba Yeisu elana enaa , yaka i sikal i na i walgumu talina Meli elana i ba , “ Topankite iyahe i vin , ge i neliwa . ”
43011029	Sauga Meli baaba o i hago , yaka etimwawa i lut i tagil ge i nok ni na Yeisu ni kite .
43011030	( He Yeisu nigeya ga i tutuk panuwaa , iyoho ya i minamina labi toto Mata i pwapwawaa . )
43011031	Yudiya bolo avaliya Meli hi miminaa limi gamwanaa ge nuwana hi pwawapwawaisi , hi kite Meli etimwawa i lut ge i na i tagil , inoke hi nuwatu tage i nana salaiya ge ni lonuwanak . Yaka hi lutan hi toulil .
43011032	Meli i na i vin labi toto Yeisu i miminaa , inoke sauga i kite , yaka i na i loepwakoku Yeisu aenaa ge i ba , “ Babala , binimala owa iyahe aloma , he nu nige ni yayaomal . ”
43011033	Yeisu i kite Meli i kahin , ge i ola al Yudiya bolo alonau hi nem hi lokahin , inoke atena i lomwan ge nuwana i nak nabi .
43011034	Inoke i nel i ba , “ Tuwana ga ku teliya ? ” Anana hi lahe hi ba , “ Babala , u nem ga , ta na u kite . ”
43011035	Yaka Yeisu i kahin .
43011036	Inoke Yudiya hi ba , “ Ku kite , i nunuwana-an nabiyan ! ”
43011037	Yaa enuna hi ba , “ He valila tomatakai i sawal yaka matana i panana , inoke ga i ola ge nige Lasalo i lalabe ge bahi ni aaliga ? ”
43011038	Yeisu atena i lomwan nabi al ge i nok i na salaiya . He salai o hi ken tukan labilabiya ge pat bwabwatana etega hi ahe awana hi paankausiya .
43011039	Yaka Yeisu i ba , “ Pat ku pakul egonan . ” Yaa Mata , iya Lasalo nuna , i ba , “ Babala , iyaka lan esopalena te i kenukenu salaiya . He iyaka bwalena ni gan ! ”
43011040	Yeisu i baek elana i ba , “ Tab ya baewa elam ya ba , ‘ Ebo nu abulilek-agau inoke Yehoba wana gasisi nu kite ’ ? ”
43011041	Yaka pat toto eteli kaus hi pakul egonan . Yeisu matana i ha labulabumwa inoke i ba , “ Ateu owa Nam , kaiwena no awanun iyaka u hago .
43011042	Ya atena sauga gegewena no awanun u hago , yaa ya ba ola o gamagalau bolo hi taltalmilil ya kaiweliya , inoke nihi abulilek te owa u patunau . ”
43011043	Sauga Yeisu i baaba haba , yaka i yoga anana i bwata i ba , “ Lasalo , u tagilim ! ”
43011044	Yaka i lut i tagil . He valila tuwana ana os kama yayapona hi ahe aena ge nimana hi avan , ge kaliko etega hi ahe maninina hi os . Inoke Yeisu i baek gamagalau elal i ba , “ Ku na tuwana ana os ku leke yoho , inoke ku teli ge ni nawanawa . ”
43011045	Yudiya bolo hi na Meli elana ge Yeisu wana ginol hi kite , hi gewi hi abulilek elana .
43011046	Yaa enuna hi na Palisi elal ge Yeisu wana ginol hi wasaan .
43011047	Inoke topowon bwabwatal avaliyau ge Palisi , Yudiya wali tologugui wali nogogo etega hi yogaan , ge hi ba , “ Ga ta ginol ola tau ya kaiwena ? He ginol yawiyawi hi gewi i awaawaginol !
43011048	Ebo nige bugul etega ta giginol elana ge ginol ololana o ni awaawaginol ya , he nasi gamagalau gegewel nihi abulilek elana . Yaka Loma nihi nem wala Limi Bwabwalena nihi ahe , ge avalau wala gamagalau nihi apapanak-agila . ”
43011049	Tologugui o avaliya etega alana Kaiyapa , iya baliman o topowon bwabwatal wali tohouwa , i ba masal i ba , “ Gewagewa komiu !
43011050	Age nige ku aatena kamwasa etega toto eliyana ge bosowaina ni labemiu ? I waisi te gamagal maisena ni yaomal gamagalau kaiweliya , ge bahi kila Yudiya gegewela nak ta pwapwawa . ”
43011051	He Kaiyapa nige totona wana nuwatu i oola ge baaba o i baunan . Yaa baliman o iya topowon bwabwatal wali tohouwa , inoke i palopisai te Yeisu abwe ni yaomal boda Yudiya gegewel kaiweliya .
43011052	Ge Yeisu i yaomal nige Yudiya ya kaiweliya i oola , yaa Yehoba natunau gegewel kaiweliya , bolo hi minek labi tomaha ge tomaha elal , inoke ni bugul papahel nihi tabwa boda maisena .
43011053	Inoke i telipuna lan o ge i nok , Yudiya wali tohouwa hi nuwanuwatu ga nihi ola ge Yeisu nihi lopaaliga .
43011054	Inoke nuwatu o kaiwena Yeisu nige i nonomasamasal Yudiya gamwaliyaa , yaa alonau wana tohago hi egon , hi na hi minaa ga panuwa etega alana Ipileimi , iyoho labi kekevana labenaa .
43011055	Yudiya wali Nopalegi Hagalena ana sauga iyaka i kelakelaubwa , inoke bolo hi miminek awan ge awan ona elal hi nowanik hi na Yelusalema ali abwabubun paganina kaiwena , mulaa abwe Nopalegi Hagalena ana sauga .
43011056	Gamagalau o hi loyaloya Yeisu kaiwena , ge Limi Bwabwalena gamwanaa hi talmilil ge hi pebaaba-agil hi ba , “ Ga ku nuwatu ola ? Tab nasi ni nem hagali ya elana ? ”
43011057	He topowon bwabwatal avaliyau ge Palisi iyaka logugui hi ginol ge hi ba , “ Ebo gamagal etega Yeisu wana abamina ni atena , wama wasa ni pem , inoke naha ba nihi lib ge nihi yowan . ”
43012001	Lan sikis ya i mina ge abwe Nopalegi Hagalena ana sauga , inoke Yeisu i na Bedani , awan toto Lasalo i miminaa , iya te Yeisu valila i palutem yaomala .
43012002	Aanan etega hi ginol Yeisu kaiwena . Mata aanan i habwe ge i lovilovivina gamagalau kaiweliya , ge Lasalo alonau gamagalau iyoho hi misiyo , avaliya Yeisu hi aanan .
43012003	Yaka Meli enonu bwalena waiwaisana ge molana bwabwatana , alana nad , ana bwata i ola lita awalehina , i ahe . Inoke i na i holek Yeisu aenaa , ge abwe kokowana pupunona elana i pwamwagamwaga . Enonu bwalena limi gamwana i kalaopopwi .
43012004	Yeisu wana tohago avaliya etega alana Yudasa Isikaliyota , iya abwe Yeisu ni wasaan , i ba ,
43012005	“ Binimala enonu ya ta palian , molana mani silba ali gewi tili handeled ta ahe , ge ta pek togulagula elal . ”
43012006	He nige tage i nuwanuwatu togulagula kaiweliya ge i ba ola o , yaa kaiwena iya tokaoma . Wali mani ana kalopu iya i matahikan , ge sauga i gewi mani i pipikaome totona kaiwena .
43012007	Yaka abwe Yeisu i ba , “ U pialiyoho ya ! Wana nuwatu ni ginol ge tuwau ni abubun nonowe o teliteli kaiwena .
43012008	Komiu sauga gegewena alomiyau ya togulagula , yaa nau nige sauga gegewena alomiu i oola . ”
43012009	Yudiya boda bwabwatana Yeisu wasana hi hago te iya iyoho Bedani , inoke hi nowanik hi na elana . He nige iya kaiwena ya i oola ge hi nonok , yaa nuwaliya al Lasalo , iya Yeisu i palutem yaomala , nihi kite .
43012010	Inoke topowon bwabwatal hi nuwanuwatu tage Lasalo al ge nihi lopaaliga ,
43012011	puna kaiwena Lasalo wana lut al kaiwena Yudiya hi gewi hi olak Yeisu elana ge hi abulilek-an .
43012012	Lan i gan al , boda bwabwatana bolo hi nowanik Nopalegi Hagalena kaiwena wasa hi hago Yeisu i nanawa Yelusalema .
43012013	Inoke vegavega ginebi lamwaliya hi govel ge hi bugulagil hi na Yeisu hi kite kamwasaa . Inoke hi nonoyogayoga hi ba , “ Hosana ! Babala ta tobalan ! ” “ Yehoba ni ba muloluan , iya i nem Babala alana elana ! ” “ Yehoba ni ba muloluan , iya Isileli wala Kin ! ”
43012014	Yeisu donki etega i ahe i heya pwatanaa , i ola Buki Bwabwalena ana baaba i ba :
43012015	Saiyoni gamagaliliyau , bahi lovakun ! Ku kite , wami kin i nenem eliyamiu , i heya donki natuna elana .
43012016	Sauga o wana tohago ginol o ana sapu nigeya ga hi aatena . Yaa Yehoba Yeisu i palut ge i pawasawasa enaa , inoke abwe hi nuwatu Buki Bwabwalena ana baaba i ba ola o Yeisu kaiwena , ge hi nuwahikan te bugul bolo o hi ginol elana .
43012017	He valila boda bwabwatana Yeisu hi kite Lasalo i yogaan ge i palutem yaomala , inoke heliya Yeisu wana ginol wasana hi palelu .
43012018	Gamagalau hi gewi Yeisu wana ginol yawiyawi o wasana hi hago , inoke hi nok hi na Yeisu hi kite kamwasaa .
43012019	Inoke Palisi heliya ya hi pebaaba-agil hi ba , “ Nuwatu toto ta nuwatuan ge tage ta ginol , iyaka nige bosowaila ! Ku kite , gamagalau gegewel iyaka hi olak elana ge hi toulil . ”
43012020	Bolo hi na Yelusalema Nopalegi Hagalena ana tapwalolo kaiwena , he gamwaliyaa Gilik gamagaliliyau enuna iyoho .
43012021	Heliya hi nok hi na Pilipi elana , iya i neem panuwa Betesaida labi Galili gamwanaa , ge hi ba , “ Tonowak , nuwama Yeisu naha kite . ”
43012022	Yaka Pilipi i nok i na i baek Andulu elana , ge ali toto eluwa hi na Yeisu wana wasa hi pek .
43012023	Inoke Yeisu i baek elal i ba , “ Sauga iyaka i vin ge Yehoba Gamagal Natuna ni pawasawasa .
43012024	Ya ba tunahot eliyamiu , ebo witi pwatumwina etega nige ni sosoguek bilibiliya ge ni aaliga , he ni maimaisena ya . Yaa ebo ni aliga , inoke abwe ni siun ge ni enon , enona ni pohaka ge ni gewi .
43012025	Henala ebo yawalina ni nunuwana-an , he abwe ni payaomal . Henala ebo yawalina panayawiya nige ni nunuwana-an , he nige ni papayaomal , yaa ni kukuhikan ana siga yawal mihomihotina ni pwawa .
43012026	Ebo gamagal etega nuwana ni tuwalali kaiweu , he ni toulilau , ge ebo hauna labi elana na minaa , iya al ni minaa . Inoke gamagal toto i tuwalali kaiweu alana Nam ni teli heyan . ”
43012027	Yaka abwe Yeisu i ba , “ Sauga ya yayaluwau i pulowan , ge nige ya aatena ga na ba ola . Age na ba , ‘ Nam , bahi lomwan ya ni mamasal eliyau ’ ? Nigeya , he lomwan ya kaiwena te ya nem .
43012028	Nam , alam nu teli heyan ge nu pawasawasa . ” Inoke anan etega i loem labulabumwa i ba , “ Alau iyaka ya pawasawasa , ge abwe na pawasawasa al . ”
43012029	Sauga gamagalau bolo hi taltalmilil o anan hi hago , yaka enuna hi ba , “ Gulumwawa butuna to . ” Yaa enuna al hi ba , “ Anelose etega to i baaba elana o . ”
43012030	Yeisu i baek elal i ba , “ Anan toto ku hago , nige nau o labe kaiwena i oola , yaa komiu ami labe kaiwena .
43012031	Sauga ya Yehoba panayawi gamagaliliyau wali pagan ni hile ge ali lahi ni baunan ; ge sauga al ya Yehoba panayawi ana babala Seitani ni pakokove ge ni tagatagil-an .
43012032	Yaa nau , sauga ebo nihi teli heyagau kolos elana , inoke gamagalau gegewel na ahel nihi nem elau . ”
43012033	He i ba ola o , inoke i pamasal bwaliga ga ni yaomal ola .
43012034	Yaka boda hi ba masal hi ba , “ Ha hago Logugui i ba tage Mesaiya iya ni mihot sauga gegewena . He ga i ola ge owa u ba , ‘ Gamagal Natuna abwe nihi teli heyan kolos elana ’ ? Gamagal Natuna toto bana u baaba , he iya henala ? ”
43012035	Yeisu i baek elal i ba , “ Nasi mwananal alomiu sauga kekeisi al ya . Inoke nuku nawanawa sauga mwananal iyehe alomiu , ge bahi gogou ni gogogou-agimiu . Kaiwena toto i nawaa gogouwa nige i aatena te ga i nonoek .
43012036	Sauga mwananal iyehe alomiu , nuku abulilek elana , inoke nuku tabwa mwananal natunau . ” Sauga Yeisu i baaba haba , yaka i egon i na i bunsumi ge nige hi kikite .
43012037	Bwagana Yeisu ginol yawiyawi hi gewi i ginolil gamagalau mataliyaa , yaa nige hi aabulilek elana .
43012038	Inoke palopita Aiseya wana baaba i patunahot , toto i ba : Babala , henala wama wasa i abulilek-an ? Ge henala Babala wana gasisi i kite i ola te sauga ya i giginol ?
43012039	Nige bosowailiya nihi abulilek kaiwena Aiseya i ba al i ba :
43012040	Yehoba mataliya i pakai , ge wali nuwatu i pagogou , inoke nige bosowailiya nihi kite mataliyaa , o ebo nuwaliya ni sapu . Yehoba i ba , “ Nige bosowailiya nihi nuwasikal elau ge na pwamolol . ”
43012041	He Aiseya Yeisu wana wasawasa i kite , inoke i baaba Yeisu bana i ola to .
43012042	Yaa bwagana , Yudiya wali tohouwa hi gewi hi abulilek Yeisu elana . Yaa wali abulilek nige hi babaa tagilan , kaiwena Palisi hi lovakunagil eba nihi teli tagilagil wali limi tapwalolowa ge bahi avaliyau nihi tatapwalolo al wali boda elana .
43012043	Nuwaliya te alaliya gamagalau nihi teli heyan , nige nuwaliya Yehoba alaliya ni teli heyan .
43012044	Yeisu i baaba anana i bwata i ba , “ Henala ebo ni abulilek elau , nige i aabulilek nau ya elau , yaa i abulilek al toto i patunau elana .
43012045	Henala ebo ni kiteyau , he toto i patunau iyaka i kite al .
43012046	Nau ya nem panayawiya ya ola mwananal , inoke bolo hi abulilek elau , gegewel nige nihi miminaa gogouwa .
43012047	“ Ebo gamagal etega no baaba i hago ge nige i hehenapu-an , he nau nige na papayatala , kaiwena ya nem nige tage gamagalau panayawi na payatalal , yaa na pwamwalil .
43012048	Henala ebo o en ni pem ge no baaba ni towani , he iyaka ana toyatala i gan . Baaba bolo ya baunan te bwaliga ni payatala sauga mowamowasena elana .
43012049	He i ola to , kaiwena nige ya babaa totou no nuwatu elana , yaa Nam toto i patunau o logugui i pem ga na ba ola ge hauna baaba na baunan .
43012050	Ge ya atena Nam wana baaba yawal mihomihotina i pamasal . Inoke baaba gegewena bolo ya baunan , he i ola te Nam i baunanim ge na baunan . ”
43013001	Nopalegi Hagalena ana sauga iyaka i kelaubwa hot . Yeisu i atena te wana sauga iyaka i vin ge panayawi toto ya ni eguluwai ge ni sikal ni na Tamana elana . Wana gamagalau bolo hi minaa panayawiya i nunuwana-agil , inoke i nunuwana-agil nabiyan i na ana siga wana yaomal elana .
43013002	Yeisu alonau ge wana tohago heliya iyoho kokoyavi enona hi aanan . Seitani nuwatu iyaka i paulutuk-an Yudasa Isikaliyota Saimon natuna elana ge Yeisu ni wasaan .
43013003	He Yeisu i atena te Tamana gasisi ge bugul gegewena i teli nimanaa , ge i atena iya i neem Yehoba elana ge ni sikal al Yehoba elana .
43013004	Inoke aanan i lut luwan , ana kama toto yayapona i loho i teli , ge tawel i ahe i lataavan henuwaninaa .
43013005	Yaka wewel i holek mwaha etega elana , inoke i telipuna tohago aeliya i ulul ge tawel toto i lataavana henuwaninaa i ahe i pwapwamwagamwaga .
43013006	Sauga i ul vin Saimon Pita elana , yaka Pita i nel i ba , “ Babala , nasi aeu nu ul ? ”
43013007	Yeisu Pita anana i lahe i ba , “ Sauga ya hauna gun ya awaawaginol ana sapu nige u aatena , yaa bwaliga abwe nu atena . ”
43013008	Pita i ba , “ Bahiwa ! Bahi sauga etega aeu nu uul . ” Yaka Yeisu i ba , “ Ebo nige aem na uul , he nige al nu oola no tohago . ”
43013009	Saimon Pita i ba , “ Babala , ebo i ola o , he bahi aeu ya nu uul , yaa nimwau ge kokowau al nu ulil . ”
43013010	Yeisu i ba , “ Ebo gamagal etega ni highig , he tuwana bikena gegewena iyaka i mowasi . Inoke nige ni highig al , besena ya te aena ni ul . Komiu iyaka ku yanayana , yaa nige gegewemiu hot i oola . ”
43013011	He Yeisu iyaka i atena te henala abwe ni wasaan , heiya te kaiwena i ba , “ Nige gegewemiu hot ku yanayana . ”
43013012	Sauga tohago aeliya i ulil haba , yaka ana kama yayapona i ahe i galoi al , inoke i na i misiyo al abanaa . Yaka i nel wana tohago elal i ba , “ Tab ku atena hauna gun abwe ya ginol eliyamiu ?
43013013	Komiu ku awa topankite-agau ge ku awa babala-agau , he ku ba bubun tei , kaiwena nau ya ola to .
43013014	He nau wami Babala ge wami Topankite aemiu iyaka ya ul , inoke komiu al alomiyau aeliya nuku ul .
43013015	Wami abagagayawa iyaka ya ginol , inoke nuku ginol ni ola no ginol eliyamiu .
43013016	Ya ba tunahot eliyamiu , totuwalali nige wana babala i bwabwata lake , ge elopapatuna nige ana topapatuna i bwabwata lake .
43013017	No ginol puna hot ana sapu iyaka ku atena , ge ebo nuku ginol ola , inoke ana yaliyaya nuku pwawa .
43013018	Yaa baaba toto ya baunan , nige gegewemiu bamiu i oola . He bolo ya hilel ya atenal . Yaa Buki Bwabwalena ana baaba ni tunahot , toto i ba , ‘ Tau toto alou ha anan mwaha maisena elana , iya iyaka i pihigelgel elau . ’
43013019	He wami wasa ya pewa pahuwala te , inoke sauga ebo ginol o ni masal , yaka nuku abulilek te ‘ Nau heiya te Nau . ’ *
43013020	Ya ba tunahot eliyamiu , henala ebo bolo ya patunal ni atupahel , he i atupaheyau , ge henala ebo i atupaheyau , he toto i patunau i atupahe al . ”
43013021	Sauga Yeisu i ba ola o , inoke yayaluwana i pulowan nabi , yaka i ba masal ya i ba , “ Ya ba tunahot eliyamiu , komiu etega abwe ni wasaagau . ”
43013022	Tohago mataliya hi peluwaluwan-an avaliyau elal , nuwaliya i gewagewa nige hi aatena henala bana ge Yeisu i babaa .
43013023	He Yeisu wana tohago avaliya etega , toto i nunuwana-an nabiyan , † i misiyowa Yeisu labenaa .
43013024	Saimon Pita matana i nok tohago o elana , inoke awana i palamwalamwaniu-ek elana tage Yeisu ni neli henala ge bana i babaa .
43013025	Inoke tohago o i gena nok Yeisu elana ge i nel i ba , “ Babala , henala bana ? ”
43013026	Inoke Yeisu i ba , “ Nasi beleid awahinena na paululowan mwaha gamwanaa na pahun ge na pek elana . He gamagalina iya . ” Yaka beleid i pahun ge i pek Yudasa Isikaliyota Saimon natuna elana .
43013027	Sauga Yudasa beleid i ahe , inoke sauga o Seitani i ulutuk elana . Yaka Yeisu i baek elana i ba , “ Bugul toto tage u giginol , he etimwawa nu ginol . ”
43013028	Yaa tohago bolo hi misiyoan abaanan elana , nige hi aatena hauna kaiwena ge Yeisu i ba ola o Yudasa elana .
43013029	Yudasa iya wali mani ana kalopu i matahikan , inoke tohago enuna wali nuwatu tage Yeisu i baek elana ni nok ni na bugul enuna ni pwamola hagali kaiwena , o ebo mani enuna ni pek togulagula elal .
43013030	Sauga Yudasa beleid i ahe i an , yaka sauga o i tagil ge i egon . He bulin iyaka i gan .
43013031	Yudasa i egon enaa , yaka Yeisu i ba , “ Sauga ya Gamagal Natuna wana wasawasa gamagalau nihi kite , ge iya eliyana Yehoba wana wasawasa al nihi kite .
43013032	He iya eliyana te Yehoba wana wasawasa nihi kite , inoke Yehoba totona Gamagal Natuna ni pawasawasa , ge etimwawa ni ginol ola .
43013033	“ Natuwau , nige alowau komiu ta miminabi . He abwe nuku loyaagau , yaa sauga ya na ba eliyamiu ni ola te valila ya baek Yudiya wali tohouwa elal : ‘ Nige bosowaimiu nuku noek labi toto ya nonoek . ’
43013034	Logugui vavaluna sauga ya na pewa : nuku penununuwana-agimiu . He nuku penununuwana-agimiu ni ola nau ya nunuwana-agimiu .
43013035	Ebo nuku penununuwana-agimiu , inoke eliyana gamagalau gegewel nihi atena age komiu no tohago . ”
43013036	Saimon Pita i nel Yeisu elana i ba , “ Babala , ga u nonoek ? ” Yeisu i ba , “ Nige bosowaim sauga ya nu toulilau ge nu noek labi toto nau ya nonoek , yaa bwaliga abwe nu toulilau . ”
43013037	Inoke Pita i baek elana i ba , “ Babala , ga i ola ge nige bosowaina sauga ya na touliliwa ? Ya talamwagau na yaomal kaiwem . ”
43013038	Yaka anana Yeisu i lahe i ba , “ Tunahot u talamwagiwa nu yaomal kaiweu ? Ya ba tunahot eliyam , nasi nu alahagau paeton , mulaa abwe kamkam melutauina ni kahin . ”
43014001	Yeisu i baek wana tohago elal i ba , “ Bahi atemiu ni bwanabwana ! Nuku melteli Yehoba elana ge nuku melteli al elau .
43014002	Nam wana limi elana abamina i gewi , inoke na nok ge abamiu na lovivina-an . Binimala ebo nige abamina , he nige bosowaina na ba ola to .
43014003	Sauga ebo na nok ge abamiu na lovivina-an haba , yaka abwe na sikalim na ahemiu alowau komiu , inoke ebo ga na minaa , komiu al nuku minaa .
43014004	Labi toto ya nonoek ana kamwasa ku atena ya . ”
43014005	Tomas i baek elana i ba , “ Babala , nige ha aatena te ga u nonoek , he abwe kamwasa ga naha atena ola ? ”
43014006	Inoke anana Yeisu i lahe i ba , “ Nau kamwasa , ba tunahot ge yawal . Nige bosowaina etega ni noek kamwasa getoga elana ge ni nok Nam elana , iyai te nau elau .
43014007	Binimala ebo nuku atenau bubun , he inoke Nam al nuku atena . Sauga ya elana ge ta nanawa awolaa Nam iyaka ku atena ge iyaka ku kite . ”
43014008	Inoke Pilipi i ba , “ Babala , Tamwam u pankitema , yaka wama nuwatu ni paolaolaek . ”
43014009	Yeisu i baek Pilipi elana i ba , “ Pilipi , age nige u aatenau , bwagana alowau komiu iyaka ta minabi ? Henala ebo i kiteyau , he iyaka Nam i kite . Inoke ga i ola ge u ba , ‘ Tamwam u pankitema ’ ?
43014010	Age nige u aabulilek te nau ya minaa Nam elana ge Nam i minaa elau ? Baaba bolo ya baunan eliyamiu nige totou no nuwatu i oola . Yaa Nam iya i minaa elau ge wana tuwalali i awaawaginol .
43014011	No baaba nuku abulilek-an te , toto ya ba , ‘ Nau ya minaa Nam elana ge Nam i minaa elau . ’ Yaa ebo baaba ya nige ku aabulilek-an , he tuwalali bolo ya ginolil kaiweliya inoke nuku abulilek .
43014012	Ya ba tunahot eliyamiu , henala ebo ni abulilek elau , he iya ginol bolo ya ginolil abwe ni ginolil . Ge ginol bwabwatal ni ginolil , ginol bolo iyaka ya ginolil ni bwata lakel , kaiwena nau ya nana Nam elana .
43014013	Ge hauna ebo nuku awanuni alau elana , na ginol ni ola wami awanun . Inoke no ginol o elana Nam alana na teli heyan ge na pawasawasa .
43014014	Hauna gun ebo nuku awanuni alau elana , nasi na ginol . ”
43014015	Yeisu i ba , “ Ebo nuku nunuwana-agau , inoke no logugui nuku henapuan .
43014016	Na awanun Nam elana inoke Tolabe etega al ni pewa , ge iya alomiu sauga gegewena .
43014017	Tolabe o , iya Yayaluwa toto Yehoba ana aatena tutunahotina i pamasal . Gamagalau panayawi nige bosowailiya nihi ahe ali tolabe , kaiwena nige hi kikite ge nige hi aatena . Yaa iya komiu ku atena , kaiwena komiu alomiu ge i minaa eliyamiu .
43014018	Nige na eeguluwagimiu ni oola mwawamwawas , yaa abwe na nem al eliyamiu .
43014019	Sauga kekeisi abwe gamagalau panayawi nige nihi kikiteyau al , yaa komiu nuku kiteyau . Kaiwena nau yawaliu i gan , inoke komiu al yawalimiu ni gan .
43014020	Lan toto o elana abwe nuku atena nau ya minaa Nam elana , ge komiu ku minaa elau , ge nau ya minaa eliyamiu .
43014021	Henala ebo no logugui ni ahe ge ni henapuan , he iya te i nunuwana-agau . Toto i nunuwana-agau , Nam gamagal o i nunuwana-an , ge nau al ya nunuwana-an ge totou na pamasalau elana . ”
43014022	Yaka Yudasa ( nige toto Yudasa Isikaliyota i oola ) i ba , “ Babala , ga i ola ge nu pamasaliwa eliyama ge nige nu papamasaliwa gamagalau panayawi elal ? ”
43014023	Anana Yeisu i lahe i ba , “ Ebo etega ni nunuwana-agau , no panpankiti ni henapuan . Yaka Nam gamagal o ni nunuwana-an , inoke alou Nam naha nok elana ge aloma naha mina .
43014024	Toto ebo nige i nunuwana-agau , he nige no panpankiti ni hehenapu-an , inoke nige naha mamasal elana . He panpankiti toto ku hago nige totou no nuwatu i oola , yaa i neem Nam toto i patunau elana .
43014025	“ Baaba bolo ya ya baunan eliyamiu sauga nau iyehe alowau komiu .
43014026	Yaa Tolabe , Yayaluwa Bwabwalena , iya alau elana abwe Nam ni patunam , inoke bugul gegewena ni pankitemiu ge baaba gegewena bolo ya baunan eliyamiu ni panuwahikagimiu .
43014027	“ Nuwa laumwal ya eeguluwan eliyamiu ; no nuwa laumwal ya pewa eliyamiu . Nuwa laumwal ololana o nige bosowaina panayawi ni pewa te nau na pewa . Bahi atemiu ni bwanabwana ge nuku lolovakun .
43014028	Iyaka ku hago te ya ba , ‘ Ya eegon yaa abwe na sikalim al eliyamiu . ’ Binimala nuku nunuwana-agau , he nuku yaliyaya te ya nana Nam elana , kaiwena iya i bwata lakeyau .
43014029	Wami wasa ya pewa pahuwala te mulaa abwe bugul bolo o ni gan , yaka sauga ebo ni gan inoke nuku abulilek .
43014030	Iyaka sauga nige i yayapu ge tage alowau komiu ta liwaliwan al , kaiwena panayawi ya ana babala Seitani iyoho i nenem . Nige wana gasisi i gagan elau ,
43014031	yaa ya talamwagau kaiwena nuwau panayawi nihi atena te Nam ya nunuwana-an ge wana logugui gegewena i baunan eliyau ya ginolil . Ku nem , labena ya ta eguluwai . ”
43015001	“ Nau oine hot puna , ge Nam iya toeyowa .
43015002	Lala bolo hi siuna eliyau ge nige hi eenon , gegewel ni gotomwa yohil , yaa lala gegewel bolo hi enon ni abubunil , laliya bolo hi nak ni tomwa yohil , inoke nihi enon nabi .
43015003	Komiu iyaka ku waisi kaiwena baaba bolo ya baunan eliyamiu iyaka i abubunimiu .
43015004	Nuku minaa eliyau , inoke nau na minaa eliyamiu . Nige bosowaina lala etega totona ni enon ebo nige ni miminaa puna elana . I ola al komiu nige bosowaina nuku enon ebo nige nuku miminaa eliyau .
43015005	“ Nau oine puna ge komiu lalana . Henala ebo ni minaa elau , ge nau na minaa elana , iya ni enon nabi . Yaa ebo nuku miluwagau , nige bosowaina bugul etega nuku ginol .
43015006	Henala ebo nige ni miminaa elau , iya i ola lala toto hi aliyoho ge i yakiwa . Lala ololana o hi bugul papahe inoke hi yoho tukan ginahaa ge nihi kalas .
43015007	Ebo nuku minaa elau ge no baaba ni minaa eliyamiu , bugul bolo nuwamiu nuku awanun kaiweliya , inoke nuku pwawa .
43015008	Ebo nuku enon nabi ge nuku ola no tohago , he toto ya Nam ni pawasawasa .
43015009	“ Nau ya nunuwana-agimiu , i ola ya te Nam i nunuwana-agau . He nuku minaa no nunuwana gamwanaa .
43015010	Ebo no logugui nuku henapuan , inoke nuku minaa no nunuwana gamwanaa , ni ola nau Nam wana logugui ya henapuan ge ya minaa wana nunuwana gamwanaa .
43015011	Baaba ya ya baunan eliyamiu inoke no yaliyaya ni mina eliyamiu ge wami yaliyaya ni pakalaopop .
43015012	He no logugui iya hiwe : nuku penununuwana alomiyau elal ni ola nau ya nunuwana-agimiu .
43015013	Nige gamagal etega wana nunuwana ana bwata ni oola toto yawalina i talamwan wana heliyamwau kaiweliya .
43015014	Ebo nuku ginol ni ola no logugui , he komiu no heliyamwau .
43015015	Nige al na aawa totuwalali-agimiu , kaiwena totuwalali nige i aatena te wana tonowak hauna i giginol . Yaa nau ya awa heliyamwau-agimiu , kaiwena bugul gegewena bolo ya hagoem Nam elana iyaka ya pamasal eliyamiu .
43015016	Komiu nige ku hihileyau , yaa nau ya hilemiu nuku nok nuku na nuku enon , ge enomiu o ni mihot . Inoke hauna gun ebo nuku awanuni alau elana , Nam ni pewa .
43015017	He no logugui iya hiwe : nuku penununuwana-agimiu . ”
43015018	Yeisu i ba , “ Ebo panayawi gamagaliliyau nihi pihigelgel-agimiu , nuku nuwahikan te hi pihigelgel-agau houwan .
43015019	Binimala ebo nuku minek panayawi gamagaliliyau ali boda elana , inoke nihi nunuwana-agimiu ni ola komiu avaliyau . Yaa komiu nige ku miminek ali boda elana , nau ya hilemiwa gamwaliyaa . Inoke heiya te kaiwena panayawi gamagaliliyau hi pihigelgel-agimiu .
43015020	Baaba toto ya baunan eliyamiu nuku nuwahikan i ola hiwe : ‘ Totuwalali nige wana babala i bwabwata lake . ’ Ebo hi palopalomwan-agau , he komiu al ge nihi palopalomwan-agimiu . Ebo no baaba hi henapuan , he komiu al ge wami baaba nihi henapuan .
43015021	Nau kaiweu pagan ya nihi ginol eliyamiu , kaiwena toto i patunau nige hi aatena .
43015022	Binimala nige na nenem ge wali wasa na pepek , he nige ali woliwoli ni gagan wali gegi kaiwena . Yaa sauga ya nige wali epaepakuna i gagan wali gegi kaiwena .
43015023	Toto ebo i pihigelgel-agau , he i pihigelgel al Nam elana .
43015024	Ginol ololal nige sauga etega gamagal etega i giginol , nau ya ginol gamwaliyaa . Binimala nigeya , inoke nige ali woliwoli ni gagan wali gegi kaiwena . He ginol yawiyawi ya ginolil iyaka hi kite , yaa bwagana o , alou ge Nam hi pihigelgel-agima .
43015025	I masal i ola to inoke baaba toto wali Logugui ana buki gamwanaa i patunahot , toto i ba , ‘ Hi pihigelgel-agau bwabwage nige wali puna i gagan . ’
43015026	“ Abwe Tolabe ni nem , iya Yayaluwa toto Yehoba ana aatena tutunahotina ana topamasal ge i tagilem Nam elana . Iya na patuna eliyamiu ni neem Nam elana ge wasau ni wasaan .
43015027	Yaa komiu al ge wasau nuku wasaan , kaiwena i telipunaa sauga toto tuwalali ya telipuna , alowau komiu ya .
43016001	“ Baaba ya ya baunan eliyamiu ni pagasisi-agimiu ge bahi nuku sosogu .
43016002	Bwaliga abwe nihi ba nuku tagil wali limi tapwalolowa ge nige alomiyau nuku tatapwalolo al . Ge sauga i nenem , ebo gamagal etega ni tagapaaligamiu , he i nuwatu tage Yehoba wana tuwalali to i ginol o .
43016003	Ginol ololana o nihi ginol eliyamiu kaiwena nige alou ge Nam hi aatenama .
43016004	Baaba ya ya baunan eliyamiu , inoke ebo ana sauga ni vin , no baaba ya nuku nuwahikan . He valila nige wami wasa ya pepewa houwan bugul ya kaiweliya , kaiwena nau iyoho ya eliyamiu . ”
43016005	“ He sauga ya ya eegon ya nana toto i patunau elana . He komiu nige etega ku nenelau te ga ya nana ,
43016006	yaa atemiu i lomwan no baaba o kaiwena .
43016007	Yaa ya ba tunahot eliyamiu : wami waisi kaiwena te nau ya eegon , kaiwena ebo nige na eegon , Tolabe nige ni nenem eliyamiu . Yaa ebo na egon , inoke abwe na patuna ni nem eliyamiu .
43016008	Ge sauga ni nem , panayawi gamagaliliyau wali gegi ni pankitel , ge ni pankitel henala i sapu , ge ni pankitel Yehoba abwe ni payatalal ge ali lahi ni baunan .
43016009	Wali gegi ni pankitel , kaiwena nige hi aabulilek elau .
43016010	Ni pankitel henala i sapu , kaiwena nau ya nonok ya nana Nam elana , he nige al nuku kikiteyau .
43016011	Ge ni pankitel Yehoba abwe ni payatalal , kaiwena panayawi ya ana babala Seitani iyaka i payatala ge ana lahi i baunan .
43016012	“ Bugul i gewi nabi iyoho nuwau na baunan eliyamiu , yaa eba nige bosowaimiu i oola .
43016013	Yaa sauga Yayaluwa toto Yehoba ana aatena tutunahotina ana topamasal ni nem , iya ni nulimiu ge baaba tutunahotina gegewena nuku atena . He nige totona wana nuwatu ni babaunan , yaa toto i hago ya te ni baunan , ge bugul bolo hi gagan sauga mulaa ni pamasal eliyamiu .
43016014	Iya nuwatu ni ahem elau ge ni pamasal eliyamiu , inoke eliyana alau ni pawasawasa .
43016015	Bugul gegewena toto Nam elana , he nau eliyau . Heiya te kaiwena ge ya ba Yayaluwa Bwabwalena ni ahiahiya eliyau ge ni papamasal eliyamiu . ”
43016016	Yeisu i ba vevehe al i ba , “ Sauga kekeisi abwe nige nuku kikiteyau , yaa sauga kekeisi al abwe nuku kiteyau . ”
43016017	Wana tohago enuna hi pebaaba-agil hi ba , “ Wana baaba ana sapu ga i ola toto i ba , ‘ Sauga kekeisi abwe nige nuku kikiteyau , yaa sauga kekeisi al abwe nuku kiteyau ’ ? Ge i ba al , ‘ Nau ya nana Nam elana . ’ ”
43016018	Heliya iyoho hi pepenelnel-agil hi ba , “ Ana sapu ga i ola ge i ba , ‘ Abwe sauga kekeisi ’ ? Wana baaba ana sapu kila nige ta aatena . ”
43016019	Yeisu i atena te wana tohago nuwaliya nihi nel elana , yaka i baek elal i ba , “ Bi ola ge ku penelnel-agimiu no baaba ana sapu kaiwena , toto ya ba , ‘ Sauga kekeisi abwe nige nuku kikiteyau , yaa sauga kekeisi al abwe nuku kiteyau ’ ?
43016020	Ya ba tunahot eliyamiu , abwe nuwamiu ni nak ge nuku kahin , yaa panayawi gamagaliliyau nihi yaliyaya . Lomwan nuku pwawa , yaa wami lomwan abwe ni pil ni na yaliyaya elana .
43016021	Ebo yova wana sauga ab , lomwan i pwawa , kaiwena wana sauga iyaka i vin . Yaa sauga ebo wawaya iyaka i sogu , inoke wana lomwan nige al i nunuwahikan , kaiwena i yaliyaya te wawaya iyaka i masal panayawi .
43016022	I ola al sauga ya komiu atemiu i lomwan , yaa abwe na kitemiu al ge nuku yaliyaya , ge nige gamagal etega wami yaliyaya ni aahek yoho .
43016023	Lan o elana nige bugul etega nuku neneli elau . Ya ba tunahot eliyamiu , hauna gun ebo nuku awanuni alau elana , Nam ni pewa .
43016024	Valila ge i nem ana siga sauga ya , nige alau elana bugul etega ku aawanuni . He nuku awanun , inoke nuku pwawa ge yaliyaya nuku kalaopopwi . ”
43016025	Yeisu i ba vevehe al i ba , “ No baaba eliyana ya ba kakanun ya . Yaa sauga i nenem abwe nige al na babaa kakanun eliyamiu , yaa Nam kaiwena na ba hoti ya .
43016026	He sauga o alau elana nuku awanun . Nige ya babaa ola te tage kaiwemiu na awanun Nam elana ,
43016027	kaiwena Nam totona i nunuwana-agimiu . I nunuwana-agimiu kaiwena komiu ku nunuwana-agau ge ku abulilek te nau ya neem Yehoba elana .
43016028	Nau ya neem Nam elana ge ya lau panayawi ; he sauga ya panayawi ya eeguluwai ge ya sisikal Nam elana . ”
43016029	Yaka wana tohago hi ba , “ He sauga ya iyaka u ba hoti te , nige ba kakanun i oola .
43016030	He iyaka ha kite te bugul gegewena u atena . Nige tage gamagal etega ni nel ga eliyam ge abwe wana nel nu lahe . He toto o i paabulilek-agima te owa u neem Yehoba elana . ”
43016031	Yeisu i baek wana tohago elal i ba , “ Iyaka abwe ku abulilek sauga e ?
43016032	Ana sauga iyoho i nenem , he iyaka i vin , ge abwe gegewemiu nuku liliwaliwali nuku na tomaha ona wami panuwaa , ge maiseu ya nuku eguluwagau . Yaa nige maiseu ya i oola , kaiwena alou Nam .
43016033	“ Nuwau nuku atilaumwal kaiwena ku minaa eliyau , heiya ge kaiwena baaba bolo ya ya baunan eliyamiu . Abwe palopalomwan nuku pwawa panayawi elana . Yaa atemiu ni matuwa , kaiwena panayawi wana gasisi iyaka ya pakokove . ”
43017001	Yeisu baaba bolo ya i baunan haba , yaka matana i lihin labulabumwa ge i ba , “ Nam , sauga iyaka i vin . Natum nu pawasawasa , inoke Natum ni pawasawasa-agiwa .
43017002	Kaiwena gasisi u pek elana gamagalau gegewel ni logugui-agil , inoke bosowaina yawal hot ni pek gamagalau gegewel elal bolo u pek elana .
43017003	Ge yawal hot iya te owa Yabowaine tutunahotina maisem nihi atenawa , ge Yeisu Keliso iya u patuna nihi atena .
43017004	Iyaka alam ya pawasawasa panayawiya , kaiwena tuwalali toto u pem ge na ginol , iyaka ya pwamowasi .
43017005	Nam , he nuwau sauga ya alou owa ta mina ge alau nu pawasawasa , ni ola te valila alou owa ta minaa wasawasa o elana mulaa abwe panayawi i gan .
43017006	Iyaka ya pamasaliwa gamagalau elal , bolo u aheliya panayawi ge u pem elau . He heliya wam gamagalau ge abwe u pem elau . Inoke wam baaba hi henapuan ,
43017007	ge iyaka hi atena te bugul gegewena bolo u pem elau hi neem elam .
43017008	Baaba bolo u pem eliyau iyaka ya baunan eliyalil , he iyaka hi hago ge hi yaliyaya-an . Inoke hi atena te tunahot nau ya neem elam , ge hi abulilek-an te owa u patunau .
43017009	Ya awanun kaiweliya . Nige ya aawanun panayawi gamagaliliyau kaiweliya , yaa bolo u pem elau kaiweliya , kaiwena heliya wam gamagalau .
43017010	No gamagalau gegewel heliya wam gamagalau , ge wam gamagalau gegewel heliya al no gamagalau . Ge gamagalau ya elal gamagalau panayawiya no wasawasa hi kite .
43017011	He nau ya nonowa elam . Nige na miminaa al panayawi , yaa heliya nihi miminaa ga panayawi . O Nam Bwabwalena , alam wana gasisi elana nu matahikagil — he alan o iyaka u pem elau — inoke nihi tabwa maisena ni ola owa ge nau kila maisena .
43017012	Sauga alowau ha mina , alam wana gasisi elana ya matahikagil , he alan o iyaka u pem elau . Ya nolibulibu-agil , inoke nige etega i yayaomal , iyai ya te tau toto nuwana yaomal , inoke Buki Bwabwalena ana baaba i patunahot .
43017013	Nau ya nonowa eliyam , yaa sauga nau iyehe panayawi , no awanun o ya baunan , inoke no yaliyaya ateliya ni kalaopopwi .
43017014	Wam baaba ya baunan eliyalil , inoke panayawi gamagaliliyau hi pihigelgel-agil , kaiwena nige hi miminek panayawi gamagaliliyau ali boda elana , i ola nau nige ya miminek ali boda elana .
43017015	Ya awanun nige tage nu aheliya panayawi , yaa nu nolibulibu-agil Seitani elana .
43017016	Heliya nige hi miminek panayawi gamagaliliyau ali boda elana , i ola nau nige ya miminek panayawi ali boda elana .
43017017	Wam baaba i tunahot , inoke nuwau wam baaba tutunahotina ni tuwalaliya elal ge eliyana nu pwabwabwalena-agil wam tuwalali kaiwena .
43017018	Ya patunal hi tagil panayawi i ola u patunau ya nem panayawi .
43017019	Heliya kaiweliya ya pwabwabwalena-agau elam , kaiwena nuwau heliya al nihi bwabwalena hot elam .
43017020	Nige ya aawanun ya te bolo ya kaiweliya , yaa ya awanun al bolo tohago ya wali wasa eliyana ge abwe nihi abulilek elau kaiweliya .
43017021	Ya awanun te heliya gegewel nihi tabwa maisena . O Nam , nihi minaa eliyala ni ola te owa u minaa elau ge nau ya minaa elam . Nihi tabwa maisena inoke panayawi gamagaliliyau nihi abulilek-an te owa u patunau .
43017022	Iyaka u pawasawasa-agau , inoke wasawasa o eliyana nau iyaka ya pawasawasa-agil , inoke heliya nihi tabwa maisena ni ola owa ge nau kila maisena .
43017023	Nau ya minaa elal ge owa u minaa elau , inoke ginol o eliyana nuwau heliya nihi tabwa maisena hot . Yaka panayawi nihi atena te owa u patunau ge bolo o u nunuwana-agil i ola u nunuwana-agau .
43017024	Nam , bolo u pem elau , nuwau alowau naha mipamaisena labi toto nau na minaa , inoke no wasawasa nihi kite . He wasawasa o u pem elau kaiwena u nunuwana-agau mulaa abwe panayawi i gan .
43017025	Nam , Tosasapona hot owa , panayawi nige hi aatenawa , yaa nau ya atenawa , ge bolo u pem elau iyaka hi atena te owa u patunau .
43017026	Iyaka ya pamasaliwa elal , ge na ginol hikahikani , kaiwena nuwau nihi penununuwana-agil ni ola owa u nunuwana-agau , ge nuwau al na minaa elal . ”
43018001	Yeisu i awanun haba Tamana elana , yaka alonau wana tohago hi egon hi na sinawel Kidilon hi kalapanet-an ge hi na hi ha labena etega . He ebwakil olibe ana gungun etega iyoho labi o elana , inoke alonau wana tohago hi na hi tuk gamwanaa .
43018002	Yudasa toto Yeisu i wasaan labena o i atena bubun , kaiwena sauga i gewi Yeisu alonau ge wana tohago hi nana hi mimigogo labi o elana .
43018003	Inoke Yudasa alonau tolohaveyan ali boda etega , avaliyau ge Limi Bwabwalena ana pulisimanau enuna , bolo topowon bwabwatal ge Palisi hi patunal , hi nok hi na gungun o elana . He elikaya , odam ge elohaveyan hi noahel .
43018004	Yeisu iyaka i atena te hauna nasi ni gan elana , yaka i pulinok elal ge i ba , “ Henala ge ku loyaan ? ”
