43018005	Anana hi lahe hi ba , “ Yeisu gagama Nasaleta . ” Yaka Yeisu i ba , “ Nau te . ” ( He Yudasa toto Yeisu i wasaan iyoho to alonau i taltalmilil . )
43018006	Sauga Yeisu i ba , “ Nau te , ” inoke hi talsikal ge hi sogu bilibiliya .
43018007	Yeisu i nelil al i ba , “ Henala ge ku loyaan ? ” Yaka hi ba , “ Yeisu gagama Nasaleta . ”
43018008	Inoke analiya i lahe i ba , “ He iyaka ya ba haba eliyamiu , nau te . Ebo ku loyaagau , inoke alowau bolo ya nuku piluwagil ge nihi egon . ”
43018009	I ba ola o , inoke wana baaba i tabwa tunahot , toto i ba , “ Nam , bolo u pem elau nige etega ya papayaomal . ”
43018010	Saimon Pita wana elohaveyan kilepana i gan , inoke i kukuyagin abanaa ge topowon bwabwatal wali tohouwa wana totuwalali tanana toto labena awonaa i goyoho . Tau o alana Malkas .
43018011	Yaka Yeisu i baek Pita elana i ba , “ Wam elohaveyan kilepana u teli pasikal abanaa . U nuwatu lomwan ana kom toto Nam i pem bahi na iim ? ”
43018012	Tolohaveyan ali boda avaliya wali tologugui , avaliyau ge Yudiya wali pulisimanau , Yeisu hi lib . Inoke hi yowan
43018013	ge houwan hi pwatanik Anasa elana . Anasa iya Kaiyapa yawana , Kaiyapa lagona tamana . Kaiyapa iya topowon bwabwatal wali tohouwa baliman o elana .
43018014	He Kaiyapa te i baek Yudiya wali tologugui elal i ba , “ I waisi te gamagal maisena ni yaomal gamagalau kaiweliya . ”
43018015	Saimon Pita alona ge tohago etega al * Yeisu hi noulil . Tohago toto o iya ana aatena i gan topowon bwabwatal wali tohouwa elana . Inoke iya alona Yeisu hi na hi tuk topowon bwabwatal wali tohouwa wana bakubakuwa ,
43018016	yaa Pita i notalmilila bakubaku ana nog elana . Yaka tohago toto ana aatena i gan topowon bwabwatal wali tohouwa elana , i sikal i na i ba yova toto nog ana tomatahikan elana ge abwe Pita i en tukan .
43018017	Inoke yova toto nog ana tomatahikan i baek Pita elana i ba , “ Age owa al tau o wana tohago etega ? ” Yaka Pita i ba , “ Nigeya , nau nige i oola . ”
43018018	Panuwa i tultul , yaka totuwalali ge pulisimanau ginaha hi ton ge hi milipainan hi loloamwaligu . Inoke Pita i nok i na alonau hi talmilil ge hi amwaligu .
43018019	Topowon bwabwatal wali tohouwa Yeisu i neli wana tohago kaiweliya ge wana panpankiti al kaiwena .
43018020	Yaka Yeisu i ba , “ Sauga gegewena ya baaba mwananala gamagalau elal . Ya panpankitiya limi tapwalolo ona elal ge Limi Bwabwalena elana , heliya Yudiya gegewel wali abamimigogo . Nige baaba etega ya babaa sume .
43018021	Inoke hauna kaiwena ge u nelau ? Bolo no baaba hi hago nu nelil . Heliya no baaba gegewena hi atena . ”
43018022	Sauga Yeisu i ba ola o , yaka pulisiman etega toto i talmilila gegelinaa , Yeisu gegenana i taganepal ge i ba , “ Hauna kaiwena ge u ba lahi topowon bwabwatal wali tohouwa elana i ola o ? ”
43018023	Yaka Yeisu i ba , “ Ebo baaba etega ya ba panak , nu baunan gamagalau gegewel nihi hago . Yaa ebo ya ba bubun , he hauna kaiwena ge u taganepalau ? ”
43018024	( He ewasi Anasa Yeisu alona ge ana eyowan iyaka i patuna i nem Kaiyapa elana , iya topowon bwabwatal wali tohouwa . )
43018025	Saimon Pita iyoho i taltalmilil ge i amwaamwaligu , inoke gamagal etega i baek elana i ba , “ Age owa al tau o wana tohago etega ? ” Yaka i alaha i ba , “ Nigeya , nau nige i oola . ”
43018026	Topowon bwabwatal wali tohouwa wana totuwalali etega , iya tau toto tanana Pita i gogoyoho tutuna , i baek Pita elana i ba , “ Owa heiya ya kitewa alom Yeisu olibe ana gungun gamwanaa , age ? ”
43018027	Yaka Pita i alaha al , ge sauga o elana kamkam melutauina i kahin .
43018028	Yudiya Yeisu hi ahe Kaiyapa wana limiya , ge hi en pwatanik Loma wali gavana Pilato wana limiya . Sauga o iyaka mweluluga lan i gangan . Nige hi tutuk gavana wana limiya , kaiwena ebo ni pabikel ge nige bosowailiya Nopalegi Hagalena enona nihi an .
43018029	Yaka Pilato i na i tagil Yudiya elal ge i nelil i ba , “ Tau ya hauna gegi i ginol ge kaiwena ku wole ? ”
43018030	Anana hi lahe hi ba , “ Binimala nige gegi etega ni giginol , he nige naha een pwatanim elam . ”
43018031	Pilato i ba , “ He ku ahe ku na ku pakot totomiu wami logugui elana . ” Yaka Yudiya hi ba , “ Yaa komiu Loma wami logugui nige i tatalam te tage ama Yudiya gamagal etega ana logugui naha ginol ge naha ba ni aliga . ”
43018032	He i masal i ola to , inoke Yeisu wana baaba ni tabwa tunahot , toto valila i baunan ge i pamasal hauna kaba yaomal elana ni yaomala . †
43018033	Pilato i sikal i na limi gamwanaa , yaka Yeisu i yogaan ge i neli i ba , “ Owa Yudiya wali kin ? ”
43018034	Yeisu i baek elana i ba , “ Baaba toto u baunan totom wam nuwatu , o age gamagalau enuna wasau hi baunaniwa ? ”
43018035	Pilato Yeisu anana i lahe i ba , “ Age u nuwatu nau Yudiya gamagalina , ine ? Wam panuwa gamagaliliyau avaliyau ge wali topowon bwabwatal te hi ahewa ge hi telewa nimwawa . Hauna u ginol panak ? ”
43018036	Yeisu i ba , “ No abalogugui nige i miminaa panayawi ya elana . Binimala ebo ni ola , he awau toabinau nihi lut nihi lohaveyan kaiweu , ge bahi Yudiya nihi yoyowanau . Yaa nigeya , no abalogugui nige i miminaa labena ya elana . ”
43018037	Pilato i ba , “ Oo , he age owa kin ! ” Anana Yeisu i lahe i ba , “ He totom te u ba , ‘ Owa kin . ’ Nuwatu toto kaiwena ge nain i abau ya nem panayawiya i ola hiwe : baaba tutunahotina na wasaan gamagalau elal . Gamagalau gegewel bolo hi minek baaba tutunahotina elana anau hi hago . ”
43018038	Inoke Pilato i nel i ba , “ He baaba tutunahotina hauna kaba bugul ? ” Yaka i na i tagil al Yudiya elal ge i ba , “ Nige ana woliwoli puna etega ya pwapwawa ge tage ana lahi na baunan .
43018039	He ku atena te baliman maisena ge maisena , Nopalegi Hagalena ana sauga elana , toulutuk dela etega na sokal kaiwemiu ge ni tagil . Tab nuwamiu komiu Yudiya wami kin na sokal kaiwemiu ? ”
43018040	Anana hi lahe hi yoga hi ba , “ Nigeya , iya nige i oola ! Ama nuwama Balabas ! ” Yaa Balabas iya totaulol ge tokaoma .
43019001	Inoke Pilato i ba tolohaveyan Yeisu hi ahe ge hihiu elololina elana hi nibinibihan .
43019002	Yaka pepesala hi ahe hi ginol ana hanahana ge hi teli kokowanaa . Kaliko yayapona matana pepol i ola kin ali kaliko , hi ahe ge hi pagaloi ,
43019003	yaka hi nonok elana ge hi babaa , “ Atema owa , Yudiya wali kin ! ” Inoke gegenana hi tataganepal .
43019004	Pilato i na i tagil al boda elal ge i ba , “ Ku laegan ! Na en tagilan nuku kite , inoke nuku atena te nige ana woliwoli puna etega ya pwapwawa ge tage ana lahi na baunan . ”
43019005	Inoke Yeisu i notagil , ana hanahana pepesala iyoho kokowanaa , ge kaliko yayapona matana pepol i galoi iyoho tuwanaa . Yaka Pilato i ba , “ Ku kite ! Tauina iya hiwe ! ”
43019006	Sauga topowon bwabwatal ge wali pulisimanau Yeisu hi kite , yaka hi yoga hi ba , “ U lokolosan ! U lokolosan ! ” Pilato analiya i lahe i ba , “ Totomiu ku ahe ku na ku lokolosan . Nau nige ana woliwoli puna etega ya pwapwawa ge tage ana lahi na baunan . ”
43019007	Inoke Yudiya Pilato anana hi lahe hi ba , “ Ama wama logugui etega i gan , ge logugui o i ba ni yaomal , kaiwena i ba tage iya Yehoba Natuna . ”
43019008	Sauga Pilato baaba o i hago , yaka i lovakun nabi hot .
43019009	Inoke i na i tuk al wana limi gamwanaa ge Yeisu i neli i ba , “ He owa ga u neem ? ” Yaa Yeisu nige Pilato anana i lalahe .
43019010	Yaka Pilato i ba , “ Nige nuwam nu baem elau ? Tab u atena no gasisi i gan bosowaiu na sokaliwa o ebo na ba nihi lokolosagiwa ? ”
43019011	Yaka Yeisu i ba , “ Binimala Yehoba nige gasisi ni tatalamwan elam , he nige wam gasisi ni gagan ge nu lologugui-agau . Inoke bolo hi talamwagau nimwamwa , heliya wali gegi wam gegi i bwata lake . ”
43019012	Sauga o elana Pilato kamwasa i loya ge Yeisu ni sokal . Yaa Yudiya hi ganyogayoga hi ba , “ Ebo tau ei nu sokal , he nige Sisa wana heliyam i oola owa . Henala ebo totona i ba iya kin , iya i pihigelgel Sisa elana . ”
43019013	Sauga Pilato Yudiya wali baaba o i hago , inoke Yeisu i en tagilan noleleya , yaka Pilato i misiyo topapayatala wali abamisiyowa , abamisiyo o i minaa limi bebena etega alana hi ba , “ Bwalal Pat . ” He alana pana Hibilu hi ba , “ Gabata . ”
43019014	Lan o Nopalegi Hagalena ana lan lovivina , ge sauga o iyaka kelaubwa alalati bwagatau . Yaka Pilato i baek Yudiya elal i ba , “ Wami kin iya hiwe . ”
43019015	Yudiya hi yoga hi ba , “ U ahe u egonan ! U ahe u egonan ! U na u lokolosan ! ” Pilato i nelil i ba , “ Nuwamiu wami kin na lokolosan ? ” Topowon bwabwatal anana hi lahe hi ba , “ Nige wama kin etega al i gagan , iyai ya te Sisa maisena . ”
43019016	Yaka Pilato Yeisu i talamwan elal ge nihi lokolosan . Inoke tolohaveyan Yeisu hi ahe .
43019017	Totona ana kolos hi pakalivai ge i tagil panuwa tolinaa i na labi toto hi ba “ Pana Babaloma . ” ( He pana Hibilu hi ba “ Goligota . ” )
43019018	Inoke hi lokolosana to . Gamagalau labui alonau hi lokolosil , etegana ana kolos hi pamilila labena awonaa , ge etegana labena gegebanaa , yaa Yeisu i minaa luwaluwala .
43019019	Pilato leleli etega i ginol ge i ba hi tagahikan Yeisu ana kolos elana . Leleli i ba , “ Yeisu gagama Nasaleta , Yudiya wali kin . ”
43019020	Yudiya hi gewi leleli o hi vasili , kaiwena labi toto Yeisu hi lokolosana nige ana bwaga i yayapu panuwa bwabwatana elana , ge leleli o hi leli pana Hibilu , pana Loma ge pana Gilik elana .
43019021	Yudiya wali topowon bwabwatal hi nok hi na Pilato elana hi ba , “ Binimala bahi nu leleli ola te , ‘ Yudiya wali kin . ’ Ya nu leli te , ‘ Tau ya i ba : Nau Yudiya wali kin . ’ ”
43019022	Pilato analiya i lahe i ba , “ Leleli toto iyaka ya leli , he iyaka ya leli . ”
43019023	Sauga tolohaveyan Yeisu hi lokolosan haba , yaka ana kaliko hi ahe ge hi wali , he teli wali ana gewi esopali , tolohaveyan maisena ge maisena tomaha ona ali kaliko . Ana holahola awaa al hi ahe , ge hi kite kaliko maisena ya te elana hi ginoliya , ge nige ana hel tubwi i gagan .
43019024	Inoke hi ba , “ Bahi ta kukuleleli-an . He pat ta ahe ta galavenu-an , inoke henala ebo pat toto ana etotohi gaganina ni ahe , he ta pek elana . ” Hi ginol ola o , inoke Buki Bwabwalena ana baaba hi patunahot , toto i ba : “ O kaliko hi wali hi guyauan elal , ge pat hi galavenu-an ge nihi kite henala o kama ni ahe . ” He tolohaveyan wali ginol i ola to .
43019025	Yeisu hinana alona talina , avaliyau Meli toto Kolopas lagona ge Meli Magidala yovana , hi talmilil ana kolos gegelinaa .
43019026	Yeisu matana i nok hinana i kite , ge tohago toto i nunuwana-an nabiyan i talmilil gegelinaa , yaka i baek hinana elana i ba , “ Nevenak , natum tei . ”
43019027	Yaka i baek al tohago elana i ba , “ Hinam tei . ” Inoke sauga o tohago nevenak i ahe , i na i matahikan wana limiya .
43019028	Yeisu i atena wana tuwalali gegewena iyaka i mowasi , inoke Buki Bwabwalena ana baaba ana patunahot kaiwena i ba , “ Ya walem . ”
43019029	Oine manumanunina ana patuna etega iyoho to . Balou hi ahe hi pahun oine manumanunina elana i vinum , yaka hisopa lana etega hi ahe balou hi howa , inoke hi paelu heyan Yeisu hohopenaa .
43019030	Sauga i im , yaka i ba , “ Iyaka i mowasi . ” Inoke kaununa i pwabun lowan , yaka yawalina i talamwan i mowasi .
43019031	Lan o Sabwata ana lan lovivina , ge lan ni gan Sabwata bwabwatana alana gaganina etega . Yudiya nige nuwaliya Yeisu ge alonau tuwaliya ni kukukiya kolos elana ge Sabwata ni pwawa , inoke hi na hi awanun Pilato elana ge ni ba tolohaveyan Yeisu ge alonau aeliya nihi tagagabom , * ge tuwaliya nihi bugul lowan .
43019032	Yaka tolohaveyan hi nok hi na gamagalau bolo avaliya Yeisu hi lokolosagil , etegana aena hi tagagabom , yaka abwe hi na labuina al aena hi tagagabom .
43019033	Yaa sauga hi nok Yeisu elana , hi kite yawalina iyaka i mowasi , inoke aena nige hi tatagagabom .
43019034	Yaa tolohaveyan etega gau i ahe Yeisu luluna i howa , yaka etimwawa saliya ge wewel i sani tagil .
43019035	Tau toto bugul ya i kite i gan , † iya i wasaan , ge wana wasa i tunahot . I atena wana baaba i tunahot , ge iya i wasa inoke komiu nuku abulilek .
43019036	Bugul ya i gan inoke Buki Bwabwalena ana baaba i patunahot , toto i ba , “ Nige tutuwana etega ni mwamwagabom . ”
43019037	Ge Buki Bwabwalena ana baaba etega al i ba , “ Toto hi howa nihi gayawaan . ”
43019038	Bugul ya i mowasi , yaka Yosepa gagama Alimadiya i na Pilato elana Yeisu tuwana ni patalam . He Yosepa iya Yeisu wana tohago etegana , yaa i tohago sumi , kaiwena Yudiya wali tologugui i lovakunagil . Pilato i talam , yaka i nok i na Yeisu tuwana ni ahe .
43019039	Nikodimas alona Yosepa hi nok , Nikodimas toto valila bulin gamwana i nok i na Yeisu i kite . Iya enonu bwalena waiwaisana , meya alona ge alos hi vikuhu , i noahe , ana pulowan i ola teti kiloglem ( 30 kg ) .
43019040	Heliya Yeisu tuwana hi ahe , enonu bwalena waiwaisana o elana hi paenonu , yaka kaliko waiwaisana ge yayapona hi ahe tuwana hi avan . He hi ginol i ola to , i ola Yudiya wali yaomal ana teliteli paganina .
43019041	Labena toto Yeisu hi lokolosana , eyowa etega i minaa to . Eyowa o gamwanaa salai etega hi ken tukan , salai o i vavaluna ge nigeya ga gamagal etega i kekenuwa .
43019042	Lan o Yudiya wali lan lovivina , yaka lan ni gan lan Sabwata , ge salai o i mikelaubwa . Inoke Yeisu tuwana hi kalivai hi na hi teliya to .
43020001	Wik ana lan houwan elana mweluluga kekeisi , panuwa nigeya ga i mwamwananal , yaka Meli Magidala yovana i na salaiya , inoke i kite pat toto salai awana ana epaankaus iyaka hi pakul egonan .
43020002	Yaka i patalelu sikal i na Saimon Pita ge tohago toto etega elal , tohago toto Yeisu i nunuwana-an nabiyan . * Inoke i ba , “ Babala tuwana iyaka hi ahe salaiya , ge nige ha aatena te ga hi teliya ! ”
43020003	Inoke Pita alona ge tohago toto etega hi egon nihi na salaiya .
43020004	Ali toto eluwa hi patalelu , yaa tohago toto etega alona i patalelu luwai , i na i vin houwa salaiya .
43020005	I imowan tuk , ge kaliko toto Yeisu tuwana ana os i kite , yaa nige i tutuk .
43020006	Saimon Pita mulaa abwe i vin , yaka i tatahot i na i tuk salaiya . Kaliko toto Yeisu tuwana ana os iyoho i kite abanaa ,
43020007	ge i ola al kaliko toto kokowana ana os i kite . Nige i miminaa tuwan ana os elal , yaa ana awa i ola te gamagal etega i gagabom ge i teli getogaan .
43020008	Yaka tohago toto etega , toto i vin houwa salaiya , mulaa abwe i tuk al , inoke i kite ge i abulilek .
43020009	( He Buki Bwabwalena ana baaba ana sapu nigeya ga hi aatena , toto i ba Yeisu abwe ni lutem yaomala . )
43020010	Yaka tohago hi sikal hi na wali limiya .
43020011	Meli iyoho i taltalmilil salai tolinaa i kahikahin . I kahikahin gamwanaa inoke i imowan tuk salaiya ,
43020012	yaka aneloseyau labui i kitel kaliko yayanana hi galoi , hi misiyowa toto Yeisu tuwana i kenukenuwa . Etegana i minaa kokowana abanaa , ge etegana i minek aena abanaa .
43020013	Inoke hi neli hi ba , “ Yova , hauna kaiwena ge u kahikahin ? ” Yaka analiya i lahe i ba , “ No Babala tuwana iyaka hi ahe egonan , he nige ya aatena te ga hi teliya . ”
43020014	Sauga i ba ola o , yaka i tagena sikal ge i kite Yeisu i taltalmilil , yaa nige i aatena te age iya Yeisu .
43020015	Yaka Yeisu i nel elana i ba , “ Yova , hauna kaiwena ge u kahikahin ? Henala u loloyaan ? ” Meli i nuwatu tage eba iya toeyowa , yaka i baek elana i ba , “ Tonowak , ebo no Babala tuwana u kalivai egonan , he no wasa u pem ga u teliya , inoke na nok na na na ahe . ”
43020016	Yeisu i baek elana i ba , “ Meli ! ” Yaka Meli i milil pil , ge i pana Hibilu i ba , “ Laboni ! ” ( Baaba ya ana sapu heiya “ topankite . ” )
43020017	Yeisu i baek elana i ba , “ Bahi nu pipihikagau ge nu kukuhikagau ! Kaiwena nigeya ga ya sisikal ya haha Nam elana . Yaa u nok u na taliwau elal ge wali wasa nu pek te , ‘ Ya sisikal ya nana Nam ge komiu Tamamiu elana , no Yabowaine ge wami Yabowaine elana . ’ ”
43020018	Inoke Meli Magidala yovana i nok i na i baek tohago elal i ba , “ Babala iyaka ya kite . ” Ge baaba toto Yeisu i baunan elana i wasaan elal .
43020019	Lan toto o , iya wik ana lan houwan , sabwelu iyaka i lobek ge bulin i gan , he tohago heliya iyoho hi mipamaisena limi etega elana , ge ana nog hi loka kaus , kaiwena Yudiya wali tologugui hi lovakunagil . Inoke Yeisu i na i tuk i talmilil gamwaliyaa , yaka i ba , “ Atemiu ni laumwal ! ”
43020020	Baaba o i baunan enaa , yaka nimana ge luluna i pankitel . Sauga tohago Babala hi kite , inoke hi yaliyaya nabi .
43020021	Yeisu i ba vevehe al i ba , “ Atemiu ni laumwal ! Komiu na patunamiu nuku nok , ni ola nau Nam i patunau ge ya nem . ”
43020022	Baaba o i baunan , yaka i yana yohoek tohago elal ge i ba , “ Yayaluwa Bwabwalena ku ahe .
43020023	Ebo gamagalau wali gegi Yehoba matanaa nuku nuwayoho , he Yehoba iyaka i nuwayoho ; ebo gamagalau wali gegi nige nuku nunuwayoho , he Yehoba nige ni nunuwayoho . ”
43020024	Sauga Yeisu i masal wana tohago elal , he tohago bolo ali gewi elulutega eluwa avaliya etega alana Tomas ( iya alana etega al te Didimas ) † nige i miminaa alonau elal .
43020025	Yaka wana pan tohago wana wasa hi pek hi ba , “ Babala ha kite . ” Yaka Tomas i baek elal i ba , “ Ebo nige ana nel mulina na kikite nimanaa ge nimwau gigina na teteliya mul o eliyana , ge ebo nige nimwau na teteliya lulunaa , ana gau mulina gamwanaa , he nige na aabulilek . ”
43020026	Wik maisena i mowasi , tohago heliya iyoho limi gamwanaa , avaliya ge Tomas . Nog hi loka kaus , yaa Yeisu i na i tuk i talmilil gamwaliyaa ge i ba , “ Atemiu ni laumwal ! ”
43020027	Inoke i baek Tomas elana i ba , “ Nimwau u kitel ge nimwam gigina nu teliya hiwe . Yaka nimwam nu paelu ge nu teliya luluwa o gau mulina gamwanaa . Bahi al nuwa eleluwa , yaa nu abulilek . ”
43020028	Tomas i baek elana i ba , “ No Babala ge no Yabowaine ! ”
43020029	Yaka Yeisu i baek elana i ba , “ U kiteyau inoke abwe u abulilek ? He bolo nige hi kikiteyau ge hi abulilek , Yehoba ni muloluagil . ”
43020030	Yeisu ginol yawiyawi hi gewi al i ginolil wana tohago mataliyaa , yaa nige leli tukanina i gagan buki ya gamwanaa .
43020031	He wasa bolo ya lelena i gan inoke nuku abulilek te Yeisu iya Mesaiya , Yehoba Natuna , ge wami abulilek o kaiwena iya alana elana yawalimiu hot nuku pwawa .
43021001	Sauga etega al Yeisu i masal al wana tohago elal Hoga Taibeliyas * ana talbwasiya . He i gan i ola hiwe .
43021002	Saimon Pita , Tomas ( iya alana etega al Didimas ) , Nataniyel ( iya gagama Kena Galili awanina ) , Sebedi natunau eluwa avaliyau ge tohago eluwa al hi mipamaisena .
43021003	Saimon Pita i baek alonau elal i ba , “ Nau ya nana ya lologi . ” Yaka heliya hi ba , “ Ha nonowa aloma owa . ” Inoke hi nok hi na hi gaiha wagaa , ge hi na hi logi matavi , yaa bulin o nige moti etega hi lologe .
43021004	Mweluluga sabwelu i haha , Yeisu i na i talmilil talbwasiya , yaa tohago nige hi aatena te iya Yeisu .
43021005	Inoke i yoga nok elal i ba , “ Alowau , tab moti etega ku loge ? ” Anana hi lahe hi ba , “ Nigeya . ”
43021006	Yaka i baek elal i ba , “ Wami vineya ku alipaloek waga bebena toto nimamiu labena awomiu elana , inoke moti enuna nihi ona . ” Inoke vineya hi alipalo hogaa , ge nige bosowailiya nihi momol pahe waga gamwanaa , kaiwena moti hi gewi nabi hi ona .
43021007	Yaka Yeisu wana tohago toto i nunuwana-an nabiyan , † i baek Pita elana i ba , “ Babala to ! ” Sauga Saimon Pita i hago tohago o i ba , “ Babala to , ” inoke ana kaliko toto i loho i teli , i ahe i galoi , i supeni lau hogaa ge i gayutuk .
43021008	Tohago gegewel al waga elana abwe hi gotuk , ge vineya hi gomomol moti hi kalaopop gamwanaa , kaiwena nige ali bwaga i gagan datuwa , ana yapu tabam wan handeled mita ya .
43021009	Sauga hi gotuk ge hi gailau , ginaha hi kite ge moti enuna iyoho ginaha kiyalina gamwanaa , ge beleid enuna al hi kite .
43021010	Yaka Yeisu i baek elal i ba , “ Moti bolo abwe ku logel enuna ku pwatanim . ”
43021011	Yaka Saimon Pita i na i ha wagaa , inoke vineya i momol tukan datuwa . Moti bwabwatal hi kalaopop vineya gamwanaa , ali gewi 153 . He bwagana moti ali gewi i ola o , yaa vineya nige i mamalabu .
43021012	Yeisu i baek elal i ba , “ Ku nem ku anan . ” He nige bosowailiya tage etega ni nel elana ni ba , “ Henala owa , ” kaiwena iyaka hi atena te iya Babala .
43021013	Inoke Yeisu i nok i na beleid i ahe i pek elal , ge i ginol i ola al to moti elana .
43021014	He Yeisu wana lut al enaa , wana masal paetonina te wana tohago elal .
43021015	Sauga hi anan haba , yaka Yeisu i baek Saimon Pita elana i ba , “ Saimon Diyon natuna , tab u nunuwana-agau nabiyan , ge bolo ya wali nunuwana i bwata lake ? ” Pita i ba , “ Ibwe , Babala , u atena te ya nunuwana-agiwa . ” Yaka Yeisu i baek elana i ba , “ No sipi natunau nu paanil . ”
43021016	Yeisu i ba paeluwana i ba , “ Saimon Diyon natuna , tab u nunuwana-agau nabiyan ? ” Pita i ba , “ Ibwe Babala , u atena te ya nunuwana-agiwa . ” Yaka Yeisu i baek elana i ba , “ No sipi nu matahikagil . ”
43021017	Yeisu i nel paetonina Pita elana i ba , “ Saimon Diyon natuna , tab u nunuwana-agau ? ” Pita atena i lomwan kaiwena Yeisu i nel paetonina i ba , “ Tab u nunuwana-agau ? ” Yaka i ba , “ Babala , owa bugul gegewena u atena . U atena te ya nunuwana-agiwa . ” Yaka Yeisu i baek elana i ba , “ No sipi nu paanil .
43021018	Ya ba tunahot eliyam , wam sauga heval totom am belet u gimwan ge u nok labi toto nuwam nu noek . Yaa bwaliga ebo nu liki , nimwam nu latahin inoke gamagal etega ni yowaniwa ge ni nuliwa nu nok labena toto nige nuwam nu noek . ”
43021019	Yeisu i ba ola o ge i pamasal bwaliga Pita hauna kaba yaomal elana ni yaomala ge Yehoba alana ni pawasawasa . Inoke i baek Pita elana i ba , “ U toulilau ! ”
43021020	Pita i tagena sikal ge tohago toto etega , toto Yeisu i nunuwana-an nabiyan , i kite i noulilem eliyaa . ( He iya te valila aanan ana sauga elana i gena nok Yeisu elana ge i ba , “ Babala , henala ge ni wasaagiwa ? ” )
43021021	Sauga Pita tohago o i kite , inoke i nel Yeisu elana i ba , “ Babala , yaa tau ya nasi ga ni ola ? ”
43021022	Anana Yeisu i lahe i ba , “ Binimala ebo nuwau iya ni mina ana siga na sikalim al , he ga i ola elam o ? Owa nige wam labi i oola to . Owa u toulilau . ”
43021023	Yaka wasa kakawi etega i lelu Yeisu ana tototoulil gamwaliyaa tage tohago toto o nige ni yayaomal . Yaa Yeisu nige i babaa ola te nige ni yayaomal . Yaa iya i ba , “ Binimala ebo nuwau iya ni mina ana siga na sikalim al , he ga i ola elam o ? ”
43021024	Tohago toto ya iya te bugul bolo ya i wasaan ge i leli lowan buki ya gamwanaa . Ge ta atena iya wana wasa i tunahot .
43021025	Yeisu bugul hi gewi nabi al i ginolil . Binimala ebo maisena ge maisena leli lowanina ni gan , he ya nuwatu panayawi nige i bwabwata ge buki bolo nihi leli o abana ni gan .
44001001	Ateu owa Tiyopilo . Buki toto ya leli houwan gamwanaa , Yeisu wana tuwalali ge wana panpankiti gegewena ya wasaan , ya telipunaa sauga toto wana tuwalali i telipuna
44001002	ana siga lan toto i ha labulabumwa . Mulaa abwe i ha labulabumwa , Yayaluwa Bwabwalena wana gasisi elana inoke ba pagasisi i pek gamagalau tobolo i hilel wana apostolowau elal .
44001003	Wana yaomal enaa , lan poti gamwanaa i masamasal wana tohago elal , inoke hi atena tunahot Yeisu iyaka i lut al . Hi kite inoke i liwaliwan elal Yehoba wana abalogugui kaiwena .
44001004	Sauga hi migogo , inoke logugui ya i baunanik elal i ba , “ Bahi ga Yelusalema nuku eeguluwan , yaa nuku matamatan Nam wana bateli , toto iyaka ya baunan eliyamiu .
44001005	Diyon i pababitaisomiu wewel elana , yaa lan nige ni gegewi inoke Nam ni pababitaisomiu Yayaluwa Bwabwalena elana . ”
44001006	Sauga apostolowau hi migogo avaliya ge Yeisu inoke hi neli hi ba , “ Babala , tab sauga ya ama Isileli wama abalogugui nu pem pasikal eliyama ge totoma naha logugui-agima ? ”
44001007	Inoke i baek elal i ba , “ Nam totona i logugui , lan ge sauga totona i teli , inoke komiu nige bosowaimiu ana sauga nuku atena .
44001008	Yaa sauga ebo Yayaluwa Bwabwalena ni lau eliyamiu yaka gasisi nuku kalaopopwi , inoke komiu nuku tabwa no towasa Yelusalema , labi Yudiya bwalibwaligena ge Sameliya ge panayawi labena gegewel elal . ”
44001009	Wana baaba o i pwamowasi , inoke mataliyaa Yeisu i ha labulabumwa , ge yaluyalu i kaus nige al hi kikite .
44001010	Mataliya hi lihikan labulabumwa toto Yeisu i nonoek , inoke sauga o elana aneloseyau labui ali kaliko yayanana hi talmilil labeliyaa
44001011	ge hi ba , “ Gamagalau Galili , hauna kaiwena ku talmilil ge matamiu i haha labulabumwa ? Yeisu toto i egona elamiu ge i ha labulabumwa , abwe ni sikalim al ni ola to ku kite i ha labulabumwa . ”
44001012	Apostolowau hi sikalem Oya Olibe inoke hi na Yelusalema , hawawal o ana yapu i ola kilomita maisena ya . *
44001013	Sauga hi vin Yelusalema , inoke hi na hi ha limi gamwana natiya toto hi miminaa . Bolo hi miminaa o , heliya Pita , Diyon , Yemesa ge Andulu , Pilipi ge Tomas , Batolomiu ge Mataiyo , Yemesa Alipiyos natuna , Saimon toto i neem boda Seloti elal , ge Yudasa Yemesa natuna .
44001014	Bolo ya gegewel hi boda pamaisena hi mimi awaawanun , avaliyau yowau ge Meli toto Yeisu hinana ge Yeisu talinau .
44001015	Lan bolo o elal , sauga etega Pita i milil toabulilek gamwaliyaa , ali gewi i ola wan handeled ge tuwenti .
44001016	Yaka i ba , “ Taliwau ge nuwau , Buki Bwabwalena ana baaba iyaka i tabwa tunahot , toto Yayaluwa Bwabwalena i pamasal Deibid elana ge i lelelian Yudasa kaiwena . Iya te gamagalau i nulil yaka hi na Yeisu hi lib ge hi yowan .
44001017	Iya valila wama boda ana gamagal etegana ge Yeisu i hile aloma ha tuwalali toyawa . ”
44001018	( He Yudasa wana tuwalali nanakina molana mani hi pek , yaka i ahe ge bilibili etega i pwamolaya , inoke eliyana i gaisoguwa i tal aliga , tinena i maleli ge elokena i tagil .
44001019	Yelusalema ana tomina gegewel wasa ya hi hago , inoke heliya analiya elana bilibili o alana hi tun Akeldama , ana sapu heiya “ Panasasaliya . ” )
44001020	Pita i ba , “ Toto Deibid i lelelian Yudasa kaiwena , iyaka i tabwa tunahot , kaiwena buki Same elana i leli i ba , ‘ Wana limi ni ola galaluwan limena , bahi gamagal etega ni hoholave . ’ I ola al i leli i ba , ‘ Gamagal getoga abamina toto i minaa ni milahe . ’
44001021	Inoke gamagal etega ta hile ge Yudasa abana ni milahe , ni tabwa aloma etega yaka aloma Yeisu wana lut al wasana ana patunahot naha wasawasa-an . Gamagal o ta hileya gamagalau gamwaliyaa bolo alomeyau ya sauga bwalibwaligena , sauga toto Babala Yeisu aloma ha nawanawa , i telipunaa Diyon gamagalau i pababitaisoil ana siga lan toto Yeisu i egona eliyala ge i ha labulabumwa . ”
44001022	
44001023	Inoke bolau labui alaliya hi latahin : Yosepa , toto alana hi ba Basabas ( i ola al hi ba Diyastas ) , ge Mataiyas .
44001024	Inoke hi awanun hi ba , “ Babala , gamagalau gegewel wali nuwatu u atena . Inoke nu pankitema gamagalau labui ya henala toto iyaka u hile
44001025	ge Yudasa abana ni milahe ni tabwa apostolo , kaiwena Yudasa tuwalali toto ya i eguluwan , i aliga ge i nok i na Gehena . ”
44001026	Yaka bolau labui alaliya hi leli pat labui elal ge pat maisena hi ahe tagilan . Pat toto Mataiyas alana i miminaa te hi ahe , inoke iya i tabwa apostolowau ali toto elulutega maisena avaliya etegana al .
44002001	Sauga Yudiya wali hagali Pentikos hagalena ana lan i vin , toabulilek gegewel heliya iyoho hi migogo limi maisena elana .
44002002	Yaka butun etega i loem labulabumwa i ola mana gasigasisena butuna ge limi toto hi miminaa gamwana gegewena i pakalaopop .
44002003	Inoke bugul etega hi kite , ana awa i ola ginaha memena i lovaleyan i tala maisena ge maisena pwataliyaa .
44002004	Inoke hi gewigewi Yayaluwa Bwabwalena hi kalaopopwi ge hi telipuna anan getoga ona hi baubaunan , i ola Yayaluwa Bwabwalena wana pek .
44002005	Saugena o Yudiya gamagaliliyau bolo wali tapwalolo hi nuwahikan bubun hi gewi heliya iyoho Yelusalema , hi noem panuwa gegewel panayawi pwatanaa hagali kaiwena .
44002006	Sauga butun ya hi hago , yaka boda bwabwatana hi nogogo hi nowanik . Hi gewigewi nuwaliya hi ahe , kaiwena hi hago toabulilek hi baaba gamagal maisena ge maisena anana elana .
44002007	Ateliya i you ge hi nuwa gewagewa , inoke hi ba , “ Gamagalau bolo hi baaba ya , heliya Galili gamagaliliyau .
44002008	Ga i ola ge kila maisena maisena ta hagol hi baaba anala tomaha ge tomaha elana ?
44002009	Kilau ta neem Patiya , Midiya , ge Elam ; Mesopoteimiya , Yudiya , ge Kapadosiya ; Pontas ge Eisiya ;
44002010	ta neem al Piligiya , Pampiliya ge Itipita ge Libiya ana labi elal , bolo panuwa Sailini labenaa . Enuna ta neem Loma ,
44002011	kilau enuna Yudiya gamagaliliyau , enuna nige Yudiya gamagaliliyau i oola yaa Yudiya wali tapwalolo iyaka ta ahe , ge kilau enuna ta neem Kiliti ge Alebiya — yaa kila maisena ge maisena ta hagol Yehoba wana ginol bwabwatal hi wasaan anala tomaha ge tomaha elana . ”
44002012	Gegewel ateliya i you ge nuwaliya i samwawinwin , inoke avaliyau hi nelil hi ba , “ Bugul ya ana sapu ga i ola ? ”
44002013	Yaa enuna toabulilek hi talawasi-agil hi ba , “ Gamagalau ya oine hi im nabiyan . ”
44002014	Inoke Pita i milil , alonau ge alonau ali toto elulutega maisena , ge i baaba boda elal , anana i bwata , i ba , “ Taliwau ge nuwau , Yudiya gamagaliliyau ge Yelusalema ana tomina ku gewigewi , no baaba nuku hago ge nuwamiu ni sapu .
44002015	Ama nige ha iim kokona i oola wami nuwatu . Sauga ya naen kilok mweluluga ya te , ge nige kila wala pagan i oola tage oine ta im mweluluge .
44002016	Bugul toto sauga ya ku kite heiya toto palopita Yoeli i baunan , i ba :
44002017	Yehoba i ba , ‘ Sauga mowamowasena elana , Yayaluwau na ligin gamagalau gegewel elal . Inoke natumiyau melubolau ge meluyowau nihi palopisai , i ola al wami hevalau ge wami tonowakau pankite ge kenonou toto i neem Yehoba elana nihi kite ge nihi kenonouan .
44002018	Ibwe , lan bolo o elal , Yayaluwau na ligin al no totuwalali melubolau ge meluyowau elal , inoke nihi palopisai .
44002019	Ginol yawiyawi na ginolil labulabumwa , sabwelu ni gogou ge waikena ni ket ni ola saliya ; ge abapankite na ginolil panayawiya , saliya , ginaha ge kasu babalona nihi masal . Mulaa abwe Babala wana lan bwabwatana ge wawasana ni vin .
44002020	
44002021	Ge inoke henala ebo labe kaiwena ni awanun Babala elana mwal ni pwawa . ’ ”
44002022	Pita i ba al i ba , “ Gamagalau Isileli , ku laegan no baaba ya elana ! Yehoba i pankitemiu tunahot iya wana totuwalali te Yeisu , kaiwena gasisi ge ginol yawiyawi i talamwan Yeisu i ginolil . Iyaka ku atena to , kaiwena i ginol gamwamiwa .
44002023	Houhouwena Yehoba i nuwatu haba Yeisu kaiwena inoke i talamwan nimamiwa inoke alomiyau ge Loma , gamagalau nanakil , ku lokolosan ge i yaomal .
44002024	Yaa Yehoba i palutem salaiya ge i pwamwalem yaomal wana gasisi elana , kaiwena yaomal nige i bosowaina ni kukuhikan .
44002025	He Yeisu bana te Deibid i ba ola hiwe : Yehoba ya kite i houwaagau sauga gegewena , nige na lamwalamwaniu kaiwena iya i minaa labewa .
44002026	Heiya te kaiwena nuwawaisi ateu i kalaopopwi ge no baaba i yaliyaliyaya . Bwagana ebo abwe na aliga , Yehoba wam bateli ya nuwahikan ge ateu i matuwaan ,
44002027	kaiwena nige nu teteli yohau salaiya , nige nu tatalam wam totuwalali bwabwalena tuwana ni bweyan .
44002028	Yawal ana kamwasa iyaka u pankiteyau , wam yaliyaya ni pakala-opopwau kaiwena maninimwa na minaa .
44002029	“ Taliwau ge nuwau , na ba bubun ya . Tubula kin Deibid i yaomal ge hi yamwi , salaina iyahe te i minamina lan ebe .
44002030	Yaa iya palopita , ge i atena Yehoba bateli gasigasisena etegana i ginol te tubutubunina etega ni tabwa kin ni ola iya .
44002031	Inoke i kite pahuwala hauna abwe Yehoba ni ginol , yaka Mesaiya wana lut al bana i ba : ‘ Yehoba nige i teteli yoho salaiya , tuwana nige ni bwebweyan . ’
44002032	Yeisu toto ya Yehoba i palutem yaomala , ge ama ha kite ha tabwa ana towasa .
44002033	I ha labulabumwa i minaa Yehoba labena awonaa , yaka Yayaluwa Bwabwalena i aheya Tamana elana i ola wana bateli . Inoke i ligin eliyama ge bugul bolo sauga ya ku kite ge ku hago hi masal .
44002034	He nige Deibid i haha labulabumwa , yaa iya i ba : Yehoba i baek no Babala elana i ba , ‘ U misiyowa labeu awowa
44002035	inoke am topihigelgel na teli lowagil aem gabulanaa . ’
44002036	“ Gamagalau Isileli ku gewigewi , nuku atena bubun Yeisu toto komiu ku lokolosan , Yehoba i teli heyan iya Babala ge Mesaiya . ”
44002037	Sauga gamagalau baaba ya hi hago , yaka hi nuwanuwatu nabi , inoke hi baek Pita ge apostolowau gegewel elal hi ba , “ Talimeyau , hauna naha ginol ? ”
44002038	Pita analiya i lahe i ba , “ Maisena ge maisena wami gegi ana en nuku pek ge nuku babitaiso Yeisu Keliso alana elana , inoke wami gegi Yehoba ni nuwayoho . Yaka Yayaluwa Bwabwalena nasi nuku ahe , iya Yehoba wana mulolu .
44002039	Kaiwena Yehoba bateli ya i ginol kaiwemiu , tubumiyau kaiweliya , ge gamagalau gegewel bolo wali panuwa ana bwaga i yapu kaiweliya — gegewel bolo ebo Yehoba wala Yabowaine ni yogaagil nihi nem elana . ”
44002040	Baaba hi gewi al Pita i baunan elal ge i ba pagasisel i ba , “ Nuku pwamwalimiu , bahi heyan nanakil ya ali lahi nuku pwapwawa . ”
44002041	Bolo Pita wana papaatena hi abulilek-an hi pababitaisoil , inoke lan o gamagalau ali gewi tili tausan hi tuk ge ali boda hi paetulan .
44002042	Toabulilek bolo o hi talamwagil sauga gegewena apostolowau wali papaatena nihi hago , nihi mipamaisena avaliyau ge wali pan toabulilek , nihi anan toyawa Yeisu wana yaomal ana nuwahikan kaiwena , ge nihi awaawanun Yehoba elana .
44002043	Apostolowau ginol yawiyawi ge abanuwa ahi i gewi hi ginolil inoke gamagalau gegewel hi kite , ginebi wali lovakun ge awatauwan .
44002044	Sauga gegewena toabulilek hi heliheliyam toyawa ge wali bugubugul ana nuwatu eliyalil i ola te gegewel wali bugul .
44002045	Wali bugubugul ge wali gogomwau nihi paliagil inoke molana mani nihi ahe ge nihi pek henala ebo ana pulowan i gan eliyana .
44002046	Lan maisena ge maisena ali pwahin elana hi mimigogo Limi Bwabwalena gamwanaa . Wali limi elal , ginebi wali hanalau ge wali yaliyaya , hi anan toyawa Yeisu wana yaomal hi nuwahikan ,
44002047	ge Yehoba hi tobatobal-an . Inoke gamagalau gegewel toabulilek wali ginol hi awa wawaisi-an . Lan maisena ge maisena Babala gamagalau enuna al i pwapwamwalil , inoke ali boda i papaetulan .
44003001	Lan etega tili kilok kokoyaviya , awanun ana sauga elana , Pita ge Diyon hi nok hi na Limi Bwabwalena awanun kaiwena .
44003002	Abauluulutuk elana , toto alana hi ba “ Waiwaisana ” , tau etega iyoho aena i nak , i nakek hinana tinenaa . Lan gegewena nihi kalivai pwatanik Limi Bwabwalena ana abauluulutuk elana ge ni awaawanun mani kaiwena gamagalau elal , bolo hi uluulutuk Limi Bwabwalena elana .
44003003	Sauga Pita ge Diyon i kitel hi uluulutuk Limi Bwabwalena elana , yaka i awanun elal tage mani etega nihi pek elana .
44003004	Inoke Pita ge Diyon mataliya hi lihikan elana , ge Pita i ba , “ Matam i nem eliyama . ”
44003005	Inoke i gayawaagil ge i nuwatu tage bugul etega ni pwawa eliyalil .
44003006	Inoke Pita i ba , “ Silba ge gold nige i gagan eliyau , yaa toto i gan eliyau , nasi na pewa : Yeisu Keliso gagama Nasaleta alana elana ya ba , ‘ U milil ge u nawanawa . ’ ”
44003007	Yaka i aheya nimana awonaa ge i kukupamilil . Sauga o elana aena ana tubwi gegewena hi gasisi ,
44003008	i misupeni ge i talmilil , yaka i telipuna i nawanawa . Inoke alonau Pita ge Diyon hi ulutuk Limi Bwabwalena elana , i nawanawa , i susupeni ge Yehoba i tobatobal-an .
44003009	Gamagalau gegewel hi kite i nawanawa ge Yehoba i tobatobal-an ,
44003010	inoke hi atena iya tau toto i mimisiyowa abauluulutuk toto hi ba “ Waiwaisana ” ge i awaawanun mani kaiwena . Inoke ateliya i you ge nuwaliya hi ahe wana molu kaiwena .
44003011	Tau o Pita ge Diyon tuwaliya i lib hikan , heliya iyoho abanawanawa etega Limi Bwabwalena ana gana gamwanaa alana hi ba “ Solomon wana Epanapana ” . Gamagalau nuwaliya hi ahe wana molu kaiwena inoke hi patalelu nok elal .
44003012	Sauga Pita gamagalau i kitel , i baek elal i ba , “ Gamagalau Isileli , ga i ola bugul ya kaiwena ge nuwamiu ku ahe ? Hauna kaiwena ku gagayawa-agima ? Age ku nuwatu tage ama wama waisi i gan Yehoba matanaa o ebo totoma wama gasisi i gan , inoke eliyana tau ya ha pwamolu ge i nawanawa ?
44003013	Nigeya , yaa bugul ya i masal kaiwena tubulau wali Yabowaine , Abalahama , Aisake ge Yakobo wali Yabowaine , wana totuwalali Yeisu iyaka i teli heyan abamina wawasana i ahe . Komiu valila Yeisu ku teli tologugui nimaliyaa , ge bwagana Pilato nuwana ni sokal , komiu ku towani .
44003014	Yeisu iya tau bwabwalena ge sasapona , yaa komiu ku towani , yaka ku awanun Pilato elana ku ba , ‘ Totaulol u sokal kaiwema . ’
44003015	Ku ba ola o inoke abwe Yawal Puna ku lokolosan i aliga , yaa Yehoba i palutem yaomala . He ama iyaka ha kite to inoke ha wasawasa-an .
44003016	Yeisu alana ha meltelian inoke alana ana gasisi elana tau ya molu ge gasisi i pwawa . He iya ku atena bubun ge sauga ya ku kite i talmilil . Ha melteli Yeisu elana inoke matamiwa molu hot i pwawa .
44003017	“ He taliwau ge nuwau , ya atena pagan toto alomiyau wami tonowakau ku ginola Yeisu elana , ku ginol ya , ana sapu nige ku aatena .
44003018	Yaa ku ginol i ola , inoke Yehoba wana baaba i patunahot , toto valila i baunan palopitau gegewel awaliyaa , i ba , ‘ No Mesaiya abwe lomwan ni pwawa . ’
44003019	Inoke wami pagan nanakina ana en nuku pek ge nuku awona pil Yehoba elana , inoke wami gegi ni ul yoho .
44003020	Ebo nuku ginol ola o , inoke Babala alomiu ge yawalimiu ni pagasisi , ge Yeisu ni patuna , iya Mesaiya toto i hile kaiwemiu .
44003021	Iya ni miminaa ga labulabumwa , ana siga Yehoba bugul gegewena ni pavavaluna , ni ola wana bateli sauga houhouwena wana palopitau bwabwalel awaliyaa .
44003022	Yehoba Mesaiya ni patuna , ni ola valila Mosese i ba , ‘ Yehoba wami Yabowaine abwe palopita etega ni patuna eliyamiu ni ola nau i patunau , iya ni noem wami boda gamwanaa . Hauna gun ni baunan eliyamiu , nuku hago .
44003023	Henala ebo palopita ya anana nige ni hahago , Yehoba ni ahek yoho hoti wana gamagalau elal . ’
44003024	“ Ge i ola al , palopitau gegewel bolo hi papaatena , i telipunaa Samuwela ge bolo awonaa , hi wasawasa-an hauna abwe ni masal sauga ya elana .
44003025	Yehoba wana bateli bolo palopitau hi baunan , he komiu kaiwemiu . Ge bateli toto Yehoba i ginol alonau ge tubulau , he komiu al kaiwemiu . Yehoba i baek Abalahama elana i ba , ‘ Tubutubunim eliyana gamagalau gegewel panayawiya na ba muloluagil ge waisi nihi pwawa . ’
44003026	Inoke Yehoba wana totuwalali i hile ge i patuna houwan ga eliyamiu , iya ni ba muloluagimiu ge wami pagan nanakina ana en nuku pek inoke waisi nuku pwawa . ”
44004001	Pita ge Diyon heliya iyoho hi baaba gamagalau elal , inoke topowon avaliyau Limi Bwabwalena ana pulisiman wali tohouwa ge Sadiusi hi nok hi na elal .
44004002	Heliya hi huga kaiwena apostolowau gamagalau hi pankitel hi ba , “ Yeisu iyaka i lut al inoke ta atena toyaomal abwe nihi lut . ”
44004003	Yaka hi libil ge hi na hi telel dela ana siga lan ni gan inoke abwe nihi pakotil , kaiwena iyaka bulin i gan .
44004004	Yaa bolo Pita ge Diyon wali papaatena hi hago hi gewi hi abulilek , inoke toabulilek bolau ali gewi i tal ha kelaubwa ni ola paib tausan .
44004005	Lan i gan inoke Yudiya wali tapwalolo ana tologugui , ge wali tohouwa ge Logugui ana topankite hi nogogo Yelusalema .
44004006	Topowon bwabwatana Anasa iyoho avaliya , ge i ola al Kaiyapa , Diyon , Aleksenda ge topowon bwabwatana ana tiniyau enuna al .
44004007	Pita ge Diyon hi pamililil mataliyaa ge hi nelil hi ba , “ Henala wana gasisi elana ge henala alana elana bugul ya ku ginol ? ”
44004008	Pita Yayaluwa Bwabwalena i kalaopopwi inoke i baek elal i ba , “ Ama gamagalau wama tologugui ge wama tohouwa komiu !
44004009	Lan ebe ku nelima kaiwena tau aena i nak ha labe yaka ku ba , ‘ Ga i ola ge i molu ? ’
44004010	Inoke nuwama nuku atena ge gamagalau Isileli gegewel nihi atena : Yeisu Keliso gagama Nasaleta , iya ku lokolosan yaa Yehoba i palutem yaomala , alana elana tau ya i talmilil matamiwa ge i molu bubun .
44004011	Yeisu bana te Buki Bwabwalena i ba , ‘ Pat toto komiu totaltal ku awa nanakan ge ku towani , Yehoba iyaka i ahe limi ana kokola gasigasisena i ginoliya . ’
44004012	Iya ya te bosowaina ni pwamwalila ; nige alan etega al i gagan gamagalau elal panayawi pwatanaa ge eliyana pwamwal ta pwawa . ”
44004013	Tologugui Pita ge Diyon wali atimatuwa hi kite , i ola al hi atena heliya gamagalau bwagabwaga ya , nige wali vavasili i bwabwata . Inoke nuwaliya hi ahe ge hi atena te valila heliya avaliya Yeisu .
44004014	Tau toto abwe i molu hi kite alonau Pita ge Diyon hi taltalmilil , inoke nige bosowailiya Pita anana nihi lahe .
44004015	Yaka hi ba hi na hi tagil noleleya ge heliya ya totoliya hi liwaliwan ,
44004016	hi ba , “ Bolau ya ga ta ola-agil ? Gamagalau gegewel Yelusalema hi atena bubun ginol yawiyawi bwabwatana ya hi ginol nige bosowaina ta alahan .
44004017	Yaa ta labose bugul ya ta paveyaho bahi wasana ni lelelu gamagalau elal , inoke ta ba bolau ya elal bahi sauga etega al alan ya nihi papaatena-an gamagalau elal . ”
44004018	Inoke hi yogaagil al ge hi sikal , ge hi baek elal hi ba , “ Bahi sauga etega Yeisu alana nuku papaatena-an ge nuku panpankiti-an . ”
44004019	Analiya Pita ge Diyon hi lahe hi ba , “ Ku nuwatu ga hauna toto i sapu Yehoba matanaa , anamiu naha hago o ebo Yehoba anana naha hago ?
44004020	Kaiwena bugul bolo ha kite ge ha hago , kaiweliya nige bosowaima naha bakuhu baaba . ”
44004021	Yaka hi ba lopwalil nabiyan ge hi ba , “ Ebo Yeisu wasana nuku wasaan al , nasi nak etega naha ginol eliyamiu . ” Hi ba ola o inoke abwe hi sokalil . Nige kamwasa etega hi nunuwatu pwawa ge tage nihi lahel , kaiwena gamagalau Pita ge Diyon wali ginol hi kite ge Yehoba hi tobalan .
44004022	He tau toto Yehoba wana gasisi elana ge hi pwamolu , wana baliman poti iyaka i eguluwai .
44004023	Tologugui Pita ge Diyon hi sokalil i mowasi , yaka hi sikal hi na avaliyau eliyalil , inoke topowon bwabwatal ge tohouwa wali baaba hi wasaan elal .
44004024	Wasa ya hi hago , inoke gegewel wali nuwatu maisena hi awanun Yehoba elana hi ba , “ Babala , owa labulabum , panayawi ge hoga , ge buguliliyau gegewel ali toginol owa .
44004025	Yayaluwa Bwabwalena wana gasisi elana valila u baaba wam totuwalali Deibid awanaa , iya tubuma , u ba : Hauna kaiwena ge boda enuna hi awatautau Yehoba elana ? He gamagalau wali nuwatu hi pamaisena nuwaliya nihi haveyan Yehoba elana , yaa nasi nige bosowailiya nihi ginol .
44004026	Panayawi ana kin ona lohaveyan kaiwena hi lovivina-agil , ge tologugui ona hi boda pamaisena tage nihi lohaveyan Yehoba ge wana hilihili gamagalina elal .
44004027	He iyaka i tabwa tunahot , kaiwena panuwa ya elana Helodi ge Pontiyas Pilato , avaliyau bolo nige Isileli gamagaliliyau i oola , ge avaliyau al boda Isileli , hi boda pamaisena nihi lohaveyan wam totuwalali bwabwalena toto wam hilihili gamagalina , iya Yeisu , elana .
44004028	Hi boda pamaisena inoke bugul gegewena toto wam nuwatu elana u logugui-an houwan tage abwe ni masal , heliya iyaka hi ginol .
44004029	Babala , ewasi wali ba lolopwal ge wali ba palopalovakun eliyama u hago . Nimwam gasigasisena nu paelu , inoke wam totuwalali bwabwalena Yeisu alana elana tokasiyebwa naha pwamolol , ge ginol yawiyawi ge abanuwa ahi naha ginolil , inoke ama wam totuwalali wam baaba naha wasaan alona ge wama atimatuwa . ”
44004030	
44004031	Sauga wali awanun hi pwamowasi , limi toto elana hi migogowa i lamwalamwaniu . Hi gewigewi Yayaluwa Bwabwalena hi kalaopopwi , inoke ginebi ge wali atimatuwa Yehoba wana baaba hi wasaan .
44004032	Toabulilek gegewel wali nuwatu maisena , ge wali bugul gegewena hi talamwan avaliyau elal , nige etega tage ni ba , “ Totou no bugul . ”
44004033	Apostolowau ginebi ge wali gasisi Babala Yeisu wana lut al hi wasaan ge Yehoba toabulilek gegewel i muloluagil nabiyan .
44004034	Gamwaliyaa nige togulagula hot etega i gagan . Bolo wali bilibili ge wali limi i gan , nihi palian ge mani nihi ahe
44004035	nihi na nihi pek apostolowau elal , inoke heliya abwe nihi guyauan nihi pek henala ebo i pulowan eliyana .
44004036	Tau etega alana Yosepa , ana un Libai , i neem taval Saipilosi , alana labuina apostolowau hi tun Banabas , ana sapu heiya “ Toba pagasisi . ”
44004037	Tau ya wana bilibili etega i palian , inoke mani i ahe ge i na i pek apostolowau elal .
44005001	Tau etega alana Ananaiyasi , alona ge lagona Sapaila wali bilibili hi palian inoke manina hi ahe .
44005002	Ali toto labui wali nuwatu hi pamaisena , inoke tau mani awalehina i kukuhikan ge awalehina i na i pek apostolowau elal .
44005003	Pita i baek Ananaiyasi elana i ba , “ Hauna kaiwena Seitani atem i pakalaopop ge wam nuwatu i logugui-an inoke Yayaluwa Bwabwalena u kakawe ? U kite , wam bilibili molana awalehina iyaka u ahe totom kaiwem .
44005004	Sauga bilibili o i minaa eliyam , he owa u logugui-an . Iyaka u palian , he manina owa wam mani . I bwe ge u nuwatu kakawi nu ginol tage mani gegewena te u pwatanim ? Ama nige u kakakawema , yaa Yehoba te u kakawe . ”
44005005	Sauga Ananaiyasi baaba o i hago , inoke i sogu ge i aliga . Inoke gamagalau gegewel bolo wasa o hi hago hi lovakun nabi .
44005006	Yaka hevalau hi lut , tuwana hi os ge hi kalivai tagilan , hi na hi teli salaiya .
44005007	Sauga ana yapu i ola auwa eton abwe Sapaila i na i tuk , nige i aatena te lagona iyaka i yaomal .
44005008	Abwe Pita i nel elana i ba , “ U ba bubun eliyau , alom ge lagom Ananaiyasi wami bilibili molana iyai ya e ? ” Anana i lahe i ba , “ Ibwe , gegewena iyai ya te . ”
44005009	Inoke Pita i baek elana i ba , “ Ga i ola ge alom lagom ku nuwatu tage Babala Yayaluwana nuku kakawe ge nige lahi nuku pwapwawa ? U kite , bolau bolo hi na lagom hi teli salaiya , heliya iyahe te hi nenem , nasi owa al nihi kalivaiwa . ”
44005010	Sauga o elana i sogu , i tala Pita aenaa ge i aliga . Yaka hevalau hi nem hi tuk , hi kite iyaka i aliga , inoke hi kaval tagilan ge hi na hi teli lagona labenaa .
44005011	Inoke toabulilek bwalibwaligel ge bolo al wasa o hi hago hi lovakun nabi .
44005012	Apostolowau ginol yawiyawi ge abanuwa ahi i gewi hi ginolil gamagalau mataliyaa . Sauga gegewena toabulilek gegewel nihi migogo Limi Bwabwalena labena etega elana , alana hi tun “ Solomon wana Epanapana . ”
44005013	Gamagalau getogal hi lovakun nige hi nonoek toabulilek ali boda elana , yaa gamagalau gegewel toabulilek hi awatauwagil ge hi awa wawaisi-agil .
44005014	Inoke toabulilek ali boda i bwatabwata ya , kaiwena bolau ge yowau hi gewi hi abulilek Babala elana .
44005015	Gamagalau apostolowau wali tuwalali hi kite , yaka hi na tokasiyebwa hi ahel ge hi pwatanim kamwasaa , abaliya hi yao ge hi pakenol , inoke sauga ebo Pita ni nawanawa ge liguligumwina ni tupa elal , yaka nihi molu .
44005016	Gamagalau hi gewi hi noem awan kekeisi bolo hi minaa Yelusalema labenaa , inoke tokasiyebwa ge bolo yayaluwa bibikel hi ulutuk elal hi pwatanik apostolowau elal ge gegewel hi pwamolol .
44005017	Topowon bwabwatal wali tohouwa alonau ge ana tolabe gegewel , heliya hi neem boda Sadiusi , apostolowau hi lamwa pulowanagil ,
44005018	inoke hi libil ge hi na hi telel dela .
44005019	Yaa bulina Babala wana anelose etega i na del ana nog i pwela , inoke apostolowau i en tagilagil . Abwe i baek elal i ba ,
44005020	“ Ku nok , ku na ku talmilila Limi Bwabwalena gamwanaa , inoke yawal vavaluna wasana nuku wasaan bubun gamagalau elal . ”
44005021	Mweluluga kekeisi inoke hi ginol i ola anelose wana baaba eliyalil , hi na hi ulutuk Limi Bwabwalena gamwanaa ge hi telipuna hi panpankiti gamagalau elal . Abwe topowon bwabwatal wali tohouwa alonau ge ana tolabe hi nem ge Yudiya wali tologugui gegewel hi yogaagil wali nogogo kaiwena , yaka gamagalau enuna hi patunal hi na dela tage apostolowau nihi enil .
44005022	Yaa sauga hi na hi vin dela , nige apostolowau hi pwapwawal . Inoke hi sikal ge hi na hi wasa tologugui elal hi ba ,
44005023	“ Sauga ha na ha vin dela , ha kite nog hi kaus bubun , tomatahikan al ha kitel iyoho hi taltalmilil nog elana , yaa sauga nog ha pwela ge ha ulutuk , apostolowau nige hi gagan . ”
44005024	Baaba o hi hago inoke topowon bwabwatal ge Limi Bwabwalena ana pulisiman wali tohouwa nuwaliya i gewagewa , hi ba , “ Heliya eba ga ? Hauna gun abwe ni gan ? ”
44005025	Abwe tau etega i na elal ge i ba , “ Apostolowau bolo ku telel dela , heliya iyoho to hi talmilil Limi Bwabwalena gamwanaa ge hi panpankiti gamagalau elal . ”
44005026	Sauga o elana Limi Bwabwalena ana pulisiman wali tohouwa , alonau ge wana boda enuna , hi na apostolowau hi ahel ge hi pwatanik tologugui elal . He hi na hi ahel kekeisi kekeisi , nige tuwaliya hi eemutan , kaiwena hi lovakun ebo nasi gamagalau nihi huga elal ge nihi loipatagil .
44005027	Sauga apostolowau hi ahel ge hi pwatanik Yudiya wali tologugui elal , hi na hi pamililil mataliyaa inoke topowon bwabwatal wali tohouwa i baek elal i ba ,
44005028	“ Iyaka ha lopwalimiu nabiyan bahi Yeisu alana nuku papaatena-an . Yaa bwagana ha lopwalimiu , komiu iyaka wasa ya ku palelu Yelusalema gamwanaa , nunuwamiu hot nuku wolema tage ama tau ya ha lopaaliga . ”
44005029	Pita ge alonau anana hi lahe hi ba , “ Yehoba heiya te anana naha hago houwan , mulaa abwe gamagal .
44005030	Tubulau wali Yabowaine Yeisu i palutem yaomala , toto ku pakuki kolos elana ge ku lopaaliga .
44005031	Yehoba iyaka i teli heyan i minaa nimana labena awonaa , iya wala Tohouwa ge wala Topwamwal . Inoke Yeisu eliyana bosowaina Isileli wali gegi ana en nihi pek ge Yehoba wali gegi ni nuwayoho .
44005032	Ama bugul ya ha atena inoke wasana ha wasawasa-an , i ola al Yayaluwa Bwabwalena , toto Yehoba i pek gamagalau elal bolo wana baaba hi hago . ”
44005033	Yudiya wali tologugui wali baaba o hi hago , inoke hi huga nabi ge nuwaliya apostolowau nihi lopaaligal .
44005034	Yaa avaliya etegana alana Gameliyel , iya Palisi wali boda ge Logugui ana topanpankiti , i ola al gamagalau gegewel hi awatauwan , i lut inoke i ba apostolowau nihi enil nihi tagil noleleya sauga kekeisi .
44005035	Inoke abwe i baek wana pan tologugui elal i ba , “ Isileli gamagaliliyau , ku nuwatu bubun , mulaa abwe bolau ya ali logugui nuku ginol .
44005036	Valila Teudasi i masal ge i ba tage iya tohouwa bwabwatana etega . Wana boda i ahel ali gewi po handeled ( 400 ) , yaa abwe hi lol ge i aliga , yaka ana tototoulil hi tatawaliwali inoke wana boda i mowasi ge nige al hi gagan .
44005037	Mulaa abwe Yudasa etegana , toto gagama Galili , i masal , sauga toto Loma gamagalau ali gewi hi ahe ge alaliya hi leli lowan alan ana buki elana . Yudasa gamagalau hi gewi i ahel ge i nulil , yaa iya al hi lol ge i aliga , yaka ana tototoulil hi tatawaliwali .
44005038	Inoke sauga ya na baewa eliyamiu , bahi bugul etega nuku giginol bolau ya elal . Ku sokalil ya , kaiwena ebo totoliya ya wali nuwatu elana ge bugul ya hi awaawaginol , he abwe ni mowasi .
44005039	Yaa ebo nuwatu o i neem Yehoba elana , nige bosowaimiu bolau ya nuku lopwalil . He nasi abwe totomiu nuku atena age ku haveyan Yehoba elana . ”
44005040	Gameliyel wana baaba alonau hi yaliyaya-an , inoke apostolowau hi yoga tukagil ge hi nibihil , hi baek elal bahi Yeisu alana nihi babaunan al , inoke abwe hi sokalil .
44005041	Yaka apostolowau tologugui hi eguluwagil , ginebi ge wali yaliyaya bwabwatana , kaiwena Yehoba wana nuwatu i ola heliya bosowailiya Yeisu alana kaiwena lomwan nihi pwawa .
44005042	Lan maisena ge maisena Limi Bwabwalena elana ge gamagalau wali limiya , hi panpankiti ge wasa waiwaisana hi papaatena-an , hi ba , “ Yeisu iya Mesaiya . ”
44006001	Toabulilek ali pwahin iyaka i bwabwata heheya , inoke sauga o elana bolo hi papana Gilik hi lovehawol bolo hi papana Yudiya kaiweliya , hi ba , “ Lan maisena ge maisena ebo aanan ku guguyau abuabulau elal , ama wama abuabulau nige ku nunuwahikagil . ”
44006002	Inoke apostolowau ali toto elulutega eluwa toabulilek hi yogaagil ge hi ba , “ Nige bosowaina Yehoba wana baaba ana papaatena naha towani ge aanan kaiwena naha tuwalali .
44006003	Talimeyau ge numeyau , gamwamiwa bolau ali toto seben nuku hilel , bolo Yayaluwa Bwabwalena ge siba hi kalaopopwi , ge tuwalali ya naha pek elal nihi matahikan .
44006004	Inoke ama wama sauga bwalibwaligena naha talamwan awanun kaiwena , ge i ola al Yehoba anana ana papaatena kaiwena . ”
44006005	Toabulilek ali pwahin gegewel apostolowau wali nuwatu hi yaliyaya-an , inoke gamagalau bolo ya hi hilel : Sitibeni , iya toabulilek hot ge Yayaluwa Bwabwalena i kalaopopwi , Pilipi , Polokolas , Nikano , Timon , Pamenas ge Nikolas , iya gagama Antiyok yaa valila i abulilek Yudiya wali tapwalolo elana .
44006006	Bolau ya hi pamililil apostolowau mataliyaa , yaka apostolowau hi awanun kaiweliya ge nimaliya hi teli kokowaliyaa , yaka hi pwabwabwalena-agil tuwalali kaiwena .
44006007	Yaka Yehoba anana gamagalau hi gewi hi abulilek-an . Inoke toabulilek ali pwahin Yelusalema elana iyaka i bwabwata heheya , ge topowon hi gewi al wasa waiwaisana hi hago ge hi abulilek-an .
44006008	Inoke Sitibeni , iya Yehoba wana mulolu ge wana gasisi i kalaopopwi , ginol yawiyawi ge abanuwa ahi i ginolil gamagalau mataliyaa .
44006009	Inoke gamagalau enuna Sitibeni hi pihigelgel-an , heliya hi minaa Yudiya wali tapwalolo ana pwahin etega alana hi tun “ Sokasokalima ” , hi neem panuwa Sailini ge Aleksendaliya . Heliya ge Yudiya enuna al , bolo hi noem labi Silisiya ge Eisiya , avaliya ge Sitibeni hi awabalgig .
44006010	Yaa nige bosowailiya Sitibeni nihi ba pakokove , kaiwena wana baaba sisibana i neem Yayaluwa Bwabwalena elana .
44006011	Inoke hi na gamagalau enuna nuwaliya hi gove sumel , hi ba , “ Nuku na nuku ba ola hiwe , ‘ Ama ha hago , wana baaba eliyana Mosese ge Yehoba i teli lowagil . ’ ”
44006012	Baaba ya kaiwena gamagalau hi pahugal nabiyan , i ola al tohouwa ge Logugui ana topankite . Yaka hi na Sitibeni hi yowan ge hi pwatanik Yudiya wali tologugui bwabwatal elal .
44006013	Inoke gamagalau enuna hi ahel hi en tukagil ge ba kakakawi enuna hi baunan hi ba , “ Tau ya sauga gegewena wala Limi Bwabwalena ge Mosese wana Logugui i sinaliagil .
44006014	Ha hago i ba tage Yeisu gagama Nasaleta Limi Bwabwalena ya ni pasamwalekaleka , ge wala mumuga paganina toto i noem Mosese elana , tage ni pil ge getogal ni teli . ”
44006015	Tomigogo o gegewel mataliya hi lipwatanek Sitibeni elana , inoke maninina hi kite ana awa i ola anelose etega maninina .
44007001	Inoke topowon bwabwatal wali tohouwa Sitibeni i neli i ba , “ Ga i ola wali woliwoli kaiwem , baaba hot o nigeya ? ”
44007002	Sitibeni anana i lahe i ba , “ Taliwau ge tamwawau , no baaba ya nuku hago . Yehoba Towasawasa valila i masal tubula Abalahama elana , sauga toto iya iyoho labi Mesopoteimiya , mulaa abwe i nok i miminaa awan Halani .
44007003	Yehoba i baek elana i ba , ‘ Wam panuwa ge am un gamagaliliyau nu eguluwagil , inoke nu nok nu na panuwa toto abwe na pankitewa . ’
44007004	Inoke Abalahama labi Koldiya i eguluwan ge i nok i miminaa panuwa Halani . Tamana wana yaomal enaa , inoke Yehoba i patuna i nem panuwa ya elana , sauga ya ta miminaa .
44007005	Yehoba nige bilibili kekeisi etega i pepek Abalahama elana ge tage ni ahe totona wana bilibili . Yaa Yehoba i bateli labi ya ni pek iya alonau ge tubunau bolo heyan mul elal nihi ahe wali bilibili . He Abalahama nige ga natuna i gagan te Yehoba bateli o i ginol .
44007006	Ge Yehoba i baek eliyana i ba , ‘ Tubumwau abwe nihi mibwabwali panuwa getoga elana , inoke tonpanuwa tuwalali pupulowanil nihi pek elal nihi ginol , ge baliman po handeled nihi miloloyowan panuwa o elana .
44007007	Gamagalau bolo tubumwau nihi paloloyowan-agil ali lahi na pek , inoke tubumwau abwe nihi tagilem panuwa o elana ge nihi kululu elau labi ya elana . ’
44007008	Yaka Yehoba bateli etega i ginol alona ge Abalahama hi pebabateli-agil , ge i ba bolau tuwaliya buhuna kunisina nihi gotomwa yoho bateli o ana etotohi . Abalahama i ab natuna Aisake , yaka lan eit i mowasi tuwana buhuna kunisina i gotomwa yoho . Aisake i ab natuna Yakobo , ge Yakobo i ab natunau kilau tubulau houhouwel ali toto elulutega eluwa .
44007009	Etega gamwaliyaa alana Yosepa , talinau ali toto elulutega maisena hi lamwa pulowanan , yaka hi palian gamagalau enuna elal ge hi pwatanik Itipita elana i tabwa totuwalali loloyowanina . Yaa Yehoba iya alona ,
44007010	inoke i pwamwal ana pulowan bwalibwaligena elal . Siba waiwaisana i pek elana , inoke Pelo , Itipita wali kin , i kite pwawa ge Yosepa i awa wawaisi-an . Yaka Pelo Yosepa i teli Itipita gegewena ge kin totona wana awan ni logugui-an .
44007011	Abwe galebu bwabwatana i masal Itipita bwalibwaligena ge i ola al Kenani , inoke minanakina i masal ge tubulau nige aliya .
44007012	Yakobo wasa i hago tage aanan iyoho Itipita , yaka natunau melubolau , kila tubulau , i patunal hi nok hi na Itipita , wali nok ya nok houhouwena .
44007013	Sauga hi sikal al palabuina Itipita elana , inoke Yosepa totona i pamasal talinau elal , i ba , ‘ Nau talimiu Yosepa , ’ ge abwe kin Pelo Yosepa talinau i atenal .
44007014	Inoke Yosepa baaba i patuna tamana Yakobo ge tutunau bwalibwaligel nihi nem Itipita , gegewel ali gewi sebenti paib .
44007015	Yaka Yakobo i nok i na Itipita , inoke mulaa abwe iya ge natunau gegewel hi yaomala panuwa o elana .
44007016	Tuwaliya hi pwatanik panuwa Sekemi , hi teliya salai toto valila Abalahama mani enuna i ahe ge i pwamola un Heimo elal .
44007017	Yehoba wana bateli Abalahama elana ana sauga kelaubwa ni vin , he tubulau Isileli bolo hi miminaa Itipita hi talaabab ge hi gewi nabi .
44007018	Sauga o elana abwe kin etega , iya Yosepa nige i aatena , i tabwa Itipita wali kin .
44007019	Tubulau i paloloyowan-agil ge wana pagan i nak nabi elal , logugui i ginol natuliyau nihi telel noleleya ge nihi aliga .
44007020	Sauga o elana Mosese i masal , iya Yehoba wana nuwatu wawayana . Waikena eton tamana ge hinana hi matahikan limiya ,
44007021	abwe hi ahe hi teliya noleleya , yaka kin natuna meluyovana i ahe i matahikan i ola natuna .
44007022	Itipita wali siba gegewena Mosese hi pankite , inoke i tabwa tau gasigasisena wana baaba elana ge wana ginol elana .
44007023	Sauga Mosese iyaka wana baliman poti , i nuwatu ni nok ge wana pan Isileli ni kitel .
44007024	I nok , yaka gagama Itipita etega i kite Isileli gamagalina i nibinibihan , inoke i nok wana pan Isileli i labe ge Itipita tauina i tagapaaliga .
44007025	Mosese i nuwatu tage wana pan Isileli nihi atena ya tage iya nimana elana te Yehoba i lalabel , yaa nige hi nunuwatu ola .
44007026	Lan i gan , Isileli labui i kitel hi lolopwapwait , inoke i labose ge ni pabakuhol i ba , ‘ Alowau ! Komiu boda maisena ya . Hauna kaiwena alom ge alom ku lolopwapwait ? ’
44007027	Tau toto alona i lolol , Mosese i bibin payou ge i ba , ‘ Owa nige ama wama tologugui ge wama toyatala i oola .
44007028	Age nasi nu lolau ni ola nolu Itipita gamagalina u lol ? ’
44007029	Sauga Mosese baaba o i hago , inoke i lou i na i mibwabwali labi Midiyani . Yaka abwe i alolon ge natuliyau labui hi abiliek to .
44007030	Baliman poti i mowasi , abwe anelose etega i masal Mosese elana uleya oya Sainai labenaa , ana awa i ola ginaha memena i tautau ebwakil lamwanaa .
44007031	Sauga bugul ya i kite , atena i you ge i nok labenaa , nuwana ni kite bubun . Inoke Yehoba anana i hago i ba ,
44007032	‘ Nau tubumwau Abalahama , Aisake ge Yakobo wali Yabowaine . ’ Mosese i ginu lovakun kaiwena , ge maninina i teli kaus bahi al matana ni nonoek .
44007033	Yaka Yehoba i baek elana i ba , ‘ Aem ana os u leke yoho , kaiwena bilibili toto u talmilila , bilibili bwabwalena .
44007034	Iyaka ya kite Itipita no gamagalau hi paloloyowan-agil . Wali kahin iyaka ya hago , inoke ya lau ge na pwamwalil . U nem , ge na patunawa nu na Itipita . ’
44007035	He Mosese iya te valila gamagalau Isileli hi towani hi ba , ‘ Owa nige ama wama tologugui ge wama toyatala i oola . ’ Yaa Yehoba Mosese i patuna anelose anana elana , anelose toto i masala elana ebwakil lamwanaa , inoke i tabwa Isileli wali tologugui ge wali topwamwal .
44007036	Gamagalau i nulil hi tagila Itipita , ge ginol yawiyawi ge abanuwa ahi i ginolil Itipita gamwanaa , Hoga Keketina elana , ge i ola al uleya baliman ana gewi poti .
44007037	Ge Mosese iya te i baek gamagalau Isileli elal i ba , ‘ Yehoba abwe palopita etega ni patuna eliyamiu , ni ola nau i patunau , iya ni noem wami boda gamwanaa . ’
44007038	Iya te alonau tubulau hi migogo uleya , ge iya alona anelose , toto i baaba eliyana oya Sainai pwatanaa . Iya Yehoba wana baaba yawalina gaganina i ahe yaka i wasaan panetan kila eliyala .
44007039	Yaa tubulau nige Mosese anana hi hahago , hi towani ge nuwaliya nihi sikal Itipita .
44007040	Inoke hi baek Eloni elana hi ba , ‘ Tau Mosese toto i ahela ta tagila Itipita , ga i ola ? Nige ta aatena i bwe . Inoke wala yabowaine etega u ginol ge ni nulila . ’
44007041	Inoke sauga o elana gogoginol etega hi ginol , ana awa i ola bulumakau natuna . Bwasumu enuna hi pwatanim hi powonan elana , ge hagali hi ginol , inoke bugul toto nimaliyaa hi ginola hi awatauwan .
44007042	Inoke Yehoba ali en i pek , ge i pialiyohil ya nihi kululuek labulabum putumwiliyau elal , i ola palopita etega wana leleli i ba : Gamagalau Isileli ! Tage kaiweu ge bwasumu ku lolil ge ku powonagil uleya baliman poti ? He nigeya !
44007043	Tage o abakululu Petupatupa Limena ku kalivai ? He nigeya ! Yaa ana awa i ola yabowaine Molok * wana abakululu ge putum Lepan yabowainena kakanununa te ku kalivail uleya . Gogoginol bolo ya ku ginolil ge ku kululuek elal . Inoke na patuna owaowa-agimiu nuku nok Babiloni .
44007044	Tubulau avaliya ge Petupatupa Limena hi nawanawa uleya . Hi tal i ola Yehoba wana baaba Mosese elana , ana awa i ola toto Yehoba i pankite .
44007045	Yaka tubulau bolo Yosuwa ge alonau hi ahe tamaliyau elal . Inoke sauga Yehoba Kenani gamagaliliyau i takel awoliyaa ge panuwa ya hi ahe wali panuwa , hi pwatanim . Yaka i minamina ge hi patuwalali ana siga Deibid wana sauga .
44007046	Yehoba i yaliyaya Deibid kaiwena , inoke Deibid i awanun elana tage limi etega ni tal Yakobo wana Yabowaine wana limi .
44007047	Yaa Solomon heiya Yehoba wana limi i tal .
44007048	Yaa Yehoba Tomihahaina nige i miminaa limi toto gamagalau hi tal elana . I ola palopita wana baaba i ba :
44007049	Yehoba i ba , ‘ Labulabum iya no abamisiyo wawasana , ge panayawi iya aeu ana abateli . He hauna kaba limi nasi nuku tal kaiweu , ge eliyana na veyahowa ?
44007050	Nau bugul bolo ya gegewena ya ginolil nimwawa . ’ ”
44007051	Inoke Sitibeni i baek al Yudiya wali tohouwa elal i ba , “ Toteli gegetoga hot komiu ! Atemiu ana bwaga i gan Yehoba elana ! Yehoba anana tanamiu i tuian ! Komiu ku ola ya tubumiyau : komiu sauga bwalibwaligena Yayaluwa Bwabwalena ku towani !
44007052	Hauna palopita ge tubumiyau nige hi papalomwan-an ? Nigeya ! He palopitau hi tagapaaligal bolo valila hi wasa hi ba , ‘ Abwe Tosasapona ni nem . ’ Yaka komiu Tosasapona o ku anagebigebi-an ge ku tagapaaliga .
44007053	He komiu Yehoba wana logugui ku ahe , logugui o aneloseyau hi pek tubumiyau elal , yaa nige ku hehenapu-an . ”
44007054	Yudiya wali tologugui baaba ya hi hago inoke tineliya i lut ge niniliya hi alahikan .
44007055	Yaa Sitibeni Yayaluwa Bwabwalena i kalaopopwi , inoke matana i ha labulabumwa , Yehoba mwananalina namanamalina i kite , ge Yeisu i kite i talmilil Yehoba nimana labena awonaa .
44007056	Inoke i ba , “ Ku kite ! Labulabum ya kite i mwapwela ge Gamagal Natuna ya kite i taltalmilil Yehoba nimana labena awonaa . ”
44007057	Yudiya wali tologugui tanaliya hi pikaus , ge hi loi analiya i bwata . Yaka gegewel hi patalelu noek Sitibeni elana , hi lib ,
44007058	hi momol tagilan panuwa ana gana tolinaa ge hi loipati . He towasa kakawi ali kaliko hi palo Sitibeni nihi loipati , inoke hi pwahin heval etega alana Sol aenaa , ge i matahikan .
44007059	Heliya iyoho pat hi alialihin elana inoke Sitibeni i awanun i ba , “ Babala Yeisu , yayaluwau u ahe . ”
44007060	Inoke i loepwakoku ge i yoga anana i bwata i ba , “ Babala , gegi toto hi giginol elau bahi nu lalahe elal . ” Baaba ya i baunan , yaka yawalina i mowasi .
44008001	He Sol iyoho ge Sitibeni wana yaomal i awa wawaisi-an . Yaka lan toto o ge i nok toekelesiya Yelusalema hi palomwanagil nabiyan . Yaka toekelesiya hi tatawaliwali hi noek Yudiya ge Sameliya ana labi gegewena elal , apostolowau ya te hi miminaa Yelusalema .
44008002	He gamagalau enuna bolo Yehoba hi awatauwan Sitibeni tuwana hi ahe hi na hi teli salaiya , ge hi kahin nabi kaiwena .
44008003	Yaa Sol nuwana toekelesiya ni apapanak-agil . Inoke i na limi maisena maisena elal , i tuk ge toabulilek melubolau ge meluyowau i yowanil , i ahel ge i na i telel dela .
44008004	Inoke toabulilek bolo hi tatawaliwali , hapanuwa nihi noek wasa waiwaisana nihi papaatena-an .
44008005	Pilipi i na Sameliya ana taun elana , ge Mesaiya wasana i papaatena-an gamagalau elal .
44008006	Gamagalau gegewel hi laegan bubun Pilipi elana , kaiwena wana baaba hi hago ge ginol yawiyawi i ginolil hi kite .
44008007	Yayaluwa bibikel hi loi ge hi ulutagilem gamagalau hi gewi elal , ge i ola al tonohomhom ge toelolol hi gewi i pwamolol .
44008008	Inoke gamagalau panuwa o elana yaliyaya bwabwatana hot hi pwawa .
44008009	Tokukula etega alana Saimon iyoho panuwa o elana , sauga i yapu kukula i awaawaginol inoke wana siba o kaiwena Sameliya gamagaliliyau gegewel nuwaliya i ahe . I ba tage iya gamagal bwabwatana etega ,
44008010	ge panuwa o elana gamagalau gegewel , bolo alaliya bwabwatana ge bolo nigeya , Saimon hi awatauwan . Hi ba , “ Saimon iya yabowaine toto alana ta ba ‘ Togasisi Hot . ’ ”
44008011	Sauga i yapu gamagalau nuwaliya hi ahe wana siba kaiwena inoke hi olak elana .
44008012	Yaa sauga Pilipi Yehoba wana abalogugui wasana waiwaisana ge Yeisu Keliso alana i papaatena-an elal , inoke bolau ge yowau hi abulilek ge hi babitaiso .
44008013	Saimon iya al i abulilek ge i babitaiso , inoke ebo Pilipi ga ni noek , Saimon alona ya , kaiwena ginol yawiyawi ge abanuwa ahi Pilipi i ginolil i kite ge nuwana i ahe .
44008014	Apostolowau heliya iyoho Yelusalema , wasa hi hago Sameliya gamagaliliyau iyaka Yehoba wana baaba hi ahe i tuk ateliyaa , inoke Pita ge Diyon hi patunal hi nok elal .
44008015	Sauga hi vin inoke hi awanun toabulilek kaiweliya Yayaluwa Bwabwalena nihi ahe ,
44008016	kaiwena Yayaluwa Bwabwalena nige ga i lalau toabulilek etegana elana , Babala Yeisu alana elana ya te hi babitaiso .
44008017	Inoke Pita ge Diyon nimaliya hi teli toabulilek kokowaliyaa , inoke Yayaluwa Bwabwalena hi ahe .
44008018	Saimon i kite apostolowau nimaliya hi teli toabulilek kokowaliyaa , ge toabulilek yaka Yayaluwa Bwabwalena hi ahe . Inoke mani i ahe tage ni pek Pita ge Diyon elal ge i ba ,
44008019	“ Gasisi toto ei ku pem elau , inoke nau al ge , ebo nimwau na teli gamagal etega kokowanaa , inoke Yayaluwa Bwabwalena ni ahe ni ulutuk elana . ”
44008020	Anana Pita i lahe i ba , “ Wam mani alom nuku yaomal , kaiwena u nuwatu tage Yehoba wana mulolu nu pwamola mani elana !
44008021	Owa nige alam i gagana tuwalali ya elana , kaiwena atem i biki nabi Yehoba matanaa .
44008022	Wam gegi toto ya ana en nu pek , ge nu awanun Babala elana wam nuwatu nanakina ya ni nuwayoho .
44008023	He ya kite lomwaketa ge huga ana nuwatu atem i pakalaopop ge gegi paganina i paloloyowan-agiwa . ”
44008024	Inoke Saimon i baek Pita ge Diyon elal i ba , “ Ku awanun Babala elana kaiweu , inoke bugul bolo baliya ku baunan bahi etega ni mamasal eliyau . ”
44008025	Pita ge Diyon wali aatena Yeisu kaiwena hi wasaan ge Yehoba wana baaba hi papaatena-an i mowasi , yaka abwe hi sikal Yelusalema . Wali sikal elana wasa waiwaisana hi papaatena-an labi Sameliya awanina hi gewi elal .
44008026	Babala wana anelose etega i baek Pilipi elana i ba , “ U tagilik , u na kamwasa toto i egona Yelusalema ge i na Gasa . ” Kamwasa ya i noek labi kekevana gamwanaa , nige awan etega i gagana .
44008027	Inoke Pilipi i telipuna i nawanawa . Sauga i nawanawa kamwasaa , yaka gagama Itiyopiya etega i pwawa , iya Itiyopiya wali kuin , o ebo ta ba Kandesi , wana totuwalali bwabwatana ge wana gogomwau ana tomatahikan . Tau ya valila i na i tapwalolo Yelusalema ,
44008028	inoke i sisikal wana panuwa kaiwena , i misiyowa wana waga momomol pwatanaa ge palopita Aiseya wana buki i vavasili .
44008029	Yaka Yayaluwa Bwabwalena i baek Pilipi elana i ba , “ U nok u na waga momomol labenaa . ”
44008030	Yaka Pilipi i patalelu i na waga momomol elana ge i hago tau o Aiseya wana buki i vavasili . Yaka i neli i ba , “ Buki toto u vavasili ei , ana sapu tab u atena ? ”
44008031	Tau o i ba , “ Nigeya ! Ebo gamagal etega ni pwamwananal eliyau inoke abwe na atena . ” Inoke i ba Pilipi i ha ge alona hi misiyo .
44008032	Buki toto i vavasiliya i ba i ola hiwe : Iya i ola sipi toto hi ahe ge hi pwatanik tagapaaliga kaiwena . Nige baaba etega i babaunan , i ola sipi natuna toto sauga ebo pupunona hi tomwatomwa , nige anana i gagan .
44008033	Hi papapuluwawi-an ge wana kot elana hi wole kakawe . Tubunau bolo ha mul nige bosowaina wasaliya ta wasaan , kaiwena yawalina panayawiya iyaka hi pwamowasi .
44008034	Gagama Itiyopiya i baek Pilipi elana i ba , “ No wasa ga u pem , henala bana palopita ya i baaba , totona bana o ebo gamagal getoga bana ? ”
44008035	Yaka Pilipi i liwaliwan elana , i telipunaa baaba bolo o elal buki Aiseya gamwanaa , inoke Yeisu wasana waiwaisana i wasaanik elana .
44008036	Hi patapatalelu kamwasaa , abwe wewel etega hi kite , inoke gagama Itiyopiya i ba , “ Wewel etega hiwe . Tab nasi bugul etega ni kausau ge nige na bababitaiso ? ”
44008037	Pilipi i baek elana i ba , “ Bosowaim ya nu babitaiso , ebo u abulilek ginebi ge atem bwalibwaligena . ” Tau o Pilipi anana i lahe i ba , “ Ibwe , ya abulilek Yeisu Keliso elana iya Yehoba Natuna . ” *
44008038	Gagama Itiyopiya i ba ge wana waga momomol hi paveyaho , inoke alona ge Pilipi , ali toto labui , hi na hi gailau wewela ge Pilipi tau o i pababitaiso .
44008039	Sauga hi gaihem wewela , yaka Babala Yayaluwana Pilipi i ahe egonan . Gagama Itiyopiya nige al Pilipi i kikite , inoke alona ge wana yaliyaya bwabwatana i noek wana panuwa ana kamwasaa .
44008040	Yaa Pilipi i na i masalek panuwa Asdod , inoke wasa waiwaisana i nopapaatena-an panuwa gegewel elal ana siga i vin Sisaliya .
44009001	Sol iyoho Yelusalema Babala wana tohago i pihigelgel-agil nuwana ni lolil . Yaka i nok topowon bwabwatal wali tohouwa elana ,
44009002	ge i awanun Yudiya wali tapwalolo ana tohouwa bolo Damasiko wali leta enuna ni ginolil . Leta o gamwaliyaa i ba ebo Yeisu wana kamwasa ana tototoulil Sol ni pwawal , ebo bolau ebo yowau , inoke bosowaina ni yowanil ge ni pwatanik Yelusalema . Inoke Sol leta o i bugulan ge i egon .
44009003	Sauga i nanawa Damasiko kaiwena ge kelaubwa ni vin , inoke abwe mwananal etega i loem labulabumwa ge Sol i yane painan .
44009004	Yaka i sogu i tala bilibiliya , ge anan etega i hago i baaba elana i ba , “ Sol , Sol ! Hauna kaiwena u papalomwan-agau ? ”
44009005	Yaka Sol i ba , “ Babala , henala owa ? ” Inoke wana nel i lahe i ba , “ Nau Yeisu toto u papalomwan-an .
44009006	He u lut ge u nok u na panuwaa , inoke abwe nihi baewa elam hauna gun nu ginol . ”
44009007	Bolau bolo avaliya Sol hi nawanawa hi taltalmilil , yaa nige baaba etega hi babaunan . Anan ya hi hago , yaa nige gamagal etega hi kikite .
44009008	Inoke Sol i lutem bilibiliya ge matana i panana , yaa nige bugul etega i kikite . Inoke hi aheya nimanaa ge hi pwatanik Damasiko .
44009009	Lan eton matana i gogou , ge i ola al nige aanan i aan ge nige wewel i iim .
44009010	Tohago etega alana Ananaiyasi i miminaa Damasiko . Pankite etega i masal eliyana inoke pankite o elana Babala i yogaan i ba , “ Ananaiyasi ! ” Anana i lahe i ba , “ Babala , nau iyehe . ”
44009011	Inoke Babala i baek elana i ba , “ U nok u na ga kamwasa elana , toto alana hi ba ‘ Kamwasa Sasapona , ’ inoke tau etega alana Sol , iya i neem Tasisi , nu loyaan Yudasa wana limiya , kaiwena iya iyoho i awaawanun .
44009012	Ana pankite elana tau etega alana Ananaiyasi i kite i nem , nimana i teli elana ge i awanun tage matana ni waisi al . ”
44009013	Ananaiyasi i ba , “ Babala , tau o wasana i gewi nabi ya hago . He iya te wam gamagalau bolo hi abulilek-agiwa Yelusalema elana i apapanak-agil .
44009014	Ge topowon bwabwatal gasisi hi pek elana inoke i nem te Damasiko tage gamagalau bolo hi kukululu alam elana ni yowanil . ”
44009015	Inoke Babala i baek elana i ba , “ U nok , kaiwena Sol iyaka ya hile ni tabwa no totuwalali . Iya alau ni wasaan bolo nige Isileli gamagaliliyau i oola avaliyau wali kin elal , ge i ola al gamagalau Isileli elal .
44009016	Ge nau abwe na pankite lomwan bwabwatana ni pwawa alau kaiwena . ”
44009017	Yaka Ananaiyasi i nok , i na i tuk limi gamwanaa , inoke nimana i teli elana ge i ba , “ Taliu Sol , Babala i patunau , iya Yeisu toto i masala elam sauga u nenem kamwasaa . I patunau ya nem matam na panana , ge Yayaluwa Bwabwalena nu kalaopopwi . ”
44009018	Sauga o bugul etega i ola moti unuliya i soguem Sol matanaa ge matana i waisi al , inoke i lut ge i babitaiso .
44009019	Yaka abwe i aanan ge tuwana i gasisi al . Lan enuna Sol i miminaa Damasiko alonau ge tohago .
44009020	Yaka sauga o i nok i na Yudiya wali limi tapwalolo elal ge i papaatena i ba , “ Yeisu iya Yehoba Natuna . ”
44009021	Gamagalau bolo hi lalaegan Sol elana nuwaliya hi ahe , ge hi nel hi ba , “ He iya tau toto valila Yelusalema elana bolo hi kululuwa alan ya elana i apapanak-agil , age ? Ge iya i nem labi ya nuwana ni yowanil , yaka ni ahel ge ni pwatanik topowon bwabwatal elal , age ? ”
44009022	He Sol wana papaatena i gagasisi nawa , inoke Yudiya bolo hi miminaa Damasiko i pankitel tunahot Yeisu iya Mesaiya , yaka nige bosowailiya anana nihi lahe .
44009023	Lan i gewi i mowasi inoke Yudiya hi migogo ge hi logugui tage Sol nihi tagapaaliga ,
44009024	yaa Sol iyaka wasa i hago wali logugui o kaiwena . Lan ge bulin panuwa ana abatagitagil hi matahikan , nuwaliya Sol nihi lol .
44009025	Inoke bulin etega Sol ana tototoulil egowa hi ahe ge Sol hi usana egowa gamwanaa , yaka hi pakuki lowana Damasiko ana gana gogohawanina etega elana .
44009026	Sol i na Yelusalema ge nuwana tage ni tuk tohago ali pwahin elana , yaa gegewel hi lovakunan , kaiwena nige hi aabulilek-an te iya iyaka i tabwa tohago .
44009027	Yaka Banabas Sol i ahe ge i pwatanik apostolowau elal , inoke wali wasa i pek i ba , “ Kamwasa elana Babala i masal Sol elana ge i baaba eliyana , ge Damasiko elana ginebi wana atimatuwa Yeisu alana i papaatena-an . ”
44009028	Inoke Sol alonau tohago hi miminaa o , yaka Yelusalema gamwana bwalibwaligena i nopainan ge ginebi wana atimatuwa i papaatena Babala alana elana .
44009029	I ola al alonau Yudiya bolo hi papana Gilik hi baaba ge hi awabalgig , yaa heliya kamwasa hi loya ge nihi tagapaaliga .
44009030	Sauga toabulilek wasa ya hi hago , yaka hi ahe ge hi pwatanik Sisaliya , inoke hi patuna i na wana panuwaa Tasisi .
44009031	Inoke toekelesiya Yudiya , Galili ge Sameliya ali labi gegewena elal hi mibubun nige palopalomwan hi pwapwawa . Yaka wali abulilek i gagasisi nawa , ge yawaliliya ana nawanawa alona wali awatauwan Babala elana . Ge Yayaluwa Bwabwalena wana labe eliyana ali pwahin i bwatabwata ya .
44009032	Pita i nopain toekelesiya panuwa maisena ge maisena elal , inoke sauga etega i nok Yehoba wana gamagalau elal bolo hi miminaa panuwa Lida .
44009033	Panuwa o elana toelolol etega i pwawa alana Ainiyasi , nige bosowaina ni lutem wana abakenuwa baliman ana gewi eit .
44009034	Pita i baek elana i ba , “ Ainiyasi , Yeisu Keliso i pwamolowa . U lut ge wam abakenu u abubun . ” Yaka sauga o Ainiyasi i lut .
44009035	Gamagalau gegewel bolo hi miminaa Lida ge labi Salon hi kite , inoke hi abulilek ge hi mipil awoliya hi pek Babala elana .
44009036	Panuwa Yopa elana yova etega alana Tabita , iya toabulilek , alana Pana Gilik elana hi ba Dokasa . * Wana sauga gegewena i talamwan tuwalali waiwaisana i ginol ge togulagula i label .
44009037	Saugenana o i kasiyebwa ge i aliga , inoke tuwana hi ul ge hi teliya limi gamwana toto natiya .
44009038	Yopa nige ana bwaga i gagan Lida elana . Inoke sauga tohago bolo hi miminaa Yopa wasa hi hago Pita iyoho Lida , yaka bolau labui hi patunal hi na hi baek Pita elana hi ba , “ Etimwawa u nem aloma owa ta nok wama panuwaa . ”
44009039	Inoke Pita i lut alonau hi nok . Sauga i vin , inoke hi en heyan limi gamwana toto natiya . Yaka abuabulau gegewel Pita hi mipainan hi kahikahin ge kaliko bolo Dokasa i helil sauga nige ga i aaliga hi pankite .
44009040	Pita i ba gegewel hi tagil limi gamwana natiya hi eguluwan , yaka i loepwakoku ge i awanun . I awanun haba , inoke i mipil ge i baek Dokasa bobowagana elana i ba , “ Tabita , u lut . ” Yaka matana i panana , ge sauga Pita i kite , i lut i misiyo .
44009041	Pita i aheya nimanaa , i labe ge i kukupamilil . Yaka abwe toabulilek ge abuabulau i yogaagil hi ulutuk , inoke Dokasa i pankitel iyaka i molu .
44009042	Inoke wana molu wasana i lelu Yopa ana labi gegewena elana , ge gamagalau hi gewi hi abulilek Babala elana .
44009043	Pita i miminaa Yopa lan i gewi al , i miminaa tau etega alana Saimon wana limiya . Tau ya wana tuwalali bwasumu kunisiliya elana bugul enuna i awaawaginol .
44010001	Gagama Loma etega i miminaa Sisaliya alana Koniliyo , iya Loma wali tolohaveyan ali gewi elulu bwagabwaga ( 100 ) wali tohouwa , heliya hi miminaa tolohaveyan ali boda bwabwatana etega gamwanaa alana hi ba , “ Bolo hi neem Itali . ”
44010002	Alonau ge wana limi ana heniheni Yehoba hi awatauwan ge hi tapwatapwalolo eliyana . I ola al togulagula i label nabiyan ge i awaawanun Yehoba elana .
44010003	Lan etega tili kilok kokoyaviya , pankite etega i masala elana . Yehoba wana anelose etegana i kite hoti i nem elana ge i ba , “ Koniliyo . ”
44010004	Koniliyo anelose i gagayawa-an ginebi wana lovakun yaka i ba , “ Babala , ga i ola ? ” Inoke anelose i ba , “ Wam awaawanun ge wam labe togulagula elal Yehoba i yaliyaya-an .
44010005	Inoke sauga ya bolau enuna nu patunal nihi na Yopa , ge Saimon toto alana al hi ba Pita nihi en pwatanim .
44010006	He i miminaa valihina Saimon , toto bwasumu kunisiliya elana bugul enuna i awaawaginol , wana limiya , iyoho hoga labenaa . ”
44010007	Anelose i baaba i mowasi inoke i egon . Yaka Koniliyo wana totuwalali labui ge ana tolabe tolohaveyan etega , toto Yehoba i awatauwan , i yogaagil .
44010008	Bugul gegewena i wasaanik elal inoke i patunal hi nok hi na Yopa .
44010009	Lan labuina heliya iyoho kamwasaa kelaubwa nihi vin panuwa Yopa , inoke alalati bwagatau wana labiya Pita i ha limi pwatanaa awanun kaiwena .
44010010	Yaka abwe Pita i galebu ge nuwana ni anan . Sauga heliya iyoho aanan hi lovilovivina limiya , inoke pankite etega i masal Pita elana .
44010011	I kite labulabum i mwapwela ge bugul etega ana awa i ola kaliko mamanana hi pihikana buhuna esopali ge hi pakuki lowanem labulabumwa i laulau panayawiya .
44010012	Bwasumu bolo aeliya esopali ge hi nawanawa tomaha ge tomaha heliya iyoho bugul o gamwanaa , ge i ola al bwasumu bolo hi yawayawal tomaha ge tomaha , ge bwasumu bolo hi youyou hawawala tomaha ge tomaha .
44010013	Yaka anan etega i hago i ba , “ Pita , u lut , bwasumu bolo ya u lolil ge u anil . ”
44010014	Pita i ba , “ Babala , bahiwa ! Nige sauga etega bwasumu bolo Logugui i lopwali ya aanil , eba ni pabikeyau . ”
44010015	Yaka anan i hago palabuina i ba , “ Bugul bolo Yehoba iyaka i ba i waisi , bahi nu aawa nanakan tage ni pabikewa . ”
44010016	Bugul ya i masal paeton Pita elana , yaka abwe kaliko mamanana o i sikal labulabumwa .
44010017	Pita iyoho i nuwanuwatu ana pankite ana sapu kaiwena . He bolau bolo Koniliyo i patunal , Saimon wana limi iyaka hi pwawa ge heliya iyoho hi taltalmilil ana abaulutuk elana .
44010018	Inoke hi yoga hi ba , “ Saimon toto alana hi ba Pita iyahe ei ? ”
44010019	Pita iyoho limi pwatanaa i nuwanuwatu ana pankite kaiwena , inoke Yayaluwa Bwabwalena i baek elana i ba , “ Pita , bolau eton hi loyaagiwa .
44010020	Inoke u lut u na u lau paiya . Bahi nuwam ni eeleluwa , nu nok ya nu na alomwau , kaiwena nau ya patunal . ”
44010021	Inoke Pita i na i lau paiya ge i baek bolau elal i ba , “ Nau heiya te ku loyaagau . Wami nuwatu ga i ola ge ku nem ? ”
44010022	Anana hi lahe hi ba , “ Koniliyo i patunama te ha nem e , iya tolohaveyan ali gewi elulu bwagabwaga wali tohouwa . Iya tau sasapona , i kululu Yehoba elana , ge Yudiya gegewel hi awatauwan . Yehoba wana anelose etega i baek elana ni yogaagiwa nu na wana limiya , inoke ni hago hauna nu baunan . ”
